The ice मुखाग्र is लगभग 60 m high

A glacier cave is a cave formed भीतर the ice of a glacier.
Glacier caves are often called ice caves, but this term is properly used to describe bedrock caves that contain year-round ice.
In physics, circular motion is a movement of an object along the circumference of a circle or rotation along a गोलाकार पाथ.
It can be uniform, with constant कोणीय रेट of रोटेशन ( and constant speed ), or non-uniform with a changing rate of rotation.
The rotation around a fixed axis of a three-dimensional देह involves गोलाकार गति of its parts.
The equations of motion describe the गति of the center of mass of a body.
Examples of circular motion include : an artificial satellite orbiting the Earth at constant height, a स्टोन which is tied to a rope and is being swung in circles, a car turning through a curve in a race track, an electron moving perpendicular to a uniform magnetic field, and a gear turning inside a mechanism.
Since the object 's velocity vector is constantly changing direction, the चलती ऑब्जेक्ट is undergoing acceleration by a centripetal force in the direction of the center of rotation.
Without this acceleration, the object would move in a straight line, according to न्यूटन 's laws of motion.
Apollo Creed is a fictional character from the Rocky films, initially portrayed as the Undisputed Heavyweight Champion of the World.
He was निभाई by Carl Weathers.
Creed had multiple nicknames, सहित the निपुण of विपत्ति, the किंग of Sting, The Dancing Destroyer, The Prince of Punch, The One and Only and The Count of Monte Fisto.
Urban legend states that Apollo Creed 's name is a wordplay on the Apostles ' Creed, a statement of belief used in Christian churches.
All of अपोलो 's चैंपियनशिप झगड़े were scheduled for the 15 round distance.
चैंपियनशिप झगड़े did not convert from 15 rounds to 12 rounds until 1987.

In the United States, the title of federal judge usually means a judge appointed by the President of the United States और पुष्टि by the संयुक्त राज्य सीनेट pursuant to the Appointments Clause in Article II of the United States Constitution.
In addition to the Supreme Court of the United States, whose existence and some aspects of whose jurisdiction are beyond the constitutional power of Congress to alter, acts of Congress have established 13 courts of appeals ( also called `` सर्किट न्यायालयों '' ) साथ appellate jurisdiction over different regions of the United States, and 94 United States district courts.
Every judge appointed to such a court may be categorized as a federal judge ; such positions include the Chief Justice and Associate Justices of the Supreme Court, Circuit Judges of the courts of appeals, and district न्यायाधीशों of the United States district courts.
All of these judges described thus far are referred to sometimes as `` Article III judges '' because they exercise the judicial power vested in the judicial branch of the federal government by Article III of the u.S. संविधान.
In addition, judges of the Court of International Trade exercise judicial power pursuant to Article III.
Other judges serving in the federal courts, including magistrate judges and bankruptcy judges, are also sometimes referred to as `` federal judges '' ; however, they are neither appointed by the अध्यक्ष nor पुष्टि by the सीनेट, और उनके power derives from Article I instead.
See Article I and Article iii अधिकरणों.
The Beretta 21A Bobcat is a small pocket-sized semi-automatic pistol designed by Beretta in Italy.
Production began in लेट 1984, solely in the Beretta U.S.A. facility in Accokeek, Maryland.
It is a further development of the beretta मॉडल 20, whose production ended in 1985.
Variable Universal Life Insurance ( often shortened to VUL ) is a प्रकार of जीवन बीमे कि builds a cash value.
In a VUL, the cash value can be invested in a wide variety of separate accounts, similar to mutual funds, and the choice of which of the available separate accounts to use is entirely up to the contract owner.
The 'variable ' component in the name refers to this ability to invest in separate accounts whose values vary—they vary because they are invested in stock and/or bond बाज़ार.
The 'universal ' component in the name refers to the flexibility the owner has in making premium भुगतान.
The premiums can vary from nothing in a given month up to maximums defined by the Internal Revenue Code लिये life insurance.
This flexibility is in contrast to whole life insurance that has fixed premium payments कि typically can not be missed without lapsing the policy ( although one may exercise an Automatic Premium Loan feature, or surrender dividends to pay a Whole Life premium ).
Variable universal life is a प्रकार of स्थाई जीवन बीमे, because the death benefit will be paid if the insured dies any time as long as there is sufficient cash value to pay the costs of insurance in the policy.
With most if not all VULs, unlike whole life, there is no endowment age ( the age at जिससे the cash value equals the death benefit amount, which for whole life is typically 100 ).
This is yet another key advantage of vul over Whole Life.
With a typical whole life policy, the death benefit is limited to the face amount specified in the policy, and at endowment age, the face amount is सब कि is सशुल्क out.
Thus with either death or endowment, the insurance company keeps any cash value built up over the years.
However, कुछ participating पूरे जीवन नीतियों प्रस्ताव राइडर्स जिससे बताएँ कि कोई dividends सशुल्क on the नीति be प्रयुक्त to खरीदें `` सशुल्क up परिवर्धन '' to the नीति जिससे बढ़ाएँ दोनो the नकदी मान और the मौत लाभ over समय.
If investments made in the separate accounts out-perform the general account of the insurance कम्पनी, a उच्चतर rate-of-return can occur than the fixed rates-of-return typical for whole life.
The combination over the years of no endowment age, continually increasing death benefit, and if a high rate-of-return is earned in the separate accounts of a VUL policy, this could result in higher value to the owner or beneficiary than that of a whole जीवन नीति साथ the वही amounts of धन सशुल्क in as premiums.
The outdoor wood boiler is a रूपांतर of the classic wood stove adapted for set-up outdoors while still transferring the heat to interior buildings.

Girl Scout Cookies are cookies sold by Girl Scouts of the USA ( GSUSA ) as one of its major fundraisers for local Scout units.
Members of the GSUSA have been selling cookies since 1917 to उठाएँ निधि.
लड़कियों जो participate can earn prizes for their efforts.

As of 2007, sales were estimated at परिचय 200 लाख boxes per year.
University हॉल
Purdue University, located in West Lafayette, Indiana, is the फ्लैगशिप university of the six-campus Purdue University system.
Purdue was founded on May 6, 1869, as a land-grant university जब the इंडियाना सामान्य Assembly, taking advantage of the Morrill Act, accepted a donation of land and money from Lafayette businessman John Purdue to establish a college of science, technology, and agriculture in his name.
The first classes were held on September 16, 1874, साथ छह instructors and 39 students.
Today, Purdue is a member of the Big Ten Conference, and is a well known world-class research institution.
Purdue enrolls the second largest student body of any university in Indiana as well as the fourth largest अंतरराष्ट्रीय छात्र जनसांख्यिकी of any university in the United States.
Purdue offers both undergraduate and graduate programs in over 211 major areas of study, और is खूब ज्ञात for its competitive engineering curricula.
The university has also been highly influential in America 's history of aviation, having established the first college credit offered in flight training, the first four-year bachelor 's degree in aviation, and the first university airport ( Purdue University Airport ).
Purdue 's aviation प्रौद्योगिकी कार्यक्रम remains one of the most competitive aviation-specific programs in the world.
In the mid-20th सदी, purdue 's aviation program expanded to encompass advanced spaceflight technology giving rise to Purdue 's nickname, Cradle of Astronauts.
Twenty-three Purdue graduates have gone on to become astronauts, including Gus Grissom ( one of the original Mercury Seven astronauts ), Neil Armstrong ( the first person to walk on the moon ), और यूजीन cernan ( the सबसे हाल व्यक्ति to चलना on the moon ).
A sebaceous cyst ( ) is a term that loosely refers to either epidermoid cysts ( also known as epidermal cysts ; L72.0 ) or pilar cysts ( भी ज्ञात as trichilemmal cysts ; L72.1 ).
Because an epidermoid गाँठ originates in the epidermis and a pilar cyst originates from hair follicles, by definition, neither type of cyst is strictly a sebaceous cyst.
The name is regarded as a misnomer as the fatty, white, semi-solid material in both of these गाँठ entities is नहीं sebum, लकिन keratin.
Furthermore, under the microscope neither entity contains sebaceous glands.
In practice, however, the terms are often प्रयुक्त interchangeably.
`` True '' sebaceous cysts are relatively rare and are known as steatocystomas or, if अनेक, as steatocystoma multiplex.
Modern pointe shoes.
The edge of the toe pad, which is inserted between the foot and toe box for cushioning, can be seen on the सही पैर.
A pointe shoe is a type of shoe worn by ballet dancers when performing pointe कार्य.
Pointe shoes developed from the desire for dancers to appear weightless and sylph -like and have evolved to enable dancers to नृत्य en pointe ( on the tips of their toes ) for extended periods of time.
They are normally worn by female dancers, though male dancers may wear them for unorthodox roles such as the ugly stepsisters in Cinderella, Bottom in A Midsummer Night 's Dream, or men performing as महिलाओं in नृत्य कंपनियाँ ऐसे as लेस नाटिकाओं trockadero और grandiva.
They are manufactured in a variety of colors, most commonly in shades of लाइट गुलाबी.
This tablespoon has a capacity of about 15 mL.
Measuring spoons
In the US and parts of Canada, a tablespoon is the largest type of spoon used for eating from a bowl.
In the uk, यूरोपीय और most Commonwealth countries, a tablespoon is a type of large spoon usually used for serving.
In countries where a tablespoon is a सेवारत spoon, the nearest equivalent to the US tablespoon is either the dessert spoon or the soup spoon.
A tablespoonful, nominally the capacity of one tablespoon, is commonly used as a measure of volume in कुकिंग.
It is abbreviated as T, tb, tbs, tbsp, tblsp, or tblspn.
The क्षमता of ordinary tablespoons is not regulated by law and is subject to considerable variation.
In the USA one tablespoon ( मापन ईकाई ) is लगभग 15 mL ; the capacity of an actual tablespoon ( dining utensil ) ranges from 7 mL to 14 mL.
In Australia एक tablespoon ( measurement unit ) is 20 mL.
Harry Potter is a series of seven fantasy novels written by the अंग्रेजों लेखक J. K. Rowling.
The books chronicle the adventures of a wizard, Harry कुम्हार, और उसके मित्रों Ronald Weasley and Hermione Granger, all of whom are students at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.
the प्रमुख स्टोरी चाप चिंताएं हैरी 's क्वेस्ट to overcome the Dark wizard Lord Voldemort, whose aims are to become immortal, conquer the wizarding world, subjugate non-magical people, and destroy all those who stand in his way, especially Harry Potter.
Since the release of the first novel Harry कुम्हार और the पारस 's स्टोन on 30 June 1997, the books have gained immense popularity, critical acclaim and commercial success worldwide.
The series has also had some share of criticism, including concern for the increasingly अंधेरा tone.
, the book series has sold about 450 million copies, बनाना it the best-selling book series in history, and has been translated into 67 languages.
The last four किताबे consecutively set records as the fastest-selling books in history.
A series of many genres, including fantasy and coming of age ( with elements of mystery, थ्रिलर, एडवेंचर, और romance ), it has many cultural meanings and references.
According to रोलिंग, the main theme is death.
वहीँ हैं भी many other themes in the series, such as prejudice and corruption.
The initial major publishers of the books were bloomsbury in the संयुक्त Kingdom and Scholastic Press in the United States.
The books have since been published by many publishers worldwide.
The books, with the seventh book split into two parts, have महरूम made into an eight-part film series by Warner Bros. Pictures, the highest-grossing film series of all time.
The series also originated much tie-in merchandise, making the Harry Potter ब्रांड लायक in excess of $ 15 billion.
Also due to the success of the books and films, Harry कुम्हार रै महरूम प्रयुक्त लिये a थीम पार्क, The Wizarding World of Harry Potter in Universal Parks & Resorts 's Islands of Adventure.

A rocket engine, or बस `` प्रक्षेपास्त्र '', is a जेट इंजन कि उपयोग only stored propellant mass for forming its high speed propulsive jet.
Rocket engines are प्रतिक्रिया engines and obtain thrust in accordance with Newton 's third law.
Since they need no बाह्य सामग्री to रूप their jet, rocket engines can be used for spacecraft propulsion as well as terrestrial uses, such as missiles.
Most rocket engines are internal combustion engines, although non-combusting फ़ॉर्म भी मौजूद.
Rocket engines as a group have the highest exhaust velocities, are by far the lightest, but are the least propellant कुशल of सब types of jet engines.
``... baby एक अधिक समय '' is a सोंग by American recording artist Britney Spears.
It served as Spears 's debut सिंगल and title track from her debut studio album,... Baby One More Time ( 1999 ).
Written by Max Martin and produced by Martin and Rami, ``... Baby One अधिक समय '' थी released on सितंबर 30, 1998, by Jive Records.
After recording and sending a demo tape with an unused song from Toni Braxton, Spears signed a multi-album सौदे साथ Jive.
``... Baby One More Time '' is a teen pop and dance-pop song that refers to a girl who regrets तोड़कर up साथ her boyfriend.
The song received generally favorable समीक्षाएँ इससे आलोचकों, जो praised its composition.
``... Baby One More Time '' attained global success, reaching number one in every country it charted.
It also received numerous certifications around the world, and is one of the best-selling singles of सब समय, साथ over 10 लाख नक़ल sold.
An accompanying म्यूज़िक वीडियो, निर्देशित by निगेल लंड, portrays स्पीयर्स as a छात्र इससे a कैथोलिक ऊँची स्कूल, जो starts to daydream कि वो is गायन और नाचना around the स्कूल, जबकि watching उसके प्रेम ब्याज इससे अफ़ार.
The music video was later referenced in the music वीडियो of `` If U Seek Amy `` ( 2008 ), where Spears 's fictional daughter is dressed with a similar schoolgirl outfit while wearing pink ribbons in her hair.
In 2010, the music video for ``... Baby One अधिक समय '' थी voted the third most influential video in the history of pop music, in a poll held by Jam !.
Spears has performed ``... Baby One अधिक समय '' in a number of live appearances and in all of her concert tours.
It was the encore of the... Baby One More Time Tour ( 1999 ) and Dream Within a Dream Tour ( 2001 ) ; Spears also performed remixed संस्करण of the song during the Oops !...
I Did It Again World Tour ( 2000 ), The Onyx Hotel Tour ( 2004 ), The M+M 's Tour ( 2007 ), The Circus Starring Britney Spears ( 2009 ), and the Femme Fatale Tour ( 2011 ).
``... Baby One More Time '' was nominated for a Grammy Award लिये बेहतरीन मादा Pop Vocal Performance, and has been included in lists by Blender, Rolling Stone and VH1.
It has been noted for redefining the sound of late 1990s म्यूज़िक.
Spears has named ``... baby एक अधिक समय '' as one of her favorite songs from her career.
It was also the final song to be played on the बीबीसी 's म्यूज़िक कार्यक्रम Top of the Pops.
हैजा is an infection in the small intestine caused by the bacterium Vibrio cholerae.
The main symptoms are watery diarrhea and vomiting.
Transmission occurs primarily by drinking water or eating food that has been contaminated by the feces ( waste product ) of an infected person, including one with no apparent symptoms.
The severity of the diarrhea and vomiting can lead to rapid dehydration and electrolyte असंतुलन, और death in some cases.
the प्राथमिक उपचार is मौखिक पुनर्जलीकरण therapy, typically with oral rehydration solution, to replace water and electrolytes.
if इस is नहीं tolerated or does not provide improvement fast enough, intravenous fluids can also be used.
Antibacterial drugs are beneficial in those with severe बीमारी to shorten its duration and severity.
Worldwide, it affects 3–5 million people and कल्याणकारी 100,000–130,000 deaths a year.
Cholera was one of the earliest infections to be studied by epidemiological methods.
The Picture of Dorian धूसर is the तभी प्रकाशित novel by Oscar Wilde, appearing as the lead story in Lippincott 's Monthly Magazine on 20 June 1890, printed as the July 1890 issue of this magazine.
The magazine 's editors feared the story was indecent as सुपुर्द, so they censored roughly 500 words, without Wilde 's knowledge, before publication.
But even with that, the story was still greeted with outrage by British reviewers, some of whom सुझाया कि वाइल्ड चाहिए be prosecuted on moral grounds, leading Wilde to defend the novel aggressively in letters to the British press.
Wilde later revised the story for book publication, making substantial alterations, deleting controversial passages, adding new chapters and including an aphoristic Preface which has since become famous in its own right.
The amended version थी published by Ward, Lock and Company in April 1891.
Some scholars believe that Wilde would today have wanted us to read the version he originally submitted to Lippincott 's.
The novel tells of a young man named Dorian धूसर, the विषय of a painting by artist Basil Hallward.
Basil is impressed by Dorian 's beauty and becomes infatuated with him, believing his beauty is responsible for a new mode in his art.
Dorian meets Lord हेनरी wotton, a friend of Basil 's, and becomes enthralled by Lord Henry 's world view.
Espousing a new hedonism, Lord Henry suggests the only things worth pursuing in life are beauty और fulfilment of the senses.
Realizing that one day his beauty will fade, Dorian ( whimsically ) expresses a desire to sell his soul to ensure the portrait Basil has painted would age rather than he.
Dorian 's wish is fulfilled, and when he subsequently pursues a life of debauchery, the पोर्ट्रेट serves as a स्मरण of the effect each act has upon his soul, with each sin displayed as a disfigurement of his form, or through a sign of aging.
The Picture of Dorian Gray is माना a कार्य of classic Gothic fiction with a strong Faustian theme.
Sári Gábor ( born 6 February 1917 ), known as Zsa Zsa Gabor ( ), is a Hungarian -born American अभिनेत्री जो acted in supporting भूमिकाएँ in फिल्मों, on Broadway, and occasionally on television.
Gabor was also a socialite.
She began her stage career in Vienna at age 15, and was पहनाया मिस हंगेरियाई in 1936.
She emigrated to the United States in 1941 and became a sought-after actress with `` European flair and स्टाइल '', साथ a व्यक्तित्व that `` exuded charm and grace ''.
Her first movie role was as supporting actress in प्यारे to Look At.
She later acted in We 're Not Married !
and played one of her few leading roles in Moulin Rouge ( 1952 ), directed by John Huston, who described her as a `` विश्वसनीय '' actress.
Besides her film and television appearances, she is best known for having nine husbands, including hotel महारथी कोनराड हिल्टन और कर्ता जार्ज Sanders.
वो एकबार stated, `` मेन have सदा liked me और i have सदा liked मेन.
But I like a mannish man, a man who knows how to talk to and treat a woman – not just a man with muscles. ''
Bruce Lee ( traditional : 李小龍 ; born Lee Jun-fan ; 27 November 1940 – 20 July 1973 ) was a Chinese American martial कलाकार, कर्ता, martial arts instructor, philosopher, and filmmaker.
The founder of Jeet kune do, ली was the son of Cantonese opera star Lee Hoi-Chuen.
He is widely considered by commentators, critics, media and other martial artists to be one of the most influential martial artists of सब समय, और a pop culture icon of the 20th century.
He is often credited with helping to change the रास्ता एशियाइ यहूद प्रस्तुत in अमरीकी films.
Lee was born in चाइनाटाउन, सैन फ्रांसिस्को on 27 November 1940 to parents from Hong Kong and was raised in Kowloon with his family until his late teens.
He was introduced to the film उद्योग by his father and appeared in several films as a child actor.
Lee moved to the United States at the age of 18 to receive his higher education, and it was during this time that he began शिक्षण martial कला.
His Hong Kong and Hollywood -produced films elevated the traditional Hong Kong martial arts film to a new level of popularity and acclaim, sparking a surge of ब्याज in चाइनीज martial arts in the West in the 1970s.
The direction and tone of his films changed and influenced martial arts and martial arts films in Hong Kong and the rest of the world.
He is noted for his roles in five feature-length films : lo वेई 's the बिग boss ( 1971 ) और Fist of Fury ( 1972 ) ; Way of the Dragon ( 1972 ), directed and written by Lee ; Warner Brothers ' Enter the Dragon ( 1973 ) and The Game of Death ( 1978 ), both directed by Robert Clouse.
Lee became an iconic figure known throughout the world, विशेषकर among the चाइनीज, as he portrayed Chinese nationalism in his films.
He initially trained in Wing Chun, but later rejected well-defined martial art styles, favouring instead the use of तकनीकों इससे विभिन्न स्त्रोत, in the spirit of his personal martial arts philosophy, which he dubbed Jeet Kune Do ( The Way of the Intercepting Fist ).
Lee आयोजित dual citizenship of Hong Kong and the United States.
He died in Kowloon Tong on 20 जुलाई 1973 at age 32.
Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ), also known as chronic obstructive lung disease ( COLD ), chronic obstructive airway disease ( COAD ), chronic airflow limitation ( CAL ) and chronic obstructive respiratory बीमारी ( CORD ), is the occurrence of chronic bronchitis or emphysema, a pair of commonly co-existing diseases of the lungs in which the airways narrow over time.
This limits airflow to and from the lungs, causing shortness of साँस ( dyspnea ).
In clinical practice, COPD is defined by its characteristically low airflow on फेफड़ों फलन परीक्षण.
In contrast to asthma, this limitation is poorly reversible and usually gets progressively worse over समय.
COPD is caused by noxious particles or gas, most commonly from tobacco smoking, which triggers an abnormal inflammatory response in the lung.
The diagnosis of COPD requires lung function परीक्षण.
Important management रणनीति हैं धूम्रपान cessation, vaccinations, rehabilitation, and drug therapy ( often using inhalers ).
Some patients go on to require long-term oxygen चिकित्सा or फेफड़ों प्रत्यारोपण.
Worldwide, COPD क्रमित as the sixth leading cause of death in 1990.
It is प्रक्षिप्त to become the चौथी अग्रणी cause of death worldwide by 2030, due to an increase in smoking rates and demographic changes in many countries.
COPD is the third leading cause of death in the U.S., and the economic burden of COPD in the U.S. in 2007 was $ 42.6 billion in health care costs and lost productivity.
Annelies `` Anne '' Marie Frank (, ?, ; 12 June 1929early March 1945 ) is एक of the most discussed Jewish victims of the Holocaust.
उसके डायरी has been the basis for several plays and films.
Born in the city of Frankfurt am Main in Weimar Germany, वो जिया सबसे of उसके जीवन in or near Amsterdam, in the Netherlands.
Born a German नेशनल, Frank lost her citizenship in 1941.
She gained अंतरराष्ट्रीय कीर्ति posthumously after her diary was published.
It documents her experiences hiding during the German occupation of the नीदरलैंड्स in संसार War II.
The Frank family moved from Germany to Amsterdam in 1933, the year the Nazis gained control over Germany.
By the beginning of 1940, they were trapped in Amsterdam by the नाजी occupation of the Netherlands.
As persecutions of the यहूदी जनसांख्यिकी increased in July 1942, the family went into hiding in the hidden rooms of Anne 's father, Otto Frank 's, office building.
After two years, the समूह was betrayed and transported to concentration camps.
Anne Frank and her sister, Margot, were eventually transferred to the bergen-belsen विशेषज्ञता camp, where they died of typhus in March 1945.
Otto Frank, the only survivor of the family, returned to Amsterdam after the war to find that Anne 's diary had been saved, and his efforts led to इसके प्रकाशन in 1947.
It was translated from its original Dutch and first published in English in 1952 as the डायरी of a Young Girl.
It has since been अनूदित into many languages.
The diary, which was given to Anne on her 13th birthday, क्रॉनिकल्स उसके जीवन इससे 12 June 1942 until 1 August 1944.
कर्ट 's signature
Kurt Donald Cobain ( February 20, 1967 – April 5, 1994 ) was an American musician and artist, best known as the lead सिंगर, guitarist and primary songwriter of the grunge band Nirvana.
Cobain formed Nirvana with Krist Novoselic in Aberdeen, Washington in 1985 and established it as part of the Seattle music scene, having its डेब्यू एल्बम ब्लीच released on the independent record label Sub Pop in 1989.
After signing साथ प्रमुख लेबल dgc रिकॉर्ड, the बैंड found breakthrough success with `` Smells Like Teen Spirit `` from its second album Nevermind ( 1991 ).
Following the success of Nevermind, Nirvana was labeled `` the flagship band '' of Generation X, and कोबेन hailed as `` the spokesman of a generation ''.
Cobain, however, was often uncomfortable and frustrated, believing his message and artistic vision to have been misinterpreted by the public, with his निजी मुद्दे प्रायः subject to media attention.
He challenged Nirvana 's audience with its final स्टुडियो एल्बम In Utero ( 1993 ).
During the last सालो of उसके जीवन, Cobain struggled with heroin addiction, illness and depression.
He भी था परेशानी coping साथ उसके कीर्ति और public image, and the professional and lifelong personal pressures surrounding himself and his wife, musician Courtney Love.
On April 8, 1994, Cobain थी मिला मुर्दे at उसके घर in Seattle, the victim of what was officially ruled a suicide by a self-inflicted shotgun wound to the head.
the हालातों of his death at age 27 have become a topic of public fascination and debate.
चूंकि उनके डेब्यू, Nirvana, with Cobain as a songwriter, has sold over 25 million albums in the U.S., and over 50 million worldwide.

Radial engine of a बाईप्लेन
Master rod ( upright ), slaves and balances from a two-row, fourteen-cylinder Pratt & Whitney Twin Wasp
The radial engine is a reciprocating type आतंरिक combustion engine configuration in which the cylinders point outward from a central crankshaft like the spokes of a wheel.
It resembles a stylized स्टार जब viewed from the front, and is called a `` star engine '' ( German Sternmotor ) in some languages.
The radial configuration was very commonly used in aircraft engines before टर्बाइन engines became predominant.
The Golden Girls is an American sitcom, created by Susan Harris, that originally aired on NBC from September 13, 1985, to May 9, 1992.
Starring Bea Arthur, Betty White, Rue McClanahan and Estelle Getty, the show centers on four older women sharing a home in मियामी, फ्लोरिडा.
It was produced by Witt/Thomas/Harris Productions, in association with Touchstone टेलीविज़न, और पॉल junger witt, टोनी Thomas, and Harris served as the original executive producers.
The Golden Girls received critical acclaim throughout most of its run and won अनेक पुरस्कार, सहित the Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Comedy Series twice.
It also won three Golden Globe Awards for Best टेलीविज़न श्रेणी – Musical or Comedy.
All four stars each received an Emmy Award throughout the series ' run and had अनेक nominations.
The series also क्रमित among the top ten highest-rated programs for six out of its seven seasons.
Deepwater drilling is the process of oil and gas खोजी और उत्पादन in गहराइयों of more than 500 feet.
By this परिभाषा, वहीँ हैं लगभग 600 deepwater wells in the Gulf of Mexico.
It has been economically infeasible for many years, but with rising oil prices, more companies हैं निवेश in this area.
Major companies working in this sector include Diamond Offshore, TransOcean, and Baker Hughes.
There are basically two kinds of mobile deepwater drilling rigs : semi-submersible drilling rigs and drillships.
Drilling can भी be performed इससे a fixed-position installation such as a floating spar ( platform ) or tension-leg platform.
हाल उद्योग विश्लेषण रै अनुमानित that the total expenditure in the global deepwater infrastructure market will reach $ 145bn in 2011.
“Not all oil is accessible on जमीन or in उथले जल.
You can find some oil deposits buried deep under the ocean floor.”... Using sonic equipment, oil companies determine the drilling sites most likely to produce oil.
Then they use a mobile offshore drilling unit ( MODU ) to dig the आरंभिक खूब.
Some units are converted into उत्पादन rigs, meaning they switch from drilling for oil to capturing oil once it 's found.
Most of the time, the oil company will replace the MODU साथ a अधिक स्थाई आयल उत्पादन rig to capture oil.”... The MODU 's job is to drill down into the ocean 's floor to find oil deposits.
The part of the drill that extends below the deck and through the जल is पुकारा the riser.
The riser allows for drilling fluids to move between the floor and the rig.
Engineers lower a drill string -- a series of pipes designed to drill down to the आयल जमा -- through the riser.”
“The expansion of deepwater खुदाई is happening despite accidents in offshore fields... ”
In 2010 a large explosion occurred killing 11 workers and spilling millions of gallons of oil into the Gulf of Mexico while a BP oil rig was खुदाई in गहन waters.
“... Despite the risks, the deepwater खुदाई ट्रेंड is spreading in the Mediterranean and off the coast of East Africa after a string of huge discoveries of natural gas.”
“The reason for the resumption of such drilling, analyst say, is continuing high demand for energy worldwide.”
America needs the oil so it is almost necessary to face the high risks that come with deepwater खुदाई in अनुक्रम for Americans to continue to carry on their everyday lives.
“The Energy Department recently projected that gulf oil production होता विस्तार इससे its 2011 level of 1.3 million barrels a day, still nearly a quarter of total domestic production, to 2 million barrels a day by 2020.”
Deepwater drilling affects the environment in दोनो negative and positive ways.
Although Deepwater drilling rarely causes oil spills it is स्टिल a hazardous possible outcome.
Oil spills परिणाम in oil sinking to the bottom of the ocean smothering plant life leaving fish without food and shelter to survive.
On the other हाथ deepwater drilling effects the environment in a positive ways too.
In time once the deepwater oil well is not in उपयोग anymore पौधे होगा grow on और around the well making a cave or cavern like shelter ideal for animals to thrive in.
Deepwater drilling also lets us see the depths of the ocean floor that are hardly ever seen.
”Cameras on rovers at the bottom of the wells record footage and take photos of rare fish that are in there natural habitat, giving scientist a look at animals they rarely seen” ( Chevron Corporation ). ''
Monica Samille Lewinsky ( born July 23, 1973 ) is an American woman with whom United States President Bill Clinton admitted to having had an `` improper relationship '' while she worked at the श्वेत हाउस in 1995 और 1996.
the affair और इसके परखना ( जिससे शामिल क्लिंटन 's महाभियोग ) became ज्ञात as the lewinsky कांड.
Francis Albert `` Frank '' Sinatra,, ( December 12, 1915 – May 14, 1998 ) was an American सिंगर और फिल्मी कर्ता.
Beginning his musical career in the झूले era साथ हैरी जेम्स और टॉमी Dorsey, Sinatra found unprecedented success as a solo artist from the early to mid-1940s after being signed to Columbia Records in 1943.
Being the idol of the `` bobby soxers ``, he released his first album, The आवाज़ of फ़्रैंक सिनात्रा in 1946.
His professional career had stalled by the 1950s, but it was पुनर्जन्म in 1953 बाद he won the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor for his performance in From Here to Eternity.
He signed with Capitol Records in 1953 and released several critically lauded एल्बम ( ऐसे as in the मूत छोटी Hours, Songs for Swingin ' Lovers !, Come Fly with Me, Only the Lonely and Nice 'n ' Easy ).
Sinatra left Capitol to found his own record label, Reprise Records in 1961 ( finding success with albums ऐसे as ring-a-ding-ding !, Sinatra at the Sands and Francis Albert Sinatra & Antonio Carlos Jobim ), toured internationally, was a founding member of the Rat Pack and fraternized with celebrities and statesmen, including John F. Kennedy.
Sinatra turned 50 in 1965, recorded the retrospective सितंबर of My Years, starred in the Emmy -winning television special Frank Sinatra : A Man and His Music, and scored hits with `` Strangers in the Night `` and `` My Way ``.
With sales of his music dwindling and after appearing in several poorly received films, Sinatra retired for the first time in 1971.
Two years later, however, he came out of retirement and in 1973 recorded several albums, scoring a Top 40 hit with `` ( Theme From ) New York, नई यॉर्क `` in 1980.
Using his Las Vegas shows as a home base, he toured both within the United States and internationally, until a short time before his death in 1998.
Sinatra also forged a highly successful career as a फिल्मी actor.
After winning Best Supporting Actor in 1953, he also garnered a nomination for Best Actor for The Man with the Golden Arm, and critical acclaim for his प्रदर्शन in The Manchurian Candidate.
He भी स्ट्रक्चर in ऐसे musicals as High Society, Pal Joey, Guys and Dolls and On the Town.
Sinatra was honored at the Kennedy Center Honors in 1983 and was awarded the अध्यक्षीय Medal of Freedom by Ronald Reagan in 1985 and the Congressional Gold Medal in 1997.
He was the recipient of eleven Grammy Awards, including the ग्रैमी trustees पुरस्कार, ग्रैमी Legend Award and the Grammy Lifetime Achievement Award.
Sinatra is also one of world’s best-selling artists of all time, having sold more than 150 million copies worldwide.
Typical cornhole board
Cornhole, also known as bean bag toss, corn toss, baggo or bags, is a lawn game in which players take turns throwing corn hole bags at a raised platform with a hole in the far end.
A bag in the छेद स्कोर 3 points, while one on the platform scores 1 point.
Play continues until a team or खिलाड़ी पहुँच the score of 21.
The American Gold Eagle is an official सुनहरा bullion सिक्का of the United States.
प्राधिकृत under the Gold Bullion Coin Act of 1985, it was first released by the United States Mint in 1986.
Bikram Yoga is a system of yoga that Bikram Choudhury synthesized from traditional hatha योग तकनीकों और popularized beginning in the early 1970s.
All Bikram Yoga classes run for 90 मिनट्स और consist of the same series of 26 postures and 2 breathing exercises.
Bikram Yoga is ideally practiced in a रूम heated to 105°f ( ≈ 40.6°c ) with a humidity of 40 %,.

A teaspoon is an item of cutlery and/or a measuring instrument, as well as a unit of measurement of volume in some countries and customs.
A fern is any one or more of a group of about 12,000 species of plants belonging to the botanical group known as Pteridophyta.
Unlike mosses, they have xylem और फ्लोएम ( बनाना them vascular plants ).
They have stems, leaves, और जड़ें जैसे अन्य vascular plants.
Ferns reproduce via बीजाणुओं और have neither seeds nor flowers.
By far the largest group of ferns is the leptosporangiate ferns, but ferns as defined here ( also called monilophytes ) include horsetails, whisk ferns, marattioid ferns, और ophioglossoid ferns.
The term pteridophyte also refers to ferns and a few other seedless vascular plants ( see classification section below ).
Ferns first appear in the चट्टान रिकार्ड 360 million years ago in the Carboniferous but many of the current families and species did not appear until roughly 145 million years ago in the early Cretaceous ( after flowering plants came to dominate many environments ).
Ferns are not of major economic importance, but some are grown or gathered for food, as ornamental plants, for remediating contaminated soils, and have been the subject of research for their ability to remove some chemical pollutants from the air.
Some हैं significant weeds.
They also play a भूमिका in mythology, medicine, and art.
Flat roofs in Israel
Flat छत in Los Angeles
A flat roof is a type of covering लिये a भवन.
In contrast to the more sloped form of roof, a flat roof is horizontal or nearly horizontal.
The slope of a roof is properly ज्ञात as इसके पिच : roofs which are nearly flat are known as low-pitch roofs ( as the angle of slope increases, so the pitch is said to increase ).
Any sheet of material used to cover a चपटा or low-pitched छत is प्रायः ज्ञात as a membrane and the primary purpose of these membranes is to waterproof the roof area.
Materials that cover flat roofs typically allow the water to चलाएं बंद इससे a पतला inclination or camber into a gutter system.
Water इससे कुछ चपटा roofs ऐसे as on garden sheds sometimes flows freely off the edge of a roof, though gutter systems are of advantage in keeping both walls and foundations dry.
Gutters on smaller roofs often lead water directly onto the ground, or better, into a विशेषकर made soakaway.
Gutters on larger roofs usually lead water into the rainwater drainage system of कोई निर्मित up area.
Occasionally flat roofs though are designed to collect water in a pool, usually for aesthetic purposes, or for rainwater buffering.
Flat roofs exist all over the world and each area has its अपना परंपरा or वरीयता लिये materials used.
In warmer climes where rainfall is less and freezing is unlikely to occur, many flat roofs are simply built of masonry or concrete and this is good at keeping out the heat of the सूर्य और सस्ती और आसान to निर्माण जहाँ timber is नहीं readily available.
In areas where the roof could become saturated by बरसात और लीक, or where water soaked into the brickwork could freeze to ice and thus lead to 'blowing ' ( breaking up of the mortar/brickwork/concrete by the expansion of ice as it forms ) these roofs are not suitable.
traditionally सबसे flat roofs in the western world make use of tar or more usually tar paper applied over roof decking to keep a building watertight.
The tar or tarpaper is in turn covered in gravel to keep the sun 's heat, UV rays and weather off it and helps protect it इससे cracking or blistering and degradation.
Roof अलंकार is प्रायः of प्लाईवुड, chipboard or OSB boards ( OSB = Oriented Strand Board, also known as Sterling board ) of around 18mm thickness.
The tar coating is लागू in एक or अधिक coats as a hot liquid, heated in a tar kettle, or as sheets of tar impregnated 'paper ' glued down and sealed together at joints by hot tar - once it has cooled, the gravel is spread evenly over it.
A main reason for failure of these traditional roofs is ignorance or lack of maintenance where people or events cause the gravel to be moved or removed from the तारकोल or tarpaper waterproofing, यूँ exposing it to मौसम और सूर्य whereupon cracking and blistering occurs over time and eventually water gets in.
tarpaper is usually a 'paper ' or fibre material soaked or impregnated in tar.
As gravel can not protect tarpaper surfaces where they rise खड़ा इससे the छत ऐसे as on मुंडेर दीवारें or upstands, tarpaper विसंगतियाँ हैं उत्पादित with fine gravel applied to the hot tar during the process of manufacture such that a permanent layer of gravel is stuck to it in order to give it ongoing protection.
Tarpapers vary in quality as does the कारीगरी और प्रशिक्षण of those applying it to produce more or less successful results.
In some micro climates or shaded areas these rather 'basic ' tarpaper roofs can last well in relation to the cost of materials purchase and cost of laying them, however the cost of modern membranes such as EPDM has come down over हाल सालो to make them more and more affordable.
There are now more firms supplying modern alternatives and there is generally a growing awareness of their performance and availability.
If a leak does occur on a flat roof then damage often goes unnoticed for long periods of time दौरान जिससे जल penetrates और soaks the अलंकार and any insulation and/or structure beneath it.
This can lead to expensive damage from the दुर्गन्ध जिससे प्रायः develops और if बाएँ can weaken the roof structure.
There are भी विभिन्न स्वास्थ्य risks to people and animals breathing the mould spores : the severity of this health risk remains a debated point.
One problem with maintaining flat roofs is that if water करता घुस the अवरोध covering ( be it traditional or a modern membrane ) it can travel a long way before causing visible damage or leaking into a building where it can be seen.
Thus it is not easy to देखिए जहाँ it is leaking in order to repair it.
Once underlying roof decking is soaked it often sags causing a further संग्रहण or puddling of water in that area and the problem worsens.
A CD-ROM ( ) is a pre-pressed compact डिस्क which contains data.
The name is an acronym which stands for `` Compact Disc Read-only memory ``.
कंप्यूटर can read CD-ROMs, but can not write on them.
CD-ROMs are popularly used to distribute computer software, including video games and multimedia applications, हालांकि कोई आंकड़ा can be भंडारित ( up to the क्षमता limit of a disc ).
Some CDs, called enhanced CDs, hold both computer data और ऑडियो साथ the latter capable of being played on a CD player, while data ( such as software or digital video ) is only usable on a computer ( such as ISO 9660 format PC CD-ROMs ).
The Yellow Book is the technical standard that defines the स्वरूप of cd-roms.
One of a set of color-bound books that contain the तकनीकी विशेषताएँ लिये all CD formats, the Yellow Book, created by Sony and Philips, was the first extension of Compact Disc Digital Audio.
It adapted the format to hold कोई रूप of data.
Joanne `` Jo '' Rowling ( ), ( born 31 July 1965 ), pen name J. K. Rowling, is a अंग्रेजों उपन्यासकार, best known as the author of the Harry Potter fantasy series.
The Potter books have gained worldwide attention, won multiple awards, and sold more than 400 लाख नक़ल.
They have become the best-selling book series in history, and been the basis for a series of films which has become the highest-grossing film series in history.
Rowling had overall approval on the scripts as well as maintaining रचनात्मक कंट्रोल by सेवारत as a producer on the final instalment.
Born in Yate, Gloucestershire, Rowling was working as a researcher and bilingual सचिव लिये माफ़ी अंतरराष्ट्रीय when she conceived the idea for the Harry Potter series on a delayed train from Manchester to London in 1990.
The seven-year period that followed entailed the death of her mother, divorce from her first husband and poverty until Rowling finished the first novel in the series, Harry Potter and the पारस 's स्टोन ( 1997 ).
Rowling subsequently published 6 sequels—the last, Harry कुम्हार और the deathly Hallows ( 2007 ) —as well as 3 supplements to the series.
In 2012, Rowling parted with her agency and resumed writing in the form of a tragicomedy अनोखा aimed at वयस्क readership, हकदार the कैज़ुअल Vacancy.
Rowling has said she is currently working on two books—one aimed for adults, the other for children younger than the Harry Potter audience, and she expects the latter to be प्रकाशित पहला.
Rowling has led a `` rags to अमीरी `` life story, in which she progressed from living on state benefits to multi-millionaire status within five years.
She is the United Kingdom 's best-selling author since records began, with sales in excess of £238m.
The 2008 Sunday Times Rich List estimated रोलिंग 's सौभाग्य at £560 million ( $ 798 million ), ranking her as the twelfth richest woman in the United Kingdom.
Forbes ranked Rowling as the forty-eighth most powerful celebrity of 2007, and TIME magazine named her as a runner-up लिये इसके 2007 Person of the Year, noting the social, moral, and political inspiration she has given her fans.
In October 2010, Rowling was named the `` Most influential स्त्री in Britain '' by leading magazine editors.
She रै become a notable लोकसेवक, supporting ऐसे धर्मार्थ as Comic Relief, One Parent Families, Multiple Sclerosis Society of Great Britain and Lumos ( formerly the Children 's High Level Group ).
Auburndale is a city in Polk County, फ्लोरिडा, संयुक्त States.
The population was 11,032 at the 2000 census.
According to the U.S Census estimates of 2005, the city had a population of 12,381.
It is part of the Lakeland – Winter Haven महानगर Statistical Area.
Hurricane Isabel ( 2003 ) as देखी इससे कक्षा दौरान Expedition 7 of the International Space Station.
The eye, eyewall, and surrounding rainbands, characteristics of tropical cyclones, हैं clearly visible in this view from space.
A tropical cyclone is a तूफ़ान प्रणाली characterized by a low-pressure center surrounded by a spiral arrangement of thunderstorms that produce strong winds and heavy rain.
Tropical cyclones strengthen when water काफूर इससे the समंदर is released as the saturated air rises, resulting in condensation of water vapor contained in the moist air.
They are fueled by a different heat mechanism than other cyclonic windstorms such as nor'easters, European windstorms, and polar lows.
The characteristic that separates tropical cyclones from other cyclonic systems is that at कोई ऊँचाई in the atmosphere, the center of a tropical cyclone will be warmer than its surroundings ; a phenomenon called `` warm core `` storm systems.
The term `` tropical '' refers both to the geographical origin of these systems, which usually form in tropical regions of the globe, and to their formation in maritime tropical air masses.
The term `` cyclone '' refers to such storms ' cyclonic nature, with counterclockwise हवा प्रवाह in the उत्तरी Hemisphere and clockwise wind flow in the Southern Hemisphere.
The opposite direction of the wind flow is a परिणाम of the Coriolis force.
Depending on its location and strength, a tropical cyclone is referred to by names such as hurricane (, ), तूफ़ान ( ), tropical storm, cyclonic storm, tropical depression, and simply cyclone.
While tropical cyclones can उपज अत्यधिक powerful winds and torrential rain, they are also able to produce high waves, damaging storm surge, and tornadoes.
They develop over large लाशें of गरम जल, और lose their strength if they move over land due to increased surface friction and loss of the warm ocean as an energy source.
This is why coastal regions can receive significant damage from a tropical cyclone, while inland regions are relatively safe from receiving strong winds.
Heavy rains, however, can produce significant flooding inland, and तूफ़ान surges can produce extensive coastal flooding up to from the coastline.
Although their effects on इंसान populations can be devastating, tropical cyclones can relieve drought conditions.
They also carry heat energy away from the tropics and transport it toward शीतोष्ण latitudes, जिससे makes them an important part of the global atmospheric circulation mechanism.
As a result, tropical cyclones help to maintain equilibrium in the Earth 's troposphere, and to maintain a अपेक्षाकृत stable and warm temperature worldwide.
Many tropical cyclones develop जब the वायुमंडलीय conditions around a weak disturbance in the atmosphere are favorable.
The background environment is modulated by climatological cycles and patterns such as the Madden-Julian दोलन, el niño-southern Oscillation, and the Atlantic multidecadal oscillation.
Others form when other types of cyclones acquire tropical विशेषताएँ.
तीव्र प्रणालियों हैं तब moved by steering winds in the troposphere ; if the conditions remain favorable, the tropical disturbance intensifies, and can even develop an eye.
On the other end of the spectrum, if the conditions around the system deteriorate or the तीव्र cyclone makes landfall, the system weakens and eventually dissipates.
It is not possible to artificially induce the dissipation of these systems with current technology.
Kirk Douglas ( born Issur danielovitch, ; दिसम्बर 9, 1916 ) is an American stage and film actor, film producer and author.
His popular films include Out of the Past ( 1947 ), चैंपियन ( 1949 ), इक्का in the छेद ( 1951 ), the ख़राब और the खूबसूरत ( 1952 ), 20,000 लीग अंतर्गत the समुद्र ( 1954 ), हवस लिये Life ( 1956 ), Paths of Glory ( 1957 ), Gunfight at the O.K. Corral ( 1957 ), The Vikings ( 1958 ), Spartacus ( 1960 ), Lonely Are the Brave ( 1962 ), Seven Days in May ( 1964 ), The Heroes of Telemark ( 1965 ) and Tough Guys ( 1986 ).
He is No.17 on the American Film Institute 's list of the greatest male अमरीकी स्क्रीन legends of all time, making him the highest-ranked living person on the list.
In 1996, he प्राप्त the Academy Honorary Award `` for 50 years as a creative and moral force in the motion picture community. ''
He is one of the last surviving actors इससे हॉलीवुड 's `` golden age ''.
Robert Clark `` Bob '' Seger ( born May 6, 1945 ) is an American rock and roll singer-songwriter, guitarist and pianist.
As a locally successful Detroit-area artist, he performed और अंकित as bob Seger and the Last Heard and Bob Seger System throughout the 1960s.
By the early 1970s, he had dropped the `` System '' from his recordings and जारी to strive for broader success with other various bands.
In 1973, he put together The Silver Bullet Band, a group of Detroit-area musicians, with whom he became most successful on the national level with the album सजीव गोली, अंकित सजीव साथ the चांदी गोली बैंड in 1975 at Cobo Hall in Detroit, Michigan.
In 1976, he achieved a national ब्रेकआउट साथ the स्टुडियो album Night Moves.
On his studio albums, he also worked extensively with the Alabama-based Muscle Shoals Rhythm Section, which appeared on several of Seger 's best-selling singles and albums.
A roots rocker with a classic raspy, shouting voice, Seger wrote and अंकित songs that dealt with love, women, blue-collar themes and was an exemplar of heartland rock.
Seger has recorded many hits, including `` रात्रि चालें, '' `` फेरे the पेज, '' `` We 've Got Tonight, '' `` Against the Wind, '' and Shakedown that was written for Beverly Hills Cop II and `` Like a Rock, '' and also co-wrote the Eagles ' number-one hit `` Heartache Tonight. ''
His iconic recording of `` बूढ़ा समय चट्टान and Roll `` was named one of the Songs of the Century in 2001.
With a career spanning five दशकों, seger continues to perform and record today.
Seger was inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 2004 और the songwriters हॉल of कीर्ति in 2012.
Richard Milhous Nixon ( January 9, 1913 – April 22, 1994 ) थी the 37th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य, सेवारत from 1969 to 1974, when he became the only president to resign the office.
Nixon had previously परोसा as a रिपब्लिकन u.S. प्रतिनिधि और सीनेटर from California and as the 36th Vice President of the United States from 1953 to 1961.
Nixon थी born in Yorba Linda, California.
He graduated from Whittier College in 1934 and Duke University School of Law in 1937, returning to कैलिफ़ोर्निया to अभ्यास law.
He and his wife, Pat Nixon, moved to Washington to work for the federal government in 1942.
He subsequently served in the संयुक्त राज्य Navy during World War II.
Nixon was elected in California to the House of Representatives in 1946 and to the सीनेट in 1950.
His pursuit of the Alger Hiss case established his reputation as a leading anti-communist, and elevated उसे to national prominence.
He was the running mate of Dwight D. Eisenhower, the Republican Party presidential nominee in the 1952 election.
Nixon served for आठ सालो as vice president.
He waged an unsuccessful presidential campaign in 1960, narrowly losing to John F. Kennedy, and lost a रेस लिये राज्यपाल of कैलिफ़ोर्निया in 1962.
In 1968, he ran again for the प्रेसिडेंसी और was elected.
Although Nixon initially escalated America 's भागीदारी in the Vietnam War, he subsequently ended U.S. involvement in 1973.
Nixon 's visit to the People 's Republic of China in 1972 opened diplomatic relations between the two nations, and he initiated détente and the Anti-Ballistic Missile Treaty साथ the सोवियत संघ the same year.
Domestically, his administration generally embraced policies that transferred power from Washington to the states.
Among other things, he launched initiatives to fight cancer and illegal drugs, imposed wage and price controls, enforced desegregation of कुछ दक्षिणी schools, and established the Environmental Protection Agency.
Though he presided over the lunar landings beginning with Apollo 11, he scaled वापस मानवयुक्त स्पेस खोजी.
He was re-elected by a landslide in 1972.
Nixon 's second term saw an Arab oil embargo, the resignation of his vice president, Spiro Agnew, and a continuing series of revelations about the Watergate scandal and other misconduct by सदस्यों of the administration.
The scandal escalated, costing Nixon much of his political support, and on August 9, 1974, he resigned in the face of लगभग निश्चित महाभियोग और हटाना from office.
After his इस्तीफा, he controversially received a pardon issued by his successor, Gerald Ford.
In retirement, Nixon 's work as an elder statesman, authoring several books and undertaking many foreign यात्राएँ, helped to rehabilitate उसके पब्लिक image.
He suffered a debilitating stroke on April 18, 1994, और died four days later at the age of 81.
{ { Infobox Senator
The डोमिनिकन Republic annexation treaty caused bitter contention between President Grant and Sen. Sumner.
ब्रैडी 1869 ] ]
Sen. Sumner, opposed to American imperialism in the Caribbean and fearful that annexation would lead to the conquest of the neighboring black republic of Haiti, became convinced that corruption lay behind the treaty, and that men close to the president shared in the corruption.
As chairman of the Senate Foreign Relations Committee, Sen. Sumner initially withheld उसके opinion on the treaty on January 18, 1870.
Sen. Sumner had been leaked information इससे सहायक सचिव of State, Bancroft Davis, that U.S. Naval ships were being used to protect President Báez.
Sen. Sumner 's committee voted against annexation and at Sen. Sumner’s suggestion and quite possibly to सहेजें the पार्टी इससे an भद्दा fight or the president from embarrassment, the Senate held its debate of the treaty behind closed doors in executive session.
President Grant persisted and sent messages to Congress in favor of annexation on कूच 14, 1870, and May 31, 1870.
In closed session, Sen. Sumner spoke out against the treaty ; warnng that there would be difficulty with the foreign nationals, noting the दीर्घकालिक विद्रोह कि took प्लेस on the द्वीप, और the risk that the independence of Haiti, recognized by the United States in 1862, would be lost.
Sumner stated that Grant 's use of the U.S. Navy as a protectorate was a उल्लंघन of अंतरराष्ट्रीय law and unconstitutional.
Finally, on June 30, 1870 the treaty थी voted on by the सीनेट और विफल to gain the required 2/3 majority for treaty passage.
The following day, President Grant, feeling betrayed by Sen. Sumner, retaliated by ordering the dismissal of Sumner’s close friend J. Lothrop Motley, Ambassador to Britain.
By autumn, Sumner 's निजी दुश्मनी to the president was public knowledge, and he blamed the Secretary of State for failing to have resigned, rather than let Grant have his way.
The two men, friends until तब, cooled into bitter enemies.
In December, 1870, still fearful that Grant meant to acquire Santo Domingo somehow, Sumner gave a fiercely critical speech accusing the अध्यक्ष of usurpation और babcock of unethical conduct.
Already, अध्यक्ष ग्रान्ट, समर्थित by उसके सचिव of राज्य हैमिल्टन मछली, था initiated a campaign to depose Sumner from the chairmanship of the Senate Foreign Relations Committee.
Although Sumner stated he was an `` Administration man '', in addition to having stopped Grant 's Dominican Republic treaty attempt, Sumner had defeated Grant 's full repeal of the Tenure of Office Act, blocked Grant 's nomination of Alexander Stewart to U.S. Secretary of Treasury, and been a constant harassing force pushing Reconstruction नीतियों तेज़ than ग्रान्ट had been willing to go.
ग्रान्ट resented Sumner 's superiority of manner, as well.
Told once that sumner did not believe in the Bible, the president is supposed to have said that he was not surprised : `` he did n't write it. ''
As the rift between Grant and Sumner increased, Sumner’s health began to decline.
When the 42nd U.S. Congress convened on March 4, 1871, सीनेटरों संबद्ध साथ अध्यक्ष ग्रान्ट, known as ‘’New Radicals’’ voted to oust Sen. Sumner from the Senate Foreign Relations Committee chairmanship.
Business ethics ( also corporate आचार ) is a रूप of लागू आचार or professional ethics that examines ethical principles and moral or ethical problems that arise in a business environment.
It applies to सब पहलुओं of business conduct and is relevant to the conduct of individuals and entire organizations.
Business ethics has both normative and descriptive आयाम.
As a corporate practice and a career specialization, the फ़ील्ड is primarily normative.
लड attempting to understand business behavior employ descriptive methods.
The range and quantity of business ethical issues reflects the बातचीत of profit-maximizing behavior with non-economic concerns.
Interest in कारोबार आचार त्वरित dramatically during the 1980s and 1990s, both within major corporations and within academia.
For example, today most major corporations प्रचार उनके प्रतिबद्धता to non-economic मान अंतर्गत headings such as ethics codes and social responsibility charters.
Adam Smith said, `` People of the same trade seldom meet together, even for merriment and diversion, लकिन the वार्तालाप ends in a षड्यंत्र विरूद्ध the public, or in some contrivance to raise prices. ''
Governments use laws and regulations to point business behavior in what they perceive to be beneficial directions.
Ethics implicitly regulates areas and details of behavior that lie beyond governmental control.
The emergence of large corporations with limited relationships and sensitivity to the communities in which they operate accelerated the विकास of औपचारिक ethics regimes.
A बर्न is a type of injury to flesh or skin caused by heat, electricity, chemicals, friction, or radiation.
Most burns affect only the superficial skin ( known as superficial or first degree ) or extend into the deeper skin but do not involve the full मोटाई of the स्किन ( ज्ञात as आंशिक मोटाई or second degree ).
Rarely all layers of the skin or deeper tissues, such as muscle or अस्थि can be घायल in which case the burn is either full thickness ( third degree ) or fourth degree.
The treatment required depends on the severity of the burn.
Superficial burns संभवतः प्रबंधित साथ छोटी more than simple pain killers while major burns may require prolonged treatment in specialized burn centers.
कूलिंग साथ tap जल may सहायता पीड़ा और घटी क्षति however if एक्सपोज़र is prolonged it may परिणाम in कम देह तापमान.
Partial thickness burns may आवश्यकता सफ़ाई with soap and water followed by dressings.
Blisters चाहिए typically be left unbroken.
Full thickness burns usually require surgical treatments such as skin grafting and extensive burns प्रायः आवश्यकता विशाल राशि of intravenous fluids.
The most common complications of burns हैं सम्बन्धित to infection.
While large burns can be fatal, आधुनिक treatments developed in the last 50 years have significantly improved the outcomes, especially in children and young adults.
Globally about 11 million people seek medical treatment and 300,000 people die इससे burns.
In the United States, of those admitted to a burn center, approximately 4 % die from their चोटों.
The long term outcome is primarily related to the size of burn and the age of the person effected.
The Atlantic Ocean, not including Arctic and अंटार्कटिक regions
This video was taken by the crew of Expedition 29 on board the ISS.
The pass starts from just north-east of the Island of Newfoundland over the North Atlantic Ocean to central Africa, over South Sudan.
The Atlantic Ocean is the second-largest of the संसार 's oceanic विभाजन.
With a total area of about, it covers लगभग 20 percent of the Earth 's surface and about 29 percent of its water surface area.
The first part of its name refers to Atlas of Greek mythology, बनाना the Atlantic the `` Sea of Atlas ''.
The oldest known जिक्र of `` अटलांटिक '' is in The Histories of Herodotus around 450 BC ( Hdt. 1.202.4 ) : Atlantis thalassa ( Greek : Ἀτλαντὶς θάλασσα ; English : Sea of Atlas ).
The term Ethiopic Ocean, derived from Ethiopia, थी लागू to the दक्षिणी अटलांटिक as late as the mid-19th century.
पहले europeans खोजा अन्य महासागर, the पद `` ocean '' itself was synonymous with the waters beyond the Strait of Gibraltar that we now know as the Atlantic.
The early Greeks believed this ocean to be a gigantic river encircling the world.
The Atlantic Ocean occupies an elongated, S-shaped basin extending longitudinally between Eurasia and Africa to the east, and the Americas to the west.
As one component of the interconnected वैश्विक समंदर, it is कनेक्ट in the उत्तर to the आर्कटिक समंदर ( जिससे is sometimes considered a sea of the Atlantic ), to the Pacific Ocean in the southwest, the Indian Ocean in the southeast, and the Southern Ocean in the south.
( Other definitions describe the अटलांटिक as extending southward to Antarctica. )
The equator subdivides it into the North Atlantic Ocean and South Atlantic Ocean.
Due to their long-term persistence, and the need for a unique identifier in issuing forecasts and चेतावनियाँ, तीव्र cyclones and subtropical cyclones are given names according to policy ( see Tropical cyclone naming ).
The following हैं सूचियाँ from which these tropical and subtropical cyclone names are derived.
White light is dispersed by a prism into the colors of the optical spectrum.
The visible spectrum is the portion of the इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक वर्णक्रम कि is visible to ( can be detected by ) the human eye.
Electromagnetic विकिरण in this range of wavelengths is called visible light or simply light.
A typical human eye will respond to wavelengths from about 390 to 700 nm.
In terms of frequency, this corresponds to a band in the vicinity of 430–790 THz.
A light-adapted eye generally has its maximum sensitivity at around 555 nm ( 540 THz ), in the green region of the optical spectrum ( see : luminosity function ).
The spectrum does not, however, contain सब the रंगों कि the human eyes and brain can distinguish.
Unsaturated colors such as pink, or purple variations such as magenta, हैं absent, for example, because they can be made only by a mix of multiple wavelengths.
Colors containing only one wavelength हैं भी called pure colors.
Visible wavelengths pass through the `` optical window ``, the region of the electromagnetic वर्णक्रम जिससे allows wavelengths to pass largely unattenuated through the Earth 's atmosphere.
An example of इस घटना is कि साफ एयर scatters blue light more than red wavelengths, and so the midday sky appears blue.
The optical window is also called the visible window क्युकी it overlaps the human visible response spectrum.
The near infrared ( NIR ) window lies बस आउट of the इंसान दृष्टि, as खूब as the Medium Wavelength IR ( MWIR ) window and the Long Wavelength or Far Infrared ( LWIR or FIR ) window though other animals may experience them.
Many species can see light with frequencies outside the `` दृश्य वर्णक्रम, '' which is defined in terms of human vision.
Bees and many other insects can detect ultraviolet लाइट, जिससे helps them find nectar in flowers.
Plant species that depend on insect pollination may owe reproductive success to their रूप in पराबैंगनी light, rather than how colorful they appear to humans.
Birds, too, can see into the ultraviolet ( 300–400 nm ), और कुछ have sex-dependent markings on their plumage that are visible only in the ultraviolet range.
Many animals that can see into the ultraviolet range, however, can not see red लाइट or कोई अन्य reddish wavelengths.
Bees ' visible spectrum ends at about 590nm, just before the orange wavelengths start.
Birds, however, can देखिए कुछ red wavelengths, but not as many as humans.
Zebras ( or ) are several species of अफ़्रीकी equids ( horse family ) united by their distinctive black and white stripes.
Their stripes come in different patterns, unique to प्रत्येक व्यक्तिगत.
They are generally social animals that live in small harems to large herds.
Unlike their closest रिश्तेदारों, घोड़े and asses, zebras have never been truly domesticated.
There are three species of zebras : the plains zebra, the grévy 's zebra and the mountain zebra.
The plains zebra and the mountain zebra belong to the subgenus Hippotigris, but grévy 's zebra is the sole species of subgenus Dolichohippus.
The latter resembles an ass, to which it is closely related, while the former two are more horse-like.
All three belong to the genus Equus, साथ साथ अन्य जीना equids.
The अद्वितीय stripes of zebras make them one of the animals most familiar to people.
They occur in a variety of habitats, such as grasslands, savannas, woodlands, thorny scrublands, mountains, and coastal hills.
However, various anthropogenic कारकों have था a कठोर impact on zebra populations, in particular hunting for skins and habitat destruction.
Grévy 's zebra and the mountain zebra are endangered.
While plains zebras are much more plentiful, one subspecies, the quagga, became extinct in the late 19th century – हालांकि वहीँ is फिलहाल a योजना, पुकारा the Quagga Project, that aims to breed zebras that are phenotypically similar to the quagga in a process called breeding back.
Barry श्वेत, born Barry Eugene Carter ( – ), was an American composer and singer-songwriter.
A two-time Grammy Award -winner known for his distinctive bass voice and romantic image, White 's महानतम कामयाबी आए in the 1970s as a सोलो singer and with the Love Unlimited Orchestra, crafting many enduring soul, funk, and disco songs such as his two biggest hits, `` You 're the First, the Last, My Everything `` and `` Ca n't Get Enough of Your Love, Babe. ''
Along with Isaac Hayes, White is considered by allmusic.com as a pioneer of disco music in the early 1970s.
During the course of his career in the music business, White achieved 106 gold एल्बम विश्वव्यापी, 41 of which also attained platinum status.
श्वेत had 20 gold and 10 platinum singles, with worldwide sales in excess of 100 million, according to critics Ed Hogan and Wade Kergan.
His influences included Rev. James Cleveland, Ray Charles, एरीथा फ्रैंकलिन प्लस Motown artists The Supremes, The Four Tops and Marvin Gaye.
Angelina Jolie (, born एंजेलीना जोली वोइट ; जून 4, 1975 ) is an American actress, film director, and screenwriter.
She has received an Academy Award, two Screen Actors Guild Awards, and three Golden Globe Awards, and was named हॉलीवुड 's highest-paid अभिनेत्री by Forbes in 2009 and 2011.
Jolie promotes humanitarian causes, and is noted for her work साथ refugees as a Special Envoy and former Goodwill Ambassador for the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees ( UNHCR ).
She has often been cited as the world 's `` most beautiful '' woman, a title for which she has प्राप्त substantial media attention.
Jolie made her screen debut as a child alongside her father Jon Voight in Lookin ' to Get Out ( 1982 ), but उसके फिल्मी करियर began in सच्चाई a दशक बाद साथ the low-budget production Cyborg 2 ( 1993 ).
Her first leading role in a प्रमुख फिल्मी थी in the cyber-thriller Hackers ( 1995 ).
She starred in the critically acclaimed biographical टेलीविज़न films जार्ज Wallace ( 1997 ) and Gia ( 1998 ), and won an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress for her performance in the drama Girl, Interrupted ( 1999 ).
Jolie achieved wide fame after her portrayal of video game heroine Lara Croft in Lara Croft : Tomb Raider ( 2001 ), and स्थापित herself among the highest-paid actresses in Hollywood with the sequel The Cradle of Life ( 2003 ).
She continued her action star career साथ mr. & mrs. स्मिथ ( 2005 ) और चाही ( 2008 ) —her biggest non-animated commercial successes to date—and received further critical acclaim for her performances in the dramas A Mighty Heart ( 2007 ) and Changeling ( 2008 ), which earned her a nomination for an Academy Award for Best Actress.
Jolie made उसके directorial debut with the wartime drama In the Land of Blood and Honey ( 2011 ).
Divorced from actors Jonny Lee Miller and Billy Bob Thornton, Jolie now lives with कर्ता ब्रैड Pitt, in a relationship notable for fervent media attention.
Jolie and Pitt have three biological children और तीन अपनाया children.
A natural arch produced by the erosion of differentially weathered rock in Jebel Kharaz, जॉर्डन
Erosion is the process by which soil and rock are removed from the धरती 's सतह by exogenetic प्रक्रियाओं such as wind or water flow, and then transported and deposited in other locations.
While erosion is a natural process, human activities have increased by 10-40 टाइम्स the रेट at जिससे erosion is occurring globally.
Excessive erosion causes समस्याएं ऐसे as मरुस्थलीकरण, decreases in agricultural productivity due to land degradation, sedimentation of waterways, and ecological collapse due to loss of the nutrient rich upper soil layers.
Water and wind erosion are now the two primary causes of land degradation ; combined, they are responsible for 84 % of degraded acreage, making excessive erosion one of the सबसे significant वैश्विक पर्यावरणीय problems.
Industrial agriculture, deforestation, सड़कें, anthropogenic climate change and urban sprawl are amongst the most significant human activities in regard to their effect on stimulating erosion.
However, there are many available alternative land use practices that can curtail or limit erosion, such as terrace -building, no-till कृषि, और revegetation of denuded soils.
Jersey Shore is an American reality television series which ran on MTV इससे दिसम्बर 3, 2009 to December 20, 2012 in the United States.
The series follows the lives of eight housemates बिता उनके summer at the Jersey Shore in the U.S. state of New Jersey.
Season 2 followed the डाल escaping the cold northeast winter to Miami Beach, with Season 3 returning to the Jersey Shore.
the चौथी season, filmed in Italy, premiered on August 4, 2011.

The fifth season finale aired on March 15, 2012.

the श्रेणी finale aired on December 20, 2012.
The show debuted amid large amounts of controversy regarding the use of the words `` Guido / Guidette, '' portrayals of Italian-American stereotypes, and scrutiny इससे स्थानीय क्युकी the डाल सदस्यों यहूद नहीं निवासियों of the area.
The series garnered record ratings for MTV, making it the network 's most viewed श्रेणी telecast ever.
The series ' cast have also been credited with introducing unique lexicon और phrases into American popular culture.
The University of Chicago and the University of Oklahoma are among the educational institutions कि have था वर्ग or सम्मेलनों about the show.
In 2010, the cast of Jersey Shore was named on Barbara walters ' 10 सबसे fascinating लोगों list, and the series has since been exported to dozens of countries worldwide.
