United States territory is any extent of region under the jurisdiction of the federal government of the United States, including all waters ( around islands or continental tracts ) and all u.s. नवल बरतन.
The United States has traditionally proclaimed the sovereign rights for exploring, exploiting, conserving, and managing its territory.
This extent of territory is all the area belonging to, और अंतर्गत the डोमिनियन of, the United States federal government ( which includes tracts lying at a distance from the country ) for administrative and other purposes.
The United States कुल territory includes a subset of political divisions.
The U.S. government is a government with delegated powers under the United राज्य Constitution.
`` The powers not delegated to the United States by the Constitution, nor निषिद्ध by it to the राज्य, are reserved to the States respectively, or to the people '' by the Tenth Amendment.
Terminator 3 : Rise of the Machines ( commonly abbreviated as T3 ) is a 2003 science fiction action film directed by Jonathan Mostow और अभिनीत अर्नाल्ड श्वार्ज़नेगर, उपनाम stahl, क्लेयर danes and Kristanna Loken.
It is the second sequel to The Terminator ( 1984 ).
After Skynet fails to मार सारा connor पहले उसके बेटे is born और to kill John himself as a child, it sends back another Terminator, the T-X, in an attempt to wipe out as many Resistance officers as possible.
इस शामिल John 's future wife, but not John himself as his whereabouts are unknown to Skynet.
John 's life is placed in danger when the T-X accidentally पाता उसे.
A cord of लकडी
The cord is a ईकाई of माप of शुष्क आवाज़ प्रयुक्त in Canada and the United States to measure firewood and pulpwood.
A cord is the amount of wood that, when `` ranked and well stowed '' ( arranged so pieces are aligned, parallel, touching and compact ), occupies a volume of.
This corresponds to a well stacked woodpile high, long, and deep ; or any अन्य व्यवस्था of linear measurements that yields the same volume.
The name cord probably comes इससे the उपयोग of a cord or string to measure it.
The, is an 8-bit handheld video game device विकसित और manufactured by Nintendo.
It was released in Japan on, in North America in, and in यूरोपीय on.
It is the first handheld console in the Game Boy line, and was created by Gunpei Yokoi and Nintendo Research & Development 1 —the same staff who had designed the Game & Watch series as well as several popular games for the Nintendo Entertainment System.
Redesigned versions were released in 1996 और 1998, in the form of Game Boy Pocket, and Game Boy Light ( Japan only ), respectively.
The Game Boy is Nintendo 's second handheld system following the Game & Watch series introduced in, and it combined features from both the Nintendo entertainment प्रणाली और खेल & Watch.
It was originally bundled with the पहेली खेल टेट्रिस.
As भाग of the चौथी पीढी of gaming, the Game Boy competed with the Sega Game Gear, Atari Lynx, and the TurboExpress.
Despite ये अन्य technologically superior handheld consoles, the Game Boy was a tremendous success.
The Game Boy and its successor, the Game Boy रंग, have both combined sold 118.69 million units worldwide.
Upon its release in the United States, it sold its entire शिपमेंट of एक लाख units within weeks.
The World Trade Center is a complex of buildings under construction in Lower Manhattan, New York City, United States, replacing an earlier जटिल of सात buildings with the same name on the same site.
The original World व्यापार बीच featured landmark twin towers, which opened on April 4, 1973 and were destroyed in the September 11 attacks of 2001, along with 7 World Trade Center.
The other buildings in the complex were damaged in the attacks, and their ruins were आखिरकार demolished.
The site is being rebuilt with five new skyscrapers और a memorial to those killed in the attacks.
, तभी एक skyscraper has been completed ; the other four are expected to be completed before 2020.
One World Trade Center will be the lead भवन लिये the नई जटिल, reaching more than 100 stories at its completion.
It became the tallest building in New York City on April 30, 2012, और is अपेक्षित to be finished by 2013.
A sixth मीनार is प्रतीक्षारत confirmation.
At the time of their completion, the original 1 World Trade Center ( the North Tower ) and 2 World Trade Center ( the दक्षिण मीनार ), ज्ञात collectively as the `` जुड़वा Towers '', were the tallest buildings in the world.
The other buildings included 3 WTC ( the मैरियट संसार व्यापार Center ), 4 WTC, 5 WTC, 6 WTC, and 7 WTC.
All of ये buildings were built between 1975 and 1985.
The cost for the construction was $ 400 लाख ( $ in dollars ).
The complex was located in the heart of New York City 's downtown financial district and contained 13.4 million square feet ( 1.24 million m2 ) of दफ्तर स्पेस.
The World Trade Center experienced a fire on, 1975, a bombing on, 1993 और a robbery on, 1998.
In 1998, the Port प्राधिकार decided to privatize the World Trade Center, leasing the buildings to a private company to manage, and awarded the lease to Silverstein Properties in.
On the morning of September 11, 2001, Al-Qaeda -affiliated hijackers flew two Boeing 767 jets into the complex, one into each tower, in a coordinated terrorist attack.
बाद burning लिये 56 मिनट्स, the South Tower ( 2 ) collapsed, followed a half-hour later by the North Tower ( 1 ), with the attacks on the World Trade Center resulting in 2,753 deaths.
Falling debris from the towers, संयुक्त साथ फ़ायर कि the debris initiated in several surrounding buildings, led to the partial or complete collapse of all the other buildings in the complex and caused catastrophic damage to ten other large structures in the surrounding area.
The process of cleanup and recovery at the World Trade Center site took आठ महीने.
Over the following सालो, plans for a rebuilt World Trade Center took form.
The first new building at the site was 7 World Trade Center, जिससे खोली in.
The Lower Manhattan Development Corporation ( LMDC ), established in to oversee the rebuilding process, organized competitions to चुनें a साईट योजना and memorial design.
Memory Foundations, designed by Daniel Libeskind, was selected as the master plan, लकिन इस went through substantial changes in design.
The new World Trade Center complex will include One World Trade Center, three other high-rise दफ्तर मीनारें, और the National September 11 Memorial & Museum.
San जिबरील Mountains
सैन Bernardino Mountains, with Mt. San Gorgonio in the foreground and Big Bear Lake in the background.
The Transverse Ranges are a group of mountain ranges of southern California, in the Pacific coast सीमाएँ physiographic region in North America.
The Transverse Ranges begin at the southern end of the California Coast Ranges and lie between Santa बारबरा और सैन डिएगो counties.
They derive the name अनुप्रस्थ Ranges due to their East-West orientation, making them transverse to the general North-South orientation of most of California 's coastal mountains.
आवधिक table with electron shells
An electron shell may be thought of as an orbit followed by electrons around an atom 's nucleus.
The closest shell to the nucleus is called the `` 1 shell '' ( also पुकारा `` k शेल '' ), followed by the `` 2 shell '' ( or `` L shell '' ), then the `` 3 shell '' ( or `` M shell '' ), and so on farther and farther from the nucleus.
The shell अक्षर k, l, m,..., प्रयुक्त in the X-ray notation, are alphabetical.
Each shell can contain only a fixed number of electrons : The 1st शेल can थाम up to two electrons, the 2nd shell can hold up to eight electrons, the 3rd shell can hold up to 18, and 4th shell can hold up to 32 and so on.
Since electrons are electrically attracted to the nucleus, an atom 's electrons will generally occupy outer shells only if the अधिक भीतरी शेल have already महरूम completely भर by other electrons.
However, this is नहीं a सख्त आवश्यकता : Atoms may have two or even three incomplete outer shells.
( देखिए Madelung rule for more details. )
For an explanation of why electrons exist in ये shells see electron configuration.
The electrons in the outermost occupied shell ( or shells ) determine the chemical properties of the atom ; it is called the valence shell.
Each shell consists of one or more subshells, and प्रत्येक subshell consists of one or more atomic orbitals.
Vickie Lynn मार्शल ( née Hogan ; November 28, 1967 – February 8, 2007 ), known by her moniker Anna Nicole Smith, was an American model, actress, and television personality.
Smith first gained लोकप्रियता in Playboy, becoming the 1993 Playmate of the Year.
She modeled लिये कपडे companies, including Guess jeans and Lane Bryant.
Smith dropped out of high school and was शादीशुदा in 1985.
Her highly publicized दूसरी विवाह to आयल business mogul, J. Howard Marshall, 62 years her senior, resulted in speculation that she married the octogenarian for his money, which she denied.
following मार्शल 's मौत, स्मिथ began a lengthy legal battle over a share of his estate.
Her case, Marshall v. Marshall, reached the U.S. Supreme Court on a question of federal क्षेत्राधिकार, और again on a सवाल of दिवालियापन अदालत authority ( now called Stern v. Marshall ).
Smith died on February 8, 2007 in a Hollywood, Florida hotel room as a परिणाम of an overdose of prescription drugs.
Within the final six months of her life, स्मिथ थी the फ़ोकस of a renewed press coverage surrounding the death of her son, Daniel, and the paternity and custody battle over her newborn daughter, Dannielynn.
The is one denomination of जापानी yen.
The current design was first minted in 1959 using Japanese characters known as the `` new स्क्रिप्ट ``, और यहूद भी minted इससे 1949-1958 using `` old-script '' Japanese characters.
Five-yen coins date to 1870 ( when, due to the much higher value of the yen, they were minted in gold ).
The front of the coin depicts a राइस संयंत्र growing आउट of the जल, with `` five yen '' written in kanji ; the back is stamped with `` Japan '' and the year of issue, also in kanji, separated by sprouts of a tree.
The three graphic elements of the coin represent agriculture and fisheries, the key तत्व of the Japanese first-sector economy.
Around a hole, वहीँ is a gear that represents industry.
It is the only जापानी सिक्का in circulation to lack Arabic numerals on either face.
TLC is an American girl group whose repertoire spanned R & B, hip hop, soul, funk, and new jack swing.
Originally consisting of singer Tionne `` T-Boz '' Watkins, rapper Lisa `` Left Eye '' Lopes and singer Rozonda `` Chilli '' Thomas, the group found unprecedented success in the 1990s while also enduring a series of spats with the law, each other, and the समूह 's रिकार्ड लेबल.
Initially, TLC हासिल commercial success following the release of their debut album Ooooooohhh...
on the tlc Tip, which sold 6 million copies worldwide.
However, it was their second एल्बम, CrazySexyCool, that catapulted the group to superstar status.
CrazySexyCool went on to be certified डायमंड by the riaa — a first for a female group, and eventually sold 23 million copies worldwide.
Five years later, the समूह released their third album FanMail, which became the group 's first album to debut at number one and sold more than 11 million copies worldwide.
The subsequent tour following FanMails release became the highest grossing tour of all time by a female band.
In 2002, Lisa `` Left Eye '' lopes died in a car accident in Honduras.
Seven months later, T-Boz और chilli released the समूह 's चौथी एल्बम 3d, which sold 2 million copies worldwide, it featured unreleased vocals from Left Eye.
Billboard magazine ranked tlc as एक of the greatest musical trios.
Between 1992 and 2003, the band accumulated ten top ten singles, चार क्रमांक एक singles, four multi-platinum albums, and four Grammy Awards.
At the end of 1999, TLC was ranked as the सातवाँ सबसे कामयाब अधिनियम of the 1990s by Billboard.
in 2008, the समूह थी inducted into the All Time Hot 100 Artist Hall of Fame by the same magazine, at 56th place.
That year it was also listed as the # 25 R & B/hip-hop artist of the preceding 25 सालो.
TLC has sold more than 65 million records worldwide and they are ranked as the second best selling female group of सब समय, और the बेहतरीन selling मादा r & b समूह of all time.
In 2012, TLC ranked 12th on VH1 's 100 Greatest Women in Music, being क्रमित the number one all girl group on that list.
Tarzan is a 1999 American animated adventure film produced by Walt Disney Feature एनिमेशन और वितरित by Walt Disney Pictures.
The 37th film in the Walt Disney Animated Classics, it is based on the story टार्ज़न of the apes by Edgar Rice Burroughs, and is the only major motion picture version of the story Tarzan property to be animated.
Directed by Chris Buck and Kevin Lima with a screenplay by Tab Murphy, Bob Tzudiker, and Noni White, Tarzan features the voices of Tony Goldwyn, Minnie Driver, Glenn Close, and Rosie O'Donnell with Brian Blessed, Lance Henriksen, Wayne Knight, and Nigel Hawthorne.
It was the last bona fide hit पहले the डिज़्नी slump of the early 2000s grossing $ 171,091,819 domestically and $ 448,191,819 worldwide, outgrossing its predecessors Hercules ( 1997 ) and Mulan ( 1998 ).
At the time of its release, its production budget of $ 130 million made it the most expensive एनिमेटेड फिल्मी कभी बना, जबतक अव्वल by डिज़्नी 's अपना $ 140 million Treasure Planet in 2002.
It was also the first Disney animated feature to open at # 1 since pocahontas.
This was the पिछला प्रमुख बक्सा दफ्तर success of the Disney Renaissance.
Oil Platform P-51 off the Brazilian coast is a semi-submersible मंच.
Oil platform Mittelplate in the उत्तर sea
An oil platform, ( offshore platform or colloquially oil rig ) is a large structure with facilities to drill कुएं, to निकालें और प्रक्रम oil and natural gas, and to temporarily store product until it can be brought to shore for refining and marketing.
In many cases, the मंच contains सुविधाएं to house the workforce as well.
Depending on the circumstances, the platform may be फिक्स्ड to the ocean floor, may consist of an artificial island, or may float.
Remote subsea wells may also be connected to a मंच by प्रवाह लाइनों और by umbilical कनेक्शन्स.
These subsea solutions may consist of one or more subsea wells, or of one or more manifold centres for multiple wells.
Slaughter is the killing of animals, प्रायः कि of domestic livestock for food.
The animals most commonly slaughtered for food are cattle, water buffalo ( for beef and veal ), sheep, goats ( for lamb and mutton ), pigs ( for pork ), horses ( for horse meat ), and fowl, largely chickens, turkeys, and ducks and increasingly मछली इससे the aquaculture industry ( fish farming ).
The श्वेत हाउस, the president 's official residence and center of the administration
Under the United States Constitution, the President of the United States is the head of state and head of सरकारी of the संयुक्त राज्य.
As chief of the executive branch and head of the federal government as a whole, the presidency is the highest political office in the United States by influence and recognition.
the अध्यक्ष is also the commander-in-chief of the United States Armed Forces.
The president is indirectly elected to a four-year term by an Electoral College ( or by the House of प्रतिनिधि चाहिए the चुनावी College fail to award an absolute majority of votes to any person ).
Since the ratification of the Twenty-second Amendment to the United States Constitution in 1951, no person may be elected President अधिक than twice, and no one who has served more than two years of a term to which someone else was elected may be elected more than once.
Upon the मौत, इस्तीफा, or removal from office of an incumbent President, the Vice President assumes the office.
The President must be at तनिक 35 सालो of age and a `` natural born '' citizen of the United States.
This list includes only those persons who were sworn into office as president following the अनुसमर्थन of the United States Constitution, which took effect on March 4, 1789.
For American leaders before this ratification, see President of the Continental Congress.
The list does not include any Acting Presidents under the twenty-fifth amendment to the United States Constitution.
There have been 43 people sworn into office, और 44 presidencies, as Grover Cleveland served two non-consecutive terms and is counted chronologically as both the 22nd and 24th president.
Of the individuals elected as president, four died in office of natural causes ( William Henry Harrison, Zachary Taylor, Warren G. Harding, and Franklin D. Roosevelt ), four यहूद assassinated ( अब्राहम lincoln, जेम्स A. गारफ़ील्ड, विलियम mckinley, and John F. Kennedy ) and one resigned ( Richard Nixon ).
George Washington, the first president, was उदघाटन in 1789 after a unanimous vote of the Electoral College.
विलियम हेनरी हैरिसन खर्च the shortest time in office with 32 days in 1841, and Franklin D. Roosevelt spent the longest with over twelve years, but died shortly into his fourth term in 1945.
He is the only president to serve more than two terms, and a constitutional amendment, affecting राष्ट्रपतियों after Harry Truman, was passed to limit the number of times an individual can be elected president.
Andrew Jackson, the seventh president, was the first to be elected by men of all classes in 1828 after most laws barring non-land-owners from voting were repealed.
Warren Harding was the first elected after women gained मतदान अधिकारों in 1920.
History records four presidents – John Q Adams, Rutherford B. Hayes, Benjamin Harrison and George W. Bush – who lost the popular vote but assumed office.
John F. Kennedy has been the only अध्यक्ष of रोमन कैथोलिक आस्था, और the current president, Barack Obama, is the first president of African descent.

AWM-F स्निपर राइफल साथ attached suppressor.
a suppressor, ध्वनि suppressor, or ध्वनि मॉडरेटर, is a यंत्र संलग्न to or भाग of the बैरल of a firearm जिससे reduces the राशि of रव, और प्रायः the राशि of muzzle फ्लैश, उत्पन्न by फायरिंग the हथियार.
A suppressor can be used both with a firearm and with compressed air gun.
Though it is sometimes referred to as a silencer, इस पद is a misnomer popularized by cinematic fiction : the sound of a projectile, especially one moving faster than the speed of sound, through the air can not be eliminated.
Using a suppressor in long distance shooting ( i.e. greater than 300 meters ) can lessen, or retard, the report at the moment of impact, and create the impression of silence near the target.
The noise heard near the muzzle as a projectile leaves the barrel, though subdued, is not silent at all.
A suppressor is usually a metal cylinder with internal mechanisms to reduce the sound of firing by slowing the escaping propellant gas and sometimes by reducing the velocity of the bullet.
Early suppressors were निर्मित around the शुरूआत of the 20th century by several inventors.
American inventor Hiram Percy Maxim ( not to be confused with hiram स्टीवंस कहावत, hiram पर्सी 's पिता, and the inventor of the Maxim Machine Gun ), is credited with inventing and selling the first commercially successful models circa 1902 ( patented 30 March 1909 ).
Maxim gave his यंत्र the trademarked name Maxim Silencer.
The muffler for internal combustion engines was developed in parallel with the firearm suppressor by कहावत in the जल्दी 20th सदी, using अनेक of the वही तकनीकों to provide quieter-running engines ( in many European countries automobile mufflers are still called silencers ).
The word silencer in reference to gun suppressor remains in widespread use, although it has since fallen out of favor with some, especially among the firearms industry, being replaced with the more literally accurate term sound suppressor or just suppressor, because a `` sound suppressor '' does not `` silence '' any weapon, rather it eliminates muzzle फ्लैश और reduces the सोनिक दबाव of a firearm discharging.
Common उपयोग and U.S. legislative language favor the historically earlier term, silencer.
In U.S. law, the terms `` firearm muffler '' and `` firearm silencer '' हैं synonymous.
Suppressors were regularly used by agents of the संयुक्त राज्य Office of Strategic Services, who favored the newly designed High Standard HDM.22 Long Rifle pistol during World War II.
OSS Director William Joseph `` Wild Bill '' Donovan demonstrated the pistol for President Franklin D. रूज़वेल्ट at the White House.
According to OSS research chief Stanley Lovell, Donovan ( an old and trusted friend of the President ) was waved into the Oval Office, where Roosevelt was dictating a letter.
While Roosevelt finished his message, Donovan turned his back and fired ten shots into a sandbag he had brought with him, announced what he had done and handed the smoking gun to the astonished president.
The British SOE ( Special Operations Executive ) Welrod assassination pistol साथ an अभिन्न suppressor was also used by the American OSS on clandestine operations in Nazi occupied Europe during the Second World War.
Beatrice `` Bea '' Arthur ( May 13, 1922 – अप्रैल 25, 2009 ) थी an अमरीकी actress, comedienne, and singer whose career spanned seven decades.
Arthur achieved fame as the character Maude Findlay on the 1970s sitcoms All in the Family and Maude, and as Dorothy Zbornak on the 1980s sitcom The Golden Girls, winning Emmy पुरस्कार लिये दोनो भूमिकाएँ.
A stage actress both before and after her television success, she won the Tony Award for बेहतरीन प्रदर्शित अभिनेत्री in a musical लिये her performance as Vera Charles in the original cast of Mame ( 1966 ).

The film premiered in North America by Bandai Entertainment on July 26, 2011, and in Australia on July 27, 2011 in a special exclusive one-off screening.

The film was additionally included with the PlayStation 3 game, Tekken Hybrid, and the Nintendo 3DS title, Tekken 3D : Prime Edition.
For a discussion of nonprofit, voluntary पड़ोस advocacy groups, see neighborhood association.
In the United States, a homeowner association is a corporation formed by a real estate developer for the purpose of marketing, managing, and selling of घरों और lots in a residential subdivision.
It grants the developer privileged voting rights in governing the association, while allowing the developer to exit वित्तीय और विधिक जिम्मेदारी of the संगठन, typically by transferring स्वामित्व of the संघ to the homeowners after selling off a predetermined number of lots.
सदस्यता in the homeowners संघ by a residential buyer is typically a condition of purchase ; a buyer is n't given an option to reject it.
Most homeowner associations are incorporated, and are subject to state statutes that govern non-profit corporations और homeowner एसोसिएशन.
State oversight of homeowner एसोसिएशन is minimal, and mainly takes the form of laws which are inconsistent from state to state.
Some states, such as Florida and California, have a large body of homeowner संघ विधि, और कुछ राज्य, such as Massachusetts, have virtually no homeowner association law.
The fastest growing form of housing in the United States today is common-interest developments ( cids ), a category that includes planned-unit developments of single-family homes, condominiums, and cooperative apartments.
चूंकि 1964, homeowner associations have become increasingly common in the USA.
The Community Associations Institute trade association estimated that HOAs governed 24.8 लाख अमरीकी homes and 62 million residents in 2010.
A prize-winning lilac-and-white Silkie
वहीँ हैं अनेक breeds of गिनी सुअर जिससे have महरूम विकसित चूंकि इसके domestication ca. 5000 bc.
Breeds vary widely in रूप और purpose, ranging from show breeds with long, flowing hair to those in use as model organisms by science.
From ca. 1200 AD to the स्पेनी conquest of the इन्का Empire in 1532, selective breeding by indigenous South American peoples resulted in many varieties of domestic Guinea pigs, which form the basis for some of the modern domestic breeds.
Early Andean breeds यहूद primarily रखा as agricultural भण्डार for food, and efforts at improving the Guinea pig as a food source continue to the modern era.
With the export of Guinea pigs to Europe in the 15th सदी, the लक्ष्य in breeding shifted to focus on the development of appealing pets.
To this समाप्त, विभिन्न प्रतिस्पर्धी breeding organizations were founded by fanciers.
The American Cavy Breeders Association, an adjunct to the अमरीकी खरगोश प्रजनक Association, is the governing body in the United States and Canada.
The British Cavy Council governs cavy clubs in the United Kingdom.
Similar organizations exist in Australia ( Australian नेशनल cavy परिषद ) and New Zealand ( New Zealand Cavy Club ).
Each club publishes इसके अपना Standard of Perfection and determines which breeds are eligible for showing.
New breeds continue to emerge in the 21st century.
Though there are many breeds of गिनी सुअर, तभी a few breeds are commonly found on the show table as pets.
Most Guinea pigs found as pets were either found undesirable by breeders or were bred to be pleasant pets regardless of कैसा खूब वे मिलें the नस्ल मानक of perfection.
The छोटी बाल, abyssinian, Peruvian and Sheltie ( aka Silkie ) breeds are those most frequently seen as pets, and the former three are the core breeds in the history of the competitive showing of Guinea pigs.
In addition to उनके standard form, nearly all breeds come in a Satin variant.
Satins, due to their hollow hair shafts, possess coats of a खास gloss and shine.
However, वहीँ is growing प्रमाण कि the जीनों जिम्मेदार लिये the Satin coat also can cause severe bone problems, including Osteodystrophy and Paget 's disease.
Showing Satin विसंगतियाँ is निषिद्ध by some cavy breeders ' associations because of animal welfare reasons.
All cavy breeds have some shared general standards : the head profile should be rounded, with विशाल आँखें और large, smooth ears.
The body should be strong and of कॉम्पैक्ट निर्माण.
Coat colour should in all variations be clearly defined और thorough from root to tip.
These standards are best met by long established, commonly bred breeds, as their प्रजनक have था पर्याप्त समय और पशु to effectively breed for these qualities.
The coat colour ideal of good definition and thoroughness is rarely met by other than the smooth coated breeds, which have had well established, पृथक प्रजनन लाइनों for different colours.
State schools ( also known as public schools or government schools ) generally refer to primary or secondary schools mandated for or offered to all children without charge paid for, in पूरे or in भाग, by कराधान.
The term may also refer to institutions of post-secondary education funded, in whole or in part, and overseen by सरकारी.
The ribosome assembles polymeric protein molecules whose sequence is नियंत्रित by the sequence of messenger RNA molecules.
This is required by all जीना cells and associated viruses.
The ribosome ( from ribonucleic acid and the Greek soma, meaning `` body '' ) is a large and complex molecular machine, found within all living cells, that serves as the primary site of biological protein synthesis ( translation ).
Ribosomes link amino acids together in the order specified by messenger RNA ( mrna ) molecules.
ribosomes consist of दो प्रमुख subunits—the small ribosomal subunit reads the mRNA, while the large subunit joins amino acids to form a polypeptide chain.
Each subunit is composed of एक or अधिक ribosomal RNA ( rRNA ) molecules and a variety of proteins.
The sequence of DNA एन्कोडिंग लिये a protein may be copied many times into messenger RNA ( mRNA ) chains of a similar sequence.
Ribosomes can bind to an mRNA chain and use it as a template for determining the correct sequence of amino acids in a particular protein.
Amino acids are selected, collected and carried to the ribosome by transfer RNA ( tRNA molecules ), जिससे डालें एक part of the ribosome and bind to the messenger RNA chain.
The attached amino acids are then linked together by another भाग of the ribosome.
Once the protein is produced, it can then 'fold ' to produce a specific functional three-dimensional ढांचा.
A ribosome is made from complexes of RNAs and प्रोटीन and is therefore a ribonucleoprotein.
Each ribosome is divided into two subunits : the smaller subunit binds to the mRNA pattern, while the larger subunit बांधता to the trna और the amino acids.
When a ribosome finishes reading an mRNA molecule, these two subunits split apart.
Ribosomes are ribozymes, because the catalytic peptidyl transferase कार्यकलाप that links amino acids together is performed by the ribosomal RNA.
ribosomes इससे जीवाणु, आर्किया और eukaryotes ( the three domains of life on Earth ) differ in their size, sequence, structure, and the ratio of protein to RNA.
The differences in structure allow some antibiotics to kill bacteria by inhibiting their ribosomes, while leaving human ribosomes unaffected.
In bacteria and archaea, more than one ribosome may move along a single mRNA chain at one time, each `` reading '' its अनुक्रम और producing a सम्बन्धित protein molecule.
The ribosomes in the mitochondria of eukaryotic cells functionally resemble many सुविधाएँ of those in जीवाणु, reflecting the likely evolutionary origin of mitochondria.
Albert Claude, Christian de duve, और George Emil Palade were jointly awarded the Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine, in 1974, for the discovery of the ribosomes.
The Nobel Prize in रसायन 2009 थी awarded to Venkatraman Ramakrishnan, Thomas A. Steitz and Ada E. Yonath for determining the detailed structure and mechanism of the ribosome.
The simplified internal ढांचा of a chloroplast
Overview of the calvin cycle and carbon fixation
The light-independent reactions of photosynthesis are chemical reactions that convert carbon dioxide and अन्य यौगिकों into ग्लूकोज.
These reactions occur in the stroma, the fluid-filled क्षेत्रफल of a chloroplast outside of the thylakoid membranes.
These reactions take the light-dependent reactions and perform further रासायनिक प्रक्रियाओं on them.
There are three phases to the light-independent reactions, collectively called the Calvin cycle : carbon fixation, reduction reactions, and ribulose 1,5-bisphosphate ( rubp ) regeneration.
Despite its name, इस प्रक्रम occurs only when light is available.
Plants do नहीं carry out the Calvin cycle by night.
They, बजाय, release sucrose into the phloem from their starch reserves.
This process happens when light is available independent of the kind of photosynthesis ( c3 कार्बन fixation, C4 carbon fixation, and Crassulacean Acid Metabolism ) ; CAM plants store malic acid in their vacuoles every night and release it by day in order to make this process work.
In mathematics, a square number or perfect square is an integer कि is the वर्गाकार of an पूर्णांक ; in other words, it is the product of some integer with itself.
For example, 9 is a square number, since it can be written as.
The usual notation for the formula for the square of a number is not the product, but the equivalent exponentiation, प्रायः सुनाया as `` वर्गाकार ''.
The name square number comes from the नाम of the आकार ; see below.
Square numbers are non-negative.
Another way of saying that a ( non-negative ) number is a square number, is that its square roots are again integers.
For उदाहरण, = ±3, so 9 is a square number.
A positive integer that has no पूर्ण वर्गाकार divisors except 1 is called square-free.
For a non-negative integer, the th square क्रमांक is, साथ being the zeroth square.
The concept of square can be extended to some अन्य क्रमांक प्रणालियों.
If rational numbers are included, then a square is the ratio of two square integers, and, conversely, the अनुपात of दो वर्गाकार integers is a square ( e.g., 4/9 = ( 2/3 ) 2 ).
Starting with 1, there are square numbers up to and including, जहाँ the expression represents the floor of the number.
The Era of Good Feelings marked a period in the political history of the संयुक्त राज्य that reflected a sense of national purpose and a desire for unity among Americans in the aftermath of the Napoleonic Wars.
The era saw the collapse of the Federalist Party and an end to the bitter partisan disputes between it और the प्रबल democratic-republican party during the First Party System.
President जेम्स मुनरो endeavored to downplay दलगत संबद्ध in making his nominations, with the ultimate goal of national unity and eliminating parties altogether from national politics.
The period is so closely संबद्ध with Monroe 's presidency ( 1817–1825 ) and his administrative goals that his name and the era are virtually synonymous.
The Era of Good Feelings marked a transition in American politics with the end of the Federalist Party as America began to develop after the War of 1812.
While America was experiencing growth and prosperity after the war with Britain, this era also marks the first instance of economic परेशानियों in the growing संयुक्त States.
Mirroring the American System proposed by Henry Clay, protective tariffs and the chartering of the Second Bank of the United States complicated the tension between the North and South साथ the coming of the first financial crisis.
While the term “Era of Good Feelings” is usually viewed with irony because of the political turmoil, economic कारकों caused animosity between the North and South.
The designation of the period by इतिहासकारों as one of “good feelings” is often conveyed with irony or skepticism, as the history of the era was one in which the political atmosphere was strained and divisive, especially among factions within the Monroe administration and the Republican Party.
The phrase “Era of Good Feelings” was coined by Benjamin Russell, in the Boston Federalist newspaper, Columbian Centinel, on July 12, 1817, following Monroe 's visit to Boston, Massachusetts as part of his good will tour of America.
Mariel Margaret `` Mia '' Hamm ( born March 17, 1972 ) is a retired American पेशेवर सॉकर खिलाड़ी.
Hamm played many years as a forward for the United राज्य महिलाओं 's नेशनल सॉकर टोली और was a founding member of the Washington Freedom.
Hamm scored 158 international goals, more than any other player, male or female, in the history of soccer and is the third most capped मादा खिलाड़ी in सॉकर इतिहास पीछे kristine Lilly and Christie Rampone, appearing in 275 international matches.
Hamm was named the women 's FIFA World Player of the Year the first two टाइम्स कि पुरस्कार was given ( in 2001 and 2002 ), and is listed as one of FIFA 's 125 best living players ( as chosen by Pelé ).
She was inducted into the National Soccer Hall of Fame as well as the अलबामा खेल हॉल of Fame and Texas Sports Hall of Fame.
She is the author of Go For the Goal : A Champion 's Guide to Winning in Soccer and Life and appeared in the HBO documentary Dare to Dream : The Story of the U.S. महिलाओं 's सॉकर Team.
Washington Post columnist Michael Wilbon called Hamm, `` Perhaps the most important खिलाड़ी of the last 15 years. ''

The New York Red Bulls is an American professional soccer team based in Harrison, New Jersey, representing the नई यॉर्क metropolitan area.
The team competes in the Eastern Conference of Major लीग सॉकर ( MLS ).
It is one of the ten चार्टर क्लब of MLS, having competed in the league since its inception.
The team was a founding member of MLS ( 1996 ), but has gone through several नाम परिवर्तन.
The team was originally ज्ञात as the New York/New Jersey MetroStars through 1997.
From the 1998 season through the 2005 ऋतु, the team was known as the MetroStars.
On March 9, 2006, the team was sold to Red सांड gmbh, leading to the team 's current name.
They are the only original MLS franchise not to have जीती कोई significant trophy ( including regular season, playoffs, and knockout competition ) since inception.
The team 's best परिणाम in the MLS was the MLS Cup final in 2008.
In the US Open Cup, the MetroStars reached three semifinals ( 1997, 1998, 2000 ), before reaching their first final in 2003, खोने 1–0 to the Chicago Fire.
On August 26, 2000, the Metros ' Clint Mathis set an MLS record by scoring five goals in a game against the Dallas Burn.
Some well-known players that have played for the team include Giovanni Savarese, Tim Howard, Tony Meola, Tab Ramos, Alexi Lalas, Clint Mathis, Jozy Altidore, Michael Bradley, Claudio Reyna, Eddie Pope, Roberto Donadoni, Lothar Matthäus, Adolfo Valencia, Youri Djorkaeff, Amado Guevara, Juan Pablo Ángel, Thierry Henry, Juninho pernambucano, जन गुन्नार solli, Rafael Márquez, and Tim Cahill.
The team has also had well-known coaches, including Carlos Queiroz, Carlos Alberto Parreira, Bora Milutinović, Bob Bradley, Mo johnston, ब्रूस Arena and Hans Backe.
Confucianism, Taoism, and Buddhism are one, a painting in the litang स्टाइल portraying तीन मेन हँस by a river stream, 12th century, Song Dynasty.
Estimating the number of Buddhists in the world, or in many countries, is difficult due to definitional issues as खूब as व्यावहारिक problems of enumeration.
To begin with, the religious beliefs, practices, and identities of East Asians ( who comprise the majority of the world 's बौद्धों by कोई माप ) often blend Buddhism with other traditions including Confucianism, the Chinese folk religion, Daoism, Shinto, and Korean shamanism.
Most followers of Buddhism do not belong to structured congregations, or observe a definite ritual of adherence such as लेने शरण, बनाना it difficult to accurately estimate the number of practitioners.
An additional challenge is the दुश्मनी of several national governments ( often Communist ones such as China or North Korea ) to religion generally or to Buddhism specifically.
Government policies in these countries may encourage the under-reporting or non-reporting of religious adherence, resulting in official योग कि may drastically underestimate the number of religious practitioners in these countries.
Estimate of the worldwide बौद्ध जनसांख्यिकी दायरा इससे 350 million to over one billion, but cluster nearer to the first figure.
Adherents.com ( as of 2012 ) suggests a figure of 397 million.
by प्रमुख branches, the numbers are as follows:
( 1 ) Mahayana Buddhism, including East Asian buddhism, साथ no कम than 185 million adherents, and possibly several times that many ( again, depending on definitional issues ).
This is the predominant रूप of Buddhism practiced in China, South Korea, Japan, Taiwan, Singapore, and Vietnam.
( 2 ) थेरवाद Buddhism, with no fewer than 125 million adherents.
This is the predominant form of buddhism practiced in Cambodia, Thailand, Laos, Sri Lanka, and Burma.
( 3 ) Vajrayana Buddhism, with लगभग 20 million adherents.
This form predominates in the वृहद तिब्बती और Mongolian regions, as well as in the Himalayas.
Besides the independent countries of Mongolia and Bhutan, and various territories within what is now western China, Vajrayana is traditional to certain regions of Russia ( e.g. Kalmykia, Buryatia ), इण्डिया ( e.g. लद्दाख, सिक्किम ), और नेपाल ( e.g. Khumbu ).
Vajrayana, भी ज्ञात as Tibetan Buddhism, is often conflated with Tantric Buddhism, but this is imprecise, as Shingon and other forms of East Asian Buddhism also practice tantra.
At least 7 countries ( Sri Lanka, Thailand, Cambodia, Laos, Burma, Bhutan, and Mongolia ) have unambiguous Buddhist majorities.
Depending on how one calculates Chinese and अन्य ईस्ट एशियाई adherents, this figure might expand to include several more countries.
In addition, buddhism is the राज्य धर्म of Cambodia and Bhutan, and receives prominent mention in the constitutions of Thailand and Sri Lanka.
In northern India and Nepal, the जमीन जहाँ buddhism थी born, the religion severely declined during the first millennium.
Whether this decline was due to the Islamic conquest of उत्तरी इण्डिया, or to other factors, remains controversial.
See the article Decline of buddhism in India.
James Butler Hickok ( May 27, 1837 – August 2, 1876 ), better ज्ञात as जंगली विधेयक hickok, was a folk hero of the American Old West.
His skills as a gunfighter and scout, along with his reputation as a lawman, provided the basis for his fame, although कुछ of उसके reported कारनामे हैं fictionalized.
Born and raised on a farm in rural Illinois, hickok गई वेस्ट at आयु 18 as a fugitive from justice, first working as a stagecoach driver, before he became a lawman in the frontier territories of Kansas and Nebraska.
He fought for the संघ फौज दौरान the American Civil War, and gained publicity after the war as a scout, marksman, actor, and professional gambler.
Between his law-enforcement कर्तव्य और जुए, which easily overlapped, Hickok was involved in several notable shootouts.
He was shot and killed while playing poker in the Nuttal & Mann 's सैलून in deadwood, डकोटा Territory ( now South Dakota ).
Artist 's conception of the Curiosity rover vaporizing rock on मंगल.
The रोवर landed on Mars in August 2012.
A Mars rover is an automated motor vehicle जिससे propels itself आरपार the सतह of the planet Mars after landing.
Rovers have several advantages over stationary landers : they examine more territory, they can be directed to interesting features, they can place themselves in sunny स्थितियाँ to मौसम शीत महीने और वे can अग्रिम the ज्ञान of कैसा to perform very remote robotic vehicle control.
There have been four कामयाब robotically operated Mars rovers.
The Jet नोदन प्रयोगशाला managed the Mars Pathfinder mission and its now inactive Sojourner rover.
It currently manages the Mars Exploration Rover mission 's active Opportunity rover and inactive स्पिरिट, and, as part of the Mars Science Laboratory mission, the Curiosity rover.
A financial audit, or more accurately, an audit of financial statements, is the सत्यापन of the वित्तीय कथन of a legal entity, with a view to express an audit opinion.
The audit opinion is intended to provide reasonable assurance, but not absolute assurance, that the financial कथन हैं प्रस्तुत fairly, in सब सामग्री respects, and/or give a true and fair view in accordance with the financial reporting framework.
The purpose of an audit is provide and objective independent examination of the financial statements, which increases the value and credibility of the financial statements produced by management, thus increase user confidence in the financial बयान, reduce निवेशकों रिस्क और consequently reduce the cost of capital of the preparer of the financial statements.
Financial audits are typically performed by firms of practicing accountants जो हैं experts in financial reporting.
The वित्तीय ऑडिट is one of many assurance functions provided by accounting firms.
Many organizations separately employ or hire internal auditors, who do not attest to वित्तीय रिपोर्ट्स लकिन फ़ोकस mainly on the internal controls of the organization.
External auditors may choose to place limited reliance on the work of internal auditors.
Auditing promotes transparency and accuracy in the financial disclosures made by an organization, therefore would likely to reduce of such corporations to छिपाते unscrupulous dealings.
Internationally, the International Standards on Auditing ( ISA ) issued by the International Auditing and Assurance Standards Board ( IAASB ) is considered as the बेंचमार्क लिये ऑडिट प्रक्रम.
Almost all jurisdictions require auditors to follow the ISA or a local विभिन्नता of the ISA.
Dollar coins have been minted in the संयुक्त राज्य in gold, silver, and base metal versions.
The term silver dollar is often used for any large white metal coin issued by the संयुक्त राज्य साथ a फेस मान of एक dollar, although purists insist that a dollar is not silver unless it contains some of that metal.
Silver डॉलर, the पहला डालर सिक्का issue, were minted beginning in 1794.
Gold dollars and gold-colored डॉलर have भी been produced by the United States.
The Sacagawea and Presidential dollars are often referred to as `` golden dollars ''.
In modern times, dollar coins have not been बहुत लोकप्रिय in the United States.
Despite efforts by the government to promote their use, most Americans currently use the one dollar विधेयक बल्कि than डालर सिक्के.
In straight और स्तर flight lift ( L ) equals weight ( W ).
In a banked फेरे of 60°, लिफ्ट बराबरी double the weight ( L=2W ).
The pilot experiences 2g और a doubled weight.
The steeper the bank, the greater the g-forces.
इस top-fuel dragster can accelerate from zero to in 0.86 seconds.
This is a horizontal acceleration of 5.3 g. Combined with the vertical g-force in the stationary मामला the pythagorean प्रमेय yields a g फ़ोर्स of 5.4 g.
g-force ( with g from gravitational ) is a term for accelerations लगा as वज़न and measurable by accelerometers.
It is not a force, per se, but a force per ईकाई द्रव्यमान.
Since such a force is perceived as a weight, कोई g-force can be described as a `` weight per unit mass '' ( see the synonym specific weight ).
The g-force acceleration acts as a गुणक of weight-like शक्तियां लिये प्रत्येक ईकाई of an ऑब्जेक्ट 's mass, and ( save for certain electromagnetic force influences ) is the cause of an object 's acceleration in relation to free-fall.
इस त्वरण experienced by an object is due to the vector sum of non-gravitational forces acting on an object free to move.
The accelerations that are not produced by gravity are termed proper accelerations, and it is only these that हैं measured in g-force units.
They cause stresses and strains on वस्तुएँ.
Because of these strains, विशाल g-forces may be destructive.
Gravitation acting alone does not produce a g-force, even though g-forces are expressed in multiples of the acceleration of a standard gravity.
Thus, the standard gravitational acceleration at the Earth 's सतह produces g-force only indirectly, as a result of resistance to it by mechanical forces.
The 1 g-force on an object sitting on the Earth 's surface is caused by mechanical force exerted in the upward direction by the ground, keeping the object from going into free-fall.
The upward force from the ground ensures that an object at rest on the Earth 's surface is accelerating relative to the free-fall condition, which is the path that the object would follow when falling freely toward the Earth 's center.
Objects allowed to free-fall in an inertial trajectory under the influence of gravitation-only, feel no g-force.
This is demonstrated by the `` zero-g '' conditions inside a freely falling elevator falling toward the Earth 's center ( in vacuum ), or ( to good approximation ) शर्तें अंदर a spacecraft in Earth orbit.
These are examples of coordinate acceleration ( a बदलें in गति ) बगैर a sensation of weight.
The experience of no g-force ( zero-g ), however it is उत्पादित, is synonymous साथ weightlessness.
In the absence of gravitational fields, or in directions at right angles to them, proper and coordinate accelerations हैं the वही, और कोई निर्देशांक त्वरण जरूर be produced by a corresponding g-force acceleration.
An example here is a rocket in free space, in which simple परिवर्तन in गति हैं उत्पादित by the engines, and produce g-forces on the rocket and passengers.
An augur holding a lituus, the curved wand often used as a symbol of augury on Roman coins
The augur was a priest and official in the classical world, especially ancient रोम और Etruria.
His प्रमुख भूमिका थी to interpret the will of the gods by studying the flight of birds : whether they are flying in groups or alone, what noises they make as they fly, direction of flight and what kind of birds they are.
This थी ज्ञात as `` taking the auspices. ''
The ceremony and function of the augur was central to any major undertaking in Roman society—public or private—including matters of war, कॉमर्स, और धर्म.
The Roman historian Livy stresses the importance of the augurs : `` Who does not know that this city was founded only after लेने the auspices, कि सबकुछ in युद्ध और in peace, at home and abroad, was done only after taking the auspices ? ''
Farmington Hills is an affluent community in southeastern मिशिगन.
It is the second largest city in ओकलैंड County in the U.S. state of Michigan.
Its जनसांख्यिकी was 79,740 at the 2010 census.
It is भाग of the upscale northwestern suburbs of Metropolitan Detroit and is also northeast of downtown Ann Arbor.
Farmington Hills consistently ranks as one of the safest शहरों in the United States, as well as in the state of Michigan.
In 2010, the area ranked as the 30th safest नगर in America.
Although the two cities have separate services and addresses, Farmington and farmington पहाड़ियाँ हैं often thought of as the same community.
Features of the community शामिल a recently renovated downtown, boutiques, a vintage cinema, numerous restaurants, exotic car dealerships, art galleries, and public parks including Heritage Park.
There are several historical साइट including the Longacre House and the Governor Warner Mansion.
Both cities are परोसा by farmington Public Schools.
farmington पहाड़ियाँ serves as a major business center for the greater Detroit area.
present-day impression of a Late Bronze Age seal
Town seal ( मेट्रिक्स ) of Náchod from 1570
A seal is a device for making an छाप in मोम, मिट्टी, पेपर, or कुछ अन्य मीडियम, including an embossment on paper, and is also the impression thus made.
The original purpose was to authenticate a document, a wrapper for one such as a modern लिफाफा, or the cover of a container or package holding valuables or other objects.
The sealing process is essentially that of a mould, with the final image represented on the device for making the impression by a mirror-image design, incised in sunken- ( or counter- ) relief or intaglio.
The seal-making यंत्र is भी referred to as the मुहर मेट्रिक्स or die ; the imprint it creates as the seal impression ( or, more rarely, the sealing ).
If the impression is बना purely as a राहत resulting from the greater pressure on the paper where the high parts of the matrix touch, the seal is known as a dry seal ; in all other cases a liquid or liquified medium ( such as ink or wax ) is used, usually in another color than the paper.
For legal purposes, the definition of a seal may be extended to शामिल rubber stamps, or writing specified words ( `` seal '' or `` L.S. `` ).
In the United States, the word `` seal '' is sometimes assigned to a facsimile of the seal design ( in monochrome or color ), which may be used in a variety of contexts including architectural settings, on ध्वज, or on आधिकारिक letterheads.
Thus, for example, the Great Seal of the United States, among other uses, appears on the reverse of the one-dollar bill ; and several of the seals of the U.S. states appear on their respective state flags.
In Europe, although coats of arms and heraldic बैज may well feature in such contexts as well as on seals, the seal design in its entirety rarely appears as an emblem.
The study of seals is known as sigillography or sphragistics.
groundhog दिन ( पेन्सिलवेनिया German : Grundsaudaag, Murmeltiertag ) is a day celebrated on February 2.
According to folklore, if it is cloudy when a groundhog emerges from its burrow on this day, then spring will come early ; if it is sunny, the groundhog will supposedly see its shadow and retreat back into its burrow, and the winter weather होगा continue for six more weeks.
Modern कस्टम of the अवकाश involve celebrations where early morning festivals are held to watch the groundhog emerging from its burrow.
In southeastern Pennsylvania, groundhog lodges ( grundsow lodges ) celebrate the holiday with fersommlinge, social events in which food is served, speeches are made, and one or more g'spiel ( plays or skits ) are performed for entertainment.
The Pennsylvania German dialect is the तभी भाषा spoken at the event, and those who speak English pay a penalty, usually in the form of a nickel, dime, or quarter per word spoken, with the money put into a bowl in the center of the table.
The largest Groundhog Day celebration is आयोजित in Punxsutawney, Pennsylvania.
Groundhog Day, already a widely recognized and popular tradition, received widespread attention as a परिणाम of the 1993 फिल्मी groundhog दिन, जिससे थी नियत in Punxsutawney, PA ( though filmed primarily in Woodstock, IL ) and portrayed Punxsutawney Phil.
High resolution image of Tampa Bay प्रदेश
The tampa खाड़ी क्षेत्रफल रै a आर्द्र उपोष्ण climate ( Koppen Cfa ), with warm and humid summers with frequent thunderstorms and drier winters with freezing temperatures occurring every 2–3 years.
The area experiences a significant summer wet season, as nearly two-thirds of the annual precipitation जलप्रपात in the महीने of जून through September.
The area is listed by the United States Department of Agriculture ( USDA ) as होने in hardiness मण्डल 10, which is about the northern limit of where coconut palms and royal palms can be grown.
highs प्रायः range between 65 and 95 °F ( 18 and 35 °C ) year round.
Though known for hot ग्रीष्म, tampa 's official high has never reached 100 °F ( 38 °C ) – the city 's all-time record temperature is 99 °F ( 37 °C ).
St. Petersburg 's all-time रिकार्ड ऊँची is exactly 100 °F ( 38 °C ).
Pinellas County lies on a peninsula between Tampa Bay and the Gulf of Mexico, and much of the city of Tampa lies on a smaller peninsula jutting out into Tampa Bay.
इस निकटता to विशाल लाशें of जल दोनो नरमपंथियों temperatures और introduces विशाल amounts of आर्द्रता into the माहौल.
In general, the लोकल समुदायों farthest इससे the coast have larger temperature ranges, both during a single day and throughout the seasons of the year.
A diagram of the electromagnetic spectrum, showing various गुण across the range of frequencies and wavelengths
The इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक spectrum is the range of all possible frequencies of electromagnetic radiation.
The `` electromagnetic spectrum '' of an ऑब्जेक्ट रै a अलग अर्थ, and is instead the characteristic distribution of electromagnetic radiation emitted or absorbed by that particular object.
The electromagnetic spectrum extends from below the low frequencies used for modern radio communication to gamma radiation at the short- wavelength ( high-frequency ) समाप्त, thereby covering wavelengths from thousands of kilometers down to a fraction of the size of an atom.
The limit for long wavelengths is the size of the ब्रह्मांड itself, जबकि it is thought that the short wavelength limit is in the vicinity of the Planck length, although in principle the spectrum is infinite and continuous.
Most parts of the electromagnetic spectrum are used in science for spectroscopic और अन्य probing interactions, as ways to study and characterize matter.
In addition, radiation from various parts of the spectrum has found many other uses for communications and manufacturing ( see इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक विकिरण for more applications ).
लेजेंड
Franklin Delano Roosevelt ( or ; January 30, 1882 – April 12, 1945 ), also known by उसके आद्याक्षर, fdr, was the 32nd President of the United States ( 1933–1945 ) and a central figure in world events during the mid-20th century, leading the United States during a time of worldwide economic depression and total war.
A dominant leader of the लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी और the तभी अमरीकी अध्यक्ष elected to more than two terms, he built a New Deal Coalition that realigned American politics after 1932, as his domestic policies defined American liberalism for the middle third of the 20th century.
With the bouncy popular song `` Happy Days Are Here Again `` as his अभियान थीम, fdr पराजित लाज़िम Republican Herbert Hoover in November 1932, at the depth of the Great Depression.
Energized by his personal विजय over पोलियो, fdr 's unfailing आशावाद and activism contributed to a renewal of the national spirit.
He worked closely साथ अंग्रेजों प्रधान मंत्री Winston Churchill and Soviet General Secretary Joseph Stalin in leading the Allies against Germany and Japan in World War II, and restoring prosperity to the nation 's economy.
In his first hundred days in office, which began March 4, 1933, Roosevelt spearheaded major legislation and issued a profusion of executive orders that instituted the New Deal —a variety of programs designed to produce relief ( government jobs for the unemployed ), recovery ( आर्थिक विकास ), और सुधार ( through विनियमन of Wall Street, banks and transportation ).
The economy improved rapidly इससे 1933 to 1937, but then relapsed into a deep recession.
The bipartisan Conservative Coalition that formed in 1937 prevented his packing the Supreme Court or passing any considerable विधान ; it abolished अनेक of the relief programs when unemployment diminished during World War II.
Most of the regulations on business were ended about 1975–85, except for the regulation of Wall गली by the प्रतिभूति and Exchange Commission, which still exists.
Along with अनेक छोटी कार्यक्रम, प्रमुख surviving कार्यक्रम include the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation, which was created in 1933, and Social Security, which Congress passed in 1935.
As World War II loomed after 1938, with the Japanese invasion of China and the aggression of Nazi Germany, FDR gave strong diplomatic and financial support to चीन और ग्रेट ब्रिटेन, while remaining officially neutral.
His goal was to make America the `` Arsenal of Democracy `` which would सप्लाई munitions to the Allies.
In March 1941, Roosevelt, with congressional स्वीकृति, provided Lend-Lease aid to the countries fighting against Nazi Germany with Britain.
With very strong national support, he made war on Japan and Germany after the Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor on December 7, 1941, calling it a `` date which will live in infamy ``.
He supervised the mobilization of the u.S. अर्थव्यवस्था to support the Allied war effort.
As an active military leader, Roosevelt implemented an overall war strategy on two fronts that ended in the defeat of the Axis शक्तियां और the विकास of the संसार 's पहला atom bomb.
In 1942 Roosevelt ordered the internment of 100,000 Japanese American civilians.
Unemployment dropped to 2 %, relief programs largely ended, and the industrial economy grew rapidly to नई हाइट्स as लाखो of लोगों moved to new jobs in war centers, and 16 million men and 300,000 women were drafted or volunteered for military service.
रूज़वेल्ट वर्चस्व the American political scene not only during the twelve years of his presidency, but also for decades afterward.
He orchestrated the realignment of voters that created the Fifth Party System.
FDR 's New Deal Coalition united labor unions, big city machines, white ethnics, African अमेरिकी और ग्रामीण श्वेत southerners.
he भी बहकावे the later creation of the United Nations and Bretton Woods.
Roosevelt is consistently rated by scholars as one of the top three U.S. Presidents, along with Abraham lincoln और जार्ज वॉशिंगटन.
A liberal Democrat, Roosevelt defined his ideological position as `` a छोटी बाएँ of center. ''
A Joint Committee is a पद in राजनीती कि is प्रयुक्त to refer to a committee made up of members of both chambers of a bicameral legislature.
In other contexts, it refers to a committee with members from more than one organization.
The regulation of prostitution in the संयुक्त राज्य is not among the enumerated powers of the federal government ; Under the Tenth Amendment to the United States Constitution, it is therefore exclusively the domain of the states to permit, prohibit, or otherwise regulate commercial sex, except insofar as Congress may regulate it as part of interstate commerce with laws like the Mann Act.
in सबसे राज्य, वेश्यावृति is माना a misdemeanor in the category of public order crime, a crime that disrupts the order of a community.
It was at one time माना to be a vagrancy crime.
Currently, Nevada is the only state to allow वेश्यालय वेश्यावृति, the terms of which are stipulated in the Nevada Revised Statutes.
Only 8 counties फिलहाल contain active brothels.
All forms of prostitution are illegal in Clark County ( which contains the Las Vegas–Paradise metropolitan area ), Washoe काउंटी ( जिससे contains रेनो ), कार्सन नगर, डगलस County, and Lincoln County.
The other counties theoretically allow वेश्यालय वेश्यावृति, but some of these counties currently have no active brothels.
Street prostitution, `` pandering, '' and living off of the proceeds of a वेश्या remain illegal under Nevada law, as elsewhere in the country.
As with other countries, prostitution in the संयुक्त राज्य can be divided into three broad categories : street prostitution, brothel prostitution, and escort prostitution.
The national flag of the United States of America, often simply referred to as the American flag, consists of thirteen equal horizontal stripes of red ( top and bottom ) alternating with white, with a blue rectangle in the canton ( referred to specifically as the `` union '' ) bearing fifty small, white, five-pointed stars arranged in nine offset horizontal rows of six stars ( top and bottom ) alternating with rows of five stars.
The 50 stars on the flag represent the 50 states of the United States of America and the 13 धारियाँ represent the thirteen British colonies that declared independence from the Kingdom of Great Britain and became the first states in the Union.
nicknames लिये the ध्वज शामिल the `` Stars and Stripes '', `` Old Glory ``, and `` The Star-Spangled Banner. ''
India is a federal union of states comprising twenty-eight states and seven union territories.
The states and territories are further subdivided into districts and so on.
congressional districts for the 113th United States Congress
2010 जनसांख्यिकी change:
Change in apportionment of congressional districts, starting in 2013, as a परिणाम of the 2010 census.
2000 Census change:
Change in apportionment of congressional districts, from 2003 to 2013, as a result of the 2000 census.
This is a complete list of congressional districts लिये representation in the United States House of Representatives.
The quantity ( apportionment ) and सीमाएँ ( redistricting ) of districts are determined after each census, although in some cases states have changed the boundaries more than once per census.
This list includes the 435 current and over 200 obsolete जिले.
For उदाहरण, चूंकि the 2000 जनसांख्यिकी, नेब्रास्का रै था तीन जिले, लकिन it प्रयुक्त to have as अनेक as छह.
In the first decade of the twenty-first century, टेक्सास था 32 जिले, लकिन has since added four due to reapportionment as a result of the 2010 census.
Other states have lost districts since the number of congressional seats has been नियत at 435 by statute.
भी शामिल here are non-voting delegations : six current and four obsolete.
The boundaries of districts प्रायः shift with each redistricting.
Over time, the प्रदेश and demographics represented in a district can change substantially.
furthermore, districts sometimes retain the same boundaries while changing their district numbers.
Mariah Carey ( born March 27, 1970 ) is an American singer, songwriter, रिकार्ड producer, actress, and philanthropist.
Under the guidance of Columbia Records executive Tommy Mottola, Carey released her self-titled debut studio album Mariah Carey in 1990 ; it went multi-platinum and spawned four लगातार क्रमांक एक singles on the u.s. बिलबोर्ड Hot 100 chart.
Following her marriage to Mottola in 1993 and success with hit records भाव ( 1991 ), Music Box ( 1993 ), and Merry Christmas ( 1994 ), Carey was established as Columbia 's highest-selling act.
Daydream ( 1995 ) made music history when its second single `` One Sweet Day ``, a duet with Boyz II Men, spent a record sixteen weeks on top of the Billboard Hot 100, and remains the longest-running number-one song in U.S. chart history.
दौरान the रिकॉर्डिंग of the album, Carey began to deviate from her R & B and pop beginnings and slowly traversed into hip hop.
This musical change became evident with the release of Butterfly ( 1997 ), at जिससे time Carey had separated from Mottola.
Carey left Columbia in 2000, and signed a record-breaking $ 100 लाख रिकॉर्डिंग contract with Virgin Records.
Before the release of her first feature film Glitter ( 2001 ), she suffered a physical and emotional breakdown and was hospitalized for severe exhaustion.
Following the film 's poor रिसेप्शन, वो was bought out of her recording contract for $ 50 million, which led to a decline in her career.
She signed a multi-million dollar contract deal with Island Records in 2002, and after an unsuccessful period, returned to the top of music चार्ट with The Emancipation of Mimi ( 2005 ).
Its second सिंगल `` we belong Together `` became her most successful single of the 2000s, and was later named `` Song of the Decade '' by Billboard.
Carey once again ventured into film with a well-received starring role in ( 2009 ) ; she was awarded the `` Breakthrough Performance Award '' at the Palm Springs अंतरराष्ट्रीय फिल्मी पर्व, और Black Reel and NAACP Image Award nominations.
In a career spanning over दो दशकों, कैरी रै बेची अधिक than 200 लाख records worldwide, making her one of the best-selling music artists of all time.
In 1998, she was honored as the world 's best-selling recording artist of the 1990s at the World Music Awards.
Carey was भी नामित the best-selling female artist of the millennium in 2000.
According to the Recording Industry संघ of अमेरिका, she is the third best-selling female artist in the United States, with 63.5 million certified albums.
With the release of `` Touch My Body `` ( 2008 ), कैरी gained उसके eighteenth number one single in the United States, more than any other solo artist.
In 2012, Carey was ranked second on vh1 's सूची of the `` 100 Greatest Women in Music ''.
Aside from her commercial accomplishments, Carey has won five ग्रैमी पुरस्कार, 17 World Music Awards, 11 American Music Awards, and 31 Billboard Music Awards.
Referred to as the `` songbird supreme '' by the Guinness World Records, she is famed लिये उसके five-octave गायन range, power, melismatic style and signature use of the whistle register.
Stratocumulus stratiformis cumulogenitus
In meteorology, a cloud is a visible mass of liquid droplets or frozen crystals made of water or विभिन्न रसायन निलंबित in the atmosphere above the surface of a planetary body.
These suspended particles are also known as aerosols.
Clouds in धरती 's atmosphere are studied in the cloud physics branch of meteorology.
Two processes, possibly acting together, can lead to एयर बनने संतृप्त ; कूलिंग the air or adding water vapor to the air.
In general, वर्षण होगा पतन to the सतह ; an exception is virga, which evaporates before reaching the surface.
The international cloud classification system is based on the fact clouds in their most basic forms can show free-convective upward growth like cumulus, appear in non-convective परतदार चादरें ऐसे as स्ट्रेट्स, or लो the रूप of पतला तंतुमय wisps, as in the case of cirrus.
Prefixes are used in connection with clouds to express variations or complexities in these basic फ़ॉर्म or to बताएँ मध्य or ऊँची ऊँचाई सीमाएँ.
These include strato- for low clouds with limited convection that form mostly in uneven layers, cumulo- for complex highly-convective storm clouds, nimbo- for thick layered clouds of some complexity that can produce moderate to heavy precipitation, alto- लिये मध्य बादल, और cirro- लिये ऊँची clouds ; the latter two of which may be of simple or moderately complex structure.
Whether or not a cloud is low, middle, or high level depends on how far above the ground its आधार forms.
Cloud types with significant vertical extent can form in the low or middle ऊँचाई सीमाएँ depending on the moisture content of the air.
Clouds in the troposphere have Latin names due to the popular adaptation of Luke Howard 's cloud categorization प्रणाली, जिससे began to स्प्रेड in लोकप्रियता दौरान December 1802.
Synoptic surface weather observations use code numbers to record and report the types of tropospheric cloud visible at each scheduled अवलोकन समय आधारित on the height and physical appearance of the clouds.
While a majority of clouds form in Earth 's troposphere, वहीँ हैं अवसरों जब बादल in the stratosphere and mesosphere can be observed.
ये तीन main layers of the atmosphere where clouds may be seen are collectively known as the homosphere.
Above this lies the thermosphere and exosphere, which together make up the heterosphere कि marks the transition to outer space.
Clouds have been observed on other planets and moons within the Solar System, but, due to their different temperature characteristics, they are composed of other substances such as methane, ammonia, and sulfuric acid.
Galveston County is a county located in the U.S. state of Texas within the houston–sugar land–baytown metropolitan area.
As of the 2010 census, the population was 291,309.
Its county seat is Galveston.
League City is the largest city in Galveston County in terms of population ; URL_http between 2000 and 2005 it surpassed Galveston as the county 's largest city.
Galveston County थी founded in 1838.

This is a list of शहरों in the Bahamas.

The Big Ten Conference, formerly Western Conference and Big Nine Conference, is the oldest Division I college athletic conference in the United States.
Its twelve member institutions ( which are primarily flagship research universities in their respective states, well-regarded academically, and with relatively large student enrollment ) are located primarily in the Midwest, stretching from Nebraska in the west to Penn State in the east.
The conference competes in the NCAA 's Division I ; its football teams compete in the Football Bowl subdivision ( FBS ), formerly known as Division I-A, the highest level of NCAA competition in that sport.
Member स्कूलों of the बिग टेन ( or, in दो मामले, their parent university systems ) also are members of the Committee on Institutional Cooperation, a leading educational and research consortium.
Despite the conference 's name, the Big Ten actually consists of 12 schools, following the addition of The Pennsylvania State University in 1993 and the University of Nebraska–Lincoln in 2011.
In 2014, the conference will expand to 14 सदस्यों साथ the परिवर्धन of the विश्वविद्यालयों of Maryland, College Park and Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey.
It is not to be confused with the Big 12 Conference, which has only ten schools and represents a different region of the country.
Single Malt Scotch is single malt whisky made in Scotland using a pot still distillation process at a single distillery, साथ malted जौ as the only grain ingredient.
As with any Scotch whisky, a सिंगल malt स्कॉच must be distilled in Scotland and matured in oak casks in Scotland for at least three years ( most single malts are matured longer ).
`` Malt '' indicates that the whisky is distilled इससे a `` malted '' grain.
Several types of grains can be malted ( for example, barley, rye और गेहूं हैं सब दाने which can be malted ) ; however, in the case of single malt Scotch, barley is always the only grain used.
`` Single '' indicates that all the malts in the bottle आइये from a single distillery.
Bottlings containing malt whisky from multiple distilleries are called `` blended malt ``.
Until the Scotch Whisky Regulations 2009 ( SWR 2009 ), the word `` blended '' only appeared ( in the context of Scotch whisky ) on bottles of whisky that contained a mixture of both barley and non-barley grain whisky, but this is no longer the case.
Under the terminology established by the swr 2009, a `` blended malt Scotch whisky '' is a mixture of single malt Scotch whiskies, not a mixture of malted barley whisky and non-barley whisky ; those are called `` blended Scotch whisky '', without the word `` malt ''.
The term `` blended malt '' replaced `` vatted malt '' used under the prior labelling conventions.
The age statement on a bottle of single malt Scotch is the number of years the व्हिस्की खर्च maturing in cask.
As very few whiskies हैं बोतलबंद इससे a सिंगल cask the age statement reflects the age of the youngest malt in the mix.
A texture may be arranged so as to, `` closely दृष्टिकोण the single-object औकात of fused-ensemble timbres, for example, the beautiful 'northern lights ' chord..., in a very interesting distribution of pitches, produces a fused sound supported by a suspended cymbal roll `` ( Erickson ( 1975 ), p.166 & 168 ).
In contrast to more traditional musical textures, sound mass संयोजन `` minimizes the importance of individual pitches in preference for texture, timbre, and dynamics as primary shapers of gesture and impact. ''
Developed from the modernist tone clusters and spread to orchestral लिखने by the लेट 1950s और 1960s, sound-mass `` obscures the boundary between sound and noise `` ( Edwards 2001, pp. 326–27 ).
Techniques which may create or be used with sound mass include extended techniques such as muted brass or strings, आतुर tonguing, चौड़ी vibrato, चरम सीमाएँ, and glissandos.
Composers and works include Barbara Kolb, Pauline Oliveros ' Sound Patterns for chorus ( 1961 ), Norma Beecroft 's From Dreams of Brass for chorus ( 1963–1964 ), and Nancy वैन de Vate.
Beecroft `` blurs individual pitches in favor of a collective timbre through the use of vocal and इंस्ट्रूमेंटल clusters, choral speech, narrator, and a wash of sounds from an electronic tape. ''
( ibid )
A very early example is the opening of Jean-Féry Rebel 's ballet Les Elémens ( 1737–38 ), where chaos is represented by a धीरे cumulating orchestral cluster of all seven notes of the D minor scale ( Henck 2004, pp. 52–54 ).
A बाद उदाहरण is the third movement of Ruth Crawford Seeger 's String Quartet 1931 ( Nonesuch H-71280 ) while more recently Phill Niblock 's multiple drone based music serves as an example.
The use of `` मदारी approaching timbres '' begins साथ debussy और edgard varèse प्रायः carefully scored व्यक्तिगत इंस्ट्रूमेंटल भाग so कि वे होता फ्यूज into एक ensemble timbre or ध्वनि द्रव्यमान ( एरिक्सन 1975, pp. 18 और 21 ).
Other examples include European `` textural '' compositions of the fifties and sixties such as Krzysztof Penderecki 's Threnody to the Victims of Hiroshima ( 1959 ) and György Ligeti 's works featuring micropolyphony in works like Atmosphères ( 1961 ) and his Requiem ( 1963-65 ).
Other composers with works using this technique include Henryk Górecki, Karel Husa, Witold Lutosławski, Kazimierz Serocki, and Steven Stucky.
Sound mass techniques also appear in the म्यूज़िक of George Crumb ( Anon. n.d. ).

A student is a learner, or किसी जो attends an educational institution.
In some nations, the अंग्रेज़ी पद ( or इसके cognate in another भाषा ) is सुरक्षित लिये those who attend university, while a schoolchild under the age of eighteen is called a pupil in English ( or an equivalent in other languages ), although in the United States a person enrolled in grades K–12 is often called a student.
In its widest use, student is used for anyone जो is learning.
Australia is a continent comprising mainland Australia, Tasmania, New Guinea, Seram, संभवतः timor, और neighbouring islands.
The continent is sometimes known in technical contexts by the names sahul, Australinea or Meganesia, to distinguish it from the Australian mainland.
It is the smallest of the seven traditional महाद्वीपों in the English conception.
New Zealand is not part of the continent of Australia, but of the पृथक, submerged continent of Zealandia.
Zealandia and Australia are both part of the wider regions known as Australasia and Oceania.
The continent of Australia lies on a continental shelf overlain by उथले समंदर जिससे divide it into several landmasses — the Arafura Sea and Torres Strait between mainland Australia and New Guinea, and Bass Strait between mainland Australia and Tasmania.
When sea levels were lower during the Pleistocene ice आयु, सहित the last glacial maximum about 18,000 BC, they were connected by dry land.
During the past ten thousand years, rising sea levels overflowed the lowlands और अलग the continent into today 's low-lying arid to semi-arid mainland and the two mountainous islands of New Guinea and Tasmania.
Geologically, a continent extends to the edge of its continental shelf, so the now-separate islands हैं considered part of the continent.
Due to the स्प्रेड of पशु, fungi and plants across the single Pleistocene landmass the separate lands have a related biota.
Central Park is nearly twice as big as the संसार 's second-smallest country, Monaco.
historically इसके reservoirs were important components of the city 's water supply.
Environmental issues in New York नगर हैं प्रभावित by the city 's size, density, abundant public transportation infrastructure, and location at the mouth of the Hudson River.
New York 's population density has पर्यावरणीय फायदे और cons.
It facilitates the highest mass transit use in the United States, लकिन भी concentrates pollution.
Gasoline consumption in the city is at the rate the national average was in the 1920s, and greenhouse gas emissions are a fraction of the national average, at 7.1 metric tons per व्यक्ति per year, below San Francisco, at 11.2 metric tons, and the national average, at 24.5 metric tons.
New York City खाते लिये तभी 1 % of संयुक्त States greenhouse gas emissions while housing 2.7 % of its population.
In September 2012, New York was named the # 1 `` America 's Dirtiest City, '' by a travel+leisure readership survey that rated the environmental quality of 35 prominent cities in the United States.
अटलांटा (, stressed, locally ) is the capital of and the most populous city in the U.S. state of Georgia, with an estimated 2011 population of 432,427.
Atlanta is the cultural and economic center of the Atlanta metropolitan area, home to 5,457,831 people and the ninth largest metropolitan area in the United States.
Atlanta is the county seat of Fulton County, and a small portion of the city extends eastward into DeKalb County.
Atlanta was established in 1837 at the intersection of two railroad lines, and the city rose from the राख of the सिविल युद्ध to become a national center of commerce.
In the दशकों following the Civil Rights Movement, during which the city earned a reputation as `` too busy to hate '' for the progressive views of its citizens and leaders, Atlanta attained international prominence.
Atlanta is the primary transportation hub of the Southeastern United States, via राजमार्ग, railroad, and air, with Hartsfield–Jackson Atlanta International Airport being the world 's busiest airport since 1998.
Atlanta is considered an `` alpha ( - ) world city, '' and, with a gross domestic उत्पाद of us $ 270 अरब, atlanta’s अर्थव्यवस्था बाँधने 15th among world cities and sixth in the nation.
Although Atlanta’s अर्थव्यवस्था is माना विविध, प्रबल sectors include logistics, professional and business services, media operations, government administration, and higher education.
Topographically, अटलांटा is चिह्नित by rolling hills and dense tree coverage.
Revitalization of Atlanta 's neighborhoods, initially spurred by the 1996 Olympics, has intensified in the 21st सदी, altering the नगर 's जनसांख्यिकी, politics, and culture.
