एलिज़ाबेथ ii ( एलिज़ाबेथ एलेक्जेंड्रा Mary ; born 21 April 1926 ) is the constitutional monarch of 16 sovereign states, known as the Commonwealth realms, and their territories and dependencies, and head of the 54-member Commonwealth of Nations.
वो is Supreme Governor of the Church of England and, in some of her realms, carries the title of Defender of the Faith as part of her full title.
On her accession on 6 February 1952, Elizabeth became Head of the Commonwealth and queen regnant of seven independent Commonwealth countries : the United Kingdom, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, South Africa, Pakistan and Ceylon.
From 1956 to 1992, the number of her realms varied as territories gained independence and some realms became republics.
At present, in addition to the first four aforementioned countries, Elizabeth is Queen of Jamaica, बारबाडोस, the बहामा, हरा, पापुआ नई गिनी, the Solomon Islands, Tuvalu, Saint Lucia, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines, Belize, Antigua and Barbuda and Saint Kitts and Nevis.
Her reign of years is currently the second longest for a British monarch ; only Queen Victoria has reigned longer at over 63 years.
Elizabeth was born in London and educated privately at घर.
Her father acceded to the throne as George VI in 1936 on the abdication of his brother Edward VIII, from which time she was the heir presumptive.
She began to undertake पब्लिक duties during the Second World War, in which she served in the Auxiliary Territorial Service.
In 1947, she married Prince Philip, Duke of Edinburgh, with whom she has चार children : Charles, Anne, Andrew, and Edward.
Her coronation service took place in 1953 and was the पहला to be televised.
The Queen 's many historic visits and meetings include a state visit to the गणतंत्र of आयरलैंड and reciprocal visits to and from the Pope.
The Queen has seen प्रमुख संवैधानिक परिवर्तन in her realms, such as devolution in the United Kingdom and the patriation of the Canadian constitution.
Times of personal significance have included the births and marriages of her children, the births of her grandchildren, the investiture of the Prince of Wales, and the celebration of milestones such as her Silver, Golden, and Diamond Jubilees in 1977, 2002, and 2012, respectively.
Major events in the Queen 's reign have included the Troubles in Northern Ireland, the falklands युद्ध, युद्धों साथ Iraq and the War in Afghanistan.
There have been times of personal sorrow for her which include the death of her father at 56, the हत्या of Prince Philip 's uncle, Lord Mountbatten, the breakdown of her children 's marriages in 1992 ( a year deemed her annus horribilis ), the death in 1997 of her former daughter-in-law, Diana, Princess of Wales, and the deaths of her mother and sister in 2002.
The Queen has occasionally faced severe press criticism of the royal family and republican sentiments, but support for the monarchy and her personal popularity remain high.
Christianity is the largest धर्म listed by Australians in the national census.
In the 2011 Census, 61.1 % of Australians were listed as Christian.
Australia रै no आधिकारिक राज्य धर्म and the Australian Constitution protects freedom of religion.
The presence of Christianity in Australia began साथ the आगमन of the First Fleet of British convicts in 1788.
The religion grew to account for 96.1 % of the national population at the time of the संघ of ऑस्ट्रेलिया in 1901.
The Anglican Church of Australia ( formerly known as the Church of England in ऑस्ट्रेलिया ) remained the largest denomination until 1986, when it was surpassed by the Roman Catholic Church in Australia.
Post-war multiculturalism and a decline in religious observance among some sections of the population have diversified the demographics of religion in Australia.
Of the roughly 61 % identifying as Christian in 2011, the largest denominations were either Roman Catholic ( 25 % ) or Anglican ( 17 % ), with the third largest denomination being the 5 % affiliated with the Uniting Church in Australia.
Post-war immigration has grown the numbers belonging to churches like the यूनानी परंपरागत archdiocese of ऑस्ट्रेलिया and there are large and growing Pentecostal groups, such as Sydney 's Hillsong Church.
The त्यौहार of Easter and Christmas are public holidays in Australia.
Around a quarter of students attend गिरिजाघर स्कूलों और ईसाई organisations are leading non-government providers of health and welfare services through organisations like Catholic Health Australia, Anglicare, UnitingCare Australia, the Salvation Army and St Vincent de Paul Society.
Historically significant Australian Christians have included Rev Dr John Dunmore Lang, Saint Mary MacKillop, Catherine Helen Spence, Pastor David Unaipon, the Reverend John Flynn and Pastor Sir Doug Nicholls.
High profile contemporary Australian Christians include : Tim Costello Baptist minister and current CEO of World Vision Australia, Frank Brennan, Jesuit human rights lawyer, Cardinal George Pell, Catholic Archbishop of Sydney, Phillip Aspinall the current Anglican Primate and Archbishop of Brisbane, Kevin Rudd, पूर्व मजदूर प्रधान मंत्री, और टोनी एबॉट, नेता लिये the संघीय विपक्ष Liberal Party.
Charter बनाना कॉलेजिएट School, which became Yale College, October 9, 1701
Yale University is a निजी आइवी लीग research university located in New Haven, Connecticut.
Founded in 1701 in the Colony of कनेक्टिकट, the विश्वविद्यालयों is the third-oldest institution of higher education in the United States.
originally चार्टर्ड as the `` कॉलेजिएट स्कूल '', the संस्था traces इसके जड़ें to 17th-century clergymen जो sought to स्थापित a कॉलेज to ट्रैन पादरी और राजनैतिक नेताओ लिये the colony.
In 1718, the College was renamed `` Yale College '' to honor a gift from Elihu Yale, a governor of the अंग्रेजों ईस्ट इण्डिया Company.
In 1861, the Graduate School of Arts and Sciences became the first U.S. institution to award the PhD. Yale became a founding member of the Association of American Universities in 1900.
Yale College was transformed, beginning in the 1930s, through the स्थापना of residential colleges : 12 now exist and two more are planned.
Yale employs over 1,100 संकाय to सिखा और सलाह about 5,300 undergraduate and 6,100 graduate and professional students.
Almost all tenured professors teach undergraduate courses, more than 2,000 of which are offered annually.
The University 's assets include an endowment valued at $ 19.4 billion, the second-largest of any अकादमिक संस्था in the world.
Yale 's system of more than two dozen पुस्तकालयों holds 12.5 million volumes.
49 Nobel Laureates have been affiliated with the विश्वविद्यालयों as विद्यार्थी, faculty, and staff.
Yale has produced many notable alumni, including पाँच u.S. राष्ट्रपतियों, 19 u.S. परम् Court Justices, and several foreign heads of state.
At the graduate level, Yale Law School, Yale School of Art, and Yale स्कूल of नाटक हैं consistently क्रमित the top programs in their field.
Yale Law School is the सबसे चयनात्मक law school in the United States.
Yale students compete intercollegiately as the Yale Bulldogs in the NCAA Division I Ivy League.
The oldest intercollegiate एथलेटिक event in the United States is the Yale-Harvard regatta.
Artemisia tridentata ( `` big sagebrush '' or `` sagebrush '' ) is an aromatic shrub इससे the परिवार asteraceae, जिससे grows in arid and semi-arid conditions, throughout a range of cold desert, steppe, and mountain habitats in the Intermountain West of North America.
The vernacular name `` sagebrush '' is also used for अनेक सम्बन्धित सदस्यों of the genus Artemisia, such as California Sagebrush ( Artemisia californica ).
Big Sagebrush and other Artemisia species are the dominant plants across large portions of the Great Basin, covering कुछ 422,000 वर्गाकार मील in 11 western U.S. & Canadian states.
It is the राज्य flower of Nevada.
Sagebrush provides food and habitat for a variety of species, such as sage grouse, pronghorn antelope, धूसर vireo, सानो खरगोश, और खच्चर हिरण.
Big sagebrush was used as an herbal medicine by Native Americans throughout the intermountain वेस्ट of उत्तर america—especially for preventing infection in wounds, stopping internal bleeding, and treating headaches and colds.
Chemically, the active औषधीय constituents शामिल camphor, terpenoids, and tannins.
Several major threats exist to sage brush ecosystems, including human settlements, परिवर्तन to agricultural land, livestock grazing, invasive plant species, wildfires, and climate change.
Yahoo ! Mail is a free email service offered by the American search engine कम्पनी याहू !
It was launched in 1997, and, according to comScore, Yahoo ! Mail is the third-largest web-based email service with 281 million users as of December 2012.
Currently, Yahoo ! offers three संस्करण of Yahoo ! Mail.
The traditional `` याहू ! मेल क्लासिक '' continues the availability of the original interface introduced in 1997.
A version introduced in 2005 शामिल a नई अजाक्स इंटरफ़ेस, drag-and-drop features, improved search functionality, keyboard shortcuts, address auto-complete, tabs, and other updated features.
In October 2010, Yahoo ! released a beta version of याहू ! मेल, जिससे शामिल improvements to the design, performance, search functionality, and Facebook integration.
In May 2011, beta परीक्षण लिये the नई संस्करण रोका, and it became the default interface for Yahoo ! Mail.
In early 2008, Yahoo ! began offering unlimited mail storage to its users in response to heated competition in the free web-mail मार्केट खण्ड.
On June 27, 2009, Yahoo ! मेसेंजर was integrated with Yahoo ! Mail.
Tacoma (, ) is a mid-sized urban port city and the county seat of पियर्स काउंटी, वॉशिंगटन, United States.
The city is on Washington 's Puget Sound, southwest of Seattle, northeast of the state capital, Olympia, and northwest of माउंट rainier नेशनल पार्क.
The population was 198,397, according to the 2010 census.
Tacoma is the second-largest city in the Puget Sound area and the third largest in the state.
Tacoma also serves as the center of business activity for the South Sound region, which has a population of around 1 लाख people.
Tacoma adopted its नाम बाद the nearby Mount Rainier, originally called Mount Tahoma.
It is known as the `` City of Destiny '' because the area was chosen to be the western terminus of the Northern Pacific Railroad in the लेट 19th सदी.
The decision of the railroad was influenced by Tacoma 's neighboring deep-water हार्बर, शुरुआत Bay.
By connecting the bay with the railroad Tacoma 's motto became `` When rails मिलें sails. ''
Today Commencement Bay serves the Port of Tacoma, a center of international trade on the Pacific Coast and Washington state 's largest port.
Like most central cities, Tacoma suffered a prolonged decline in the mid-20th century as a result of suburbanization and divestment.
Since the 1990s, developments in the downtown core include the विश्वविद्यालयों of वॉशिंगटन टकोमा ; टकोमा कड़ी, the first modern electric light rail service in the state ; the state 's highest density of art and history museums ; and a restored urban waterfront, the Thea Foss Waterway.
With a long इतिहास of blue-collar labor politics — from the railroad workers of the 19th century, to the longshoremen of the 20th century, to the Labor Ready workers of today — Tacoma has long been known for its rough, gritty image.
A song about Tacoma, `` Thrice All American '', by अमरीकी singer-songwriter और पूर्व निवासी Neko Case, describes it as `` a dusty old jewel in the South Puget Sound / where the factories churn / and the timber 's all cut down ''.
Tacoma-Pierce काउंटी रै महरूम named one of the most livable areas in the country.
Tacoma was also recently listed as the 19th most walkable नगर in the country.
In कंट्रास्ट, the नगर is also ranked as the most stressed-out city in the country in a 2004 survey.
In 2006, women 's magazine Self नामित टकोमा the `` Most Sexually Healthy City '' in the United States.
In 2012, The Advocate gave Tacoma the title of `` Gayest City in America '', in part because of the large diversity of public offices held, and Washington राज्य गुजर a विधेयक in 2012 allowing LGBT couples to marry.
Tacoma is famous for the 1940 collapse of the Tacoma Narrows Bridge.
Chula Vista ( ; ) is the second largest नगर in the सैन डिएगो महानगर area, the seventh largest city in Southern California, the fourteenth largest city in the State of California, and the 77th-largest city in the United States.
The population was 243,916 as of the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.
स्तिथ बस इससे शहर सैन डिएगो और इससे the मैक्सिकन border in the South Bay region of the metropolitan area, the city is at the center of one of the richest economic and culturally diverse zones in the United States.
Chula Vista is so named because of its दर्शनीय location between the San Diego Bay and coastal mountain foothills.
Founded in the early 19th century, fast population growth has recently been observed in the city.
As the second largest city in San Diego काउंटी, chula विस्टा रै जल्दी become a destination popular to many tourists.
Located in the city is one of America 's few year-round United राज्य ओलम्पिक प्रशिक्षण centers और लोकप्रिय tourist destinations include Cricket Wireless Amphitheater, the Chula Vista marina, and the Chula Vista Nature Center.
Metes and bounds is a प्रणाली or method of describing land, real property ( in contrast to personal property ) or real estate.
The system has been used in England for many centuries, and is still used there in the definition of general सीमाएँ.
By custom, it was applied in the original Thirteen Colonies that became the United States, and in many other land jurisdictions based on English आम law.
Typically the system uses physical features of the local geography, along with directions and distances, to define and describe the सीमाएँ of a parcel of land.
The boundaries are described in a running prose style, working around the parcel in sequence, from a point of शुरूआत, returning वापस to the वही पाइंट ; compare with the oral ritual of beating the bounds.
It may include references to other adjoining parcels ( and their owners ), and it, in turn, could भी be referred to in later surveys.
At the time the description is compiled, it may have महरूम चिह्नित on the ground with permanent monuments placed where there were no suitable natural monuments.
The term `` metes '' refers to a boundary पारिभाषित by the measurement of each straight run, specified by a distance between the terminal points, and an orientation or direction.
A direction may be a सरल कम्पास bearing, or a precise orientation determined by accurate survey methods.
The term `` bounds '' refers to a more general boundary वर्णन, ऐसे as साथ a निश्चित watercourse, a stone wall, an adjoining public road way, or an existing building.
The system is often used to define larger pieces of property ( e.g. farms ), and political subdivisions ( e.g. town सीमाएँ ) जहाँ precise definition is not required or would be far too expensive, or previously designated boundaries can be incorporated into the description.
Sir Isaac Newton ( 25 December 164220 March 1727 ) was an English physicist and mathematician who is widely regarded as one of the most influential scientists of all time and as a key figure in the scientific revolution.
His book Philosophiæ Naturalis Principia Mathematica ( `` Mathematical Principles of Natural Philosophy '' ), first published in 1687, laid the foundations for most of classical mechanics.
Newton also made seminal contributions to optics and shares credit with Gottfried लैबनिट्ज़ लिये the आविष्कार of the infinitesimal calculus.
Newton 's Principia formulated the laws of motion and universal gravitation that dominated scientists ' view of the physical universe for the next three centuries.
It also demonstrated that the motion of objects on the Earth and that of celestial bodies could be described by the same principles.
By deriving Kepler 's laws of planetary motion from his mathematical description of gravity, Newton removed the last doubts about the वैध of the heliocentric मॉडल of the cosmos.
Newton built the first practical reflecting telescope and developed a theory of colour based on the observation that a prism decomposes श्वेत लाइट into the अनेक रंग of the visible spectrum.
He also formulated an empirical law of cooling and पढ़ाई the गति of sound.
In addition to his work on the calculus, as a mathematician Newton contributed to the study of power series, generalised the द्विपद प्रमेय to non-integer exponents, and developed Newton 's method for approximating the roots of a function.
Newton was a fellow of Trinity College and the second Lucasian Professor of Mathematics at the विश्वविद्यालयों of कैम्ब्रिज.
He was a devout but unorthodox Christian and, unusually for a member of the Cambridge faculty, he refused to take holy orders in the Church of England, perhaps because he privately अस्वीकृत the doctrine of trinitarianism.
In addition to his work on the mathematical sciences, Newton also dedicated much of his time to the पढ़ाई of alchemy और biblical chronology, but most of his work in those areas remained unpublished until long after his death.
In his later life, Newton became अध्यक्ष of the Royal Society.
He also served the British government as वार्डन और निपुण of the Royal Mint.
Prof. Walter Lewin explains Newton 's law of gravitation in MIT course 8.01
Satellites and projectiles all obey न्यूटन 's विधि of gravitation
Newton 's law of universal gravitation states that every point mass in the universe attracts प्रत्येक अन्य पाइंट द्रव्यमान साथ a फ़ोर्स कि is सीधे आंशिक to the product of their masses and inversely proportional to the square of the distance between them.
( Separately it was shown that large spherically symmetrical masses आकर्षित और हैं आकर्षित as if all their mass were concentrated at their centers. )
This is a general physical law derived from empirical observations by कया Newton called induction.
It is a part of classical mechanics and was प्रतिपादित in न्यूटन 's कार्य philosophiæ naturalis Principia Mathematica ( `` the Principia '' ), first published on 5 July 1687.
( When Newton 's book was presented in 1686 to the Royal Society, Robert Hooke made a claim that Newton had obtained the inverse square law from him – see History section below. )
In आधुनिक भाषा, the law states the following:
Assuming SI units, F is measured in newtons ( N ), m1 and m2 in kilograms ( kg ), r in meters ( m ), and the constant G is approximately equal to.
The value of the constant G was first accurately determined from the results of the Cavendish प्रयोग conducted by the British scientist Henry Cavendish in 1798, although Cavendish did not himself calculate a numerical value for G.
This experiment was भी the पहला परीक्षण of Newton 's theory of gravitation between masses in the laboratory.
It took place 111 years after the publication of Newton 's Principia and 71 years after Newton 's death, so none of Newton 's calculations could use the value of G ; instead he could only calculate a force relative to another force.
Newton 's law of gravitation resembles Coulomb 's law of electrical forces, which is used to calculate the परिमाण of विद्युत फ़ोर्स between two charged bodies.
दोनो हैं inverse-square कानून, in जिससे फ़ोर्स is inversely आंशिक to the वर्गाकार of the अलहदा between the लाशें.
Coulomb 's Law has the product of two charges in place of the product of the masses, और the electrostatic constant in place of the gravitational constant.
Newton 's law has since been superseded by आइंस्टीन 's theory of general relativity, but it continues to be used as an excellent approximation of the effects of gravity.
आपेक्षिकता is जरूरी तभी when there is a need for extreme precision, or when dealing with gravitation for extremely massive and dense objects.
White और रेड ध्वज, representing इराकी और अमरीकी deaths, sit in the grass quadrangle of The Valley Library on the Corvallis, Oregon, campus of Oregon State University.
As part of the traveling Iraq Body Count प्रदर्शनी इससे 2008 to 2009 ( not related to Iraq Body Count project ), the flags aim to `` raise awareness of the human cost of the Iraq War. ''
( May 2008 )
Casualties of the conflict in Iraq since 2003 ( beginning साथ the 2003 आक्रमण of इराकी, और continuing with the ensuing occupation of Iraq, as well as the activities of the various armed groups operating in the country ) have come in many forms, and the accuracy of the information available on different types of Iraq War casualties varies greatly.
The table below summarizes various estimates of the Iraqi casualty figures.
For troops in the u.s.-led बहुराष्ट्रीय गठबन्धन, the death toll is carefully tracked and updated daily, and the names and photographs of those killed in action as well as in accidents have been published widely.
A total of 4,486 u.S. सैनिको यहूद मारे in Iraq between 2003 and 2012.
Regarding the Iraqis, however, information on both military and civilian casualties is both less precise and less consistent.
Estimates of casualty levels are available from reporters on the झाँकी, इससे officials of शामिल संगठन, and from groups that summarize information on incidents reported in the news media.
The word `` casualties `` in its most general sense includes the injured as well as the dead.
Accounts of the number of coalition wounded vary widely, partly because it is नहीं स्पष्ट कया चाहिए be गिने : चाहिए only those injuries serious enough to put a soldier out of commission be included ?
Do illnesses or injuries caused by accidents गिनती, or चाहिए the focus be restricted to wounds caused by hostile engagement ?
Sources using different definitions may arrive at बहुत different numbers, and sometimes the precise definition is not clearly specified.

A highwayman थी a चोर and brigand who preyed on travellers.
This type of outlaw usually travelled and robbed by घोड़ा, as compared to a footpad who travelled and robbed on foot.
Mounted robbers were widely considered to be socially श्रेष्ठ to footpads.
Such robbers operated in Great Britain and Ireland इससे the elizabethan era until the early 19th century.
The word highwayman is पहला ज्ञात to be प्रयुक्त in the year 1617 ; other euphemisms included `` knights of the road '' and `` gentlemen of the road. ''
दो terms applied to 19th-century North American highwaymen were road agents in some instances for mountain bandits while in other cases the term is Rlallaala for mountain-based ruffians.
in the वही time period in Australia, they were known as bushrangers.
Earvin `` Magic '' Johnson, Jr. ( born August 14, 1959 ) is a retired American professional basketball player who played point guard for the Los Angeles Lakers of the National Basketball संघ ( NBA ).
After winning championships in high school and college, Johnson was चयनित पहला overall in the 1979 NBA Draft by the Lakers.
He won a championship and an NBA Finals Most Valuable Player Award in his रुकी ऋतु, और जीती चार more championships with the Lakers during the 1980s.
Johnson retired abruptly in 1991 after announcing that he had contracted HIV, but returned to play in the 1992 All-Star Game, winning the All-Star MVP Award.
After protests from his fellow players, he retired again for four years, but returned in 1996, at age 36, to play 32 games for the Lakers पहले retiring लिये the third and final time.
Johnson 's career achievements include three NBA MVP Awards, nine NBA Finals दिखावे, बारह all-star खेल, and ten All-NBA First and Second Team nominations.
He led the league in regular-season assists चार times, and is the NBA 's all-time leader in average assists per game, at 11.2.
Johnson was a member of the `` Dream Team ``, the U.S. बास्केट team that won the Olympic gold medal in 1992.
After leaving the NBA in 1992, Johnson formed the Magic Johnson All-Stars, a barnstorming team that travelled around the world playing exhibition games.
Johnson was honored as one of the 50 महानतम खिलाड़ी in एनबीए इतिहास in 1996, और enshrined in the Basketball Hall of Fame in 2002.
He was rated the महानतम NBA point guard of all time by ESPN in 2007.
His friendship and rivalry with Boston Celtics star Larry Bird, whom he faced in the 1979 NCAA finals and three NBA championship series, were well documented.
Since his retirement, Johnson has been an advocate for HIV/ AIDS prevention and safe sex, as well as an entrepreneur, philanthropist, broadcaster and motivational speaker.
Johnson was a part-owner of the Lakers for अनेक सालो, और was part of a group that purchased the Los Angeles Dodgers in 2012.
Allium cells in different phases of the कोशिका साईकिल
The cells of eukaryotes ( left ) and prokaryotes ( सही )
The cell is the basic structural, कार्यात्मक और biological unit of all known living organisms.
It is the smallest unit of life that is classified as a living thing ( except virus, which consists only from dna/rna covered by प्रोटीन और lipids ), and is often called the building block of life.
It consists of a protoplasm enclosed within a membrane, which contains many biomolecules such as proteins and nucleic acids.
Organisms can be classified as एककोशिकीय ( consisting of a single cell ; including most bacteria ) or multicellular ( including plants and animals ).
While the number of cells in plants and animals varies from species to species, Humans contain about 100 trillion ( 1014 ) cells.
Most plant and animal cells are between 1 and 100 micrometres and therefore are visible only under the microscope.
The cell was खोजा by Robert Hooke in 1665.
The cell theory, first developed in 1839 by Matthias Jakob Schleiden and Theodor Schwann, states that all organisms are composed of one or more cells, that all cells come from preexisting cells, that vital functions of an organism occur within cells, और कि सब कोशिकाएं contain the खानदानी सूचना जरुरी लिये regulating कोशिका कृत्यों और लिये transmitting information to the next generation of cells.
कोशिकाएं उभरा on ग्रह Earth at least 4.0–4.3 billion years ago.
The word cell comes from the Latin cella, अर्थ `` छोटी रूम ''.
The descriptive term for the smallest living biological structure थी coined by रॉबर्ट hooke in a book he published in 1665 when he compared the cork cells he saw through his microscope to the small rooms monks lived in.
grecian सूत्र is a men 's hair coloring product in the United States.
Canada and Europe previously बैन the उत्पाद क्युकी of its use of lead acetate.
A motor scooter 's front with an अव्यवहारिक number and variety of headlamps, added for decorative purposes
A headlamp is a lamp attached to the front of a vehicle to लाइट the road ahead.
Headlamp performance has steadily improved throughout the automobile age, spurred by the great disparity between daytime and nighttime traffic fatalities : the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration states that nearly half of all traffic-related fatalities occur in the dark, despite only 25 % of traffic travelling during darkness.
While it is common for the term headlight to be used interchangeably in informal discussion, headlamp is the term for the यंत्र itself, जबकि हेडलाइट properly refers to the beam of light produced and distributed by the device.
Other vehicles, such as trains and वायुयान, are required to have headlamps.
Bicycle headlamps are often used on bicycles, and are required in some jurisdictions.
They can be powered by a battery or a छोटी electrical generator on the wheel.
Additionally ऑटोमोटिव रात्रि vision systems work to supplement headlamps.
Women 's rights are the rights and entitlements claimed for women and girls of many societies विश्वव्यापी.
In some places these rights are institutionalized or supported by law, local custom, and behaviour, whereas in अन्य वे may be ignored or suppressed.
They differ from broader धारणाएं of इंसान अधिकारों through दावा of an अंतर्निहित historical and traditional bias against the exercise of rights by women and girls in favour of men and boys.
Issues commonly संबद्ध साथ धारणाएं of women 's rights include, though are not limited to, the right : to bodily integrity and autonomy ; to vote ( suffrage ) ; to hold public office ; to work ; to fair wages or equal pay ; to own property ; to education ; to serve in the military or be conscripted ; to enter into legal contracts ; and to have marital, parental and religious rights.
Caryn Elaine Johnson, best known as Whoopi Goldberg (, ( born November 13, 1955 ) is an American comedienne, अभिनेत्री, singer-songwriter, political activist, author and talk show host.
Goldberg made her film debut in The रंग जामुनी ( 1985 ), playing Celie, a mistreated black woman in the Deep South.
She received a nomination for the Academy Award for Best Actress and won her first Golden ग्लोब पुरस्कार for her role in the film.
In 1990, she played Oda Mae Brown, a wacky psychic helping a slain man ( Patrick Swayze ) save his lover ( Demi Moore ) in the blockbuster Ghost.
This performance won her a second Golden Globe and an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress ; this made गोल्डबर्ग तभी the दूसरी ब्लैक स्त्री in the history of the Academy Awards to win an acting Oscar—the first being Hattie McDaniel who won for Gone With the Wind in 1939.
Notable later films include Sister Act and Sister Act 2, The Player, Made in America, How Stella Got Her Groove Back, Girl, बाधित और चूहा Race.
She is also acclaimed for her roles as the bartender Guinan in Star Trek : The Next Generation, as Terry Doolittle in Jumpin ' Jack Flash, and as Carmen Tibideaux in Glee, as well as the voice of Shenzi the hyena in The Lion King.
Goldberg has been nominated for 13 Emmy Awards for her कार्य in टेलीविज़न.
She was co-producer of the popular game show हॉलीवुड वर्गों इससे 1998 to 2004.
She has been the मॉडरेटर of the daytime talk show The View since 2007.
गोल्डबर्ग रै a ग्रैमी, दो दिन Emmys, two Golden Globes, a Tony ( for production, not acting ), and an Oscar.
In addition, Goldberg has a British Academy Film Award, four People 's Choice Awards, and has been honored with a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame.
She is one of the few entertainers who have won an Emmy, Grammy, Oscar, और टोनी पुरस्कार.
The National Hockey League ( NHL ; ) is an `` unincorporated not-for-profit संघ '' जिससे operates a major professional ice hockey league of 30 franchised member clubs, of which seven are currently located in Canada and 23 in the United States.
headquartered in नई यॉर्क नगर, the NHL is widely considered to be the premier professional ice hockey league in the world, and one of the major professional sports leagues in the United States and Canada.
The Stanley Cup, the oldest professional sports ट्रॉफी in उत्तर अमेरिका, is awarded annually to the league playoff champion at the end of each season.
The league was organized on नवम्बर 26, 1917, in मॉन्ट्रियल, क्यूबेक, कनाडा, बाद the बर्खास्तगी of operations of its predecessor organization, the National Hockey Association ( NHA ), which had been founded in 1909.
It started with four teams and, through a series of expansions, contractions, and relocations, the league is now composed of 30 active franchises.
The स्वदेश to जिससे the नाम of the लीग originally referred was Canada, although the league has now been binational since 1924 when it expanded into the United States.
After a labour dispute that led to the रद्दीकरण of the संपूर्ण 2004–05 season, the league resumed play under a new collective bargaining agreement that included a salary cap.
In 2009, the NHL enjoyed रिकार्ड highs in terms of sponsorships, attendance, and television audiences.
The NHL draws many highly skilled players from all over the world and currently has players from about 20 different countries.
Although canadians have historically गठित the बहुमत of the players in the NHL, over the past four plus decades the percentages of US and European players have increased both because of the NHL 's continued expansion from six to thirty clubs since 1967, and the increased availability of highly skilled European players.
Maggots feeding on carrion.
A maggot is the larva of a fly ( order Diptera ) ; it is applied in particular to the larvae of Brachyceran flies, such as houseflies, cheese flies, and blowflies, rather than larvae of the Nematocera, such as mosquitoes and क्रेन उड़ता.
`` Maggot '' is not a technical term and should not be taken as such ; in many standard textbooks of entomology it does not appear in the अनुक्रमणिका at all.
In many non-technical texts the term is प्रयुक्त लिये कीट लार्वे in general.
Other sources have coined their own definitions ; for उदाहरण : ``...
The term applies to a grub when all ट्रेस of limbs has disappeared... '' and ``... Applied to the footless larvae of Dipters. ''
Maggot-like fly larvae हैं of चौड़ी महत्व in पारिस्थितिकी और आयुर्विज्ञान ; among other roles, various species are prominent in recycling carrion and garbage, attacking crops and foodstuffs, spreading microbial infections, and causing myiasis.
Herod (, Hordos, Greek :, Hērōdēs ), also known as Herod the Great ( 73/74 BCE – 4 BCE in Jericho ), was a Roman क्लाएंट king of Judea.
His epithet of `` the Great '' is widely disputed as he is वर्णित as `` a madman who murdered his own family and a great many rabbis ``.
He is also known for his colossal building प्रोजेक्ट in जेरूसलम और elsewhere, सहित उसके विस्तार of the Second Temple in Jerusalem ( sometimes referred to as Herod 's Temple ) and the construction of the port at Caesarea Maritima.
Important details of उसके जीवनी are gleaned from the works of the 1st century CE Roman–Jewish historian Josephus Flavius.
the romans बना हेरोदेस 's बेटे, हेरोदेस Archelaus, ethnarch of Judea, Samaria, and Idumea ( biblical Edom ) from 4 BCE to 6 CE, referred to as the tetrarchy of Judea.
Archelaus was judged incompetent by the Roman emperor Augustus who then combined Samaria, Judea proper and Idumea into Iudaea province under rule of a prefect until age 41.
Herod 's other son Herod Antipas was tetrarch of galilee इससे 4 bce–39 CE.
ABO blood group antigens उपस्थित on रेड रक्त कोशिकाएं और IgM antibodies present in the serum
The ABO blood group system is the most important blood type system ( or blood group system ) in human blood transfusion.
the संबद्ध anti-a और anti-b antibodies हैं usually IgM antibodies, which are usually produced in the first years of life by sensitization to environmental substances such as food, bacteria, and viruses.
ABO blood types are also present in some other animals, for example apes such as chimpanzees, bonobos, and gorillas.
Year 1907 ( MCMVII ) was a common year starting on Tuesday ( कड़ी होगा प्रदर्शक the full calendar ) of the Gregorian calendar and a common year starting on Monday of the 13-day-slower Julian calendar.
Northville is an affluent city located in and divided by Oakland and Wayne counties in the U.S. state of Michigan.
The area is a suburb of महानगर Detroit.
The जनसांख्यिकी थी 5,970 at the 2010 census.
Most of the city is in ओकलैंड काउंटी, and is surrounded by the city of Novi.
The Wayne County portion is घिरी by Northville Township.
Northville is served by Northville Public Schools.
The city is located northeast of Ann Arbor and उत्तरपश्चिम of डेट्रॉयट.
Elaine Stritch ( born February 2, 1925 ) is an अमरीकी अभिनेत्री और vocalist.
She has appeared in numerous स्टेज plays and musicals, feature films, and many television programs.
She is known for उसके प्रदर्शन of `` The Ladies Who Lunch '' in Stephen Sondheim 's 1970 musical Company, her 2001 one-woman show, Elaine Stritch at Liberty, and recently for her role as Jack Donaghy 's mother Colleen on NBC 's 30 Rock.
वो रै महरूम मनोनीत लिये the टोनी पुरस्कार पाँच टाइम्स in विभिन्न श्रेणी.
Stritch is also a three-time एमी पुरस्कार winner.
Misfits is a British science fiction comedy-drama television show about a group of young अपराधियों sentenced to work in a community service programme, where they obtain supernatural powers after a strange electrical storm.
the series opened in 2009 and is currently ongoing.
Antonia Thomas, Iwan Rheon, लॉरेन socha, नाथन stewart-jarrett, और Robert Sheehan are introduced as Alisha Daniels, Simon Bellamy, Kelly Bailey, Curtis Donovan, and Nathan Young respectively.
Sheehan left after the दूसरी श्रेणी, replaced in the third by Joseph Gilgun as Rudy Wade.
After the fourth series was announced rheon, थामस और socha था बाएँ उनके भूमिकाएँ and would be replaced by new characters Karla Crome, Nathan McMullen and Matt Stokoe, as Jess, Finn and Alex respectively.
Midway through the fourth श्रेणी, stewart-jarrett left while Natasha O'Keeffe joined the cast as Abbey Smith.
On 19 March 2013, Channel 4 announced at a press event that they have renewed Misfits for a fifth and final श्रेणी containing 8 episodes.
Brett Lorenzo Favre ( born October 10, 1969 ) is a former American फ़ुटबॉल quarterback who spent the majority of his career with the Green Bay Packers of the National Football League ( NFL ).
He was a 20-year veteran of the NFL, having निभाई क्वार्टरबैक लिये the अटलांटा Falcons ( 1991 ), Green Bay Packers ( 1992 – 2007 ), New York Jets ( 2008 ) and Minnesota Vikings ( 2009 – 2010 ).
Favre is the only quarterback in NFL इतिहास to throw लिये over 70,000 गज, over 500 touchdowns, over 300 interceptions, over 6,000 completions, and over 10,000 pass attempts.
Favre started at the quarterback position for the University of Southern Mississippi for four years before being selected in the second round of the 1991 NFL Draft by Atlanta ( 33rd overall ).
He was traded to Green Bay on February 10, 1992, लिये the 19th pick in the 1992 NFL Draft.
Favre became the Packers ' starting quarterback in the fourth game of the 1992 season, stepping in for injured quarterback Don Majkowski, and started every खेल through the 2007 season.
He was traded to the New York Jets and started at quarterback for the 2008 season before signing with the Vikings on अगस्त 18, 2009 as their starting quarterback.
He made an NFL record 297 consecutive starts ( 321 सहित playoffs ).
He is the only खिलाड़ी to जीत the AP Most Valuable Player three consecutive times ( 1995–97 ).
He has led teams to eight division championships ( 1995, 1996, 1997, 2002, 2003, 2004, 2007, 2009 ), five NFC Championship Games ( 1995, 1996, 1997, 2007, 2009 ), और two Super Bowl appearances ( Super Bowl XXXI, Super Bowl XXXII ), winning one ( Super Bowl XXXI ).
He holds many NFL records, including most career touchdown passes, most career passing yards, most career pass completions, most career pass attempts, most career interceptions thrown, most consecutive starts by a player, most consecutive starts by a क्वार्टरबैक, सबसे करियर victories as a starting quarterback, most sacked, and most fumbles.
He is also referred to by उसके उपनाम `` The Gunslinger ''.

The World Wide Web ( abbreviated as WWW or W3, commonly ज्ञात as the वेब ), is a प्रणाली of interlinked hypertext documents accessed via the Internet.
With a web browser, एक can दृश्य वेब पृष्ठों कि may contain text, images, videos, and other multimedia, and navigate between them via hyperlinks.
Using concepts from his earlier hypertext systems like ENQUIRE, British engineer, computer scientist and at that time employee of the CERN, सर टिम berners-lee, अभी निदेशक of the World Wide Web Consortium ( W3C ), wrote a proposal in March 1989 for what would eventually become the World Wide Web.
At CERN, a European research organisation near Geneva straddling the border between France and Switzerland, Berners-Lee and Belgian computer scientist Robert Cailliau proposed in 1990 to use hypertext `` to link and access information of various kinds as a web of nodes in which the user can browse at will '', and वे सरेआम introduced the project in December of the same year.
Wayne Lyman Morse ( October 20, 1900July 22, 1974 ) was a politician and attorney from Oregon, United States, known for his proclivity for opposing his parties ' leadership, and specifically लिये उसके विपक्ष to the Vietnam War on constitutional grounds.
Born in Madison, Wisconsin, and educated at the University of Wisconsin-Madison and the University of Minnesota Law School, Morse moved to Oregon in 1930 and began teaching at the University of Oregon School of Law.
During World War II he was elected to the United States Senate as a Republican ; he became an स्वतंत्र बाद ड्वाइट D. Eisenhower 's election to the presidency in 1952.
While an independent, he set a record for performing the दूसरी longest one-person filibuster in the history of the Senate.
Morse joined the Democratic Party in 1955, और was reelected twice while a member of that party.
Morse made a ब्रैड run for the Democratic Party 's presidential nomination in 1960.
A few years later, Morse was one of only two Senators who opposed the Gulf of Tonkin Resolution, which authorized the president to take military action in Vietnam without a declaration of war.
He continued to speak out against the war in the ensuing years, and lost his 1968 bid for reelection to Bob Packwood, जो criticized उसके दमदार विपक्ष to the war.
Morse made two more bids for reelection to the सीनेट before his death in 1974.
In parliamentary procedure, a गति to तालिका रै two different and contradictory meanings:
In the United States, to table usually means the to lay [ the टॉपिक ] on the table or to move for postponement of consideration ; a proposal to suspend consideration of a pending motion.
Much less often, it अर्थात् a गति to `` put on the तालिका '' : a proposal to begin consideration ( or reconsideration ), a usage consistent with the rest of the English-speaking world.
In the rest of the English-speaking world such as the United Kingdom, to table means to move to place [ the topic ] upon the तालिका ( or to मूव to प्लेस on the तालिका ) : a proposal to begin consideration ( or reconsideration ) of a proposal.
Both the American and the British dialects have the sense of `` to table '' as to lay [ the topic ] on the table or to cause [ the topic ] to झूठ on the तालिका.
The difference is the idea of कया the table is for, that of a shelf off to the side, or an active work bench.
The British meaning has the sense of the table as being an active work bench, with the topic being the बीच of ध्यान, माना और discussed by all until it can be resolved, at which point it is taken off the 'table '.
The American sense is that the table is like that of a shelf, archive, or long-term भंडार यंत्र, जहाँ the topic has been disposed of by sending it to the 'table ' and leaving it there.
खिलौना स्टोरी 3 is a 2010 अमरीकी 3d कंप्यूटर एनिमेटेड comedy-drama थाना फिल्मी, और the तीसरा किश्त in the खिलौना स्टोरी श्रेणी.
It was produced by Pixar Animation Studios and distributed by Walt डिज़्नी तस्वीरें.
Directed by Lee Unkrich, the film was released विश्वव्यापी इससे June through October in Disney Digital 3-D, RealD, and IMAX 3D.
Toy Story 3 was also the first film to be released theatrically with Dolby Surround 7.1 sound.
The screenplay was written by Michael Arndt, while Unkrich लिखा the स्टोरी साथ साथ John Lasseter and Andrew Stanton, respectively director and co-writer of the two first films.
The plot focuses on the toys वुडी, बज़ lightyear, और उनके मित्रों dealing with an uncertain future as their owner, Andy, prepares to leave for college.
Actors Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Joan Cusack, Don rickles, estelle हैरिस, जॉन ratzenberger, Wallace Shawn, Jeff Pidgeon, Jodi Benson, R. Lee Ermey, John Morris, and Laurie Metcalf reprised their voice-over roles from the previous films.
Jim Varney, who played Slinky Dog in the first two films, and Joe Ranft, who portrayed Lenny and Wheezy, both died before production began on खिलौना स्टोरी 3.
The role of Slinky Dog was taken over by ब्लेक क्लार्क ( a friend of Varney ), while Ranft 's characters and various others were written out of the story.
New characters include performances by ned beatty, टिमोथी डाल्टन, क्रिस्टन schaal, bonnie हंट, whoopi गोल्डबर्ग, Jeff Garlin, Richard Kind, and Michael Keaton.
The feature broke Shrek the Thirds record as the biggest opening day North American gross for an animated film unadjusted for inflation, and a big opening with an unadjusted gross of $ 110,307,189.
It is also the highest-grossing opening weekend for a Pixar film, as well as the highest-grossing opening वीकेंड लिये a फिल्मी to have opened in the month of June.
This is the highest-grossing film of 2010, both in the United States और कनाडा, and worldwide.
In early August, it became Pixar 's highest-grossing film at the North American box office ( surpassing Finding nemo ), और the highest-grossing एनिमेटेड फिल्मी of सब समय विश्वव्यापी ( surpassing shrek 2 ) ; बाद कि माह, खिलौना Story 3 became the first ever animated film in history to make over $ 1 billion worldwide.
It is currently the 10th-highest-grossing film of all time.
Toy Story 3 was nominated for five Academy Awards, सहित बेहतरीन चित्र, Best Adapted Screenplay, and Best Sound Editing.
It was the third animated film ( after Beauty और the जानवर और up ) to be nominated for Academy Award for Best Picture.
It won the awards for बेहतरीन Animated Feature and Best Original Song.
John Levell Starks ( born August 10, 1965 ) is an American retired पेशेवर बास्केट shooting guard.
Starks was listed at 6'5 '' and 190 पाउंड दौरान उसके एनबीए playing career.
Although he was not drafted in the 1988 NBA Draft after attending four colleges in his native Oklahoma, including Oklahoma State University, he gained कीर्ति जबकि playing लिये the New York Knicks of the National Basketball Association in the 1990s.
Secure Digital or ( SD ) is a non-volatile मेमोरी card format for use in portable devices, such as mobile phones, digital cameras, GPS navigation devices, and tablet computers.
The Secure डिजिटल standard is maintained by the SD Card Association ( SDA ).
sd technologies have been implemented in more than 400 brands across dozens of product categories and more than 8,000 models.
The Secure Digital स्वरूप शामिल चार card families available in three different form factors.
The चार परिवारों हैं the असली standard-capacity ( sdsc ), the High-Capacity ( SDHC ), the eXtended-Capacity ( SDXC ), and the SDIO, which combines input/output functions with data storage.
The three form factors are the असली आकार, the `` mini '' size, and the `` micro '' size ( see illustration ).
There are many combinations of रूप कारकों and device families.
Electrically passive adapters allow the use of a smaller card in a host device built to hold a larger card.
Host devices that comply with newer versions of the specification provide backward compatibility and accept older SD cards, but this आलेख explains अनेक factors that can prevent the use of a newer SD card:
A newer card may offer greater capacity than the मेजबान device can handle.
A newer card may use a file system the host device can not navigate.
Use of an SDIO card requires the host device be designed for the input/output functions the card provides.
The organization of the कार्ड थी changed starting with the SDHC family.
Some vendors produced SDSC cards above 1 GB before the SDA had मानकीकृत a विधि of doing so.
The SDA uses several trademarked logos to enforce अनुपालन साथ इसके विशेषताएँ and assure users of compatibility.
ह्यूज John Mungo Grant ( born 9 September 1960 ) is a British actor and film producer.
He has received a सुनहरी Globe, a BAFTA, and an Honorary César.
His films have अर्जित more than US $ 2.4 billion from 25 theatrical releases worldwide.
Grant achieved international stardom after appearing in Richard Curtis 's successful Four Weddings and a Funeral ( 1994 ).
He used this breakthrough role as a frequent cinematic persona during the 1990s, delivering कॉमिक प्रदर्शन in मुख्यधारा films like Mickey Blue Eyes ( 1999 ) and Notting Hill ( 1999 ).
By the turn of the 21st century, he had established himself as a leading man skilled with a satirical comic talent.
Grant has expanded his oeuvre with critically acclaimed turns as a cad in Bridget Jones 's Diary ( 2001 ), परिचय a लड़के ( 2002 ), प्रेम दरअसल ( 2003 ), and American Dreamz ( 2006 ).
He later played against type with अनेक कैमियो भूमिकाएँ in the epic drama film Cloud Atlas ( 2012 ).
Within the film industry, Grant is cited as an anti-film star who approaches his roles like a character actor, and कोशिशें to मेक उसके एक्टिंग appear spontaneous.
Hallmarks of his comic skills include a nonchalant touch of irony / sarcasm and studied physical mannerisms as well as his precisely-timed संवाद डिलीवरी और फेशियल expressions.
The entertainment media 's coverage of ग्रान्ट 's जीवन बंद the बिग screen has often overshadowed his work as a thespian.
He has been vocal about his disrespect for the profession of acting, and in his disdain towards the culture of celebrity and hostility towards the media.
In a career spanning 30 years, ग्रान्ट रै repeatedly claimed that acting is not a true calling but just a job he fell into.
The Han Dynasty ( ; ) ( 206 bc – 220 AD ) was an imperial dynasty of China, preceded by the Qin Dynasty ( 221–207 BC ) and succeeded by the Three Kingdoms ( 220–280 AD ).
It was founded by the विद्रोही leader Liu Bang, known posthumously as Emperor Gaozu of Han.
It was briefly interrupted by the Xin Dynasty ( 9–23 AD ) of the पूर्व रीजेंट Wang Mang.
This interregnum separates the Han into दो अवधि : the Western Han ( 206 BC – 9 AD ) and Eastern Han ( 25–220 AD ).
Spanning over four centuries, the period of the हान राजवंश is माना a golden age in Chinese history.
To this day, China 's majority ethnic group refers to itself as the `` हान लोगों '' and the Chinese script is referred to as `` Han characters ``.
The Han Empire was divided into areas सीधे नियंत्रित by the central government, known as commanderies, and a number of semi-autonomous kingdoms.
These kingdoms gradually खोया सब vestiges of their independence, particularly following the Rebellion of the Seven States.
The Xiongnu, a nomadic कनफेडरेशन जिससे dominated the eastern Eurasian Steppe, defeated the Han army in battle in 200 BC.
Following the defeat, a political marriage alliance was negotiated in which the Han became the de facto अवर संगी.
When, despite the सन्धि, the Xiongnu continued to raid Han borders, Emperor Wu of Han ( r. 141–87 BC ) launched several military campaigns against them.
The परम हान विजय in ये wars eventually forced the Xiongnu to accept vassal status as Han tributaries.
These campaigns expanded Han प्रभुता into the tarim Basin of Central Asia and helped establish the vast trade network known as the Silk Road, which reached as far as the Mediterranean world.
Han forces managed to divide the Xiongnu into दो स्पर्धा राष्ट्र, the Southern and Northern Xiongnu, and forced the Northern Xiongnu across the Ili River.
Despite these victories, the territories north of हान 's सीमायें यहूद quickly overrun by the nomadic Xianbei Confederation.
After 92 AD, the palace eunuchs increasingly involved themselves in court politics, engaging in violent power struggles between the various consort clans of the empresses and empress dowagers, causing the हान 's परम downfall.
Imperial authority was also seriously challenged by large Daoist धार्मिक समाजों which instigated the Yellow Turban Rebellion and the Five Pecks of Rice Rebellion.
Following the death of Emperor Ling ( r. 168–189 AD ), the palace eunuchs suffered होलसेल नरसंहार by military officers, allowing members of the aristocracy and military governors to become warlords and divide the empire.
When Cao Pi, King of Wei, usurped the throne from Emperor Xian, the Han राजवंश ceased to exist.
The Han Dynasty was an age of economic prosperity and saw a significant growth of the money economy first established during the Zhou Dynasty ( c. 1050–256 BC ).
The coinage issued by the central government mint in 119 bc remained the मानक coinage of China until the Tang Dynasty ( 618–907 AD ).
To pay for its military campaigns and the settlement of newly conquered frontier territories, the सरकारी nationalized the private salt and iron industries in 117 BC.
These government monopolies were repealed दौरान the पूर्वी Han period, and the lost revenue was recouped through heavily taxing private entrepreneurs.
The emperor was at the pinnacle of Han समाज.
He presided over the Han government but shared power with both the nobility and appointed ministers who came largely इससे the scholarly gentry class.
From the शासनकाल of Emperor Wu onward, the Chinese court officially sponsored Confucianism in education and court politics, synthesized with the cosmology of later scholars such as Dong Zhongshu.
This नीति endured until the fall of the Qing Dynasty in 1911 AD.
Science और प्रौद्योगिकी दौरान the हान काल देखी significant अग्रिम, सहित papermaking, the nautical परिचालन अरित्र, the उपयोग of ऋणात्मक संख्याएँ in गणित, the raised-relief मैप, the हाइड्रोलिक -powered armillary गोला लिये खगोलशास्त्र, और a भूकम्पमापी employing an उलट लोलक.
Tourette सिंड्रोम ( also called Tourette 's syndrome, Tourette 's disorder, Gilles de la Tourette syndrome, GTS or, more commonly, simply Tourette 's or TS ) is an inherited neuropsychiatric disorder with onset in childhood, characterized by multiple physical ( motor ) tics and at least one vocal ( phonic ) tic.
These tics characteristically wax and wane, can be suppressed temporarily, and are preceded by a premonitory urge.
Tourette 's is defined as part of a spectrum of tic विकार, जिससे शामिल transient and chronic tics.
Tourette 's थी एकबार माना a विरल और विचित्र सिंड्रोम, most often associated with the exclamation of obscene words or socially inappropriate and derogatory remarks ( coprolalia ), but this symptom is present in only a small minority of people with Tourette 's.
Tourette 's is no longer considered a rare condition, but it is not always correctly identified because most cases are mild and the severity of tics decreases for most children as they pass through adolescence.
Between 0.4 % and 3.8 % of children ages 5 to 18 may have Tourette 's ; the prevalence of transient and chronic tics in school-age children is उच्चतर, with the more common tics of eye blinking, coughing, throat clearing, sniffing, and facial movements.
Extreme Tourette 's in adulthood is a rarity, और tourette 's does not adversely affect intelligence or life expectancy.
Genetic and environmental factors play a role in the etiology of Tourette 's, but the exact causes are unknown.
In most मामले, medication is unnecessary.
There is no effective treatment for every case of tics, but certain medications and therapies can help when their use is warranted.
Education is an महत्वपूर्ण भाग of कोई उपचार योजना, and explanation and reassurance alone are often sufficient treatment.
comorbid conditions ( co-occurring diagnoses other than Tourette 's ) such as attention-deficit hyperactivity disorder ( ADHD ) and obsessive–compulsive disorder ( OCD ) are present in many patients seen in tertiary specialty clinics.
These other conditions often cause more functional impairment to the individual than the tics that are the hallmark of Tourette 's, hence it is महत्वपूर्ण to correctly पहचानो comorbid conditions and treat them.
The eponym was bestowed by Jean-Martin Charcot ( 1825–1893 ) on behalf of उसके निवासी, जॉर्जेस Albert Édouard Brutus Gilles de la Tourette ( 1859–1904 ), a French physician and neurologist, who published an account of nine patients with Tourette 's in 1885.
सनबीम badge.
Sunbeam was a marque registered by John Marston Co. Ltd of Wolverhampton, इंग्लैण्ड, in 1888.
The company first made bicycles, then motorcycles and cars from the late 19th century until about 1936, and applied the marque to all तीन फ़ॉर्म of परिवहन.
The company also manufactured aero इंजन in the First World War and 647 aircraft during the Second World War.
A Sunbeam was the first British car to win a ग्रैंड प्रिक्स रेस, और set a number of land speed records.
The company went into receivership in 1935 and was purchased by the Rootes Group, which continued to use the Sunbeam marque.
Fox News Channel ( FNC ), also known as Fox News, is a cable news channel owned by the Fox Entertainment Group, a subsidiary of न्यूज निगम.
As of April 2009, the channel was available to 102 million households in the United राज्य और to दर्शक internationally, broadcasting primarily from its New York studios.
The चैनल थी निर्मित by Australian-American media mogul Rupert Murdoch, who hired former NBC executive Roger Ailes as its founding CEO.
It launched on October 7, 1996 to 17 लाख केबल subscribers.
It grew during the लेट 1990s और 2000s to become the dominant cable news network in the United States.
Critics have stated that Fox News चैनल promotes रूढ़िवादी political positions and biased reporting.
Commentators, news anchors, and reporters at Fox News Channel have responded कि न्यूज रिपोर्टिंग और राजनैतिक commentary operate independently of each other, and have denied any bias in news reporting.
The mandibular first molar or six-year molar is the दाँत स्तिथ distally ( दूर from the midline of the face ) from both the mandibular second premolars of the mouth but mesial ( toward the midline of the face ) from both mandibular second molars.
It is located on the mandibular ( lower ) arch of the mouth, and generally opposes the maxillary ( upper ) first molars and the ऊर्ध्वहनु 2nd premolar in normal class I occlusion.
The function of this molar is similar to that of all molars in लिहाज़ to पीस होने the principal action during mastication, commonly known as chewing.
There are usually five well-developed cusps on mandibular पहला molars : two on the buccal ( side nearest the cheek ), two lingual ( side nearest the tongue ), and one distal.
There are great differences between the पतझड़ी ( baby ) mandibular molars and those of the permanent mandibular molars, even though their function are similar.
The permanent mandibular molars are नहीं माना to have any teeth that precede it.
Despite being named molars, the deciduous molars are followed by permanent premolars.
In the universal system of notation, the deciduous mandibular first molars are designated by a letter लिखा in uppercase.
The right deciduous mandibular first molar is known as `` S '', and the left one is known as `` L ''.
The international संकेतन रै a different system of notation.
Thus, the right deciduous mandibular first molar is known as `` 84 '', and the left one is known as `` 74 ''.
In the universal system of notation, the permanent mandibular पहला molars हैं designated by a number.
The right permanent mandibular first molar is known as `` 30 '', and the left one is ज्ञात as `` 19 ''.
The Palmer notation uses a number in conjunction with a symbol designating in जिससे quadrant the tooth is found.
For this tooth, the left and right first molars would have the वही क्रमांक, `` 6 '', लकिन the right one would have the symbol, `` ┐ '', over it, while the left one would have, `` ┌ ''.
The international notation has a different numbering system than the previous two, and the right permanent mandibular first molar is known as `` 46 '', and the left one is known as `` 36 ''.
Mandibular primary first molars usually have four pulp horns.
the पहला molar is usually the first permanent tooth to erupt and has adult undertones.
Anatomy : The mandibular first molar has five cusps : the mesiobuccal ( MB, toward midline and cheek ), mesiolingual ( ML, toward midline और जीभ ), distolingual ( dl, दूर इससे midline और towards tongue ), distobuccal ( DB, away from midline and toward cheek ), and distal ( D, away from midline ), listed in order of decreasing size.
Listed in अनुक्रम of अवरोहण height they are : ML, DL, DF, MF, and D. An eighth cusp was found in a primary second lower molar in an Argentinean child.
Viewed from the top of the tooth ( occlusal view ), the mandibular first molar is pentagonal ( पाँच तरफा ) in shape and tapers toward the lingual, with the sides being the buccal surface, the mesial surface, the lingual surface, distal surface, and the distobuccal surface.
The occlusal सतह has four grooves.
The central groove is not straight but runs down the बीच of the दाँत mesially to distally and contains four pits ( mesial, central, central, and distal ).
The distobuccal groove रनों इससे the distal गड्ढे in the central groove distobuccally separating the distal and distobuccal cusps.
The lingual groove runs from the more distal of the सेंट्रल गड्ढों in the सेंट्रल groove toward the lingual surface between the mesiolingual and distolingual cusps.
The buccal groove runs from the more mesial of the central pits in the central groove toward the buccal surface between the mesiobuccal and distobuccal cusps समाप्ति in the buccal pit.
The portion of the central groove between the central pits is termed the Lewis offset and is mandatory to account for the locations of the buccal और lingual grooves ( buccal groove being more mesial than the lingual groove while they are parallel ).
From the buccal ( buccal view ), दो जड़ें हैं present.
The distal root is generally straighter, although both often have a slight distal curvature.
The हाइट्स of रुपरेखा on the mesial and distal contact the adjacent teeth and are located at the junction of the occlusal and middle thirds of the crown.
The Florida Legislature is the two घरों कि अधिनियम as the state legislature of the U.S. state of Florida.
The Florida Constitution states that `` The legislative power of the state shall be vested in a विधानमंडल of the राज्य of फ्लोरिडा, '' composed of a Senate and House of Representatives.
The legislature is seated at the Florida State कैपिटल in tallahassee.
Stained glass depiction of Daniel interceding साथ arioch, the किंग 's guard.
arioch था महरूम charged with killing all the wise men after they were not able to interpret Nebuchadnezzar 's dream.
Daniel 2 is the second chapter of the Book of Daniel in the यहूदी बाइबल.
The chapter 's source टेक्स्ट is predominantly written in Aramaic.
According to the टेक्स्ट, Nebuchadnezzar is the king of Babylon who is troubled by his dreams.
He demands an interpretation for his dreams or will have उसके रहस्यवादी interpreters executed.
Daniel seeks Divine Wisdom to interpret the king 's dreams और गुणगान परमेश्वर साथ a short psalm.
God gives Daniel a vision in the night to reveal the king 's सपना.
Able to satisfy the king, Daniel is promoted over the whole province of Babylon.

The old Comcast logo from 1969 to 1999, when it was replaced साथ the crescent logo.
the comcast Corporation is an American provider of entertainment, information and communications products and services.
it is the largest केबल ऑपरेटर, एक of the biggest द्रव्यमान मीडिया, घर अंतरजाल सेवा प्रदाता, और तीसरा largest घर टेलीफोन सेवा प्रदाता in the संयुक्त राज्य, providing केबल टेलीविज़न, ब्रॉडबैंड अंतरजाल, टेलीफोन सेवा और in कुछ क्षेत्रों घर सुरक्षा ( सहित burglar सचेतक, निगरानी कैमरे, आग सचेतक प्रणालियों और घर स्वचालन ) to दोनो आवासीय और वाणिज्यिक ग्राहक in 40 राज्य और the District of Columbia.
The company is headquartered in Philadelphia, पेन्सिलवेनिया.
In 2011, Comcast acquired a 51 % बहुमत हिस्सेदारी in मीडिया संगुटिका NBCUniversal from GE in January 2011, and began the process of purchasing the remaining 49 % on February 12, 2013, at a cost of $ 16.7 billion.
It completed the खरीदें on March 19, 2013.

Entertainment Television, Style Network, G4, the Golf चैनल और एनबीसी खेल संजाल ), वितरण ( ThePlatform ), and related businesses.
Comcast has been the subject of आलोचना for activities including its stance on net neutrality, as well as poor results on customer satisfaction surveys.
Porcupines are rodents with a coat of शार्प कांटे, or quills, कि बचाव and camouflage them from predators.
They are indigenous to the americas, southern Asia, and Africa.
Porcupines are the third largest of the rodents, behind the capybara and the beaver.
Most porcupines are about long, साथ an long tail.
Weighing, they are rounded, large और slow.
porcupines आइये in विभिन्न शेड्स of भूरा, धूसर, और the असामान्य श्वेत.
Porcupines ' spiny सुरक्षा resembles that of the unrelated erinaceomorph hedgehogs and monotreme echidnas.
The common porcupine is a herbivore.
It eats leaves, herbs, twigs and green plants like skunk गोभी और क्लोवर और in the winter it may eat bark.
the North American porcupine often climbs trees to find food.
The African porcupine is नहीं a climber and forages on the ground.
It is ज़्यादातर nocturnal, लकिन will sometimes forage for food in the day.
Porcupines have become a pest in कीनिया और हैं खाया as a delicacy.
The name porcupine comes from Middle French porc espin ( spined pig ).
A क्षेत्रीय American name for the animal is quill pig.

Elijah J. McCoy ( May 2, 1844 – October 10, 1929 ) was a black Canadian-American आविष्कारक और इंजीनियर, जो थी notable for his 57 U.S. patents, most to do with lubrication of steam engines.
Born free in Canada, he returned as a five-year-old child with his family to the United States in 1847, where he lived लिये the बाकी of उसके life and became a US citizen.
Honda FCX Clarity, a हाइड्रोजन ईंधन कोशिका demonstration vehicle introduced in 2008
A hydrogen vehicle is a vehicle कि उपयोग हाइड्रोजन as its onboard fuel for motive power.
Hydrogen वाहनों शामिल हाइड्रोजन fueled space rockets, as well as automobiles and other transportation vehicles.
The power plants of such vehicles बदलें the रासायनिक उर्जा of हाइड्रोजन to mechanical energy either by burning hydrogen in an internal combustion engine, or by reacting hydrogen with oxygen in a fuel cell to run electric motors.
फैली उपयोग of हाइड्रोजन लिये fueling transportation is a key element of a proposed hydrogen economy.
Hydrogen fuel does not occur naturally on धरती and thus is not an energy source ; rather it is an energy carrier.
It is most frequently made from methane or other fossil fuels, but it can be produced using sources ( such as wind, solar, or नाभिकीय ) कि are intermittent, too diffuse or too cumbersome to directly propel vehicles.
Integrated wind-to-hydrogen plants, using electrolysis of water, are exploring technologies to deliver costs low enough, and quantities great पर्याप्त, to compete with traditional energy sources.
Many companies are working to develop technologies कि might efficiently exploit the potential of hydrogen energy for mobile uses.
The attraction of using hydrogen as an energy currency is that, if hydrogen is prepared without using fossil fuel inputs, vehicle propulsion would not contribute to कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड emissions.
The drawbacks of hydrogen use are high capital cost, low energy content per unit volume, high tankage weights, very high storage vessel pressures, the storage, transportation and filling of gaseous or liquid hydrogen in vehicles, the large investment in infrastructure that would be required to fuel vehicles, and the inefficiency of production processes.
sacramento is the capital city of the U.S. state of California and the seat of government of Sacramento County.
It is located at the confluence of the Sacramento River and the अमरीकी नदी in the उत्तरी portion of California 's expansive Central Valley.
With an estimated 2011 population of 477,891, it is the sixth-largest city in California and the 35th largest city in the United States.
Sacramento is the core cultural and economic center of the Sacramento metropolitan area which शामिल seven counties with an estimated 2009 population of 2,527,123.
Its metropolitan area is the चौथी largest in कैलिफ़ोर्निया बाद the वृहद Los Angeles Area, San Francisco Bay Area, and the San Diego metropolitan area, as well as the 25th largest in the United States.
Sacramento was cited by Time magazine as America 's most ethnically and racially integrated city in 2002.
Sacramento became a नगर through the efforts of the Swiss immigrant John Sutter, Sr., his son John Sutter, Jr., and James W. Marshall.
Sacramento grew quickly thanks to the protection of Sutter 's फोर्ट, जिससे was established by Sutter in 1839.
During the California Gold Rush, Sacramento was a major distribution point, a commercial and agricultural center, and a terminus लिये wagon trains, stagecoaches, riverboats, the telegraph, the Pony Express, and the First Transcontinental Railroad.
California State University, Sacramento, more commonly known as sacramento राज्य or सैक राज्य, is the largest local university.
It is one of the twenty-three campuses of the California State University system.
Drexel University Sacramento is located in Downtown, sacramento.
University of the Pacific 's McGeorge School of Law is located in the ओक पार्क पड़ोस.
In addition, the विश्वविद्यालयों of California, Davis is located in nearby Davis, west of the capital.
The UC Davis Medical Center, a world-renowned शोध हॉस्पिटल, is स्तिथ in the city of Sacramento.
The Apple Store is a chain of retail stores owned and operated by Apple Inc., dealing in computers and उपभोक्ता इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स.
The stores sell Macintosh personal computers, software, iPods, iPads, iPhones, third-party accessories, और अन्य उपभोक्ता इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स such as Apple TV.
Some high profile stores feature a Theatre for presentations and workshops and a Studio for training with Apple products ; all stores offer a Genius बार लिये technical support and repairs, as well as free workshops available to the public.
Under the leadership of Ron Johnson, the former Senior Vice President of Retail Operations, the Apple Stores have, according to an आलेख in the नई York Times, been responsible for `` [ turning ] the boring computer sales floor into a sleek playroom filled with gadgets ''.
, Apple has 405 stores worldwide, with global sales of billion in merchandise in 2011, and they lead the United States retail market in शर्तें of बिक्री प्रति ईकाई क्षेत्रफल.
Steven Paul `` Steve '' Jobs ( ; February 24, 1955 – October 5, 2011 ) was an American entrepreneur and inventor, best ज्ञात as the co-founder, chairman, and CEO of Apple Inc.
through ठहराना, he थी widely पहचाना as a charismatic पायोनियर of the personal computer revolution and for his influential career in the computer and consumer electronics fields, transforming `` one industry after another, from computers and smartphones to music and movies... ''
Jobs also co-founded and served as chief executive of Pixar Animation Studios ; he became a सदस्य of the फलक of निर्देशकों of The Walt Disney Company in 2006, when Disney acquired Pixar.
Jobs was among the first to see the commercial potential of Xerox PARC 's mouse -driven graphical user interface, which led to the creation of the Apple Lisa and, one year later, the Macintosh.
He also played a role in introducing the LaserWriter, one of the first widely उपलब्धियाँ लेज़र मुद्रक, to the market.
After a power struggle with the board of directors in 1985, Jobs left Apple and founded NeXT, a computer platform development company specializing in the higher-education और कारोबार markets.
In 1986, he acquired the कंप्यूटर ग्राफिक्स division of Lucasfilm, which was spun off as Pixar.
He was credited in खिलौना Story ( 1995 ) as an executive producer.
He served as CEO and majority shareholder until Disney 's purchase of पिक्चर्स in 2006.
In 1996, after Apple had failed to deliver its operating system, Copland, Gil Amelio turned to NeXT Computer, and the nextstep मंच became the न्यास for the Mac OS X.
Jobs returned to Apple as an advisor, and took control of the company as an interim CEO.
Jobs brought ठहराना from near bankruptcy to profitability by 1998.
As the new CEO of the company, Jobs oversaw the development of the iMac, iTunes, iPod, iPhone, and iPad, and on the services side, the company 's ठहराना खुदरा स्टोर्स, itunes स्टोर and the App Store.
The success of these products and services provided several years of stable financial returns, and propelled Apple to become the world 's most valuable publicly traded company in 2011.
The reinvigoration of the company is regarded by many commentators as एक of the महानतम turnarounds in business history.
In 2003, Jobs was diagnosed with a pancreas neuroendocrine tumor.
Though it was initially treated, he reported a hormone imbalance, underwent a liver transplant in 2009, and appeared progressively thinner as his health declined.
On medical leave for most of 2011, Jobs resigned in August that year, और थी निर्वाचित अध्यक्ष of the Board.
He died of respiratory arrest related to his metastatic ट्यूमर on October 5, 2011.
Jobs received a number of honors and public recognition for his influence in the प्रौद्योगिकी and music industries.
He has been referred to as `` legendary '', a `` futurist '' or simply `` दूरदर्शी '', और रै महरूम described as the `` Father of the Digital Revolution '', a `` master of innovation '', and a `` design perfectionist ''.

रोमन numerals, the numeric system in ancient Rome, uses combinations of letters from the Latin alphabet to signify values.
The numbers 1 to 10 can be expressed in Roman numerals as follows:
और.
The Roman numeral प्रणाली is a cousin of Etruscan numerals.
Use of Roman numerals continued after the मनाही of the Roman Empire.
From the 14th century on, Roman numerals began to be replaced in most contexts by more convenient Hindu-Arabic numerals ; however this process was gradual, and the उपयोग of रोमन numerals in कुछ नाबालिग अनुप्रयोग continues to this day.
Effective Nuclear चार्ज Diagram
The effective nuclear charge ( often symbolize as or Z* ) is the net positive charge experienced by an electron in a multi-electron अणु.
The term `` effective '' is used because the shielding effect of negatively charged electrons prevents उच्चतर orbital electrons from experiencing the full nuclear charge by the repelling effect of inner-layer electrons.
The effective nuclear चार्ज अनुभवी by the outer shell electron is also called the core charge.
It is संभावित to determine the शक्ति of the nuclear charge by looking at the oxidation number of the atom.
