The Witch 's Finger in the carlsbad Caverns
A stalagmite ( or ; from the Greek σταλαγμίτης - stalagmitês, from σταλαγμίας - stalagmias, `` dropping, trickling '' ) is a type of speleothem that rises from the floor of a limestone cave due to the dripping of mineralized solutions and the deposition of calcium carbonate.
This stalagmite formation occurs only under certain pH शर्तें within the underground cavern.
The corresponding formation on the ceiling of a गुफा is ज्ञात as a stalactite.
If these formations grow together, the परिणाम is ज्ञात as a column.
The Hall of Giants in the carlsbad Caverns
Stalagmites should normally not be touched, since the rock buildup is formed by minerals precipitating out of the water solution onto the old surface ; skin oils can alter the surface where the mineral water will चिपकी, यूँ affecting the विकास of the formation.
Oils and dirt from human contact can also stain the formation and change its color permanently.
Similar structures can also form in lava tubes, associated with कुछ प्रकार of lavacicles, although the mechanism of formation is very different.
Stalactites and stalagmites can also form on concrete ceilings और floors, हालांकि they form much more rapidly there than in the natural cave environment.
The largest stalagmite in the world is high and is located in the cave of Cueva मार्टिन infierno, क्यूबा.
In the Zagros Mountains of south Iran, approximately from the ancient city of Bishapur, in the Shapur cave on the fourth of five terraces stands the 3rd century CE statue of shapur i, दूसरी शासक of the सासानी Empire.
The statue, carved इससे one stalagmite, is nearly high.
How I Met Your Mother is an American sitcom कि premiered on CBS on September 19, 2005.
The show was created by क्रेग थामस and Carter Bays.
How I Met Your Mother is framed by the year 2030, when Ted Mosby ( voiced by Bob Saget ) gathers his daughter ( Lyndsy Fonseca ) और बेटे ( दाउद henrie ) to बताना उन्हें the स्टोरी of कैसा he met their mother.
We flashback to where it begins in 2005 with Ted mosby ( जोश radnor ) as a single, 27-year-old architect living with his two best friends from Wesleyan University, Marshall Eriksen ( Jason Segel ), a law student, and Lily Aldrin ( Alyson Hannigan ), a kindergarten teacher, who have been dating for almost nine years when Marshall proposes.
Their सगाई कल्याणकारी टेड to सोचो परिचय ढूंढना his own soul mate, much to the disgust of his friend Barney Stinson ( Neil Patrick Harris ), a womanizer with an unnamed corporate job.
And thus, Ted begins his search for his perfect mate, and meets Robin Scherbatsky ( Cobie Smulders ), whom he भी befriends.
The 100th एपीसोड of कैसा I Met Your Mother aired on January 11, 2010.
On December 21, 2012, the series थी नवीनीकृत लिये a नवीं season.
On January 30, 2013, it was announced कि ऋतु 9 will be its final season.
Gringo (,, ) is a कठबोली स्पेनी and Portuguese word used in Ibero-America, to denote foreigners, often from the United States.
The term can be applied to someone who is दरअसल a foreigner, or it can denote a दमदार association or assimilation into foreign ( particularly US ) society and culture.
In Spanish it does not have a negative connotation.
Roger Axtell, a travel etiquette expert, notes that `` [ t ] he word gringo is not necessarily a bad word.
It is slang but is derogatory only in its use and कॉन्टेक्स्ट. ''
The word was used in Spain long before it crossed the Atlantic to denote foreign, non-native speakers of Spanish.
The great white shark, Carcharodon carcharias, also known as the great white, white pointer, white shark, or white death, is a प्रजाति of large lamniform shark which can be found in the coastal surface waters of all the major oceans.
The great white shark is mainly known for its size, with the largest individuals known to have approached or exceeded in length, and in weight.
इस शार्क पहुँच इसके परिपक्वता around 15 सालो of आयु और can have a जीवन स्पैन of over 30 सालो.
The great white shark is arguably the world 's largest known extant macropredatory fish, and is one of the प्राथमिक परभक्षी of marine mammals.
It is also known to prey upon a variety of अन्य समुद्री पशु, including fish and seabirds.
It is the only known surviving प्रजाति of its genus Carcharodon, and is ranked first in having the most attacks on humans.
The IUCN list the ग्रेट white shark as a vulnerable species, while it is included in Appendix II of CITES.
The bestselling novel Jaws by Peter Benchley and the subsequent ब्लॉकबस्टर film by Steven Spielberg depicted the great white shark as a `` ferocious man eater ``.
In reality, humans are not the पसन्दीदा शिकार of the great white shark.
The संयुक्त राज्य हथियारबंद शक्तियां हैं the military forces of the United States of America.
They consist of the Army, Navy, Marine Corps, Air Force, and coast गार्ड.
The U.S. has a strong tradition of civilian कंट्रोल of the military.
The President is the सैन्य 's overall सिर, और helps रूप सैन्य policy with the U.S. Department of Defense ( DoD ), a federal executive department, acting as the principal organ by which military policy is carried out.
The dod is headed by the Secretary of Defense, who is a civilian and Cabinet member.
The Defense Secretary is second in the military 's chain of command, just below the President, and serves as the principal assistant to the President in all DoD-related matters.
To coordinate सैन्य कार्रवाई साथ diplomacy, the President has an advisory National Security Council headed by a National Security Advisor.
Both the President and Secretary of Defense are advised by a seven-member Joint Chiefs of Staff, which includes the सिर of each of the Defense Department 's service branches as well as the chief of the National Guard Bureau.
Leadership is provided by the Chairman of the संयुक्त chiefs of Staff and the Vice Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff.
The Commandant of the coast गार्ड is not a member of the Joint Chiefs of Staff.
All of the branches work together during operations and joint missions, under the Unified Combatant कमांड, अंतर्गत the प्राधिकार of the Secretary of Defense with the exception of the Coast Guard.
The Coast Guard falls under the administration of the Department of Homeland Security and receives its operational orders from the Secretary of Homeland Security.
The Coast Guard may be transferred to the Department of the Navy by the President or Congress during a time of war.
All five armed services are among the seven uniformed services of the United States ; the others are the U.S. Public Health Service Commissioned Corps and the नेशनल oceanic और वायुमंडलीय प्रशासन commissioned Corps.
इससे the समय of इसके inception, the सैन्य played a decisive role in the history of the United States.
A sense of national unity and identity was forged as a result of victory in the First Barbary War और the दूसरी barbary युद्ध.
Even so, the Founders यहूद संदिग्ध of a स्थाई सैन्य force and not until the outbreak of World War II did a large standing army become officially established.
The National Security Act of 1947, adopted following World War II and during the Cold War 's onset, created the modern U.S. military framework ; the Act merged previously Cabinet-level Department of War and the Department of the Navy into the National Military Establishment ( renamed the विभाग of रक्षा in 1949 ), headed by the Secretary of Defense ; and created the Department of the Air Force and National Security Council.
The U.S. military is one of the largest militaries in terms of number of personnel.
It draws its manpower from a large pool of paid volunteers ; although conscription has been used in the पास्ट in विभिन्न times of both war and peace, it has not been used since 1972.
As of 2013, the U.S. spends about $ 554.2 billion annually to fund its सैन्य शक्तियां, और appropriates लगभग $ 88.5 billion to fund Overseas Contingency Operations.
Put together, the u.S. constitutes roughly 43 percent of the world 's military expenditures.
The U.S. Armed Forces as a whole possess large quantities of advanced और शक्तिशाली उपकरण, साथ साथ फैली placement of forces around the world, giving them significant capabilities in both defense and power projection.
Freedom of speech is the political right to communicate one 's opinions and ideas using one 's देह और प्रॉपर्टी to anyone जो is willing to receive them.
The term freedom of expression is sometimes used synonymously, but includes any act of seeking, receiving and imparting information or विचार, regardless of the medium used.
in अभ्यास, the सही to स्वतंत्रता of वाक is नहीं निरपेक्ष in कोई देश और the सही is commonly विषय to सीमाएं, as साथ मानहानि, बदनामी, obscenity, राजद्रोह ( सहित, लिये उदाहरण inciting जातीय द्वेष ), कापीराइट उल्लंघन, रहस्योद्घाटन of सूचना कि is वर्गीकृत or वरना.
The right to freedom of expression is recognized as a human right under Article 19 of the Universal Declaration of इंसान अधिकारों and recognized in international human rights law in the International Covenant on Civil and Political Rights ( ICCPR ).
Article 19 of the ICCPR states that `` [ e ] veryone shall have the right to hold opinions without interference '' and `` everyone shall have the right to freedom of expression ; this right shall include स्वतंत्रता to तलाश, प्राप्त और impart सूचना और विचार of सब kinds, regardless of frontiers, either orally, in लिखने or in छपाई, in the form of art, or through any other media of his choice ''.
Article 19 goes on to say that the exercise of these rights carries `` special duties and responsibilities `` and may `` therefore be subject to certain प्रतिबंध '' जब जरुरी `` [ f ] or आदर of the अधिकारों or reputation of others '' or `` [ f ] or the protection of national security or of public order ( order public ), or of public health or morals ''.
Freedom of speech may be legally curtailed in some religious legal systems and in secular jurisdictions where it is मिला to कारण धार्मिक ठोकर, such as the British Racial and Religious Hatred Act 2006.
The Big Bang सिद्धान्त logo.
the बिग बंग सिद्धान्त is an American comedy television series created and executive produced by Chuck Lorre and Bill Prady.
Like the name of the series itself, with the exception of the first episode— '' Pilot '' —episode titles of The Big Bang Theory always start with `` The '' and resemble the name of a scientific principle, theory or experiment, whimsically referencing a plot point or quirk.
, 133 एपीसोड have aired.
The Big Bang सिद्धान्त रै been renewed for a seventh season.
Dwight David `` Ike '' Eisenhower ( pronounced, ; October 14, 1890 – March 28, 1969 ) was the 34th President of the संयुक्त States from 1953 until 1961.
He had previously been a five-star general in the United States Army during World War II and served as Supreme Commander of the Allied Forces in Europe ; he had responsibility for planning and supervising the invasion of North Africa in Operation Torch in 1942–43 and the successful invasion of France and Germany in 1944–45 from the Western Front.
In 1951, he became the first supreme commander of NATO.
Eisenhower was of Pennsylvania Dutch ancestry and was reared in a large family in Kansas by parents with a robust work ethic and religious background.
As one of six sons, he was conditioned by a competitive atmosphere which instilled self-reliance.
He attended and graduated from West Point and later शादीशुदा और था दो sons.
After World War II, Eisenhower served as Army Chief of Staff under President Harry S. Truman, then assumed the post of President at कोलंबिया University.
Eisenhower entered the 1952 presidential race as a रिपब्लिकन to counter the non-interventionism of Senator Robert A. Taft and to crusade against `` Communism, Korea and corruption ''.
He won by a भूस्खलन, defeating Democrat Adlai Stevenson and ending two decades of the New Deal Coalition.
In the first year of his presidency, आइज़नहावर अपदस्थ the नेता of इरान in the 1953 Iranian coup d'état and used nuclear threats to conclude the Korean War with China.
His New Look policy of nuclear deterrence gave priority to inexpensive nuclear weapons जबकि reducing the funding for conventional military forces ; the goal was to keep pressure on the Soviet Union and reduce federal deficits.
In 1954, Eisenhower first articulated the domino theory in his description of the threat presented by the spread of साम्यवादी.
The Congress agreed to his request in 1955 for the Formosa Resolution, which enabled him to prevent Chinese communist aggression against Chinese nationalists and established the U.S. policy of defending Taiwan.
When the Soviets launched sputnik in 1957, he था to खेल catch-up in the space race.
Eisenhower forced इसराईल, the UK, and France to end their invasion of Egypt during the Suez Crisis of 1956.
In 1958, he sent 15,000 US troops to Lebanon to prevent the pro-Western government from falling to a nasser -inspired क्रान्ति.
Near the end of his term, his efforts to set up a summit meeting with the soviets collapsed क्युकी of the U-2 incident.
On the domestic front, he covertly opposed जोसेफ मैकार्थी और contributed to the end of McCarthyism by openly invoking the modern expanded version of executive privilege.
He वरना बाएँ सबसे राजनैतिक activity to his Vice President, Richard Nixon.
He was a moderate conservative who continued New Deal agencies and expanded Social Security.
Among his enduring innovations, he launched the Interstate Highway System ; the Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency ( DARPA ), which led to the internet, among many invaluable outputs ; the National aeronautics और स्पेस प्रशासन ( नासा ), driving peaceful discovery in space ; the establishment of strong science education via the National Defense Education Act ; and encouraging peaceful use of nuclear power via amendments to the Atomic Energy Act.
In social policy, he sent federal troops to Little Rock, Arkansas, for the first time since Reconstruction to enforce संघीय अदालत आदेश to desegregate public schools.
He also signed सिविल अधिकारों legislation in 1957 and 1960 to protect the right to vote.
He implemented desegregation of the armed forces in two years and made five नियुक्ति to the परम् अदालत.
He was the first term-limited president in accordance साथ the 22nd Amendment.
Eisenhower 's two terms were peaceful ones लिये the सबसे भाग and saw considerable economic prosperity except for a sharp recession in 1958–59.
आइज़नहावर is often ranked highly among the U.S. Presidents.
Air Force One is the official air traffic control कॉल चिह्न of a United States Air Force aircraft carrying the President of the United States.
In common parlance the term refers to those Air Force aircraft specifically designed, built, and used लिये the purpose of transporting the president.
The Presidential aircraft is a prominent प्रतीक of the American presidency and its power.
The idea of designating specific military aircraft to transport the President arose in 1943, when officials of the संयुक्त राज्य फौज एयर शक्तियां – the पूर्ववर्ती to the U.S. Air Force – became concerned with relying on commercial airlines to transport the President.
A C-87 Liberator Express was reconfigured for use as a अध्यक्षीय हस्तांतरण ; however, it was rejected by the Secret Service amid concerns over the aircraft 's safety record.
A C-54 Skymaster was then converted for presidential use ; this aircraft, dubbed the Sacred Cow, transported President Franklin D. Roosevelt to the Yalta Conference in February 1945, and was subsequently used for another two years by President Harry S. Truman.
The `` Air Force One '' call sign was created after a 1953 incident during जिससे a उड़ान carrying अध्यक्ष ड्वाइट D. आइज़नहावर entered the same airspace as a commercial airline flight using the same call sign.
Several aircraft have been used as Air Force One since the creation of the presidential fleet, including two Boeing 707s introduced in the 1960s and 1970s, respectively ; since 1990, the presidential fleet has consisted of two Boeing VC-25As – specifically configured, highly customized Boeing 747-200B series aircraft.
The Air Force is looking into replacing the two VC-25 वायुयान साथ three replacement aircraft beginning in 2017.
A wedding anniversary is the anniversary of the तिथि a wedding took place.
Traditional names exist for most of them : for instance, 50 years of marriage is called a `` golden wedding वर्षगांठ '' or बस a `` सुनहरी anniversary ''.
A स्कैनर साथ Duplexing Automatic Document Feeder.
In multifunction or all-in-one printers, fax machines, photocopiers and scanners, an automatic document feeder or ADF is a feature which takes several pages and feeds the paper one page at a time into a scanner or copier, allowing the user to scan, और thereby copy, print, or fax, multiple-page documents without having to manually replace each page.
Most copiers allow scanning on the flatbed or platen ( the `` glass '' ) or through a दस्तावेज़ feeder.
The vast majority of fax machines have an ADF, allowing the unattended sending of multi-page faxes.
Due to the ubiquity of ADF in fax machines, some fax machine owners use the fax machine as a scanner, faxing multi-page documents to themselves.
Document feeders are described by speed, in pages per minute or ppm, and capacity, usually in a range from 10 sheets to 200.
There are two kinds of document feeders capable of two-sided ( duplex ) स्कैनिंग : a reversing automatic document feeder or RADF scans one side of a page, then flips it and scans the other side.
A duplexing automatic document फीडर or dadf scans both sides in one pass.
The लाभ of the dadf is faster speed for two-sided originals.
RADFs and DADFs are rated in बिंब प्रति मिनट ( IPM ), the number of sides they can scan each minute.
Fair Park is a recreational और शैक्षणिक complex located in Dallas, Texas ( USA ).
The complex is registered as a Dallas Landmark, National Historic Landmark and is home to nine museums, six performance facilities, a lagoon, and the largest Ferris wheel in North America.
Many of the buildings on the complex were constructed for the Texas Centennial Exposition in 1936 which drew over six million visitors.
Most of the buildings built for the exposition still survive and it is recognized as a significant उदाहरण of Art Deco architecture.
Fair Park has been designated a Great Place in America by the अमरीकी नियोजन Association.
The अमरीकी नियोजन संघ ( APA ) “is an independent, not-for-profit educational organization that provides leadership in the development of vital communities.”
The Great Places in American program helps to celebrate areas with “exemplary अक्षर, विशेषता, और planning.”
होने designated as a Great Place in America, Fair Park was one of only ten cities chosen in 2011.
San Jose ( ; Spanish : St. Joseph ) is the third-largest city in California, the tenth-largest in the u.S., और the काउंटी सीट of सांता क्लारा काउंटी जिससे is located at the southern end of San Francisco Bay.
San जोस is the largest नगर भीतर सिलिकॉन घाटी, which is a major component of the greater San Francisco Bay Area, a region of 8.4 million people and the fifth largest metropolitan area ( CSA ) in the United States.
It is the largest city in Northern कैलिफ़ोर्निया.
San Jose was founded on November 29, 1777, as El Pueblo de San José de Guadalupe, the first civilian town in the Spanish colony of Nueva California, which बाद became Alta California.
The city served as a farming community to support Spanish military installations at सैन फ्रांसिस्को and Monterey.
When California gained statehood in 1850, San Jose served as its first capital.
After more than 150 years as a small farming city, San Jose and the surrounding Santa Clara Valley became the last ( and largest ) संलग्न क्षेत्रफल of undeveloped land surrounding the San Francisco Bay.
San Jose experienced increased demand लिये आवास इससे सैनिको and veterans returning from World War II.
San Jose then continued its aggressive expansion during the 1950s और 1960s by annexing more land area.
The rapid growth of the high-technology और इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स उद्योग further accelerated the transition from an agricultural center, to an urbanized metropolitan area.
By the 1990s, San Jose 's location within the booming local technology industry earned the city its nickname, पूंजी of Silicon Valley.
San Jose now maintains global city औकात और is the largest city in the San Francisco Bay Area in terms of population, land area, and industrial development.
The U.S. Census Bureau reported the जनसांख्यिकी of the नगर to be 945,942 as of the 2010 Census.
As of April 2013, the estimated population of San Jose थी 984,000.
San Jose, along with the Santa Clara Valley, experienced about half a century of spectacular suburban sprawl, साथ characteristics of intense urbanization similar to the Los Angeles area of Southern California.
The city has taken definite steps to avoid बनने `` L.A. North ''.
However, the sprawl in सैन जोस is बदतर than in Los Angeles by measures such as population density and public transit safety, investment, and ridership.
Europe depicted by Antwerp cartographer Abraham Ortelius in 1595
The history of Europe covers the people inhabiting the यूरोपीय महाद्वीप चूंकि it थी पहला populated in prehistoric times to present, with the first Homo sapiens arriving between 45,000 and 25,000 BC.
The earliest settlers to Prehistoric यूरोपीय आए दौरान the paleolithic era.
The arrival of agriculture around 7000 BC ushered in the पाषाणकालीन age.
Neolithic यूरोपीय lasted for 4000 years, overlapping with metal-using cultures that gradually spread throughout the continent.
Technological advances during the prehistoric age tended to arrive from the Middle East, spreading gradually to the northwest.
Some of the best-known सभ्यताओं of प्रागैतिहासिक यूरोपीय यहूद मिनोआई और माइसीनियाई, which flourished during the Bronze Age until they collapsed in a short period of time around 1200 BC.
The period known as classical antiquity began with the rise of the city-states of प्राचीन यूनानियों.
Greek influence reached its zenith under the expansive empire of सिकंदर the ग्रेट, spreading throughout Asia.
Northern and western Europe were dominated by the La Tène culture, a precursor to the Celts.
Rome, a small city-state traditionally संस्थापित in 753 bc, would grow to become the Roman Republic in 509 BC and would succeed Greek culture as the dominant Mediterranean civilization.
The events of the rule of Julius Caesar led to reorganization of the Republic into the Roman Empire.
The empire was बाद विभाजित by the emperor Diocletian into the Western and Eastern empires.
During the later years of the Roman Empire, the Germanic peoples of northern Europe grew in strength and repeated attacks led to the Fall of the Western Roman Empire in AD 476, a date which traditionally marks the समाप्त of the शास्त्रीय काल और the प्रारंभ of the Middle Ages.
During the Middle Ages, the Eastern Roman Empire survived, though modern historians refer to इस राज्य as the बीज़ान्टिन Empire.
In Western Europe, germanic peoples स्थानांतरित into स्थितियाँ of शक्ति in the remnants of the पूर्व पश्चिमी Roman Empire and established kingdoms and empires of their own.
Of all of the Germanic peoples, the Franks would rise to a position of Hegemony over western Europe, the Frankish Empire reaching its peak under Charlemagne around AD 800.
Francia was divided into several parts ; West Francia would evolve into the Kingdom of France, while East Francia would evolve into the पावन रोमन साम्राज्य, a precursor to modern Germany.
The British Isles were the site of अनेक large-scale migrations.
Native Celtic peoples had been marginalized during the काल of रोमन ब्रिटेन, और जब the romans abandoned the अंग्रेजों isles during the 400s, waves of Germanic Anglo-Saxons migrated to southern Britain and established a series of petty kingdoms in what would eventually develop into the Kingdom of England by AD 927.
During इस काल, the Kingdom of Poland and Kingdom of Hungary ( 1000–1945 ) were organized as well.
The Viking Age, a period of migrations of scandinavian peoples, dominated the period from the late 700s to the middle 1000s.
Chief among the Viking states was the Empire of Cnut the Great, a Danish leader who would become king of इंग्लैण्ड, Denmark, and Norway.
The Normans, a Viking लोगों जो settled in उत्तरी फ़्रांस और संस्थापित the duchy of Normandy, would have a significant impact on many parts of Europe, from the Norman conquest of England to Southern Italy and Sicily.
Another Scandinavian people, the Rus ' people, would go on to found Kievan Rus ', an early state which थी a precursor for the modern country of Russia.
As the Viking Age drew to a close, the period known as the Crusades, a series of religiously-motivated सैन्य रिझाने originally intended to bring the Levant back into Christian rule, began.
Several Crusader states were founded in the eastern भूमध्यसागरीय.
ये यहूद सब short-lived.
The crusaders would have a profound impact on many parts of Europe.
Their Sack of Constantinople in 1204 brought an abrupt end to the Byzantine Empire.
Extinct श्वान breeds is a compilation of dog breeds that have become extinct.
Wii Speak is a microphone accessory लिये Nintendo 's Wii video game console.
Connected to the console via USB, the device can be placed near the video display, allowing voice chat to be conducted with the entire room.
The device features an LED to indicate when the microphone is active.
Wii Speak was घोषित at Nintendo 's 2008 E3 media briefing.
It was released separately and bundled with Animal Crossing : City Folk on November 16, 2008, in North America, and was released on December 5, 2008, in Europe.
The Wii Speak accessory is succeeded by the embedded microphone on the Wii U 's GamePad controller.
निसान बुद्धिमान Key®
A smart key is an electronic access and authorization प्रणाली जिससे is उपलब्धियाँ as an विकल्प or standard in several cars.
It was first developed by Siemens in the mid-1990s and introduced by mercedes-benz under the name `` Keyless Go '' in 1998 on the W220 S-Class following its design patent filed by Daimler-Benz on May 17, 1997.
univisión ( ) is a spanish-language television network in the United States.
The network is primarily dedicated for Latin American families जो reside in the United States.
It रै the largest दर्शक of Spanish-language television viewers in the world according to Nielsen ratings.
Randy Falco, ( CEO as of June 29, 2011 ) COO, has been in charge of the company since the departure of Univision Communications president and CEO Joe Uva in April 2010.
in हाल सालो the संजाल रै पहुँचे पैरिटी साथ the u.S. 's पाँच प्रमुख english-language टेलीविज़न संजाल, और is प्रायः a दमदार पांचवां, outranking the cw, साथ कुछ fourth-place साप्ताहिक placings, और as of 2012, भी पहला प्लेस rankings लिये व्यक्तिगत कार्यक्रम over सब पाँच अंग्रेज़ी संजाल due to the संजाल 's सतत अनुसूची of नई telenovelas सब 52 सप्ताह of the साल.
Univisión is headquartered in New York, and has its major studios, production facilities, and operations in Doral, Florida, a suburb of Miami.
In 2009, another television studio was announced, Univision studios, to be built in Doral.
Univision is available on cable and satellite in most of the country, with local stations in over 50 markets with large Hispanic and Latino populations and a national cable network feed distributed in बाज़ार बगैर either the availability or the demand for a locally-based station.
Most of these stations air पूरा लोकल न्यूज और other local programming in addition to network shows, and in major markets such as Los Angeles, New York, and Miami the local newscasts carried by the network 's owned-and-operated station ( O & O ) stations are equally competitive with their English-language counterparts ratings-wise.
Univisión was acquired on March 29, 2007 by a consortium led by Haim Saban 's Saban Capital Group ( who had previously owned the entity Saban Entertainment ), TPG Capital, L.P., Providence Equity Partners, Madison Dearborn Partners, and Thomas H. Lee Partners for $ 13.7 billion or $ 36.25 per share plus $ 1.4 अरब in acquired कर्ज़.
The buyout left the company with a debt level of twelve times its सालाना नकदी प्रवाह, जिससे थी twice the norm in buyouts done over the previous two years.
Artist 's धारणा of a protoplanetary disk
The formation and of the Solar System is अनुमानित to have begun 4.6 billion years ago with the gravitational collapse of a small part of a giant molecular cloud.
Most of the collapsing mass collected in the centre, forming the Sun, while the rest flattened into a protoplanetary disk out of which the planets, moons, asteroids, और अन्य small Solar System bodies formed.
This widely accepted model, known as the nebular hypothesis, was first developed in the 18th century by emanuel swedenborg, immanuel kant, and Pierre-Simon Laplace.
Its subsequent development has interwoven a variety of वैज्ञानिक disciplines सहित astronomy, physics, geology, and planetary science.
Since the dawn of the space age in the 1950s and the discovery of extrasolar planets in the 1990s, the model has been both challenged and refined to account for new observations.
the सौर प्रणाली रै विकसित considerably चूंकि इसके आरंभिक गठन.
Many moons have formed from circling discs of gas and dust around their parent planets, while other moons are thought to have formed independently और बाद महरूम captured by उनके ग्रह.
Still अन्य, as the Earth 's Moon, may be the result of giant collisions.
Collisions between bodies have occurred continually up to the present day and have been central to the एवोल्यूशन of the सौर प्रणाली.
The positions of the planets often shifted, और planets have switched places.
This planetary migration is now thought to have been responsible for much of the Solar प्रणाली 's जल्दी एवोल्यूशन.
In roughly 5 billion years, the Sun will cool and expand outward many times its current diameter ( becoming a red giant ), before casting off its outer layers as a planetary नीहारिका और leaving पीछे a तारकीय remnant known as a white dwarf.
In the far distant future, the gravity of passing stars will धीरे reduce the Sun 's retinue of planets.
Some planets will be destroyed, others ejected into interstellar स्पेस.
ultimately, over the course of tens of billions of years, it is likely that the Sun will be left with none of the original bodies in orbit around it.
The Trial ( Kafka 's original German title :, later as, and ) is a novel written by Franz Kafka in 1914 और 1915 लकिन नहीं published until 1925.
One of Kafka 's best-known works, it tells the story of a man arrested and prosecuted by a remote, अभिगम्य authority, with the nature of his crime revealed to neither him nor the reader.
Like Kafka 's other novels, The Trial was never completed, although it does include a chapter which brings the story to an end.
Because of this there are certain inconsistencies which exist within the अनोखा, ऐसे as असमानताओं in timing in addition to other discontinuities in narration.
बाद काफ्का 's मौत in 1924 his friend and literary executor Max Brod edited the text for publication by Verlag Die Schmiede.
The original पाण्डुलिपि is held at the Museum of Modern Literature, Marbach am Neckar, Germany.
In 1999, the किताब थी सूचीबद्ध in le mondes 100 Books of the Century and as No. 2 of the Best German Novels of the Twentieth Century.
Lisa Anne Loeb ( born कूच 11, 1968 ) is an American singer-songwriter and actress.
She launched her career in 1994 with the सोंग, `` रहो ( i छूटी तुम ) ``, which was included in the film Reality Bites.
She was the first artist to have a क्रमांक एक सिंगल in the United States while not signed to a recording contract.
Her पाँच स्टुडियो cds शामिल उसके प्रमुख लेबल डेब्यू, the gold-selling Tails and its follow-up, the Grammy-nominated, gold-selling Firecracker.
लोएब रै भी worked in film, television, voice-over work and children’s recordings.

Network in 2006 focused on her quest for love, success, career, and family.

In 2010 she founded the Lisa Loeb Eyewear Collection, जिससे is आधारित on her own designs.
The Coat of arms of the राज्य of New Jersey includes:
A shield with three plows emblazoned, representative of New Jersey 's agricultural tradition.
A forward-facing knight 's helmet.
A horse 's सिर as the crest of the helmet.
The female figures स्वतंत्रता और Ceres, representative of the state 's motto ( see next item ).
Liberty is holding a staff supporting a `` liberty cap `` ; Ceres is holding an overflowing cornucopia.
The streamer at the foot of the emblem contains the राज्य motto of नई जर्सी, `` स्वतंत्रता और समृद्धि '', and the year of statehood, 1776.
It was originally designed by पियरे Eugene du Simitiere in 1777 and was modified slightly in 1928.
The seal is the central motif in the flag of New Jersey and the Great Seal of the State of New Jersey.
The Coat of बाहें contains a horse 's head.
A helmet showing that New Jersey governs itself accordingly and three plows on a shield referring to the State 's कृषि परंपरा, giving it the उपनाम `` Garden State ''.
The दो Goddesses represent the State motto, `` Liberty and Prosperity ''.
Liberty is on the left.
She is holding a स्टाफ साथ a स्वतंत्रता cap on it, and the word liberty underneath her.
The goddess on the सही is Ceres, goddess of agriculture.
वो is पकड़कर a cornucopia साथ समृद्धि लिखा नीचे उसके.
According to the minutes of the New Jersey General सभा लिये कूच 11, 1896, the तिथि in जिससे the सभा officially स्वीकृत the flag as the state emblem, the buff color is due indirectly to George Washington, who had ordered on October 2, 1779, that the uniform coats of the New Jersey Continental Line be dark ( Jersey ) blue, with buff facings.
buff-colored facings had until then been reserved only for his own uniform and those of other Continental generals and their aides.
Then, on February 28, 1780, the Continental War Officers in Philadelphia directed that the uniform coat facings of all regiments were to be the same as the background color of the regiments ' state flag.

`` We Can Work It Out '' is a song by the Beatles, लिखा by पॉल McCartney and John Lennon.
It was released as a `` double A-sided `` single साथ `` दिन tripper ``, the पहला समय दोनो पहलू of a single were so designated in an initial release.
दोनो गीतों were recorded during the Rubber Soul sessions.
The song is an example of Lennon–McCartney collaboration at a depth that happened only rarely after they wrote the hit singles of 1963.
This song, `` A Day in the Life ``, `` Baby, You 're a समृद्ध man `` और `` I 've Got a Feeling ``, are among the notable exceptions.
As a medical diagnosis, pedophilia or paedophilia is a psychiatric disorder in persons 16 years of age or older typically characterized by a primary or exclusive sexual interest toward prepubescent children ( generally age 11 सालो or younger, हालांकि specific diagnosis criteria for the disorder extends the cut-off point for prepubescence to age 13 ).
An adolescent who is 16 years of age or older must be at least five years older than the prepubescent child before the attraction can be diagnosed as pedophilia.
The पद रै a range of definitions, as found in psychiatry, psychology, the vernacular, and law enforcement.
The International Classification of Diseases ( ICD ) defines pedophilia as a `` disorder of adult personality and behaviour '' in जिससे वहीँ is a यौन वरीयता for children of prepubertal or early pubertal age.
According to the Diagnostic and Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders ( DSM ), it is a paraphilia in which adults or adolescents 16 सालो of आयु or पुरानी have तीव्र और तूल यौन प्रेरणाएं towards और कल्पनाओं परिचय prepubescent children that they have either acted on or which cause them distress or interpersonal difficulty.
In popular उपयोग, pedophilia अर्थात् कोई यौन ब्याज in children or the act of child sexual abuse, often termed `` pedophilic behavior ''.
For example, The American Heritage Stedman 's Medical शब्दकोष राज्य, `` pedophilia is the act or fantasy on the part of an adult of engaging in sexual activity with a child or children. ''
This common use application also extends to the sexual interest in and यौन सम्पर्क साथ pubescent or post-pubescent minors.
Researchers recommend that these imprecise uses be avoided because although people who commit child sexual abuse commonly exhibit the disorder, some offenders do not meet the clinical diagnosis standards for pedophilia and ये मानकों pertain to prepubescents.
Additionally, not all pedophiles दरअसल commit such abuse.
Pedophilia was first formally recognized and named in the late 19th century.
A significant amount of research in the area रै लिया प्लेस since the 1980s.
Although mostly documented in men, there are also women who exhibit the disorder, and researchers assume available estimates underrepresent the सच्चा क्रमांक of female pedophiles.
No cure for pedophilia has been developed, but there are therapies that can reduce the incidence of a व्यक्ति committing child sexual abuse.
In the United States, following कान्सास v. hendricks, sex अपराधियों जो are diagnosed with certain mental disorders, particularly pedophilia, can be subject to indefinite civil commitment, under various state laws ( generically called SVP laws ) and the federal Adam Walsh Child Protection and Safety Act of 2006.
At present, the exact causes of pedophilia have not महरूम conclusively स्थापित.
Research suggests कि pedophilia may be correlated साथ several different neurological abnormalities, and often co-exists with other personality disorders and psychological pathologies.
In the contexts of forensic psychology and law enforcement, a variety of typologies have महरूम सुझाया to categorize pedophiles according to behavior and motivations.
Julio César Chávez ( born Julio César Chávez gonzález on जुलाई 12, 1962 ) is a retired Mexican professional boxer.
Chávez is considered by many people for their sport statistics the greatest fighter ever to come out of मैक्सिको.
He is a six-time world champion in three weight divisions, and for several years he was considered one of the best pound-for-pound boxer in the world.
In a career that spanned over 25 years, Chávez won five world titles in three weight divisions : WBC Super Featherweight in 1984, WBA Lightweight in 1987, WBC Lightweight in 1988, wbc Light Welterweight in 1989, IBF Light Welterweight in 1990, and WBC Light Welterweight in 1994.
He holds records लिये सबसे कामयाब लगातार defenses of संसार शीर्षक ( 27 ), most title fights ( 37 ), most title-fight victories ( 31 ) and he is after Joe Louis with ( 23 ) for most title defenses won by knockout ( 21 ).
Chávez also has the longest undefeated streak in boxing history, 13 years.
His record was 89-0-1 going into his first loss to Frankie Randall and had an 87 fight win streak until his `` draw '' with whitaker.
Julio César chávez was known for his outstanding punching power, devastating body attack, remarkably strong chin and the relentless stalking of his opponents.
He ranks # 24 on ESPN 's 50 महानतम मुक्केबाज of All Time.
On December 7, 2010, he was inducted in the prestigious International Boxing Hall of Fame for the Class of 2011.
He is the father of prospect Omar Chávez and former WBC middleweight चैंपियन Julio César Chávez, Jr.

To be sent to the सही meant slave labor ; to the left, the gas chamber.

The Holocaust ( from the Greek ' : hólos, `` whole '' and kaustós, `` burnt '' ) also known as the Shoah ( Hebrew :, HaShoah, `` catastrophe '' ; Yiddish :, Churben or Hurban, from the Hebrew for `` destruction '' ), was the mass murder or genocide of approximately six million Jews during World War II, a programme of systematic state-sponsored murder by Nazi Germany, led by Adolf Hitler and the Nazi Party, throughout German-occupied territory.
Of the nine million Jews who had resided in Europe before the holocaust, लगभग two-thirds were killed.
Over one million Jewish children were killed in the Holocaust, as were approximately two million Jewish women and three million Jewish men.
A network of over 40,000 facilities in Germany and German-occupied territory were used to concentrate, hold, and kill Jews and other victims.
Some विद्वानों argue कि the mass murder of the Romani and people with disabilities should be included in the definition, and some use the common noun `` holocaust '' to describe other Nazi mass murders, including those of Soviet prisoners of war, Polish and Soviet civilians, and homosexuals.
Recent estimates based on figures obtained since the fall of the Soviet संघ indicates कुछ टेन to ग्यारह million civilians and prisoners of war were intentionally murdered by the Nazi regime.
The persecution and genocide were carried out in stages.
Various laws to remove the Jews from civil society, most prominently the Nuremberg Laws, were enacted in Germany सालो पहले the outbreak of World War II.
Concentration शिविरों यहूद स्थापित in जिससे inmates were subjected to slave labor until they died of exhaustion or disease.
Where Germany conquered new territory in eastern Europe, specialized इकाई पुकारा einsatzgruppen murdered Jews and political opponents in mass shootings.
The occupiers required Jews and Romani to be confined in overcrowded ghettos पहले होने transported by freight train to extermination camps where, if they survived the journey, most were systematically killed in gas chambers.
Every arm of Germany 's bureaucracy was involved in the logistics that led to the genocides, turning the Third Reich into what one Holocaust scholar has called `` a genocidal state ''.
4-H in the United States is a youth organization administered by the National Institute of Food and Agriculture of the United States Department of Agriculture ( USDA ), with the mission of `` engaging युवावस्था to reach their fullest potential while advancing the field of youth development. ''
the name represents four personal development areas of focus for the organization : head, heart, hands, and health.
The organization रै over 6.5 million members in the United States, from ages five to twenty-one, in approximately 90,000 clubs.
The goal of 4-H is to develop citizenship, leadership, responsibility and life कौशल of युवावस्था through experiential learning programs and a positive youth development approach.
Though typically thought of as an agriculturally focused organization as a result of its history, 4-H today focuses on नागरिकता, स्वस्थ जीना, विज्ञान, अभियान्त्रिकी, and technology programs.
Today, 4-H and related programs exist in over eighty countries around the world ; the organization and प्रशासन varies from country to country.
Each of these programs operates independently, but cooperatively through international exchanges, global education programs, and communications.
The 4-H motto is `` To make the best better '', while its slogan is `` Learn by doing '' ( sometimes written as `` सीख to do by doing '' ).
The national flag of Chile, consists of two unequal horizontal bands of श्वेत और रेड और a blue square the same height as the white band in the canton, which bears a white five-pointed star in the center.
it थी अपनाया on 18 अक्तूबर 1817.
The Chilean flag is also known in Spanish as La Estrella solitaria ( the लोन स्टार ).
The star represents a guide to progress और सम्मान ; ब्लू symbolizes the sky and the Pacific Ocean, white is for the snow-covered Andes, and red stands for the blood spilled to achieve independence.
According to the epic poem La Araucana, the colors were derived from those इससे the ध्वज flown by the Mapuche during the Arauco War.
`` Flag Day '' is held each year on the ninth of July to commemorate the 77 soldiers who died in the 1882 Battle of La Concepción.
Generation Y, also known as the Millennial Generation, is the demographic cohort following Generation X.
There are no precise dates लिये when Generation Y starts and ends.
Commentators use beginning birth dates from the latter 1970s, or इससे the early 1980s to the early 2000s.

According to Tacitus, Nero targeted Christians as those responsible for the आग.

Virginia ( ), officially the Commonwealth of Virginia, is a U.S. state located in the दक्षिण अटलांटिक प्रदेश of the संयुक्त राज्य.
Virginia is nicknamed the `` Old Dominion '' and the `` माँ of राष्ट्रपतियों '' बाद the eight U.S. presidents born there.
The geography and climate of the Commonwealth are shaped by the Blue Ridge Mountains and the chesapeake खाड़ी, जिससे provide habitat for much of its flora and fauna.
The capital of the राष्ट्रमंडल is Richmond ; and Virginia Beach is the most populous city.
Fairfax County is the most populous political subdivision.
The wealthiest is loudoun County.
The Commonwealth 's जनसांख्यिकी is over eight million.
The area 's history begins with several स्वदेशी groups, including the Powhatan.
In 1607 the London Company established the Colony of वर्जिनिया as the पहला permanent New World English colony.
Slave labor and the land acquired from displaced Native American tribes each played a significant role in the उपनिवेश 's जल्दी राजनीती और plantation economy.
Virginia was one of the 13 Colonies in the American Revolution and joined the confederacy in the American Civil War, during which Richmond was made the Confederate capital and Virginia 's northwestern counties seceded to form the state of West Virginia.
Although the Commonwealth was under conservative single-party rule for nearly a century following Reconstruction, both major national parties are competitive in आधुनिक Virginia.
The Virginia General Assembly is the oldest legislature in the Western Hemisphere.
The state government has been repeatedly ranked most प्रभावी by the Pew Center on the States.
It is unique in how it treats cities and counties equally, manages लोकल सड़कें, और prohibits its governors from serving consecutive terms.
Virginia 's economy has many sectors : agriculture in the Shenandoah Valley ; federal agencies in Northern Virginia, including the मुख्यालय of the विभाग of रक्षा और सीआईए ; और सैन्य सुविधाएं in Hampton Roads, the site of the region 's main seaport.
Virginia 's public schools and many colleges and universities have contributed to growing media and technology sectors.
As a परिणाम, कंप्यूटर चिप्स have become the state 's leading export.
Windows Movie Maker ( formerly known as Windows Live Movie Maker, codenamed Sundance ) is a freeware video editing तन्त्र by microsoft.
It is a part of Windows Essentials software suite and offers the ability to create and edit videos as well as to publish them on SkyDrive, Facebook, YouTube, and Flickr.
`` Brenda 's Got A Baby '' is the solo debut single by Tupac Shakur, and tenth track from उसके debut album, 2Pacalypse Now.
The song, which features R & B singer Dave Hollister, is about a twelve year-old girl named ब्रेंडा जो जीवनदान in a ghetto, रै a baby, and is incapable of supporting it.
The song explores the issue of टीन गर्भावस्था और इसके effect on the young mothers and their families.
Like many of Shakur 's songs, `` Brenda 's Got a baby '' draws इससे the दुर्दशा of the impoverished.
Using Brenda to represent young mothers in general, Shakur criticises the low level of support from the baby 's father, the government, and society in general.
Shakur wrote the song when he read a newspaper article about a twelve-year-old girl who got pregnant from her cousin and, because she किया not want her parents to know about the baby, threw it in a trash can.
The official logo of Pokémon for its international रिलीज ; `` पोकीमॉन '' is छोटी for the original Japanese title of `` Pocket Monsters ''.
is a मीडिया franchise published and owned by Japanese video game company Nintendo and created by Satoshi Tajiri in 1996.
Originally released as a pair of interlinkable Game Boy role-playing video games developed by Game Freak, Pokémon has since become the second-most successful and lucrative video game-based media franchise in the world, behind only निन्टेंडो 's own Mario franchise.
Pokémon properties have since been merchandised into anime, manga, व्यापार ताश, खिलौने, किताबे, and other media.
The franchise celebrated in 2006, and, cumulative sales of the video games ( सहित घर कंसोल संस्करण, such as the `` Pikachu '' Nintendo 64 ) have reached more than 200 million copies.
In November 2005, 4Kids Entertainment, which had managed the non-game सम्बन्धित लाइसेंसिंग of पोकीमॉन, announced that it had agreed not to renew the Pokémon representation agreement.
Pokémon USA Inc. ( now The Pokémon Company अंतरराष्ट्रीय ), a subsidiary of Japan 's Pokémon Co., now oversees all Pokémon licensing outside of Asia.
The name Pokémon is the romanized संकुचन of the Japanese brand.
The term Pokémon, in addition to referring to the Pokémon franchise itself, also collectively refers to the 649 fictional species that have made appearances in Pokémon media as of the रिलीज of the fifth generation titles Pokémon Black 2 and White 2 ; with the upcoming releases of Pokémon X and Y, 6 new Pokémon have been featured in promotions for the games.
`` Pokémon '' is identical in both the singular and बहुवचन, as is प्रत्येक व्यक्तिगत प्रजाति name ; it is grammatically correct to say `` one Pokémon '' and `` many Pokémon '', as well as `` one Pikachu `` and `` many Pikachu ''.

Dada ( ) or Dadaism was an art movement of the European avant-garde in the early 20th century.
Many claim Dada began in Zurich, Switzerland in 1916, spreading to Berlin shortly thereafter but the height of New York Dada was the साल पहले in 1915.
To quote Dona Budd 's The Language of Art Knowledge, Dada थी born आउट of negative reaction to the horrors of World War I.
This अंतरराष्ट्रीय movement was begun by a group of artist and poets associated with the Cabaret Voltaire in Zurich.
Dada rejected reason and लॉजिक, prizing nonsense, irrationality and intuition.
The origin of the name Dada is unclear ; some believe that it is a nonsensical word.
Others maintain कि it originates इससे the रोमानियाई कलाकारों ट्रिस्टन tzara and Marcel Janco 's frequent use of the words da, da, meaning yes, yes in the Romanian language.
Another theory says that the name `` Dada '' came during a meeting of the group when a paper knife stuck into a French-German dictionary happened to point to 'dada ', a फ्रेंच word for 'hobbyhorse '.
The movement primarily involved visual arts, literature, poetry, art manifestoes, art theory, theatre, and graphic design, और concentrated its anti-war politics through a rejection of the prevailing standards in art through anti-art cultural works.
In addition to being anti-war, Dada was also anti- बुर्जुआ और था political affinities with the radical left.
Dada activities included public gatherings, demonstrations, and publication of art/literary journals ; passionate coverage of art, politics, and culture were topics often discussed in a variety of media.
Key figures in the movement included Hugo Ball, Emmy Hennings, Hans Arp, Raoul Hausmann, Hannah Höch, Johannes Baader, Tristan Tzara, Francis Picabia, Richard Huelsenbeck, Georg Grosz, John Heartfield, Marcel Duchamp, Beatrice Wood, Kurt Schwitters, and hans Richter, among others.
the गति बहकावे बाद शैलियाँ जैसे the avant-garde और शहर म्यूज़िक आंदोलनों, और समूह सहित surrealism, देवानंद réalisme, पॉप आर्ट और fluxus.
Dada is the groundwork to abstract art and sound poetry, a starting point for performance art, a prelude to postmodernism, an influence on pop art, a celebration of antiart to be later embraced for anarcho-political uses in the 1960s and the movement that lay the foundation for Surrealism.
First trophic level.
The plants in this image, and the algae and phytoplankton in the lake, are primary producers.
They take nutrients from the soil or the water, and manufacture उनके अपना food by photosynthesis, using energy from the sun.
The trophic स्तर of an organism is the position it occupies in a food chain.
The word trophic derives from the Greek τροφή ( trophē ) referring to food or feeding.
A food chain represents a succession of organisms that eat another organism and are, in फेरे, खाया themselves.
The number of steps an organism is from the start of the chain is a measure of इसके trophic स्तर.
Food chains start at trophic level 1 with primary producers such as plants, move to herbivores at level 2, predators at level 3 and typically finish with carnivores or apex predators at level 4 or 5.
The path along the chain can form either a one-way flow, or a food `` web. ''
Ecological communities with higher biodiversity form more जटिल trophic paths.
Four of the most important domesticated रेशा शलभ.
Top to bottom : Bombyx mori, Hyalophora cecropia, antheraea pernyi, Samia cynthia.
From Meyers Konversations-Lexikon ( 1885-1892 )
A silk-producing raspy क्रिकेट.
Silk is a natural protein fibre, some forms of जिससे can be woven into textiles.
The protein fibre of silk is composed मुख्यतः of fibroin और उत्पादित by certain insect larvae to form cocoons.
The best-known type of silk is obtained इससे the cocoons of the लार्वे of the शहतूत silkworm Bombyx mori reared in captivity ( sericulture ).
The shimmering रूप of silk is due to the triangular prism -like structure of the silk fibre, which allows silk cloth to refract incoming light at different angles, thus producing different colors.
Silks are produced by several other insects, but generally only the silk of moth caterpillars has been used for textile निर्माण.
There has been कुछ research into other silks, which differ at the molecular level.
Many silks are mainly produced by the larvae of insects undergoing complete metamorphosis, but some adult insects such as webspinners produce silk, and some insects such as raspy झींगुर उपज silk throughout their lives.
Silk production also occurs in Hymenoptera ( bees, wasps, and ants ), silverfish, mayflies, thrips, leafhoppers, भृंग, lacewings, fleas, flies and midges.
Other प्रकार of सन्धिपाद उपज रेशा, most notably various arachnids such as spiders ( see spider silk ).
Late Show with David Letterman is an American late-night talk show hosted by David लेटरमैन on सीबीएस.
The show debuted on August 30, 1993, and is produced by Letterman 's उत्पादन company, Worldwide Pants Incorporated.
The show 's music director and band-leader of the हाउस band, the CBS Orchestra, is Paul Shaffer.
The head writer is Matt Roberts और the उद्घोषक is Alan Kalter.
Of the major U.S. late-night programs, Late दिखाएँ बाँधने दूसरी in संचयी average viewers over time and third in number of episodes over time.
The show लीड other late night shows in ad revenue with $ 271 million in 2009.
In most U.S. markets the show airs at 11:35 p.m. eastern/pacific समय, लकिन is अंकित Monday through Wednesday at 4:30 p.m., and Thursdays at 3:30 p.m and 6:00 p.m.
The second Thursday एपीसोड प्रायः airs on Friday of that week.
In 2002, Late Show with David Letterman was ranked No. 7 on TV Guide 's 50 महानतम tv shows of सब Time.
CBS has a contract with Worldwide Pants to continue the show through 2014 ; by then, Letterman will surpass Johnny Carson as the longest tenured late-night talk show host.
The Real Housewives of Orange County is an American reality documentary television program on Bravo, set in Orange County, California.
It was the first the Real Housewives program in the series.
The series is a voyeuristic look into the wealthy जीवनदान of ये housewives, as वे shop, get plastic surgery, gossip, fight and live lavishly.
The financial crisis, the beginning of which coincided almost exactly with the first season 's broadcast, has since trimmed the housewives ' lifestyles with job losses, evictions, mortgage defaults, foreclosures, and marital stress—all अंकित in प्रगतिशील सीज़न of the show.
cyberstalking is the use of the Internet or other electronic means to stalk or harass an individual, a group of individuals, or an organization.
It may include the बनाना of गलत आरोपों or statements of fact ( as in defamation ), monitoring, making threats, identity theft, damage to data or equipment, the solicitation of minors for sex, or gathering information that may be used to harass.
The definition of `` harassment '' must meet the criterion that a reasonable person, in possession of the same information, would लिहाज़ it as sufficient to cause another reasonable person distress.
Cyberstalking is different from spatial or offline stalking in that it occurs through the उपयोग of इलेक्ट्रॉनिक संचार प्रौद्योगिकी such as the internet.
however, it sometimes leads to it, or is accompanied by it.
Both are criminal offenses.
Cyberstalking shares important characteristics with offline stalking.
Many stalkers – ऑनलाइन or बंद – हैं प्रेरित by a desire to control their victims.
A cyberstalker may be an ऑनलाइन stranger or a person whom the target knows.
A cyberstalker may be anonymous and may solicit involvement of other people online who do not even know the target.
Cyberstalking is a criminal offense that comes into play under state anti-stalking कानून, बदनामी कानून, and harassment laws.
A cyberstalking conviction can परिणाम in a restraining अनुक्रम, probation, or even criminal penalties against the assailant, including jail.
A business letter is usually used when writing from one company to another, or लिये पत्राचार between such organizations and their customers, clients and other external parties.
The overall style of letter will depend on the संबंध between the parties concerned.
There are many कारण to लिखें a business letter.
It could be to request direct information or action from another party, to order supplies from a supplier, to identify a mistake that was committed, to reply directly to a request, to apologize for a wrong or simply to convey goodwill.
Even today, the business letter is still very useful because it produces a स्थाई record, is confidential, formal and delivers persuasive, well-considered messages.
Tilapia ( ) is the common name for nearly a hundred species of cichlid fish from the tilapiine cichlid tribe.
Tilapia are mainly freshwater fish, inhabiting shallow स्ट्रीम, तालाबों, rivers and lakes, and less commonly found living in brackish water.
Historically, they have been of major importance in artisan fishing in Africa and the Levant, and are of increasing importance in aquaculture.
Tilapia can become problematic invasive species in new warm-water habitats, whether deliberately or accidentally introduced, लकिन generally not in temperate climates due to their inability to survive in cooler waters below about.
Turner & Hooch is a 1989 comedy drama crime film starring Tom Hanks and Beasley the Dog as the eponymous characters, Turner और hooch क्रमशः.
The film also stars Mare Winningham, Craig T. नेल्सन, and Reginald VelJohnson.

Adolf Hitler ( ; 20 April 1889 – 30 April 1945 ) was an Austrian -born जर्मनी राजनेता और the leader of the Nazi Party ( ( NSDAP ) ; National Socialist German Workers Party ).
He was chancellor of Germany from 1933 to 1945 and dictator of Nazi Germany ( as Führer und Reichskanzler ) from 1934 to 1945.
Hitler was at the centre of Nazi Germany, World युद्ध II in Europe, and the Holocaust.
हिटलर थी a decorated veteran of World War I.
He joined the German Workers ' Party ( precursor of the NSDAP ) in 1919, and became leader of the NSDAP in 1921.
In 1923, he attempted a तख्तापलट d'état in म्यूनिख, ज्ञात as the Beer Hall Putsch.
the विफल तख्तापलट resulted in Hitler 's imprisonment, during which time he wrote his memoir, Mein Kampf ( My Struggle ).
After his release in 1924, Hitler gained popular support by attacking the Treaty of Versailles and promoting Pan-Germanism, antisemitism, और anti-communism साथ charismatic छाये और Nazi propaganda.
After his appointment as chancellor in 1933, he रूपांतरित the वाइमर Republic into the Third Reich, a single-party dictatorship based on the totalitarian and autocratic ideology of Nazism.
Hitler 's aim was to establish a New Order of absolute Nazi German hegemony in महाद्वीपीय यूरोपीय.
To this end, his foreign and domestic policies had the aim of seizing Lebensraum ( `` जीना स्पेस '' ) for the Germanic people.
He निर्देशित the rearmament of Germany and the invasion of Poland by the Wehrmacht in September 1939, resulting in the outbreak of World War II in Europe.
Under Hitler 's rule, in 1941 German forces and their European allies occupied सबसे of Europe and North Africa.
In 1943, Germany had been forced onto the defensive and suffered a श्रेणी of escalating defeats.
In the final days of the war, during the Battle of Berlin in 1945, हिटलर शादीशुदा उसके long-time partner, Eva Braun.
On 30 April 1945, less than two days later, the two committed suicide to avoid capture by the Red Army, और उनके शवों यहूद burned.
Hitler 's aggressive foreign policy is considered the प्रमुख कारण of the outbreak of World War II in Europe.
His antisemitic policies and racially प्रेरित विचारधारा resulted in the deaths of at least 5.5 million Jews, and millions of other people deemed racially inferior.

A domain name is an identification string that defines a फ्रेम of प्रशासनिक autonomy, authority, or control on the Internet.
Domain names are formed by the नियम और procedures of the Domain Name System ( DNS ).
Technically, any name registered in the डीएनएस is a domain name.
Domain names हैं प्रयुक्त in विभिन्न networking contexts and application-specific naming and addressing purposes.
In general, a domain name represents an Internet Protocol ( IP ) resource, such as a personal computer used to access the अंतरजाल, a सर्वर कंप्यूटर होस्टिंग a वेब साईट, or the web site itself or any other service communicated via the Internet.
Domain names are organized in अधीनस्थ स्तर ( subdomains ) of the DNS root domain, which is nameless.
The first-level नियत of डोमेन names हैं the top-level domains ( TLDs ), including the generic top-level domains ( gTLDs ), such as the prominent domains com, info, net and org, and the country code top-level domains ( ccTLDs ).
Below these top-level domains in the DNS hierarchy are the second-level and third-level domain names that are typically open for reservation by end-users who wish to connect local area networks to the अंतरजाल, बनाएँ अन्य सरेआम accessible Internet resources or run web sites.
The पंजीकरण of ये डोमेन names is usually administered by domain name registrars who sell their services to the public.
A fully qualified domain name ( FQDN ) is a domain name that is completely specified in the hierarchy of the डीएनएस, having no omitted parts.
डोमेन names हैं प्रायः लिखा in lowercase, although labels in the Domain Name System are case-insensitive.
Nitrate is a polyatomic ion with the molecular formula NO3− and a molecular mass of 62.0049 g/mol. Nitrates also describe the सशुल्क कार्यात्मक group RONO2.
These nitrate esters हैं a specialized class of explosives.

Agriculture is a major industry in the United States and the country is a जाल निर्यातक of food.
As of the last census of agriculture in 2007, वहीँ यहूद 2.2 लाख farms, covering an area of, an average of per farm.
Although agricultural activity occurs in most states, it is विशेषकर concentrated in the विशाल expanse of चपटा, arable land known as the Great Plains, which encompasses the central region of the nation.
The Mpemba effect, named after Tanzanian student Erasto Mpemba, is the assertion that warmer जल can freeze faster than colder water.
Although there is anecdotal support लिये the प्रभाव, there is no agreement on exactly what the effect is and under what circumstances it occurs.
There have been reports of similar phenomena since ancient times, although with insufficient detail for the claims to be replicated.
The phenomenon seems contrary to ऊष्मागतिकी, लकिन a number of possible explanations for the effect have been proposed.
Further investigations will need to decide on a precise परिभाषा of `` जमने '' और कंट्रोल a विशाल क्रमांक of starting parameters in order to confirm or explain the effect.
the siamese (, ) is one of the first distinctly recognized breeds of Oriental cat.
The breed originated in Thailand ( formerly known as Siam ), where they are one of several native breeds and are called Wichian Mat ( วิเชียรมาศ, a name meaning `` moon diamond '' ).
In the 20th century the Siamese cat became एक of the most popular breeds in Europe and North America.

In economics, the money supply or धन भण्डार, is the total amount of monetary assets available in an economy at a specific time.
There are several ways to define `` money, '' but standard measures usually include currency in circulation and demand deposits ( जमाकर्ताओं ' easily accessed assets on the books of financial institutions ).
Money सप्लाई data are recorded and published, usually by the government or the central bank of the country.
Public and private sector analysts have long monitored changes in money supply because of its प्रभाव on the दाम स्तर, महंगाई, the exchange rate and the business cycle.
That relation between money and कीमतें is historically संबद्ध साथ the quantity theory of money.
There is strong empirical evidence of a direct relation between money-supply growth और long-term दाम महंगाई, at least for rapid increases in the amount of money in the economy.
That is, a country such as Zimbabwe which saw rapid increases in its money supply also saw rapid increases in prices ( hyperinflation ).
This is one reason for the reliance on monetary policy as a अर्थात् of controlling inflation.
The nature of this causal कड़ी is the subject of contention.
Some heterodox economists argue कि the धन सप्लाई is endogenous ( determined by the workings of the economy, not by the central bank ) and that the sources of inflation must be found in the distributional structure of the economy.
In addition, those economists seeing the central bank 's कंट्रोल over the money supply as feeble say that there are two weak links between the growth of the money supply and the inflation rate.
First, in the aftermath of a recession, when many resources हैं underutilized, an बढ़ाएँ in the money supply can cause a sustained increase in real production instead of inflation.
Second, if the velocity of money, i.e., the ratio between nominal GDP and money supply, परिवर्तन, an बढ़ाएँ in the धन सप्लाई could have either no प्रभाव, an exaggerated effect, or an unpredictable effect on the growth of nominal GDP.

IMAX ( an abbreviation for Image Maximum ) is a motion picture film format and a set of cinema प्रक्षेप standards created by the Canadian company IMAX Corporation.
IMAX has the capacity to record and display images of far greater size and resolution than conventional फिल्मी प्रणालियों.
Since 2002, कुछ विशेषता films have been converted ( or upgraded ) into IMAX format for display in IMAX theatres and some have also been partially shot in IMAX.
IMAX is the most widely used system for special-venue film presentations.
, there are 697 IMAX theatres in 52 countries.

It also ran on Nickelodeon and the Faith and Values Channel/Odyssey ( now the Hallmark Channel ) as खूब as many PBS stations throughout the United States.
It was set in a department स्टोर, आधारित on the फ्लैगशिप location of the now defunct Simpson 's in Toronto.
Many sequences लिये it यहूद शॉट at the Queen Street West and Yonge Street store after hours.
संविधानवाद, in इसके सबसे सामान्य अर्थ, is `` a जटिल of विचार, attitudes, और पैटर्न of बर्ताव elaborating the principle कि the प्राधिकार of सरकारी गर्भाशयी इससे और is सीमित by a देह of आधारभूत विधि ''.
A political organization is संवैधानिक to the extent that it `` contain [ s ] institutionalized mechanisms of power control for the protection of the interests and liberties of the citizenry, including those that may be in the minority ``.
As described by political scientist and constitutional scholar David Fellman :
An ice-cream headache, also known as brain freeze, cold-stimulus headache, or its given scientific name sphenopalatine ganglioneuralgia ( meaning `` nerve pain of the sphenopalatine ganglion `` ), is a form of brief cranial pain or headache commonly संबद्ध साथ खपत ( विशेषकर जल्दी खपत ) of ठंडा beverages or foods such as ice cream and ice pops.
It is caused by having something cold touch the roof of the mouth ( palate ), and is believed to result from a nerve response causing rapid constriction and swelling of रक्त बरतन or a `` referring `` of pain from the roof of the mouth to the head.
The rate of intake for cold foods has महरूम पढ़ाई as a contributing factor.
There are people who can not अनुभव `` brain freeze '' or similar symptoms.
The term ice-cream headache has been in use since at least 31 जनवरी 1937, contained in a जर्नल प्रविष्टि by रेबेका Timbres published in the 1939 book We did n't ask Utopia : a Quaker family in Soviet Russia.
The first published use of the term brain freeze, as it pertains to cold-induced headaches, थी on 27 May 1991.
`` Auld Lang Syne '' ( : नोट `` s '' बल्कि than `` z '' ) is a Scots poem written by Robert Burns in 1788 and set to the tune of a traditional folk song ( Roud # 6294 ).
It is well known in many countries, especially in the English-speaking world ; its परंपरागत use being to celebrate the start of the New Year at the stroke of midnight.
By extension, it is also sung at funerals, graduations और as a farewell or ending to other occasions.
The international Boy Scout youth movement, in many countries, उपयोग it as a close to jamborees and other functions.
The song 's Scots title may be अनूदित into अंग्रेज़ी वस्तुतः as `` बूढ़ा long चूंकि '', or more idiomatically, `` long long ago '', `` days gone by '' or `` old times ''.
Consequently `` For auld lang syne '', as it appears in the first line of the chorus, might be loosely अनूदित as `` for ( the sake of ) old times ''.
The phrase `` Auld Lang Syne '' is also used in similar poems by Robert Ayton ( 1570–1638 ), allan ramsay ( 1686–1757 ), and James Watson ( 1711 ) as well as older folk songs predating Burns.
Matthew Fitt uses the phrase `` In the days of auld lang syne '' as the समतुल्य of `` Once upon a time...
`` in his retelling of fairy tales in the Scots language.

leeroy Jenkins, sometimes misspelled Leroy Jenkins and often elongated with numerous additional letters, is an Internet meme named for a player character created by Ben Schulz in Blizzard Entertainment 's MMORPG, World of Warcraft.
The character became popular due to a वीडियो of the खेल that circulated around the Internet.
The phenomenon has since spread beyond the boundaries of the गेमिंग जातियाँ into other online and mainstream media.
Oscar Grant was fatally shot by BART police officer Johannes Mehserle in Oakland, California, United States, in the early morning hours of New Year 's Day 2009.
Responding to reports of a fight on a crowded Bay Area Rapid Transit train returning from San Francisco, BART Police officers detained Oscar Grant and several other passengers on the platform at the fruitvale BART Station.
Officer Johannes Mehserle and another अधिकारी यहूद restraining Grant, who was prostrate and allegedly resisting arrest.
Officer Mehserle stood and, according to witnesses, said : `` Get back, I 'm gon na tase him. ''
Then Mehserle drew his gun and shot Grant once in the back ; mehserle appeared stunned, put his hands to his head and exclaimed, `` Oh, my God ! ''
दौरान उसके अदालत testimony, Mehserle said that Grant then exclaimed, `` You shot me ! ''
Grant turned out to be unarmed ; he was pronounced dead the next morning at highland Hospital in Oakland.
The events were captured on अनेक digital video and cell phone cameras.
The footage was disseminated to मीडिया outlets and to various websites, where it was watched millions of times.
The following days saw both peaceful and हिंसक विरोध.
The shooting has been variously labeled an involuntary manslaughter and a summary execution.
On January 13, Alameda County prosecutors चार्ज mehserle with murder for the shooting.
He resigned उसके स्थिति और pleaded not guilty.
The विचारण began on June 10, 2010.
Michael Rains, Mehserle 's criminal defense attorney, argued that Mehserle mistakenly shot Grant with his pistol, intending to use his Taser when he saw ग्रान्ट reaching लिये उसके waistband.
Pretrial filings argue that his client did not commit first-degree murder and asked a Los Angeles judge to instruct the jury to limit its deliberations to either second-degree murder or acquittal.
Oakland civil rights attorney John Burris filed a $ 25 million wrongful death claim against BART on behalf of Grant 's family.
On July 8, 2010, the jury returned its verdict : Mehserle was found अपराधी of involuntary manslaughter और नहीं अपराधी of second-degree murder and voluntary manslaughter.
Initial protests against the ruling were शांतिपूर्वक व्यवस्थित ; looting, arson, destruction of property, and small riots broke out after dark.
Nearly 80 people were आखिरकार arrested.
On Friday, July 9, 2010, the U.S. Justice Department opened a civil rights case against Mehserle ; the federal government can prosecute उसे independently for the same act under the separate sovereigns exception to double jeopardy.
The Department of Justice will be working with the U.S. Attorney 's दफ्तर in San Francisco and the FBI.
On November 5, 2010, Mehserle was sentenced to two सालो, ऋण time served.
He served his time in the Los Angeles County Jail, occupying a private कोशिका away from other prisoners.
He was released on June 13, 2011 और is अभी on parole.
Major प्रतिनिधि of the Harlem Renaissance.
The हार्लेम पुनर्जागरण was a cultural movement that spanned the 1920s.
At the time, it was known as the `` New Negro Movement '', named after the 1925 anthology by Alain Locke.
Though it was centered in the Harlem neighborhood of New York City, अनेक french-speaking ब्लैक writers from African and Caribbean colonies who lived in Paris were also influenced by the Harlem Renaissance.
The Harlem Renaissance is unofficially recognized to have spanned इससे परिचय 1919 जबतक the जल्दी or mid-1930s.
Many of its ideas lived on much longer.
The zenith of this `` flowering of Negro literature '', as James Weldon Johnson preferred to call the Harlem Renaissance, was placed between 1924 ( the year that Opportunity : A Journal of Negro Life hosted a party for black writers where many white publishers were in attendance ) and 1929 ( the year of the stock market crash and the beginning of the Great Depression ).

The history of Africa begins with the prehistory of Africa and the emergence of Homo sapiens in East Africa, continuing into the उपस्थित as a patchwork of diverse and politically developing nation states.
Some early प्रमाण of कृषि in Africa dates from 16,000 BCE, and metallurgy from about 4000 BCE.
The recorded history of early civilization arose in Egypt, and बाद in नुबिया, the मग़रिब और the सींग of अफ़्रीकी.
During the Middle Ages, Islam स्प्रेड through the regions.
Crossing the Maghreb and the Sahel, a major बीच of मुस्लिम संस्कृति was Timbuktu.
Some notable pre-colonial states and societies in Africa include the Nok culture, Mali Empire, Ashanti Empire, Kingdom of Mapungubwe, Kingdom of Sine, Kingdom of Saloum, Kingdom of Baol, Kingdom of ज़िम्बाब्वे, Kingdom of Kongo, Ancient Carthage, Numidia, Mauretania, the Aksumite Empire, the Ajuuraan State and the Adal Sultanate.
From the late 15th century, Europeans and Arabs took slaves from वेस्ट, सेंट्रल और southeast Africa overseas in the African slave trade.
European colonization of Africa developed rapidly in the हाथापाई लिये Africa of the late 19th and early 20th centuries.
following struggles लिये स्वतंत्रता in अनेक भाग of the continent, as well as a weakened Europe after the Second World War ; decolonization took place.
Africa 's history रै महरूम चुनौतीपूर्ण लिये शोधकर्ताओं in the फ़ील्ड of African studies because of the scarcity of written sources in large parts of sub-Saharan Africa.
Scholarly techniques such as the recording of oral history, historical linguistics, पुरातत्व और आनुवंशिकी have been crucial.
Curry Foley was the first player in Major League Baseball history to hit for the cycle.
In baseball, hitting for the cycle is the accomplishment of one batter hitting a सिंगल, a दोगुना, a ट्रिपल, और a घर चलाएं in the same game.
collecting the hits in that order is known as a `` natural cycle ''.
Cycles are uncommon in Major League Baseball ( MLB ), and have occurred 294 टाइम्स since the first by Curry Foley in 1882.
The cycle is roughly as common as a no-hitter ( 279 occurrences in एमएलबी इतिहास ) ; it रै been called `` one of the rarest '' and `` most difficult feats '' in baseball.
Based on 2009 offensive levels, the probability of an average MLB player hitting for a cycle against an average team in a game is approximately 0.00590 % ; this corresponds to परिचय 2.5 चक्र in a 162-game season with 30 teams.
In अन्य बेसबॉल leagues, the cycle is achieved less frequently.
Through September 4, 2008, 62 players in Nippon Professional Baseball ( NPB ), the top-level baseball organization in Japan, have hit for the cycle, the most recent being Michihiro Ogasawara.
Two players have hit लिये the साईकिल on the same day once in NPB history ; this has occurred twice in MLB history.
One NPB player has also hit for the cycle in an npb all-star game.
No player has ever hit for the cycle in the MLB All-Star Game or the postseason.
The प्रमुख स्लेव routes in medieval Africa.
This article discusses systems, history, and effects of गुलामी भीतर अफ़्रीकी.
See Arab slave trade, अटलांटिक स्लेव व्यापार, Maafa, and Slavery in contemporary Africa for other discussions.
`` स्लेव हस्तांतरण in Africa ''.
Europeans usually did not enter the आंतरिक regions.
Slavery in Africa has existed throughout the continent for many centuries, and continues in the वर्तमान दिन.
Systems of servitude and slavery were common in many parts of the continent, as they were in much of the प्राचीन संसार.
In most अफ़्रीकी समाजों जहाँ slavery was prevalent, the enslaved people were largely treated as indentured servants and not treated as chattel slaves.
When the Arab slave trade and Atlantic slave trade began, many of the local slave प्रणालियों बदला और began supplying captives for slave markets outside of Africa.
गुलामी in ऐतिहासिक अफ़्रीकी थी practiced in अनेक अलग फ़ॉर्म और कुछ of ये do नहीं clearly अनुरूप the परिभाषाएं of गुलामी elsewhere in the संसार.
Debt slavery, enslavement of युद्ध captives, सैन्य slavery, and criminal slavery were all practiced in various parts of Africa.
Although there had been some trans-Saharan trade from the interior of Sub-Saharan Africa to other regions, slavery was a small भाग of the economic life of many societies in Africa until the introduction of transcontinental slave trades ( Arab and Atlantic ).
Slave practices were again transformed with European colonization of Africa and the औपचारिक abolition of गुलामी in the early 1900s.
Windows Task Manager is a task manager or System monitor application included with the Microsoft Windows NT family of operating systems that provides limited information about computer performance and running applications, processes and CPU उपयोग, कमिट चार्ज और मेमोरी सूचना, संजाल कार्यकलाप और आंकडे, logged-in उपयोक्ता, और प्रणाली services ( and as often is the case with software tools provided by Microsoft for Windows, 3rd party software is available which fills the requirements more thoroughly, e.g, `` Process Explorer '', `` Extended Task Manager '', `` Anvir Task Manager '', `` Process Hacker '', and `` System Explorer '' ).
The Task Manager can also be प्रयुक्त to नियत प्रक्रम प्राथमिकताएं, processor affinity, forcibly terminate processes, and shut down, restart, hibernate or log off from Windows.
Windows Task Manager was introduced with खिड़कियाँ nt 4.0.
Previous versions of Windows NT included the Task List application, which had far fewer features.
the कार्य सूची was capable of listing currently running processes and killing them, or creating a new process.
In Windows xp तभी, a shutdown मेनू is also present that allows access to Standby, Hibernate, Turn off, Restart, Log Off and Switch User.
Earlier versions of Microsoft Windows ( Microsoft Windows 3.x, Windows 95, Windows 98 ) had a program ज्ञात as कार्य to display the programs currently running.
This file was executed by कार्यशील the taskman.exe file from the C : \Windows directory.
