Sanuk, a division of Deckers Outdoor Corporation, is a जूते ब्रांड आधारित in Southern California.
Sanuk, the Thai word for fun, was संस्थापित by दक्षिणी California native Jeff Kelley when he started making sandals out of indoor-outdoor carpet.
The first product created was green carpeted and entitled the `` फर रियल '' बाद एक दूकान मालिक पूछा if the विलक्षणता sandal was `` For Real. ''
The Fur Real first became a runaway hit through boutique stores and not the intended surf shops.
The novelty act was followed up by a sandal wrapped in wire mesh, a तेंदुआ छपाई संस्करण, and styles made out of a poncho material in a variety of colors.
Sanuk has grown to include style options for men, women and youth and is distributed across the United States and in over 50 देशों throughout यूरोपीय, एशिया, दक्षिण America and Australia.
Sanuk centers itself around a positive lifestyle advocating the slogan, `` Smile, pass it on ! ``.
In computer science, array programming languages ( also ज्ञात as वेक्टर or multidimensional languages ) generalize operations on scalars to apply transparently to vectors, matrices, and higher dimensional arrays.
Array programming primitives concisely एक्स्प्रेस broad ideas about data manipulation.
The level of conciseness can be dramatic in certain cases : it is not uncommon to find array programming language one-liners that require more than a couple of pages of जावा code.
APL, designed by Ken Iverson, was the first programming भाषा to provide सरणी programming capabilities.
The mnemonic APL refers to the title of his seminal book `` A Programming Language '' and not to arrays per se. Iverson 's contribution to rigor and clarity was संभवतः अधिक महत्वपूर्ण than the simple extension of dimensions to functions.
In the United States an annuity contract is created when an insured party, usually an individual, pays a life insurance company a सिंगल प्रीमियम कि will later be distributed back to the insured party over time.
Annuity contracts traditionally provide a guaranteed distribution of income over time, such as via fixed payments, until the death of the person or persons named in the contract or until a final date, whichever comes पहला.
However, the majority of modern annuity customers use annuities only to accumulate funds free of income and capital gains taxes and to later take lump-sum withdrawals without using the guaranteed-income-for-life feature.
President Barack ओबामा.
Barack Obama with his first Supreme Court nominee, Sonia Sotomayor.
Following is a list of सब संयुक्त राज्य संघीय न्यायाधीशों appointed by President Barack Obama during his presidency.
As of April 30, 2013, 187 Obama nominees to Article III judgeships have been confirmed by the United States Senate, namely two Justices to the Supreme Court of the United States, 35 न्यायाधीशों to the संयुक्त राज्य न्यायालयों of appeals and 150 judges to the United States district courts.
25 further nominations are currently awaiting सीनेट action.
There are currently 16 vacancies on the संयुक्त राज्य न्यायालयों of appeals, 67 vacancies on the United States district courts and 22 additional federal judiciary vacancies that are anticipated to occur before the end of Obama 's second term.
Obama has not made any recess appointments to the संघीय न्यायालयों.
Obama has बना दो nominations to the United States Court of International Trade, an Article III tribunal.
Obama also designated sitting judge Emily C. Hewitt of the संयुक्त राज्य अदालत of संघीय दावा, an Article I court, to be Chief Judge of that court.

Agency debt also known as an एजेंसी बंध is a security, usually a bond, issued by a U.S. government-sponsored agency.
The offerings of these agencies are backed but not guaranteed by the US government since the agencies हैं निजी entities.
Some prominent issuers of these securities are Student Loan Marketing Association ( Sallie Mae ), Federal National Mortgage Association ( Fannie Mae ) and Federal Home ऋण बंधक निगम ( Freddie Mac ).
Agency securities are प्रायः exempt इससे राज्य और लोकल taxes, but not federal tax.
Agency debt is also called an agency security.
The Susquehanna Steam Electric Station, a खौलते water reactor.
The reactors are located inside the आयताकार containment buildings towards the front of the cooling towers.

Crew members are spelling out आइंस्टीन 's mass-energy equivalence formula E = mc2 on the flight deck.

Nuclear power is the use of sustained nuclear परिवर्द्धन to generate heat and electricity.
Nuclear power plants provided about 5.7 % of the world 's उर्जा और 13 % of the संसार 's electricity, in 2012.
In 2013, the IAEA report that there are 437 operational nuclear power reactors ( although not all हैं producing electricity ), in 31 countries.
In addition, there are approximately 140 naval vessels using नाभिकीय नोदन in operation, powered by some 180 reactors.
There is an ongoing debate about the उपयोग of नाभिकीय energy.
Proponents, such as the World Nuclear Association, the IAEA and Environmentalists for Nuclear Energy contend that nuclear power is a sustainable energy source that reduces carbon emissions.
Opponents, such as Greenpeace International and NIRS, believe that nuclear power poses many threats to people and the environment.
Nuclear power plant accidents include the chernobyl विपत्ति ( 1986 ), Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster ( 2011 ), and the Three Mile Island accident ( 1979 ).
There have also been some nuclear-powered पनडुब्बी mishaps.
Research into safety improvements is continuing and nuclear fusion, believed to be safer, may be प्रयुक्त in the भविष्य.
As of 2012, according to the IAEA, worldwide there were 68 civil nuclear power reactors under निर्माण in 15 देशों.
In the US the licenses of almost half its reactors have महरूम extended to 60 years, and plans to build another dozen are under serious consideration.
However, Japan 's 2011 Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster prompted a rethink of नाभिकीय उर्जा नीति in many countries.
Germany decided to बंद all its reactors by 2022, and Italy has banned nuclear power.
Following Fukushima, the International Energy Agency halved its estimate of additional nuclear generating capacity to be निर्मित by 2035.
फोटोग्राफ of the बर्लिन Wall taken from the West side.
The Wall was built in 1961 to prevent East Germans from fleeing from Communism.
It was an iconic प्रतीक of the Cold War and its fall in 1989 marked the end of the War.
The Cold War, often dated from 1947 to 1991, was a sustained state of political and military tension between powers in the Western Bloc, dominated by the United States with NATO among its allies, and powers in the Eastern Bloc, वर्चस्व by the सोवियत Union along with the Warsaw Pact.
This began after the success of their temporary wartime alliance against Nazi Germany, leaving the USSR and the us as two superpowers with profound economic and political differences.
A neutral faction arose with the Non-Aligned Movement founded by Egypt, India, and Yugoslavia ; this faction rejected association with either the US-led West or the Soviet-led East.
The Cold War was so named because the two major powers—each possessing nuclear weapons and thereby threatened with mutual assured destruction —never met in direct military combat.
Instead, in their struggle for global influence they engaged in ongoing psychological warfare and in regular indirect confrontations through प्रॉक्सी wars.
Cycles of relative calm would be followed by high tension, which could have led to world war.
The tensest times were during the Berlin Blockade ( 1948–1949 ), the Korean War ( 1950–1953 ), the Suez Crisis ( 1956 ), the Berlin Crisis of 1961, the Cuban missile crisis ( 1962 ), the Vietnam युद्ध ( 1959–1975 ), the योम kippur युद्ध ( 1973 ), the सोवियत युद्ध in अफगानिस्तान ( 1979–1989 ), the Soviet downing of Korean Air Lines Flight 007 ( 1983 ), and the `` Able Archer '' NATO military exercises ( 1983 ).
The conflict was expressed through military coalitions, strategic conventional force deployments, extensive aid to client states, espionage, विशाल प्रचार अभियान, conventional और nuclear arms races, appeals to neutral nations, rivalry at sports events ( in particular the Olympics ), and technological competitions such as the Space Race.
the us और ussr became involved in political and military conflicts in the Third World countries of Latin America, Africa, the Middle East, and Southeast Asia.
To alleviate the risk of a potential nuclear war, both sides sought relief of political tensions through détente in the 1970s.
In the 1980s, the United States increased diplomatic, military, and economic pressures on the Soviet Union, at a time when the कम्युनिस्ट राज्य थी already कष्ट from economic stagnation.
In the mid-1980s, the new Soviet President Mikhail Gorbachev introduced the liberalizing reforms of perestroika ( `` reorganization '', 1987 ) and glasnost ( `` openness '', ca. 1985 ).
Pressures for national स्वतंत्रता grew stronger in Eastern Europe, especially Poland.
They reached a breaking point when Gorbachev refused to use Soviet troops to support the faltering government of East Germany in late 1989.
Within weeks all the satellite states broke free from Moscow in a peaceful wave of revolutions ( there was some violence in Romania ).
The pressures escalated inside the Soviet Union, where Communism fell and the USSR was formally dissolved in late 1991.
The United States remained as the world 's तभी महाशक्ति.
The Cold War and its events have left a significant legacy, and it is often referred to in popular संस्कृति, विशेषकर in मीडिया featuring themes of espionage and the threat of nuclear warfare.
Pikes Peak State Park is a state पार्क of आयोवा, यूएसए, featuring a bluff overlooking the Upper Mississippi River opposite the confluence of the Wisconsin River.
The park is operated by the आयोवा विभाग of Natural Resources.
It is nearly a thousand acres ( 4 km2 ) in extent.
The निकटतम city is McGregor, Iowa.
Iowa Highway 76 लगभग defines इसके उत्तरी boundary.
It gets its name from the Iowa incarnation of Pikes Peak, a particularly high point overlooking the gorge of the Upper मिसिसिपी, और जैसे Pikes Peak in Colorado, is named for Zebulon Pike.
वहीँ हैं चढ़ाई trails, campgrounds and RV facilities.
Mountain bikes are permitted in निश्चित portions of the park.
Aside from recreational development, the land in the park थी never cleared and to a large extent remains as it was before the advent of white settlement.
It is part of a larger complex of parks, reserves and refuges which include Effigy Mounds नेशनल स्मारक, the विभिन्न components of the पीला नदी राज्य Forest, the enormous Upper Mississippi River National Wildlife and Fish Refuge and much smaller, much less well known Driftless Area National Wildlife Refuge.
The Northeast Iowa Legacy Trail System is undergoing विकास, और होगा कनेक्ट elements of these sites.
Zac Brown Band is an American country/folk band based in अटलांटा, Georgia.
The lineup consists of Zac Brown ( lead vocals, guitar ), Jimmy De Martini ( fiddle, vocals ), John Driskell Hopkins ( bass guitar, vocals ), Coy Bowles ( guitar, keyboards ), क्रिस fryar ( ड्रम ), मिट्टी कुक ( गिटार, keyboards, mandolin, steel guitar, vocals ), and Daniel de los Reyes ( percussion ).
The band has toured throughout the संयुक्त राज्य, including a slot on the 2009 and 2010 Bonnaroo Music Festival.
They have also recorded five studio albums, and charted nine Number One singles on the Billboard country charts : `` Chicken Fried ``, `` Toes ``, `` Highway 20 Ride ``, `` Free ``, `` As She 's Walking Away ``, `` Colder Weather ``, `` Knee Deep ``, `` Keep Me In Mind ``, and `` Goodbye in Her Eyes `` in जोड to the singles `` whatever it is `` और `` no hurry ``, जिससे peaked at number 2 on the same chart.
Talk radio is a radio format containing discussion परिचय topical issues.
Most shows are regularly hosted by a single individual, and often feature साक्षात्कार साथ a number of different guests.
Talk radio typically includes an element of listener participation, usually by broadcasting live conversations between the host and श्रोता जो `` कॉल in '' ( प्रायः via telephone ) to the show.
Listener contributions are usually screened by a show 's producer ( s ) in order to maximize audience interest and, in the case of commercial talk radio, attract advertisers.
Generally, the shows are organized into segments, each separated by a pause for advertisements ; however, in public or non-commercial रेडियो, म्यूज़िक is sometimes निभाई in place of commercials to separate the program segments.
Variations of talk radio include रूढ़िवादी talk, hot talk, liberal talk and sports talk.
While talk radio has historically been संबद्ध साथ AM/FM, starting around 2005 the technology for Internet-based talk-radio shows became cost effective in the form of podcasts.
Now, it is possible for an individual to use a variety of services to host an Internet-based talk-radio दिखाएँ बगैर carriage by a traditional radio station.
In addition TV programming from talk and news outlets such as BBC, CNN, Bloomberg and Fox are now often available expanding the world of बात radio further.
Talk radio listening is now enjoyed नहीं तभी on radios, लकिन a wide variety of other devices and services including PCs using iTunes, station directories such as Tunein, show directory smartphones with apps such as Stitcher.
Hippa is a genus of decapod crustaceans in the family Hippidae, containing the following species:
Hippa adactyla fabricius, 1787
hippa admirabilis ( Thallwitz, 1892 )
hippa alcimede ( De Man, 1902 )
hippa australis Hale, 1927
Hippa carcineutes holthuis & Manning, 1970
Hippa celaeno ( de man, 1896 )
Hippa granulatus ( borradaile, 1904 )
hippa hirtipes ( Dana, 1852 )
hippa इंडिका haig, मुरुगन & बालकृष्णन नायर, 1986
Hippa marmorata ( hombron & Jacquinot, 1846 )
Hippa ovalis ( A. milne-edwards, 1862 )
hippa picta ( Heller, 1861 )
Hippa strigillata ( stimpson, 1860 )
Hippa testudinaria ( herbst, 1791 )
Hippa truncatifrons ( miers, 1878 )
It is closely related to the genus Emerita, and species have often been transferred between the two genera.
Jakarta ( ), officially known as the खास Capital Region of Jakarta ( ), is the capital and largest city of Indonesia.
Located on the northwest coast of Java, Jakarta is the country 's economic, cultural and political centre, and with a population of 10,187,595 as of November 2011, it is the most populous city in Indonesia and in Southeast Asia, and is the thirteenth most populated city in the world.
The official metropolitan area, known as jabodetabek ( a नाम formed by combining the initial syllables of Jakarta, Bogor, Depok, Tangerang and Bekasi ), is the second largest in the world, yet the metropolis 's suburbs still continue beyond it.
Jakarta is listed as a global city in the 2008 Globalization and World शहरों पढ़ाई समूह and Network ( GaWC ) research.
and has an क्षेत्रफल of.
This area has population of well over 28 million, making it one of the world 's largest conurbations in शर्तें of number of inhabitants.
In 2011, Jakarta ranked 17th among the world 's 200 largest cities, a jump from its 2007 ranking of 171.
Jakarta has grown more rapidly than Kuala Lumpur, Beijing and Bangkok.
Established in the fourth century, the city became an important trading बंदरगाहों लिये the किंगडम of Sunda.
It was the de facto capital of the Dutch East Indies ( when it was known as Batavia ) and has जारी as the पूंजी of Indonesia since the country 's independence was declared in 1945.
The city is the seat of the ASEAN Secretariat.
Jakarta is served by the Soekarno–Hatta International Airport, Halim Perdanakusuma International Airport, and Tanjung Priok Harbour ; it is connected by several intercity और commuter रेल, and served by several bus lines running on reserved busways.

Air कंडीशनिंग is the process of altering the properties of air ( primarily temperature and humidity ) to more favourable conditions.
More generally, air conditioning can refer to any form of technological कूलिंग, हीटिंग, ventilation, or disinfection that modifies the condition of air.
An air conditioner ( often referred to as air con, AC or A/C, and not to be confused with the abbreviation for alternating current ) is a major or home appliance, system, or mechanism designed to change the air तापमान और आर्द्रता भीतर an क्षेत्रफल ( used for cooling and sometimes heating depending on the air properties at a given time ).
The cooling is typically done using a simple refrigeration cycle, but sometimes evaporation is used, commonly for comfort cooling in buildings and motor vehicles.
In निर्माण, a पूरा प्रणाली of heating, ventilation and air conditioning is referred to as `` HVAC ``.
`` 6 Foot 7 Foot '' ( also styled as `` 6'7 '' ) is a सोंग by अमरीकी rapper Lil Wayne featuring label mate, Cory Gunz.
It is taken from his ninth studio album, Tha Carter IV ( 2011 ).
It was officially released on iTunes on December 16, 2010.

DC Talk ( styled as dc Talk ), is a ग्रैमी -winning Christian rap trio.
The group was formed in lynchburg, वर्जिनिया in 1987 by Toby McKeehan, Michael Tait, and Kevin Max Smith.
They have released five major studio albums together : DC Talk ( 1989 ), Nu Thang ( 1990 ), Free at Last ( 1992 ), यीशु freak ( 1995 ), और Supernatural ( 1998 ).
In 2002, the Encyclopedia of Contemporary Christian Music called DC Talk `` the most popular overtly Christian act of all time. ''
In 2000, the समूह released an EP titled Solo which contained two solo songs from each member.
Since that time, dc बात रै महरूम on an indefinite hiatus, and the three band members have each led solo careers.
They have performed and recorded individual songs together several times दौरान the 2000s, हालांकि the समूह never officially reunited or disbanded.
The group 's musical style evolved significantly throughout their career.
Their first two releases, DC Talk and Nu Thang, यहूद of the hip hop genre.
DC Talk 's third album, Free at Last, also मुख्यतः took influence from the hip hop style, although their music began taking on a rock sound.
The trio 's last two albums, Jesus Freak and अलौकिक, यहूद predominantly pop rock.
The Bible is a compilation of many shorter books written at different times और बाद समवेत into the biblical canon.
All but the shortest of these books have महरूम विभाजित into अध्याय, generally a page or so in length, since the early 13th century.
Since the mid-16th century, each अध्याय रै महरूम further divided into `` verses '' of a few short lines or sentences.
Sometimes a sentence spans more than one verse, as in the case of, and sometimes there is more than one वाक्य in a single verse, as in the case of.
As the chapter and verse divisions were not part of the original texts, they form part of the paratext of the Bible.
The Jewish divisions of the यहूदी टेक्स्ट differ at various points from those used by Christians.
For instance, in Jewish tradition, the ascriptions to many Psalms are regarded as independent verses, making 116 more verses, whereas the established Christian practice is to गिनती और क्रमांक each Psalm ascription together with the first verse following it.
Some chapter divisions also occur in अलग स्थान, e.g. in Hebrew Bibles is numbered as in Christian translations.
An अनुक्रमणिका ( बहुवचन : indexes ) is a list of words or phrases ( 'headings ' ) and associated pointers ( 'locators ' ) to where useful material relating to that heading can be found in a document.
In a traditional back-of-the-book index the headings will include names of people, places and events, and concepts selected by a person as being relevant and of interest to a possible reader of the book.
The pointers are typically page numbers, paragraph numbers or खण्ड numbers.
In a library catalog the words are authors, titles, subject headings, etc., और the संकेतक are call numbers.
Internet search engines, such as Google, and full text searching help provide access to information but are not as selective as an index, as they provide non-relevant links, and may मिस प्रासंगिक information if it is not phrased in exactly the way they expect.
In United States financial regulation, a suspicious activity report ( or SAR ) is a report made by a financial institution to the Financial Crimes प्रवर्तन संजाल ( fincen ), an एजेंसी of the संयुक्त राज्य विभाग of the राजकोष, regarding suspicious or potentially suspicious activity.

Facebook is an online सोशल नेटवर्किंग सेवा, जिनकी नाम तना इससे the colloquial नाम लिये the किताब given to students at the start of the academic year by some university administrations in the United States to help students get to know each other.
It was founded in February 2004 by Mark zuckerberg साथ उसके कॉलेज roommates and fellow Harvard University students Eduardo Saverin, Andrew McCollum, Dustin Moskovitz and Chris Hughes.
The website 's membership was initially limited by the संस्थापकों to हार्वर्ड विद्यार्थी, लकिन थी विस्तारित to other colleges in the Boston area, the Ivy League, and Stanford University.
It gradually added support for students at various other universities before opening to high school विद्यार्थी, and eventually to anyone aged 13 and over.
Facebook now allows any users who declare themselves to be at least 13 years old to become registered users of the site.
Users must register before using the site, after which they may create a personal profile, add other users as friends, and exchange messages, including स्वचालित सूचनाएं when they update their profile.
Additionally, उपयोक्ता may जुड़ें common-interest उपयोक्ता समूह, व्यवस्थित by कार्यस्थल, school or college, or other characteristics, and categorize their friends into lists such as `` People From Work '' or `` Close Friends ''.
As of September 2012, Facebook has over one अरब क्रियाशील उपयोक्ता.
According to a May 2011 Consumer Reports survey, there are 7.5 million children under 13 with accounts and 5 million under 10, violating the साईट 's शर्तें of सेवा.
In May 2005, Accel partners invested $ 12.7 लाख in Facebook, and Jim Breyer added $ 1 million of his own money to the pot.
A January 2009 Compete.com study ranked Facebook as the most used सोशल नेटवर्किंग सेवा by worldwide monthly active users.
entertainment साप्ताहिक included the site on its end-of-the-decade `` best-of '' list, saying, `` How on earth did we stalk our exes, remember our co-workers ' birthdays, bug our friends, and play a rousing game of Scrabulous before Facebook ? ''
Critics, such as Facebook Detox, state that Facebook has turned into a national obsession in the संयुक्त राज्य, resulting in विशाल amounts of time lost and encouraging narcissism.
Quantcast estimates Facebook has 138.9 million monthly unique u.S. विज़िटर in may 2011.
According to सोशल मीडिया आज, in अप्रैल 2010 an estimated 41.6 % ( 129.5 million ) of the U.S. population had a Facebook account.
Nevertheless, फेसबुक 's market growth started to stall in some regions, with the site losing 7 million active users in the United States and Canada in May 2011.
Facebook eventually filed for an initial public offering on February 1, 2012, and was headquartered in मेनलो पार्क, कैलिफ़ोर्निया.
Facebook Inc. began selling भण्डार to the पब्लिक and trading on the NASDAQ on May 18, 2012.
सल्फोनेमाइड functional group
hydrochlorothiazide is a sulfonamide and a thiazide.
furosemide is a sulfonamide, but not a thiazide.
सल्फोनेमाइड or sulphonamide is the basis of several groups of drugs.
The original antibacterial sulfonamides ( sometimes called sulfa drugs or sulpha drugs ) are synthetic रोगाणुरोधी एजेंटों कि contain the sulfonamide group.
Some sulfonamides are also devoid of जीवाणुरोधी कार्यकलाप, e.g., the anticonvulsant sultiame.
The sulfonylureas and thiazide diuretics are नए ड्रग समूह आधारित on the antibacterial sulfonamides.
Sulfa allergies are common, hence medications containing sulfonamides are prescribed carefully.
It is important to make a distinction between sulfa दवाएँ और अन्य sulfur-containing दवाएँ और एडिटिव, such as sulfates and sulfites, which are chemically unrelated to the sulfonamide group, and do not cause the same hypersensitivity reactions seen in the sulfonamides.

Domestic geese ( Anser anser domesticus or Anser cygnoides ) are domesticated grey geese ( either Greylag Geese or Swan Geese ) kept as poultry for their meat, eggs, and down feathers since ancient times.
30 सेकेंड to मंगल is an American rock band from Los Angeles, formed in 1998.
Since 2007, the band has consisted of actor Jared Leto ( lead vocals, rhythm guitar, songwriter ), Shannon Leto ( drums, percussion ) और tomo miličević ( सीसे गिटार, keyboards ).
Following the departure of Matt Wachter ( now of Angels & Airwaves ) in 2007, Tim Kelleher became the bassist for the समूह, performing सजीव तभी साथ दोनो jared और miličević recording bass for studio recordings, while Braxton Olita ( keyboards ) was added to the touring lineup in 2009.
Previously, the समूह भी featured guitarists Solon Bixler ( now of Great Northern ) and Kevin Drake ( now of Polaroid Kiss ).
To तिथि, 30 सेकेंड to मंगल have released तीन स्टुडियो albums – 30 Seconds to Mars ( 2002 ), A Beautiful Lie ( 2005 ), This Is War ( 2009 ) and three extended plays – AOL Sessions Undercover ( 2007 ), To the Edge of the Earth ( 2008 ), and MTV Unplugged : 30 Seconds to Mars ( 2011 ).
30 Seconds to Mars ' music has been associated mostly with neo-prog, progressive metal and post-grunge, but they have also included emo, screamo, space rock and synthrock into their music.
They have been compared to Pink Floyd ( who were an influence on their work ) and Tool because of their use of philosophical and spiritual lyrics, concept albums and their use of experimental music.
A Christmas Story is a 1983 अमरीकी क्रिसमस कॉमेडी film based on the short stories and semi-fictional anecdotes of author and raconteur Jean Shepherd, based on his book In God We Trust, All Others Pay Cash, with some elements derived from Wanda Hickey 's Night of Golden Memories.
It was directed by bob Clark.
The film has since become a holiday classic and is shown numerous times on television during the Christmas season on the संजाल TBS, often in a 24-hour marathon.
In 2012, the film was selected for preservation in the National Film Registry by the पुस्तकालयों of कॉंग्रेस for being `` culturally, historically, or aesthetically significant ''.

The building was initially a rowing club और थी later converted into the restaurant.
Joe 's Crab Shack is an American chain of beach-themed seafood casual dining restaurants owned by Ignite Restaurant Group.
Founded in ह्यूस्टन, टेक्सास, the restaurant now operates locations all across the United States of America.
It serves seafood and अमरीकी cuisine.
The रेस्तरां also have a gift shop that sells facetious t-shirts featuring phrases advertising Joe 's seafood choices.
It is based in ह्यूस्टन, Texas.
New York City Cruise लाइनर टर्मिनल in Hell 's Kitchen at 52nd Street.
The New York Passenger Ship Terminal ( also known as the लक्ज़री लाइनर पंक्ति or Manhattan Cruise Terminal or New York Cruise Terminal ) is a terminal for ocean-going passenger ships on Manhattan 's west side.
The terminal consists of North River Piers 88, 90, 92 and 94 on the हडसन नदी between West 46th and West 54th Street.
( As a general rule, pier numbers in Manhattan can be determined by adding 40 to the सम्बन्धित cross-street. )
Ships now dock at Piers 88, 90 and 92.
बांध 94 on the north side is now used for exhibition space.
Pier 86, एकबार used by United States Lines, is now home to the USS Intrepid.
In 2003, the terminal संभाला 900,000 passengers.
The city is forecasting that 1.5 लाख होगा उपयोग the terminal by 2017.
The piers हैं long and apart.
They were first completed in 1935 to replace the Chelsea Piers as the नगर 's luxury liner terminal.
The new terminal was built to handle बडे जहाजों कि था outgrown the Chelsea Piers.
The piers were renovated in 1970 and are currently undergoing another $ 150 million renovation.
The renovated plans call for it to handle three विशाल जहाजों at a time.
In doing renovations, the नगर is also considering decommissioning Pier 92.
Logo of the नई यॉर्क क्रूज Terminal.For
decades the terminal was the only ocean-going यात्री टर्मिनल in New York harbor.
With an upsurge in cruise ship traffic and the terminal 's ability to handle comfortably only three large ships at a time, two new terminals have opened in the harbor — the Cape Liberty Cruise Port opened in 2004 in bayonne, नई जर्सी ( used by Royal Caribbean Cruise Line, Celebrity Cruises and Azamara Cruises ), and the Brooklyn Cruise Terminal ( used by the Queen Mary 2 and other ships of the Carnival Corporation cruise brands ) opened in 2006 in Brooklyn, New York.
The West Side Highway takes a small jog east from the piers to below वेस्ट 42nd गली क्युकी जब the टर्मिनल was built land had to be taken away from Manhattan to allow for longer piers.
The US Army Corps of Engineers, who कंट्रोल the waterfront dimension, would not extend the pierhead line farther into the river, so the city extended the pier by cutting away at the land.
The city earlier did this for the चेल्सी Piers ; however in Chelsea only landfill was taken away.
At the Passenger Terminal actual मैनहटन schist थी लिया away.
From downstream in the river
Many major passenger ships have docked there, including the RMS महारानी मरियम 2 और Freedom of the Seas, before the Brooklyn and Bayonne terminals opened.
The SS Normandie caught fire और subsequently capsized at its Pier 88 berth during World War II.
The Normandie, renamed uss lafayette, झूठ capsized in the frozen mud at Pier 88 in the winter of 1942
Norwegian Cruise Line 's जल्द to be नवीनतम जलयान the नॉर्वेजियाई Breakaway will sail year-round out of the New York Passenger Ship Terminal.
The city will spend $ 4 million to renovate and upgrade the cruise terminal to accommodate the जलयान.

Christian right is a term used in the United States to describe right-wing Christian political groups that are characterized by their strong support of socially conservative नीतियों.
Christian conservatives principally seek to apply their understanding of the teachings of Christianity to politics and public policy by proclaiming the value of those teachings and/or by seeking to use those शिक्षाओं to influence law and public policy.
In the U.S., the Christian right is an अनौपचारिक गठबन्धन formed around a कोर of धर्मान्तरण Protestants that draws `` support from politically conservative Catholics, Jews, Mormons, and occasionally secularists '' who share their goals.
The movement has its roots in American politics going back as far the 1940s and has been especially influential since the 1970s.
Their influence draws, in part, from grassroots activism as well as their focus on social issues and ability to motivate the electorate around those issues.
The Christian right is notable today for advancing socially conservative positions on issues including school prayer, stem cell research, homosexuality, निरोधक, गर्भपात, और pornography.
हालांकि the Christian right is usually associated with the U.S., the movement has been a key factor in the politics of Canada, The Netherlands, Northern Ireland and Australia, among others.
Far East Movement ( stylized as Far★East Movement or abbreviated FM ) is an American hip hop band quartet based in Los Angeles.
The group formed in 2003 and consists of Kev Nish ( Kevin Nishimura ), Prohgress ( James Roh ), J-Splif ( Jae Choung ), and DJ Virman ( Virman Coquia ).
Far East Movement 's पहला अर्जी to कीर्ति was their song `` Round Round '' featured in the Hollywood movie, The Fast and the Furious : Tokyo Drift, and its subsequent soundtrack, video game and DVD.
Since `` Round गोलाकार '', the group has been featured on various network shows including,, Entourage, Gossip Girl, and Finishing the Game ( a featured film at Sundance 2007 ).
Their single `` Like a G6 `` hit number one on the बिलबोर्ड hot 100 चार्ट and on iTunes as well in late October 2010.
Far East Movement also has the distinction of being the first Asian-American group to earn a # 1 hit on the बिलबोर्ड Hot 100 in the United States.
LR44 is the IEC designation for an क्षारीय 1.5 वोल्ट बटन कोशिका, commonly प्रयुक्त in small LED flashlights, digital thermometers, calculators, calipers, watches, clocks, toys and laser pointers.
LR44 क्षारीय cell
The battery nomenclature is defined by the अंतरराष्ट्रीय विद्युततकनीकी Commission ( IEC ) in its 60086-3 standard ( Primary batteries, part 3 Watch batteries ).
The letter L indicates the electrochemical system used ; a zinc negative electrode, मैंगनीज डाइऑक्साइड depolarizer and positive electrode, and an alkaline electrolyte.
R44 indicates a round cell 11.4±0.2 mm diameter and 5.2±0.2 mm ऊँचाई as defined by the IEC standard 60086.
Manufacturers have their own part numbers for IEC type LR44 batteries including:
LR44, LR44G, lr44gd, LR44H
lr1154, L1154, L1154C, L1154F, L1154G, L1154H
6135-99-792-8475 ( NSN )
1166a
AG13, A613, AG14, AG-14, g13a, g13-a
157, 303, 357
A76, gda76, gp76a, GPA7, GPA75, GPA76, GPS76A,
1128MP, 208-904, A-76, CA18, CA19, CR44, D76A, KA, ka76, ms76h, PX76A, PX675A, RPX675, RW82, SB-F9, V13GA
4.5-volt, D, C, AA, AAA, aaaa, a23, 9-volt, CR2032 and LR44 batteries
Other types of batteries are or were made in the r44 आकार.
Formerly, mercury batteries were बना as बटन कोशिकाएं ( प्रकार MR44 and NR44 ).
Zinc-air बैटरी प्रकार PR44 require air to work.
Silver-oxide batteries type SR44 may provide extra क्षमता compared to LR44 types but have slightly different voltage characteristics.
Performance of a device meant to use a silver-oxide battery may be degraded with प्रतिस्थापन of LR44 types.
Manufacturer 's numbers for silver ऑक्साइड r44 आकार cells include:
sr44/sr44w/sr44sw
6135-99-651-3240 ( NSN )
sr1154
1107so
1131sop
sg13
s76
epx76 ( Energizer )
303/357 ( D357H )
Hurricane Katrina was the deadliest and most destructive Atlantic hurricane of the 2005 Atlantic hurricane season.
It was the costliest natural disaster, as well as one of the five deadliest hurricanes, in the इतिहास of the United States.
Among recorded Atlantic hurricanes, it was the sixth strongest overall.
At least 1,833 people died in the hurricane and subsequent floods, बनाना it the deadliest U.S. hurricane since the 1928 Okeechobee hurricane ; total property damage was estimated at $ 81 billion ( 2005 USD ), nearly triple the damage brought by Hurricane Andrew in 1992.
Hurricane कैटरीना formed over the Bahamas on August 23, 2005 and crossed southern Florida as a moderate Category 1 hurricane, causing some deaths and flooding there before strengthening rapidly in the Gulf of Mexico.
The hurricane strengthened to a Category 5 hurricane over the warm Gulf water, but weakened before बनाना इसके दूसरी landfall as a Category 3 hurricane on the morning of Monday, August 29 in southeast Louisiana.
It caused severe destruction along the Gulf coast from central Florida to Texas, much of it due to the storm surge.
The most significant number of deaths occurred in नई ऑरलियन्स, Louisiana, which flooded as the levee system catastrophically failed, in many cases hours after the storm had moved inland.
Eventually 80 % of the city and large tracts of neighboring parishes became flooded, and the floodwaters lingered for weeks.
However, the worst property damage occurred in coastal areas, such as all Mississippi beachfront towns, which were flooded over 90 % in hours, as नौकाएँ और कसीनो barges rammed इमारतें, pushing गाड़ियाँ और घरों अंतर्देशीय, साथ waters reaching 6–12 miles ( 10–19 km ) from the beach.
The hurricane surge protection failures in New Orleans are considered the worst civil engineering disaster in U.S. history and prompted a lawsuit against the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers ( USACE ), the designers and builders of the levee system as mandated by the Flood Control Act of 1965.
जिम्मेदारी लिये the असफलताओं और flooding was laid squarely on the Army Corps in January 2008 by Judge Stanwood Duval, U.S. District Court, but the federal agency could not be held financially liable due to sovereign immunity in the Flood Control Act of 1928.
There was also an investigation of the responses from federal, state and local governments, resulting in the resignation of Federal Emergency Management Agency ( FEMA ) director Michael D. Brown, and of New Orleans पुलिस विभाग ( nopd ) अधीक्षक Eddie Compass.
Several agencies including the United States Coast Guard ( USCG ), National Hurricane Center ( NHC ), और नेशनल मौसम Service ( NWS ) were commended for their actions.
They provided सटीक hurricane weather tracking forecasts with sufficient lead time.
Even the most insistent appeals from national, state and local public officials to residents to evacuate before the storm did not warn that the levees could breach and fail.
U.S. debt from 1940 to 2011.
Red lines indicate the `` debt held by the public '' and black लाइनों indicate the कुल national debt or gross public debt.
The अंतर is the `` intragovernmental debt, '' which includes obligations to government programs such as Social Security.
Stated as a सूत्र, National Debt = Debt held by the Public + Intragovernmental Debt.
The second panel shows the two debt figures as a percentage of U.S. GDP ( dollar मान of U.S. economic production for that year ).
The top panel is deflated so every year is in 2010 dollars.
The United States public debt is the money borrowed by the संघीय सरकारी of the United States through the issuing of securities by the Treasury and other federal government agencies.
US पब्लिक कर्ज़ consists of two components:
Debt held by the public includes Treasury securities held by investors outside the federal government, including that held by individuals, corporations, the संघीय आरक्षित प्रणाली और विदेशी, state and local governments.
Debt held by government accounts or intragovernmental debt includes non-marketable Treasury securities held in accounts administered by the federal government that are owed to program beneficiaries, such as the Social Security Trust Fund.
Debt held by government accounts represents the cumulative surpluses, including interest earnings, of these accounts that have been invested in Treasury प्रतिभूति.
Public debt increases or decreases as a result of the annual एकीकृत बजट deficit or surplus.
The federal government budget deficit or surplus is the difference between सरकारी रसीदें और बिता, ignoring intra-governmental transfers.
However, some spending that is excluded from the deficit ( supplemental appropriations ) also adds to the debt.
Historically, the US पब्लिक कर्ज़ as a share of GDP increased during wars and recessions, and subsequently declined.
For example, debt held by the public as a share of GDP peaked just after World War II ( 113 % of GDP in 1945 ), but then fell over the following 30 years.
In recent decades, however, large budget deficits and the resulting increases in debt have led to चिंता परिचय the long-term स्थिरता of the federal government 's fiscal policies.
On 2 April 2013, debt held by the पब्लिक थी लगभग $ 11.959 trillion or about 75 % of GDP.
intragovernmental holdings stood at $ 4.846 trillion, giving a combined total public debt of $ 16.805 trillion.
As of January 2013, $ 5.6 trillion or approximately 47 % of the debt held by the public was owned by foreign निवेशकों, the largest of जिससे यहूद the लोगों 's गणतंत्र of चीन and Japan at just over $ 1.1 trillion each.
In basketball, an assist is attributed to a player जो गुजरता the बॉल to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was `` assisting '' in the basket.
There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer चाहिए be credited with an assist.
An assist can be scored for the passer even if the player who receives the pass makes a basket after dribbling the ball.
However, the original definition of an assist did not include such situations, so the comparison of assist statistics across eras is a complex matter.
Only the pass directly पहले the स्कोर may be गिने as an assist, so no more than one assist can be recorded per field goal ( unlike in other sports, such as ice hockey ).
A pass that leads to a shooting foul and scoring by free throws does not count as an assist in the NBA, लकिन करता in fiba play ( only one assist is awarded per set of free throws in which at least one free throw is made ).
Point guards tend to get the most assists per game ( apg ), as their role is primarily that of a passer and ballhandler.
Centers tend to get fewer assists, but centers with good floor presence and court vision can dominate a टोली by assisting.
Being inside the key, the center often has the best angles और the बेहतरीन स्थिति for `` dishes '' and other short passes in the scoring area.
Center wilt Chamberlain led the NBA in assists in 1968.
A strong center with inside-scoring prowess, such as former NBA center Hakeem Olajuwon, can also be an effective assistor because the defense 's double-teaming tends to open up offense in the form of shooters.
The NBA single-game assist record is 30, held by Scott Skiles of the Orlando Magic against the Denver Nuggets, on December 30, 1990.
The NBA record for most करियर assists is held by John Stockton with 15,806.
The mill or mille ( ) ( sometimes mil in the UK, when discussing property taxes in the United States, or previously in Cyprus and Malta ) is a now-abstract ईकाई of करेंसी प्रयुक्त sometimes in accounting.
In the United राज्य, it is a notional ईकाई समतुल्य to of a United States dollar ( a tenth of a cent ).
In the United Kingdom it was proposed during the decades of discussion on the decimalization of the पाउंड as a प्रभाग of the पाउंड स्टर्लिंग.
Several other currencies used the mill, such as the maltese लीरा.
The term comes from the Latin `` millesimum '', meaning `` thousandth भाग ''.
The Greco-Persian Wars ( also often called the Persian Wars ) were a series of विरोध between the हख़ामनी साम्राज्य of Persia and city-states of the Hellenic world that started in 499 BC and lasted until 449 BC.
The collision between the fractious political world of the Greeks and the enormous empire of the फारसियों began जब सायरस the Great conquered Ionia in 547 BC.
Struggling to rule the independent-minded cities of Ionia, the Persians appointed tyrants to नियम प्रत्येक of उन्हें.
This would prove to be the source of much trouble for the Greeks and फारसियों alike.
In 499 BC, the then tyrant of Miletus, Aristagoras, embarked on an expedition to conquer the island of Naxos, with Persian support ; however, the expedition was a debacle and, pre-empting his dismissal, Aristagoras incited all of Hellenic Asia Minor into rebellion against the Persians.
This was the शुरूआत of the आयोनियन विद्रोह, which would last until 493 BC, progressively drawing more regions of Asia Minor into the conflict.
Aristagoras secured military support from Athens and Eretria, and in 498 BC these forces helped to कैप्चर and burn the Persian regional capital of Sardis.
The Persian king Darius the Great vowed to have revenge on एथेंस और eretria for this act.
The revolt continued, साथ the दो पहलू effectively stalemated throughout 497–495 BC.
In 494 BC, the Persians regrouped, and attacked the epicentre of the विद्रोह in Miletus.
At the Battle of Lade, the Ionians suffered a decisive शिकस्त, और the विद्रोह collapsed, with the final members being stamped out the following year.
Seeking to secure his empire from further revolts and from the हस्तक्षेप of the मेनलैंड यूनानियों, दारा embarked on a scheme to conquer Greece and to punish Athens and Eretria for burning Sardis.
The first Persian invasion of Greece began in 492 BC, with the Persian general Mardonius conquering Thrace and Macedon before several mishaps forced an early end to the campaign.
In 490 BC a second force was sent to Greece, this time across the Aegean Sea, under the command of Datis and artaphernes.
This expedition subjugated the Cyclades, before besieging, capturing and razing eretria.
However, while en route to attack Athens, the Persian फ़ोर्स थी decisively पराजित by the athenians at the Battle of Marathon, ending Persian efforts for the time being.
Darius then began to plan to complete the conquest of Greece, but died in 486 BC and जिम्मेदारी लिये the conquest passed to his son Xerxes I.
In 480 BC, Xerxes personally led the second Persian invasion of Greece with one of the largest ancient armies ever assembled.
Victory over the 'Allied ' Greek states ( led by स्पार्टा and Athens ) at the Battle of Thermopylae allowed the Persians to torch Athens and overrun most of Greece.
However, while seeking to नष्ट the combined Greek fleet, the Persians suffered a severe defeat at the Battle of Salamis.
The following year, the confederated Greeks went on the offensive, defeating the Persian army at the Battle of plataea, और समाप्ति the आक्रमण of Greece.
The allied Greeks followed up their success by destroying the rest of the Persian fleet at the Battle of Mycale, पहले expelling पारसी garrisons from Sestos ( 479 BC ) and Byzantium ( 478 BC ).
The actions of the general Pausanias at the siege of Byzantium alienated many of the Greek states इससे the spartans, और the anti-persian गठबंधन was therefore reconstituted around Athenian leadership, as the so-called Delian League.
The Delian League continued to campaign against Persia for the next three decades, beginning with the expulsion of the बाकी पारसी garrisons from Europe.
At the Battle of the Eurymedon in 466 BC, the League won a double victory that आखिरकार secured freedom for the cities of Ionia.
However, the League 's involvement in an Egyptian revolt ( from 460–454 bc ) resulted in a disastrous defeat, and further campaigning was suspended.
A बेड़े थी भेजा to साइप्रस in 451 BC, but achieved little, and when it withdrew the Greco-Persian Wars drew to a quiet end.
Some historical sources suggest the end of hostilities थी चिह्नित by a peace treaty between Athens and Persia, the so-called Peace of Callias.
hooverville near Portland, Oregon
A `` hooverville '' is the लोकप्रिय नाम for shanty towns built by homeless people during the Great Depression.
They were named after Herbert Hoover, जो थी अध्यक्ष of the United States during the onset of the Depression and widely blamed for it.
The term was coined by चार्ल्स माइकेल्सन, publicity chief of the Democratic National Committee.
Matthew Michael Hasselbeck ( born September 25, 1975 ) is an American football क्वार्टरबैक लिये the इंडियानापोलिस Colts of the National Football League ( NFL ).
He was drafted in the sixth round of the 1998 NFL Draft by the Green Bay Packers.
After a season on the practice squad and two सीज़न बैकिंग up Brett Favre, he was traded to the Seattle Seahawks in 2001.
Hasselbeck gained the starting role in 2003, and led Seattle to six playoff appearances and a Super Bowl appearance ; he was selected to three Pro Bowls and an All-Pro selection.
Following ten सीज़न with the Seahawks, Hasselbeck joined the Tennessee Titans in 2011.
Hasselbeck then signed a contract साथ the इंडियानापोलिस Colts in 2013 less than 24 hours after being released by the Tennessee Titans.
ICT is inevitably सम्बन्धित to the computer network.
Information and Communications Technology or ( ICT ), is often used as an extended synonym for information technology ( it ), लकिन is a अधिक विशिष्ट पद कि stresses the role of unified communications and the integration of telecommunications ( telephone lines and wireless signals ), computers as well as necessary enterprise software, middleware, storage, and audio-visual systems, which enable users to access, store, transmit, and manipulate information.
The phrase ICT had been used by academic researchers since the 1980s, but it became popular after it was used in a report to the UK government by Dennis Stevenson in 1997 and in the revised National Curriculum for England, Wales और उत्तरी आयरलैंड in 2000.
The term ICT is now also used to refer to the अभिसरण of audio-visual and telephone networks with computer networks through a single cabling or link system.
There are large economic incentives ( huge cost savings due to elimination of the telephone network ) to merge the audio-visual, भवन प्रबन्धन और टेलीफोन संजाल साथ the कंप्यूटर संजाल प्रणाली using a सिंगल एकीकृत प्रणाली of cabling, सिग्नल distribution and management.
The term Infocommunications is used in some cases as a shorter form of information और संचार ( s ) प्रौद्योगिकी.
In fact infocommunications is the विस्तार of दूरसंचार with information processing and content handling functions on a common digital technology base.
For a तुलना of these and other terms, see.
For ICT विकास अनुक्रमणिका around the world, see.

A schematic presentation of the plum pudding model of the अणु ; in thomson 's mathematical model the `` corpuscles '' ( or modern electrons ) were arranged non-randomly, in rotating rings
The current model of the sub-atomic structure involves a घना केंद्रक घिरी by a probabilistic `` cloud '' of electrons
The plum pudding model of the atom by J. J. Thomson, who खोजा the इलेक्ट्रॉन in 1897, was proposed in 1904 before the discovery of the atomic nucleus in order to add the electron to the atomic model.
In this model, the atom is composed of electrons ( which Thomson still called `` corpuscles '', though G. J. Stoney had proposed that atoms of electricity be called electrons in 1894 ) surrounded by a soup of positive charge to balance the electrons ' negative आरोप, जैसे negatively चार्ज `` plums `` घिरी by positively charged `` pudding ``.
The electrons ( as we know them today ) were thought to be positioned throughout the atom, but with many structures possible for positioning multiple electrons, particularly rotating rings of electrons ( see below ).
Instead of a soup, the अणु थी भी sometimes said to have had a `` cloud '' of positive charge.
With this model, Thomson abandoned his earlier `` nebular atom '' hypothesis in which the atom was composed of immaterial vortices.
Now, at least part of the atom was to be composed of Thomson 's particulate negative corpuscles, although the rest of the positively चार्ज part of the atom remained somewhat nebulous and ill-defined.
The 1904 Thomson model was disproved by the 1909 gold foil प्रयोग of hans geiger and Ernest Marsden.
This was interpreted by Ernest रदरफोर्ड in 1911
to imply a very small nucleus of the atom containing a very high positive charge ( in the मामला of सुनहरा, पर्याप्त to संतुलन about 100 electrons ), thus leading to the Rutherford model of the atom.
Although gold has an atomic number of 79, immediately after Rutherford 's paper appeared in 1911 Antonius Van den Broek made the सहज सुझाव कि परमाणु क्रमांक is नाभिकीय charge.
The matter required प्रयोग to decide.
Henry Moseley 's work showed experimentally in 1913 ( see Moseley 's law ) कि the प्रभावी नाभिकीय charge was very close to the atomic number ( Moseley found only one unit difference ), and Moseley referenced only the papers of Van den Broek and Rutherford.
This work culminated in the solar-system-like ( but quantum-limited ) Bohr model of the atom in the same year, in which a nucleus containing an atomic number of positive charge is surrounded by an equal number of electrons in orbital shells.
Bohr had also inspired moseley 's work.
Thomson 's model was compared ( though not by Thomson ) to a British dessert called plum pudding, hence the name.
thomson 's पेपर थी प्रकाशित in the March 1904 edition of the Philosophical Magazine, the leading British science journal of the day.
in thomson 's दृश्य :... the अणु of the तत्व consist of a क्रमांक of negatively electrified corpuscles enclosed in a गोला of वर्दी धनात्मक electrification,...
In this model, the electrons were free to rotate within the blob or बादल of positive substance.
These orbits were stabilized in the model by the fact that when an electron moved farther from the center of the positive cloud, it felt a larger जाल धनात्मक inward फ़ोर्स, क्युकी there was more material of opposite charge, inside its orbit ( see Gauss 's law ).
In Thomson 's model, electrons were free to rotate in rings which were further stabilized by interactions between the electrons, and spectra were to be accounted for by energy मतभेद of अलग रिंग orbits.
Thomson attempted to make his model account for some of the major spectral lines ज्ञात लिये कुछ elements, but was not notably successful at this.
Still, Thomson 's model ( along with a similar Saturnian ring model for atomic electrons, also put forward in 1904 by Nagaoka after James Clerk Maxwell 's model of Saturn 's rings ), were earlier harbingers of the बाद और अधिक कामयाब solar-system-like Bohr model of the atom.
Typical strip of बेकन.
Bacon is a cured मांस prepared from a pig.
It is first cured using large quantities of salt, either in a brine or in a dry packing ; the result is fresh bacon ( also known as green bacon ).
Fresh bacon may then be further dried for weeks or months in ठंडा एयर, or it may be boiled or smoked.
Fresh and dried bacon is typically पकाया before eating.
Boiled bacon is ready to eat, as is some smoked bacon, but may be cooked further पहले eating.
Bacon is prepared इससे several different cuts of meat.
It is usually made from side and back cuts of pork, except in the United States, where it is almost always prepared from pork belly ( typically referred to as `` streaky '', `` वसीय '', or `` अमरीकी स्टाइल '' outside of the US and Canada ).
The side cut रै more meat and less fat than the belly.
Bacon may be prepared from either of दो पृथक वापस कटौती : fatback, which is almost pure fat, and pork loin, which is very lean.
Bacon-cured पोर्क loin is known as back bacon.
uncooked pork belly bacon strips.
Bacon may be eaten smoked, boiled, fried, baked, or grilled, or used as a minor ingredient to flavor dishes.
Bacon is also used for barding and larding roasts, विशेषकर game, e.g. venison, pheasant.
The word is derived from the Old High German bacho, meaning `` buttock '', `` ham '' or `` side of bacon '', and cognate with the Old French bacon.
In महाद्वीपीय Europe, this part of the pig is usually not smoked like bacon is in the United States ; it is used primarily in cubes ( lardons ) as a cooking ingredient, valued both as a source of fat and for its flavor.
In Italy, this is called pancetta and is usually cooked in small cubes or served uncooked and thinly sliced as part of an antipasto.
Meat from other animals, such as beef, lamb, chicken, goat, or turkey, may also be cut, cured, or वरना prepared to resemble bacon, and may even be referred to as `` bacon ''.
Such use is common in areas with significant यहूदी और मुस्लिम populations.
The USDA defines bacon as `` the cured पेट of a स्वाइन carcass '' ; अन्य cuts and characteristics must be separately qualified ( e.g., `` smoked pork loin bacon '' ).
लिये सुरक्षा, बेकन जरूर be treated to prevent trichinosis, caused by Trichinella, a parasitic roundworm which can be destroyed by heating, freezing, drying, or smoking.
Bacon is विशिष्ट इससे salt pork and ham by differences in the brine ( or dry packing ).
Bacon brine has added curing ingredients, most notably sodium nitrite, and occasionally sodium nitrate or potassium nitrate ( saltpeter ) ; sodium ascorbate or erythorbate are added to accelerate curing and stabilize color.
Flavorings such as brown sugar or मेपल हैं used for some products.
if प्रयुक्त, sodium polyphosphates are added to improve sliceability and reduce spattering when the bacon is pan fried.
Today, a brine for ham, but not bacon, includes a large amount of शुगर.
Historically, `` ham '' and `` bacon '' referred to different cuts of meat that were brined or packed identically, प्रायः साथ in the same barrel.
The Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 ( ERISA ) (, codified in part at ) is a federal law which establishes minimum standards लिये पेंशन योजनाएँ in निजी उद्योग और provides लिये extensive rules on the federal income tax effects of transactions associated with employee benefit plans.
ERISA was enacted to protect the interests of कर्मचारी लाभ plan participants and their beneficiaries by:
Requiring the disclosure of financial और अन्य information concerning the plan to beneficiaries ;
Establishing standards of conduct लिये योजना fiduciaries ;
Providing for appropriate remedies and access to the संघीय न्यायालयों.
ERISA is sometimes used to refer to the full body of laws regulating employee benefit plans, which are मिला मुख्यतः in the Internal Revenue Code and ERISA itself.
Responsibility for the interpretation and enforcement of ERISA is divided among the Department of Labor, the Department of the Treasury ( particularly the आतंरिक आय सेवा ), और the पेंशन लाभ guaranty Corporation.
Illegal immigration to the संयुक्त राज्य is the अधिनियम of foreign nationals entering the United States, without government permission and in violation of United States nationality law, or staying beyond the termination date of a visa, also in violation of the law.
A warning sign at the international boundary between the United राज्य and Canada in Point Roberts, Washington.
A much different दृष्टिकोण at the U.S.-Mexico border near El Paso, Texas
The undocumented immigrant population of the United States in 2008 was estimated by the Center for Immigration Studies to be about 11 million people, down from 12.5 million people in 2007.
अन्य estimates दायरा from 7 to 20 million.
According to a 2005 Pew Hispanic Center report, 56 % of undocumented immigrants were from Mexico ; 22 % were from अन्य लैटिन अमरीकी देशों ; 13 % यहूद इससे एशिया ; 6 % were from Europe and Canada ; and 3 % were from Africa and the rest of the world.
Alvin Independent School District is a स्कूल ज़िला आधारित in एल्विन, Texas ( USA ).
Alvin ISD is a large suburban school district south of Houston in the communities of Alvin, Manvel, Pearland, Hillcrest, Rosharon, Iowa Colony, Liverpool, and Amsterdam.
aisd serves pearland नगर 's rapidly growing western portion of the city including the new large master-planned communities of Shadow Creek Ranch, South Fork, and Southern Trails.
एल्विन isd covers of land.
In human anatomy, the ulnar nerve is a nerve which रनों निकट the ulna bone.
The ulnar collateral स्नायु of elbow joint is in relation with the ulnar nerve.
The nerve is the largest unprotected nerve in the human body ( meaning unprotected by muscle or bone ), so injury is common.
This nerve is directly connected to the little finger, and the adjacent half of the ring finger, supplying the palmar पक्ष of ये fingers, including both front and back of the tips, perhaps as far back as the fingernail beds.
One method of injuring the nerve is to strike the medial epicondyle of the humerus from posteriorly, or inferiorly with the elbow flexed.
The ulnar nerve is trapped between the bone and the overlying skin at this point.
This is commonly referred to as bumping one 's `` मजेदार अस्थि ''.
This name is thought to be a pun, based on the ध्वनि resemblance between the name of the bone of the upper arm, the `` humerus `` and the word `` humorous ``.
Alternatively, according to the Oxford English Dictionary it may refer to `` the peculiar सनसनी अनुभवी when it is struck ''.
Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, shortened Hogwarts, is a fictional British school of magic for students aged eleven to eighteen, and is the primary setting for the पहला six books in J.K. Rowling 's Harry Potter series.
Rowling has suggested that she may have inadvertently taken the name from the hogwort plant ( Croton capitatus ), which she had seen at Kew Gardens some time before writing the series, although the names `` The Hogwarts '' and `` Hoggwart '' appear in the 1954 Nigel Molesworth book How To Be Topp by Geoffrey Willans.
Hogwarts school was voted as the 36th best Scottish educational establishment in a 2008 online ranking, outranking Edinburgh 's loretto School.
According to a director of the Independent Schools Network rankings, it थी added to the स्कूलों लिस्टिंग `` for fun '' and was then voted on.
The U.S. subprime mortgage संकट थी a नियत of कार्यक्रम और conditions that led to a financial crisis and subsequent recession that began in 2008.
It was characterized by a rise in subprime mortgage delinquencies and foreclosures, and the resulting decline of securities backed by said mortgages.
Several major financial institutions collapsed in September 2008, with significant disruption in the flow of credit to businesses and उपभोक्ता और the onset of a severe global recession.
There were many causes of the संकट, साथ टीकाकारों assigning different levels of blame to financial institutions, regulators, credit agencies, government housing policies, and consumers, among others.
A proximate कारण was the rise in subprime lending.
The प्रतिशत of lower-quality subprime mortgages originated during a given year rose from the historical 8 % or lower range to approximately 20 % from 2004 to 2006, with much higher ratios in some parts of the U.S.
A ऊँची प्रतिशत of ये subprime mortgages, over 90 % in 2006 लिये उदाहरण, यहूद adjustable-rate mortgages.
These two changes were part of a broader trend of lowered lending मानकों और higher-risk mortgage products.
Further, U.S. households had become increasingly indebted, with the ratio of debt to disposable personal आय उठती from 77 % in 1990 to 127 % at the end of 2007, much of this increase mortgage-related.
When U.S. home prices declined steeply after peaking in mid-2006, borrowers ' क्षमता to पुनर्वित्त their loans became more difficult.
As adjustable-rate mortgages began to reset at higher interest दरों ( causing higher monthly payments ), mortgage delinquencies soared.
Securities backed with mortgages, including subprime mortgages, widely आयोजित by वित्तीय firms globally, lost most of their value.
Global investors also drastically reduced purchases of mortgage-backed कर्ज़ और अन्य प्रतिभूति as part of a decline in the capacity and willingness of the private financial system to support lending.
Concerns about the soundness of U.S. credit and वित्तीय बाज़ार led to tightening क्रेडिट around the world and slowing economic growth in the U.S. and Europe.
The crisis had severe, long-lasting consequences लिये the u.S. and European economies.
The U.S. entered a deep recession, with nearly 9 लाख jobs lost during 2008 and 2009, roughly 6 % of the workforce.
U.S. housing prices fell nearly 30 % on average and the u.S. भण्डार मार्केट fell approximately 50 % by early 2009.
As of early 2013, the U.S. stock market had recovered to its pre-crisis peak but housing prices remained near their low point and unemployment remained elevated.
Economic growth remained below pre-crisis levels.
Europe also continued to struggle with its own economic संकट.
Carl Jung in 1910.
Myers and briggs extrapolated उनके MBTI theory from Jung 's writings in his book Psychological Types.
The Myers-Briggs Type Indicator ( MBTI ) मूल्यांकन is a psychometric questionnaire designed to measure psychological preferences in how people perceive the world and make decisions.
These preferences were extrapolated from the typological theories proposed by Carl Gustav Jung and first published in his 1921 book मनोवैज्ञानिक Types ( English edition, 1923 ).
Jung theorized that there are four principal psychological कृत्यों by जिससे we अनुभव the world : sensation, intuition, feeling, and thinking.
One of these four functions is dominant most of the time.
The original developers of the व्यक्तित्व inventory यहूद katharine कुक briggs और उसके बेटी, इसाबेल briggs मायर्स ; ये दो, having पढ़ाई extensively the कार्य of जंग, turned उनके ब्याज of इंसान बर्ताव into a भक्ति of turning the सिद्धान्त of मनोवैज्ञानिक प्रकार to व्यावहारिक उपयोग.
They began creating the indicator during World War II, believing कि a ज्ञान of personality preferences would help women who were entering the industrial workforce for the first time to identify the sort of war-time jobs that would be `` most comfortable and effective ''.
The initial प्रश्नावली grew into the Myers-Briggs Type Indicator, which was first published in 1962.
The MBTI focuses on normal populations and emphasizes the value of naturally occurring differences.
Robert Kaplan and Dennis saccuzzo मानना `` the underlying assumption of the MBTI is that we all have specific preferences in the way we construe our experiences, and these preferences underlie our interests, needs, values, and motivation '' ( p. 499 ).
`` Judas '' is a song by American recording artist Lady Gaga, from her second studio album Born This Way ( 2011 ).
It was released by interscope रिकॉर्ड on अप्रैल 15, 2011, four days ahead of its scheduled release.
Written and produced by Lady Gaga and redone, `` यहूदा '' is a dance and electro house song about a woman in love with a man who betrayed her.
It embodies the incidents that have haunted Gaga in the पास्ट, और इसके कोर अर्थ refers to the negative parts of her life that she ca n't escape.
Gaga has further explained that the song was also about honoring one 's inner darkness in order to bring oneself into the light.
The artwork for the single was designed by गागा in microsoft Word.
In spite of a polarizing impact on several religious groups, the song was generally खूब प्राप्त by आलोचकों, who likened the song to `` Bad Romance `` with some noting it should have been the album 's lead single.
The song has a similar sound to Gaga 's previous RedOne-produced ट्रैक्स, सहित `` पोकर फेस ``, `` LoveGame ``, `` Bad Romance '', and `` Alejandro ``.
It contains तीन distinct hooks and a house -influenced break down.
Gaga explained that the lines spoken during the विश्लेषण बात परिचय उसके as परे redemption, regarding the traditional views of what a woman should be.
`` Judas '' initially had a strong sales खोलने, but was less successful commercially in comparison to Gaga 's previous singles.
The song reached the top ten of the charts in most major music markets, and also reached the top of the चार्ट in दक्षिण Korea.
A music वीडियो for the song was filmed in April 2011, co-directed by Gaga and Laurieann Gibson and co-starring Norman Reedus.
It has a biblical storyline where Reedus played Judas Iscariot and Gaga played Mary Magdalene.
The video portrays them as modern day missionaries going to जेरूसलम.
It शामिल the Biblical story of Judas betraying Jesus, and ended with Gaga as Magdalene getting stoned to death.
Before its release, the कैथोलिक लीग condemned गागा लिये the कथित use of religious imagery and her role in the video.
However, critics generally praised the video, नहीं ढूंढना कोई offensive content.
The video was nominated लिये दो पुरस्कार at the 2011 MTV Video Music Awards.
Gaga has performed `` Judas '' on a क्रमांक of television shows, including The Graham Norton Show, Saturday Night Live, Good Morning Americas `` Summer Concert Series '', the French X Factor as well as on The Ellen DeGeneres Show.
Marvin Gaye ( April 2, 1939April 1, 1984 ), born Marvin Pentz Gay, Jr., was an अमरीकी singer-songwriter and musician.
Gaye helped to shape the sound of Motown Records in the 1960s with a string of hits including `` How Sweet It Is ( To Be Loved By You ) `` and `` I Heard It through the grapevine `` and duet recordings with Mary Wells and Tammi Terrell, later earning the titles `` Prince of Motown '' and `` Prince of Soul ''.
During the 1970s, Gaye recorded the concept albums कया 's going on और let 's मिलेंगी it on और became among the first artists in Motown to break away from the reins of its production company.
Gaye 's later recordings influenced several R & B subgenres ऐसे as शांत तूफ़ान and neo-soul.
Following a period in Europe under a tax exile in the जल्दी 1980s, gaye released the 1982 Grammy Award-winning hit `` Sexual Healing `` and the Midnight Love album.
Since his death in 1984, Gaye has been posthumously honored by many institutions, including the Grammy Lifetime Achievement Award और the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame.
The Academy Award for Best Picture is one of the Academy Awards of Merit presented annually by the Academy of Motion चित्र Arts and Sciences ( AMPAS ) to producers working in the motion picture industry and is the only category in which every member is eligible to nominate for.
Best Picture is considered the most important of the अकादमी Awards, as it represents all the directing, acting, music composing, writing, editing and other efforts put forth into a film.
Consequently, Best Picture is the final award and the conclusion of the annual अकादमी पुरस्कार ceremony.
The Grand Staircase columns at the Dolby Theatre in Los Angeles, where the Academy Awards ceremonies have been held since 2002, showcase every film that has won the Best Picture title since the award 's inception 85 years ago.
Heavy Rain is an interactive drama action-adventure video game created by French developer Quantic Dream exclusively लिये the प्लेस्टेशन 3.
The game is लिखा और directed by Quantic Dream 's founder and CEO David Cage.
Heavy Rains story is a dramatic thriller modelled बाद फिल्मी noir, featuring चार protagonists involved with the mystery of the Origami Killer, a serial killer who uses extended periods of rainfall to drown his victims.
Ethan Mars is trying to save his son from being the next victim, while investigative journalist Madison Paige, FBI profiler Norman Jayden, and private detective Scott Shelby are each trying to track down clues to the Origami Killer 's identity.
The player interacts with the game by performing actions highlighted on स्क्रीन सम्बन्धित to motions on the नियंत्रक, and in some cases, performing a series of quick time events during fast-paced action sequences.
The खिलाड़ी 's निर्णय और actions during the game will affect the narrative.
The main वर्ण can be मारे, and certain actions may lead to different scenes and endings.
A playable डेमो थी released on 11 February 2010.
The demo was released prior to this तिथि for people who took part in a Four Day Challenge on 5 February 2010.
A patch to allow use of the PlayStation Move controller to play the game थी released in सितंबर 2010.
Heavy Rain was critically acclaimed and has sold over two million copies.
it जीती 2010 's खेल of the साल इससे सीएनएन और गेमिंग संघ, और बेहतरीन ps3 खेल of 2010 by gamespy और ign.
A modified version of the खेल थी released titled Heavy Rain Edition Modifiée exclusively in France, aimed towards a younger audience.

Total superannuation उद्योग liabilities : members funds and reserves ( A $ millions ) since 1988.
सालाना कुल superannuation industry asset growth 1996-2005.
superannuation in ऑस्ट्रेलिया refers to the इंतजाम जिससे लोगों मेक in ऑस्ट्रेलिया to have निधि उपलब्धियाँ लिये उन्हें in retirement.
In Australia, superannuation arrangements are government-supported और प्रोत्साहित, and minimum provisions are compulsory for employees.
For example, employers are required to pay a proportion of an employee 's salaries and wages ( currently 9 % ) into a superannuation fund, but people are encouraged to put aside additional funds into superannuation.
The minimum obligation required by employers is set to increase to 12 % धीरे stepping annually from 2013 to 2020.
An individual can withdraw funds out of a superannuation fund when the person meets one of the conditions of release contained in Schedule 1 of the Superannuation Industry ( पर्यवेक्षण ) regulations 1994.

Electoral College map showing the results of the 2012 u.S. presidential election.
President Barack Obama ( D - IL ) won the popular vote in 26 states and the District of कोलंबिया ( denoted in ब्लू ) to capture 332 electoral votes.
पूर्व राज्यपाल mitt romney ( r - ma ) जीती the popular vote in 24 states ( denoted in red ) to capture 206 electoral votes.
Cartogram representation of the चुनावी कॉलेज vote for the 2012 election, with each square representing one electoral vote.
The संयुक्त राज्य चुनावी College is the institution that officially elects the President and Vice President of the United States every four years.
The President and Vice President are not elected directly by the मतदाता.
Instead, they are elected by `` electors '' who are chosen by popular vote on a state-by-state basis.
Electors are apportioned to each state and the District of Columbia, but not to territorial possessions of the United States, such as Puerto Rico and Guam.
The number of निर्वाचक in प्रत्येक राज्य is equal to the number of members of Congress to which the state is entitled.
The Twenty-third Amendment has सदा resulted in the District of Columbia having three electors.
There are 538 electors, based on there being 435 representatives and 100 senators, प्लस the three electors from the District of Columbia.
Electors are pledged to particular presidential and vice presidential उम्मीदवार, हालांकि unpledged निर्वाचक are possible.
In all states, मगर maine and Nebraska, electors are elected on a `` winner-take-all '' basis.
That is, all electors pledged to the अध्यक्षीय candidate who wins the most votes in a state become electors for that state.
Maine and Nebraska use the `` congressional district method '', selecting one elector within each congressional district by popular vote and selecting the remaining two electors by a statewide popular vote.
Although no elector is required by federal law to honor a pledge, there have only been very few occasions जब an elector voted contrary to a pledge.
The Twelfth Amendment specifies how a President and Vice President are elected and requires each elector to cast one vote for अध्यक्ष और another vote for Vice President.
Critics argue that the Electoral College is inherently undemocratic और देता झूले राज्य अनुपातहीन influence in electing the President and Vice President.
The Electoral College gives a numeric advantage in the election of the अध्यक्ष to the छोटी states, as the minimum number of electors for the small states is three compared to one for the election of representatives.
On the other hand, the winner-take-all method of मतदान favors the larger states.
A number of constitutional amendments have been proposed seeking to alter the Electoral College or replace it with a direct popular vote.
Barack Hussein Obama II ( ; born August 4, 1961 ) is the 44th और current President of the United States, the first African American to hold the office.
Born in Honolulu, Hawaii, Obama is a ग्रैजुएट of कोलंबिया University and Harvard Law School, where he was president of the Harvard Law Review.
He was a community organizer in Chicago पहले कमाई his law degree.
He worked as a civil rights attorney in Chicago and taught constitutional law at the University of Chicago Law School from 1992 to 2004.
He served three terms representing the 13th District in the Illinois Senate from 1997 to 2004, running unsuccessfully for the United States House of प्रतिनिधि in 2000.
In 2004, Obama received नेशनल ध्यान दौरान उसके अभियान to represent इलिनोइस in the United States Senate with his victory in the March Democratic Party primary, his keynote address at the Democratic National Convention in July, and his election to the Senate in November.
He began his presidential campaign in 2007, and in 2008, after a close primary campaign against Hillary Rodham Clinton, he won sufficient delegates in the लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी primaries to प्राप्त the presidential nomination.
He then defeated रिपब्लिकन nominee John McCain in the general election, and was inaugurated as president on January 20, 2009.
Nine months बाद, Obama was named the 2009 Nobel Peace Prize laureate.
He was re-elected president in November 2012, defeating Republican nominee Mitt Romney, and was sworn in लिये a second term on January 20, 2013.
Early in his first term in office, Obama signed into law economic stimulus legislation in response to the Great Recession in the form of the American Recovery and Reinvestment Act of 2009 and the Tax Relief, Unemployment Insurance Reauthorization, and Job Creation Act of 2010.
Other major domestic initiatives in his presidency include the Patient Protection and Affordable Care अधिनियम, प्रायः referred to as `` obamacare '' ; the dodd–frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act ; the Do n't Ask, Do n't Tell Repeal Act of 2010 ; the Budget Control Act of 2011 ; and the American Taxpayer Relief Act of 2012.
In May 2012, he became the first sitting U.S. president to सरेआम support same-sex marriage and in 2013 his administration filed briefs which urged the Supreme Court to rule in favor of same-sex couples in two high-profile cases.
In foreign policy, Obama ended U.S. military involvement in the Iraq War, increased troop levels in Afghanistan, signed the New START arms control treaty with Russia, ordered U.S. सैन्य भागीदारी in लीबिया, and ordered the military operation that resulted in the death of Osama bin Laden.
The होंडा cbr1100xx Super Blackbird was a Honda motorcycle made from 1996 to 2007.

Two years later the title passed to the Suzuki Hayabusa, which reached.

नमूना दृश्य of an electronic health record based on images
Sample view of an इलेक्ट्रॉनिक health record
An electronic health record ( EHR ) is an evolving concept defined as a systematic collection of electronic health information about व्यक्तिगत patients or populations.
It is a रिकार्ड in डिजिटल स्वरूप that is theoretically capable of being shared across different health care settings.
In कुछ मामले this sharing can occur by way of network-connected enterprise-wide information systems and other information networks or exchanges.
EHRs may include a range of data, including demographics, medical history, medication and allergies, immunization status, प्रयोगशाला परीक्षण परिणाम, radiology बिंब, vital signs, personal stats like age and weight, and billing information.

The Rime of the Ancient Mariner ( originally The Rime of the Ancyent Marinere ) is the longest major poem by the English poet Samuel Taylor Coleridge, written in 1797–98 and published in 1798 in the first edition of Lyrical Ballads.
Modern संस्करण उपयोग a बाद संशोधित version printed in 1817 that featured a gloss.
Along with other poems in गीतात्मक ballads, it was a signal shift to modern poetry and the beginning of British Romantic literature.
A proxy auto-config ( PAC ) file defines how web browsers and other user agents can automatically choose the appropriate proxy server ( अभिगम method ) for fetching a given URL.
A PAC file contains a JavaScript function “FindProxyForURL ( url, host ) ”.
This function returns a string साथ एक or more access method specifications.
These specifications cause the user agent to use a particular प्रॉक्सी सर्वर or to कनेक्ट directly.
Multiple specifications provide a fall-back when a proxy fails to respond.
The browser fetches इस pac file before requesting other URLs.
The URL of the PAC file is either configured manually or determined automatically by the वेब प्रॉक्सी autodiscovery Protocol.
Zendaya Coleman ( born September 1, 1996 ), known mononymously as Zendaya, is an American actress, singer and dancer.
she stars on the Disney Channel sitcom Shake It Up as रॉकी ब्लू.
She has starred in two films and निभाई एक of the lead roles in the film Frenemies as Halley Brandon.
She voiced फर्न in the Pixie Hollow Games.

Zendaya is भी a musician.
