इस is a सूची of airports in Pennsylvania ( a U.S. state ), grouped by type and sorted by location.
It contains all public-use and military airports in the राज्य.
Some private-use and former airports may be included where notable, such as airports that were previously public-use, those साथ वाणिज्यिक enplanements recorded by the FAA or airports assigned an IATA airport code.
iOS ( previously iPhone OS ) is a mobile operating system developed and distributed by Apple Inc. Originally released in 2007 for the iPhone and iPod Touch platforms, it has been extended to support other Apple devices such as the iPad and Apple TV.
Unlike Microsoft 's Windows Phone and Google 's Android, Apple does not license iOS for संस्थापना on non-Apple hardware.
, Apple 's App Store contained more than 700,000 iOS applications, जिससे have collectively been downloaded more than 30 billion times.
It had a 21 % share of the smartphone mobile operating प्रणाली इकाई shipped in the चौथी quarter of 2012, behind only Google 's Android.
in जून 2012, it accounted for 65 % of mobile web data consumption ( including use on both the iPod Touch and the iPad ).
At the half of 2012, there were 410 million devices activated.
According to the special media event held by Apple on सितंबर 12, 2012, 400 लाख डिवाइस have been sold through June 2012.
The user interface of iOS is based on the concept of direct हेरफेर, using multi-touch gestures.
Interface control elements consist of sliders, switches, और buttons.
Interaction with the OS includes gestures such as swipe, tap, पिंच, और रिवर्स pinch, all of which have specific definitions within the context of the iOS operating system and its multi-touch interface.
Internal accelerometers are प्रयुक्त by कुछ अनुप्रयोग to respond to shaking the device ( one common result is the undo command ) or rotating it in three dimensions ( one common result is switching from portrait to landscape mode ).
iOS is निकला इससे os X, with which it shares the Darwin foundation.
iOS is Apple 's mobile version of the OS X operating system used on ठहराना कंप्यूटर.
In iOS, there are four abstraction layers : the Core OS layer, the कोर सेवाएं परत, the मीडिया परत, और the cocoa Touch layer.
The current version of the operating system ( iOS 6.1.3 ) dedicates 1-1.5 GB of the device 's flash memory for the system partition, using roughly 800 mb of कि partition ( varying by model ) for iOS itself.
आईओएस फिलहाल रनों on iphone, iPad, iPod touch and Apple TV.

A spoiler is an automotive aerodynamic यंत्र जिनकी intended design function is to 'spoil ' unfavorable air movement across a body of a vehicle in motion, usually described as turbulence or drag.
Spoilers on the front of a vehicle are often called air dams, because in addition to directing air flow they also reduce the amount of air flowing underneath the गाडी जिससे generally reduces aerodynamic lift and drag.
विघ्न हैं प्रायः fitted to रेस and high-performance sports cars, although they have become common on passenger vehicles as well.
Some spoilers are added to cars primarily for styling purposes and have either little aerodynamic benefit or even make the aerodynamics worse.
विघ्न लिये गाड़ियाँ are often incorrectly confused with, or the term used interchangeably with, wings.
Automotive विंग्स are devices whose intended design is to generate downforce as air passes around them, not simply disrupt existing airflow patterns.
Mario, who serves as Nintendo 's mascot, is a fictional अक्षर created by game designer Shigeru Miyamoto and voiced by Charles Martinet.
This is a list of video games where the character Mario plays a part, either as the protagonist, antagonist, supporting अक्षर, as भाग of an ensemble cast, as a cameo, or in a game within a game.
It does not include simple references to the character, such as the portraits of Mario found in The Legend of zelda : a कड़ी to the Past.
The year indicated is the year the खेल थी पहला released, सबसे commonly in जापानी ; games were sometimes released years later in other regions of the world.
The list includes ports, remakes and compilations.
It does n't include any आभासी Console re-releases.
`` Man of Constant Sorrow '' ( also known as `` I Am A Man of Constant Sorrow '' ) is a traditional अमरीकी लोक सोंग पहला recorded by Dick Burnett, a partially blind fiddler from Kentucky.
The song was originally recorded by burnett as `` विदाई सोंग '' printed in a Richard Burnett songbook, circa 1913.
An early version was recorded by Emry Arthur in 1928 ( Vocalion Vo 5208 ).
Public interest in the song was renewed after the release of the 2000 फिल्मी O Brother, Where Art Thou ?
, as it plays a central role in the फिल्मी 's plot.
The song was also शामिल in the film 's highly successful, multiple-platinum selling soundtrack.
Josephson जंक्शन सरणी chip developed by the National Bureau of Standards as a standard volt
The volt ( symbol : V ) is the SI derived unit for electric potential ( voltage ), electric potential difference, and विद्युतवाहक force.
The volt is named in honor of the Italian physicist alessandro volta ( 1745–1827 ), who invented the voltaic pile, possibly the first chemical battery.
A plaque commemorating the location of the Sarajevo assassination and steps of Gavrilo Princip ( image taken in 1987, before steps were removed in 1992 and plaque changed from Cyrillic to Latin script )
A plaque commemorating the location of the Sarajevo assassination ( image taken in 2009 )
On 28 June 1914, Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria, heir presumptive to the Austro-Hungarian throne, and his wife, Sophie, Duchess of Hohenberg, were shot dead in Sarajevo, by Gavrilo Princip, एक of a समूह of छह बोस्नियाई serb हत्यारे coordinated by Danilo Ilić.
The political objective of the assassination was to break off Austria-Hungary 's south-slav प्रांतों so वे could be combined into a Greater Serbia or a Yugoslavia.
The हत्यारे ' motives यहूद सतत with the movement that later became known as Young Bosnia.
Serbian military officers stood पीछे the attack.
At the top of these Serbian military conspirators was Chief of Serbian सैन्य Intelligence Dragutin Dimitrijević, his righthand man Major Vojislav Tankosić, and Masterspy Rade Malobabić.
Major Tankosić armed the assassins with bombs and pistols and trained them.
The assassins were given access to the same clandestine tunnel of safe-houses and agents that Rade Malobabić used for the infiltration of weapons and operatives into Austria-Hungary.
The assassins, the key members of the clandestine tunnel, and the key सर्बियाई सैन्य conspirators who were still alive were arrested, tried, convicted and punished.
Those जो were arrested in Bosnia were tried in Sarajevo in October 1914.
The other conspirators were arrested and tried before a Serbian kangaroo court on the French-controlled Salonika Front in 1916–1917 on unrelated गलत आरोप ; सर्बिया चलाया तीन of the top military conspirators.
Much of what is known about the assassinations आता इससे ये दो ट्रायल and related records.
Assignment of responsibility for the bombing and murders of 28 June is highly controversial because the attack led to the outbreak of संसार युद्ध I one month later.
Mission San Juan Capistrano was a स्पेनी मिशन in Southern California, located in present-day San Juan Capistrano.
It was founded on सब संतो ' Day November 1, 1776, by Spanish Catholics of the Franciscan Order.
Named for Giovanni da Capistrano, a 15th century theologian and `` warrior priest '' who resided in the Abruzzo region of Italy, San Juan Capistrano रै the भेद of होने घर to the oldest भवन in California still in use, a chapel built in 1782.
Known alternately as `` Serra 's Chapel '' and `` Father Serra 's Church, '' it is the तभी extant structure where it has been documented that the padre Junipero Serra celebrated mass.
One of the best known of the Alta California missions ( and one of the few missions to have actually been founded twice—others being मिशन San Gabriel Arcángel and Mission La Purísima Concepción ).
The site was originally consecrated on अक्तूबर 30, 1775, by Father Fermín Lasuén, but was quickly abandoned due to unrest among the indigenous population in San Diego.
The कामयाबी of the उपनिवेश is evident in its historical records.
Prior to the arrival of the missionaries, some 550 natives were बिखरे throughout the local area.
By 1790, the number of converted Christians had grown to 700, and just six years later nearly 1,000 `` neophytes `` ( recent converts ) lived in or around the Mission compound.
1,649 baptisms were conducted that year alone, out of the total 4,639 souls परिवर्तित between 1776 और 1847.
अधिक than 2,000 पूर्व निवासियों ( ज़्यादातर juaneño इंडियंस ) हैं दफ्न in unmarked क़ब्रों in the मिशन 's कब्रिस्तान ( campo सेंटो ).
The remains of Father ( later Monsignor ) st. जॉन o'sullivan, जो पहचाना the प्रॉपर्टी 's historic value and working tirelessly to conserve and rebuild its structures, are buried at the entrance to the cemetery on the west side of the property, and a statue raised in his honor stands at the head of the crypt.
The surviving chapel also serves as the final resting place of three padres who passed on while serving at the Mission : Fathers José Barona, Vicente Fustér, and Vicente Pascual Oliva are सब entombed beneath the अभयारण्य मंजिल.
The Criolla or `` Mission अंगूर, '' was first planted at San Juan Capistrano in 1779 ; in 1783, the first wine produced in Alta California emerged from the Mission 's winery.
The Mission entered a long period of gradual decline after secularization in 1833.
Numerous efforts were made over the years to restore the Mission to its former glory, but none met with great success until the arrival of Father O'Sullivan in 1910.
Restoration efforts continue, and `` Serra 's Chapel '' is स्टिल प्रयुक्त for religious services.
About half-a-million visitors, सहित 80,000 school children, come to the Mission each year.
And while the ruins of `` The Great Stone Church '' ( which was all but leveled by an 1812 earthquake ) are a renowned architectural wonder, the Mission is perhaps best known for the annual `` Return of the Swallows '' which is traditionally observed every March 19 ( Saint Joseph 's Day ).
Mission San Juan Capistrano has served as a favorite subject for many notable artists, and has been immortalized in literature and on film numerous times, perhaps more than any other mission.
In 1984, a modern church complex was constructed just north and west of the मिशन यौगिक and is now known as Mission Basilica San Juan Capistrano.
Today, the mission compound serves as a संग्रहालय, साथ the सेरा चैपल भीतर the compound serving as a chapel for the mission parish.
Better Off Dead is a 1985 American teen romantic comedy film starring John Cusack and written and directed by जंगली स्टीव हॉलैंड.
It tells the story of high स्कूल छात्र लेन myer जो is suicidal after his girlfriend breaks up with him.
Mercedes-Benz Superdome ( originally louisiana superdome और commonly the superdome ) is a sports and exhibition stadium, located in the Central Business District of New Orleans, Louisiana, USA.
Plans were drawn up in 1967, by the New ऑरलियन्स modernist architectural firm of Curtis and Davis.
Its स्टील frame covers a expanse.
Its dome is made of a Lamella multi-ringed frame and has a व्यास of, बनाना it the largest fixed domed structure in the world.
It is home to the NFL 's New Orleans Saints, the NCAA 's Division I-A Tulane Green Wave football team ( the largest football stadium in Conference USA ), the State फार्म bayou क्लासिक, the r+l वाहक New Orleans Bowl, the Allstate Sugar Bowl and, every fourth year, the BCS National Championship Game.
Because of the size and location in one of the major tourist destinations in the संयुक्त राज्य, the superdome routinely makes the `` छोटी सूची '' of उम्मीदवार being considered for major sporting events, such as the Super Bowl and the Final Four.
In 2005, the Superdome gained international attention of a different type when it housed thousands of people seeking shelter from Hurricane Katrina.
The building suffered extensive damage as a result of the storm, and was closed for many months afterward.
On October 3, 2011, it was announced that German automaker mercedes-benz purchased naming rights to the stadium.
The new name took effect on अक्तूबर 23, 2011.
It is the third stadium that has naming rights from mercedes-benz ( और पहला in the संयुक्त राज्य ), बाद the mercedes-benz Arena, the stadium of Bundesliga club VfB Stuttgart, in Stuttgart, Germany and the Mercedes-Benz Arena in Shanghai, China.

Disney 's Animal Kingdom Lodge is an African-themed deluxe resort at the वॉल्ट डिज़्नी संसार Resort.
it खोली on April 16, 2001.
the रिज़ॉर्ट is स्वामित्व and operated by Walt Disney Parks and Resorts.
Disney 's Animal किंगडम आवास is located in the Animal Kingdom Resort Area, adjacent to Disney 's Animal Kingdom.
It gives guests the अवसर to दृश्य चरने वन्यजीव बाहर उनके rooms and public areas in the resort within proximity of the animals, conveying the feeling of being in an African savanna.
The People 's Party, also known as the `` populists '', थी a short-lived political party in the United States established in 1891 during the Populist movement ( United States, 19th Century ).
it थी सबसे महत्वपूर्ण in 1892-96, और तब rapidly धुंधली दूर.
Based among poor, white cotton farmers in the South ( especially उत्तर कैरोलिना, अलबामा, और टेक्सास ) और hard-pressed wheat farmers in the plains states ( especially Kansas and Nebraska ), it represented a radical crusading form of agrarianism and hostility to banks, railroads, and elites generally.
It sometimes formed coalitions with labor unions, और in 1896 the डेमोक्रेट endorsed their presidential nominee, William Jennings Bryan.
The terms `` populist '' and `` populism `` are commonly प्रयुक्त लिये anti-elitist appeals in विपक्ष to established interests and mainstream parties.
Linguistic map of Nigeria, कैमरून, and Benin.
Sign in अंग्रेज़ी, outside the University of Lagos
There हैं सैंकड़ों of languages spoken in Nigeria.
The major languages are Yoruba, Hausa, इग्बो, ईदो, fulfulde, Kanuri, and Ibibio.
The official language of Nigeria, English, the former colonial language, was chosen to facilitate the सांस्कृतिक और भाषाई unity of the country.
English, however, remains an exclusive preserve of the country 's urban elite, and is not widely बोला in rural areas, which comprise three quarters of the countries population.
Nigeria 's linguistic diversity is a microcosm of Africa as a whole, encompassing three major African languages families : Afroasiatic, nilo-saharan, और niger–congo.
Nigeria also has several as-yet unclassified languages, such as Cen Tuum, which may represent a relic of an भी वृहद diversity prior to the spread of the current language families.
a श्रेणी of कार्यक्रम led to the attack on Pearl Harbor.
युद्ध between जापानी और the संयुक्त राज्य था महरूम a सम्भावना कि प्रत्येक स्वदेश 's सैन्य शक्तियां नियोजित लिये चूंकि the 1920s, हालांकि रियल टेंशन किया नहीं शुरू जबतक the 1931 आक्रमण of मंचूरिया by जापानी.
Over the next decade, Japan expanded slowly into China, leading to all out war between the two in 1937.
In 1940 Japan invaded French Indochina in an effort to embargo all imports into China, including war supplies purchased from the U.S.
This move prompted the United States to embargo all oil exports, leading the इम्पीरियल जापानी Navy to estimate that it had less than two years of bunker oil remaining and to support the existing plans to seize oil resources in the Dutch East Indies.
Planning had been underway for some time on an attack on the `` दक्षिणी संसाधन क्षेत्रफल '' to add it to the Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere that Japan envisioned in the Pacific.
The Philippine islands, at that time an American territory, were also a जापानी target.
The Japanese military concluded that an invasion of the Philippines would provoke an American military response.
Rather than seize and fortify the islands, and wait for the inevitable US counterattack, Japan 's military leaders instead decided on the pre-emptive पर्ल हार्बर आक्रमण, जिससे वे assumed would negate the American forces needed for the liberation and reconquest of the islands.
Planning for the attack had begun in very early 1941, by Admiral isoroku Yamamoto.
He finally won assent from the Naval High Command by, among other things, threatening to resign.
The attack was approved in the summer at an Imperial Conference and again at a second सम्मेलन in the पतन.
Simultaneously over the year, pilots were trained, and ships prepared for its execution.
Authority for the attack was granted at the दूसरी इम्पीरियल Conference if a diplomatic result satisfactory to Japan was not reached.
After final approval by सम्राट हिरोहितो the order to attack was issued at the beginning of December.
A common office stapler
A common school stapler
A stapler is a mechanical device that joins चादरें of पेपर or समान material by driving a thin metal staple through the sheets and folding the ends.
Staplers are widely प्रयुक्त in government, business, offices, homes and schools.
The word `` stapler '' can actually refer to a क्रमांक of अलग devices of varying uses.
In addition to joining paper sheets together, staplers can भी be used in a surgical setting to join tissue together with surgical staples to close a surgical wound ( much in the same way as stitches or sutures ).
Typically, most staplers are used to join अनेक sheets of paper.
Paper staplers आइये in two distinct types : manual and electric.
Manual staplers are normally hand-held, although मॉडल कि हैं प्रयुक्त while set on a desk or other surface are not uncommon.
Electric staplers मौजूद in a variety of different designs and models.
Their primary ऑपरेटिंग function is to join large numbers of paper sheets together in rapid succession.
Some electric staplers can join up to 20 sheets at a time.
Swallowing, known scientifically as deglutition, is the process in the human or animal body that makes something pass from the mouth, to the pharynx, and into the esophagus, while shutting the epiglottis.
If this fails और the ऑब्जेक्ट goes through the trachea, then choking or pulmonary aspiration can occur.
In the human body it is नियंत्रित by the swallowing reflex.
Thaddeus Stevens ( April 4, 1792 – August 11, 1868 ), of Pennsylvania, was a leader of the Radical रिपब्लिकन गुट of the रिपब्लिकन पार्टी and a fierce opponent of slavery.
He was one of the most influential members in the history of Congress.
As chairman of the powerful House Ways and Means Committee, Stevens, a witty, sarcastic speaker and flamboyant पार्टी नेता, वर्चस्व the हाउस from 1861 until his death.
He wrote much of the वित्तीय legislation that paid for the American Civil War.
Stevens and Senator Charles Sumner were the prime leaders of the Radical Republicans दौरान the युद्ध और Reconstruction era.
Scholarly views of Stevens have swung sharply चूंकि उसके मौत as interpretations of Reconstruction have changed.
Historians of the Dunning School ( 1890s–1940s ) held Stevens responsible for demanding harsh treatment of the white South and violating American traditions of republicanism, depicting Stevens as a villain for his वकालत of हर्ष उपायों in the दक्षिण ऐसे as disfranchising all ex-Confederates.
This अत्यधिक negative characterization held sway into the 1950s.
The rise of the neo-abolitionist school in the 1950s led to a strong positive appreciation of Stevens ' work on civil rights for freedmen.
A recent biographer characterizes him as, `` The Great Commoner, savior of free public education in Pennsylvania, national Republican leader in the struggles against slavery in the United States and intrepid mainstay of the attempt to secure racial justice for the freedmen दौरान पुनर्निर्माण, the तभी member of the House of Representatives ever to have been known as the 'dictator ' of Congress. ''
Overview of the अनुवाद of eukaryotic messenger RNA
Diagram showing the translation of mRNA and the synthesis of प्रोटीन by a राइबोसोम
In molecular biology and genetics, translation is the process through which सेल्यूलर ribosomes manufacture प्रोटीन.
It is part of the प्रक्रम of gene expression.
In translation, messenger RNA ( mRNA ) produced by ट्रांसक्रिप्शन is decoded by the राइबोसोम to produce a specific amino acid chain, or polypeptide, that will later fold into an active protein.
In bacteria, translation occurs in the कोशिका 's कोशिकाद्रव्य, जहाँ the large and small subunits of the ribosome are located, and bind to the mRNA.
In eukaryotes, translation occurs across the membrane of the endoplasmic reticulum in a प्रक्रम पुकारा vectorial संश्लेषण.
The ribosome facilitates डिकोडिंग by inducing the binding of tRNAs with complementary anticodon sequences to that of the mRNA.
The tRNAs carry specific amino acids that are chained together into a polypeptide as the mRNA passes through and is `` read '' by the ribosome in a fashion reminiscent to that of a stock टिकर and ticker tape.
In many instances, the entire ribosome/mRNA complex binds to the outer membrane of the अशिष्ट endoplasmic reticulum and releases the nascent protein polypeptide inside for later vesicle transport and secretion outside of the cell.
Many types of transcribed RNA, such as ट्रांसफ़र RNA, ribosomal RNA, and small nuclear RNA, do not undergo translation into proteins.
Translation proceeds in four phases : initiation, elongation, translocation and termination ( all describing the growth of the amino acid chain, or polypeptide that is the उत्पाद of अनुवाद ).
Amino acids are brought to ribosomes and समवेत into प्रोटीन.
In activation, the correct amino acid is covalently bonded to the सही ट्रांसफ़र RNA ( tRNA ).
The amino एसिड is joined by its carboxyl group to the 3 ' OH of the tRNA by an ester bond.
When the tRNA has an amino एसिड linked to it, it is termed `` charged ''.
Initiation involves the small subunit of the राइबोसोम बाइंडिंग to the 5 ' end of mRNA with the help of initiation factors ( IF ).
Termination of the polypeptide happens जब the a site of the ribosome faces a stop codon ( UAA, UAG, or UGA ).
No tRNA can recognize or bind to इस codon.
Instead, the stop codon induces the binding of a release factor protein that prompts the disassembly of the संपूर्ण ribosome/mrna जटिल.
A number of antibiotics act by inhibiting translation ; ये शामिल anisomycin, cycloheximide, chloramphenicol, tetracycline, streptomycin, erythromycin, and puromycin, among others.
Prokaryotic ribosomes have a different structure from that of eukaryotic ribosomes, and thus antibiotics can specifically target bacterial infections without any detriment to a eukaryotic host 's cells.
A मल्टीमीडिया message on a mobile phone.
Multimedia Messaging Service ( MMS ) is a मानक way to send messages that include multimedia content to and from mobile phones.
It extends the core SMS ( Short Message Service ) capability that allowed exchange of text messages तभी up to 160 characters in length.
The most popular use is to send photographs from camera-equipped handsets, although it is also popular as a method of delivering news and entertainment content including videos, pictures, text pages and ringtones.
The मानक is विकसित by the Open Mobile Alliance ( OMA ), although during development it was part of the 3GPP and WAP groups.
Smallpox was an infectious disease अद्वितीय to इंसानो, caused by either of two virus variants, Variola major and Variola minor.
The disease is also known by the Latin names Variola or Variola vera, derived from varius ( `` spotted '' ) or varus ( `` pimple '' ).
The disease was originally known in English as the `` pox '' or `` red plague '' ; the term `` smallpox '' थी first used in Britain in the 15th century to distinguish variola from the `` great pox '' ( syphilis ).
The last naturally occurring case of smallpox ( Variola minor ) was diagnosed on 26 अक्तूबर 1977.
Smallpox localized in small blood बरतन of the skin and in the mouth and throat.
In the skin it resulted in a characteristic maculopapular rash and, later, raised fluid-filled blisters.
V. major produces a अधिक serious disease and has an overall mortality rate of 30–35 %.
V. minor causes a milder form of disease ( also ज्ञात as alastrim, cottonpox, milkpox, whitepox, and Cuban itch ) which kills about 1 % of its victims.
Long-term complications of V. major संक्रमण शामिल characteristic scars, commonly on the face, which occur in 65–85 % of survivors.
Blindness resulting from corneal ulceration and scarring, and limb deformities due to arthritis and osteomyelitis are less common complications, seen in about 2–5 % of cases.
smallpox is believed to have उभरा in human populations about 10,000 BC.
The earliest physical evidence of it is probably the pustular rash on the mummified देह of pharaoh ramses V of Egypt.
The disease killed an estimated 400,000 Europeans annually during the closing years of the 18th सदी ( सहित पाँच reigning monarchs ), और was responsible for a third of all blindness.
Of all those infected, 20–60 % —and over 80 % of infected children—died from the disease.
Smallpox was जिम्मेदार for an estimated 300–500 million deaths during the 20th century.
As recently as 1967, the World Health Organization ( WHO ) अनुमानित that 15 million people contracted the disease and that two million died in that year.
After vaccination campaigns throughout the 19th और 20th सदियां, the WHO certified the eradication of smallpox in 1979.
smallpox is एक of दो संक्रामक रोगों to have been eradicated, the other being rinderpest, which was declared eradicated in 2011.
`` I Want to Hold Your Hand '' is a song by the English rock band the बीटल्स.
Written by John Lennon and Paul McCartney, and recorded in October 1963, it थी the first Beatles record to be made using four-track equipment.
With advance orders exceeding one million copies in the United Kingdom, `` I Want to Hold Your Hand '' would ordinarily have gone straight to the top of the British record charts on its day of release ( 29 November 1963 ) had it not been blocked by the group 's first million seller `` She Loves You ``, the Beatles ' previous UK single, which was having a resurgent spell in the top position following intense media coverage of the group.
लेने two weeks to dislodge its predecessor, `` I Want to Hold Your Hand '' stayed at number one for five weeks and remained in the UK top fifty for twenty-one weeks in total.
It was also the group 's first American number one, entering the Billboard Hot 100 chart on 18 January 1964 at number forty-five and starting the British invasion of the अमरीकी म्यूज़िक उद्योग.
By 1 February it held the number one spot — for सात सप्ताह — before being replaced by `` She Loves You '', a reverse scenario of what had occurred in Britain, and remained in the US charts for a total of fifteen weeks.
`` I Want to Hold Your हाथ '' became the Beatles ' best-selling single worldwide.
A gasser was a type of hot rod originating on the dragstrips of the संयुक्त States in the late 1950s and continued until the early 1970s.
Gassers were based on production models from the 1930s to mid-1960s, which have been stripped of extraneous weight and jacked up using a truck beam axle to provide better weight distribution on acceleration ( Beam axles are also lighter than an स्वतंत्र सामने बर्खास्तगी ), हालांकि a उठाया भण्डार सामने बर्खास्तगी is common as well.
Common weight reduction techniques include fiberglass देह panels, stripped इंटीरियर्स and plexiglass windows ( sometimes color tinted ).
क्युकी वे यहूद primarily निर्मित लिये रेसिंग, ये गाड़ियाँ typically था the इंजन swapped to a larger or अधिक शक्तिशाली एक, the मौजूदा भण्डार इंजन परिवर्धित ( प्रायः heavily ) or दोनो.
It was बहुत आम to अनुरूप a Roots supercharger and mechanical fuel injection, such as one from Algon, Hilborn, or Crower.
With form being dictated by function, their रूप is प्रायः बहुत शीर्ष भारी और ungainly, largely due to सामने ends being raised higher than stock, to assist in the weight transfer during rapid acceleration ( racing ).
Having their exhaust pipes exit through the सामने फेंडर खूब is a आम characteristic of gassers, as is having bodies painted in flamboyant metalflakes, pearls, and candy finishes complemented by lettering in wild fonts.
The name arose because they competed in a gasoline -fueled drag racing क्लास, बल्कि than one using methanol or nitromethane.
The gasser is the predecessor of the आधुनिक Funny Car.

Electrocardiography ( ECG or EKG from ) is a transthoracic ( across the thorax or chest ) interpretation of the electrical activity of the heart over a period of time, as detected by electrodes attached to the surface of the skin and recorded by a device external to the body.
The recording produced by this noninvasive procedure is termed an electrocardiogram ( also ECG or EKG ).
An ECG is used to measure the rate and regularity of heartbeats, as खूब as the आकार और स्थिति of the कक्षों, the presence of any damage to the heart, and the effects of drugs or devices used to regulate the heart, such as a pacemaker.
Most ECGs are performed for diagnostic or research purposes on human hearts, but may भी be performed on पशु, usually for diagnosis of heart abnormalities or research.
Donald John Trump, Sr. ( born June 14, 1946 ) is an अमरीकी कारोबार magnate, television personality and author.
He is the अध्यक्ष और अध्यक्ष of The Trump Organization and the founder of Trump Entertainment Resorts.
Trump 's extravagant lifestyle, outspoken manner, and role on the NBC reality show The Apprentice have made him a well-known हस्ती who was No. 14 on the 2012 Forbes Celebrity 100 list.
Trump is the son of Fred Trump, a wealthy नई यॉर्क City real-estate developer.
He worked लिये उसके पिता 's कड़, Elizabeth Trump & Son, while attending the Wharton School of the University of Pennsylvania, and in 1968 officially joined the company.
He was given control of the company in 1971 and renamed it The Trump संगठन.
In 2010, Trump expressed an ब्याज in बनने a प्रत्याशी लिये अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त States in the 2012 election, though in May 2011, he announced he would not be a candidate.
In December 2011, ट्रम्प was suggested as a possible vice presidential selection by Michele Bachmann, if she were to win the Republican nomination.
`` A Change Is Gon na Come '' is a 1964 single by R & B singer-songwriter sam cooke, लिखा और पहला अंकित in 1963 and released under the RCA Victor label shortly after his death in late 1964.
Though only a modest hit for Cooke in comparison with his previous singles, the song came to exemplify the 1960s ' Civil Rights Movement.
The song has gained in popularity and critical acclaim in the दशकों चूंकि its release, and is # 12 on Rolling Stone 's 500 Greatest Songs of All Time.
Steam rising from the Nesjavellir Geothermal Power Station in Iceland.
geothermal उर्जा is थर्मल उर्जा उत्पन्न और भंडारित in the धरती.
Thermal energy is the energy that determines the तापमान of matter.
The Geothermal energy of the Earth 's crust originates from the original formation of the planet ( 20 % ) and from रेडियोसक्रिय क्षय of खनिज ( 80 % ).
The geothermal gradient, which is the difference in temperature between the core of the planet and its सतह, ड्राइव a निरन्तर conduction of thermal energy in the form of heat from the core to the surface.
The adjective geothermal originates from the Greek roots γη ( ge ), meaning earth, and θερμος ( thermos ), meaning hot.
At the core of the Earth, thermal energy is created by radioactive decay and temperatures may पहुँचें over 5000 °c ( 9,000 °F ).
Heat conducts from the कोर to surrounding cooler rock.
The high temperature and pressure cause some rock to melt, creating magma convection upward since it is lighter than the solid rock.
The magma heats rock and water in the क्रस्ट, sometimes up to 370 °C ( 700 °F ).
From hot springs, geothermal उर्जा रै महरूम प्रयुक्त लिये स्नान चूंकि paleolithic टाइम्स and for space heating since ancient Roman times, but it is now better known for electricity generation.
Worldwide, about 10,715 megawatts ( MW ) of geothermal शक्ति is online in 24 countries.
An additional 28 gigawatts of direct geothermal heating capacity is installed लिये ज़िला हीटिंग, space heating, spas, industrial processes, desalination and agricultural applications.
Geothermal power is cost effective, reliable, sustainable, and environmentally friendly, लकिन रै historically महरूम सीमित to areas near tectonic plate boundaries.
Recent technological advances have dramatically expanded the range and size of viable resources, especially for applications such as home heating, opening a potential for widespread exploitation.
Geothermal wells release greenhouse gases trapped deep within the earth, but these emissions are much lower per उर्जा ईकाई than those of चट्टान fuels.
As a result, geothermal power has the potential to help mitigate global warming if widely deployed in place of fossil fuels.
The Earth 's geothermal resources are theoretically more than adequate to supply humanity 's energy needs, लकिन तभी a बहुत छोटी भिन्न may be profitably शोषित.
Drilling and खोजी for deep resources is very expensive.
Forecasts for the future of geothermal शक्ति निर्भर on assumptions about technology, energy prices, subsidies, and interest rates.
Pilot programs like EWEB 's customer opt in Green Power Program show that customers would be willing to अदा a छोटी अधिक लिये a renewable energy source like geothermal.
But as a result of government assisted research and industry experience, the cost of generating geothermal शक्ति रै decreased by 25 % over the past two decades.
In 2001, geothermal energy cost between two and ten सेंट per kwh.
Ownership of property may be private, collective, or common and the property may be वस्तुएँ, land/real estate, or intellectual property.
Determining ownership in law involves determining who has certain rights and duties over the प्रॉपर्टी.
These rights and duties, sometimes called a 'bundle of rights ', can be अलग and held by different parties.
The question of ownership reaches back to the ancient philosophers, Plato और Aristotle, who held different opinions on the subject.
Plato ( 428/427 BC – 348/347 BC ) thought private property created divisive inequalities, while Aristotle ( 384 BC – 322 BC ) विचार निजी प्रॉपर्टी सक्रिय लोगों to receive the full benefit of their labor.
Private property can circumvent what is now referred to as the “ त्रासदी of the commons ” problem, where people tend to degrade common property more than they do private property.
Given a short-sighted owner, however, a private property system can make these tragedies worse—for example, a private owner of a piece of oil-rich property, depending on his worldview, might be अधिक दिलचस्पी in short-term वित्तीय लाभ than वृद्धिशील उपयोग साथ an नजर toward अन्य 's चिंताएं ( e.g., those of भविष्य generations, the disenfranchised, etc. ).
While Aristotle justified the existence of private ownership, he left open questions of ( 1 ) how to allocate property between what is private and common और ( 2 ) how to allocate the private property within society.
over the सहस्राब्दियों, और आरपार संस्कृतियों what can be property and how it is regarded culturally have varied widely.
Ownership is the basis for many other concepts that form the foundations of ancient and modern societies such as money, व्यापार, कर्ज़, bankruptcy, the criminality of theft, and private vs. public property.
Ownership is the key भवन ब्लाक in the development of the capitalist socio-economic system.
Adam Smith stated that one of the sacred laws of justice was to guard a person 's property and possessions.
The process and mechanics of ownership are fairly complex : one can gain, transfer and lose स्वामित्व of प्रॉपर्टी in a number of ways.
To acquire property one can purchase it with money, trade it for अन्य प्रॉपर्टी, receive it as a gift, steal it, find it, make, it or homestead it.
एक can ट्रांसफ़र or lose ownership of property by selling it for money, exchanging it for other property, giving it as a gift, being robbed of it, it, or having it stripped from one 's ownership through legal means such as eviction, foreclosure, seizure, or taking.
Ownership is self-propagating in that the owner of any property will also own the economic लाभ of that property.
`` What 's My नाम ? '' is a song recorded by Barbadian recording artist Rihanna, for her fifth studio album Loud ( 2010 ).
Featuring guest vocals from Canadian rapper Drake, the song was released as the second single from Loud on अक्तूबर 29, 2010 through Def Jam Recordings.
The R & B song was produced by the नॉर्वेजियाई उत्पादन duo स्टारगेट, और थी लिखा by the duo along with Ester Dean, Traci Hale, and Drake.
Lyrically, it incorporates themes of sexual intercourse और romance.
Music critics gave the song positive reviews, citing it some of Rihanna 's best vocal work to date ; there was a तारीफ़ regarding its romantic nature, as well as its sexual tones.
`` What 's My Name ? '' was a commercial success and topped the US Billboard Hot 100 chart, giving Rihanna her third number-one single in 2010, as खूब as उसके आठवीं overall on the चार्ट.
The song also topped the charts in Hungary and the United Kingdom and reached the top five in कनाडा, आयरलैंड, नई Zealand, Norway and Slovakia.
The song received a nomination at the 54th ग्रैमी Awards for Best Rap/Sung Collaboration.
An accompanying music video, निर्देशित by फिलिप andelman, portrays a रोमांटिक एनकाउंटर between Rihanna and Drake in a grocery store along with romantic scenes between the pair and Rihanna walking through Manhattan 's Lower East Side.
`` What 's My Name ? '' was promoted with live performances across both sides of the Atlantic, including Saturday Night Live in America and the series seven finale of The X Factor in the United Kingdom.
The latter performance resulted in an investigation from the देश 's मीडिया नियामक, Ofcom, for the raunchy nature of Rihanna 's outfit.
A mathematical constant is a special number, usually a real number, that is `` significantly interesting in some way ''.
Constants arise in many different areas of mathematics, with constants such as e ( mathematical constant ) | and pi| occurring in ऐसे विविध contexts as भूगोल, number theory and calculus.
What it means for a constant to arise `` naturally '', and what makes a constant `` interesting '', is ultimately a matter of taste, and some mathematical constants are notable more for historical reasons than लिये उनके intrinsic mathematical interest.
The more popular स्थिरांक have महरूम पढ़ाई throughout the ages and computed to many decimal places.
All mathematical constants are definable numbers and usually are also computable numbers ( Chaitin 's constant being a significant एक्सेप्शन ).
Elections to the United States Senate were held on November 2, 2010, for 37 of the United States Senate 's 100 seats.
( A special चुनाव on जनवरी 19, 2010 in Massachusetts was held earlier in the year. )
thirty-four of the सीटे यहूद लिये six-year terms to the Senate 's `` class three '', and three were special elections for shorter terms.
Of the 37 elections, 19 featured incumbent Democrats ( 7 of whom retired or were defeated in the primary ) and 18 प्रदर्शित लाज़िम republicans ( eight of whom retired or were defeated in the primary ).
After the previous elections ( in 2008 ), the United States Senate was composed of 58 Democrats, 40 Republicans, and 2 independents जो caucus साथ the डेमोक्रेट.
Republicans won four seats held by retiring डेमोक्रेट and Republicans defeated two incumbent Democrats.
This was the largest number of Republicans gains since the 1994 elections and also the पहला समय चूंकि कि चुनाव कि republicans successfully defended all of their own seats.
This was the fourth consecutive election of `` class 3 '' senators where Democrats have failed to लाभ सीटे और the third consecutive mid-term election held in a president 's first term where Republicans have picked-up seats.
Despite these Republican wins, however, the Democrats retained a majority of the Senate with 51 seats plus 2 independents who caucus with them, compared to the 47 republicans.
A solstice is an astronomical event that occurs twice each year as the Sun reaches its highest or न्यूनतम excursion सापेक्ष to the celestial equator on the celestial sphere.
As a result, on the day of the solstice, the Sun appears to have reached its highest or lowest सालाना ऊँचाई in the आसमान ऊपर the क्षितिज at local solar noon.
The word solstice is derived from the Latin sol ( sun ) and sistere ( to stand still ), because at the solstices, the Sun stands still in declination ; that is, the मौसमी गति of the Sun 's path ( as seen from Earth ) comes to a stop before reversing direction.
The solstices, together with the equinoxes, are connected with the seasons.
In अनेक संस्कृतियों the solstices mark either the beginning or the midpoint of winter and summer.
The term संक्रांति can also be used in a broader sense, as the date ( day ) when this occurs.
The day of the solstice is either the longest day of the साल ( in गर्मियाँ ) or the shortest दिन of the year ( in winter ) for any place outside of the tropics.
जेरी ली लुईस ( born सितंबर 29, 1935 ) is an American rock and roll and country music singer-songwriter and pianist.
He is known by the nickname `` The कातिल '' and is often viewed as “rock & roll 's first great wild man”.
An early pioneer of चट्टान और फेंकें म्यूज़िक, in 1956 Lewis made his first recordings at Sun Records.
`` Crazy Arms `` sold 300,000 copies in the दक्षिण, लकिन it थी उसके 1957 hit `` पूरे lotta shakin ' Going On `` that shot Lewis to fame worldwide.
Lewis followed this in that same year when he recorded songs such as `` Great गेंदें of आग ``, `` breathless `` और `` ऊँची School Confidential ``.
Lewis sold more records than Elvis प्रेस्ली at this time.
However, Lewis ' rock 'n ' roll career faltered in the wake of his विवाह to उसके यंग cousin.
He had little success in the charts following the scandal and his popularity quickly faded.
His live performance fees plummeted from $ 10,000 per night to $ 250.
In the meantime he was determined to gain back some of his लोकप्रियता.
During the early 60’s he did n't have much chart success with few exceptions such as `` कया 'd i Say ``.
His live performances at this time were increasingly जंगली और energetic.
His album Live at the Star Club, Hamburg from 1964 is often regarded by many music journalists and fans as एक of the wildest और महानतम rock and roll concert albums ever.
After recording songs such as `` I 'm on Fire '' for several years with little success, in 1968 Lewis made a transition into country music and had हिट्स साथ गीतों such as `` Another Place, Another Time ''.
This reignited his career and throughout the late '60s and '70s he regularly topped the country-western charts.
His # 1 देश हिट्स शामिल `` to मेक प्रेम मीठी For You ``, `` There Must Be More to Love Than This ``, `` Would You Take Another Chance on Me `` and `` Me And Bobby McGee ``.
Lewis 's successes continued throughout the दशक और he embraced उसके चट्टान 'n ' फेंकें पास्ट साथ गीतों ऐसे as a कवर of the Big Bopper 's `` Chantilly Lace `` and `` Rockin ' My Life Away ``.
In the 21st सदी लुईस continues to tour to audiences around the world and still releases new albums.
One such album, titled Last Man Standing, is his best selling to date at over a million copies sold worldwide.
This was followed by Mean Old Man which has प्राप्त कुछ of the best sales of Lewis’s career.
Lewis has had a dozen gold records in both rock and country, won several Grammy awards, including a Lifetime Achievement पुरस्कार.
Lewis was inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 1986, and his pioneering contribution to the genre has महरूम पहचाना by the rockabilly हॉल of Fame.
In 1989, his life was chronicled in the movie Great Balls of Fire, starring Dennis Quaid.
In 2003, Rolling स्टोन Magazine listed his box set All Killer, No Filler : The Anthology number 242 on their list of `` 500 greatest albums of all time ``.
In 2004, they ranked him number 24 on their सूची of the 100 महानतम Artists of All Time.
Lewis is the last surviving member of Sun Records ' Million Dollar Quartet and the क्लास of '55 एल्बम, जिससे भी शामिल Johnny Cash, Carl Perkins, Roy Orbison and Elvis Presley.
Henry Louis Stephens, बेनाम watercolor ( 1863 ) of a man reading a newspaper with headline `` Presidential Proclamation / Slavery ''.
The Emancipation Proclamation was an order issued to all segments of the Executive branch ( including the Army and Navy ) of the संयुक्त राज्य by President Abraham Lincoln on January 1, 1863, during the American Civil War.
It was based on the president 's constitutional authority as commander in chief of the हथियारबंद शक्तियां ; it थी नहीं a विधि passed by Congress.
It proclaimed all those enslaved in Confederate territory to be forever फ़्री, और ordered the फौज ( and all segments of the Executive branch ) to treat as free all those enslaved in ten states that were still in rebellion, thus applying to 3.1 million of the 4 million slaves in the U.S.
The Proclamation could not be enforced in areas still under rebellion, but as the army took control of Confederate regions, the slaves in those regions यहूद emancipated बल्कि than लौटे to their masters.
From 20,000 to 50,000 former slaves in regions where rebellion had already been subdued were immediately emancipated, and over 3 million more were emancipated as the Union फौज उन्नत.
The Proclamation did not apply to the five slave राज्य कि यहूद नहीं in विद्रोह, nor to सबसे regions already नियंत्रित by the Union army ; emancipation there would come after separate state actions and/or the December 1865 ratification of the Thirteenth Amendment, which made slavery illegal everywhere in the U.S.
The Proclamation did not compensate the owners, did not itself outlaw slavery, and did not make the ex-slaves ( called freedmen ) citizens.
It made the eradication of slavery an explicit war goal, in addition to the goal of reuniting the Union.
On September 22, 1862, Lincoln था जारी a preliminary proclamation that he would order the emancipation of all slaves in any state of the Confederate States of America that did not return to Union control by January 1, 1863.
None returned, and the order, signed and issued January 1, 1863, took effect except in locations जहाँ the संघ था already mostly regained control.
The Proclamation outraged white Southerners who envisioned a race war, angered some Northern Democrats, energized anti-slavery forces, and weakened शक्तियां in यूरोपीय कि wanted to intervene to help the Confederacy.
It also lifted the spirits of अफ़्रीकी अमेरिकी दोनो in the Southern and Northern States, and led to many slaves escaping their masters and running behind Union lines in order to have their emancipation enforced.
Sucker Punch is a 2011 American fantasy action film directed by Zack Snyder and co-written by him and Steve Shibuya.
It is Snyder 's पहला फिल्मी आधारित on an original script.
The film stars Emily ब्राउनिंग, abbie Cornish, Jena Malone, Vanessa Hudgens, Jamie Chung, and Carla Gugino.
The storyline follows the fantasies of a young woman who is committed to a mental institution, as वो makes a plan to escape the hospital before suffering a lobotomy.
The film was released in both conventional and IMAX theatres in the United States at मध्यरात्रि on March 25, 2011.
It received generally ऋणात्मक समीक्षाएँ from critics, but was a moderate box office success.
Front and back of Canon PowerShot A95, a typical pocket-size digital camera
Haselblad 503CW with Ixpress V96C digital back, an example of a पेशेवर डिजिटल camera system
A digital camera ( or digicam ) is a camera that takes video or still photographs by recording images on an इलेक्ट्रॉनिक चित्र sensor.
Most cameras बेची आज are digital, and digital cameras are incorporated into many devices ranging from PDAs and mobile phones ( called camera phones ) to vehicles.
Digital and film cameras share an optical system, typically using a lens with a variable diaphragm to focus light onto an image pickup device.
The diaphragm और शटर admit the correct amount of light to the imager, just as with film but the image pickup device is electronic rather than chemical.
however, नापसंद फिल्मी कैमरे, डिजिटल cameras can display images on a screen immediately after being recorded, and store and delete images from memory.
अनेक डिजिटल cameras can also record moving video with sound.
कुछ डिजिटल कैमरे can क्रॉप और सिलाई तस्वीरें और perform अन्य elementary चित्र संपादन.
The inside and front of a Dell PowerEdge web server, a computer designed लिये रैक mounting
Multiple web servers may be प्रयुक्त for a high traffic website, here four Sun Fire X4200 servers are installed together
Web server can refer to either the hardware ( the computer ) or the software ( the computer application ) that helps to उद्धार वेब सामग्री कि can be पहुँचा through the अंतरजाल.
The most common use of वेब सर्वर is to मेजबान websites, but there are other uses such as gaming, data storage or running enterprise applications.
The American Red Cross ( ARC ), also known as the American National Red Cross, is a humanitarian organization that provides emergency assistance, disaster relief and education inside the United States.
It is the designated U.S. संबद्ध of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies.
Today, in addition to domestic disaster relief, the American Red Cross offers services in five other areas : community services that help the needy ; communications services and comfort for military members and their family members ; the collection, processing and distribution of blood and blood products ; educational programs on preparedness, health, and safety ; and international relief and development programs.
Issued a corporate charter by the United States Congress under Title 36 of the United States Code, Section 3001, the American नेशनल Red Cross is governed by volunteers and supported by community donations, income from health and safety training and products, and income from blood products.
The American Red Cross is headquartered in Washington, D.C.
The अध्यक्ष of the फलक of राज्यपालों, serving her second three-year term, is Bonnie McElveen-Hunter.
The current President and Chief Executive Officer is Gail J. McGovern.

A rooster ( also called a cockerel or मुर्गा ) is a male gallinaceous bird.
It usually refers to a male chicken ( Gallus gallus ).
Immature male chickens less than one year old are called cockerels.
The term `` rooster '' originates in the United States, and the term is widely used throughout उत्तर अमेरिका, as well as Australia and New Zealand.
In the United किंगडम और आयरलैंड the older term `` cockerel '' is more commonly used.
`` Cock '' is in general use as the name for a male of other species of bird, for example `` मुर्गा गौरैया ''.
`` roosting '' is the कार्रवाई of perching aloft to sleep at night, and is done by both sexes.
The rooster is polygamous, लकिन can नहीं guard several nests of eggs at once.
He guards the general area where his hens are nesting, and will attack अन्य roosters कि enter his territory.
During the daytime, he usually sits on a high पर्च, प्रायः 3–5 feet off the ground to serve as a lookout for his flock.
He will sound a distinctive सचेतक कॉल if predators are nearby.
The Pokémon Trading Card Game ( Pokémon TCG ) is a collectible card game based on the Pokémon video game series, first published in October 1996 by Media Factory in Japan.
In the US, it was initially published by wizards of the Coast, the company that produces, in December 1998.
निन्टेंडो took over publishing in June 2003.
It is one of Nintendo 's last remaining दमदार links to its heritage as a playing card company.
Land Rover is a British car manufacturer with its headquarters in gaydon, warwickshire, संयुक्त Kingdom which specialises in four-wheel-drive vehicles.
It is part of the Jaguar Land रोवर group, a subsidiary of Tata Motors of India.
It is the second oldest four-wheel-drive car ब्रांड in the world ( after Jeep ).
The Land Rover name was originally used by the Rover Company for one specific vehicle model, named बस the जमीन रोवर, शुभारम्भ by रोवर in 1948.
Over the following years it developed into a marque encompassing a range of four-wheel-drive models, including the Defender, Discovery, Freelander, Range Rover, Range Rover Sport and Range Rover Evoque.
Land Rovers are currently assembled in the company 's Halewood and Solihull plants, with research and development taking प्लेस at jlr 's Gaydon and Whitley engineering centres.
Land Rover sold 194,000 वाहनों विश्वव्यापी in 2009.
Although the brand originates from the original 1948 मॉडल, जमीन रोवर as a company has only existed since 1978.
Prior to this, it was a product line of the Rover Company which was subsequently absorbed into the rover-triumph प्रभाग of the अंग्रेजों Leyland Motor Corporation ( BL ) following Leyland Motor Corporation ’s takeover of Rover in 1967.
The ongoing commercial success of the original Land Rover series models, and latterly the Range Rover in the 1970s in the midst of BL’s well documented business troubles prompted the establishment of a separate Land Rover company but still under the BL छतरियाँ, बाकी भाग of the subsequent रोवर समूह in 1988, अंतर्गत the स्वामित्व of अंग्रेजों aerospace after the remains of British Leyland were broken up and privatised.
in 1994 रोवर समूह पीएलसी थी acquired by bmw.
In 2000, Rover Group was broken-up by bmw and Land Rover was sold to Ford Motor Company, becoming part of its Premier Automotive Group.
In 2006 Ford purchased the Rover brand इससे bmw for around £6 million.
This reunited the Rover and Land Rover brands लिये the पहला समय चूंकि 2000 जब the Rover group was broken up by BMW.
In June 2008, Ford sold both Land Rover and Jaguar Cars to Tata Motors.
This sale also शामिल the dormant Rover brand
The cover of the first DVD संकलन released by Aniplex of The New Captain Shūsuke Amagai arc
The ninth season of the ब्लीच दुश्मनी श्रेणी is named.
the श्रेणी is based on Tite Kubo 's manga with same name.
The episodes are directed by Noriyuki Abe and उत्पादित by TV Tokyo, Dentsu, and Studio Pierrot.
The episodes ' plot focuses on the introduction of a new Soul Reaper captain, Shūsuke Amagai, and the mystery surrounding the kasumiōji गोत्र, one of the families that constitute the nobility of Soul Society.
The season began airing on April 23, 2008 in Japan on TV Tokyo और ended on October 7, 2008.
The English adaptation of the Bleach anime is licensed by Viz Media, and this arc began airing on अगस्त 28, 2010 on कार्टून Network 's Adult Swim, and finished on January 29, 2011.
Five DVD compilations, each containing four एपीसोड of the ऋतु, have महरूम released by aniplex ; the first DVD compilation was released on November 26, 2008 and the fifth on March 25, 2009.
A DVD box will be प्रकाशित by Viz Media on December 13, 2011.
The episodes use three pieces of theme music : one opening theme and two closing विषयवस्तु.
The खोलने theme is `` Chu-Bura `` by Kelun.
The first closing theme is `` Orange '' by Lil'B, used for episodes 168 to 179, and the second closing theme is `` Gallop '' by pe'zmoku, used for the remainder of the episodes.
The regulation of prostitution in the United States is not among the enumerated powers of the federal government ; Under the Tenth Amendment to the United States Constitution, it is therefore exclusively the domain of the states to permit, prohibit, or otherwise regulate commercial sex, except insofar as Congress may विनियमित it as भाग of अंतरराज्यीय कॉमर्स साथ कानून जैसे the मन अधिनियम.
In most states, prostitution is माना a misdemeanor in the category of public order crime, a crime that disrupts the order of a community.
It was at one time माना to be a vagrancy crime.
फिलहाल, नेवाडा is the only state to allow brothel prostitution, the terms of which are stipulated in the Nevada Revised Statutes.
Only 8 काउंटी currently contain active brothels.
All forms of prostitution are illegal in Clark County ( which contains the Las Vegas–Paradise महानगर क्षेत्रफल ), washoe County ( which contains Reno ), Carson City, Douglas County, and Lincoln County.
The other counties theoretically allow brothel वेश्यावृति, लकिन कुछ of ये काउंटी currently have no active brothels.
Street prostitution, `` pandering, '' and living off of the proceeds of a prostitute remain illegal under Nevada law, as elsewhere in the country.
As with अन्य देशों, prostitution in the United States can be divided into three broad categories : street prostitution, brothel prostitution, and escort prostitution.
The East Coast of the United States, also known as the Eastern Seaboard or the Atlantic seaboard और commonly shortened to East Coast, refers to the easternmost coast of the United States along the Atlantic Ocean.
The states जिससे have shoreline on the East Coast are, from north to south, the U.S. states of Maine, New Hampshire, Massachusetts, Rhode Island, Connecticut, New York, New Jersey, Delaware, Maryland, Virginia, North Carolina, South Carolina, Georgia, and Florida.
Richard Milhous Nixon ( January 9, 1913 – अप्रैल 22, 1994 ) थी the 37th अध्यक्ष of the United States, serving from 1969 to 1974, when he became the only president to resign the office.
Nixon had previously served as a Republican U.S. representative and senator from California and as the 36th Vice President of the United States from 1953 to 1961.
Nixon was born in Yorba लिंडा, California.
He ग्रैजुएट इससे whittier College in 1934 and Duke University School of Law in 1937, returning to California to practice law.
He and his wife, Pat Nixon, moved to Washington to work for the संघीय सरकारी in 1942.
He subsequently served in the United राज्य नेवी दौरान World War II.
Nixon was elected in California to the House of प्रतिनिधि in 1946 and to the Senate in 1950.
His pursuit of the Alger Hiss case established his reputation as a leading anti-communist, and elevated him to national prominence.
He was the running mate of Dwight D. Eisenhower, the Republican Party अध्यक्षीय nominee in the 1952 election.
Nixon परोसा लिये eight years as vice president.
He waged an unsuccessful अध्यक्षीय अभियान in 1960, narrowly losing to John F. Kennedy, and lost a race for Governor of California in 1962.
In 1968, he ran again लिये the प्रेसिडेंसी and was elected.
Although Nixon initially escalated America 's भागीदारी in the Vietnam War, he subsequently ended U.S. involvement in 1973.
Nixon 's विज़िट to the लोगों 's Republic of China in 1972 opened diplomatic relations between the two nations, and he initiated détente and the Anti-Ballistic Missile Treaty with the Soviet Union the same year.
Domestically, his प्रशासन generally embraced policies that transferred power from Washington to the states.
Among other things, he शुभारम्भ पहलों to fight cancer and illegal drugs, imposed wage and price controls, enforced desegregation of some Southern schools, and established the Environmental Protection Agency.
Though he presided over the चंद्र अवतरण beginning with Apollo 11, he scaled back manned space exploration.
He was re-elected by a landslide in 1972.
Nixon 's second पद देखी an Arab oil embargo, the resignation of his vice president, Spiro Agnew, and a continuing series of revelations about the Watergate scandal and other misconduct by members of the administration.
The scandal escalated, costing Nixon much of his political support, और on अगस्त 9, 1974, he resigned in the face of almost certain impeachment and removal from office.
After his resignation, he controversially received a pardon issued by his successor, Gerald Ford.
In retirement, Nixon 's work as an elder statesman, authoring अनेक किताबे और undertaking many foreign trips, helped to rehabilitate his public image.
He suffered a debilitating stroke on April 18, 1994, and died four days later at the आयु of 81.
Sertraline hydrochloride ( trade names Zoloft, Lustral ) is an antidepressant of the selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor ( SSRI ) class.
it थी introduced to the market by Pfizer in 1991.
Sertraline is primarily विहित लिये प्रमुख depressive disorder in adult outpatients as well as obsessive–compulsive, panic, and social anxiety disorders in both adults and children.
In 2011, it was the second-most prescribed antidepressant on the U.S. retail market, with 37,208,000 prescriptions.
The efficacy of sertraline for depression is similar to that of older tricyclic antidepressants, but इसके side effects are much less pronounced.
Differences साथ नए antidepressants हैं subtler and also mostly confined to side effects.
Evidence suggests that sertraline may work better than fluoxetine ( Prozac ) for some subtypes of अवसाद.
Treatment of panic disorder साथ sertraline परिणाम in a significant घटी of the number of panic attacks and in improved quality of life.
For obsessive-compulsive disorder, sertraline is not as effective as cognitive behavioral therapy ; the best results have महरूम हासिल by combining these two treatments.
Although approved for social phobia and posttraumatic तनाव विकार, sertraline लीड to तभी modest improvement in these conditions.
Sertraline also alleviates the लक्षण of premenstrual dysphoric disorder and can be used in sub-therapeutic doses or intermittently for its treatment.
Sertraline shares the common side effects and contraindications of other SSRIs, with high rates of nausea, diarrhea, insomnia, and sexual side effects ; however, it does not cause वज़न लाभ, और इसके effects on both cognition and vigilance are relatively mild.
In pregnant women taking sertraline, the drug was present in significant concentrations in fetal blood, and was also संबद्ध साथ a उच्चतर रेट of various birth defects.
Similarly to other antidepressants, the use of sertraline for depression may be associated साथ a higher rate of suicidality.
The Five Heartbeats is a 1991 musical drama फिल्मी निर्देशित by Robert Townsend, who co-wrote the script with Keenan Ivory Wayans.
Distributed by 20th Century Fox, the film 's main cast includes Townsend, Michael Wright, Leon Robinson, Harry J. Lennix, Tico Wells, Harold Nicholas of the Nicholas Brothers, and Diahann Carroll.
The plot of the फिल्मी ( जिससे is loosely based on the lives of several artists : The Dells, The Temptations, Four Tops, Wilson Pickett, James Brown, Frankie Lymon, Sam Cooke and others ) follows the three decade career of the R & B vocal group The Five Heartbeats.
The film depicts the वृद्धि और पतन of a motown प्रेरित आत्मा अधिनियम through the eyes of the film 's main protagonist, Donald `` Duck '' Matthews ( portrayed by Townsend ), who serves as a narrator throughout the film.
However, a majority of the cinema is presented in a consecutive समय लकीर as opposed to traditional flash backs.
The film includes a significant amount of original music conceived by various artists for the film 's soundtrack, including singles such as `` A Heart Is a House for Love ``, `` We Have n't Finished Yet '', and `` Nothing But Love ''.
The film was released to most North American audiences March 29, 1991 however it was not made available to audiences in other continents until 2002 when a DVD was released prior to another dvd रिलीज in 2006 लिये the फिल्मी 's 15th वर्षगांठ.
The movie received mixed समीक्षाएँ इससे critics.
Secretariat ( March 30, 1970 – अक्तूबर 4, 1989 ) थी an अमरीकी Thoroughbred racehorse that in 1973 became the first U.S. Triple Crown champion in 25 years.
He set race records in all three events in the Series — the Kentucky Derby ( 1:59.4 ), the preakness stakes ( 1:53 ), and the Belmont Stakes ( 2:24 ) — records that still stand today.
He is माना to be one of the greatest Thoroughbreds of all time.
In 1999, ESPN ranked Secretariat the 35th best athlete of the 20th century, the highest ranking racehorse on the list URL_http.
He ranked second behind Man o ' War in The Blood-Horse 's List of the Top 100 U.S. Racehorses of the 20th Century.
Secretariat was sired by Bold Ruler out of somethingroyal, by Princequillo.
he थी foaled at The Meadow in Caroline County, Virginia.
Like his famous predecessor Man o ' War, Secretariat थी a विशाल शाहबलूत colt and was given the same nickname, `` Big Red. ''
Secretariat 's grandsire, Nasrullah, is also the great-great-grandsire of 1977 ट्रिपल Crown winner Seattle Slew.
Owned by पैनी chenery, he was trained by Lucien Laurin and mainly ridden by Canadian jockey Ron Turcotte, along with apprentice jockey Paul Feliciano ( first two races ), and veteran Eddie Maple ( last race ).
He raced in Chenery 's मर्ग stable 's blue and white checkered colors and his groom was Eddie Sweat.
Secretariat stood approximately tall, and weighed, with a 75-inch girth, in उसके रेसिंग प्रधान.
A typical 12 V, 40 Ah lead-acid car battery
An automotive battery is a type of rechargeable battery that supplies इलेक्ट्रिक उर्जा to an automobile.
Usually this refers to an sli बैटरी ( starting, lighting, ignition ) to power the starter motor, the lights, and the ignition system of a vehicle’s engine.
Automotive SLI बैटरी हैं प्रायः lead-acid type, and are made of six galvanic cells in series to provide a 12 volt system.
Each cell provides 2.1 volts for a total of 12.6 volt at पूरा चार्ज.
Heavy vehicles such as highway trucks or tractors, often equipped with diesel engines, may have two batteries in series for a 24 volt system, or may have समानांतर strings of batteries.
Lead-acid batteries are made up of plates of lead and separate plates of lead dioxide, which are submerged into an electrolyte solution of about 38 % sulfuric acid and 62 % water.
This causes a chemical reaction that releases electrons, allowing उन्हें to flow through conductors to produce electricity.
As the battery discharges, the acid of the electrolyte reacts with the materials of the plates, बदलना उनके सतह to lead sulfate.
When the battery is recharged, the chemical reaction is reversed : the सीसे सल्फेट reforms into सीसे डाइऑक्साइड and lead.
With the plates restored to their असली condition, the process may now be repeated.
Battery recycling of automotive batteries reduces the need for resources required for manufacture of new batteries, diverts विषाक्त सीसे इससे landfills, और रोकता risk of improper disposal.
Full-time employment is नियुक्ति in which a person works a minimum number of hours defined as such by his/her employer.
Full-time employment often comes साथ लाभ कि हैं नहीं typically offered to part-time, temporary, or flexible workers, such as annual leave, sickleave, and health insurance.
full-time jobs are often considered careers.
They generally pay more than part-time jobs, and usually carry more hours per week.
The Fair Labor Standards Act ( FLSA ) does not define full-time employment or part-time employment.
This is a matter generally to be संकल्पित by the employer ( US Department of Labor ).
The definition by employer can vary and is generally published in a company 's Employee हैंडबुक.
Companies commonly require from 30–35 or 40 hours per सप्ताह to be defined as full-time and therefore eligible for benefits.
Full-Time status varies between company and is often based on the shift the employee must work during each work week.
The `` standard '' work week consists of five eight-hour days, commonly परोसा between 9:00AM to 5:00PM totaling 40 hours.
While a four-day week generally consists of four ten-hour days ; it may also consist of as little as नौ घंटों लिये a कुल of a 36 hour work week.
Twelve-hour shifts are प्रायः तीन दिनों per week, unless the company has the intention of paying out the employee overtime.
Overtime is legally paid out anytime an employee works more than 40 hours per सप्ताह.
The legal minimum for ओवरटाइम starts at Base Pay + One-Half.
The increased payout is considered to compensate slightly for the increased थकान जिससे a person experiences on such long shifts.
शिफ्ट can भी be बहुत irregular, as in retail, but are still full-time if the required number of hours is reached.
There are some situations where a person who needs full-time work is dropped to part-time, which is sometimes a रूप of constructive dismissal to avoid paying unemployment benefits to a laid-off worker.
Seahorse is the title given to 54 प्रजाति of marine fish in the genus Hippocampus.
`` Hippocampus '' आता इससे the Ancient Greek hippos meaning `` horse '' and kampos meaning `` sea monster ''.
The Controlled Substances Act ( CSA ) was enacted into law by the Congress of the United States as शीर्षक II of the Comprehensive Drug Abuse Prevention and Control Act of 1970.
The CSA is the federal U.S. drug policy under which the manufacture, importation, possession, use and distribution of certain substances is regulated.
The Act also served as the national implementing विधान for the Single Convention on Narcotic Drugs.
The विधान निर्मित five Schedules ( classifications ), with varying qualifications for a substance to be included in each.
Two federal agencies, the Drug Enforcement Administration and the Food and Drug Administration, determine which substances are added to or removed from the various schedules, though the statute passed by Congress निर्मित the आरंभिक लिस्टिंग, और कॉंग्रेस रै sometimes अनुसूचित अन्य substances through विधान ऐसे as the hillory J. farias और सामन्था reid date-rape रोकथाम अधिनियम of 2000, जिससे लगाई गामा hydroxybutyrate in अनुसूची i. वर्गीकरण decisions are required to be made on criteria including potential for abuse ( an undefined term ), currently accepted medical use in treatment in the United States, and international treaties.
Maya numerals
Maya numerals are a vigesimal ( base - twenty ) numeral system used by the Pre-Columbian Maya civilization.
The numerals are made up of three symbols ; zero ( shell shape ), one ( a dot ) and five ( a bar ).
For example, thirteen is written as three dots in a horizontal row above two horizontal lines stacked above each other.
Lyndon Baines Johnson ( August 27, 1908 – January 22, 1973 ), often referred to as LBJ, was the 36th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य ( 1963–1969 ), a position he assumed after his service as the 37th Vice President of the United States ( 1961–1963 ).
He is one of only four people who परोसा in सब चार निर्वाचित संघीय कार्यालयों of the United States : Representative, Senator, Vice President, and President.
Johnson, a Democrat from Texas, served as a United States Representative from 1937–1949 and as a Senator from 1949–1961, including six years as United States Senate Majority Leader, two as Senate Minority Leader and two as Senate Majority Whip.
After campaigning unsuccessfully for the Democratic nomination in 1960, Johnson was asked by जॉन F. कैनेडी to be उसके कार्यशील mate for the 1960 presidential election.
Johnson succeeded to the प्रेसिडेंसी following the हत्या of John F. Kennedy on November 22, 1963, completed Kennedy 's term and was elected President in his own right, winning by a large margin over Barry Goldwater in the 1964 election.
Johnson was greatly supported by the Democratic Party and as President, he was responsible for designing the `` Great Society `` legislation that included laws that upheld civil rights, public broadcasting, Medicare, Medicaid, environmental protection, aid to education, and his `` War on Poverty. ''
Johnson was renowned for his domineering personality and the `` जॉनसन उपचार, '' his coercion of powerful politicians in order to advance legislation.
Meanwhile, जॉनसन escalated अमरीकी भागीदारी in the Vietnam War, from 16,000 American advisors/soldiers in 1963 to 550,000 combat troops in early 1968, as American casualties soared and the peace process bogged down.
The involvement stimulated a large angry antiwar movement based विशेषकर on university campuses in the U.S. and abroad.
Summer riots broke out in most major cities after 1965, and crime rates soared, as his opponents raised demands for `` law and अनुक्रम '' policies.
The Democratic Party split in multiple feuding factions, and after Johnson did poorly in the 1968 नई हैम्पशायर प्राथमिक, he ended उसके bid for reelection.
Republican Richard निक्सन थी elected to succeed him.
Historians argue that Johnson 's presidency marked the शिखर of आधुनिक उदारतावाद in the United States after the New Deal era.
Johnson is ranked favorably by some इतिहासकारों क्युकी of his domestic policies.
प्रोजेस्टेरोन भी ज्ञात as p4 ( pregn-4-ene-3,20-dione ) is a c-21 स्टेरॉयड हार्मोन शामिल in the मादा menstrual साईकिल, गर्भावस्था ( supports gestation ) और embryogenesis of इंसानो और अन्य प्रजाति.
Progesterone belongs to a क्लास of hormones called progestogens, and is the major naturally occurring human progestogen.
बिग Bird is a protagonist of the children 's television show Sesame Street.
Officially performed by Caroll Spinney चूंकि 1969, he is an eight-foot two-inch ( 249 cm ) tall bright primrose-yellow bird.
He can roller skate, ice skate, dance, sing, लिखें काव्य, draw and even ride a unicycle.
But despite this wide array of talents, he is prone to frequent misunderstandings, on one occasion even singing the alphabet as one big long word ( इससे the सोंग पुकारा `` ABC-DEF-GHI, '' pronounced `` ab-keddef-gajihkel-monop-quristuv-wixyz '' ), pondering what it could ever mean.
He lives in a large nest behind the 123 Sesame Street brownstone and has a टेडी भालू नामित Radar.
