The Second crusade ( 1145–1149 ) was the second major crusade launched from Europe.
The Second Crusade was started in response to the पतन of the काउंटी of edessa the पिछला year to the forces of Zengi.
The county had been founded during the First Crusade ( 1096–1099 ) by Baldwin of Boulogne in 1098.
While it was the first Crusader state to be founded, it was also the first to fall.
The Second Crusade was announced by Pope यूजीन iii, और थी the पहला of the क्रूसेड to be led by European kings, namely Louis VII of France and Conrad III of Germany, with help from a number of other European nobles.
The armies of the two kings marched separately across Europe.
After crossing Byzantine territory into Anatolia, both armies यहूद separately पराजित by the Seljuq Turks.
The main Western Christian सोर्स, odo of deuil, और syriac ईसाई sources claim that the Byzantine emperor Manuel I Comnenus secretly hindered the crusaders ' progress, particularly in Anatolia where he is alleged to have deliberately ordered Turks to attack them.
Louis and Conrad and the remnants of उनके सेना reached Jerusalem and, in 1148, participated in an ill-advised attack on Damascus.
the crusade in the east was a failure for the crusaders and a great victory for the Muslims.
It would ultimately have a कुंजी influence on the fall of Jerusalem and give rise to the Third Crusade at the end of the 12th century.
The only success of the Second Crusade came to a combined force of 13,000 Flemish, Frisian, नॉर्मन, अंग्रेज़ी, स्कॉटिश, and German crusaders in 1147.
Travelling from इंग्लैण्ड, by जलयान, to the पावन जमीन, the फौज रोका and helped the smaller ( 7,000 ) Portuguese army in the capture of Lisbon, expelling its Moorish occupants.
Wal-Mart Stores, Inc. ( ), branded as Walmart, is an American multinational retail corporation that runs chains of large discount department stores and warehouse stores.
The company is the world 's third largest public corporation, according to the सौभाग्य वैश्विक 500 सूची in 2012, the biggest private employer in the world with over two million employees, and is the largest retailer in the world.
Walmart remains a family-owned business, as the company is controlled by the Walton family, who own a 48 percent stake in Walmart.
It is also one of the world 's most मूल्यवान कंपनियाँ.
The company was founded by Sam Walton in 1962, incorporated on अक्तूबर 31, 1969, and publicly traded on the New York Stock Exchange in 1972.
It is headquartered in Bentonville, Arkansas.
walmart is भी the largest grocery retailer in the United States.
In 2009, it generated 51 percent of its US $ 258 billion बिक्री in the U.S. from grocery business.
It also owns and operates the Sam 's Club retail warehouses in North America.
By 1988, Wal-Mart was the most profitable retailer in the US, and by November 1990, it outsold k-mart.
By 1991 it outsold Sears in retail, making it America 's largest retailer, a भेद it स्टिल holds.
Walmart has 8,500 stores in 15 countries, under 55 different names.
The company operates under the walmart नाम in the संयुक्त States, including the 50 states and Puerto Rico.
It operates in Mexico as Walmex, in the संयुक्त किंगडम as Asda, in Japan as Seiyu, and in India as Best Price.
It has wholly owned operations in Argentina, ब्राज़ील, and Canada.
Walmart 's investments outside North America have था मिश्रित परिणाम : इसके परिचालन in the संयुक्त किंगडम, South America, and China are highly successful, whereas ventures in Germany and South Korea were unsuccessful.
Robert William Gary Moore ( 4 अप्रैल 1952 – 6 फ़रवरी 2011 ), was a Northern Irish musician, most widely recognised as a singer and guitarist.
In a career dating back to the 1960s, Moore played with artists including Phil Lynott and ब्रायन Downey during his teens, leading him to memberships with the Irish bands Skid Row and Thin Lizzy on three separate occasions.
Moore shared the stage with such blues and rock luminaries as B.B. King, Albert King, Colosseum II, George Harrison and Greg Lake, as खूब as having a successful solo career.
He guested on a number of albums recorded by high profile musicians, सहित a कैमियो रूप playing the सीसे गिटार solo on `` She 's My Baby `` from Traveling Wilburys Vol. 3.
an example of rack mounted servers
A web hosting service is a type of Internet hosting service that allows individuals and organizations to make उनके जालस्थल accessible via the World Wide Web.
Web hosts are companies that provide space on a server owned or leased लिये उपयोग by क्लाइंट, as well as providing Internet connectivity, typically in a data center.
Web hosts can also provide data center space and connectivity to the अंतरजाल लिये other servers located in their data center, called colocation, also known as Housing in Latin America or France.
The scope of web hosting services varies greatly.
The most मौलिक is वेब पेज और small-scale file hosting, where files can be uploaded via File Transfer Protocol ( FTP ) or a Web interface.
the फाइलें हैं प्रायः वितरित to the वेब `` as is '' or साथ minimal प्रसंस्करण.
Many Internet service providers ( ISPs ) offer this service free to सदस्य.
Individuals and organizations may also obtain Web page hosting from वैकल्पिक सेवा प्रदाताओं.
Personal web site hosting is typically free, advertisement-sponsored, or inexpensive.
Business web site hosting often has a higher expense depending upon the size and type of the website.
Single page hosting is generally sufficient लिये निजी web pages.
A complex site calls for a more comprehensive package that provides डेटाबेस support and application development platforms ( e.g. PHP, Java, Ruby on Rails, ColdFusion, or ASP.NET ).
These facilities allow ग्राहक to लिखें or install scripts for applications like forums and content management.
Also, Secure sockets परत ( SSL ) is typically used for e-commerce.
The host may also provide an इंटरफ़ेस or कंट्रोल फलक लिये मैनेजिंग the Web server and installing scripts, as well as other modules and service applications like e-mail.
Some hosts specialize in certain software or services ( e.g. e-commerce ), जिससे हैं commonly प्रयुक्त by larger companies that outsource network infrastructure.
Obstetrics ( इससे the लैटिन obstare, `` to stand by '' ) is the medical specialty dealing with the care of all women 's reproductive tracts and their children during pregnancy ( prenatal period ), childbirth and the postnatal period.
अनेक obstetricians are also gynecologists, meaning they perform in both specialties.
In the United States, ये physicians are commonly referred to as OB/GYNs.
The Wright brothers, Orville ( August 19, 1871 – January 30, 1948 ) and Wilbur ( April 16, 1867 – May 30, 1912 ), were two American brothers, inventors, and aviation pioneers who were credited with inventing and building the संसार 's पहला कामयाब वायुयान और बनाना the पहला नियंत्रित, powered and sustained heavier-than-air human flight, on December 17, 1903.
From 1905 to 1907, the भाइयो developed their flying machine into the first practical fixed-wing aircraft.
Although not the first to build और मक्खी प्रायोगिक वायुयान, the Wright brothers were the first to invent aircraft controls that made fixed-wing powered flight possible.
The brothers ' fundamental breakthrough was their invention of three-axis कंट्रोल, जिससे सक्रिय the pilot to steer the aircraft effectively and to maintain its equilibrium.
This method became standard and remains standard on fixed-wing aircraft of all kinds.
From the beginning of their aeronautical work, the Wright brothers केन्द्रित on विकासशील a विश्वसनीय विधि of pilot control as the key to solving `` the flying problem ''.
This approach differed significantly from other experimenters of the time who put more emphasis on विकासशील powerful engines.
Using a small homebuilt wind tunnel, the Wrights also एकत्रित अधिक सटीक आंकड़ा than कोई पहले, enabling them to design and build wings and propellers that were more efficient than any before.
Their first U.S. patent, 821,393, did not claim invention of a flying machine, but rather, the invention of a प्रणाली of aerodynamic कंट्रोल कि manipulated a flying machine 's surfaces.
They gained the mechanical skills essential for their success by working for years in their दूकान साथ मुद्रण दबाता, साइकिल, मोटर्स, and other machinery.
Their work with bicycles in particular influenced their belief that an अस्थिर गाडी जैसे a उड़ती यंत्र could be नियंत्रित and balanced with practice.
From 1900 until their first powered flights in late 1903, they conducted extensive glider परीक्षण कि भी विकसित उनके कौशल as पायलटों.
Their bicycle shop employee Charlie टेलर became an महत्वपूर्ण part of the team, building their first aircraft engine in close collaboration with the brothers.
The Wright brothers ' status as inventors of the वायुयान has been subject to counter-claims by various parties.
Much विवाद persists over the many competing claims of early aviators.

it premiered on March 4, 2009.

The international destination for this cycle is São Paulo, Brazil, the श्रेणी पहला विज़िट to South America.
The क्रमांक of लड़कियों was reduced to 13, the first time since Cycle 9, after being maintained at 14 in the last two cycles.
This was the last समय paulina porizkova participated as judge.
The winner was 20-year-old Teyona Anderson इससे woodstown, New Jersey.

Exxon Mobil Corporation, or ExxonMobil, is an American multinational oil and gas corporation headquartered in Irving, Texas, United States.
It is a direct वंशज of John D. Rockefeller 's Standard Oil company, and was formed on November 30, 1999, by the merger of Exxon and Mobil.
It is affiliated with Imperial Oil which operates in Canada.
exxonmobil is the world 's largest company by revenue and in 2013, became the largest publicly traded company by market capitalization in the world.
The company is ranked # 5 globally in Forbes वैश्विक 2000 list in 2013.
exxon mobil 's reserves were 72 billion oil-equivalent barrels at the end of 2007 and, at then ( 2007 ) rates of production, are expected to last over 14 years.
With 37 oil refineries in 21 countries constituting a combined daily refining capacity of, exxon mobil is the largest refiner in the संसार, a शीर्षक that was also associated with Standard Oil since its incorporation in 1870.
ExxonMobil is the largest of the world 's supermajors with daily production of 3.921 million BOE ( barrels of oil equivalent ).
In 2008, this was approximately 3 % of world production, which is less than अनेक of the largest state-owned petroleum companies.
When ranked by oil and gas reserves it is 14th in the world with less than 1 % of the total.
A 2012 article in The Daily Telegraph says that ExxonMobil has `` grown into one of the planet’s most hated corporations, able to determine American foreign policy and the fate of entire राष्ट्र ''.
in शर्तें of इसके पर्यावरणीय record, ExxonMobil increasingly drills in terrains leased to them by dictatorships, such as those in Chad and Equatorial Guinea.
Lee Raymond, the corporation’s chief executive until 2005, was `` notoriously sceptical about climate change and disliked government interference at any level ''.
The company was widely criticized for its slow response to cleaning इसके 1989 valdez oil spill in Alaska.
This article is about the Globe थिएटर of Shakespeare.
For the modern पुनर्निर्माण in London, see Shakespeare 's Globe.
For other uses, see Globe Theatre ( बहुविकल्पी ).
The Globe थिएटर थी a theatre in London associated with William Shakespeare.
It was built in 1599 by Shakespeare 's playing company, the Lord Chamberlain 's Men, on land owned by Thomas Brend and inherited by his son, Nicholas Brend and grandson Sir Matthew Brend, and was destroyed by fire on 29 June 1613.
A second Globe Theatre was built on the same site by जून 1614 और closed in 1642.
A modern reconstruction of the Globe, named `` Shakespeare 's Globe ``, opened in 1997 approximately इससे the site of the original theatre.
it 's a अद्भुत जीवन is a 1946 अमरीकी क्रिसमस नाटक फिल्मी उत्पादित और निर्देशित by फ़्रैंक capra, आधारित on the छोटी स्टोरी `` the महानतम तोहफा ``, जिससे फिलिप वैन doren stern लिखा in 1939 और privately प्रकाशित in 1945.
The film is considered one of the most loved films in American cinema and has become परंपरागत देखने दौरान the Christmas season, alongside popular classics such as Charles Dickens ' A Christmas Carol.
The film stars James Stewart as George Bailey, a man who has given up his dreams in order to help others and whose imminent suicide on Christmas Eve brings about the हस्तक्षेप of उसके संरक्षक देवदूत, क्लेरेंस Odbody ( Henry Travers ).
Clarence shows George all the lives he has touched and how different life in his community of Bedford Falls would be had he never been born.
Despite initially performing poorly at the box office due to high production costs and stiff competition at the समय of इसके रिलीज, the फिल्मी रै come to be regarded as a classic and is a staple of Christmas television around the world.
Theatrically, the film 's break-even point was actually $ 6.3 million, approximately twice the production cost, a figure it never came close to achieving in its initial release.
An appraisal in 2006 reported : `` Although it was not the complete box office failure that today everyone believes... it was initially a major disappointment and confirmed, at least to the studios, कि capra was no longer capable of turning out the populist features that made his films the must-see, money-making events they once were. ''
The film was nominated for five Oscars and has been recognized by the American Film Institute as one of the 100 best American films ever made, placing number 11 on its initial 1998 greatest movie list, and would also place क्रमांक एक on its list of the most inspirational American films of all time.
आंकड़ा गोदाम Overview
In computing, a data गोदाम or enterprise data warehouse ( DW, DWH, or EDW ) is a database used for reporting and data analysis.
It is a central repository of data which is created by integrating data from one or more disparate sources.
Data warehouses store current as well as historical data and are प्रयुक्त लिये बनाना trending reports for senior management reporting such as annual and quarterly comparisons.
The data stored in the warehouse are uploaded from the operational systems ( such as marketing, बिक्री etc., shown in the figure to the right ).
The data may pass through an operational data store for additional operations before they are used in the DW for reporting.
The typical ETL -based आंकड़ा गोदाम उपयोग स्टेजिंग, data integration, and access layers to house its key functions.
The staging layer or staging database stores raw data extracted from each of the disparate सोर्स data systems.
The integration layer integrates the disparate data sets by transforming the data from the staging layer often storing इस रूपांतरित आंकड़ा in an operational data store ( ODS ) database.
The integrated data are then moved to yet another डेटाबेस, प्रायः called the data warehouse database, where the data is arranged into hierarchical groups often called dimensions and into facts and aggregate facts.
The combination of facts और आयाम is sometimes called a star schema.
The access परत helps users retrieve data.
A data warehouse constructed from an integrated data सोर्स प्रणालियों does not require ETL, staging databases, or operational data store databases.
The integrated data source systems may be considered to be a part of a distributed operational data store layer.
Data federation methods or data virtualization methods may be used to access the distributed integrated source data systems to consolidate and aggregate data directly into the आंकड़ा गोदाम डेटाबेस tables.
Unlike the ETL-based data warehouse, the integrated source data systems and the data warehouse हैं all integrated since there is no transformation of dimensional or reference data.
This integrated data warehouse architecture supports the ड्रिल bas इससे the कुल data of the data warehouse to the transactional data of the integrated source data systems.
Data warehouses can be subdivided into data marts.
Data marts store subsets of data from a warehouse.
This definition of the data गोदाम focuses on आंकड़ा storage.
The main source of the data is cleaned, transformed, cataloged and made available for use by managers and other business professionals for data mining, online analytical processing, market research and decision support ( Marakas & O'Brien 2009 ).
However, the means to retrieve and analyze data, to extract, transform and load data, and to manage the data dictionary are also considered अनिवार्य components of a आंकड़ा warehousing system.
Many सन्दर्भ to data warehousing use this broader context.
Thus, an expanded definition for data warehousing includes business intelligence tools, tools to extract, transform and load data into the repository, and tools to manage and retrieve metadata.
Portland stone quarry on the आइल of पोर्टलैंड, England
An abandoned construction aggregate quarry near Adelaide, South ऑस्ट्रेलिया
A quarry is a प्रकार of open-pit mine from which rock or minerals are extracted.
Quarries are generally used for extracting building materials, such as आयाम स्टोन, निर्माण कुल, riprap, sand, and gravel.
They are often collocated साथ concrete and asphalt plants due to the requirement for large amounts of aggregate in those materials.
Open mines that produce minerals are typically referred to as खोलें pit mines.
the शब्द quarry can include underground quarrying for stone, such as Bath stone.
Mormons ( ) are a religious and cultural group related to Mormonism, the principal branch of the Latter Day Saint movement of Restorationist christianity, which began with the visions of Joseph Smith in upstate New York during the 1820s.
After Smith 's death in 1844 the mormons followed ब्रिघम Young to what would become the Utah Territory.
Today Mormons are समझा to be सदस्यों of the गिरिजाघर of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints ( LDS Church ).
कुछ mormons हैं भी either स्वतंत्र or non-practicing.
The center of Mormon cultural influence is in यूटा, and North America has more Mormons than any other continent, though the majority of Mormons live outside the United States.
mormons have विकसित a strong sense of communality that stems from their doctrine and history.
During the 19th century Mormon converts tended to gather to a central भौगोलिक स्थान, और between 1852 और 1890 a minority of Mormons openly practiced plural marriage, a form of religious polygamy.
Mormons dedicate large amounts of time और संसाधन to serving in their church, and many young Mormons choose to serve a full-time proselytizing mission.
Mormons have a स्वास्थ्य code that eschews alcoholic beverages, tobacco, coffee, tea, and other addictive substances.
They tend to be very family-oriented, and have strong connections across generations and with extended family, reflective of their belief that families can be sealed together beyond death and throughout शाश्वत.
Mormons also have a strict law of chastity, requiring abstention from sexual relations outside of marriage and strict fidelity within marriage.
mormons self-identify as ईसाई, हालांकि कुछ of उनके मान्यताओं differ इससे मुख्यधारा christianity.
Mormons believe in the Bible, as well as अन्य books of scripture, such as the Book of Mormon.
They have a unique view of cosmology, और मानना कि all people are spirit-children of God.
Mormons believe that returning to God requires following the example of Jesus Christ, and accepting his atonement through ordinances ऐसे as baptism.
They believe that Christ 's church was restored through Joseph Smith, and is हिदायत by living prophets and apostles.
Central to Mormon faith is the विश्वास कि God speaks to his children and answers their prayers.
In financial हिसाब, एसेट are economic resources.
Anything tangible or intangible that is capable of being owned or नियंत्रित to उपज value and that is held to have positive economic value is considered an asset.
बस stated, एसेट represent value of ownership that can be converted into cash ( although cash itself is also considered an asset ).
The balance sheet of a कड़ रिकॉर्ड the monetaryJ.
G. Siegel, N. Dauber & J. K. Shim, `` The Vest Pocket CPA '', Wiley, 2005.There are अलग विधि of assessing the monetary value of the assets recorded on the Balance Sheet.
In some cases, the Historical Cost is used ; such that the value of the asset when it was bought in the past is used as the monetary मान.
In other instances, the present मेला मार्केट मान of the asset is used to determine the value shown on the balance sheet.
मान of the assets owned by the firm.
It is money and other valuables belonging to an individual or business.
Two major asset classes are ठोस assets and intangible assets.
Tangible assets contain various subclasses, including current assets और फिक्स्ड assets.j.
Downes, J.E. Goodman, `` Dictionary of Finance & Investment Terms '', Baron 's Financial Guides, 2003 Current assets include inventory, while fixed assets include such items as buildings and equipment.J. downes, j.e. गुडमैन, `` Dictionary of Finance & Investment Terms '', Baron 's Financial Guides, 2003 ; and J. G. Siegel, N. Dauber & J. K. Shim, `` The Vest Pocket CPA '', Wiley, 2005.
Intangible assets are nonphysical resources and rights that have a value to the firm because वे दे the कड़ कुछ kind of advantage in the market place.
उदाहरण of intangible एसेट हैं साख, copyrights, trademarks, patents and computer programs, and financial assets, including such items as accounts receivable, bonds and stocks.
A neuron ( or ; also known as a neurone or nerve cell ) is an electrically excitable cell that processes and transmits information through electrical and chemical signals.
A chemical signal occurs via a synapse, a specialized कनेक्शन साथ other cells.
Neurons connect to each other to form neural networks.
न्यूरॉन्स हैं the कोर components of the nervous system, which includes the brain, spinal cord, and peripheral ganglia.
A number of specialized types of neurons exist : sensory neurons respond to touch, sound, light and numerous अन्य stimuli affecting कोशिकाएं of the संवेदी organs that then send signals to the spinal cord and brain.
Motor neurons receive signals from the brain and spinal cord, cause muscle contractions, and affect glands.
Interneurons connect neurons to other न्यूरॉन्स भीतर the same region of the brain or spinal cord.
A typical neuron possesses a cell body ( often called the सोम ), dendrites, and an axon.
Dendrites are thin structures कि उठता इससे the cell body, often extending for hundreds of micrometres and branching multiple times, giving rise to a complex `` dendritic tree ''.
An axon is a special cellular extension that arises from the cell body at a site called the axon hillock and travels for a distance, as दूर as 1 मीटर in इंसानो or भी अधिक in अन्य प्रजाति.
The cell body of a neuron frequently gives rise to multiple dendrites, but never to अधिक than एक axon, हालांकि the axon may branch hundreds of times before it terminates.
At the majority of synapses, signals are sent from the axon of one neuron to a dendrite of another.
There are, however, many exceptions to these rules : neurons कि कमी dendrites, न्यूरॉन्स कि have no axon, synapses that connect an axon to another axon or a dendrite to another dendrite, etc.
All neurons are electrically excitable, maintaining voltage gradients across their membranes by means of metabolically driven ion pumps, which combine with ion channels embedded in the membrane to generate intracellular-versus-extracellular विशेषज्ञता differences of ions such as sodium, potassium, chloride, and calcium.
Changes in the cross-membrane voltage can alter the फलन of voltage-dependent ion channels.
If the voltage changes by a large enough amount, an all-or-none electrochemical pulse called an action potential is generated, which travels rapidly along the cell 's axon, and activates सिनेप्टिक कनेक्शन्स साथ अन्य cells when it arrives.
Neurons do नहीं undergo cell division.
In सबसे cases, neurons are generated by special types of stem cells.
Astrocytes, a प्रकार of glial कोशिका, have भी been observed to turn into neurons by virtue of the stem cell characteristic pluripotency.
In humans, neurogenesis largely ceases during adulthood—but in two brain areas, the hippocampus and olfactory bulb, there is strong evidence for generation of substantial संख्याएँ of नई न्यूरॉन्स.
Super Bowl XLIII was an American football game between the American Football Conference ( AFC ) champion Pittsburgh Steelers and the National Football Conference ( NFC ) champion Arizona Cardinals to decide the National Football League ( NFL ) champion for the 2008 season.
The Steelers defeated the कार्डिनल्स by the score of 27–23.
The game was played on February 1, 2009, at Raymond James Stadium in Tampa, Florida.
With this win, the Steelers became the पहला team to win six Super Bowls.
Pittsburgh, who finished the regular season with a 12–4 record, also won their second Super Bowl in चार सालो बाद winning Super Bowl XL at the end of the 2005 season.
the कार्डिनल्स डाला the game seeking their first NFL title since 1947, the longest championship drought in the league.
The club became an unexpected winner during the regular season, compiling a 9–7 record, and the playoffs with the aid of head coach Ken Whisenhunt, who was the Steelers ' offensive coordinator in Super Bowl XL, and the re-emergence of quarterback Kurt Warner, who was the Super कटोरी mvp in सुपर कटोरी xxxiv साथ उसके पूर्व team, St. Louis Rams.
Pittsburgh jumped to a 17–7 halftime lead, aided by linebacker जेम्स हैरिसन 's सुपर Bowl record 100-yard interception return for a touchdown.
Trailing 20–7 at the start of the fourth quarter, Arizona scored 16 unanswered points, including wide receiver Larry Fitzgerald 's 64-yard touchdown reception, to take the lead with 2:37 remaining in the game.
But the Steelers marched 78 yards to score on चौड़ी receiver santonio Holmes ' 6-yard game-winning touchdown catch with 35 seconds left.
Holmes, who caught nine passes for 131 yards and a touchdown, including four receptions for 73 yards on that final game-winning drive, was named Super Bowl MVP.
He became the sixth wide receiver to win the award, and also was the third Pittsburgh receiver to win the award, following Lynn Swann and Hines Ward.
Despite the global financial crisis and limited amount of ancillary festivities that are normally held before the game, the NBC television network broadcast attracted an average U.S. दर्शक of 98.7 लाख दर्शक, बनाना it the most watched Super Bowl in history to that point.
A diagram of the electromagnetic spectrum, प्रर्दशित विभिन्न गुण across the range of frequencies and wavelengths
the इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक spectrum is the range of all possible frequencies of electromagnetic radiation.
The `` electromagnetic spectrum '' of an object has a different meaning, and is instead the characteristic distribution of इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक radiation emitted or absorbed by that particular object.
The electromagnetic spectrum extends from below the low frequencies used for modern radio communication to gamma radiation at the short- wavelength ( high-frequency ) समाप्त, thereby covering wavelengths from thousands of kilometers down to a fraction of the size of an atom.
The limit for long wavelengths is the size of the universe itself, while it is thought that the short wavelength limit is in the vicinity of the Planck length, although in principle the spectrum is infinite and continuous.
Most parts of the electromagnetic spectrum are used in science for spectroscopic and other probing interactions, as तरीके to पढ़ाई और characterize matter.
In addition, radiation from various parts of the spectrum has found many other uses for संचार and manufacturing ( see electromagnetic radiation for more applications ).
लेजेंड
Marchantia, a liverwort
Bryophyte is a traditional name used to refer to सब embryophytes ( land plants ) that do not have true vascular tissue and are therefore called ' non-vascular plants '.
Some bryophytes do have specialized tissues for the transport of water ; however since these do not contain lignin, they are not considered to be true vascular tissue.
Currently bryophytes are thought not to be a natural or monophyletic समूह ; however the name is convenient and remains in use as a collective term for mosses, hornworts, and liverworts.
bryophytes produce enclosed reproductive structures ( gametangia and sporangia ), but they produce neither flowers nor seeds, reproducing via spores.
The term bryophyte comes from Greek βρύον, bryon, `` tree-moss, oyster-green '' + φυτόν - phyton `` plant ''.
A bank is a financial institution and a financial intermediary that accepts deposits and channels those deposits into lending activities, either directly by loaning or indirectly through capital markets.
A bank is the connection between customers that have capital deficits and customers साथ पूंजी surpluses.
Due to their influence within a financial system and an economy, banks are generally highly regulated in most countries.
Most banks operate under a system known as fractional आरक्षित banking where they hold only a small reserve of the funds deposited and lend out the rest for profit.
वे हैं generally विषय to minimum capital requirements which are based on an international set of capital standards, known as the Basel Accords.
The oldest bank still in existence is Monte dei Paschi di Siena, headquartered in सियेना, Italy, which has been operating continuously since 1472.
It is followed by Berenberg Bank of Hamburg ( 1590 ) and Sveriges Riksbank of Sweden ( 1668 ).
Banking in its modern sense evolved in rich cities of पुनर्जागरण Italy, such as Florence, Venice and Genoa.
In the history of banking, a number of banking dynasties —among them notably Medici, Fugger, Welser, Berenberg, Baring and Rothschild —have played a सेंट्रल भूमिका over many centuries.
The Xbox is a video game console manufactured by microsoft.
It was released on November 15, 2001 in North America, February 22, 2002 in जापानी, और कूच 14, 2002 in ऑस्ट्रेलिया and Europe.
It was Microsoft 's first foray into the गेमिंग कंसोल market.
As part of the sixth-generation of gaming, the Xbox competed with Sony 's PlayStation 2, Sega 's Dreamcast ( which stopped American sales before the Xbox went on sale ), and Nintendo 's GameCube.
The Xbox was the first console offered by an American कम्पनी बाद the Atari Jaguar stopped sales in 1996.
The integrated Xbox Live सेवा शुभारम्भ in November 2002 allowed players to play games online with a broadband connection.
It first competed with Dreamcast 's online service but later primarily competed with PlayStation 2 's online service.
Although these two are free while Xbox Live required a subscription, as well as broadband-only connection which was not completely adopted yet, Xbox Live was a success due to better servers, features such as a buddy list, and milestone शीर्षक जैसे हेलो 2 released in नवम्बर 2004, जिससे is the best-selling Xbox video game and was by far the most popular online game for years.
एक्सबॉक्स 's successor, the Xbox 360, was launched in November 2005.
The Xbox was discontinued in लेट 2005 in Japan where sales were poor.
It was discontinued in late 2006 in Europe and जल्दी 2007 in उत्तर America.
The last Xbox game in Europe was Tony Hawk 's Project 8 released in November 2006, और the last game in North America was Madden NFL 09 released in August 2008.
support लिये out-of-warranty एक्सबॉक्स consoles थी discontinued on March 2, 2009, stating that any in-warranty repair now needed will not be undertaken.
Xbox access to Xbox सजीव थी रोका on April 15, 2010.
The Gospel According to John ( Greek τὸ κατὰ Ἰωάννην εὐαγγέλιον ), commonly referred to as the इन्जील of जॉन or बस John and often referred to in New Testament scholarship as the Fourth Gospel, is an account of the public ministry of Jesus.
It begins with the witness and प्रतिज्ञान by John the Baptist and concludes with the death, burial, resurrection, and post-resurrection appearances of Jesus.
This account is चौथी of the canonical gospels, after the synoptics Matthew, Mark and Luke.
राज्य कि the किताब derives from the testimony of the ' disciple whom Jesus loved. '
Along with Peter, the unnamed disciple is especially close to Jesus, and early-church tradition identified him as John the Apostle, one of Jesus ' Twelve Apostles.
The gospel is closely related in style and content to the three surviving Epistles of John such that commentators treat the four books together, yet, according to सबसे आधुनिक विद्वानों, जॉन थी नहीं the लेखक of कोई of ये books.
Recent Christian Scripture scholarship more and more has लगाई जॉन भीतर a first-century Jewish context.
Raymond E. Brown did pioneering work to ट्रेस the विकास of the tradition from which the gospel arose.
The discourses seem to be concerned with the actual issues of the church-and-synagogue debate at the time when the Gospel was written.
It is notable that, in the gospel, the जातियाँ still appears to define itself primarily against Judaism, rather than as part of a wider Christian church.
Though Christianity started as a movement within Judaism, gradually ईसाइयों और यहूदियों became bitterly opposed.
John presents a `` higher '' Christology than the synoptics, meaning that it describes यीशु as the incarnation of the divine Logos through whom all things were made, as the object of veneration, and more explicitly as God incarnate.
Only in John does Jesus talk at लंबाई परिचय खुद and his divine role, often shared with the disciples only.
Against the synoptics, John focuses largely on अलग चमत्कार ( including resurrecting Lazarus ), given as signs meant to engender faith.
Synoptic elements such as parables और exorcisms are not found in John.
It presents a realized eschatology in जिससे मोक्ष is already present for the believer.
The Plagues of Egypt ( ), also called the Ten Plagues ( ) or the Biblical Plagues, यहूद टेन calamities that, according to the biblical Book of Exodus, Israel 's God, Yahweh, inflicted upon Egypt to persuade Pharaoh to release the ill-treated Israelites from slavery.
Pharaoh capitulated बाद the tenth plague, triggering the Exodus of the Jewish people.
The plagues were designed to contrast the शक्ति of yahweh साथ the impotence of Egypt 's various gods.
Some commentators have associated several of the plagues साथ निर्णय on specific gods associated with the Nile, fertility and natural phenomena.
The plagues of Egypt are also उल्लेखित in the Quran ( 7,133–136 ).
According to the किताब of exodus, God proclaims that all the gods of Egypt will be judged through the tenth and final plague:
John Martin 's painting of the plague of hail और fire ( 1823 ).
A role-playing game ( RPG and sometimes roleplaying game ) is a game in which players assume the roles of characters in a fictional setting.
Players take responsibility for acting out these roles within a कथा, either through शाब्दिक एक्टिंग or through a process of structured decision-making or character development.
Actions taken भीतर अनेक खेल सफल or fail according to a formal system of rules and guidelines.
There are several forms of आरपीजी.
The original form, sometimes called the tabletop RPG, is conducted through discussion, whereas in सजीव कार्रवाई role-playing games ( LARP ) players physically perform their characters ' actions.
In both of these forms, an arranger called a game master ( GM ) usually decides on the rules and सेटिंग to be प्रयुक्त और अधिनियमों as रेफरी, जबकि each of the other players plays the role of a single character.
Several किस्में of आरपीजी भी मौजूद in इलेक्ट्रॉनिक media, such as multi-player text-based MUDs and their graphics-based successors, massively multiplayer online role-playing games ( MMORPGs ).
Role-playing games also include single-player offline role-playing video games in which players कंट्रोल a अक्षर or टोली जो undertake quests, and may include capabilities that advance using statistical mechanics.
These games often share settings and rules with tabletop RPGs, but emphasize character उन्नति अधिक than collaborative storytelling.
Despite this variety of forms, some game forms such as trading card games and wargames कि हैं सम्बन्धित to role-playing games may not be included.
role-playing कार्यकलाप may sometimes be present in such games, but it is not the primary focus.
The term is also sometimes used to describe roleplay simulation games and exercises used in teaching, training, and academic research.
The American Civil War ( ACW ), also known as the War between the States or simply the Civil युद्ध ( देखिए नामकरण ), थी a सिविल युद्ध लड़ा इससे 1861 to 1865 between the संयुक्त States ( the `` Union '' or the `` North '' ) and several Southern slave states that declared their secession and formed the Confederate States of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ).
The war had its origin in the issue of गुलामी, especially the extension of slavery into the western territories.
Foreign powers did not intervene.
After four years of खूनी कॉम्बैट कि बाएँ over 600,000 soldiers dead and destroyed much of the South 's infrastructure, the Confederacy collapsed, slavery was abolished, and the difficult Reconstruction process of restoring national unity and guaranteeing rights to the freed slaves began.
In the 1860 अध्यक्षीय चुनाव, republicans, led by Abraham Lincoln, opposed expanding slavery into United States ' territories.
Lincoln won, but before his inauguration on कूच 4, 1861, सात cotton-based slave states formed the Confederacy.
Outgoing Democratic President James Buchanan and the incoming Republicans rejected secession as illegal.
Lincoln 's inaugural address declared his administration would not initiate civil war.
Eight remaining slave states जारी to reject calls for secession.
Confederate forces जब्त numerous संघीय forts within territory claimed by the Confederacy.
A Peace Conference failed to find a compromise, and both sides prepared for war.
The Confederates assumed that European countries were so dependent on `` King Cotton `` that they would intervene ; none किया और none पहचाना the नई Confederate States of America.
Hostilities began on April 12, 1861, when Confederate forces fired upon Fort Sumter, a key fort आयोजित by Union troops in South Carolina.
Lincoln पुकारा लिये प्रत्येक राज्य to provide troops to retake the fort ; consequently, four more slave states joined the Confederacy, bringing their total to eleven.
The Union soon controlled the border states और established a naval blockade that crippled the southern economy.
The Eastern Theater was inconclusive in 1861–62.
The autumn 1862 Confederate campaign into Maryland ( a संघ राज्य ) ended साथ confederate रिट्रीट at the बैटल of antietam, dissuading British intervention.
Lincoln issued the Emancipation उदघोषणा, which made ending slavery a war goal.
To the west, by summer 1862 the Union destroyed the Confederate river navy, then much of their western armies, and the Union at Vicksburg split the Confederacy in two at the Mississippi River.
In 1863, Robert E. Lee 's Confederate incursion north ended at the Battle of Gettysburg.
Western successes led to Ulysses S. ग्रान्ट कमांड of all Union armies in 1864.
In the Western Theater, William T. Sherman drove east to capture Atlanta and marched to the sea, destroying confederate अवसंरचना साथ the रास्ता.
The Union marshaled the resources and manpower to आक्रमण the confederacy इससे सब दिशानिर्देश, and could afford to fight battles of attrition through the Overland Campaign towards Richmond, the Confederate capital.
The defending Confederate army failed, leading to Lee 's आत्मसमर्पण to ग्रान्ट at appomattox Court House on April 9, 1865.
The American Civil War was one of the earliest true industrial युद्धों.
Railroads, the telegraph, steamships, और mass-produced weapons were employed extensively.
The mobilization of civilian factories, mines, shipyards, banks, transportation and food supplies all foreshadowed World War I.
It remains the deadliest war in American history, resulting in the deaths of an estimated 750,000 सैनिको and an undetermined number of civilian casualties.
Historian John Huddleston estimates the death toll at ten percent of all Northern males 20–45 years old, and 30 percent of all Southern white males aged 18–40.
The परिभाषा of the world 's busiest airport has been specified by the Airports Council International in Geneva, Switzerland.
The ACI defines और उपायों the following three types of airport traffic:
Passenger traffic : total passengers emplaned और deplaned, passengers in transit counted once
Cargo traffic : loaded and unloaded भाड़ा and mail in metric tonnes
Traffic movements : landings और take-offs of aircraft
World War I ( WWI ) was a global war centred in Europe कि began on 28 जुलाई 1914 और lasted until 11 November 1918.
It was predominantly called the World War or the Great War from its occurrence until the start of World War II in 1939, and the First World युद्ध or संसार युद्ध I thereafter.
It involved all the world 's great powers, which were assembled in two opposing alliances : the Allies ( based on the Triple Entente of the United Kingdom, France and Russia ) and the Central Powers ( originally the Triple Alliance of जर्मनी, Austria-Hungary and Italy ; but, as Austria–Hungary had taken the offensive against the agreement, Italy did not enter into the war ).
These alliances were both reorganised and expanded as more nations entered the war : Italy, Japan and the United States joined the allies, और the उस्मानी साम्राज्य और बुल्गारिया the सेंट्रल Powers.
ultimately, more than 70 million military personnel, including 60 million Europeans, were mobilised in one of the largest wars in history.
More than 9 million combatants यहूद मारे, largely क्युकी of technological advancements that led to enormous increases in the lethality of weapons without corresponding improvements in protection or mobility.
It थी the fifth- deadliest conflict in world history, subsequently paving the way for various political changes, such as revolutions in many of the nations involved.
One of the long-term causes of the war was the resurgence of imperialism in the foreign policies of the great powers of Europe.
More immediately, the assassination of archduke फ्रांज फर्डिनेंड of ऑस्ट्रिया, the heir to the throne of Austria-Hungary, on 28 June 1914 by Yugoslav nationalist Gavrilo Princip in Sarajevo triggered a diplomatic crisis when Austria-Hungary subsequently delivered an ultimatum to the Kingdom of Serbia.
अनेक alliances formed over the previous decades were invoked.
Within weeks, the major powers यहूद at war and, via their colonies, the conflict soon spread around the world.
On 28 July, the Austro-Hungarians fired the first shots of the war as preparation for the invasion of Serbia.
While the Russians mobilised, the Germans invaded neutral Belgium and Luxembourg on the way to फ़्रांस, providing a casus belli for Britain 's declaration of war against Germany.
After the German march on Paris was brought to a halt—the so-called चमत्कार of the Marne —the Western Front settled into a static battle of attrition with a trench line that changed little until 1917.
On the Eastern Front, the Russian army was successful विरूद्ध the Austro-Hungarians, but was stopped in its invasion of East Prussia by the Germans.
In November the Ottoman Empire joined the war, opening up fronts in the Caucasus, मेसोपोटामिया and the Sinai.
Italy and बुल्गारिया went to war in 1915 and Romania in 1916.
In Russia, the त्सार 's सरकारी collapsed in March 1917 and a subsequent revolution in November brought the Russians to terms with the Central Powers.
After a 1918 जर्मनी अप्रिय along the western front, the Allies drove back the Germans in a series of successful offensives and American forces began entering the trenches.
Germany, which had its own trouble with क्रांतिकारियों, agreed to an armistice on 11 November 1918.
The war ended in victory for the allies.
Events on the home fronts were as tumultuous as on the battle fronts, as the participants tried to mobilize उनके जनशक्ति and economic resources to fight a total war.
By the end of the war, four major imperial powers—the German, Russian, austro-hungarian and Ottoman empires—ceased to exist.
The successor states of the former two lost a great amount of territory, जबकि the latter two were dismantled entirely.
The map of central Europe was redrawn into अनेक छोटी states.
The League of Nations थी formed in the hope of preventing another such conflict.
The European राष्ट्रवाद शाखित by the युद्ध and the breakup of empires, the repercussions of Germany 's defeat and problems with the Treaty of Versailles are agreed to be factors contributing to World War II.
The Deepwater Horizon oil spill ( also referred to as the BP oil spill, the BP oil disaster, the Gulf of Mexico oil spill, and the Macondo blowout ) was an oil spill in the Gulf of मैक्सिको on the bp -operated macondo prospect, माना the largest आकस्मिक समुद्री आयल spill in the इतिहास of the पेट्रोलियम industry, estimated to be between 8 % and 31 % larger in volume than the earlier Ixtoc I oil spill.
Following the explosion and sinking of the Deepwater Horizon oil rig, which claimed 11 lives, a sea-floor oil gusher flowed unabated for 87 days, until it was capped on 15 जुलाई 2010.
The total निर्वहन is estimated at.
A massive response ensued to protect beaches, wetlands and estuaries from the spreading आयल utilizing skimmer जहाजों, फ्लोटिंग booms, controlled burns and of Corexit oil dispersant.
After several failed efforts to contain the flow, the well was declared sealed on 19 September 2010.
Some reports indicate the well site continues to leak.
Due to the months-long spill, साथ साथ प्रतिकूल प्रभाव इससे the जवाब and cleanup activities, extensive damage to marine and wildlife habitats, fishing and tourism industries, and human health problems have continued through 2013.Three years after the spill, tar balls could still be found on the Mississippi coast.
Numerous investigations छान the causes of the explosion and record-setting spill.
Notably, the U.S. government 's September 2011 report pointed to defective cement on the खूब, faulting ज़्यादातर bp, लकिन भी खूब ऑपरेटर transocean और contractor Halliburton.
Earlier in 2011, a White House commission likewise blamed BP and its partners for a series of cost-cutting decisions and an insufficient safety system, but also concluded that the spill resulted from `` systemic '' root causes and `` अनुपस्थित significant सुधार in दोनो उद्योग practices और सरकारी नीतियों, might well recur ''.
In November 2012, BP and the United States Department of Justice settled federal criminal charges with BP pleading अपराधी to 11 रिश्तो of manslaughter, दो misdemeanors, and a felony count of lying to Congress.
BP also agreed to four years of government monitoring of its safety practices and ethics, and the Environmental Protection Agency announced that BP होता be temporarily बैन इससे नई अनुबंध with the US government.
BP and the Department of Justice agreed to a record-setting $ 4.525 billion in fines and other payments but further legal proceedings not अपेक्षित to conclude जबतक 2014 हैं जारी to determine payouts और जुर्माना अंतर्गत the Clean Water Act and the Natural Resources Damage Assessment.
As of February 2013, दण्ड और सिविल settlements and payments to a trust fund had cost the company $ 42.2 billion.
`` Where the Streets Have No Name '' is a song by चट्टान बैंड u2.
It is the opening track from their 1987 album The Joshua Tree and was released as the album 's तीसरा सिंगल in अगस्त 1987.
The song 's hook is a repeating guitar arpeggio using a delay प्रभाव, निभाई during the song 's introduction and again at the end.
Lead vocalist Bono wrote the lyrics in response to the notion that it is possible to identify a person 's religion and income based on the street on जिससे वे जिया, विशेषकर in Belfast.
During the band 's difficulties recording the song, producer Brian eno माना erasing the song 's tapes to have them start from scratch.
`` Where the Streets Have No Name '' was praised by critics and became a commercial success, peaking at number thirteen in the US, number fourteen in Canada, number ten in the Netherlands, and number four in the United Kingdom.
The song has become one of the band 's most popular गीतों और रै remained a स्टेपल of उनके सजीव act since the song debuted in 1987 on The Joshua Tree Tour.
The song was notably performed on a Los एंजिल्स छत लिये the फिल्मांकन of इसके म्यूज़िक वीडियो, जिससे जीती a ग्रैमी Award for Best Performance Music Video.Recently the song has been used by the NFL 's Baltimore Ravens as their entrance song in Super Bowl XLVII
Thomas Jeffrey `` tom '' हैंक्स ( born July 9, 1956 ) is an American actor, producer, writer, and director.
Hanks is known for his roles in अपोलो 13, Big, That Thing You Do !
, The Green Mile, You 've Got Mail, Sleepless in Seattle, Charlie Wilson 's War, Catch Me If तुम Can, Forrest Gump, Cast Away, A League of Their Own, The Da Vinci Code, Angels & Demons, as well as animated films like the Toy Story film series, The Polar Express, and The Simpsons Movie.
He has earned and been nominated for numerous awards during his career, सहित जीतना a सुनहरी ग्लोब लिये बेहतरीन कर्ता और an अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन कर्ता लिये his role in Philadelphia and a Golden Globe, an Academy Award, a Screen Actors Guild Award, and a People 's Choice Award for Best Actor for his role in Forrest Gump, and earning the Stanley Kubrick Britannia Award for Excellence in Film from the BAFTAs in 2004.
Hanks is also known for his collaboration with film director Steven Spielberg on Saving Private Ryan and the mini-series Band of Brothers, which launched Hanks also as a successful director, producer and writer.
As of 2012, Hanks ' films have grossed over $ 4.2 billion at the United States box office alone, and over $ 8.5 billion worldwide making him the highest all-time box office star.

Halley 's Comet or Comet Halley ( or ), officially designated 1P/Halley, is the best-known of the short-period comets and is visible from Earth every 75–76 years.
Halley is the only short-period comet that is clearly visible to the naked eye इससे Earth, and thus the only naked-eye comet that might appear twice in a human lifetime.
अन्य naked-eye धूमकेतुओं may be उज्जवल और अधिक spectacular, लकिन होगा appear तभी एकबार in हज़ारों of years.
हैली 's रिटर्न to the भीतरी सौर प्रणाली have महरूम observed और अंकित by खगोलशास्त्रियों चूंकि at तनिक 240 BCE.
Clear records of the comet 's appearances were made by चाइनीज, babylonian, और मध्यकालीन यूरोपीय chroniclers, but were not recognized as reappearances of the same object at the time.
The comet 's periodicity was first determined in 1705 by English astronomer Edmond Halley, after whom it is अभी named.
Halley 's Comet last appeared in the inner Solar System in 1986 and will next appear in mid-2061.
During its 1986 apparition, Halley became the first comet to be observed in detail by spacecraft, providing the पहला observational data on the structure of a comet nucleus and the mechanism of coma and tail formation.
These observations supported a number of longstanding hypotheses about comet construction, particularly Fred Whipple 's `` dirty snowball '' model, which correctly predicted कि हैली होता be रचित of a मिश्रण of volatile ices – such as water, carbon dioxide and ammonia – and dust.
The missions also provided data जिससे substantially reformed और reconfigured ये ideas ; for instance it is now understood that Halley 's surface is largely composed of dusty, non-volatile materials, and that only a small portion of it is icy.
The following is a list of the most populous incorporated places of the United States of अमेरिका.
As defined by the United States Census Bureau, an `` incorporated place `` includes a variety of designations, including city, town, village, borough, and municipality.
A few exceptional Census Designated Places ( CDPs ) are also included in the Census Bureau 's listing of incorporated places.
Consolidated city-counties represent a distinct type of government that includes the entire population of a काउंटी, or काउंटी equivalent.
Some consolidated city-counties, however, शामिल multiple incorporated places.
This list presents तभी कि portion ( or `` संतुलन '' ) of such consolidated city-counties that are not a part of another incorporated place.
Note that इस सूची refers तभी to the जनसांख्यिकी of व्यक्तिगत municipalities within their defined limits, which does not include other municipalities or unincorporated suburban areas within urban agglomerations.
A अलग रैंकिंग is evident when considering U.S. metropolitan area populations.
The Mayflower was the ship that in 1620 transported 102 English तीर्थयात्रियों, सहित a core group of Separatists, to New England.
Their story is one of travail and survival in a हर्ष New World environment.
A New Zealand forward ( in white ) takes a शॉट on goal against Cameroon in the 2011 FIFA U-20 World Cup.
Forwards, also known as strikers, are the players on a team in association football who play nearest to the opposing टोली 's लक्ष्य, और हैं इसलिए प्रधानतया जिम्मेदार for scoring goals.
This very उन्नत स्थिति and its limited defensive responsibilities mean forwards normally score more goals than other players.
This position requires प्रज्ञा, speed, and power, both of execution and of thought, to perform the role well.
Modern team formations प्रायः include one to three forwards ; two is the most common.
Coaches typically field one striker who plays in an advanced position ( the centre forward ), and another attacking forward who plays somewhat deeper and assists in making goals as खूब as स्कोरिंग ( the second striker ).
It should be noted that inside forwards develop इससे attacking midfield स्थितियाँ and hence are naturally midfielders.
Barcelona FC star लियोनेल मेस्सी is a ठेठ Attacking Midfielder seen as a forward due to his shot accuracy.
A California domestic partnership is a legal relationship available to same-sex युगल, और to निश्चित opposite-sex युगल in जिससे at तनिक one party is at least 18 years of age.
It affords the couple `` the same rights, protections, and benefits, and... the same responsibilities, दायित्वों, and duties under law... '' as married spouses.
Enacted in 1999, the domestic partnership registry was the first of its kind in the United States created by a legislature without court intervention.
Initially, domestic partnerships enjoyed very few privileges—principally बस hospital-visitation rights and the right to be claimed as a next of kin of the estate of a deceased partner.
The legislature has since expanded the scope of California domestic partnerships to शामिल सब of the rights and responsibilities common to marriage.
As such, California domestic partnerships are functionally समतुल्य to सिविल unions offered in several other states.
Although the कार्यक्रम enjoys broad support in California, it has been the source of some controversy.
Groups opposed to the recognition of same-sex families have challenged the expansion of domestic partnerships in अदालत.
Conversely, advocates of same-sex marriage contend that anything less than full marriage rights extended to same-sex partners is analogous to the `` separate लकिन बराबर '' जातिगत laws of the Jim Crow era.
चिह्नित A. जैक्सन ( born April 1, 1965 ) is an American basketball coach, and former player who is the current head coach of the Golden State Warriors of the NBA.
A point guard from St. John 's University, he played लिये the नई यॉर्क knicks, इंडियाना पेसर्स, लॉस एंजिल्स Clippers, Denver Nuggets, Toronto Raptors, Utah Jazz and Houston Rockets in the NBA in a career spanning from 1987 to 2004.
Jackson has also worked as a commentator for ESPN and ABC alongside his former coach Jeff Van Gundy और play-by-play man माइक breen.
He was previously an NBA analyst for The YES Network 's New Jersey नेट games.
South Africa has eleven official भाषाएं : अफ्रीकी, अंग्रेज़ी, Ndebele, Northern Sotho, Sotho, Swazi, Tswana, Tsonga, Venda, Xhosa and Zulu.
Fewer than two percent of South Africans speak a first language other than an official one.
Most South africans can speak more than one language.
Dutch and English were the first official languages of South Africa from 1910 to 1925.
Afrikaans was added as a part of Dutch in 1925.
Dutch was replaced by Afrikaans when South Africa became a republic in 1961, and Dutch was dropped in 1983, so between 1983 and 1994, South Africa had two official languages : English and Afrikaans.
The English version of the South African constitution refers to the languages by the names in those languages : isiZulu, isiXhosa, Afrikaans, Sepedi ( referring to Northern Sotho ), setswana, अंग्रेज़ी, Sesotho ( referring to Southern Sotho ), Xitsonga, Siswati, Tshivenda and isiNdebele ( referring to Southern Ndebele ).
In South Africa, दक्षिणी Ndebele is known simply as Ndebele, as most speakers of Northern Ndebele live in Zimbabwe.
The 1993 version of the Constitution referred to Northern Sotho as sesotho sa Leboa, but the 1996 version referred to the language as Sepedi.
Different government departments and official bodies use अलग शर्तें to denote Northern Sotho.
The प्रमुख भाषा of सरकारी is English even if South Africans often take pride in using indigenous languages for any purpose.
Afrikaans भी सुविधाएँ prominently in commerce together with English as the languages with the highest number of fluent speakers are Afrikaans and English.
In terms of linguistic classification, the official languages include two West-Germanic languages ( English and Afrikaans ) and nine Bantu languages.
Four of these हैं nguni भाषाएं ( ज़ुलू, ख़ोसा, स्वाति और Ndebele ) and three are Sotho–Tswana languages ( Northern Sotho, Southern Sotho and Tswana ).
Tsonga is a tswa–ronga language.
South African Sign Language is a distinct though incompletely emerged नेशनल मानक भाषा which also subsumes a cluster of semi-standardised dialects.
Aluminium nitrate is a salt of aluminium और नाइट्रिक acid, existing normally as a crystalline hydrate, most commonly as aluminium nitrate nonahydrate, Al ( NO3 ) 3·9H2O.
The New York Jets are a professional football team headquartered in Florham पार्क, नई जर्सी, representing the New York metropolitan area.
the टोली is a member of the Eastern Division of the American Football Conference ( AFC ) in the National Football League ( NFL ).
In a unique arrangement for the league, the Jets share MetLife Stadium in East Rutherford, New जर्सी साथ the नई यॉर्क दिग्गज.
The मताधिकार is legally and corporately registered as New York Jets, LLC.
The team was founded in 1959 as the Titans of New York, an original member of the American Football League ; later, the franchise joined the एनएफएल in the AFL–NFL merger.
The team began to play in 1960 at the Polo Grounds.
Under new स्वामित्व, the वर्तमान name was adopted in 1963 and the franchise was relocated to Shea Stadium in 1964 and then to the Meadowlands Sports Complex in 1984.
The Jets advanced to the playoffs for the first time in 1968 and went on to compete in Super Bowl III where they defeated the Baltimore Colts, becoming the first AFL team to defeat an NFL club in an afl-nfl संसार चैंपियनशिप Game.
Since 1968, the Jets have appeared in the playoffs thirteen times, and in the afc चैंपियनशिप खेल चार times, most recently losing to the Pittsburgh Steelers in 2010.
However, the Jets have never returned to the Super Bowl, making them one of three NFL teams to win their lone Super Bowl appearance, along with the New ऑरलियन्स संतो और tampa Bay Buccaneers.
The team 's training facility, अटलांटिक स्वास्थ्य Jets Training Center, which opened in 2008, is located in Florham Park.
The team currently holds their annual training camp sessions on the campus of the State University of New York at Cortland in Cortland, नई यॉर्क जबकि पकड़कर occasional सत्र at the Florham Park complex.
Psilocybe semilanceata
Psilocybin mushrooms, also known as psychedelic mushrooms, are fungi that contain psychoactive indole alkaloids.
There are multiple colloquial terms for psilocybin मशरूम, the most common being shrooms and magic mushrooms.
biological genera containing psilocybin mushrooms include Agrocybe, Conocybe, Copelandia, Galerina, Gerronema, Gymnopilus, Hypholoma, Inocybe, Mycena, Panaeolus, Pluteus, and Psilocybe.
There are approximately 190 species of psilocybin mushrooms and most of them fall in the genus psilocybe.
Psilocybin mushrooms have likely महरूम प्रयुक्त चूंकि prehistoric times and may have been depicted in rock art.
Many cultures have used these मशरूम in religious rites.
In modern Western society they are used recreationally for their साइकेडेलिक effects.
Recent अध्ययन done at Imperial College London and Johns Hopkins School of Medicine conclude that when used properly, psilocybin acts as an anti-depressant as suggested by fMRI brain scans.
Alaska ( ) is a state in the United States, situated in the उत्तरपश्चिम extremity of the उत्तर अमरीकी महाद्वीप, साथ the international boundary with Canada to the east, the Arctic Ocean to the north, and the Pacific Ocean to the west and south, with Russia further west across the Bering Strait.
Alaska is the largest state in the United States by क्षेत्रफल, the 4th तनिक populous and the least densely populated of the 50 United States.
Approximately half of अलास्का 's 731,449 residents live within the Anchorage metropolitan area.
Alaska 's economy is dominated by the oil, natural gas, and fishing industries ; it has these resources in प्रचुरता.
Alaska was purchased from Russia on March 30, 1867, for $ 7.2 million ( $ adjusted for inflation ) at लगभग two cents per acre ( $ 4.74/km2 ).
The land went through several administrative changes before becoming an organized ( or incorporated ) territory on May 11, 1912, and the 49th state of the U.S. on January 3, 1959.
The name `` Alaska '' ( Аляска ) was already introduced in the Russian colonial period, जब it थी प्रयुक्त तभी लिये the प्रायद्वीप और is निकला इससे the aleut alaxsxaq, meaning `` the mainland '' or, more literally, `` the object towards which the action of the sea is directed ''.
It is also known as Alyeska, the `` ग्रेट जमीन '', an Aleut word derived from the same root.
The 101 French departments are divided into 342 arrondissements, जिससे may be translated into English as districts.
The capital of an arrondissement/district is called a subprefecture.
When an arrondissement contains the prefecture ( पूंजी ) of the विभाग, that prefecture is the capital of the arrondissement, acting both as a prefecture and as a subprefecture.
arrondissements हैं further विभाजित into cantons और communes.
The vagina ( इससे लैटिन vāgīna, वस्तुतः `` म्यान '' or `` म्यान `` ) is a tubular ट्रैक्ट जिससे is a sex अंग और रै दो प्रमुख कृत्यों ; यौन मैथुन और प्रसव.
In humans, this passage लीड इससे the खोलने of the भग to the uterus ( womb ), but the vaginal tract ends at the cervix.
Unlike men, who have तभी one genital orifice, women have two, the urethra and the vagina.
The vaginal opening is much larger than the urethral खोलने, and both openings are protected by the labia.
The inner mould of the vagina रै a foldy texture which can create friction for the penis during intercourse.
During arousal, the vagina gets moist to facilitate the entrance of the penis.
The latinate plural `` vaginae '' is rarely used in English.
Colloquially, the word vagina is often used to refer to the vulva or to the female genitals in सामान्य.
However, by its dictionary and anatomical definitions, vagina refers exclusively to the specific internal structure.
The Cincinnati Reds are a Major League Baseball team based in सिनसिनाटी, Ohio.
They are सदस्यों of the National League Central Division.
Established in 1881 as an independent club, the team became a charter member of the अमरीकी संघ in 1882, और joined the नेशनल League in 1890.
The club traditionally traces its उत्पत्ति to baseball 's first openly professional team in 1869.
The Reds have जीती पाँच संसार श्रेणी शीर्षक, एक अमरीकी संघ pennant, नौ नेशनल लीग pennants और टेन प्रभाग शीर्षक.
the लाल निभाई in the नेशनल लीग वेस्ट between 1969 और 1993 और have महरूम in the नेशनल लीग सेंट्रल चूंकि 1994.
Since 2003, the Reds have निभाई at Great American Ball Park, built next to their home from 1970 to 2002, Riverfront Stadium.
Bob castellini has owned the Cincinnati Reds since 2006.
A शरारत stink bomb.
A stink bomb is a device designed to create an अप्रिय smell.
They range in effectiveness from simple pranks to सैन्य grade malodorants or riot control chemical agents.
The Guinness Book of रिकॉर्ड सूचियाँ दो smelliest substances.
One is `` US Government Standard Bathroom Malodor '' ; a mixture of eight chemicals with a stench resembling इंसान मल, तभी much stronger, designed to test the efficacy of deodorizers and air fresheners.
another एक, `` जो me ? ``, is a mixture of five sulfur-containing chemicals and smells like rotting food and carcasses.
The adage `` A picture is worth a thousand words '' refers to the notion that a जटिल विचार can be conveyed with just a single still image.
It also aptly characterizes one of the main goals of visualization, namely making it possible to absorb large amounts of आंकड़ा जल्दी.
The अभिव्यक्ति `` उपयोग a picture.
It 's worth a thousand शब्द. '' appears in a 1911 newspaper article quoting newspaper editor Arthur Brisbane discussing journalism and publicity.
1913 समाचारपत्र विज्ञापन
A similar phrase, `` One Look Is Worth A Thousand Words '', appears in a 1913 newspaper विज्ञापन लिये the piqua स्वचालित सप्लाई हाउस of Piqua, Ohio.
An early use of the सटीक phrase appears in an 1918 समाचारपत्र विज्ञापन लिये the San Antonio Light which says : One of the Nation 's Greatest Editors Says : One Picture is Worth a Thousand Words The San Antonio Light 's Pictorial Magazine of the War Exemplifies the truth of the above statement -- judging from the warm reception it has received at the hands of the Sunday Light readers.
It is believed by some that the modern use of the phrase stems from an article by Fred R. Barnard in the advertising trade journal Printers ' Ink, promoting the use of images in advertisements that appeared on the sides of streetcars.
The December 8, 1921 issue carries an ad entitled, `` One Look is लायक a हजार शब्द. ''
Another ad by Barnard appears in the March 10, 1927 issue with the phrase `` One Picture Worth Ten हजार शब्द, '' जहाँ it is labeled a Chinese proverb ( 一圖勝萬言 ).
The Home Book of Proverbs, Maxims, and Familiar Phrases quotes Barnard as saying he called it `` a Chinese proverb, so that लोगों would take it seriously. ''
Soon after, the proverb would become popularly attributed to Confucius.
The discussion of `` One Picture Worth हजार शब्द '' बनाम `` एक चित्र लायक टेन हजार शब्द '' Wan yen I hua and 10.000 miles worth 10.000 books is cited in Information graphics where the concept of many in different disciplines and cultures.
A picture is worth a हजार words
despite इस आधुनिक उत्पत्ति of the popular phrase, the sentiment has been expressed by earlier writers.
For example the Russian writer Ivan Turgenev wrote ( in Fathers and Sons in 1862 ), `` A picture shows me at a glance what it takes dozens of pages of a book to expound. ''
Computer programmer and author Fred Brooks makes an opposite statement regarding programming in The Mythical Man-Month : `` Show me your flowcharts and conceal your tables, and I shall continue to be mystified.
Show me your tables, and I won’t usually need your flowcharts ; they’ll be स्पष्ट. ''
The phrase has also been spoofed by John McCarthy, the famous computer वैज्ञानिक, to make the opposite point : `` As the Chinese say, 1001 words is worth more than a picture. ''
A season is a subdivision of the साल, चिह्नित by परिवर्तन in weather, ecology, and hours of daylight.
सीज़न परिणाम इससे the वार्षिक क्रान्ति of the Earth around the Sun and the tilt of the Earth 's axis relative to the plane of revolution.
In temperate and polar regions, the seasons are चिह्नित by changes in the intensity of sunlight that reaches the Earth 's surface, variations of which may cause animals to go into hibernation or to migrate, and plants to be dormant.
During May, June and July, the northern hemisphere is exposed to more direct धूप क्युकी the गोलार्ध चेहरों the sun.
The same is true of the दक्षिणी hemisphere in November, December and January.
It is the tilt of the धरती कि कल्याणकारी the Sun to be higher in the sky during the summer months which increases the solar flux.
However, due to seasonal lag, June, July and August are the hottest months in the northern गोलार्ध और दिसम्बर, जनवरी और February are the hottest months in the southern hemisphere.
In temperate and subpolar regions, generally चार पंचांग -आधारd seasons ( with their adjectives ) are recognized : spring ( vernal ), summer ( estival ), autumn ( autumnal ) and winter ( hibernal ).
However, ecologists mostly use a six season model for temperate climate regions that includes pre-spring ( prevernal ) and लेट गर्मियाँ ( serotinal ) as पृथक सीज़न साथ साथ the traditional four.
Hot regions have दो or तीन सीज़न ; the rainy ( or wet, or monsoon ) season and the dry season, and in some tropical areas, a cool or mild season.
In some parts of the world, special `` seasons '' are loosely defined based on important events such as a hurricane season, tornado season or a wildfire season.
the छह ecological seasons
The four पंचांग सीज़न, depicted in an ancient Roman mosaic from Tunisia
डच exports in 2006
At the time of writing the Netherlands is the 17th largest economy of the world.
( see : List of देशों by जीडीपी ( nominal ) )
GDP per capita is roughly $ 42,000 which puts it in the top 10 of richest nations in the world ( see : List of देशों by जीडीपी ( ppp ) प्रति capita ).
Between 1996 and 2000 annual आर्थिक विकास ( जीडीपी ) averaged over 4 %, well above the European average.
Growth slowed considerably in 2001-05 as भाग of the वैश्विक economic slowdown.
2006 and 2007 however showed economic growth of 3.4 % और 3.9 %.
The Dutch economy was hit considerably by the ongoing global financial crisis and the ensuing European debt crisis.
Several banks went bankrupt, and a number of others had to receive सरकारी सहायता.
In 2009 the अर्थव्यवस्था declined with 3.5 %, followed by two years of mild growth.
The Dutch economy is फिलहाल in a मंदी again, with an economic decline of 0.5 % in 2012.
Inflation is at 3.2 % in फ़रवरी 2013.
Unemployment has been relatively कम compared to other EU nations for decades but after mid-2012 it has seen a fast increase and in February 2013 it has hit 7.7 %.

Prunus virginiana, commonly called bitter-berry, chokecherry, Virginia bird cherry and western chokecherry ( also black chokecherry for P. virginiana var. demissa ), is a species of bird cherry ( Prunus subgenus Padus ) native to उत्तर अमेरिका ; the प्राकृतिक ऐतिहासिक दायरा of P. virginiana includes most of the continent, except for the far north and far south.
Los Angeles अंतरराष्ट्रीय Airport is the primary airport serving the Greater Los Angeles Area, the second-most populated metropolitan area in the United States.
It is most often referred to by its IATA airport code lax, साथ the letters pronounced individually.
LAX is located in southwestern Los Angeles along the Pacific coast in the neighborhood of Westchester, from the downtown core and is the primary विमानक्षेत्र of लॉस एंजिल्स संसार एयरपोर्ट ( lawa ), an agency of the Los Angeles city government formerly known as the Department of Airports.
In 2011, LAX was the sixth busiest airport in the world after hartsfield-jackson अटलांटा अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र, बीजिंग Capital International Airport, London Heathrow Airport, Chicago O'Hare International Airport, and Tokyo Haneda International Airport with 61,862,052 passengers.
The airport holds the claim for `` the world 's व्यस्ततम उत्पत्ति और गंतव्य ( o & d ) विमानक्षेत्र '' in 2011 that involves non-connecting passenger traffic.
it is भी the only airport to rank among the top five U.S. airports for both passenger and cargo traffic.
LAX is the busiest विमानक्षेत्र in the वृहद लॉस एंजिल्स Area, but other airports including Bob Hope Airport, John Wayne Airport, Long Beach Airport, LA/Ontario International Airport, and Palm Springs International Airport also serve the region.
LAX is also the busiest airport in California and the West Coast of the संयुक्त राज्य in शर्तें of उड़ान परिचालन, passenger traffic and air cargo activity, leading it to be referred to as the `` Gateway to the Pacific Rim ``.
Peyton Williams Manning ( born March 24, 1976 ) is an American football quarterback for the डेनवर broncos of the National Football League ( NFL ).
He played for the Indianapolis Colts for 14 seasons from 1998 to 2011.
He is the son of former NFL quarterback Archie Manning and an elder bhai of New York Giants quarterback Eli Manning.
Manning played college football for the University of Tennessee, leading the Volunteers to the 1997 SEC Championship in his senior season.
However, No. 3 Tennessee lost to the No. 2 Nebraska Cornhuskers 42-17 in the Orange Bowl giving Nebraska and Tom Osborne their 3rd national चैंपियनशिप in 4 years.
He was चुनी by the इंडियानापोलिस कोल्टस with the first overall pick in the 1998 NFL Draft.
From 1998 to 2010, he led the Colts to eight ( seven AFC South and one AFC East ) प्रभाग championships, दो afc championships, and to a Super Bowl championship ( Super Bowl XLI ).
He रै जीती a रिकार्ड चार लीग सबसे मूल्यवान खिलाड़ी पुरस्कार, was the most valuable player of Super Bowl XLI, has been named to twelve Pro Bowls, has twelve 4,000-yard passing seasons, and is the Indianapolis Colts ' all-time leader in passing yards ( 54,828 ) and touchdown passes ( 399 ).
In 2009, he was named the बेहतरीन player in the NFL and Fox Sports along with Sports Illustrated named him the NFL player of the decade of the 2000s.
In may 2011, he underwent गर्दन सर्जरी to alleviate गर्दन पीड़ा और भुजा कमज़ोरी he dealt साथ दौरान the पिछला few सीज़न पहले हस्ताक्षर a five-year, $ 90 लाख अनुबंध एक्सटेंशन साथ the कोल्टस in जुलाई 2011.
Manning had hoped to play in the 2011 season, but in September 2011, he underwent a much more serious second surgery : a level one cervical fusion procedure.
Manning had never missed an NFL game in his career, but थी मजबूर to मिस the entire 2011 season.
He was released by the Colts on March 7, 2012, and after an almost two-week period where he visited with and worked आउट लिये अनेक एनएफएल टीमों, he हस्ताक्षरित with the Denver Broncos on March 20, 2012.
Manning 's pre-snap routine has earned him the उपनाम, `` the शेरिफ '' and is one of the most recognizable and parodied in the NFL.
The Indianapolis Colts ' almost exclusive use of the hurry-up offense led to Manning using an array of gestures और मौखिक कमांड to call the play at the line of scrimmage rather than in the huddle.
The America Tower of the अमरीकी सामान्य बीच, the headquarters of Baker Hughes
Baker Hughes is one of the संसार 's largest oilfield services companies.
It operates in over 90 देशों, providing the आयल and gas industry with products and services for drilling, formation evaluation, completion, production and reservoir consulting.
Baker Hughes has its headquarters in the America Tower in the अमरीकी सामान्य Center in Neartown, Houston.
Baker Hughes Incorporated was formed जब बेकर अंतरराष्ट्रीय and Hughes Tool Company merged in 1987.
Baker Hughes operates worldwide with major offices in Liverpool, United Kingdom ; Singapore ; Dubai ; a शोध और मेंटेनेंस सुविधा in Celle, Germany ; Lafayette, Louisiana ; Houston, Texas ; Pescara, Italy ; and Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
The company is administered broadly in two hemispheres : the eastern hemisphere with five regions ( Europe, Africa, the Middle East, Asia Pacific and Russia/Caspian ) and the western hemisphere with four regions ( Canada, US Land, US Gulf, and Latin America ).
Each of these regions is subdivided into markets.
The United States one- cent coin, commonly ज्ञात as a पैनी, is a unit of currency equaling one one-hundredth of a United States dollar.
The cent 's प्रतीक is ¢.
Its obverse has featured the profile of President Abraham lincoln चूंकि 1909, the centennial of his birth.
From 1959 ( the sesquicentennial of Lincoln 's birth ) to 2008, the reverse featured the Lincoln Memorial.
Four different reverse designs in 2009 honored Lincoln 's 200th birthday and a नई, स्थाई reverse – the Union Shield – was introduced in 2010.
The सिक्का is 0.75 inches ( 19.05 mm ) in diameter and 0.061 inches ( 1.55 mm ) in thickness.
The U.S. Mint 's आधिकारिक नाम लिये a पैनी is `` '' and the U.S. Treasury 's official name is `` one cent piece ''.
The colloquial term penny derives from the British coin of the same name, the pre-decimal version of which था a समान value.
In American English, pennies is the plural form, other plural forms pence and pee ( standard use in British अंग्रेज़ी ) हैं नहीं used.
As of 2012, it costs the u.S. मिंट 2.00 cents to make a cent because of the cost of materials and production.
This figure includes the Mint’s fixed components for distribution and fabrication, अनुमानित at $ 13 million in FY 2011.
It also includes Mint overhead allocated to the penny, which was $ 17.7 लाख for 2011.
Fixed costs and overhead would have to be absorbed by other circulating coins बगैर the पैनी.
The loss in profitability due to producing the one cent coin in the United States for the year of 2012 was $ 58,000,000.
This was a slight decrease from 2011, the year before, which had a production loss of $ 60,200,000.

Koi varieties हैं विशिष्ट by coloration, patterning, and scalation.
Some of the major colors हैं श्वेत, ब्लैक, रेड, yellow, blue, and cream.
The सबसे लोकप्रिय श्रेणी of कोई is the gosanke, जिससे is बना up of the kohaku, taisho sanshoku, और showa sanshoku किस्में.
The American Federation of Government Employees ( AFGE ) is an American labor union representing over 650,000 employees of the federal government, about 5,000 employees of the District of Columbia, and a few hundred private sector employees, mostly in and around federal facilities.
AFGE is the largest union for civilian, non- postal federal employees and the largest union for District of Columbia employees who रपट directly to the mayor ( i.e., outside of D.C. public schools ).
It is संबद्ध with the AFL-CIO.
