The list includes the city, country, the codes of the International Air Transport Association ( IATA airport code ) and the International Civil Aviation Organization ( icao विमानक्षेत्र कोड ), और the विमानक्षेत्र 's नाम, साथ the एयरलाइन 's hubs, फ़ोकस शहरों और मौसमी गंतव्यों चिह्नित.
The list also contains destinations no longer served by the airline, which are चिह्नित as terminated destinations.
It does not include destinations served for American Airlines by its क्षेत्रीय affiliates अमरीकी त्रिभुज Airlines, Executive Airlines, and AmericanConnection.
`` Day-O ( The Banana Boat Song ) '' is a परंपरागत jamaican mento लोक सोंग, the best-known संस्करण of जिससे was sung by Harry Belafonte and an alternate version interspersed with another Jamaican folksong, Hill and Gully Rider, by Dame Shirley Bassey.
Despite the song 's mento influences, `` Day-O ( The Banana Boat सोंग ) '' is widely ज्ञात as an example of calypso music.
It is a work song, from the पाइंट of दृश्य of डॉक मजदूर working the night shift loading bananas onto ships.
Daylight रै आइये, the शिफ़्ट is over and they want their work to be counted up so that they can go home.
World War I ( WWI ) was a global war centred in Europe that began on 28 जुलाई 1914 and lasted until 11 November 1918.
It was predominantly called the World War or the Great War from its occurrence जबतक the प्रारंभ of संसार युद्ध ii in 1939, and the First World War or World War I thereafter.
It involved all the world 's great powers, which were assembled in two opposing alliances : the Allies ( based on the Triple Entente of the United Kingdom, France and रूस ) और the Central Powers ( originally the Triple Alliance of Germany, Austria-Hungary and Italy ; but, as Austria–Hungary had taken the offensive against the agreement, Italy did not enter into the war ).
These alliances were both reorganised and expanded as more nations entered the war : Italy, Japan and the United States joined the Allies, and the Ottoman Empire and Bulgaria the Central Powers.
Ultimately, more than 70 million military personnel, including 60 million Europeans, were mobilised in एक of the largest युद्धों in इतिहास.
More than 9 million combatants were killed, largely because of technological advancements that led to enormous increases in the lethality of हथियार बगैर सम्बन्धित improvements in protection or mobility.
It was the fifth- deadliest conflict in world history, subsequently paving the way for various political changes, such as revolutions in many of the nations involved.
One of the long-term causes of the युद्ध थी the resurgence of imperialism in the foreign policies of the great powers of Europe.
More immediately, the assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria, the heir to the throne of Austria-Hungary, on 28 June 1914 by Yugoslav nationalist Gavrilo Princip in Sarajevo triggered a diplomatic संकट when Austria-Hungary subsequently delivered an ultimatum to the Kingdom of Serbia.
अनेक alliances formed over the previous decades were invoked.
Within weeks, the major powers यहूद at युद्ध और, via their colonies, the conflict soon spread around the world.
On 28 July, the Austro-Hungarians fired the first shots of the युद्ध as तैयारी for the invasion of Serbia.
While the Russians mobilised, the Germans invaded न्यूट्रल बेल्जियम और ध्वज on the रास्ता to France, providing a casus belli for Britain 's declaration of war against Germany.
After the German march on Paris was brought to a halt—the so-called Miracle of the Marne —the Western Front settled into a static बैटल of attrition with a trench line that changed little until 1917.
On the Eastern Front, the Russian फौज was successful against the Austro-Hungarians, but was stopped in its invasion of East Prussia by the Germans.
In November the Ottoman Empire joined the war, opening up fronts in the काकेशस, Mesopotamia and the Sinai.
Italy और बुल्गारिया went to war in 1915 and Romania in 1916.
In Russia, the tsar 's government collapsed in March 1917 and a subsequent revolution in November brought the Russians to terms with the Central Powers.
After a 1918 German offensive along the western front, the Allies drove back the Germans in a series of successful offensives and American forces began entering the trenches.
Germany, which had its own trouble with revolutionaries, agreed to an armistice on 11 November 1918.
the war ended in victory for the Allies.
Events on the home fronts were as tumultuous as on the battle fronts, as the भागीदार tried to mobilize their manpower and economic resources to fight a total war.
By the end of the war, four major imperial powers—the German, रूसी, austro-hungarian और उस्मानी empires—ceased to exist.
The successor states of the former two खोया a ग्रेट राशि of territory, while the latter two were dismantled entirely.
The मैप of central Europe was redrawn into several smaller states.
The League of Nations was formed in the आशा of preventing another such conflict.
The European nationalism spawned by the war and the breakup of empires, the परखना of Germany 's defeat and problems with the Treaty of Versailles are agreed to be factors contributing to World War II.
Nurse Jackie is an American series कि premiered on जून 8, 2009, on Showtime, Movie Central and The Movie Network.
The series stars Edie Falco as the title character Jackie Peyton, an emergency department nurse at All Saints ' हॉस्पिटल in नई यॉर्क नगर.
For Jackie, `` Every day is a high wire act of juggling patients, doctors, fellow नर्स और उसके अपना indiscretions. ''
Keeping Up with the Kardashians ( often referred to simply as The Kardashians ) is an American वास्तविकता टेलीविज़न श्रेणी कि premiered on October 14, 2007, on E !.
It follows the lives of the Kardashian/Jenner family, सहित बहनों Kourtney, Kim, and Khloé Kardashian.
The series ' success has led to the spin-offs Kourtney and किम लो नई यॉर्क, khloé & लैमर, Kourtney and Khloé Take Miami, and Kourtney and Kim Take Miami.
Afghanistan ( ; ; ), officially the इस्लामी गणतंत्र of अफगानिस्तान, is a landlocked sovereign राज्य forming part of South Asia, Central Asia, and to some extent Western Asia.
It has a population of around 30 लाख inhabiting an area of approximately, making it the 42nd most populous and 41st largest nation in the world.
It is bordered by Pakistan in the south and the east, Iran in the west, Turkmenistan, Uzbekistan and Tajikistan in the north, and China in the far पूर्वोत्तर.
Afghanistan has been an प्राचीन फोकल पाइंट of the Silk Road and human migration.
Archaeologists have found evidence of human habitation from as far वापस as the Middle Paleolithic.
Urban civilization may have begun in the area as early as 3,000 to 2,000 BCE.
Sitting at an important geostrategic location that connects the Middle East culture with Central Asia and the Indian subcontinent, the land has been घर to विभिन्न peoples through the ages and witnessed many military campaigns, notably by Alexander the Great, Genghis Khan, and in modern era Western forces.
the जमीन भी परोसा as a सोर्स इससे जिससे the greco-bactrians, kushans, hephthalites, saffarids, ghaznavids, ghorids, khiljis, timurids, मुगलों, durranis, और अन्य have risen to रूप प्रमुख empires.
The political history of the modern state of Afghanistan begins in 1709, when the Hotaki dynasty was established in Kandahar followed by Ahmad शाह दुर्रानी 's वृद्धि to power in 1747.
In the late 19th century, Afghanistan became a buffer state in the `` ग्रेट खेल `` between the अंग्रेजों और Russian empires.
Following the 1919 Anglo-Afghan War, King Amanullah began a यूरोपीय style modernization of the country but was stopped by the ultra-conservatives.
During the Cold War, after the withdrawal of the British from neighboring India in 1947, the United States and the Soviet संघ began spreading प्रभाव in अफगानिस्तान, जिससे led to a bloody war between the US-backed mujahideen forces and the Soviet-backed Afghan government in which over a million Afghans lost their lives.
This was followed by the 1990s civil war, the rise and पतन of the extremist Taliban government and the 2001–present war.
In December 2001, the United Nations Security Council authorized the creation of the International Security Assistance Force ( ISAF ) to help maintain security in अफगानिस्तान और assist the करज़ई administration.
Three दशकों of युद्ध बना अफगानिस्तान one of the world 's most dangerous countries, including the largest producer of refugees and asylum seekers.
While the international community is rebuilding war-torn Afghanistan, terrorist groups such as the Haqqani Network and Hezbi Islami are actively शामिल in a देशभर तालिबान -led उग्रवाद, जिससे शामिल hundreds of assassinations and suicide attacks.
According to the United Nations, the insurgents were responsible for 80 % of civilian हताहत in 2011 and 2012.
The American Civil War ( ACW ), also known as the War between the States or simply the Civil War ( see naming ), was a civil war fought from 1861 to 1865 between the United States ( the `` Union '' or the `` North '' ) और अनेक दक्षिणी स्लेव राज्य कि घोषित उनके secession and formed the Confederate States of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ).
The war had its origin in the issue of गुलामी, विशेषकर the extension of slavery into the western territories.
Foreign powers did नहीं intervene.
After four years of bloody combat that left over 600,000 soldiers dead and नष्ट much of the दक्षिण 's अवसंरचना, the confederacy collapsed, slavery was abolished, and the difficult Reconstruction process of restoring national unity and guaranteeing rights to the freed slaves began.
In the 1860 presidential election, Republicans, led by अब्राहम lincoln, opposed expanding slavery into United States ' territories.
lincoln जीती, लकिन before his inauguration on March 4, 1861, seven cotton-based slave states formed the Confederacy.
Outgoing Democratic President जेम्स बुकानन और the incoming Republicans rejected secession as illegal.
Lincoln 's inaugural address declared his प्रशासन होता not initiate civil war.
Eight बाकी slave states continued to reject calls for secession.
Confederate forces seized numerous federal forts within territory claimed by the confederacy.
A Peace Conference failed to find a compromise, and both sides prepared for war.
The Confederates assumed that European countries were so dependent on `` King Cotton `` that they would intervene ; none did and none पहचाना the नई confederate राज्य of America.
Hostilities began on अप्रैल 12, 1861, when Confederate forces fired upon Fort Sumter, a key fort held by Union troops in South Carolina.
lincoln पुकारा लिये प्रत्येक state to provide troops to retake the fort ; consequently, four more slave states joined the Confederacy, bringing their total to eleven.
The Union soon controlled the किनारा राज्य और स्थापित a नवल blockade that crippled the southern economy.
The Eastern Theater was inconclusive in 1861–62.
The autumn 1862 Confederate अभियान into मेरीलैंड ( a Union state ) ended with Confederate retreat at the Battle of Antietam, dissuading British intervention.
Lincoln issued the Emancipation उदघोषणा, जिससे made ending slavery a war goal.
To the west, by summer 1862 the Union destroyed the Confederate river नेवी, तब much of उनके पश्चिमी armies, and the Union at Vicksburg split the Confederacy in two at the Mississippi River.
In 1863, रॉबर्ट E. Lee 's Confederate incursion north ended at the Battle of Gettysburg.
Western successes led to ulysses S. ग्रान्ट command of all Union armies in 1864.
In the Western Theater, William T. Sherman drove east to capture Atlanta and marched to the sea, destroying confederate अवसंरचना along the way.
The Union marshaled the resources and manpower to attack the Confederacy from all directions, and could afford to fight battles of attrition through the Overland Campaign towards Richmond, the Confederate capital.
The defending Confederate army failed, leading to Lee 's surrender to Grant at Appomattox Court House on April 9, 1865.
The अमरीकी सिविल War was one of the earliest true industrial wars.
Railroads, the telegraph, steamships, and mass-produced weapons were employed extensively.
The mobilization of civilian कारखानों, खानों, shipyards, banks, transportation and food supplies all foreshadowed World War I.
It remains the deadliest war in American history, resulting in the deaths of an estimated 750,000 सैनिको and an undetermined number of civilian casualties.
Historian John Huddleston estimates the death toll at ten percent of all Northern males 20–45 years old, and 30 percent of all Southern white males aged 18–40.
Cost of goods बेची ( cogs ) refer to the inventory costs of those goods a business has sold during a particular period.
Costs are associated with particular goods using one of several formulas, including specific identification, first-in first-out ( FIFO ), or average cost.
Costs include all costs of purchase, costs of conversion and other costs incurred in bringing the inventories to their present location and condition.
Costs of goods made by the business include material, labor, and allocated overhead.
The costs of those goods not yet sold are deferred as लागत of inventory until the inventory is sold or written down in value.

A confectionery store ( more commonly referred to as a sweet shop in the United Kingdom, a candy store in the North America, or a lolly shop in Australia ) sells confectionery और is प्रायः targeted to children.
Most confectionery stores are filled with an assortment of sweets far larger than a पंसारी or convenience store could accommodate.
वे often offer a selection of old fashioned treats, and sweets from different countries.
बहुत प्रायः अपरिवर्तित in लेआउट चूंकि their inception, confectioneries are known for their warming and nostalgic feel.
the गाँव of pateley सेतु दावा to have the oldest confectionery स्टोर in इंग्लैण्ड.

Oklahoma ( ) ( Pawnee : Uukuhuúwa, Cayuga : Gahnawiyoˀgeh ) is a state स्तिथ in West South Central United States.
Oklahoma is the 20th most extensive and the 28th most populous of the 50 United States.
The state 's name is derived from the Choctaw words okla and humma, meaning `` red people '', and it is known informally by its उपनाम, the sooner राज्य.
Formed by the combination of Oklahoma Territory and Indian Territory on November 16, 1907, ओक्लाहोमा थी the 46th state to enter the union.
Its residents are known as Oklahomans or, informally `` Okies '', and its capital and largest city is ओक्लाहोमा City.
A major producer of natural gas, oil, and agriculture, Oklahoma relies on an economic base of aviation, energy, दूरसंचार, and biotechnology.
It has one of the fastest growing economies in the nation, ranking among the top states in प्रति capita income growth and gross domestic product growth.
Oklahoma City and Tulsa serve as Oklahoma 's primary economic anchors, साथ nearly दो तिहाई of oklahomans living within their metropolitan statistical areas.
With small mountain ranges, prairie, mesas, and eastern forests, most of ओक्लाहोमा झूठ in the ग्रेट मैदान और the U.S. Interior Highlands —a region especially prone to severe weather.
In addition to having a prevalence of English, German, Scottish, Irish and Native American ancestry, more than 25 Native American languages are बोला in ओक्लाहोमा, दूसरी तभी to California.
Oklahoma is स्तिथ on a संगम of तीन प्रमुख अमरीकी सांस्कृतिक regions और historically served as a route for cattle drives, a destination for southern settlers, and a government-sanctioned territory for Native Americans.
Stacked and खड़ा car tires
a टायर ( or टायर ) is a ring-shaped covering that fits around a wheel 's rim to protect it and enable better vehicle performance.
Most tires, such as those for automobiles and bicycles, provide कर्षण between the vehicle and the road while providing a flexible cushion that absorbs shock.
The materials of modern pneumatic tires are synthetic rubber, natural rubber, fabric and wire, along with कार्बन black and other chemical compounds.
They consist of a tread और a body.
The tread provides traction while the body provides containment for a quantity of compressed air.
Before rubber was विकसित, the पहला versions of tires were simply bands of metal that fitted around wooden wheels to prevent wear and tear.
Early rubber टायर यहूद solid ( not pneumatic ).
Today, the majority of tires are न्यूमेटिक inflatable structures, comprising a doughnut-shaped body of cords and wires encased in rubber and generally filled with compressed air to form an inflatable cushion.
Pneumatic tires are used on many types of वाहनों, सहित गाड़ियाँ, साइकिल, motorcycles, trucks, earthmovers, and aircraft.
Metal tires are still used on locomotives and railcars, and solid rubber ( or other polymer ) tires are still used in various non-automotive applications, such as some casters, carts, lawnmowers, and wheelbarrows.
Dr. Joseph Warren ( June 11, 1741 – June 17, 1775 ) थी an अमरीकी डॉक्टर who played a leading role in American Patriot organizations in Boston in early days of the American Revolution, eventually serving as president of the revolutionary Massachusetts Provincial Congress.
Warren enlisted Paul Revere and William Dawes on April 18, 1775, to leave Boston and स्प्रेड the सचेतक कि the अंग्रेजों गैरीसन in Boston was setting out to raid the town of Concord and arrest rebel leaders John Hancock and Samuel Adams.
Warren participated in the next day 's Battles of Lexington and Concord, which are commonly माना to be the opening engagements of the American Revolutionary War.
Warren had been commissioned a Major General in the colony 's मिलिशिया shortly पहले the जून 17, 1775 बैटल of Bunker Hill.
Rather than exercising his rank, Warren served in the battle as a private सिपाही, और was killed in combat when British troops stormed the redoubt atop Breed 's Hill.
His मौत, immortalized in जॉन trumbull 's पेंटिंग, the मौत of सामान्य वारेन at the बैटल of Bunker 's Hill, June 17, 1775, galvanized the rebel forces, and he has been memorialized in many place names in the United States.
STM image of self-assembled supramolecular chains of the organic semiconductor Quinacridone on Graphite.
An organic semiconductor is an organic material with semiconductor properties, that is, with an विद्युत चालकता between that of insulators and that of metals.
Single molecules, short chain ( oligomers ) and organic polymers can be semiconductive.
Semiconducting small molecules ( aromatic hydrocarbons ) शामिल the polycyclic aromatic compounds pentacene, anthracene, and rubrene.
Polymeric organic semiconductors include poly ( 3-hexylthiophene ), poly ( p-phenylene vinylene ), as खूब as polyacetylene and its derivatives.
There हैं दो प्रमुख overlapping classes of organic semiconductors.
These are organic charge-transfer complexes and various linear-backbone conductive polymers derived from polyacetylene.
Linear backbone organic semiconductors include polyacetylene itself और इसके डेरिवेटिव polypyrrole, and polyaniline.
At तनिक locally, charge-transfer complexes often exhibit similar conduction mechanisms to inorganic semiconductors.
Such mechanisms arise from the उपस्थिति of छेद and electron conduction layers separated by a band gap.
While such classic mechanisms are महत्वपूर्ण locally, as साथ अकार्बनिक amorphous semiconductors, tunnelling, localized states, mobility gaps, and phonon -assisted hopping also significantly contribute to conduction, particularly in polyacetylenes.
Like inorganic semiconductors, organic semiconductors can be doped.
Organic semiconductors susceptible to doping ऐसे as polyaniline ( Ormecon ) and are also known as organic metals.
Typical current carriers in सशुल्क semiconductors are holes and electrons in π-bonds.
लगभग सब सशुल्क solids are insulators.
But when their constituent molecules have π-conjugate systems, electrons can move via π-electron cloud overlaps, especially by hopping, tunnelling और related mechanisms.
Polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons and phthalocyanine salt crystals हैं उदाहरण of this type of organic semiconductor.
Mainly due to low mobility, even unpaired electrons may be stable in charge-transfer complexes.
Such unpaired electrons can function as current carriers.
This type of सेमीकंडक्टर is भी प्राप्त by pairing an electron donor molecule with an electron acceptor molecule.
मादा ejaculation is the expulsion of fluid by human females from the paraurethral ducts through and around the female urethra during or before an orgasm.
It is also ज्ञात colloquially as gushing or squirting, although these are considered to be different phenomena in some research publications.
The exact source and nature of the fluid continue to be a टॉपिक of बहस among चिकित्सा professionals, which is also related to doubts over the existence of the G-Spot.
The FIFA Women 's World Cup is an international association football competition contested by the senior women 's national teams of the सदस्यों of fédération internationale de फ़ुटबॉल संघ ( FIFA ), the sport 's global governing body.
The championship has been awarded every four years since the inaugural टूर्नामेंट in 1991.
Japan won the 2011 टूर्नामेंट in a penalty shootout.
The current format of the tournament involves 16 teams competing for the title at venues भीतर the host nation ( s ) over a period of about three weeks ; – this phase is often called the World Cup Finals.
A qualification phase, which currently takes place over the preceding तीन सालो, is प्रयुक्त to determine which teams qualify for the tournament together with the host nation ( s ).
the फीफा महिलाओं 's संसार कप is पहचाना as the most important International competition in women 's football and is played amongst women 's national football teams of the member states of FIFA, the sport 's global governing body.
The first Women 's World Cup tournament, named the Women 's World Championship, was held in 1991, sixty-one years after the men 's पहला फीफा संसार Cup tournament in 1930.
The six World Cup tournaments have महरूम won by four different national teams.
The next World Cup will be hosted by Canada in 2015.
Scorpions is a young adult novel written by Walter Dean Myers, first published in the United राज्य by हार्पर & पंक्ति on जून 20, 1988.
Front page of a 17th century Hebrew Bible by Joseph Athias, now at Beth Hatefutsoth, Israel
'Son of man ' is the अनुवाद of various Hebrew and Greek phrases used in both the Hebrew Bible and the New Testament.
It has diverse meanings, ranging from a normal human होने to a prophesied अनन्त, दैवी ruler.
The Hebrew अभिव्यक्ति `` बेटे of man '' ( בן–אדם i.e. ben-'adam ) appears one hundred and seven times in the Hebrew Bible.
This is the most common Hebrew construction for the singular but is used mostly in Ezekiel ( 93 times ) and 14 times elsewhere.
In thirty two cases the phrase appears in intermediate plural form `` बेटे of मेन '', i.e. human beings.
As generally interpreted by Jews, it denotes humankind generally.
In the Koine Greek of the New Testament, `` the son of man '' is invariably used as `` ὁ υἱὸς τοὺ ἀνθρώπου '' with a definite article.
The use of the definite article in `` the son of man '' in the Christian gospels is novel, and before its use there, no records of its use in any of the surviving Greek documents of antiquity exist.
Geza Vermes has stated that `` the बेटे of man '' in the Christian gospels is unrelated to Hebrew Bible usages.
In Christian usage, unlike the Son of God title, which has been an essential element of Christian creeds since the Apostolic age, the proclamation of `` Jesus as the Son of man '' has never महरूम an आलेख of आस्था in Christianity.
The interpretation of the use of `` the Son of man '' in the New Testament has remained चुनौतीपूर्ण और बाद 150 सालो of बहस no consensus on the issue has emerged among scholars.
Master of foxhounds leads the field from Powderham किला in Devon, England, with the hounds in front.
Fox hunting is an activity involving the tracking, chase, and sometimes killing of a fox, traditionally a red fox, by trained foxhounds or other scent hounds, and a group of unarmed followers led by a master of foxhounds, who follow the hounds on foot or on horseback.
Fox hunting originated in the form practised until recently in the United Kingdom in the 16th century, but is practised all over the world, including in ऑस्ट्रेलिया, कनाडा, फ़्रांस, आयरलैंड, Italy and the United States.
In Australia, the term also refers to the शिकार of foxes with firearms similar to spotlighting or deer hunting.
In much of the world hunting in general is understood to relate to any game animals or weapons ( e.g., deer hunting with bow and तीर ) ; in ब्रिटेन और आयरलैंड, `` hunting '' without qualification implies fox hunting ( or other forms of hunting with hounds- beagling, stag hunting, mink hunting, drag hunting or hunting the clean boot ) as described here.
The sport is controversial, particularly in the UK, where it was banned in Scotland in 2002, and in England and Wales in November 2004 ( law enforced इससे फ़रवरी 2005 ), हालांकि शूटिंग foxes as vermin remained legal.
Proponents of fox hunting view it as an important part of rural culture और उपयोगी for reasons of conservation and pest control, while opponents argue that it is cruel and unnecessary.
Tobacco advertising is the advertising of tobacco उत्पाद or use ( typically cigarette smoking ) by the tobacco industry through a variety of media including sponsorship, particularly of sporting events.
It is now एक of the most highly regulated forms of marketing.
कुछ or all forms of tobacco advertising are banned in many countries.

The company was founded in 1968 as उन्नत Patent Technology.
It eventually changed its name to Alliance Gaming and acquired, in 1996, Bally Gaming International, a पूर्व प्रभाग of Bally Manufacturing.
In 2006, the entire company अपनाया the बल्ली नाम, a ट्रेडमार्क that originated in 1932 by the Bally Manufacturing Corporation.
Gustave doré 's engravings illustrated the Divine Comedy ( 1861–1868 ) ; here, Dante is lost in Canto 1 of the Inferno.
Inferno ( Italian लिये `` नरक `` ) is the first part of Dante Alighieri 's 14th-century epic poem Divine Comedy.
It is followed by purgatorio and Paradiso.
It is an allegory telling of the journey of Dante through Hell, guided by the Roman poet वर्जिल.
in the कविता, Hell is depicted as nine circles of suffering located within the Earth.
allegorically, the दैवी कॉमेडी represents the यात्रा of the आत्मा towards परमेश्वर, साथ the inferno describing the मान्यता और अस्वीकृति of सिन.
Smirnoff is a brand of vodka owned and produced by the British company Diageo.
The स्मरनॉफ ब्रांड began साथ a वोदका distillery founded in Moscow by Pyotr Arsenievich Smirnov ( 1831–1898 ).
It is अभी distributed in 130 countries.
It is उत्पादित in अनेक देशों including India, Ireland, Italy, the United Kingdom and the United States.
Smirnoff products शामिल वोदका, flavoured vodka, and malt beverages.
In कूच 2006, diageo उत्तर अमेरिका claimed that Smirnoff vodka was the best-selling distilled spirit brand in the world.
Big Brown ( foaled April 10, 2005 in केंटकी ) is a retired champion American Thoroughbred racehorse and winner of the 2008 Kentucky Derby and 2008 Preakness Stakes.
Bred by dr. गेरी B. नैप 's monticule Farms in Lexington, Kentucky, he won his first five race starts.

The Serenity Prayer is the common name for an originally untitled prayer by the American theologian Reinhold Niebuhr ( 1892–1971 ).
It has been अपनाया by alcoholics Anonymous and other twelve-step programs.
The best-known रूप is : परमेश्वर, grant me the serenity to accept the things I can not change,
the हिम्मत to change the things I can,
And wisdom to जान the अंतर.
The Declaration and Resolves of the First महाद्वीपीय कॉंग्रेस ( भी ज्ञात as the घोषणा of Colonial Rights, or the Declaration of Rights ), was a statement adopted by the First Continental Congress on October 14, 1774, in response to the Intolerable Acts passed by the British Parliament.
The Declaration outlined colonial objections to the Intolerable Acts, listed a colonial bill of rights, and provided a detailed list of grievances.
It was समान to the घोषणा of Rights and Grievances, passed by the Stamp Act Congress a decade earlier.
The Declaration concluded with an रूपरेखा of कॉंग्रेस 's plans : to enter into a boycott of British trade ( the Continental Association ) until their grievances were redressed, to publish addresses to the people of Great Britain and British America, and to send a petition to the King.
Pulse pressure is the pressure that is felt जब अहसास the pulse.
Measured in millimeters of mercury ( mmHg ), the दबाव अंतर between the systolic और diastolic pressures is the pressure change to create the pulse, which is the pulse pressure.
If resting blood pressure is ( systolic/diastolic ) 120/80 millimeters of mercury ( mmHg ), pulse pressure is 40.
The Hills is a reality television series जिससे originally aired on MTV from May 31, 2006 until July 13, 2010.
The show uses a reality television स्वरूप, following the निजी जीवनदान of several young adults living in Los Angeles, California, but tends towards a narrative format more commonly found in scripted genres such as soap operas.
The series originally followed the personal life of former Laguna Beach star Lauren Conrad and her friends ' new lives in Los Angeles.
After five seasons, Conrad left the series and was replaced by another पूर्व लगुना Beach star, Kristin Cavallari, beginning in the second half of the fifth season.

the series premiered in syndication in the fall of 2009 alongside Laguna Beach : The Real Orange County.
In poker, bad beat is a subjective term for a hand in which a player with what appear to be strong cards nevertheless loses.
it सबसे प्रायः occurs where one player bets the clearly stronger hand and their opponent makes a poor call that eventually `` hits '' and wins.
There is no consensus among poker players as to what exactly constitutes a bad beat and often players will disagree about whether a particular hand was a bad beat.
The goldfish ( Carassius auratus auratus ) is a freshwater fish in the family Cyprinidae of order Cypriniformes.
It थी एक of the earliest fish to be domesticated, and is one of the most commonly kept aquarium fish.
A relatively small member of the carp family ( which also includes the koi carp और the crucian कार्प ), the goldfish is a domesticated version of a less-colorful carp ( Carassius auratus ) native to east Asia.
It was first domesticated in China more than a thousand years ago, and several distinct breeds have since been developed.
Goldfish breeds vary greatly in size, body shape, fin configuration and coloration ( various combinations of white, yellow, orange, red, brown, and black are known ).
Uncooked rouladen
Rouladen ( or rinderroulade, singular : roulade ) is a German meat roulade usually consisting of bacon, onions, mustard and pickles wrapped in thinly sliced beef which is then cooked.
In some countries, the roulade is also known as `` बीफ ज़ैतून ''.
Beef or veal is used as मांस हालांकि कुछ खाना विद्वानों tend to believe that the original version was probably venison or pork, and pork is still popular in some areas.
The beef rouladen as we know them today have become popular over the last century.
The cut is usually topside beef or silverside since this is the cheaper cut.
The more expensive संस्करण होता be the round steak, also known as rump steak.
The मांस is काटें into large, thin slices.
The भरना is a मिश्रण of स्मोक्ड और cooked pork belly, chopped onions and chopped pickles ( gurken ) which is at times varied by adding minced meat, sausage meat, pine nuts and mustard.
The mixture varies from region to region.
Rouladen are traditionally परोसा लिये डिनर.
Red wine is often served with this dish.
ठेठ eukaryotic cell.
Cellular respiration is the set of the metabolic reactions and processes that take place in the cells of organisms to convert biochemical energy from nutrients into adenosine ट्राइफॉस्फेट ( एटीपी ), और तब रिलीज बर्बाद उत्पाद.
The reactions involved in respiration are catabolic reactions, जिससे ब्रेक विशाल अणुओं into छोटी ones, releasing energy in the process as weak so-called `` high-energy '' bonds are replaced by stronger bonds in the products.
Respiration is one of the key ways a cell gains उपयोगी उर्जा to ईंधन cellular activity.
Cellular respiration is माना an exothermic redox reaction.
The overall प्रतिक्रिया is broken into many smaller ones when it occurs in the body, most of which are redox reactions themselves.
Although technically, cellular respiration is a दहन प्रतिक्रिया, it clearly does not resemble one when it occurs in a living cell.
This difference is because it occurs in many separate steps.
While the overall reaction is a combustion reaction, no single reaction that comprises it is a combustion reaction.
Nutrients that are commonly used by animal and plant cells in respiration include sugar, amino acids और fatty acids, and a common oxidizing agent ( electron acceptor ) is molecular oxygen ( O2 ).
The energy stored in ATP ( its third phosphate group is weakly bonded to the rest of the molecule and is cheaply broken allowing stronger bonds to form, thereby transferring energy for use by the cell ) can then be used to ड्राइव प्रक्रियाओं requiring उर्जा, सहित biosynthesis, locomotion or transportation of molecules across cell membranes.
देशों by 2011 GDP ( nominal ) according to the CIA World Factbook.
This आलेख शामिल a सूची of देशों in the world sorted by their gross domestic product ( GDP ), the market value of all final goods and services from a nation in a given year.
The GDP dollar estimates presented here are calculated at market or government official एक्सचेंज दरों.
Several economies which are not considered to be countries ( world, the EU, and some dependent territories ) are included in the lists because they appear in the sources.
These economies हैं नहीं क्रमित in the charts here, but are listed where applicable.
The figures presented here do not take into account differences in the cost of living in different countries, and the परिणाम can vary greatly इससे एक साल to another based on fluctuations in the exchange rates of the country 's currency.
Such fluctuations may change a country 's ranking from one year to the अगला, भी though they often make little or no difference to the standard of living of its population.
Therefore these figures चाहिए be प्रयुक्त with caution.
Some countries/regions may have citizens which are on औसत wealthy.
These countries/regions could appear in इस सूची as having a small GDP.
This would be because the country/region listed has a small population, and therefore small total economy ; the GDP is calculated as the population times the wealth per capita.
comparisons of नेशनल wealth are also frequently made on the basis of purchasing power parity ( PPP ), to adjust for differences in the cost of living in different countries.
( See List of देशों by जीडीपी ( PPP ) )
PPP largely removes the exchange rate problem, but रै इसके अपना कमियां ; it does not reflect the value of economic output in international trade, and it also requires more estimation than nominal GDP.
On the whole, PPP per capita आंकड़े are more narrowly spread than nominal GDP per capita figures.
The first list includes data compiled by the United राष्ट्र आंकडे Division for 2011.
The second list largely includes data ( estimate ) compiled by the International मौद्रिक निधि for 2012.
The third list shows the World Bank 's mostly 2011 estimates, and the fourth list includes mostly 2012 estimates from the CIA World Factbook.
Lapping is a machining प्रक्रम, in जिससे two surfaces are rubbed together with an abrasive between them, by hand movement or by way of a machine.
This can take two फ़ॉर्म.
The first type of lapping ( traditionally called grinding ), typically involves rubbing a brittle material ऐसे as glass against a surface such as iron or glass itself ( also known as the `` lap '' or grinding tool ) with an abrasive such as aluminum oxide, jeweller 's rouge, optician 's rouge, emery, silicon carbide, diamond, etc., in between them.
This produces microscopic conchoidal fractures as the abrasive rolls about between the two surfaces and removes सामग्री इससे both.
The अन्य form of lapping involves a softer material such as pitch or a ceramic for the lap, which is `` charged '' with the abrasive.
The lap is then used to cut a harder material—the workpiece.
The abrasive embeds within the softer सामग्री जिससे holds it and permits it to score across and cut the harder material.
Taken to a finer limit, this will produce a polished surface such as with a polishing cloth on an automobile, or a पॉलिशिंग cloth or polishing pitch upon glass or steel.
Taken to the ultimate limit, with the aid of accurate interferometry and specialized पॉलिशिंग मशीने or skilled हाथ पॉलिशिंग, lensmakers can produce surfaces that are flat to better than 30 nanometers.
This is one twentieth of the wavelength of light from the commonly used 632.8 nm helium neon लेज़र लाइट सोर्स.
Surfaces this चपटा can be molecularly bonded ( optically contacted ) by bringing them together under the right conditions.
( This is नहीं the वही as the wringing effect of Johansson blocks, although it is similar ).
The term `` America 's Team '' is a popular nickname in the United States that refers to the डलास Cowboys in the National Football League.
The nickname originated with the team 's 1978 highlight film, where the narrator opens with the following परिचय : the पद is पहचाना and often used by media outlets, including ESPN, Yahoo !, HBO Sports, and Sports Illustrated.
My Babysitter 's a Vampire ( French : Ma gardienne est un vampire ) is a 2011 Canadian television series, based on the टेलीविज़न फिल्मी of the same name.
In Canada, the श्रेणी premiered in फ्रेंच on Télétoon on February 28, 2011, in English on Teletoon on March 14, 2011, and on Disney Channel in the United States on June 27, 2011.
the दिखाएँ थी निर्मित by भैस tv, creators of 6teen और कुल नाटक.
The show follows Ethan Morgan ( मैथ्यू नाईट ), who, in the television film, learns that his babysitter Sarah ( Vanessa Morgan ) is a vampire.
In the film, he learns he is able to have visions and his best friend Benny वीयर ( Atticus Mitchell ) is a spellmaster.
The series follows the three as they take on supernatural forces and have adventures, with occasional help from fellow vampires Rory ( Cameron Kennedy ) and Erica ( Kate Todd ), while dealing with the परेशानियों of regular high school life.

A pickup truck or pick-up, often simply referred to as a pickup, is a light motor गाडी साथ an open-top, पश्च कार्गो area ( bed ).
In North America, the term pickup is used for light trucks with a हल्का ड्यूटी chassis और फैक्टरी निर्मित, integrated bed, as well as for coupé utility vehicles, often based on a personal car chassis, but also often on a special dedicated chassi for such use.
Some countries have their own terms similar to pickup, such as ute in Australia and New Zealand, or bakkie in South Africa.
Large pickup trucks are somewhat rare in Europe, जहाँ vans and light lorries are commonly used for similar roles.
The President of the United States of America ( potus ) is the head of state and head of government of the United States.
The president लीड the कार्यपालिका शाखा of the federal government and is the commander-in-chief of the United States Armed Forces.
Article ii of the u.S. संविधान vests the कार्यपालिका शक्ति of the United States in the president and charges him with the execution of federal law, alongside the responsibility of appointing federal executive, diplomatic, regulatory, and judicial officers, and concluding treaties with foreign powers, with the advice and consent of the Senate.
The president is further empowered to grant federal pardons and reprieves, and to convene and adjourn either or both houses of Congress under extraordinary circumstances.
Since the founding of the United States, the power of the president and the federal government have grown substantially and each आधुनिक अध्यक्ष, despite possessing no formal legislative powers beyond signing or vetoing congressionally passed bills, is largely responsible for dictating the legislative agenda of his party and the foreign and domestic policy of the United States.
The president is अक्सर वर्णित as the most powerful person in the world.
The president is indirectly elected by the people through the Electoral College to a four-year term, and is one of only two nationally elected federal officers, the other being the Vice President of the United States.
The twenty-second amendment, अपनाया in 1951, prohibits anyone from ever being elected to the presidency for a third full term.
It also prohibits a person from being elected to the presidency more than once if that person previously had served as president, or एक्टिंग अध्यक्ष, for more than two years of another person 's term as president.
In all, 43 individuals have परोसा 55 four-year terms.
On जनवरी 20, 2009, Barack Obama became the 44th and current president.
On November 6, 2012, he was re-elected and is scheduled to serve जबतक January 20, 2017.
बोतलबंद mineral water
Bottled water is drinking water ( e.g., well water, distilled water, Mineral water, or spring water ) packaged in plastic or glass water bottles.
बोतलबंद जल may be carbonated or not.
Sizes range from small single serving bottles to विशाल carboys लिये जल coolers.
Map of the major rivers, lakes, and टंकी in India
Map showing rivers and flood prone क्षेत्रों in India
नदियाँ of इण्डिया play an important role in the lives of the Indian people.
The river systems provide irrigation, potable water, cheap transportation, electricity, and the livelihoods लिये a large number of people all over the country and to rural areas.
This easily explains why nearly all the major cities of India are स्तिथ by the banks of rivers.
The rivers also have an important role in Hindu mythology और हैं माना holy by all Hindus in the country.
Seven major rivers along with their numerous tributaries make up the नदी प्रणाली of India.
Most of the rivers pour their waters into the Bay of Bengal ; however, some of the rivers whose courses take them through the western part of the country and towards the ईस्ट of the राज्य of himachal pradesh empty into the Arabian Sea.
Parts of Ladakh, northern parts of the Aravlli range and the arid भाग of the थार मरुस्थल have inland drainage.
Dr.Francis Buchanan surveyed the courses of the नदियाँ of इण्डिया along with their tributaries and branches in 1810-11 AD and presented a minute account of it.
The shifting of the पाठ्यक्रम और bed over the centuries is very remarkable.
Many of the channels mentioned in that survey have now become dead, सूखी or even extinct.
All major rivers of India originate from one of the three main watersheds :
The Himalaya and the काराकोरम ranges
Vindhya and Satpura ranges और chotanagpur plateau in central India
Sahyadri or पश्चिमी ghats in western India
The Bretton Woods system of monetary management established the rules for commercial and financial relations among the world 's major industrial राज्य in the mid-20th सदी.
The Bretton वुड्स प्रणाली थी the first example of a fully negotiated monetary order intended to govern monetary relations among independent nation-states.
Preparing to rebuild the international economic system as World War II was still raging, 730 delegates from all 44 Allied nations gathered at the Mount Washington Hotel in Bretton Woods, New Hampshire, United States, for the संयुक्त राष्ट्र Monetary and Financial Conference.
The delegates deliberated दौरान 1–22 जुलाई 1944, and signed the Agreement on its final day.
Setting up a system of rules, institutions, and procedures to regulate the international monetary प्रणाली, the planners at Bretton Woods established the International Monetary Fund ( IMF ) and the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development ( IBRD ), which today is part of the World Bank Group.
These organizations became operational in 1945 बाद a sufficient number of countries had ratified the agreement.
The chief features of the Bretton Woods system were an obligation for each country to adopt a monetary policy that maintained the exchange rate by tying its currency to the U.S. dollar and the ability of the IMF to bridge temporary imbalances of payments.
On 15 August 1971, the United States unilaterally terminated convertibility of the us $ to सुनहरा.
This brought the Bretton Woods प्रणाली to an समाप्त and saw the dollar become fiat currency.
This action, referred to as the Nixon shock, created the situation in which the United States dollar became a reserve करेंसी used by many states.
At the वही समय, many fixed currencies ( such as GBP, for example ), also became free floating.
Ducati Motor Holding S.p.A. is an Italian कम्पनी कि डिजाइन और manufactures motorcycles.
Headquartered in Bologna, Italy, Ducati is owned by Audi through its Italian subsidiary Lamborghini.
A क्रेडिट स्कोर is a numerical अभिव्यक्ति based on a statistical analysis of a person 's credit files, to represent the creditworthiness of that person.
A credit score is primarily based on credit report information typically sourced इससे credit bureaus.
Lenders, such as banks and credit card companies, use credit scores to evaluate the potential risk posed by lending धन to उपभोक्ता and to mitigate losses due to bad debt.
Lenders उपयोग क्रेडिट स्कोर to determine who qualifies for a loan, at what interest rate, and what credit limits.
Lenders भी उपयोग credit scores to determine which customers are likely to bring in the most revenue.
The use of credit or identity स्कोरिंग prior to authorizing access or granting credit is an implementation of a trusted system.
Credit scoring is not limited to banks.
Other organizations, such as mobile phone कंपनियाँ, insurance companies, landlords, and government departments employ the same techniques.
Credit scoring also has a lot of ओवरलैप साथ आंकड़ा खनन, which uses many similar techniques.
These techniques combine thousands of कारकों लकिन they are more or less similar or the same.
The seven SI base units and the interdependency of their definitions : for example, to extract the definition of the metre from the speed of light, the परिभाषा of the second must be known while the ampere and candela are both dependent on the definition of energy which in turn is defined in terms of length, mass and time.
The अंतरराष्ट्रीय प्रणाली of इकाई ( si ) defines सात इकाई of measure as a basic set from which all other SI units are derived.
These SI base units and उनके शारीरिक quantities are:
metre लिये लंबाई ( US English : meter )
kilogram लिये mass ( note : not the gram )
second for समय
ampere for electric वर्तमान
kelvin लिये तापमान
candela for चमकदार intensity
mole for the amount of पदार्थ.
The SI आधार quantities form a set of mutually independent dimensions as required by dimensional analysis commonly employed in science and technology.
However, in a दिए realization of these units they may well be interdependent, i.e. defined in terms of each other.
The names of SI units are written in lowercase characters ( the 'degree Celsius ' meets this rule, as 'degree ' is the unit, and 'Celsius ' is a modifier ).
The symbols of units are written in lowercase ( e.g. मीटर रै the प्रतीक m ), मगर कि प्रतीकों लिये इकाई नामित after persons are written with an initial capital letter ( e.g., the hertz has the uppercase symbol Hz ).
Many other units, such as the litre ( US English : liter ), are formally not part of the SI, but are accepted लिये उपयोग साथ SI.
स्मारक Canyon
Colorado National Monument ( locally referred to as The Monument ) is a part of the नेशनल पार्क सेवा निकट the city of Grand Junction, Colorado.
Spectacular canyons cut deep into sandstone and even granite–gneiss–schist चट्टान formations, in some areas.
This is an area of desert land ऊँची on the कोलोराडो Plateau, with pinion and juniper forests on the plateau.
The park hosts a wide range of wildlife, including red-tailed hawks and golden eagles, ravens, jays, मरुस्थल bighorn sheep, and coyotes.
Activities include hiking, horseback riding, road bicycling, and दर्शनीय drives ; a visitor center on the west side contains a natural history museum and gift shop.
There are magnificent views from trails and the Rim Rock Drive, which winds along the plateau.
Nearby are the Book Cliffs, and the largest flat-topped mountain in the world, the ग्रैंड Mesa.
Its feature attraction is Monument Canyon, which runs the width of the park, और शामिल चट्टान formations such as Independence Monument, the Kissing Couple, and Coke Ovens.
The monument includes 20,500 acres ( 32 वर्गाकार मील ), much of which has been recommended to Congress for designation as wilderness.
left to right : Utility Uniform, Blue Dress वर्दी, सेवा Uniform, and Evening Dress uniforms
The Uniforms of the United राज्य समुद्री Corps serve to distinguish Marines from members of other services.
Among current uniforms in the United States हथियारबंद शक्तियां, the Marines ' uniforms have been in service the longest.
The Marine Dress Blue uniform has, with few changes, been worn in essentially इसके वर्तमान रूप चूंकि the 19th century.
North American telephone area codes 419 and 567 serve the northwest quadrant of the U.S. state of Ohio.
The largest city served by these area codes is Toledo ( and its suburbs of Holland, Maumee, Northwood, Oregon, Ottawa Hills, Perrysburg, Rossford, Sylvania, swanton, waterville, और Whitehouse ).
Other cities served by these area codes include Ada, Ashland, Bellevue, Bluffton, Bowling Green, Bryan, Bucyrus, Celina, Clyde, Crestline, Defiance, Delphos, Edison, Erastus, Findlay, Fostoria, Fremont, Galion, Kenton, Lima, मैन्सफील्ड, Mount Gilead, Napoleon, Norwalk, Oak Harbor, Port Clinton, Sandusky, Shelby, St. Marys, Tiffin, Upper Sandusky, Van Wert, Wapakoneta, Wauseon, Willard.
Other areas served include the Lake Erie Islands north of Port Clinton और वेस्ट of Sandusky.
The main area code, 419, was created as one of the original area codes in October 1947 ; the overlay area code 567 was created on January 1, 2002.
Despite the presence of Toledo, the state 's fourth-largest city, 419 was the last of Ohio 's original four area codes to have been split or overlaid.
Mickey Leroy Gilley ( born March 9, 1936 ) is an American country music सिंगर and musician.
Although he started out singing straight-up country and western material in the 1970s, he moved towards a more pop -friendly ध्वनि in the 1980s, bringing him further success on not just the country charts, but the pop charts as well.
Among his biggest hits are `` Room Full of Roses, '' `` Do n't the Girls All Get Prettier at Closing Time, '' and the remake of the Soul hit `` स्टैंड by Me ``.
He is also the cousin of Jerry Lee Lewis, Carl McVoy, Jim Gilley and Jimmy Swaggart.
According to the Federal Aviation प्रशासन, gilley is a licensed पायलट, जो holds an instrument rating with commercial pilot privileges for multi-engine airplanes, as well as private pilot privileges for single engine aircraft.
The September 11 attacks ( also referred to as September 11, September 11th, or 9/11 ) were a series of four coordinated terrorist attacks launched by the इस्लामी आतंकवादी समूह al-qaeda upon the संयुक्त States in New York City and the Washington, D.C. area on September 11, 2001.
Four passenger airliners were hijacked by 19 al-Qaeda terrorists so they could be flown into इमारतें in आत्महत्या attacks.
Two of those planes, American Airlines Flight 11 और संयुक्त एयरलाइंस उड़ान 175, यहूद क्रैश into the North and South towers, respectively, of the World Trade Center complex in New York City.
Within two hours, both towers collapsed with debris and the resulting fires causing partial or complete collapse of all other buildings in the WTC complex, as well as major damage to ten other large surrounding structures.
A third plane, American Airlines Flight 77, was crashed into the Pentagon ( the मुख्यालय of the संयुक्त राज्य Department of Defense ), leading to a partial collapse in its western side.
The fourth plane, United Airlines Flight 93, was targeted at the United States Capitol in Washington, D.C., but crashed into a field near Shanksville, Pennsylvania, after its passengers tried to overcome the hijackers.
In total, almost 3,000 people died in the attacks, including the 227 civilians and 19 hijackers सवार the चार planes.
suspicion quickly fell on al-Qaeda.
Although the group 's leader, ओसामा bin Laden, initially denied any involvement, in 2004 he claimed responsibility for the attacks.
Al-Qaeda and bin Laden cited U.S. support of Israel, the उपस्थिति of u.S. सैनिकों in Saudi Arabia, and sanctions against Iraq as motives for the attacks.
The United States responded to the attacks by launching the War on Terror and invading अफगानिस्तान to depose the तालिबान, जिससे था harbored al-Qaeda.
Many देशों strengthened their anti-terrorism legislation and expanded law enforcement powers.
Having evaded capture for years, bin Laden was located and killed by U.S. forces in May 2011.
The destruction of the Twin Towers and other properties caused serious damage to the economy of Lower Manhattan and had a significant effect on global markets.
क्लीनअप of the संसार व्यापार बीच site was completed in May 2002, and the Pentagon was repaired within a year.
Numerous memorials have been constructed, including the National September 11 Memorial & Museum in New York, the प्रस्तुतीकरण मेमोरियल, and the Flight 93 National Memorial in Pennsylvania.
After a lengthy delay, the एक संसार व्यापार बीच is expected to be completed at Ground Zero in New York City in 2013.
Finding Nemo is a 2003 American computer-animated comedy-drama adventure film written and directed by Andrew Stanton, released by Walt Disney तस्वीरें, और the पांचवां फिल्मी उत्पादित by पिक्चर्स एनिमेशन studios.
It tells the story of the over-protective clownfish named Marlin ( Albert Brooks ) who, along साथ a राजसी तंग नामित dory ( एलेन degeneres ), searches for his abducted son Nemo ( Alexander Gould ) all the way to Sydney Harbour.
Along the way, Marlin learns to लो risks और let Nemo take care of himself.
It is Pixar 's पहला फिल्मी to be released in cinemas in the northern hemisphere summer.
The film was re-released for the first time in 3D on सितंबर 14, 2012, और it थी released on Blu-ray on December 4, 2012.
A sequel, Finding Dory, is फिलहाल in development, set to be released on November 25, 2015.
The film received universal critical acclaim and won the Academy Award for Best Animated Feature, and was nominated in three more categories including Best Original Screenplay.
It was the second highest-grossing फिल्मी of 2003, earning a total of $ 921 million worldwide.
ढूंढना Nemo is also the best-selling DVD of all time, with over 40 million copies sold as of 2006, and was the highest-grossing G-rated film of all time before Pixar 's own Toy Story 3 overtook it.
it is भी the 23rd highest-grossing film of all time, as well as the 3rd highest-grossing animated film.
In 2008, the American Film Institute नामित it the दसवाँ greatest animated film ever made during their Top 10.
The sixth season of America 's Best Dance Crew, also known as America 's Best Dance Crew : Season of the Superstars, premiered on April 7, 2011 और concluded on June 5, 2011.
auditions were held in four cities from January 21 through February 5 : Chicago, Houston, New York, and Los Angeles.
This season takes a different route from पास्ट seasons.
The crews जरूर perform to the म्यूज़िक of एक specific artist each week, including Rihanna, Lil Wayne, and other popular stars.
This season also features special अतिथि दिखावे by विभिन्न म्यूज़िक हस्तियाँ including Justin Bieber, The Black Eyed Peas, Katy Perry, Kesha, Nicki Minaj, and Kanye West.
Dominic `` D-Trix '' Sandoval, a पूर्व सदस्य of क्वेस्ट क्रू, the winner of the third season of America 's Best Dance Crew, joins returning judges Lil Mama and JC Chasez as the newest judge.
In the ऋतु finale, i aM mE was declared the winner of Season 6 and received the $ 100,000 ( USD ) prize.
In the United States, Social Security refers to the old-age, survivors, and Disability Insurance ( OASDI ) federal program.
The original Social Security Act ( 1935 ) and the current version of the Act, as amended, encompass अनेक सोशल welfare और सोशल insurance programs.
Social Security is primarily funded through dedicated payroll taxes called Federal Insurance योगदान अधिनियम कर ( fica ).
Tax deposits are formally entrusted to the Federal Old-Age and Survivors Insurance Trust Fund, the Federal Disability Insurance Trust Fund, the Federal Hospital Insurance Trust Fund, or the Federal Supplementary Medical Insurance Trust Fund which comprise the Social Security Trust Fund.
Upward redistribution of income is responsible for about 43 % of the projected Social Security shortfall over the next 75 years.
According to economist Martin Feldstein, the combined spending लिये all social insurance programs in 2003 constituted 37 % of government expenditure and 7 % of the gross domestic product.
Social Security is फिलहाल अनुमानित to keep roughly 40 percent of all Americans age 65 or older out of poverty.
The Social Security Administration is headquartered in woodlawn, मेरीलैंड, just west of Baltimore.
The alcohol by volume दिखाया on a bottle of absinthe.
Alcohol by volume ( abbreviated as ABV, abv, or alc/vol ) is a standard measure of how much alcohol ( ethanol ) is contained in an alcoholic beverage ( expressed as a percentage of total volume ).
The ABV standard is प्रयुक्त worldwide.
In some countries, alcohol by volume is referred to as degrees Gay-Lussac ( after the French chemist Joseph लुई gay-lussac ).
लॉरेल Hollow is a village in the Town of Oyster Bay in Nassau County, New York in the United States.
The population was 1,952 at the 2010 census.
Charles John huffam डिकेंस ( ; 7 फ़रवरी 1812 – 9 June 1870 ) was an English writer and social critic.
He created some of the world 's most memorable fictional characters and is generally regarded as the महानतम novelist of the Victorian period.
During his life, his works enjoyed unprecedented fame, and by the twentieth century his literary प्रतिभाशाली थी broadly acknowledged by critics and scholars.
His novels and short stories continue to be widely popular.
born in portsmouth, इंग्लैण्ड, डिकेंस बाएँ स्कूल to कार्य in a फैक्टरी बाद उसके पिता थी thrown into कर्जदार ' थाना.
Although he had little formal education, his early impoverishment drove him to succeed.
Over his करियर he संपादित a weekly journal for 20 years, wrote 15 novels, 5 novellas and hundreds of short stories and non-fiction articles, lectured and performed extensively, was an indefatigable letter writer, and campaigned vigorously for children 's rights, education, and other social reforms.
डिकेंस sprang to कीर्ति साथ the 1836 serial publication of The Pickwick Papers.
Within a few years he had become an international literary celebrity, famous for his humour, satire, and keen observation of अक्षर और society.
His novels, most published in मासिक or साप्ताहिक instalments, pioneered the serial publication of narrative fiction, which became the dominant Victorian mode for novel publication.
The instalment format allowed Dickens to evaluate his audience 's reaction, and he often modified his plot and अक्षर development based on such feedback.
For example, when his wife 's chiropodist expressed distress at the way Miss Mowcher in David Copperfield seemed to reflect her disabilities, Dickens went on to improve the अक्षर साथ धनात्मक lineaments.
fagin in Oliver Twist apparently mirrors the famous fence Ikey Solomon ; His caricature of Leigh Hunt in the figure of Mr Skimpole in Bleak House was likewise toned down on advice from some of his friends, as they read episodes.
in the वही अनोखा, दोनो लॉरेंस boythorne और मूनी the beadle are drawn from real life – Boythorne from Walter Savage Landor and Mooney from 'Looney ', a beadle at Salisbury Square.
उसके भूखंड यहूद carefully constructed, और डिकेंस प्रायः wove in तत्व इससे topical कार्यक्रम into उसके कहानियां.
Masses of the illiterate poor chipped in ha'pennies to have each new monthly episode read to them, opening up and inspiring a नई class of readers.
Dickens was regarded as the literary colossus of his age.
His 1843 novella, A Christmas Carol, is one of the most influential works ever written, and it remains popular and continues to inspire adaptations in every artistic genre.
His creative genius has been praised by fellow writers—from Leo Tolstoy to G. K. Chesterton and George Orwell —for its यथार्थवाद, कॉमेडी, prose style, unique characterisations, and social criticism.
On the other हाथ ऑस्कर वाइल्ड, Henry James and Virginia Woolf complained of a lack of psychological depth, loose writing, and a vein of saccharine sentimentalism.
मार्टिन लूथर King and other civil rights leaders in front of the statue of Abraham Lincoln, August 28, 1963
The civil rights movement was a series of विश्वव्यापी राजनैतिक आंदोलनों for equality before the law that peaked in the 1960s.
In many situations it took the form of campaigns of civil resistance aimed at achieving बदलें by nonviolent forms of resistance.
In some situations it was accompanied, or followed, by civil अशांति और armed rebellion.
The process was long and tenuous in many countries, and many of these movements did not fully achieve their goals although, the efforts of these movements did सीसे to सुधार in the विधिक अधिकारों of previously oppressed groups of people.
The main aim of the civil rights movement included, and include, ensuring that the rights of all people are बराबर सुरक्षित by the law, including the rights of minorities.
Civil rights movements ranging from the global LGBT rights movement to the वैश्विक Women 's rights movement to various racial minority rights movements around the world continue.
The 2010 फीफा संसार Cup was the 19th FIFA World Cup, the world championship for men 's national association football teams.
It took place in South Africa from 11 June to 11 जुलाई 2010.
The bidding process for hosting the tournament finals was open only to African nations ; in 2004, the international football संघ, FIFA, selected South Africa over Egypt and Morocco to become the first African nation to host the finals.
The matches were played in ten stadiums in nine host cities around the country, with the final played at the Soccer City stadium in South Africa 's largest city, Johannesburg.
Thirty-two teams were selected for participation via a worldwide योग्यता टूर्नामेंट that began in August 2007.
In the first round of the tournament finals, the teams competed in round-robin groups of four teams for points, साथ the शीर्ष दो टीमों in each group proceeding.
These sixteen teams advanced to the knockout stage, where three rounds of खेल decided जिससे टीमों would participate in the final.
In the final, Spain, the European champions, defeated third-time finalists the Netherlands 1–0 after extra time, with Andrés Iniesta 's goal in the 116th minute giving Spain their first world title, becoming the eighth nation to जीत the टूर्नामेंट, and the first European nation to win the tournament outside its home continent.
Host nation South Africa, 2006 world champions Italy and 2006 runners-up France were all eliminated in the first round of the tournament.
It was the first time that the hosts were eliminated in the पहला round.
New Zealand with their three draws were the only undefeated team in the टूर्नामेंट, लकिन यहूद भी eliminated in the first round.
The McMuffin is a परिवार of नाश्ता सैंडविच in various sizes and configurations, sold by the fast-food restaurant chain McDonald 's.
The Egg McMuffin is the signature breakfast sandwich ; it was invented by the late McDonald 's franchisee हर्ब पीटरसन in the late 1960s and was introduced nationwide in 1972.
John Lennon was an English musician who gained worldwide fame as एक of the संस्थापकों of the बीटल्स, लिये उसके subsequent सोलो career, and for his political activism and pacifism.
He was shot by Mark David Chapman at the entrance of the भवन जहाँ he जिया, The Dakota, in New York City on 8 December 1980.
Lennon had just लौटे इससे रिकार्ड Plant Studio with his wife, Yoko Ono.
Lennon was pronounced dead on arrival at St. Luke's-Roosevelt Hospital Center, where it was stated that nobody could have जिया लिये अधिक than a few मिनट्स after sustaining such injuries.
Shortly after local news stations reported Lennon 's death, crowds gathered at रूज़वेल्ट Hospital and in front of the Dakota.
Lennon was cremated on 10 December 1980 at the ferncliff कब्रिस्तान in Hartsdale, New York ; the ashes were given to Ono, who chose not to hold a funeral for him.
The first report of Lennon 's death to a U.S. national audience was announced by Howard Cosell, on ABC 's Monday Night Football.
New Orleans ( or, locally or ; ) is a प्रमुख United States port and the largest city and metropolitan area in the state of Louisiana.
The population of the city was 343,829 as of the 2010 U.S. Census.
The New ऑरलियन्स महानगर area ( New Orleans–Metairie–Kenner Metropolitan Statistical Area ) had a population of 1,167,764 in 2010 and was the 46th largest in the United States.
The New orleans–metairie–bogalusa संयुक्त Statistical Area, a larger trading area, had a 2010 population of 1,214,932.
The city is named after Orléans, a city located on the Loire River in केन्द्र, फ़्रांस, and is well known for its distinct French Creole architecture, as well as its cross-cultural and multilingual heritage.
New Orleans is also famous for its cuisine, music ( विशेषकर as the जन्मस्थान of जैज़ ), and its annual celebrations and festivals, most notably Mardi Gras.
The city is often referred to as the `` सबसे unique '' in America.
New Orleans is located in southeastern louisiana, straddling the Mississippi River.
The नगर और Orleans Parish ( ) are.
The city and parish are bounded by the parishes of St. Tammany to the north, St. Bernard to the east, Plaquemines to the south and Jefferson to the south and west.
Lake pontchartrain, भाग of which is included in the city limits, lies to the north and Lake Borgne lies to the east.
The United States presidential election of 1968 was the 46th quadrennial presidential election, held on Tuesday, November 5, 1968.
The Republican nominee, former Vice-President Richard Nixon, won the election over the Democratic nominee, लाज़िम vice-president Hubert Humphrey.
Nixon ran on a अभियान कि promised to restore law and order to the nation 's cities, torn by riots and crime.
Analysts have argued the election of 1968 is a realigning election as it permanently disrupted the New Deal Coalition that had dominated presidential politics for 36 years.
Coming four years बाद Democrat Lyndon B. Johnson won in a historic landslide, the election saw the incumbent president forced out of the race and a Republican elected for the first time in twelve years.
It was a wrenching national experience, conducted during a year of violence that included the assassination of civil rights leader Martin Luther King, Jr., और subsequent रेस दंगे आरपार the nation, the assasination of Democratic presidential candidate Robert F. Kennedy, widespread opposition to the Vietnam War across university campuses, and violent confrontations between police and anti-war protesters at the 1968 Democratic National Convention as the Democratic party split again and again.
The election featured the strongest तीसरा पार्टी प्रयत्न since 1912 by former Alabama Governor George Wallace, a Democrat.
Because Wallace 's campaign opposed संघीय intervention in the South to end school segregation, he carried the Deep South and ran well in ethnic industrial districts in the North.
This was the last election in which New York had the most votes in the electoral college ( 43 votes ).
After the 1970 जनसांख्यिकी, कैलिफ़ोर्निया gained the most electoral votes and has remained the most populous state since then.
This is the latest election जहाँ a अध्यक्षीय ticket won without carrying the vice presidential candidate 's home state.
Karak ( ; also known as Garak, Garrak, and Gorg ) is a village in gamasiyab ग्रामीण District, in the Central District of Nahavand County, Hamadan Province, Iran.
At the 2006 census, its population was 294, in 65 families.

Kurt Donald Cobain ( February 20, 1967 – April 5, 1994 ) थी an अमरीकी संगीतकार और कलाकार, बेहतरीन ज्ञात as the lead singer, guitarist and primary songwriter of the grunge band Nirvana.
Cobain formed Nirvana with Krist Novoselic in Aberdeen, Washington in 1985 and established it as part of the Seattle music scene, having its debut album ब्लीच released on the स्वतंत्र record label Sub Pop in 1989.
After signing with major label DGC Records, the band found breakthrough success with `` Smells Like Teen Spirit `` इससे इसके दूसरी एल्बम nevermind ( 1991 ).
following the कामयाबी of nevermind, निर्वाण थी labeled `` the flagship band '' of Generation X, and Cobain hailed as `` the spokesman of a generation ''.
Cobain, however, was often uncomfortable and frustrated, believing his संदेश और कलाकारी दृष्टि to have महरूम misinterpreted by the public, with his personal issues often subject to media attention.
he challenged Nirvana 's audience with its final studio album In Utero ( 1993 ).
During the last years of उसके जीवन, कोबेन struggled with heroin addiction, illness and depression.
He also had difficulty coping with his fame and public image, and the professional and lifelong personal pressures surrounding खुद और उसके बीवी, संगीतकार कोर्टनी Love.
On April 8, 1994, Cobain was found dead at his home in Seattle, the victim of what was officially ruled a suicide by a self-inflicted shotgun घाव to the सिर.
The circumstances of his death at age 27 have become a topic of public fascination और बहस.
Since their debut, Nirvana, with Cobain as a songwriter, has sold over 25 million albums in the U.S., and over 50 लाख विश्वव्यापी.
A millwright is a craftsman or tradesman engaged with the construction and maintenance of machinery.
More generally in the English speaking world, early millwrights were specialist carpenters who erected machines used in agriculture, food processing और प्रसंस्करण lumber and paper.
In the जल्दी भाग of the Industrial Revolution, their skills were pressed into service building the earliest powered textile mills.
Modern millwrights work with steel and other materials in addition to wood and must often combine the skills of several skilled trades in order to successfully fabricate industrial मशीनरी or to इकट्ठे मशीने इससे pre-fabricated parts.
The modern millwright must also be समर्थ to पढ़ा blueprints and other schematics to aid him in the construction of complex systems.
Millwrights are frequently unionized, with around 45 % unionized in the US, although experienced millwrights often set themselves up as independent contractors.
The Adjustment Bureau is a 2011 अमरीकी रोमांटिक action thriller film loosely based on the Philip K. Dick short story, `` Adjustment Team ``.
The film was written and directed by George Nolfi and stars Matt डैमन and Emily Blunt.
The cast also includes Anthony Mackie, John Slattery, माइकल Kelly, and Terence Stamp.
The score was composed by Thomas Newman, with two songs by रिचर्ड ashcroft ( `` Future 's Bright '' for the opening sequence ; `` Are You Ready ? '' for the closing credits ).
सोडियम azide is the inorganic compound with the formula NaN3.
This colorless salt is the gas-forming component in many car airbag systems.
It is used for the तैयारी of अन्य azide यौगिकों.
It is an ionic पदार्थ, is highly soluble in water, and is very acutely toxic.
Double rainbow and supernumerary rainbows on the अंदर of the प्राथमिक arc.
The shadow of the photographer 's head on the bottom marks the centre of the रेनबो circle ( antisolar point ).
A rainbow is an optical and meteorological phenomenon that is caused by प्रतिबिंब of लाइट in water droplets in the Earth 's atmosphere, resulting in a spectrum of light appearing in the sky.
It takes the रूप of a multicoloured arc.
Rainbows caused by sunlight सदा appear in the खण्ड of sky directly opposite the sun.
In a `` प्राथमिक rainbow '', the arc shows red on the outer part and violet on the inner side.
This rainbow is caused by light होने refracted जबकि entering a droplet of water, then reflected inside on the back of the droplet and refracted again when leaving it.
In a double rainbow, a second arc is seen outside the primary arc, and has the order of its colours reversed, red facing toward the other one, in both rainbows.
This second rainbow is caused by light reflecting twice inside water droplets.
The Conservative Party, officially the Conservative and Unionist Party and colloquially referred to as the Tory Party or the Tories, is a centre-right political party in the United Kingdom that espouses the philosophies of कोसा और अंग्रेजों unionism.
it is the largest राजनैतिक पार्टी in the संयुक्त किंगडम, being the largest single party in the House of Commons with 303 MPs, the largest party in local government with 9,391 councillors, and the largest British party in the European Parliament with 25 MEPs.
It governs in गठबन्धन साथ the Liberal Democrats, with party leader David Cameron as Prime Minister.
The रूढ़िवादी पार्टी थी founded in 1834, and was one of two dominant parties in the 19th century, along with the Liberal Party.
It changed its name to the Conservative and Unionist Party in 1912 after merging with the Liberal Unionist Party, although that name is rarely used and it is generally referred to as simply the रूढ़िवादी Party.
In the 1920s, the Liberal vote greatly diminished and the Labour Party became the conservatives ' प्रमुख rivals.
Conservative Prime Ministers led governments for 57 years of the 20th century, including Winston Churchill ( 1940–45, 1951–55 ) और मार्गरेट थैचर ( 1979–90 ).
Thatcher 's tenure led to wide-ranging economic liberalisation and saw the Conservatives become the most eurosceptic of the तीन प्रमुख पार्टियों.
The party was returned to government in coalition, having failed to win a majority, in 2010 under the अधिक `` उदार '' नेतृत्व of दाउद cameron.
In the European Parliament, the Conservatives are the largest British party with 25 MEPs, who sit with the soft eurosceptic European Conservatives and Reformists ( ECR ) parliamentary group, while the party itself is a member of the Alliance of European Conservatives and Reformists ( AECR ) Europarty.
They are the third-largest पार्टी in the Scottish Parliament and second-largest in the Welsh Assembly.
They were formally अलाइड to the ulster यूनियनिस्ट पार्टी ( uup ) as part of the Ulster Conservatives and Unionists arrangement, with the UUP currently participating in the five-party Northern Ireland Executive.
Destiny 's Child was an American R & B girl group whose final, and perhaps most recognizable, line-up comprised Beyoncé नॉलेस, केली rowland और मिशेल Williams.
Formed in 1990 in Houston, टेक्सास, नियति 's चाइल्ड members began their musical endeavors as Girl 's Tyme comprising, among others, Knowles, Rowland, LaTavia Roberson and LeToya Luckett.
After years of सीमित कामयाबी, they were signed to Columbia Records as Destiny 's Child.
Destiny 's Child was launched into मुख्यधारा मान्यता following the रिलीज of उनके best-selling second album, The Writing 's on the Wall, which contained the number-one singles `` Bills, Bills, Bills `` and `` Say My Name ``.
Despite critical and commercial success, the group was plagued by internal conflict and विधिक turmoil, as Roberson and Luckett attempted to split from the group 's manager Mathew Knowles, citing favoritism of Knowles and Rowland, his daughter and niece, respectively.
Both roberson और luckett यहूद soon replaced with Williams and Farrah Franklin ; however, in 2000, Franklin was dismissed, leaving them as a trio.
Their third album, उत्तरजीवी, जिससे contains विषयवस्तु the public interpreted as a channel to the group 's experience, contains the worldwide hits `` Independent Women ``, `` Survivor `` and `` Bootylicious ``.
In 2002, they announced a hiatus and re-united two years later for the release of their चौथी स्टुडियो एल्बम, Destiny Fulfilled ( 2004 ).
Destiny 's Child has sold अधिक than 50 million records worldwide to date.
Billboard magazine ranks the समूह as एक of the महानतम musical trios of all time, the ninth most successful artist/band of the 2000s, and placed the group 68th in its All-Time Hot 100 Artists list in 2008.
The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention ( CDC ) is a United राज्य संघीय एजेंसी under the Department of Health and Human Services headquartered in Druid Hills, unincorporated DeKalb County, Georgia, in Greater Atlanta.
It works to protect public health and safety by providing information to enhance health decisions, and it promotes स्वास्थ्य through partnerships with state health departments and other organizations.
The CDC focus national attention on developing and applying disease रोकथाम और कंट्रोल ( विशेषकर संक्रामक रोगों और foodborne pathogens और अन्य सूक्ष्मजैविक infections ), environmental health, occupational safety and health, health promotion, injury prevention and education activities designed to improve the health of the people of the United States.
The CDC is the United States ' national public health institute and is a founding सदस्य of the अंतरराष्ट्रीय Association of National Public Health Institutes.
Earthquake prediction `` is usually defined as the specification of the time, location, and magnitude of a future earthquake within stated limits '', and विशेषकर of `` the next strong earthquake to occur in a region. ''
This can be distinguished from earthquake forecasting, which is the probabilistic assessment of general earthquake hazard, including the frequency and magnitude of damaging भूकंप, in a given area over periods of years or decades.
This can be further distinguished from real-time earthquake warning प्रणालियों, जिससे, upon डिटेक्शन of a severe earthquake, can provide neighboring regions a few seconds warning of potentially significant shaking.
To be useful, an earthquake prediction must be precise enough to warrant the cost of increased precautions, including disruption of ordinary क्रियाएँ and commerce, and timely enough that preparation can be made.
Predictions must also be reliable, as false alarms and cancelled alarms are not only economically costly, लकिन seriously undermine confidence in, and thereby the effectiveness of, any kind of warning.
With over 7,000 भूकंप around the संसार प्रत्येक साल साथ a परिमाण of 4.0 or greater, trivial success in earthquake prediction is easily obtained using sufficiently broad parameters of time, location, or magnitude.
However, such trivial `` successful पूर्वानुमान '' are not useful.
Major earthquakes are often followed by reports that they were predicted, or at least anticipated, but no claim of a कामयाब prediction of a major earthquake has survived close inquiry.
In the 1970s there was intense optimism amongst scientists that some method of predicting earthquakes might be found, लकिन by the 1990s continuing विफलता led अनेक वैज्ञानिकों to सवाल whether it was even possible.
While many scientists still hold that, given enough संसाधन, भविष्यवाणी might be possible, many others maintain that earthquake prediction is inherently impossible.
Deborah Ann `` Debby '' Ryan ( born May 13, 1993 ) is an American actress, singer, संगीतकार, songwriter और record producer.

She is also known for appearing in the 2008 विशेषता film The Longshots as Edith.
In 2009, she guest starred in an episode of Wizards of Waverly Place in Wizards on Deck with Hannah Montana as बेली पिकेट along with her other cast mates from The Suite Life on Deck.
Then, in 2010, she starred in the film 16 बधाइयां, जिससे थी the सबसे देखी cable program on the day of its premiere on the Disney Channel.
16 Wishes introduced Ryan to new audiences ; the movie received high viewership in the adults जनसांख्यिकी ( 18-34 ).
