Facebook is an online social networking service, whose name stems from the colloquial name for the book given to students at the start of the academic year by some university administrations in the United States to help students get to know each other.
It was founded in February 2004 by Mark Zuckerberg with his college roommates and fellow Harvard University students Eduardo Saverin, Andrew McCollum, डस्टिन Moskovitz and Chris Hughes.
The website 's membership was initially limited by the founders to Harvard students, but was expanded to other colleges in the Boston area, the Ivy League, and Stanford University.
It gradually added support for students at various अन्य विश्वविद्यालयों पहले opening to high school students, and eventually to anyone aged 13 and over.
फेसबुक अभी allows कोई उपयोक्ता जो घोषित themselves to be at तनिक 13 सालो बूढ़ा to become पंजीकृत उपयोक्ता of the साईट.
Users must register before using the साईट, बाद जिससे वे may बनाएँ a निजी प्रोफ़ाइल, add other users as friends, and exchange messages, including automatic notifications when they update their profile.
Additionally, users may join common-interest user groups, व्यवस्थित by कार्यस्थल, स्कूल or college, or other characteristics, and categorize their friends into lists such as `` People From Work '' or `` Close Friends ''.
As of सितंबर 2012, Facebook has over one billion active users.
According to a May 2011 Consumer Reports survey, there are 7.5 million children अंतर्गत 13 साथ खाते और 5 million under 10, violating the site 's terms of service.
In May 2005, Accel partners invested $ 12.7 लाख in Facebook, and Jim Breyer added $ 1 million of his own money to the pot.
A January 2009 Compete.com study ranked Facebook as the most प्रयुक्त सोशल networking service by worldwide monthly active users.
Entertainment Weekly included the site on its end-of-the-decade `` best-of '' list, saying, `` How on earth did we stalk our exes, remember our co-workers ' जन्मदिन, कीड़ा our friends, and play a rousing game of Scrabulous before Facebook ? ''
Critics, such as Facebook Detox, state that फेसबुक रै turned into a नेशनल obsession in the United States, resulting in vast amounts of time lost and encouraging narcissism.
Quantcast estimates Facebook has 138.9 million monthly unique U.S. विज़िटर in may 2011.
According to Social Media Today, in April 2010 an estimated 41.6 % ( 129.5 million ) of the u.S. जनसांख्यिकी था a Facebook account.
Nevertheless, Facebook 's market growth started to stall in some regions, with the site losing 7 million active उपयोक्ता in the United States and Canada in May 2011.
Facebook eventually filed लिये an आरंभिक public offering on February 1, 2012, and was headquartered in Menlo Park, California.
Facebook Inc. began selling stock to the public and trading on the NASDAQ on May 18, 2012.
Erwin Johannes Eugen Rommel ( 15 November 1891 – 14 अक्तूबर 1944 ), popularly known as The Desert Fox ( Wüstenfuchs, ), was a German Field Marshal of World War II.
He earned the respect of both his own troops and the दुश्मनों he fought.
Rommel was a highly decorated officer in World War I and was awarded the Pour le Mérite for his exploits on the इतालवी सामने.
In World War II, he further distinguished himself as the commander of the 7th Panzer Division during the 1940 invasion of France.
His leadership of German and Italian forces in the North African campaign established him as one of the most able commanders of the war, and earned him the appellation of the Desert Fox.
He is regarded as one of the most skilled commanders of desert warfare in the conflict.
He later commanded the German forces opposing the Allied cross-channel invasion in normandy.
His कार्यभार never took him to the Eastern Front.
Rommel is regarded as having been a दयालु और पेशेवर officer.
His Afrika Korps थी never अभियुक्त of युद्ध अपराधों, और सैनिको captured during his Africa campaign were reported to have been treated humanely.
Orders to kill Jewish सैनिको, नागरिकों and captured commandos were ignored.
Late in the war, Rommel was linked to the conspiracy to assassinate Adolf Hitler.
Since Rommel was a national hero, Hitler desired to eliminate him चुपचाप.
He forced Rommel to commit suicide with a cyanide pill, in return for आश्वासनों कि ख़बरों 's family would not be persecuted following his death.
Stained glass representation of the Holy Spirit as a dove, c. 1660.
The seven gifts of the Holy Spirit is an enumeration of seven spiritual gifts originating with patristic authors, later elaborated by five intellectual virtues and four other groups of ethical characteristics.
They are : अक्ल, समझना, wonder and awe ( fear of the Lord ), counsel, knowledge, fortitude, and piety ( reverence ).
The धरती दिन ध्वज, the latest proposal of John McConnell for a flag of Earth Day
Earth Day is an annual event, celebrated on April 22, on which events are held worldwide to demonstrate support for environmental protection.
It was first celebrated in 1970, and is now coordinated globally by the Earth Day Network, and celebrated in more than 192 देशों प्रत्येक year.
In 1969 at a UNESCO सम्मेलन in San Francisco, the date proposed was March 21, 1970, the first day of spring in the northern hemisphere.
This day of nature 's equipoise was later sanctioned in a Proclamation signed by Secretary सामान्य u thant at the United Nations.
A month later a separate Earth Day was founded by United राज्य Senator Gaylord Nelson as an environmental teach-in first held on April 22, 1970.
Nelson was later awarded the Presidential पदक of स्वतंत्रता Award in recognition of his work.
While this April 22 Earth Day was focused on the United States, an organization launched by Denis Hayes, who थी the original national coordinator in 1970, took it international in 1990 and organized events in 141 nations.
Numerous communities celebrate Earth Week, an entire week of activities focused on पर्यावरणीय मुद्दे.
Iodine is a रासायनिक element with symbol I and atomic number 53.
The नाम is from Greek ioeidēs, meaning violet or purple, due to the color of elemental iodine vapor.
Iodine and its compounds are primarily used in nutrition, and industrially in the production of एसिटिक एसिड और निश्चित polymers.
Iodine 's relatively high atomic number, low toxicity, and ease of attachment to organic यौगिकों have बना it a भाग of many X-ray contrast materials in modern medicine.
Iodine has only एक stable isotope.
A क्रमांक of आयोडीन radioisotopes are also used in medical applications.
Iodine is found on Earth mainly as the highly water-soluble iodide आयन, i−, which concentrates it in oceans and brine pools.
Like the other हैलोजन्स, फ़्री आयोडीन occurs मुख्यतः as a diatomic molecule I2, and then only momentarily after being oxidized from iodide by an oxidant like free oxygen.
In the universe and on Earth, आयोडीन 's ऊँची परमाणु number makes it a relatively rare element.
However, its presence in ocean water has given it a भूमिका in जीवविज्ञान.
It is the heaviest अनिवार्य तत्व utilized widely by life in biological functions ( only tungsten, employed in enzymes by a few species of bacteria, is heavier ).
Iodine 's rarity in many soils, due to initial low abundance as a crust-element, and also leaching of soluble iodide by rainwater, has led to many deficiency problems in जमीन पशु और अंतर्देशीय इंसान populations.
Iodine deficiency affects about two billion people and is the leading preventable cause of बौद्धिक disabilities.
Iodine is required by higher animals, which उपयोग it to synthesize थायराइड hormones, which contain the element.
क्युकी of this function, radioisotopes of iodine are concentrated in the thyroid gland along with nonradioactive iodine.
If inhaled, the radioisotope iodine-131, which has a high fission product yield, concentrates in the thyroid, but is easily remedied with potassium iodide treatment.
Lobbying ( also lobby ) is the अधिनियम of attempting to influence decisions made by officials in the government, most often legislators or members of regulatory agencies.
Lobbying is किया by अनेक अलग प्रकार of लोगों और व्यवस्थित groups, including individuals in the private sector, corporations, fellow legislators or government officials, or advocacy groups ( interest groups ).
lobbyists may be among a विधायक 's constituencies, meaning a voter or bloc of voters within his or her electoral district, or not ; they may engage in lobbying as a business, or not.
Professional lobbyists are people whose business is trying to influence legislation on behalf of a group or individual who hires them.
Individuals and nonprofit organizations can also lobby as an act of volunteering or as a small part of their normal job ( for instance, a CEO meeting with a representative about a project important to his/her company, or an activist meeting with his/her legislator in an unpaid capacity ).
Governments often define and regulate organized group lobbying that has become influential.
The ethics and नैतिकता of lobbying are.
Lobbying is often spoken of with contempt, when the implication is that people with inordinate socioeconomic power are corrupting the law ( twisting it away from fairness ) in order to serve their own conflict of interest.
But another side of lobbying is making sure that others ' interests are duly defended विरूद्ध others ' corruption, or even simply making sure that minority interests are fairly defended against mere tyranny of the majority.
For example, a medical association, or a trade association of health insurance companies, may lobby a legislature in order to counteract the influence of तम्बाकू कंपनियाँ, in which case the lobbying would be viewed by most people as justified ( duly defending against others ' corruption ).
The difficulty in आरेखण उद्देश्य लाइनों between which lobbyists are `` good lobbyists '' and which ones are `` bad ones '' is compounded by the cleverness with which lobbyists or their clients can argue that their own lobbying is of the `` good '' kind.
At heart, the effort to influence legislation is a power struggle.
as in अन्य फ़ॉर्म of शक्ति संघर्ष, such as war or law enforcement, motives range from to self-defense to fighting for justice, and the dividing line between predation and justice is subject to rationalization.
Sunshine of अपना love guitar riff
Cream were a 1960s British rock supergroup consisting of bassist/vocalist Jack Bruce, guitarist/vocalist eric क्लैप्टन, and drummer Ginger Baker.
Their sound was characterised by a hybrid of blues rock, hard rock and psychedelic rock, combining the psychedelia-themed lyrics, Eric Clapton 's blues guitar playing और vocals, जोकर ब्रूस 's आवाज़ और prominent bass playing and Ginger Baker 's jazz -influenced drumming.
The group 's third album, पहियों of Fire, was the world 's first platinum-selling double album.
Cream are widely regarded as being the world 's first successful supergroup.
In their करियर, they sold over 15 million albums worldwide.
Cream 's music included songs based on traditional blues such as `` Crossroads `` and `` Spoonful ``, and modern blues such as `` Born Under a Bad Sign ``, as well as more eccentric songs such as `` Strange Brew ``, `` Tales of Brave Ulysses `` and `` Toad ``.
Cream 's biggest hits were `` I Feel Free `` ( UK, number 11 ), `` Sunshine of Your प्रेम `` ( us, क्रमांक 5 ), `` White Room `` ( US, number 6 ), `` Crossroads '' ( US, number 28 ), and `` Badge `` ( UK, number 18 ).
Cream made a significant प्रभाव on the लोकप्रिय म्यूज़िक of the समय, और, साथ साथ जिमि Hendrix, and Terry Kath of Chicago, popularised the use of the wah-wah pedal.
They provided a heavy yet technically proficient musical theme that foreshadowed and influenced the emergence of अंग्रेजों bands such as The Jeff Beck Group in the late 1960s.
The band 's live performances influenced progressive rock acts such as Rush.
Cream were inducted into the Rock and फेंकें हॉल of Fame in 1993.
They were included in both Rolling Stone and VH1 's lists of the `` 100 Greatest कलाकारों of सब समय ''.
They were also ranked number 16 on VH1 's `` 100 Greatest कलाकारों of Hard Rock ''.
Hairspray is a 1988 comedy film written and directed by John Waters, and starring Ricki Lake, Sonny Bono, Debbie Harry, Michael St. Gerard, Shawn Thompson, Colleen Fitzpatrick, Jerry Stiller, and in his last film role, Divine.
Hairspray was a dramatic departure from waters ' पहले works, साथ a much broader intended audience.
In fact, Hairsprays PG is the mildest rating a Waters film has received ; most of his previous films यहूद rated X by the MPAA.
Set in 1962 Baltimore, मेरीलैंड, the फिल्मी घूमती around self-proclaimed `` pleasantly plump '' teenager Tracy Turnblad as she pursues stardom as a dancer on a local TV show and rallies against racial segregation.
Hairspray was only a moderate कामयाबी upon इसके आरंभिक नाट्य release, earning a modest gross of $ 8 million.
However, it managed to आकर्षित a larger दर्शक on home video in the early 1990s and became a cult classic.
Most critics praised the film, हालांकि some were displeased with the overall campiness.
In 2002, the film was adapted into a Broadway musical of the वही नाम, which won eight Tony Awards, including Best Musical in 2003.
A second film version of Hairspray, an adaptation of the स्टेज musical, was also released by New Line Cinema in 2007, which included many changes of scripted items from the original.
The film also ranks # 444 on Empire magazine 's 2008 list of the 500 greatest movies of all time.
A Christian denomination is an identifiable religious body under a common name, structure, and doctrine भीतर christianity.
Some groups included do not consider themselves a denomination ( e.g., the कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर considers itself the one true church and the Apostolic See, and as pre-denominational ).
Some groups viewed by non-adherents as denominational actively resist being called a denomination and do not have any औपचारिक denominational ढांचा, प्राधिकार, or record-keeping परे the लोकल सभा ; several groups within Restoration Movement fall into this category.
Some groups are large ( e.g. Catholics, Lutherans, Anglicans or Baptists ), जबकि अन्य हैं बस a few छोटी चर्च, and in most cases the relative size is not evident in this list.
Modern आंदोलनों ऐसे as fundamentalist Christianity, Pietism, Evangelicalism, Pentecostalism and the Holiness movement sometimes cross denominational lines, or in some cases create new denominations out of two or more continuing groups, ( as is the case for many United and uniting churches, for example ).
ऐसे subtleties and complexities are not clearly depicted here.
प्रमुख विभाजन within Christianity.
Note : This is नहीं a पूरा सूची, लकिन aims to provide a comprehensible overview of the diversity among denominations of Christianity.
As there are reported to be approximately 41,000 ईसाई denominations, अनेक of जिससे can नहीं be सत्यापित to be significant, only those denominations with Wikipedia articles will be listed in order to ensure that all entries on this list are notable and verifiable.
Between denominations, theologians, and comparative religionists वहीँ हैं considerable मतभिन्नता परिचय जिससे समूह can be properly called Christian, disagreements arising primarily from doctrinal differences between groups.
For the purpose of simplicity, this list is intended to प्रतिबिंबित the self-understanding of each denomination.
Explanations of different opinions concerning their status as Christian denominations can be found at उनके संबंधित articles.
There is no official recognition in most parts of the world for religious bodies, and there is no official clearinghouse which could determine the औकात or respectability of religious bodies.
Often there is considerable disagreement between various churches परिचय whether अन्य चर्च चाहिए be labeled with pejorative terms such as `` cult '', or about whether this or that group enjoys some measure of respectability.
Such considerations often vary from place to place, where one religious group may enjoy majority status in one region, but be widely regarded as a `` dangerous cult '' in another part of the world.
Inclusion on this list does not indicate any निर्णय परिचय the size, importance, or character of a group or its members.
1804 map of `` Louisiana ``, edged on the वेस्ट by the Rocky Mountains.
The Louisiana Purchase ( `` Sale of Louisiana '' ) was the acquisition by the United States of America in 1803 of of France 's claim to the territory of Louisiana.
The U.S. paid 50 million francs ( $ 11,250,000 ) प्लस रद्दीकरण of debts worth 18 million francs ( $ 3,750,000 ), for a total sum of 15 million dollars ( less than 3 cents per acre ) for the Louisiana territory ( $ million in dollars, less than 42 cents per acre ).
The Louisiana territory encompassed सब or भाग of 15 present U.S. states and two Canadian provinces.
The land purchased contained all of present-day Arkansas, Missouri, Iowa, ओक्लाहोमा, कान्सास, और नेब्रास्का ; भाग of मिनेसोटा कि यहूद वेस्ट of the Mississippi River ; most of North Dakota ; most of South Dakota ; northeastern New Mexico ; northern Texas ; the portions of Montana, Wyoming, and Colorado east of the Continental Divide ; Louisiana west of the Mississippi River, including the city of New Orleans ; and small portions of land that would eventually become part of the Canadian provinces of Alberta and Saskatchewan.
France controlled this vast area from 1699 until 1762, the year it gave the territory to इसके ally Spain.
Under नेपोलियन बोनापार्ट, फ़्रांस took वापस the territory in 1800 in the आशा of भवन an साम्राज्य in उत्तर अमेरिका.
A slave revolt in Haiti and an impending war with Britain, however, led France to abandon these plans and sell the entire territory to the United States, जो था originally intended only to seek the purchase of New Orleans and its adjacent lands.
The purchase of the territory of Louisiana took place during the presidency of Thomas Jefferson.
At the समय, the खरीदें faced domestic opposition because it was thought to be unconstitutional.
Although he agreed that the U.S. Constitution did not contain provisions for acquiring territory, Jefferson decided to go ahead with the purchase anyway in order to remove France 's presence in the region and to protect both U.S. trade access to the बंदरगाहों of नई ऑरलियन्स और फ़्री ड्योढ़ी on the मिसिसिपी River.
Ceremony at Place d'armes, New Orleans marking transfer of Louisiana to the United States, 10 March 1804, as depicted by Thure de Thulstrup.
`` Cool Jerk '' is a popular song written by Donald Storball and originally performed by The capitols.
Released in 1966, it reached No. 2 on the American R & B चार्ट and No. 7 on the pop chart.
The backing track for this song was actually recorded ( secretly ) by the Motown house band the दुर्गंध भाइयो.
Per one of the दुर्गंध भाइयो, the song was originally to be called `` Pimp Jerk. ''
This was taken from watching neighborhood pimps, जो होता dance in the clubs, but were too `` cool '' to do the jerk like regular folks.
Their version was subsequently named `` the Pimp Jerk. ''
The producer was afraid that a song with the word pimp in the title would be banned or not receive much धनात्मक ध्यान, and had the title changed to its current form.
The Go-Go 's, Todd Rundgren, Big Trouble, Human Sexual Response, The La de da 's, the Creation, and The Coasters have covered the song.
Todd Rundgren did his version in an odd time हस्ताक्षर ( 7/4 ), giving an obviously jerky feel to the song.
The Go-Go 's covered the सोंग लिये उनके 1982 album Vacation and later re-recorded it for their 1990 album Greatest.
In the feature film Home Alone 2 : Lost in New York, Uncle Frank ( Gerry Bamman ) sings `` Cool Jerk '' in the shower.
A version of the song with different lyrics ( `` Do the Cool Whip '' ) is प्रयुक्त in कूल चाबुक commercials.
A recording of `` Cool झटका '' by Ricardo Ray is featured in the feature film Donnie Brasco ( 1997 ).
The song features in the film Standing in the Shadows of Motown, performed by the Funk Brothers with सीसे vocals by bootsy कॉलिन्स.
The song is heard briefly in the एनिमेटेड feature, Madagascar 3 : Europe 's Most Wanted.
Despite this कारण, it is listed in some variations of the film 's soundtrack.
A league is a unit of length ( or, rarely, area ).
It was long आम in Europe and Latin America, but it is no longer an official unit in any nation.
The league originally referred to the distance a person could walk in an hour.
चूंकि the मध्य आयु, many values have been specified in several countries.
In the context of nautical distances, the 3 mile ( 4.8 km ) अलहदा corresponds to कैसा दूर an observer of average height ( 5'9 '' or 1.78 m ) can see when standing at sea level.
यूँ, a जलयान traveling one `` league '' has reached what was previously the farthest visible distance on the horizon.
The lack of a historical and global standard लिये the सटीक माप of a `` league '' can be accounted for by the variable elevation of the observer ( i.e., sightings from a ship 's deck vs. masthead ).
The Irish state came into being in 1922 as the Irish Free State, a dominion of the British Commonwealth, having seceded from the United Kingdom under the Anglo-Irish Treaty.
It comprises 26 of आयरलैंड 's 32 counties.
चूंकि 1949 it has existed as the Republic of Ireland.
From its foundation, the Irish फ़्री राज्य थी embroiled in a civil war between nationalists supporting the Treaty and opponents who supported a republic.
The pro-Treaty side, organised as cumann na ngaedheal उभरा victorious from the conflict and won subsequent elections.
They formed the government of the state until 1932, when they peacefully handed over power to the anti-Treaty faction in Fianna Fáil, who पराजित उन्हें in an चुनाव.
The Irish state, despite its violent beginnings, has remained a liberal democracy throughout its existence.
A new constitution in 1937 removed many of the links with Britain established under the Treaty and Ireland 's neutrality in the Second World War demonstrated its independence in विदेशी नीति matters from Britain.
In 1948 Ireland formally बाएँ the अंग्रेजों Commonwealth and adopted the title of `` Republic ''.
In the आर्थिक गोला, the Irish state has had a mixed performance.
On independence, it was one of the wealthier countries in Europe per head of population.
However it also inherited from British rule the problems of बेरोजगारी, emigration, uneven geographical development and lack of a native industrial base.
For much of its history, the state struggled to rectify these problems.
Particular peaks of emigration were recorded during the late 1930s, 1950s and 1980s, जब the Irish economy recorded little growth.
In the 1930s, Fianna Fáil सरकारें attempted to create Irish domestic industries using subsidies and protective tarifs.
In the late 1950s, these policies यहूद dropped in पक्ष of फ़्री व्यापार with selected countries and encouraging of foreign investment with low taxes.
This was विस्तारित when Ireland entered the European Economic Community in 1972.
In the 1990s and 2000s, Ireland experienced an आर्थिक बूम ज्ञात as the सेल्टिक Tiger, in which the country 's GDP surpassed many of its European neighbours.
Immigration also surpassed emigration, bringing the state 's population up to over 4 million.
However, since 2008, Ireland has experienced a severe crisis in the बैंकिंग सेक्टर और साथ sovereign debt.
The resultant आर्थिक slump रै deepened the effect of the world recession on Ireland.
From 1937 to 1998, the Irish constitution included a claim on Northern Ireland as a part of the नेशनल territory.
However, the state also opposed and used its security forces against those armed groups - principally the Provisional Irish Republican Army, who tried to unite Ireland by force.
This occurred in the 1950s, throughout the 1970s and 1980s and has continued on a reduced scale.
Irish governments meanwhile tried to broker an agreement to the conflict known as The Troubles within Northern Ireland from 1968 to the late 1990s.
The British government officially recognised the सही of the Irish government to be a party to the Northern negotiations in the Anglo-Irish Agreement of 1985.
In 1998, as part of the Good Friday Agreement, the Irish constitution was altered by referendum to remove the territorial claim to उत्तरी आयरलैंड और बजाय extend the right of Irish citizenship to all the people of the island should they wish to have it.
John Quincy Adams ( July 11, 1767February 23, 1848 ) थी the छठे अध्यक्ष of the United States ( 1825–1829 ).
He served as American diplomat, Senator, and congressional प्रतिनिधि.
He was a सदस्य of the Federalist, Democratic-Republican, National Republican, and later Anti-Masonic and Whig parties.
Adams was the son of former President John एडम्स और Abigail Adams.
As a diplomat, Adams played an important role in negotiating many अंतरराष्ट्रीय treaties, सबसे notably the Treaty of Ghent, which ended the War of 1812.
As Secretary of State, he negotiated with the संयुक्त किंगडम over अमेरिका 's उत्तरी किनारा with Canada, negotiated with Spain the annexation of Florida, and authored the Monroe Doctrine.
Historians agree he was one of the महानतम राजनयिकों and secretaries of state in American history.
As president, he sought to modernize the American economy and promoted education.
Adams enacted a part of his कार्यसूची और सशुल्क बंद much of the national debt.
He was stymied by a Congress controlled by his enemies, and his lack of patronage networks helped राजनेता eager to undercut him.
He lost his 1828 bid for re-election to एंड्रयू Jackson.
in doing so, he became the first president since his father to serve a single term.
Adams is best known as a diplomat who shaped अमेरिका 's विदेशी नीति in लकीर साथ उसके ardently राष्ट्रवादी commitment to America 's republican values.
More recently Howe ( 2007 ) portrayed Adams as the exemplar and moral leader in an era of modernization.
During Adams ' आजीवन, technological innovations and new means of communication spread messages of religious revival, social reform, and party politics.
Goods, money, and people traveled more rapidly and efficiently than ever before.
Adams was elected a U.S. Representative from Massachusetts after leaving office, सेवारत लिये the पिछला 17 सालो of उसके जीवन साथ दूर greater acclamation than he had achieved as president.
He is, so far, the only president later elected to the United States House of Representatives ( though John Tyler was elected to the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि of the confederate राज्य बस पहले उसके मौत in 1862 ).
Animated by his growing revulsion विरूद्ध गुलामी, Adams became a leading opponent of the Slave Power.
He predicted that if a civil war were to break out, the president could abolish गुलामी by using उसके युद्ध शक्तियां.
Adams also predicted the Union 's dissolution over the slavery issue, but said that if the South became independent there would be a series of bloody slave revolts.
Windows Internet Explorer 9 ( IE9 ) is a version of the Internet Explorer web browser इससे microsoft.
It was released to the public on कूच 14, 2011.
Microsoft has released Internet Explorer 9 as a major out-of-band संस्करण कि is नहीं tied to the release schedule of any particular version of Windows, unlike previous versions.
It is the first version since Internet Explorer 2 to not be bundled with a Windows ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली, हालांकि कुछ OEMs have installed it with Windows 7 on their PCs, as well as new Windows 7 laptops.
The system आवश्यकताएँ for Internet Explorer 9 are Windows 7, Windows Server 2008 R2, Windows Vista Service Pack 2 or Windows Server 2008 SP2 with the Platform Update.
खिड़कियाँ xp and earlier are not supported.
अंतरजाल Explorer 9 is the last version of Internet Explorer to be supported on Windows Vista.
Both IA-32 and x64 builds are available.
Internet Explorer 9 supports several CSS 3 properties, embedded ICC v2 or v4 color profiles support via खिड़कियाँ रंग प्रणाली, और रै improved JavaScript performance.
It is the last of the five major web browsers to implement support लिये स्केलेबल वेक्टर ग्राफिक्स ( SVG ).
It also features hardware-accelerated graphics rendering using Direct2D, hardware-accelerated text rendering using DirectWrite, hardware-accelerated video rendering using Media Foundation, imaging support provided by Windows Imaging Component, and high fidelity printing powered by the XML Paper specification ( XPS ) print pipeline.
Internet Explorer 9 also supports the HTML5 video और ऑडियो tags and the Web Open Font Format.
Alka-Seltzer is an effervescent antacid and pain reliever first marketed by the Dr. Miles Medicine Company.
It was developed by Maurice Treener, head chemist at Miles, in elkhart, Indiana.
Alka-Seltzer is marketed for relief of नाबालिग aches, pains, सूजन, fever, headache, heartburn, sour stomach, indigestion, and hangovers, while neutralizing excess stomach acid.
it थी शुभारम्भ in 1931.
A spin-off of Alka-Seltzer made to relieve colds और फ्लू, alka-seltzer Plus, was later introduced.
A short-lived antacid non-aspirin variant, Alka-Mints, was introduced in 1994 और discontinued in 1997.
Alka-Seltzer is फिलहाल owned by Bayer Schering Pharma AG, Germany.
The name `` Alka-Seltzer '' has been extended to incorporate an entire line of medications sold over the काउंटर और लिया by अर्थात् of rapidly dissolving tablets that form a carbonated solution in water.

Enlarge to दृश्य लेबल्स.
A stalactite (, ; from the Greek stalasso, ( σταλάσσω ), `` to drip '', and meaning `` that which drips '' ) is a प्रकार of speleothem ( secondary mineral ) that hangs from the ceiling of limestone caves.
It is a प्रकार of dripstone.
The सम्बन्धित formation on the floor of the cave is known as a stalagmite.
Degree abbreviations are used as an alternative way to specify an academic degree instead of स्पेलिंग आउट the शीर्षक in full, such as in reference books like Who 's Who and on business cards.
Many डिग्री have more than one abbreviation.
In the UK, it is not generally the custom to punctuate abbreviations for डिग्री with full stops ( e.g. `` BSc '' rather than `` B.Sc. ``.
Race is a classification system used to categorize humans into large और पृथक populations or groups by anatomical, cultural, ethnic, genetic, geographical, historical, linguistic, religious, or social affiliation.
First used to denote national affiliations, the term began to be used to relate to physical traits in the 17th century.
In the early 20th century the पद थी प्रायः प्रयुक्त, in a taxonomic sense, to denote genetically differentiated human populations defined by phenotype.
While biologists sometimes use the concept of race to make distinctions among fuzzy सेट of traits, अन्य in the वैज्ञानिक community suggest that the idea of race often is used in a naive or simplistic way, i.e. that among humans, race has no taxonomic significance : all living humans belong to the same species, Homo sapiens and subspecies, Homo sapiens sapiens.
Social conceptions and groupings of races vary over time, involving folk taxonomies
that define of individuals based on perceived traits.
Scientists consider biological essentialism obsolete, and generally discourage racial explanations for collective differentiation in both physical and behavioral traits.
Since the second half of the 20th century the associations of race with the ideologies and theories that grew out of the work of 19th-century anthropologists and physiologists has led to the use of the word race itself becoming problematic.
Although still used in general contexts, it is now often replaced by other words जिससे हैं कम अस्पष्ट और emotionally charged, such as populations, people ( s ), ethnic groups or communities depending on context.
Lucy Stone ( August 13, 1818 – October 19, 1893 ) was a prominent American abolitionist and suffragist, and a गायन एडवोकेट और आयोजक promoting rights for women.
In 1847, Stone became the first woman इससे मैसाचुसेट्स to earn a college degree.
She spoke out for women 's rights and against slavery at a time when महिलाओं यहूद हतोत्साहित और prevented from public speaking.
Stone was the first अंकित अमरीकी स्त्री to retain उसके own last name after marriage.
Stone 's organizational activities for the cause of women 's rights yielded tangible gains in the difficult political environment of the 19th century.
Stone helped initiate the first National Women 's Rights Convention and she supported and sustained it annually साथ साथ a क्रमांक of अन्य लोकल, राज्य और regional activist conventions.
Stone spoke in front of a number of legislative bodies to promote laws giving अधिक अधिकारों to महिलाओं.
She assisted in establishing the स्त्री 's नेशनल वफ़ादार लीग to सहायता pass the तेरहवीं amendment and thereby abolish slavery, after which she helped form the largest group of like-minded women 's rights reformers, the politically moderate American Woman Suffrage Association, which worked for decades at the state level in favor of women 's right to vote.
Stone wrote extensively about a wide range of women 's rights, प्रकाशन and distributing speeches by herself and others, and convention proceedings.
In the long-running and influential Woman 's Journal, a weekly periodical that she established and promoted, Stone aired दोनो उसके अपना और differing दृश्य परिचय women 's rights.
Called `` the orator '' and `` the morning star of the woman 's rights movement '', स्टोन वितरित a वाक जिससे sparked Susan B. Anthony to take up the cause of women 's suffrage.
Elizabeth Cady Stanton wrote that `` Lucy Stone was the first व्यक्ति by जिसको the दिल of the American public was deeply stirred on the woman question. ''
Together, Anthony, Stanton, and Stone have been called the 19th सदी `` triumvirate `` of women 's suffrage and feminism.
In finance, a bond is an instrument of indebtedness of the बंध issuer to the holders.
It is a debt security, under which the issuer owes the holders a debt and, depending on the terms of the bond, is obliged to pay them interest ( the कूपन ) or to repay the प्रिंसिपल at a बाद date, termed the maturity.
Interest is usually payable at fixed intervals ( semiannual, annual, sometimes monthly ).
Very प्रायः the बंध is परक्राम्य, i.e. the ownership of the instrument can be transferred in the secondary market.
Thus a bond is a form of loan or IOU : the holder of the bond is the lender ( creditor ), the issuer of the bond is the borrower ( debtor ), और the कूपन is the interest.
Bonds provide the borrower with external funds to finance long-term investments, or, in the case of government bonds, to finance current expenditure.
Certificates of deposit ( CDs ) or short term commercial paper are considered to be money market instruments and not bonds : the main difference is in the लंबाई of the पद of the यंत्र.
Bonds and stocks are both securities, but the major difference between the two is that ( capital ) stockholders have an equity stake in the कम्पनी ( i.e. वे हैं स्वामी ), whereas bondholders have a creditor stake in the company ( i.e. they are lenders ).
Another difference is that bonds usually have a defined term, or परिपक्वता, after which the bond is redeemed, whereas stocks may be outstanding indefinitely.
An exception is an irredeemable bond, such as Consols, which is a perpetuity, i.e. a bond with no maturity.

A scale model is a physical model, a representation or copy of an object that is larger or smaller than the actual size of the ऑब्जेक्ट, जिससे seeks to maintain the relative proportions ( the scale factor ) of the physical size of the original object.
Very often the scale model is used as a guide to making the ऑब्जेक्ट in full size.
Scale models are built or एकत्रित लिये अनेक reasons.
The Zune HD was a portable media player in the Zune product परिवार released on सितंबर 15, 2009 by Microsoft.
It was a direct competitor साथ the Apple iPod and iPhone series of mobile devices.
It was initially released in 16 and 32 GB capacities.
a 64 gb version was released on April 9, 2010.
It utilized a touchscreen interface for navigation and included Wi-Fi for synchronization, access to the Zune Marketplace और वेब browsing.
The Zune HD utilized the nvidia tegra APX 2600 chip, allowing it to play 720p video through the optional HDMI Zune dock on a high-definition television.
Otherwise, content would be scaled down to 480x272 pixels on the player 's OLED touchscreen.
Old Sparky, the इलेक्ट्रिक chair used at Sing Sing prison
Execution by electrocution, usually performed using an इलेक्ट्रिक कुर्सी, is an निष्पादन method originating in the United States in which the condemned person is strapped to a specially built wooden chair and electrocuted through electrodes placed on the body.
This execution method was created by employees of Thomas Edison during the War of currents, और रै महरूम प्रयुक्त तभी in the United States and, for a period of several decades, in the Philippines ( its first use there in 1924 under American occupation, last in 1976 ).
Historically, once the condemned person was attached to the कुर्सी, विभिन्न चक्र ( differing in voltage and duration ) of alternating current would be passed through the individual 's body, in order to cause fatal damage to the internal organs ( including the brain ).
The first jolt of electric current थी designed to कारण तात्कालिक unconsciousness and brain death ; the second one was designed to cause fatal damage to the vital organs.
Death was frequently caused by विद्युत overstimulation of the heart.
Although in the United States the electric chair has become a प्रतीक of the मौत दंड, इसके उपयोग is in decline due to the rise of lethal injection, which is widely believed to be a more humane method of execution.
Although some states still maintain electrocution as a method of execution, today it is only maintained as a secondary method that may be chosen over lethal इंजेक्शन at the request of the prisoner.
As of 2010, electrocution is an optional form of execution in Alabama, Florida, South कैरोलिना और Virginia.
They allow the prisoner to choose lethal injection as an वैकल्पिक method.
In the states of Kentucky and Tennessee, the electric chair has been retired मगर लिये those जिनकी पूंजी अपराधों यहूद वचनबद्ध prior to legislated dates in 1998 ( Kentucky : March 31, 1998 ; Tennessee : December 31, 1998 ) and who chose electrocution.
In both states, inmates who do not चुनें electrocution or inmates who committed their crimes after the designated date are killed by lethal injection.
The electric chair is an alternate form of execution approved लिये संभावित उपयोग in अरकंसास and Oklahoma if other forms of execution are found unconstitutional in the state at the time of execution.
It is the sole method of execution in Vermont, where देशद्रोह is the only capital crime.
On February 8, 2008, the Nebraska Supreme Court determined that execution by इलेक्ट्रिक कुर्सी was a `` cruel and unusual punishment '' under the state 's constitution.
This brought executions of this type to an end in Nebraska, the only remaining state to retain electrocution as its sole method of execution for murder.
The Maryland House of Delegates is the lower house of the General Assembly, the राज्य विधानमंडल of the American State of Maryland, and is composed of 141 Delegates elected from 47 districts.
The House of Delegates Chamber is located in the Maryland State House ( state capitol ) on State Circle in annapolis, जिससे is the state capital.
The State House also houses the Maryland State सीनेट कक्ष और the offices of the Governor and Lieutenant Governor of the State of Maryland.
Each Delegate has offices in Annapolis, in the nearby Casper R. Taylor, Jr. House दफ्तर Building.
The Liberation of Paris ( also known as the Battle for Paris ) took place during World War II from 19 August 1944 until the surrender of the occupying जर्मनी गैरीसन on 25 August.
The Liberation of Paris प्रारंभ साथ an uprising by the French Resistance against the German garrison.
On 24 August, the फ्रेंच शक्तियां of the आंतरिक ( शक्तियां françaises de l'intérieur, FFI ) received reinforcements from the Free French Army of Liberation and from the U.S. Third Army under General Patton.
The capital region of France had been governed by Nazi Germany since the signing of the Second Compiègne Armistice in June 1940, जब the German Army occupied northern and westernmost France, and when the puppet regime of Vichy France was established in the town of Vichy in central France.
This battle marked the liberation of Paris and the exile of the Vichy सरकारी to Sigmaringen in Germany.
However, there was still much heavy fighting to be done before France was liberated, including the campaign in southern France during August-September ( in Provence and extending into the southwestern प्रदेश of the vosges kyu ), साथ the german-held seaports of पश्चिमी फ़्रांस ( ऐसे as at Brest and Dunkirk ), in Alsace and Lorraine in eastern France, and in northeastern France, such as along the Rhine and Moder Rivers.
The German Army and SS लड़ा doggedly in these areas for the remainder of 1944 and into 1945.
`` Feelin ' Alright ? '' also known as `` Feeling Alright '' is a song written by Dave मेसन of the अंग्रेज़ी चट्टान बैंड ट्रैफ़िक इससे their eponymous 1968 album, Traffic.
The song was also a hit single for several performers : Joe Cocker ( 1969, # 69, recharted in 1972, us # 33 ), mongo santamaría ( 1969, # 95 ) and Grand Funk Railroad ( 1971, US # 54 ).
It has also been recorded by Three Dog Night ( 1969 ), The 5th Dimension ( 1970 ), Lou Rawls, Freddie King, Paul Weller, Lulu, Chairmen of the Board ( 1970 ), Rare धरती, the इलेक्ट्रिक अवधारणा ऑर्केस्ट्रा, माँ 's finest ( 1973 ), the ओहियो Players ( 1971 ), Diana Ross with the Jackson 5 ( 1971 ), Maceo Parker, Gladys Knight & the Pips, Widespread Panic and The Black Crowes.
A Steel Drum version by Trinidad Oil Company was reissued on the dancefloor jazz compilation Blue Juice 2.
It was also featured in the 2000 फिल्मी duets, सुंग by Huey Lewis.
Both the original and the जो Cocker cover were featured in the movie Flight, starring Denzel Washington.
Devon Werkheiser ( born कूच 8,1991 ) is an अमरीकी actor, voice actor, singer, songwriter and musician, best known for his starring role as Ned Bigby on the Nickelodeon sitcom Ned 's Declassified School Survival Guide and for his role in the 2007 TV Movie Shredderman Rules, as the lead character Nolan Byrd.

Sample view of an इलेक्ट्रॉनिक health record based on images
Sample view of an इलेक्ट्रॉनिक health record
An electronic health record ( EHR ) is an evolving concept defined as a systematic collection of इलेक्ट्रॉनिक स्वास्थ्य सूचना परिचय व्यक्तिगत मरीजों or populations.
It is a record in डिजिटल स्वरूप कि is theoretically capable of being shared across different health care settings.
In some cases this sharing can occur by way of network-connected enterprise-wide information systems and other information networks or exchanges.
EHRs may include a range of data, including demographics, medical history, medication and allergies, immunization status, laboratory test results, radiology images, vital signs, personal stats जैसे आयु और वज़न, और बिलिंग सूचना.
Loan origination is the process by जिससे a borrower applies लिये a new loan, and a lender processes that application.
Origination generally includes all the steps from taking a loan application up to disbursal of funds ( or घटती the application ).
Loan servicing covers सबकुछ बाद disbursing the funds until the loan is fully paid off.
Loan origination is a specialized version of new account opening for वित्तीय सेवाएं संगठन.
Certain people and organizations specialize in ऋण origination.
Mortgage brokers और अन्य बंधक originator companies serve as a prominent example.
There हैं अनेक अलग types of loans.
For more information on loan types, see the loan and उपभोक्ता lending articles.
Steps involved in originating a loan vary by loan type, various kinds of loan risk, regulator, lender नीति, और अन्य कारकों.
Top left : The Tennessee Valley Authority, part of the नई सौदे, being signed into law in 1933.
Top right : Franklin Delano रूज़वेल्ट, जो थी responsible for initiatives and programs collectively known as the New Deal.
Bottom : A public mural from one of the कलाकारों employed by the New Deal.
The New Deal was a series of economic programs enacted in the United States between 1933 and 1936.
They involved presidential executive orders or laws passed by Congress दौरान the पहला पद of President Franklin D. Roosevelt.
The कार्यक्रम यहूद in response to the Great Depression, and focused on what historians call the `` 3 Rs '' : Relief, Recovery, and Reform.
That is Relief for the unemployed and poor ; Recovery of the economy to normal levels ; and सुधार of the वित्तीय system to prevent a repeat depression.
The New Deal produced a political realignment, making the Democratic Party the majority ( as well as the party that held the White House for seven out of nine Presidential terms from 1933 to 1969 ), with its base in liberal विचार, the श्वेत दक्षिण, परंपरागत Democrats, big city machines, and the newly empowered labor unions and ethnic minorities.
The Republicans were विभाजित, साथ conservatives opposing the entire New Deal as an enemy of business and growth, and liberals accepting some of it and promising to make it more efficient.
The realignment crystallized into the New Deal Coalition that dominated most presidential चुनावों into the 1960s, while the opposition Conservative Coalition largely controlled Congress from 1937 to 1963.
By 1936 the term `` liberal '' typically was used for supporters of the नई सौदे, and `` conservative `` for its opponents.
From 1934 to 1938, Roosevelt was assisted in his endeavours by a “pro-spender” majority in Congress ( drawn from two-party, competitive, non-machine, Progressive, और बाएँ party districts ).
As noted by Alexander Hicks, “Roosevelt, backed by rare, non-Southern Democrat majorities — 270 non-Southern Democrat representatives and 71 non-Southern Democrat सीनेटरों — spelled Second New Deal reform.”
Many historians distinguish between a `` First New Deal '' ( 1933–34 ) and a `` Second New Deal '' ( 1935–38 ), साथ the दूसरी one more liberal and more controversial.
the `` पहला नई सौदे '' ( 1933–34 ) dealt साथ विविध समूह, इससे बैंकिंग और railroads to उद्योग और खेती, सब of जिससे मांगे सहायता लिये आर्थिक अस्तित्व.
the संघीय आपात राहत प्रशासन, लिये उदाहरण, provided $ 500 लाख लिये राहत परिचालन by राज्य और शहरों, जबकि the short-lived cwa ( सिविल works प्रशासन ) दिया बस्तियों धन to operate make-work प्रोजेक्ट in 1933-34.
The `` Second New Deal `` in 1935–38 included the Wagner Act to promote labor unions, the Works प्रगति प्रशासन ( wpa ) राहत कार्यक्रम ( which made the federal government by far the largest single employer in the nation ), the Social Security Act, and new programs to aid tenant farmers and migrant workers.
The final major items of New Deal legislation were the creation of the United States Housing Authority and Farm Security Administration, both in 1937, and the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938, which set maximum hours and minimum wages for most categories of workers.
The economic downturn of 1937–38, and the bitter split between the AFL and CIO labor unions led to major Republican gains in कॉंग्रेस in 1938.
Conservative Republicans और डेमोक्रेट in कॉंग्रेस joined in the informal Conservative Coalition.
By 1942–43 they shut down relief programs such as the WPA and CCC and blocked major liberal proposals.
Roosevelt खुद turned his attention to the war effort, and won reelection in 1940 and 1944.
The Supreme Court declared the National Recovery Administration ( NRA ) and the first version of the Agricultural Adjustment Act ( AAA ) असंवैधानिक, however the aaa थी rewritten and then upheld.
As the first Republican president elected after FDR, Dwight D. Eisenhower ( 1953–61 ) left the New Deal largely intact, even expanding it in some areas.
In the 1960s, Lyndon B. Johnson 's Great Society used the New Deal as inspiration for a dramatic expansion of liberal programs, which Republican Richard M. Nixon generally retained.
After 1974, however, the call for deregulation of the economy gained bipartisan support.
The New Deal regulation of banking ( glass–steagall अधिनियम ) was suspended in the 1990s.
Many New Deal programs remain क्रियाशील, साथ कुछ स्टिल ऑपरेटिंग अंतर्गत the असली names, सहित the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation ( FDIC ), the Federal Crop Insurance Corporation ( FCIC ), the Federal Housing Administration ( FHA ), and the Tennessee Valley Authority ( TVA ).
The largest कार्यक्रम still in existence today are the Social Security System and the Securities and Exchange Commission ( SEC ).
A woman ( ), pl : women ( ) is a मादा इंसान.
The term woman is usually reserved for an adult, with the term girl होने the usual पद लिये a मादा child or adolescent.
However, the term woman is भी sometimes used to identify a female human, regardless of age, as in phrases such as `` Women 's rights ``.
Women are typically capable of giving birth, though older women who have gone through menopause and some intersex महिलाओं can not.
`` I Do n't want to मिस a बात '' is a song performed by American rock band Aerosmith for the 1998 film Armageddon.
Written by Diane Warren, the song debuted at number one on the Billboard Hot 100 ( the first # 1 for the band after 28 years together ).
The song stayed at number one लिये चार weeks from September 5 to September 26, 1998.
The song also ठहरे at क्रमांक 1 for several weeks in several other countries.
In the UK, the song peaked at number four, becoming Aerosmith 's उच्चतम charting सोंग in the uk, जहाँ it थी the 17th best-selling single of 1998, and has sold over a million copies.
Although not used by the majority of the संसार 's countries, daylight saving time is common in the Western world.
Daylight saving time ( DST ) —also summer time in British English — is the अभ्यास of advancing घड़ियाँ दौरान the lighter months so that evenings have more daylight and mornings have less.
Typically clocks are adjusted forward one hour near the start of spring and are adjusted पिछड़ा in autumn.
The modern idea of daylight छायांकन थी पहला proposed in 1895 by George Vernon Hudson and it was first implemented during the First World War.
Many countries have used it at various times since तब.
Much of the United States used DST in the 1950s and 1960s, and DST use expanded following the 1970s energy crisis and has been widely used in North America and Europe since then.
The practice has been दोनो praised and criticized.
Adding daylight to evenings benefits retailing, sports, and other activities that exploit sunlight बाद working घंटों, but can cause problems for evening entertainment and other occupations tied to the sun.
Although an early goal of DST was to reduce evening usage of incandescent lighting ( formerly a primary use of विद्युत ), आधुनिक हीटिंग और कूलिंग उपयोग पैटर्न differ greatly, and research about how DST currently affects energy use is limited or contradictory.
DST clock shifts present अन्य चुनौतियां.
They complicate timekeeping, and can disrupt बैठक, सफर, बिलिंग, record keeping, medical devices, heavy equipment, and sleep patterns.
Software can often adjust computer clocks automatically, but this can be limited and error-prone, particularly when DST dates are changed.

Montargis is a कम्यून in the Loiret department in north-central France on the Loing river.
The कस्बा is स्तिथ परिचय दक्षिण of Paris and east of Orléans in the Gâtinais.
Montargis is the second largest city in the loiret, बाद orléans.
It is near a विशाल वन, and contains light industry and farming, including saffron.
Due to its numerous canals and bridges, montargis sometimes bills itself as the `` Venice of the Gâtinais. ''
Though quite modern, it retains a medieval charm in its downtown area.
In computer storage, a logical unit number, or LUN, is a number used to identify a logical unit, which is a device addressed by the scsi प्रोटोकॉल or protocols which encapsulate SCSI, such as Fibre Channel or iSCSI.
A LUN may be used with any device which supports read/write operations, such as a tape drive, but is सबसे प्रायः प्रयुक्त to refer to a logical disk as created on a SAN.
Though not technically correct, the term `` LUN '' is प्रायः भी प्रयुक्त to refer to the logical disk itself.
The Gospel According to Mark (,, to euangelion kata Markon ), commonly shortened to the Gospel of चिह्नित or बस चिह्नित, is the दूसरी book of the New Testament.
इस canonical account of the life of Jesus of Nazareth is one of the three synoptic gospels.
It was thought to be an epitome, which accounts for its place as the second gospel in the Bible.
However, most contemporary विद्वानों अभी लिहाज़ it as the earliest of the canonical gospels ( c 70 ).
That Mark was used as a सोर्स लिये the अन्य synoptic gospels इन्जील of Matthew and Gospel of Luke is widely held by many, although not all, New Testament scholars.
the इन्जील of चिह्नित narrates the मंत्रालय of यीशु इससे उसके बपतिस्मा by जॉन the बैपटिस्ट to उसके मौत और क़यामत.
It focuses particularly on the last week of his life ( अध्याय 11–16 ) in Jerusalem.
Its swift कथा portrays यीशु as a वीर man of action, an exorcist, healer and miracle worker.
an महत्वपूर्ण theme of Mark is the Messianic Secret.
Jesus silences the demoniacs he heals, tries unsuccessfully to keep his messianic identity secret, and conceals his message with parables.
meanwhile, the शिष्यों असफल to समझे दोनो the implication of the miracles of Jesus and the meaning of the things he predicts about his arrest, death and resurrection.
Most scholars believe that the original text of the gospel ends at Mark 16:8 with the discovery of Jesus ' empty tomb and that the following account of उसके क़यामत दिखावे is a later addition.
According to tradition and some early church writers, the author is Mark the Evangelist, the साथी of the apostle Peter.
The gospel, however, appears to rely on several underlying sources, varying in form and in theology, which tells विरूद्ध the परंपरा कि the इन्जील थी based on Peter 's preaching.
The text is a compilation which may include eye-witness accounts as खूब as ज्ञात अपोस्टोलिक preachings, और pre-existing written records that do not exist today but can be confirmed from 2nd-century commentators.
Some of the stories in the gospel may have been transmitted orally पहले होने written down.
Various elements within the gospel suggest that the author wrote in Syria or फिलिस्तीन लिये a non-jewish Christian community.
The Lord of the Rings is an एपिक ऊँची काल्पनिक अनोखा written by English philologist and University of Oxford professor J. R. R. Tolkien.
The story began as a sequel to tolkien 's 1937 children 's fantasy novel The Hobbit, but eventually developed into a much larger work.
It थी written in stages between 1937 and 1949, much of it during World War II.
It is the दूसरी best-selling novel ever written, with over 150 million copies sold.
The title of the novel refers to the story 's main antagonist, the Dark Lord Sauron, who had in an पहले आयु निर्मित the One Ring to rule the other Rings of Power as the ultimate weapon in his campaign to conquer and rule all of Middle-earth.
इससे शांत beginnings in the शायर, a होब्बिट जमीन नहीं नापसंद the अंग्रेज़ी countryside, the story ranges across north-west Middle-earth, following the course of the War of the Ring through the eyes of its characters, notably the hobbits Frodo Baggins, Samwise `` Sam '' Gamgee, Meriadoc `` Merry '' Brandybuck and Peregrin `` Pippin '' Took, but also the hobbits ' chief allies and travelling companions : Aragorn, a Human Ranger ; Boromir, a man from Gondor ; Gimli, a Dwarf warrior ; Legolas, an Elven prince ; and Gandalf, a Wizard.
The work was initially intended by Tolkien to be one volume of a two-volume set, with the other being The Silmarillion, but this idea was dismissed by his publisher.
It was decided for economic reasons to publish The Lord of the Rings as three volumes over the कोर्स of a साल इससे 29 जुलाई 1954 to 20 अक्तूबर 1955, thus creating the now familiar Lord of the Rings trilogy.
The three volumes were entitled The Fellowship of the रिंग, the दो मीनारें, and The Return of the King.
Structurally, the novel is divided internally into six books, two per volume, with several appendices of background सामग्री शामिल at the समाप्त of the third volume.
The Lord of the Rings रै चूंकि been reprinted numerous times and translated into many languages.
Tolkien 's work has been the विषय of extensive analysis of its themes and origins.
Although a major work in itself, the story was only the last movement of a larger epic Tolkien था worked on since 1917, in a process he described as mythopoeia.
Influences on this earlier work, and on the story of The Lord of the बजती, include philology, mythology, religion and the author 's distaste for the effects of industrialization, as well as earlier fantasy works and Tolkien 's experiences in World War I.
The Lord of the Rings in its turn is considered to have had a great effect on modern fantasy ; the impact of Tolkien 's works is such that the use of the words `` Tolkienian '' and `` tolkienesque '' have महरूम recorded in the Oxford English Dictionary.
The enduring popularity of The Lord of the बजती रै led to numerous सन्दर्भ in लोकप्रिय culture, the founding of many societies by fans of Tolkien 's works, and the publication of many books about Tolkien and his works.
The Lord of the Rings has inspired, and continues to inspire, कलाकृति, music, films and television, video games, and subsequent literature.
Award-winning adaptations of The रब of the बजती have been made for radio, theatre, and film.
