The series debuted on January 11, 2004.
A TV film Merry Christmas, ड्रेक & जोश was made apart from the regular series on December 5, 2008.
There are a total of 60 episodes were produced spanning चार seasons.
Drake Bell, Josh Peck, and मिरांडा Cosgrove were the only actors to appear in all 60 episodes.
The San Francisco 49ers conduct training camp at the team 's headquarters और अभ्यास सुविधा in सांता क्लारा, California in August 2010.
The offense is wearing red jerseys with the exception of quarterback Alex Smith, who is in a ब्लैक जर्सी ; the defense in white.
In the National Football League, training camp refers to the समय पहले the ऋतु commences.
During this time, teams will sometimes congregate at an outside location, usually a university, to conduct प्रशिक्षण शिविर लिये at तनिक the first few weeks.
This is similar to बेसबॉल 's spring training.
Training camp is used in several अलग तरीके.
New players and coaches use it to acclimate themselves to नई teammates and systems.
For younger players, it serves as a period of evaluation ; for दिग्गजों, it is समय to round back into form.
Training camp is विभाजित into several different components.
The first is scrimmages.
These हैं pseudo-games where teams run nearly full games ' worth of plays.
sometimes, दो practice sessions are held on the same day.
This concept is referred to as two-a-days.
Other parts of प्रशिक्षण शिविर शामिल drills, बैठक साथ कोच and other players at one 's position, weight training, and pre-season games.
The latter half of training camp leads सीधे into the exhibition season.
With NFL training camps starting in late-july, the biggest concern has been dehydration.
In 2001, मिनेसोटा Vikings player Korey Stringer died of a medical condition based from dehydration and heatstroke.
The death of Stringer prompted the एनएफएल to change their training policies.
At each practice, every team must have the टोली डॉक्टर और प्रशिक्षकों on the field ; additionally, an ambulance must be present during practices.
With NFL training camps beginning in late July, severe weather can affect अभ्यास और प्रदर्शनी games.
In 2002, a Cleveland Browns exhibition game ended due to lightning near Cleveland भूरा Stadium, and severe storms have been known to disrupt training camps.
Fans are often समर्थ to विज़िट उनके पसंदीदा team 's training camp to catch an early look at the players ; admission to practices is often free or substantially less expensive than a game ticket, making training camp trips a popular option for fans who can not attend many games due to financial or other reasons.
NFL teams often sell souvenirs and concessions at camp sites along with offering activities and events to make training camp a more fan-friendly experience.
In computing, a file system ( or filesystem ) is a type of data store which can be used to store, retrieve and update a नियत of files.
The पद could refer to the अमूर्त आंकड़ा structures प्रयुक्त to define फाइलें, or to the वास्तविक तन्त्र or फर्मवेयर components कि implement the अमूर्त विचार.
Some file systems are used on local data storage devices ; others provide file access via a network protocol ( e.g. NFS, smb, or 9p clients ).
Some file systems are `` virtual '', in that the `` files '' supplied are computed on request ( e.g. procfs ) or are merely a mapping into a different file system used as a backing store.
The file system manages access to both the content of files and the metadata about those फाइलें.
It is जिम्मेदार लिये arranging storage space ; reliability, efficiency, and tuning with regard to the physical storage medium are important design considerations.
William Howard Taft ( September 15, 1857 – March 8, 1930 ) was the 27th President of the United States ( 1909–1913 ) and later the tenth Chief इंसाफ of the संयुक्त राज्य ( 1921–1930 ).
He is the only person to have served in both of these offices.
पहले बनने अध्यक्ष, Taft, a Republican, was selected to serve on the Superior Court of Cincinnati in 1887.
In 1890, Taft was appointed Solicitor General of the United States and in 1891 a judge on the United States Court of Appeals for the Sixth सर्किट.
In 1900, President William McKinley appointed Taft governor-general of the फिलीपीन.
in 1904, अध्यक्ष थियोडोर Roosevelt appointed Taft Secretary of War in an effort to groom Taft, then his close political ally, into his handpicked presidential successor.
Taft assumed a prominent role in problem solving, assuming on some occasions the role of acting Secretary of State, while declining repeated offers from Roosevelt to serve on the Supreme Court.
Riding a wave of popular support for fellow Republican Roosevelt, Taft won an easy victory in his 1908 bid लिये the प्रेसिडेंसी.
In his only term, Taft 's domestic agenda emphasized trust-busting, civil service reform, strengthening the Interstate Commerce Commission, improving the performance of the postal service, and passage of the Sixteenth Amendment.
Abroad, Taft sought to further the economic development of nations in Latin America and Asia through `` डालर कूटनीति ``, और दिखाया decisiveness and restraint in response to revolution in Mexico.
The task-oriented Taft was oblivious to the राजनैतिक ramifications of उसके निर्णय, often alienated his own key constituencies, and was overwhelmingly defeated in his bid for a second term in the presidential election of 1912.
in सर्वेक्षण of presidential scholars, Taft is usually ranked near the middle of lists of all American Presidents.
बाद leaving दफ्तर, Taft spent his time in academia, arbitration, and the search for world peace through his self-founded League to Enforce Peace.
in 1921, बाद the पहला संसार युद्ध, अध्यक्ष वारेन G. हार्डिंग नियुक्त taft मुख्य इंसाफ of the संयुक्त States.
Taft served in this क्षमता जबतक shortly before his death in 1930.
The Ten Commandments is a 1956 epic film produced and directed by Cecil B. DeMille that dramatized the biblical story of the Exodus, in which the Hebrew-born Moses, an adopted Egyptian prince, becomes the deliverer of the Hebrew slaves.
It starred Charlton Heston in the lead role, Yul Brynner as his adoptive brother, Pharaoh Rameses II, Anne Baxter as Nefretiri, Edward G. Robinson as Dathan, Yvonne De Carlo as Sephora, डेबरा पेजेट as lilia, और जॉन Derek as Joshua.
The supporting cast includes Sir Cedric Hardwicke as Pharaoh Seti I, नीना foch as bithiah, मार्था Scott as Yoshebel, Judith Anderson as Memnet, Vincent Price as Baka, and John Carradine as Aaron.
The film was released by सर्वोपरि तस्वीरें in VistaVision on October 5, 1956.
The Ten Commandments, जिससे demille narrated, was the last film that he directed.
he थी नियत to सीधा the 1958 remake of his 1938 film The Buccaneer, but his final illness forced him to relinquish the directing chores to his son-in-law, actor Anthony Quinn.
DeMille had also planned to film the life of Lord Baden Powell, the founder of the Scout गति, साथ दाउद niven ; इस project was never realized.
The Ten Commandments is a आंशिक remake of DeMille 's 1923 silent film.
Some of the cast and crew of the 1956 version worked on the original.
It has since been remade as a television miniseries broadcast in April 2006.
The Ten Commandments is one of the most financially successful films ever made, grossing over $ 65 लाख at the u.S. बक्सा office.
adjusting लिये महंगाई, इस makes it the छठे highest-grossing फिल्मी domestically, साथ an समायोजित कुल of $ 1,025,730,000 in 2012.
The box office website `` The Numbers '' सूचियाँ the घरेलू gross at $ 80 million.
In 1999, The Ten Commandments was selected for preservation in the United States National Film Registry by the Library of Congress as being `` culturally, historically, or aesthetically significant ''.
In June 2008, the American Film Institute revealed its `` Ten Top Ten `` —the best ten films in ten American film genres—after polling over 1,500 लोगों इससे the रचनात्मक community.
The Ten Commandments थी सूचीबद्ध as the tenth best film in the epic genre.
The film received seven Academy Award nominations including Best Picture, और जीती the अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये Best Visual Effects.
Charlton Heston was nominated for a Golden Globe Award for Best Motion Picture कर्ता in the नाटक श्रेणी.
Yul Brynner won the National Board of Review Award for Best Actor for his role as Rameses, along with his other roles in the किंग और I and Anastasia.
Louisville (, or ) is a major city and the largest city in the U.S. state of Kentucky and the county सीट of Jefferson County.
Since 2003, the city 's borders have been with those of the county because of a city-county merger.
The city 's total consolidated population at the 2010 census was 741,096 ( louisville 's संतुलन कुल, 602,011, excludes semi-autonomous towns and is the population listed in most sources and national rankings ).
As of 2010, the Louisville metropolitan area ( MSA ) had a जनसांख्यिकी of 1,307,647 ranking 42nd nationally.
The metro area includes Louisville-Jefferson County and 12 surrounding counties, eight in केंटकी और चार in दक्षिणी Indiana ( see Geography below ).
The Louisville Combined Statistical Area, having a population of 1,451,564, includes the MSA, Hardin काउंटी और larue काउंटी in केंटकी, and Scott County, Indiana.
An important internal shipping port in the 19th century, louisville आज is best known as the location of the Kentucky Derby, the first of three annual thoroughbred horse races making up the Triple Crown.
A typical प्रायोगिक setup for an aldol reaction.
Both flasks are submerged in a dry ice/acetone cooling bath ( −78 °C ) the तापमान of जिससे is being monitored by a thermocouple ( the wire on the left ).
A cooling bath, in laboratory chemistry ( often but not always organic chemistry ) practice, is a liquid mixture which is used to maintain low temperatures, typically between 13 °C and −196 °C.
ये कम temperatures हैं प्रयुक्त to collect liquids after distillation, to remove solvents using a rotary evaporator, or to perform a chemical reaction below room temperature ( see : kinetic control ).
Cooling baths are generally one of two types : ( a ) a cold fluid ( particularly liquid nitrogen, water, or भी एयर ) — लकिन सबसे commonly the term refers to ( b ) a mixture of 3 components : ( 1 ) a cooling agent ( such as dry ice or water ice ) ; ( b ) a liquid 'carrier ' ( such as liquid water, ethylene glycol, acetone, etc. ), which transfers heat between the bath and the vessel ; ; and ( c ) an additive to depress the melting-point of the solid/liquid system.
( A familiar उदाहरण of इस is the उपयोग of an ice/rock-salt mixture to freeze ice cream.
the phase-change of बर्फ into द्रव जल requires उर्जा, 'pulling ' ऊष्मा इससे the प्रणाली.
adding नमक lowers the अस्थायी at जिससे इस happens, meaning more energy has to be absorbed from the environment in order to melt the ice.
This effectively makes the ice 'colder ' — it must 'pull ' more heat from its पर्यावरण to become liquid. )
Eating disorders are conditions defined by abnormal eating habits that may involve either insufficient or excessive food intake to the detriment of an individual 's physical and mental health.
Bulimia nervosa and anorexia nervosa are the सबसे आम विशिष्ट forms in the United Kingdom.
Other types of eating disorders include binge eating disorder और खाने विकार नहीं otherwise specified.
bulimia नर्वोज़ा is a disorder characterized by binge eating and purging.
Purging can include self-induce उल्टी, over-exercising, and the usage of diuretics, enemas, and laxatives.
Anorexia nervosa is characterized by extreme food restriction to the point of self-starvation and excessive weight loss.
Though primarily thought of as affecting females ( an estimated 5–10 million being affected in the U.K. ), eating disorders affect males as well.
An estimated 10 – 15 % of लोगों साथ खाने विकार are males ( Gorgan, 1999 ).
( an अनुमानित 1 million U.K. males being affected ).
Although eating disorders are increasing all over the world among both men and women, there is evidence to सुझाएँ कि it is महिलाओं in the Western world who are at the highest risk of developing them and the degree of westernization increases the risk.
Nearly half of all Americans personally जान किसी with an eating disorder.
The skill to comprehend the central processes of appetite has increased tremendously चूंकि लेप्टिन थी खोजा, and the skill to observe the functions of the brain as well.
Interactions between motivational, homeostatic and self-regulatory कंट्रोल प्रक्रियाओं हैं शामिल in eating behaviour, which is a key component in eating disorders.
The precise cause of eating disorders is not entirely understood, but there is evidence कि it may be linked to other medical conditions and situations.
Cultural idealization of thinness and youthfulness have contributed to eating disorders affecting diverse populations.
One study showed that girls with ADHD have a greater chance of getting an खाने disorder than those not affected by ADHD.
Another study suggested कि महिलाओं साथ PTSD, especially due to sexually related trauma, are more likely to develop anorexia nervosa.
One study showed that फोस्टर लड़कियों हैं अधिक likely to develop bulimia nervosa.
Some think that peer दबाव और idealized body-types seen in the media are also a significant factor.
Some research show that for certain people there are genetic reasons why they may be prone to विकासशील an खाने disorder.
Recent studies have मिला प्रमाण a सहसंबंध between patients with bulimia nervosa and substance use disorders.
In addition, anxiety disorders and personality disorders हैं आम आवृत्ति with clients of eating disorders.
While proper treatment can be highly प्रभावी लिये अनेक कष्ट इससे विशिष्ट प्रकार of खाने विकार, the consequences of eating disorders can be severe, including death ( whether from direct medical effects of disturbed eating habits or from comorbid conditions such as suicidal thinking ).
Slavery in the United States existed from the early years of the colonial period ; it was firmly established by the time the United States sought स्वतंत्रता from Great Britain in 1776.
However, by 1804, सब राज्य उत्तर of the मेसन और डिक्सन लकीर था either abolished गुलामी outright or passed कानून लिये the क्रमिक abolition of गुलामी.
In 1787 Congress prohibited slavery in the उत्तरपश्चिम Territory.
But गुलामी gained new life in the South with the cotton industry after 1800, and expanded into the Southwest.
The nation was polarized into स्लेव और फ़्री states along the Mason-Dixon Line, which separated Pennsylvania and Maryland.
The United States and Great Britain both prohibited the international slave trade in 1808, but the domestic trade, with sales to the Deep South, expanded dramatically, and many captives were shipped by the coastwise slave trade.
Before the 1840s, the South was vigorously defending slavery and its expansion into the territories.
In the North some abolitionists denounced it as sinful, and numerous anti-slavery forces rejected it as detrimental to the rights of free men.
After failed compromises and अब्राहम lincoln 's चुनाव, in 1861 ग्यारह स्लेव राज्य broke away to form the Confederate States of America, leading to the American Civil War.
The federal government in 1862 made abolition of गुलामी a युद्ध goal.
In January 1863 अध्यक्ष lincoln freed slaves in the Confederacy through the Emancipation Proclamation.
After the war, the Thirteenth Amendment, effective December 1865, abolished slavery throughout the entire United States, including the Border states and the Indian territories.
From the 16th to the 19th centuries, an estimated 12 लाख Africans were shipped as slaves to the Americas.
See Slavery in the Americas.
The great majority went to the sugar plantations of the वेस्ट इंडीज or Brazil, where mortality was high.
About 645,000 were brought to what is now the United राज्य.
By the 1860 United States Census, the slave population in the American South था grown to four million.
Of all 1,515,605 families in the 15 slave states, nearly 400,000 held slaves ( roughly one in four ), amounting to 8 % of सब अमरीकी families.
जबकि कुछ स्लेव worked as हाउस बन्दों and urban artisans, the great majority worked on plantations or large farms, cultivating lucrative cash crops, such as rice, tobacco, sugar and, after 1800, chiefly cotton.
By 1860 most slaves were held in the Deep South, where they served in work-gangs ; two-thirds worked in cotton.
In small operations, they worked साथ उनके owners.
In large plantations they were directed by श्वेत paid overseers.
Under the system that became chattel slavery ( ownership of a human being, and of his/her descendants ), a racial element was fundamental : slaves were blacks of African descent and owned, almost universally, by whites of European descent.
In the 17th century, Virginia, followed by other southern colonies, enacted विधि that children of slave mothers were born into slavery.
Slaves could gain freedom only by running away ( which was difficult and illegal to do ), or by manumission by owners, which was regulated by राज्य, और became increasingly मुश्किल or prohibited.
In the earliest era of chattel slavery, the colonies also व्यवस्थित work by a system of bonded labor known as indentured servitude.
This typically lasted for several years for both poor Europeans and Africans alike, to pay off the costs of transport to the colonies.
They contracted for such arrangements because of poor economies in their home countries.
Between 1680 and 1700, as fewer Europeans migrated to the colonies, planters began to आयात more Africans as slaves.
Recognizing the importance of slavery, the House of Burgesses in Virginia enacted a new slave code in 1705 ; it combined a किस्में of विधान और added नई प्रावधानों enforcing श्वेत सर्वोच्चता in the law.
Schematic cross section of part of leaf, xylem shown as red circles at figure 8.
Xylem is one of the two types of transport tissue in vascular plants ( phloem is the अन्य ).
The word xylem is derived from the Greek word ξύλον ( xylon ), meaning `` wood '' ; the best-known जाइलम ऊतक is wood, though it is found throughout the plant.
Its basic function is to transport water, but it also transports some nutrients through the plant.
This clock representation shows कुछ of the major units of geological time and definitive events of Earth history.
The Hadean eon represents the time before fossil record of life on Earth ; its upper boundary is अभी regarded as 4.0 Ga ( billion years ago ).
Other subdivisions reflect the evolution of life ; the Archean and proterozoic are both eons, the Palaeozoic, Mesozoic and Cenozoic are eras of the Phanerozoic eon.
The two million year Quaternary period, the time of recognizable humans, is too small to be visible at इस scale.
The geologic time scale is a system of chronological measurement that relates stratigraphy to time, and is used by geologists, paleontologists, and other earth scientists to describe the timing और संबंध between कार्यक्रम कि have occurred throughout Earth 's history.
The table of geologic time spans presented here agrees with the dates and nomenclature set forth by the International आयोग on स्तरिकी मानक रंग कोड of the International Commission on Stratigraphy.
Evidence from radiometric dating indicates कि the Earth is about 4.54 billion years old.
The geology or deep time of धरती 's पास्ट रै been organized into various units according to events which took place in each period.
Different spans of time on the GTS are usually delimited by changes in the composition of strata which correspond to them, indicating प्रमुख geological or paleontological events, such as mass extinctions.
For example, the boundary between the Cretaceous period and the Paleogene period is defined by the Cretaceous–Paleogene extinction event, जिससे चिह्नित the निधन of the dinosaurs and many other groups of life.
Older time spans which predate the reliable fossil record ( before the Proterozoic Eon ) are defined by absolute age.
The TI-82 is a graphing परिपथ बना by Texas Instruments.
The TI-82 was designed in 1993 as a stripped down, more user friendly version of the ti-85, और as a replacement for the TI-81.
It was the direct predecessor of the ti-83.
It shares with the TI-85 a 6 mhz zilog Z80 microprocessor.
Like the TI-81, the TI-82 features a 96x64 pixel display, and the core feature set of the TI-81 with many new features.
the cast of characters of The King of Fighters XI.
The King of Fighters fighting game series, उत्पादित by snk playmore, शामिल a चौड़ी cast of characters, some of which are taken from other SNK games.
The story takes place in a fictional universe in which an annual series of 3-on-3 or 4-on-4 fighting tournaments are held.
The first game in the series introduces the initial main character of the series, Kyo Kusanagi, a young Japanese सेनानी जो is the heir to a powerful group of martial artists having pyrokinetic abilities.
Kyo fights against the Kusanagi गोत्र 's दुश्मनों, उसके rival Iori Yagami, and the god Orochi and its human followers, among others.
The first four games in the series revolve about these fights, while The King of Fighters '99 introduces a new story arc, revolving around K ', a young man who seeks to destroy the रहस्यमय nests संगठन because they kidnapped him at an early age and stripped him of his past memories, so that they could force him to be a fighter under their control.
In The King of Fighters 2003, a new character named Ash Crimson enters the tournament, to चोरी the शक्तियां of the clans जो sealed the Orochi in the past for an unknown reason.
A new group of antagonists, known as Those From the Past, also appears in the series ; वे want to obtain Orochi 's power for the purpose of giving it to their unknown master.
The plot and the characters came इससे the Yamata no Orochi legend.
There are also several characters in the games that are parodies or homages to several popular anime, manga, और films.
Merchandise based on the characters has also been released, सहित कार्रवाई figures and keychains.
The characters have garnered praise from several video game publications for the quality of their designs and movesets.
Comments focused on the lack of improvements in some of the characters, but added that the roster is greatly diverse.
Whale Wars is a weekly American documentary-style reality television series that premiered on November 7, 2008 on the Animal Planet केबल चैनल.
The program follows Paul Watson, founder of the Sea Shepherd Conservation Society, as he and the crew aboard their विभिन्न बरतन harass Japanese whalers off the coast of Antarctica.
On January 5, 2013, एनिमल ग्रह renewed the series for a sixth season.
The Harpy Eagle ( Harpia harpyja ) is a Neotropical species of eagle.
It is sometimes known as the American Harpy Eagle to distinguish it from the Papuan Eagle which is sometimes known as the नई गिनी harpy त्रिभुज or Papuan Harpy Eagle.
It is the largest and most powerful raptor found in the americas, and among the largest extant species of eagles in the world.
It usually inhabits tropical lowland rainforests in the upper ( emergent ) canopy layer.
Destruction of its natural habitat has seen it vanish from many parts of its पूर्व दायरा, और it is nearly extirpated in Central America.
biological वर्गीकरण, or scientific classification in biology, is a method of scientific taxonomy used to group and categorize organisms into groups such as genus or species.
These समूह हैं known as taxa ( singular : taxon ).
Modern biological classification has its root in the work of Carolus Linnaeus, who grouped species according to shared शारीरिक characteristics.
These groupings have since been revised to improve consistency with the darwinian principle of आम descent.
With the introduction of the cladistic method in the late 20th century, phylogenetic taxonomy in which organisms are grouped based purely on inferred evolutionary relatedness, ignoring morphological similarity, has become common in some areas of biology.
Molecular phylogenetics, जिससे उपयोग डीएनए sequences as data, has also driven many recent revisions and is likely to continue doing so.
Biological classification belongs to the विज्ञान of biological systematics.
Lennon 's हस्ताक्षर
John Winston Ono Lennon, ( born John Winston Lennon ; 9 October 1940 – 8 December 1980 ) was an English musician, singer and songwriter who rose to worldwide fame as a founder सदस्य of the बीटल्स, एक of the सबसे commercially कामयाब और critically acclaimed acts in the history of popular music.
With Paul McCartney, he formed one of the most celebrated songwriting partnerships of the 20th century.
Born and raised in Liverpool, as a teenager Lennon became involved in the skiffle craze ; उसके पहला बैंड, the quarrymen, evolved into the Beatles in 1960.
As the group disintegrated towards the end of the decade, Lennon embarked on a solo career that produced the critically acclaimed albums John Lennon/Plastic Ono Band and Imagine, and iconic songs ऐसे as `` दे सलाम a मौका `` और `` imagine ``.
After his marriage to Yoko Ono in 1969, he changed his name to जॉन Ono Lennon.
Lennon disengaged himself from the music business in 1975 to devote time to raising his infant son Sean, but re-emerged with Ono in 1980 with the new album Double Fantasy.
He was murdered three weeks after its रिलीज.
Lennon revealed a rebellious nature and acerbic wit in उसके music, writing, drawings, on film and in interviews.
Controversial through his political and peace activism, he moved to New York City in 1971, where his criticism of the Vietnam War resulted in a lengthy attempt by रिचर्ड निक्सन 's प्रशासन to deport him, while some of his songs were adopted as anthems by the anti-war movement.
As of 2012, Lennon 's solo album sales in the United States exceed 14 million units, and as writer, co-writer or performer, he is जिम्मेदार लिये 25 number-one singles on the US Hot 100 chart.
In 2002, a BBC poll on the 100 Greatest Britons voted him eighth, and in 2008, Rolling Stone क्रमित उसे the fifth-greatest singer of all time.
He was posthumously inducted into the songwriters हॉल of कीर्ति in 1987 और into the चट्टान और फेंकें Hall of Fame in 1994.
Statue of Rip van Winkle in Irvington, New York, not far from `` sunnyside ``, the घर of वॉशिंगटन Irving
`` Rip Van Winkle '' is a short story by American author वॉशिंगटन इरविंग प्रकाशित in 1819, as well as the name of the story 's fictional protagonist.
Written जबकि इरविंग was living in Birmingham, England, it was part of a collection entitled The Sketch Book of Geoffrey Crayon.
Although the story is set in New York 's Catskill Mountains, Irving later admitted, `` When I wrote the story, I had never been on the Catskills. ''
Throughout the fifty-five year history of the Grammy Awards, many significant रिकॉर्ड have महरूम नियत.
This page only includes the प्रतिस्पर्धी पुरस्कार won by various artists.
This does not include the various खास पुरस्कार कि हैं प्रस्तुत by the National Academy of Recording Arts and Sciences such as Lifetime Achievement Awards, Trustees Awards, Technical Awards or Legend Awards.
The page however does include other non-performance सम्बन्धित grammys ( known as the Craft & Production Fields ) that may have been presented to the artist ( s ).
Pee-wee Herman is a कॉमिक fictional अक्षर created and portrayed by American comedian Paul Reubens.
He is best known for his two television series और फिल्मी श्रेणी during the 1980s.
the childlike Pee-wee Herman character developed as a stage act that quickly led to an HBO special in 1981.
As the stage performance gained further popularity, Reubens took the character to motion picture with Pee-wee 's Big Adventure in 1985, toning down the वयस्क innuendo लिये the अपील of children.
This paved the way for Pee-wee 's Playhouse, an एमी पुरस्कार जीतना children 's series that ran on CBS from 1986-1991.
Another film, Big शीर्ष pee-wee, was released in 1988.
Due to negative media attention following a scandal in 1991, Reubens decided to shelve his alter ego during the 1990s, and then gradually resurrected it during the following दशक.
It was at that time that Reubens addressed plans to write a new pee-wee फिल्मी, pee-wee 's playhouse : the Movie.
In June 2007, Reubens appeared as pee-wee Herman for the first time since 1991 at Spike TV 's Guys ' Choice Awards.
That '70s Show is an American television काल sitcom कि centers on the जीवनदान of a समूह of teenage मित्रों जीना in the fictional suburban town of Point Place, Wisconsin, from May 17, 1976, to December 31, 1979.
It debuted on the Fox टेलीविज़न network, first airing on August 23, 1998, running for eight consecutive seasons, and concluding with the 200th episode on May 18, 2006.
The main teenage cast members यहूद topher अनुग्रह, Mila Kunis, Ashton Kutcher, Danny Masterson, Laura Prepon, and Wilmer Valderrama.
The main adult cast members were Debra Jo Rupp, Kurtwood Smith, Don Stark and, during the first three seasons, Tanya Roberts.
Kansas ( ) is a U.S. state located in the Midwestern United राज्य.
It is named after the Kansas River which flows through it, which in turn थी नामित बाद the कंस देशी American tribe, which inhabited the area.
The tribe 's name ( natively kką : ze ) is often said to mean `` people of the wind '' or `` people of the south wind, '' although this was probably not the term 's original meaning.
Residents of कान्सास are called `` Kansans. ''
For thousands of years what is now Kansas was home to numerous और विविध Native American tribes.
Tribes in the Eastern part of the state generally lived in villages along the river valleys.
Tribes in the पश्चिमी भाग of the राज्य were semi- nomadic and hunted large herds of bison.
Kansas was first settled by यूरोपीय Americans in the 1830s, but the pace of settlement accelerated in the 1850s, in the midst of political wars over the slavery issue.
When officially खोली to उपनिवेश by the u.S. सरकारी in 1854, abolitionist Free-Staters from New England and pro-slavery settlers from neighboring Missouri rushed to the territory to determine if Kansas would become a free state or a slave state.
Thus, the area was a hotbed of violence and chaos in its early days as these forces collided, and was ज्ञात as bleeding Kansas.
The abolitionists eventually prevailed और on जनवरी 29, 1861, Kansas entered the Union as a free state.
After the Civil War, the population of Kansas grew rapidly, when waves of immigrants turned the prairie into farmland.
Today, Kansas is one of the सबसे उत्पादक agricultural states, producing high yields of wheat, sorghum and sunflowers.
Kansas is the 15th most extensive और the 33rd सबसे populous of the 50 United States.
Psychology is an academic and applied discipline that involves the scientific study of mental functions and behaviors.
Psychology has the immediate goal of समझना individuals and groups by both establishing general principles and researching specific cases, and by many accounts it ultimately aims to benefit society.
In this field, a professional or researcher is called a psychologist and can be classified as a social, behavioral, or cognitive scientist.
Psychologists attempt to understand the role of mental functions in individual and सोशल बर्ताव, जबकि भी exploring the physiological और neurobiological processes that underlie certain cognitive functions and behaviors.
Psychologists explore concepts such as बोध, संज्ञान, attention, emotion, phenomenology, motivation, brain functioning, personality, behavior, and interpersonal relationships.
psychologists of diverse stripes also consider the unconscious mind.
Psychologists employ empirical methods to infer causal and correlational relationships between psychosocial variables.
In addition, or in opposition, to employing empirical and deductive methods, some—especially clinical and counseling psychologists—at टाइम्स rely upon सांकेतिक interpretation and other inductive techniques.
Psychology has been described as a `` hub science '', with psychological findings linking to शोध और perspectives from the social sciences, natural sciences, medicine, and the humanities, such as philosophy.
While psychological knowledge is often applied to the मूल्यांकन और उपचार of mental health problems, it is also directed towards understanding and solving problems in many different spheres of human activity.
The majority of psychologists are involved in some kind of therapeutic भूमिका, practicing in clinical, counseling, or school settings.
Many do scientific research on a wide range of topics related to mental processes and behavior, and typically कार्य in विश्वविद्यालयों मनोविज्ञान विभाग or सिखा in अन्य academic settings ( e.g., medical schools, hospitals ).
Some are employed in industrial and organizational settings, or in other areas such as human development and aging, sports, health, and the media, as well as in forensic investigation and other aspects of law.
Thomas Jefferson ( April 13, 1743 ( April 2, 1743 O.S. ) – July 4, 1826 ) was an American Founding Father, the principal author of the घोषणा of स्वतंत्रता ( 1776 ) और the तीसरा अध्यक्ष of the United States ( 1801–1809 ).
At the beginning of the American Revolution, he served in the Continental Congress, representing Virginia and then served as a wartime राज्यपाल of वर्जिनिया ( 1779–1781 ).
Just बाद the युद्ध ended, from mid-1784 Jefferson served as a diplomat, stationed in Paris.
In May 1785, he became the United राज्य मंत्री to France.
Jefferson थी the first United States Secretary of State ( 1790–1793 ) serving under President George Washington.
With his close friend James Madison he organized the democratic-republican पार्टी, और subsequently resigned from Washington 's cabinet.
Elected Vice President in 1796, when he came in second to John Adams of the Federalists, Jefferson opposed Adams and साथ मैडिसन secretly लिखा the Kentucky and Virginia Resolutions, which attempted to nullify the Alien and Sedition Acts.
Elected president in what Jefferson called the Revolution of 1800, he oversaw the purchase of the विशाल louisiana Territory from France ( 1803 ), and sent the Lewis and Clark Expedition ( 1804–1806 ) to explore the new west.
His second term was beset साथ परेशानियों at घर, such as the failed treason trial of his former Vice President Aaron Burr.
With escalating trouble with Britain who was challenging American neutrality and threatening शिपिंग at समुद्र, he tried economic warfare with his embargo laws which only damaged American trade.
In 1803, President Jefferson initiated a process of Indian tribal removal and relocation to the Louisiana Territory west of the Mississippi River, in order to open lands for eventual American settlers.
A leader in the Enlightenment, Jefferson was a polymath who spoke five languages fluently और थी deeply interested in science, invention, architecture, religion and philosophy, interests that led him to the founding of the University of Virginia after his presidency.
He designed his own large mansion on a 5,000 acre plantation near Charlottesville, वर्जिनिया, जिससे he named Monticello.
While not a notable orator, Jefferson was a skilled writer and corresponded with many influential people in America and Europe throughout his वयस्क life.
Though Jefferson owned many slaves, he opposed the institution all his life and consequently treated and took care of them बहुत खूब और अपेक्षित उन्हें to कार्य no more than free farmers.
Since 1802 historians and others have been divided over the controversy of whether Jefferson was the father of one or more children belonging to Sally Hemings, a slave at Monticello. ''
Historians are also in असहमति with how much Jefferson was committed to the anti-slavery cause.
In 1807, President Jefferson signed into law a bill that banned the importation of slaves into the United States.
After Martha Jefferson, his wife of eleven years, died in 1782, Jefferson remained a widower for the rest of his life ; उनके विवाह उत्पादित six children, of whom two survived to adulthood.
Though जेफरसन रै महरूम criticized by many modern day scholars over the issue of slavery, he remains rated as one of the greatest U.S. presidents.
`` Sun City '' is a 1985 protest song written by Steven Van Zandt, produced by Van Zandt and Arthur Baker and recorded by Artists United Against Apartheid to convey opposition to the South अफ़्रीकी policy of apartheid.
The primary means of that opposition is to declare that all the artists involved would refuse any and all offers to perform at Sun City, a resort which was located in Bantustan of Bophuthatswana, one of a number of internationally unrecognized supposed `` independent '' states created by the South African government to forcibly relocate its black population.

This is a list of NBA players साथ सबसे championships won as a player.
The National बास्केट संघ ( NBA ) is a major professional basketball league in North America.
it थी founded in 1946 as the Basketball Association of America ( BAA ).
The league adopted its current name at the प्रारंभ of the when it merged with the National Basketball League ( NBL ).
The NBA Finals is the championship series for the NBA and the निष्कर्ष of the sport 's postseason.
The winning team of the series receives the लैरी o'brien Championship Trophy.
Players from the जीतना टोली प्रायः receive championship rings from the team honoring their contribution.
However, in some rare occasion, the teams opted to gave other commemorative वस्तुएं, ऐसे as कलाई घड़ियाँ, instead of rings.
The number of championships won by NBA superstars is often प्रयुक्त as a मापन of their greatness.
Boston Celtics center Bill Russell holds the record for the सबसे एनबीए championships जीती साथ 11 titles during his 13-year playing career.
He won his first championship with the बोस्टन सेल्टिक्स in उसके rookie year.
Afterwards, he went on to win 10 championships in the next 12 सालो, सहित आठ consecutive championships from 1959 to 1966.
He won the last two championships in 1968 and 1969 as player-coach.
Russell 's teammate, sam जोन्स, जीती 10 championships from 1959 to 1969, the second most in NBA history.
Four Celtics players, Tom Heinsohn, K. C. Jones, Satch Sanders and जॉन havlicek, won eight championships each.
Two other Celtics, Jim Loscutoff and Frank Ramsey, won सात championships each.
Four players, Bob Cousy, Kareem Abdul-Jabbar, Michael Jordan और scottie pippen, won six championships each.
Jordan and Pippen are members of the Chicago Bulls team who won three consecutive championships twice in the 1990s.
रॉबर्ट horry और जॉन salley are the only players to have won the championships with three different teams.
Horry won seven championships with the Houston Rockets, the Los Angeles Lakers and the सैन अंतोनियो स्पर्स, जबकि salley जीती चार championships with the Detroit Pistons, the Bulls and the Lakers.
Frank Saul and Steve Kerr are the only players to win two championships साथ two different teams in consecutive seasons.
Saul won consecutive championships with the Rochester Royals and the Minneapolis Lakers in the 1950s, while Kerr won consecutive championships with the Bulls and the Spurs in the 1990s,
Accuracy indicates proximity of measurement results to the सच्चा मान, परिशुद्धता to the repeatability, or reproducibility of the measurement
In the fields of science, engineering, industry, and statistics, the accuracy of a measurement प्रणाली is the उपाधि of निकटता of माप of a quantity to that quantity 's actual ( true ) value.
The precision of a measurement system, also called reproducibility or repeatability, is the उपाधि to जिससे दोहराया measurements under unchanged conditions show the same results.
Although the two words reproducibility and repeatability can be synonymous in colloquial use, वे हैं deliberately contrasted in the context of the scientific method.
A measurement system can be accurate but not precise, precise लकिन नहीं सटीक, neither, or both.
For उदाहरण, if an प्रयोग contains a systematic error, then increasing the sample size generally increases precision but does not improve accuracy.
The result would be a consistent yet inaccurate string of results from the flawed प्रयोग.
Eliminating the systematic error improves accuracy but does not बदलें precision.
A मापन प्रणाली is designated मान्य if it is both accurate and precise.
Related terms include bias ( non- random or directed effects caused by a factor or factors unrelated to the independent variable ) and error ( random variability ).
The terminology is also लागू to अप्रत्यक्ष measurements—that is, values obtained by a computational procedure from observed data.
in जोड to सटीकता and precision, measurements may also have a measurement resolution, which is the smallest change in the underlying physical quantity that produces a response in the measurement.
In the case of full reproducibility, such as when rounding a number to a representable फ्लोटिंग पाइंट क्रमांक, the word precision has a meaning not related to reproducibility.
For example, in the IEEE 754-2008 मानक it अर्थात् the क्रमांक of bits in the significand, so it is used as a measure for the relative accuracy with which an arbitrary number can be represented.
Fuck in its literal meaning refers to the act of sexual मैथुन.
It is an English word कि is प्रायः प्रयुक्त as a profanity, either to denote disdain or as an intensifier.
The origin of the word is obscure.
It is usually माना to be first attested to around 1475, but it may be considerably older.
In modern usage, fuck and its derivatives ( ऐसे as कमीने और fucking ) can be used in the position of a noun, a verb, an adjective or an adverb.
There are many common phrases which make use of the word, as well as a number of यौगिकों incorporating it, such as motherfucker.
Animated, color-coded map showing the various continents and regions.
Depending on the convention and model, some continents may be consolidated or subdivided : for example, Eurasia is most often subdivided into Europe and Asia ( red shades ), जबकि उत्तर and South America are sometimes recognized as one American continent ( green shades ).
A continent is one of अनेक बहुत large landmasses on Earth.
They are generally identified by convention rather than any strict criteria, with up to seven regions commonly regarded as continents—they हैं ( इससे largest in size to smallest ) : Asia, Africa, North America, South America, Antarctica, Europe, and Australia.
In भूविज्ञान, महाद्वीपों हैं described by means of tectonic plates.
Plate tectonics is the process and study of the movement, collision and division of महाद्वीपों, earlier known as continental drift.

Community property is a marital प्रॉपर्टी शासन कि originated in सिविल विधि jurisdictions and is now also found in some common law jurisdictions.
The states of the United States that recognize community property are primarily in the West ; it was inherited from Mexico 's ganancial community system, which itself was inherited from Spanish law ( a Roman -derived civil law system ) and ultimately from the Visigoths.
जबकि अंतर्गत स्पेनी rule Louisiana adopted the ganancial community system of acquests and gains, which replaced the traditional French community of movables and acquests in its civil law system.
Map of the United States with community प्रॉपर्टी states highlighted in red.
In addition to the highlighted states, Alaska is a पृथक प्रॉपर्टी राज्य कि permits couples to opt into a community property arrangement.
In a community property क्षेत्राधिकार, सबसे प्रॉपर्टी acquired दौरान the विवाह ( except for gifts or inheritances ) —the community, or communio bonorum—is owned jointly by both spouses and is divided upon divorce, annulment or death.
Joint ownership is automatically presumed by law in the absence of specific evidence that होता पाइंट to a contrary conclusion for a particular piece of property.
Division of community property may take place by मद, by splitting सब items or by value.
In some jurisdictions, such as California, a 50/50 division of community property is strictly mandated by statute, meaning that the focus then shifts to whether particular items are to be वर्गीकृत as जातियाँ or पृथक प्रॉपर्टी.
In other jurisdictions, such as Texas, a तलाक court may decree an `` equitable distribution `` of community property, which may result in an unequal division of such.
In non-community प्रॉपर्टी states property may be divided by equitable distribution.
Generally बोलना, the प्रॉपर्टी कि प्रत्येक संगी brings into the विवाह or receives by gift, bequest or devise during marriage is called separate property ( i.e., not community property ).
See प्रभाग of property.
Division of जातियाँ debts may not be the same as division of community property.
For example, in California, community प्रॉपर्टी is जरूरी to be विभाजित `` equally '' while community debt is required to be divided `` equitably ''.
Property that is owned by one spouse before the marriage is the separate property of that spouse, unless the property is `` transmuted '' into community property.
The rules for this vary from jurisdiction to क्षेत्राधिकार.
The Duke and duchess of कैम्ब्रिज waving to the crowd at The Mall shortly after the wedding.
The wedding of Prince William, Duke of कैम्ब्रिज, और कैथरीन Middleton took place on 29 April 2011 at Westminster Abbey in London.
The groom, Prince William, Duke of Cambridge, is the eldest son of Charles, Prince of Wales, and is second in the line of succession to the British Throne and the thrones of fifteen other Commonwealth realms.
The bride, Catherine `` Kate '' Middleton is the eldest of three children of Michael and Carole Middleton of Bucklebury, Berkshire.
The Dean of Westminster, John Hall, presided at the service ; the archbishop of canterbury, rowan विलियम्स, conducted the marriage ; Richard Chartres, the Bishop of London, preached the sermon ; and a reading was given by the bride 's brother, James.
William 's best man was his brother, Prince Harry, while the bride 's sister, Pippa, was maid of honour.
The ceremony was attended by the bride 's and groom 's families, as well as many foreign royals, diplomats, and the couple 's chosen personal guests.
After the ceremony, the couple made the traditional रूप on the बालकनी of Buckingham Palace.
As Prince William was not the heir apparent to the सिंहासन, the wedding was not a full state occasion and many details were left to the couple to decide, such as much of the guest list of about 1,900.
Prince विलियम and Kate Middleton met in 2001.
Their engagement on 20 October 2010 was घोषित on 16 November 2010.
The build-up to the wedding and the occasion itself attracted much media attention, being compared in many ways with the 1981 विवाह of William 's parents.
The अवसर थी a पब्लिक holiday in the United Kingdom and featured many ceremonial aspects, including use of the state carriages and roles for the Foot Guards and Household Cavalry.
Events were held around the Commonwealth to mark the wedding ; organisations and hotels held events across Canada, over 5,000 street parties were held throughout the संयुक्त Kingdom, and one million people lined the route between Westminster Abbey and Buckingham Palace.
The ceremony was viewed live by tens of millions more around the संसार, including 72 million on the YouTube Royal Channel.
In the United Kingdom, टेलीविज़न ऑडियंस peaked at 26.3 million viewers, with a total of 36.7 million watching part of the coverage.

minnillo थी also named Miss Teen USA in 1998.

A hand ( med. / lat. : manus, pl. manūs ) is a prehensile, multi- fingered extremity स्तिथ at the end of an arm or forelimb of primates and humans, chimpanzees, monkeys, and lemurs.
A few other vertebrates such as the koala ( which has two opposable thumbs on each `` hand '' and fingerprints remarkably similar to इंसान फिंगरप्रिंट ) हैं प्रायः described as having either `` hands '' or `` paws '' on their front limbs.
Hands are the main structures for physically manipulating the environment, used for both gross motor skills ( such as grasping a large ऑब्जेक्ट ) और ठीक मोटर कौशल ( ऐसे as picking up a small pebble ).
The fingertips contain some of the densest areas of nerve endings on the body, are the richest source of tactile feedback, and have the greatest positioning capability of the body ; thus the sense of touch is intimately associated with hands.
Like other paired organs ( eyes, feet, legs ), each hand is dominantly controlled by the opposing brain hemisphere, so that handedness, or the पसन्दीदा हाथ चुनाव for single-handed activities such as writing with a pencil, reflects individual brain functioning.
Some विकासवादी anatomists use the term hand to refer to the appendage of digits on the forelimb more generally — for example, in the context of whether the three digits of the bird hand involved the same homologous loss of two digits as in the dinosaur hand.
The human hand has 27 bones, not including the sesamoid bones which क्रमांक varies between people.
14 of which are the phalanges ( proximal, intermediate and distal ) of the fingers.
The metacarpals are the bones that connects the उंगलियाँ और the कलाई.
प्रत्येक इंसान hand has 5 metacarpals and 8 carpal bones.
too कूल थी a पेशेवर कुश्ती टैग टोली और पूर्व गुट सबसे notably क्रियाशील in संसार कुश्ती federation/entertainment between 1998 और 2001 और लिये a छोटी समय in 2004.
Basic डिजिटल alarm clock without a radio.
The mark in the top-left of the display indicates that the time is 4:00pm, not 4:00am.
A 1969 radio alarm clock ( Sony Digimatic 8FC-59W ) with an early mechanical-digital प्रदर्शक.
A digital clock is a type of clock that प्रदर्शक the समय डिजिटली, i.e. in numerals or अन्य प्रतीकों, as opposed to an analog clock, where the time is indicated by the positions of rotating hands.
Digital clocks are often associated with electronic drives, but the `` digital '' वर्णन refers only to the display, not to the drive mechanism.
( Both analog and digital clocks can be driven either mechanically or electronically, but `` clockwork '' mechanisms साथ डिजिटल displays are rare. )
The biggest digital clock is the Lichtzeitpegel ( `` Light Time Level '' ) on the television tower rheinturm düsseldorf, Germany.
Family Guy creator Seth macfarlane भी provides the voices of Peter Griffin, Stewie Griffin, Brian Griffin, and Glenn Quagmire.
Family Guy is an अमरीकी animated sitcom that features five main voice actors, and numerous regular cast and recurring guest stars.
The principal voice cast consists of show creator Seth MacFarlane, Alex Borstein, Seth Green, Mila Kunis ( who replaced Lacey Chabert after the first season ) and Mike Henry and now, the new actor Beau Osborne.
Recurring voice actors include पैट्रिक warburton, Adam West, John G. Brennan, Nicole Sullivan and Jennifer Tilly, and repeat guest stars include Phyllis Diller, Charles Durning, Rush Limbaugh, and Phil LaMarr.
Many cast members provide आवाज़ें लिये अनेक characters.
The voice actors, in portraying the various character personalities on the show, draw प्रेरणा इससे हस्तियाँ और पॉप culture.
Family Guy वर्ण have महरूम निभाई by more than one actor, after members of the show left the series or had conflicting obligations.
Kunis was nominated for an Annie Award for voicing Meg Griffin in the season 5 episode `` Barely Legal `` and MacFarlane has also won an Emmy Award for Outstanding Voice-Over Performance and an Annie Award for Best Voice Acting in an Animated टेलीविज़न उत्पादन, हालांकि no other cast member has won an award for their work on the series.
The five sets of the board game Monopoly depicted here show the एवोल्यूशन of the खेल 's कलाकृति and designs in the United States from 1935–2005.
The history of the board game Monopoly can be traced back to the early 20th century.
The earliest known design was by the American, Elizabeth Magie, patented in 1904 but existing as जल्दी as 1902.
Magie 's original intent was to publish a board game to illustrate an आर्थिक principle, namely the Georgist concept of a single land value tax.
A series of board games were developed from 1906 through the 1930s कि शामिल the खरीदे और selling of land and the development of that land.
By 1934, a board game had been created much like the version of Monopoly sold by Parker Brothers and its related companies through the rest of the 20th century, and into the 21st.
Several लोगों, ज़्यादातर in the midwestern United States and near the East Coast, contributed to the game 's design and evolution.
By the 1970s, the idea that the game had been निर्मित solely by चार्ल्स darrow था become लोकप्रिय लोकगीत ; it थी मुद्रित in the game 's instructions for many years, in a 1974 book devoted to Monopoly, and was cited in a general book about toys even as recently as 2007.
Even a guide to family games published for Reader 's Digest in 2003 only gave credit to darrow और एलिज़ाबेथ magie, erroneously stating कि magie 's असली game was created in the 1800s, and not acknowledging any of the game 's development between Magie 's creation of the game, and the eventual publication by Parker Brothers.
Also in the 1970s, Professor Ralph Anspach, who था खुद प्रकाशित a फलक खेल intended to illustrate the सिद्धान्त of both monopolies and trust busting, fought Parker Brothers and its then parent company, General Mills, over the trademarks of the Monopoly board game.
Through the research of anspach और अन्य, much of the early history of the game was `` rediscovered ''.
Anspach confronted Maxine Brady, author of the 1974 book The Monopoly Book : Strategy and Tactics of the World 's Most Popular Game over the actual history of the खेल on बैरी farber 's नई यॉर्क नगर बात show in 1975.
Because of the lengthy court प्रक्रम, सहित appeals, the legal status of Parker Brothers ' trademarks on the game was not settled until 1985.
The game 's name remains a registered trademark of पार्कर भाइयो, as do इसके specific design elements.
At the conclusion of the court case, the game 's logo and graphic design तत्व became part of a larger Monopoly brand, licensed by Parker Brothers ' parent companies onto a variety of items through the present day.
Despite the `` rediscovery '' of the board game 's जल्दी इतिहास in the 1970s और 1980s, and several books and journal articles on the subject, Hasbro ( Parker Brothers ' current parent company ) did not acknowledge any of the game 's history before Charles Darrow on its official Monopoly website as recently as June 2012.
nor किया हास्ब्रो acknowledge anyone other than Darrow in materials published or sponsored by them, at least as recently as 2006.
International tournaments, first held in the जल्दी 1970s, continue to the present, with the next world championship likely scheduled for 2013.
Starting in 1985, a नई generation of spin-off board games and card games appeared on both sides of the Atlantic Ocean.
In 1989, the first of many वीडियो खेल और computer game editions was published.
Since 1994, many official variants of the game, based on locations other than Atlantic City, New Jersey ( the official U.S. setting ) or London ( the official Commonwealth setting, excepting Canada ), have महरूम प्रकाशित by हास्ब्रो or इसके licensees.
In 2008, Hasbro permanently changed the color scheme and some of the gameplay of the standard U.S. Edition of the खेल to मैच the uk संस्करण, although the U.S. standard edition maintains the Atlantic City property names.
Hasbro also modified the official लोगो to दे the `` mr. एकाधिकार '' character a 3-D computer-generated look, which has since been adopted by licensees USAopoly, Winning Moves and Winning Solutions.
And Hasbro has also been including the Speed Die, introduced in 2006 's Monopoly : The Mega Edition by Winning Moves Games, in versions produced directly by Hasbro ( such as the 2009 Championship Edition ).
In baseball, a sacrifice fly is a batted ball that satisfies four criteria:
There हैं fewer than two outs when the ball is hit.
The ball is hit to the outfield ( fair or बेईमानी ), or to infield foul territory.
The batter is put out because an outfielder ( or an infielder running in the outfield, or foul territory ) catches the ball on the fly ( alternatively if the batter would have been out if not for an error or if the outfielder बूंदें the बॉल और another runner is put out ).
a धावक जो is already on base scores on the play.
It is called a `` sacrifice '' fly because the batter presumably intends to cause a teammate to score a run, जबकि sacrificing his own ability to do so.
Minnesota ( ) is a U.S. state located in the midwestern United States.
Minnesota was carved out of the eastern हाफ of the मिनेसोटा territory and admitted to the Union as the 32nd state on May 11, 1858.
Known as the `` Land of 10,000 Lakes '', the state 's name आता इससे a Dakota word for `` sky-tinted water ''.
Those waters, साथ with forests, parks, and wilderness areas, offer residents and tourists a variety of outdoor recreational opportunities.
Minnesota is the 12th सबसे extensive और the 21st most populous of the U.S. states.
Nearly 60 % of its residents live in the Minneapolis–Saint Paul metropolitan area ( known as the `` Twin Cities '' ), the center of transportation, business, industry, education, government and home to an internationally known arts community.
The remainder of the state consists of western prairies now given over to intensive agriculture ; deciduous forests in the southeast, अभी साफ, farmed और settled ; and the less populated North Woods, used for mining, forestry, and recreation.
Minnesota is known for its relatively mixed social and political orientations, and has a high rate of civic participation and voter turnout.
Minnesota ranks among the healthiest राज्य, and has a highly literate population.
the विशाल बहुमत of residents are of Scandinavian and German descent.
The state is known as a center of Scandinavian अमरीकी संस्कृति.
Ethnic विविधता has increased in recent decades.
Substantial influxes of एशियाई, अफ़्रीकी, और Latin American immigrants have joined the descendants of European settlers and the original Native American inhabitants.
Grants are non-repayable निधि by one party ( grant makers ), often a government department, corporation, foundation or trust, to a, often ( but not always ) a nonprofit entity, educational institution, business or an individual.
In order to receive a grant, some form of `` Grant Writing '' often referred to as either a proposal or an application is usually required.
Most grants are made to fund a specific project and require some level of अनुपालन and reporting.
The grant writing process involves an applicant submitting a proposal ( or submission ) to a potential funder, either on the आवेदक 's own initiative or in response to a Request for Proposal from the funder.
Other grants can be given to individuals, such as victims of natural disasters or individuals who seek to खोलें a छोटी business.
Sometimes grant makers आवश्यकता ग्रान्ट जरुरतमंदों to have कुछ form of tax-exempt status, be a registered nonprofit organization or a local government.
For example, tiered funding for a freeway are बहुत विशाल अनुदान negotiated at government policy level.
however छोटी अनुदान may be provided by a government agency ( e.g. municipal government ).
Project-related funding involving governments, business, communities, and individuals is often arranged by application either in writing or online.
Naturally occurring cobalt ( Co ) is composed of 1 stable isotope, 59Co. 28 radioisotopes have been characterized with the most stable being 60Co with a half-life of 5.2714 years, 57Co with a half-life of 271.79 days, 56co साथ a half-life of 77.27 दिनों, और 58co साथ a half-life of 70.86 days.
All of the remaining radioactive isotopes have half-lives that are less than 18 hours and the majority of these have half-lives that are less than 1 second.
This element also has 11 meta states, all of which have half-lives कम than 15 minutes.
The isotopes of cobalt दायरा in परमाणु weight from 47Co to 75Co.
The primary decay विधि लिये isotopes साथ परमाणु द्रव्यमान unit values less than that of the most abundant stable isotope, 59Co, is electron capture and the primary mode of decay for those of greater than 59 atomic mass units is beta decay.
The primary decay products before 59Co are iron isotopes and the प्राथमिक products after are nickel isotopes.
Standard परमाणु द्रव्यमान : 58.933195 ( 5 ) u
Who स्थानांतरित My Cheese ?
an अद्भुत Way to Deal with Change in Your Work and in Your Life, published in 1998, is a motivational book by Spencer Johnson written in the style of a parable or business fable.
It describes change in one 's work and life, and four typical reactions to said change by two mice and two `` littlepeople '', दौरान उनके हंट for cheese.
A New York Times business bestseller since रिलीज, जो स्थानांतरित My Cheese ?
remained on the list for almost पाँच सालो and spent over 200 weeks on Publishers Weekly 's hardcover nonfiction list.
It रै बेची अधिक than 26 लाख copies worldwide in 37 languages and remains to be one of the best-selling business books.
Nikita Sergeyevich Khrushchev ( – September 11, 1971 ) led the Soviet Union दौरान भाग of the Cold War.
He served as First Secretary of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union from 1953 to 1964, and as Chairman of the Council of Ministers, or Premier, from 1958 to 1964.
Khrushchev was responsible for the partial de-Stalinization of the Soviet Union, for backing the progress of the early Soviet space program, and for अनेक relatively liberal reforms in areas of domestic policy.
Khrushchev 's party colleagues removed him from power in 1964, replacing him with Leonid Brezhnev as First Secretary and Alexei kosygin as प्रीमियर.
khrushchev थी born in the रूसी village of Kalinovka in 1894, close to the present-day border between Russia and Ukraine.
he थी employed as a metalworker in his youth, and during the Russian Civil War was a political commissar.
With the सहायता of lazar Kaganovich, he worked his way up the Soviet hierarchy.
He supported Joseph Stalin 's purges, and स्वीकृत thousands of arrests.
In 1939, Stalin sent him to govern Ukraine, और he continued the purges there.
During what was known in the Soviet Union as the Great Patriotic War ( Eastern Front of World War II ), Khrushchev was again a commissar, सेवारत as an intermediary between Stalin and his generals.
khrushchev थी present at the bloody defense of Stalingrad, a fact he took great pride in throughout his life.
After the युद्ध, he लौटे to युक्त पहले being recalled to Moscow as one of Stalin 's close advisers.
In the शक्ति संघर्ष triggered by Stalin 's death in 1953, Khrushchev, after several years, emerged victorious.
On February 25, 1956, at the 20th पार्टी कॉंग्रेस, he delivered the `` Secret Speech, '' denouncing Stalin 's purges and ushering in a less repressive era in the Soviet Union.
His domestic policies, aimed at bettering the lives of ordinary नागरिकों, were often ineffective, especially in the area of agriculture.
Hoping eventually to rely on missiles for नेशनल रक्षा, Khrushchev ordered major cuts in conventional forces.
Despite the cuts, khrushchev 's rule saw the tensest years of the Cold War, culminating in the Cuban Missile Crisis.
Some of Khrushchev 's policies were seen as erratic, particularly by his emerging rivals, जो चुपचाप रोज़ in strength and deposed him in October 1964.
He did not suffer the deadly fate of some previous losers of Soviet power struggles, but was pensioned off with an apartment in Moscow and a dacha in the countryside.
His lengthy memoirs were smuggled to the West and published in part in 1970.
khrushchev died in 1971 of heart disease.
Upper gastrointestinal ( GI ) bleeding refers to hemorrhage in the upper gastrointestinal tract.
The anatomic cut-off for upper GI bleeding is the स्नायु of treitz, जिससे connects the चौथी portion of the duodenum to the diaphragm near the splenic flexure of the colon.
Upper GI bleeds are considered चिकित्सा emergencies, and require admission to hospital for urgent diagnosis and management.
Due to advances in medications and endoscopy, upper GI hemorrhage is now usually treated without surgery.
World population estimates from 1800 to 2100, based on UN 2010 projections ( रेड, नारंगी, ग्रीन ) और US Census Bureau historical estimates ( black ).
Actual recorded population figures are in blue.
According to the highest estimate, the संसार जनसांख्यिकी may rise to 16 billion by 2100 ; according to the lowest estimate, it may decline to 6 billion.
the world population is the total number of living humans on Earth.
As of आज, it is estimated to number billion by the United States Census Bureau ( USCB ).
The USCB estimates that the world population exceeded 7 billion on March 12, 2012.
According to a separate estimate by the United राष्ट्र Population Fund, it reached this milestone on October 31, 2011.
The world population has experienced continuous growth since the end of the Great Famine and the Black मौत in 1350, जब it stood at around 370 million.
The highest दरों of विकास – वैश्विक जनसांख्यिकी increases above 1.8 % per year – were seen briefly during the 1950s, and for a longer period during the 1960s and 1970s.
The growth rate peaked at 2.2 % in 1963, and था declined to 1.1 % by 2011.
Total annual births were highest in the late 1980s at about 138 million, and are now expected to remain essentially निरंतर at उनके 2011 स्तर of 134 लाख, जबकि मौतों number 56 million per year, and are expected to increase to 80 million per year by 2040.
Current projections show a continued increase in population in the near future ( but a steady decline in the population growth rate ), with the global जनसांख्यिकी अपेक्षित to reach between 7.5 and 10.5 billion by 2050.
Various longer-term estimates predict further विकास, stagnation, or even overall decline in the global population by 2150.
Some analysts have questioned the स्थिरता of further world population growth, citing the growing pressures on the environment, global food supplies, and energy resources.
Philips Lumileds Lighting Company is the manufacturer of a wide range of high-power/high-efficiency light-emitting diodes ( LEDs ).
It is a अभी a fully owned division of Philips Lighting.
knuckle mnemonic for the number of days in each month of the Gregorian Calendar.
Each projecting knuckle represents a 31-day month.
A mnemonic (, with a silent `` m '' ), or mnemonic यंत्र, is any learning technique that aids information retention.
Mnemonics aim to translate सूचना into a रूप कि the इंसान brain can retain better than its original form.
Even the process of applying this conversion might already aid the transfer of information to long-term memory.
Commonly encountered mnemonics are often for lists और in auditory रूप, ऐसे as छोटी कविताएं, acronyms, or यादगार वाक्यांश, but mnemonics can also be for other types of information and in visual or kinesthetic forms.
Their use is based on the observation that the human mind more easily remembers spatial, personal, surprising, physical, sexual, humorous, or otherwise 'relatable ' information, rather than more abstract or impersonal forms of information.
The word mnemonic is derived from the Ancient Greek word μνημονικός ( mnēmonikos ), meaning `` of memory '' and is related to Mnemosyne ( `` remembrance '' ), the नाम of the देवी of मेमोरी in यूनानी mythology.
Both of these words are निकला इससे μνήμη ( mnēmē ), `` remembrance, memory ''.
Mnemonics in antiquity were most often considered in the context of what is today known as the Art of मेमोरी.
Ancient Greeks and Romans विशिष्ट between two types of memory : the 'natural ' memory and the 'artificial ' memory.
The former is inborn, and is the one that everyone uses automatically and बगैर सोच.
The artificial memory in contrast has to be प्रशिक्षित और विकसित through the learning and practicing of a variety of mnemonic techniques.
mnemonic प्रणालियों हैं खास तकनीकों or रणनीति consciously प्रयुक्त to improve मेमोरी, it helps employ सूचना already भंडारित in long-term मेमोरी to मेक memorization an easier task.
President Bush signing the No Child Left Behind Act at Hamilton H.S. in हैमिल्टन, Ohio.
The No Child Left Behind Act of 2001 ( NCLB ) is a United States Act of Congress that is a reauthorization of the elementary और द्वितीयक शिक्षा अधिनियम, जिससे शामिल Title I, the government 's flagship aid program for disadvantaged students.
NCLB supports standards-based education reform based on the आधार कि सेटिंग ऊँची मानकों and establishing measurable goals can improve individual outcomes in education.
The Act requires states to develop आकलन in मौलिक skills.
States must give these assessments to all students at चुनें grade levels in order to receive federal school funding.
The Act does not assert a नेशनल achievement standard ; standards are set by each individual state.
NCLB expanded the federal role in public education through annual testing, annual academic progress, report cards, teacher qualifications, and funding परिवर्तन.
The bill passed in the u.S. कॉंग्रेस with bipartisan support.
Dodge B Series utility circa 1950, चलित by Albert Namatjira
A pickup truck or pick-up, often simply referred to as a pickup, is a light motor vehicle with an open-top, rear cargo area ( bed ).
In North America, the term pickup is used for light trucks with a lighter duty chassis and factory built, integrated bed, as well as for coupé utility vehicles, often based on a personal car chassis, लकिन भी प्रायः on a खास dedicated chassi for such use.
Some countries have their own terms समान to पिकअप, such as ute in Australia and New Zealand, or bakkie in South Africa.
Large pickup trucks are somewhat विरल in यूरोपीय, जहाँ vans and light lorries are commonly used for similar roles.
This 15th-century depiction of Charlemagne and Pope Adrian I shows a well-bred medieval horse with arched neck, refined head and elegant gait.
Horses in the Middle Ages differed in size, build and breed from the modern घोड़ा, और यहूद, on औसत, smaller.
They were also more central to society than their modern counterparts, being essential for war, कृषि, और हस्तांतरण.
Consequently, specific types of horse developed, many of जिससे have no आधुनिक equivalent.
While an understanding of modern horse breeds and equestrianism is vital for any analysis of the medieval horse, researchers also need to consider documentary ( दोनो लिखा और सचित्र ) and archaeological evidence.
Horses in the Middle Ages were rarely differentiated by नस्ल, but rather by use.
This led them to be described, for example, as `` chargers `` ( war horses ), `` palfreys `` ( riding horses ), कार्ट घोड़े or packhorses.
Reference is also given to their place of origin, such as `` Spanish horses, '' but whether this referred to एक नस्ल or अनेक is अनजान.
Another difficulty arising during any study of medieval documents or literature is the flexibility of the medieval languages, where several words can be used for one thing ( or, conversely, several objects are referred to by one word ).
Words such as ' courser ' and 'charger ' are used interchangeably ( even within one document ), and where one epic may speak disparagingly of a rouncey, another praises its skill and swiftness.
Significant technological advances in equestrian equipment, प्रायः introduced इससे अन्य cultures, allowed for significant changes in both warfare and agriculture.
In particular, improved designs for the solid-treed saddle as well as the arrival of the stirrup, horseshoe and horse collar were significant अग्रिम in मध्यकालीन समाज.
Consequently, the assumptions and theories developed by historians are not definitive, and debate still rages on many मुद्दे, ऐसे as the प्रजनन or आकार of the घोड़ा, and a number of sources must be consulted in order to understand the breadth of the subject.
The Music Man is a musical with book, music, and lyrics by Meredith Willson, based on a story by Willson and Franklin Lacey.
The plot concerns con man Harold Hill, who poses as a boys ' band organizer and leader and sells band instruments and uniforms to naive townsfolk पहले skipping कस्बा with the cash.
In River City, Iowa, prim librarian and piano teacher Marian Paroo sees through him, but when Hill helps her younger bhai overcome उसके भय of social interactions due to his lisp, Marian begins to fall in love with Harold.
Harold, in turn गिरना लिये Marian, risks being caught to win her.
In 1957, the show became a hit on Broadway, winning five Tony Awards, including Best Musical, और कार्यशील लिये 1,375 प्रदर्शन.
The cast album won the first ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये `` बेहतरीन Original Cast Album '' and was number one on the Billboard charts for 245 weeks.
The दिखाएँ 's success led to revivals and a popular 1962 film adaptation and a 2003 television remake.
It frequently is उत्पादित by both professional and amateur theater companies.
Surveyor 's wheel
A surveyor 's wheel, also called a clickwheel, hodometer, waywiser, trundle wheel, measuring wheel, or perambulator is a device for measuring distance.

Sand टीले in the rub ' al Khali ( `` Empty quarter '' ) of Saudi Arabia.
