Call of Duty is a first-person और third-person shooter computer/ video game franchise.
The series began on the PC, and later expanded to consoles and handhelds.
अनेक spin-off games have also been released.
The earlier games in the series are set primarily in World War II, this includes : Call of Duty, Call of Duty 2, and Call of Duty 3.
शुरूआत साथ Modern Warfare, which is set in modern times, the series has shifted focus away from World War II.
Call of Duty 4 : Modern Warfare ( released November 2007 ) was followed by Call of Duty : संसार at युद्ध and Call of Duty : Modern Warfare 2.
Black Ops ( released November 2010 ) takes प्लेस in the ठंडा War, while Modern Warfare 3 ( released November 2011 ) takes place in the near-future setting.
Black Ops 2 ( Released नवम्बर 13, 2012 ) takes place in the year 2025.
The Call of Duty games are published and owned by Activision with aspyr मीडिया publishing it for Apple OS X.
While the studio Infinity वार्ड primarily स्टिल develops them, Treyarch has also developed several of the titles with the release of the studios ' games interlaced with each other.
Some games have been developed by Gray Matter Interactive, Spark Unlimited, Amaze entertainment, n-space, विद्रोह developments, ideaworks खेल स्टुडियो, sledgehammer Games and nStigate Games.
The खेल उपयोग a किस्में of engines, including the id Tech 3, the Treyarch NGL, and the IW 5.0.
Other products in the franchise include a line of action figures designed by Plan-B Toys, a card game created by Upper Deck, and a comic book mini-series प्रकाशित by wildstorm.
As of November 11, 2011, the Call Of ड्यूटी श्रेणी have sold over 100 million copies.
As of March 31, 2012 there are 40 million monthly active players across सब of the कॉल of ड्यूटी titles, with 10 million Call of Duty : Elite users and 2 million paying annual members.
Over 1.6 billion hours of online gameplay have been logged Modern Warfare 3 since its 2011 release.
The estate tax in the United States is a tax imposed on the transfer of the `` taxable estate `` of a deceased person, whether such property is transferred via a will, according to the राज्य कानून of intestacy or वरना बना as an घटना of the मौत of the owner, such as a transfer of property from an intestate estate or trust, or the payment of certain life insurance benefits or financial account sums to beneficiaries.
the एस्टेट कर is one part of the Unified Gift and Estate Tax system in the United States.
The other part of the system, the gift tax, imposes a tax on हस्तांतरण of प्रॉपर्टी during a person 's life ; the gift tax prevents avoidance of the estate tax should a person want to give away his/her estate.
In addition to the संघीय सरकारी, अनेक states also impose an estate tax, with the state version called either an estate tax or an inheritance tax.
Opponents of the estate tax call it the `` death tax ''.
If an asset is left to a spouse or a federally पहचाना charity, the tax usually does not apply.
In addition, up to $ 5,250,000 can be given by an व्यक्तिगत, before and/or upon their death, without incurring federal gift or estate taxes.
Gavin McGregor Rossdale ( born 30 October 1967 ) is an English actor and musician, known as the lead singer and rhythm guitarist of the rock band Bush.
Following Bush 's separation in 2002, which lasted for eight years, he was the lead सिंगर और guitarist for Institute, and later began a solo career.
When performing solo, Gavin plays songs from his extensive musical libraries.
Rossdale has been क्रमित in the Top 100 Heavy Metal Vocalists by Hit Parader ( # 75 ).
Raffaello Sanzio da Urbino ( April 6 or March 28, 1483 – April 6, 1520 ), better known simply as Raphael, was an Italian painter and architect of the ऊँची Renaissance.
His work is admired for its clarity of रूप और आसानी of संयोजन and for its visual achievement of the Neoplatonic ideal of human grandeur.
Together with michelangelo और लियोनार्डो da विंची, he forms the traditional trinity of great masters of that period.
Raphael was enormously productive, running an unusually विशाल कार्यशाला, और despite उसके death at 37, a large body of his work remains.
Many of उसके works हैं मिला in the वेटिकन Palace, where the frescoed Raphael Rooms were the central, and the largest, work of his career.
The best known work is the स्कूल of एथेंस in the Vatican Stanza della Segnatura.
After his early years in Rome much of his work was self-designed, लकिन लिये the सबसे भाग चलाया by the workshop from his drawings, with considerable loss of quality.
He was अत्यधिक influential in his lifetime, though outside Rome his work was mostly known from his collaborative printmaking.
After his death, the influence of his great rival Michelangelo was more widespread until the 18th and 19th centuries, when Raphael 's अधिक निर्मल और समन्वयात्मक qualities यहूद again regarded as the highest models.
His career falls naturally into three phases and three styles, first described by Giorgio Vasari : his early years in Umbria, then a period of about four years ( from 1504–1508 ) absorbing the artistic traditions of फ्लोरेंस, followed by उसके पिछला hectic and triumphant twelve years in Rome, working for two Popes and their close associates.
Julia Fiona रॉबर्ट्स ( born अक्तूबर 28, 1967 ) is an American actress.
She became a Hollywood star after headlining the romantic comedy Pretty Woman ( 1990 ), which grossed $ 464 million worldwide.
After receiving Golden Globe Awards and Academy पुरस्कार nominations for Steel Magnolias ( 1989 ) and Pretty Woman, she won the Academy Award for Best Actress for her performance in Erin Brockovich ( 2000 ).
Her films The Pelican Brief ( 1993 ), My Best Friend 's Wedding ( 1997 ), Mystic Pizza ( 1988 ), Notting Hill ( 1999 ), Runaway Bride ( 1999 ), Ocean 's Eleven ( 2001 ), Ocean 's Twelve ( 2004 ), Charlie Wilson 's War ( 2007 ), वेलेंटाइन 's Day ( 2010 ), Eat Pray Love ( 2010 ), and Mirror Mirror ( 2012 ) have collectively brought box office receipts of over $ 2.6 billion, making her one of the most successful actresses in terms of box office receipts.
Roberts had become एक of the highest-paid अभिनेत्रियों in the world, topping The Hollywood Reporters annual `` power list '' of top-earning female stars from 2005 to 2006.
Her fee for 1990 's Pretty Woman was $ 300,000 ; in 2003, she was paid an unprecedented $ 25 million for her role in Mona Lisa Smile ( 2003 ).
As of 2010, Roberts 's net लायक थी estimated to be $ 140 million.
Roberts has been named one of People magazine 's `` 50 Most Beautiful People in the संसार '' ग्यारह टाइम्स, tied with Halle Berry.
In 2011, she was named one of the `` 100 Hottest Women of All-Time '' by Men 's Health.
In 2001, महिलाओं घर जर्नल क्रमित her as the 11th most powerful woman in the United States.
Mark Elliot Zuckerberg ( born May 14, 1984 ) is an American computer programmer and Internet entrepreneur.
He is best known as one of five co-founders of the social नेटवर्किंग जालस्थल फेसबुक.
As of April 2013, Zuckerberg is the chairman and chief कार्यपालिका of फेसबुक, inc. और in 2013 his personal wealth was estimated to be US $ 13.3 billion.
Together with his college roommates and fellow Harvard University students Eduardo Saverin, Andrew McCollum, डस्टिन moskovitz और क्रिस ह्यूजेस, zuckerberg शुभारम्भ Facebook from Harvard 's dormitory rooms.
The group then introduced Facebook onto other campuses nationwide and स्थानांतरित to पालो आल्टो, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, United States ( U.S. ) shortly afterwards.
In 2007, at the age of twenty-three years, Zuckerberg became a billionaire as a result of Facebook and the number of Facebook users worldwide reached a total of one billion in 2012.
Zuckerberg was involved in various legal disputes that were initiated by अन्य in the समूह, who claimed a share of the company based upon their involvement during the development phase of Facebook.
Since 2010, Zuckerberg has been named among the 100 wealthiest and most influential people in the world by Time पत्रिका as a part of its Person of the Year accolade.
Zuckerberg was played by actor Jesse Eisenberg in the 2010 Hollywood film the सोशल संजाल in which the rise of Facebook is portrayed.
The Mayflower was the ship that in 1620 transported 102 English तीर्थयात्रियों, including a core group of Separatists, to New England.
Their story is एक of travail and survival in a harsh New World environment.

कमेटी of तरीके और अर्थात् is the chief tax -writing committee of the United States House of Representatives.
Members of the Ways and Means Committee are not allowed to serve on any other House Committees unless they apply for a waiver from their पार्टी 's congressional नेतृत्व.
The Committee has jurisdiction over all taxation, tariffs and other revenue-raising measures, as खूब as a क्रमांक of अन्य कार्यक्रम including:
Social सुरक्षा
Unemployment लाभ
medicare
प्रवर्तन of child support laws
Temporary Assistance लिये मोहताज परिवारों, a federal welfare program
Foster care और adoption programs
The U.S. Constitution requires that all bills regarding कराधान जरूर originate in the House of Representatives.
चूंकि हाउस कार्यविधि is कि सब बिल्स regarding कराधान जरूर go through this committee, the committee is very influential, as is its Senate counterpart, the U.S. Senate Committee on Finance.
The Ways and Means Committee in the 111th Congress was chaired by Charlie Rangel, who had taken a leave of absence as chairman until हाउस आचार उल्लंघनों were resolved.
However, his छोड़ of अनुपस्थिति as chairman was ruled to be a resignation.
Pete Stark resigned as acting chairman, so Sander Levin held that position until the प्रारंभ of the 112th Congress.
Dave Camp became the committee chair for the 112th Congress, बाद the republicans जीती control of the House in the 2010 election.
The blue whale ( Balaenoptera musculus ) is a marine mammal belonging to the suborder of baleen whales ( called Mysticeti ).
At in लंबाई और or अधिक in weight, it is the largest known animal to have ever existed.
Long and slender, the blue whale 's body can be various shades of bluish-grey dorsally and somewhat हल्का underneath.
There are at least three distinct subspecies : B. m. musculus of the North Atlantic and North Pacific, B. m. intermedia of the Southern Ocean and B. m. brevicauda ( also known as the pygmy blue whale ) found in the Indian Ocean and South Pacific Ocean.
B. m. indica, found in the भारतीय समंदर, may be another subspecies.
As with other baleen whales, its diet consists लगभग exclusively of small crustaceans known as krill.
Blue whales यहूद abundant in nearly सब the महासागर on धरती जबतक the शुरूआत of the बीसवीं सदी.
For over a century, they were hunted almost to extinction by whalers जबतक सुरक्षित by the international community in 1966.
A 2002 report estimated there were 5,000 to 12,000 blue whales विश्वव्यापी, located in at least five groups.
More recent research into the Pygmy subspecies suggests इस may be an underestimate.
Before whaling, the largest population was in the Antarctic, numbering लगभग 239,000 ( दायरा 202,000 to 311,000 ).
There remain only much smaller ( around 2,000 ) एकाग्रता in प्रत्येक of the पूर्वी उत्तर Pacific, Antarctic, and Indian Ocean groups.
वहीँ हैं दो अधिक समूह in the उत्तर अटलांटिक, और at तनिक दो in the दक्षिणी गोलार्ध.
The globe artichoke ( Cynara cardunculus var. scolymus ) is a variety of a species of thistle cultivated as a food.
The edible matter is कलियों कि रूप भीतर the पुष्प heads before the flowers come into bloom.
The buds go away or change to a coarse, barely edible form when the flower blooms.
The uncultivated or wild variety of the प्रजाति is पुकारा a cardoon.
It is a perennial plant native to the Mediterranean region.
The United States one hundred-dollar bill ( $ 100 ) is a denomination of United States करेंसी.
U.S. statesman, inventor, and diplomat बेंजामिन फ्रैंकलिन is currently featured on the obverse of the bill.
On the reverse of the banknote is an image of Independence Hall.
The $ 100 bill is the largest denomination that has been printed since July 13, 1969, when the denominations of $ 500, $ 1,000, $ 5,000, और $ 10,000 यहूद retired.
The Bureau of Engraving and Printing says the average life of a $ 100 bill in circulation is 90 months ( 7.5 सालो ) पहले it is replaced due to पहनें and tear.
The bills are also commonly referred to as `` Benjamins '', in reference to the use of Benjamin Franklin 's portrait on the denomination, or `` c-notes '', आधारित on the रोमन numeral for 100.
The bill is one of two denominations printed today that does not feature a President of the United States ; the अन्य is the $ 10 bill, featuring Alexander Hamilton.
The time on the clock of Independence Hall on the रिवर्स, according to the U.S. Bureau of Engraving and Printing, shows approximately 4:10.
One hundred hundred-dollar bills are delivered by संघीय आरक्षित बैंको in mustard-colored straps ( $ 10,000 ).
The Series 2009 $ 100 bill redesign was unveiled on April 21, 2010, and was to be issued to the public on February 11, 2011, but production was shut down in December 2010 because as many as 30 % were unusable due to a manufacturing flaw.
A vertical crease in the paper reveals a blank space on the विधेयक जब खींचा out.
In their replacement, and continuing the high demand of this denomination, the Series 2006A was शुभारम्भ retaining the पिछला डिज़ाइन ( 1996-generation ).
On April 24, 2013, the Federal Reserve announced the new $ 100 bill would enter circulation on October 8, 2013.
King David in robes of a बीज़ान्टिन सम्राट.
Miniature from the Paris psalter.
David ( ; ISO 259-3 Dawid ; ' ; Strong 's : Daveed ) according to the Hebrew Bible, was the second king of the United Kingdom of Israel, and according to the New Testament Gospels of Matthew and Luke, an ancestor of Jesus.
His life is conventionally dated to c. 1040–970 BCE, his शासनकाल over यहूदा c. 1010–1002 BCE, and his reign over the United Kingdom of Israel c. 1002–970 BCE.
The Books of Samuel, 1 Kings, and 1 Chronicles are the only sources of information on David, although the Tel Dan stele ( dated c. 850–835 BCE ) contains the phrase ( bytdwd ), read as `` House of David '', which most scholars take as confirmation of the अस्तित्व in the mid-9th सदी bce of a judean royal राजवंश पुकारा the हाउस of David.
He is depicted as a righteous king, although not without faults, as well as an acclaimed warrior, musician, and poet, traditionally credited for composing many of the psalms contained in the किताब of Psalms.
David is central to यहूदी, ईसाई, और Islamic doctrine and culture.
Biblical परंपरा maintains that a direct descendant of David will be the Messiah.
In Islam he is considered to be a prophet and the king of a nation.
Kathmandu ( ; ) is the पूंजी और largest urban agglomerate of Nepal.
The agglomerate consists of काठमांडू महानगर City at its core, and its sister cities Patan, Kirtipur, Thimi, and Bhaktapur.
It also शामिल the recently पहचाना urban areas of Shankhapur, Karyabinayak, and Champapur.
Banepa, Dhulikhel, and Panauti are satellite urban areas of Kathmandu located just outside the काठमांडू घाटी.
Kathmandu is also known informally as `` ktm '' or the `` tri-city ''.
According to a census conducted in 2011, काठमांडू metropolis alone has 975,453 inhabitants ; and the agglomerate has a population of more than 2.5 million inhabitants.
The metropolitan city area is and has a population density of 19,250 per km2.
The city स्टैंड at an elevation of approximately in the bowl-shaped Kathmandu Valley of central Nepal.
It is surrounded by four major mountains : Shivapuri, Phulchoki, Nagarjun, and Chandragiri.
Kathmandu Valley is part of three districts ( Kathmandu, ललितपुर, और भक्तपुर ), रै the highest population density in the country, and is home to about a twelfth of Nepal 's population.
During Rana and Shah eras, the name `` Nepal '' referred only to the Kathmandu Valley ; it was what people जो जिया बाहर the valley called it.
During this period, अंग्रेजों historians called the valley itself `` Nepal Proper ''.
Today, Kathmandu is नहीं तभी the पूंजी of the Federal Democratic Republic of Nepal, but also the headquarters of the Central Development Region of Nepal.
The Central प्रदेश comprises three zones : Bagmati, Narayani, and Janakpur.
Kathmandu is located in the bagmati Zone.
काठमांडू is the gateway to tourism in Nepal.
It is also the nerve center of the country 's economy.
It has the most advanced infrastructure of any urban area in नेपाल, और इसके अर्थव्यवस्था is focused on tourism, which accounted for 3.8 % of Nepal 's GDP in 1995–96.
( Tourism in Kathmandu declined thereafter during a period of political unrest, but since तब has improved. )
The city has a समृद्ध इतिहास, spanning nearly 2000 years, as inferred from inscriptions found in the valley.
Religious and सांस्कृतिक festivities form a major part of the lives of people residing in Kathmandu.
Most of Kathmandu 's people follow Hinduism and many others follow Buddhism.
There are people of other religious beliefs as खूब, giving Kathmandu a cosmopolitan culture.
Nepali is the most commonly बोला भाषा in the city.
Nepal Bhasa is the indigenous language spoken by the नेवार people.
Hindi is widely understood and English is समझा by Kathmandu 's educated residents.
the नगर 's literacy rate is 98 %.
Kathmandu 's sister cities ( Lalitpur Patan ) and Bhaktapur are integral to Kathmandu 's cultural heritage, tourism industry, and economy ; therefore UNESCO 's World Heritage Site lists all three cities ' monuments and attractions together under one heading, `` Kathmandu Valley- UNESCO World Heritage Site ``.
Field hockey, usually referred to simply as hockey, is a team sport of the hockey family which is played between two teams of eleven players with hockey sticks and a hard, solid plastic ball.
At the turn of the 21st century, the game is played globally, साथ particular लोकप्रियता throughout Europe, Asia, Oceania, and South America – in addition to being the national sport of Pakistan and India.
The term `` field hockey '' is used primarily in Canada, the United States, and other regions of the world जहाँ the खेल of ice hockey is more popular.
During play, goal keepers are the only players who are allowed to touch the ball with any part of their body ( with the exception of a player 's hand माना 'part of the स्टिक ' ), साथ इस तभी applying within the shooting circle ( also known as the D, or shooting arc, or just the circle ), while field players play the ball with the flat side of their stick.
The team that scores the most goals by the end of the मैच विन्स.
If the score is tied at the समाप्त of the game, either a draw is declared or the game goes into extra time and/or a penalty shootout, depending on the competition 's format.
The governing body of hockey is the अंतरराष्ट्रीय Hockey Federation ( FIH ), with men and women being represented internationally in competitions including the Olympic games, Commonwealth games, Hockey World Cup, Champions Trophy and Junior Hockey World Cup, with many countries running extensive junior, senior, and masters ' club competitions.
The FIH is also responsible for organising the हॉकी नियम फलक and developing the rules for the sport.
A popular variant of field hockey is indoor hockey, which differs in a number of respects while embodying the primary principles of hockey.
Indoor hockey is a 6-a-side variant, with a field which is घटाया to लगभग 40m × 20m.
With many of the rules remaining the same, including obstruction and feet, there are several key variations - Players may not raise the ball unless shooting on goal, players may not hit the ball ( instead utilising pushes to transfer the ball ), and the sidelines are replaced with solid barriers जिससे the ball will rebound off.
Ethan `` Cane '' Ashby ( né Atkinson ) is a fictional character from the American CBS soap opera the यंग और the Restless.
He is portrayed by Australian actor Daniel Goddard, who originally auditioned for Brad Snyder on As the संसार turns लकिन थी recommended for a role on The Young and the Restless instead.
The role was to be portrayed as an American, but गोडार्ड 's ऑस्ट्रेलियाई descent influenced the character 's background.
Former head writer lynn मारी लैथम introduced him during the episode airing on January 12, 2007 as an Australian bartender in search of his family, a debut that received a mixed response.
Latham created Cane as the son of Phillip Chancellor II ( Donnelly Rhodes ) and Jill फोस्टर एबॉट ( जेस वाल्टन ) लकिन the अक्षर 's पृष्ठभूमि was rewritten by Maria Arena Bell in 2009, reestablishing him as the son of Colin and Genevieve Atkinson ( Tristan Rogers and Genie Francis ).
Though characterized as `` mysterious '', Cane is `` वफ़ादार और समर्पित '', while Goddard described the character as a `` typical Australian, working-class kind of guy ''.
He was the first member of the Atkinson family to appear on the series, followed by his parents and एकसमान twin brother.
Soon after his debut, he became a leading अक्षर, a निर्णय praised by viewers and critics.
The character has been involved with Amber Moore ( Adrienne Frantz ), Chloe मिशेल ( एलिज़ाबेथ hendrickson ) and most notably Lily Winters ( Christel Khalil ), a romance that garnered significant fan attention.
In 2009, Cane and Lily were married ; Global BC would later call Lily the प्रेम of cane 's life.
The pair था दो children, Charlie and Mattie Ashby.
In 2011, the actor was fired, and Cane was shot to मौत onscreen.
However, Goddard was rehired soon after viewers campaigned for his return, revealing कि cane 's एकसमान जुड़वा brother was in fact the man who died.
This कुर्बान उसके विवाह to Lily, but the couple were remarried on Valentine 's Day in 2012.
Goddard has been widely acclaimed for his portrayal ; Canyon News said that he portrays the character honestly, और is `` always dependable, on fire and exciting ''.
John Christopher `` Johnny '' Depp II ( born June 9, 1963 ) is an American actor, film producer, and musician.
He has won the Golden Globe पुरस्कार और स्क्रीन Actors Guild award for Best Actor.
Depp rose to prominence on the 1980s television श्रेणी 21 जम्प गली, becoming a teen idol.
Dissatisfied with that status, Depp turned to film for अधिक चुनौतीपूर्ण भूमिकाएँ ; he निभाई the शीर्षक अक्षर of the acclaimed एडवर्ड scissorhands ( 1990 ) and later found box office success in films such as Sleepy Hollow ( 1999 ), Charlie and the Chocolate Factory ( 2005 ), Alice in Wonderland ( 2010 ), Rango ( 2011 ) and the Pirates of the Caribbean film series ( 2003–present ).
He has collaborated with director and friend Tim Burton in आठ films ; the most recent being Dark Shadows ( 2012 ).
Depp has gained acclaim for his portrayals of such people as Ed Wood in ed Wood, Joseph D. Pistone in Donnie Brasco, Hunter S. Thompson in Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas, George Jung in Blow, and the bank robber John Dillinger in Michael Mann 's Public Enemies.
Films featuring Depp have grossed over $ 3.1 billion at the United States box office and over $ 7.6 billion worldwide.
He has been nominated for top awards many times, winning the Best Actor Awards from the Golden –_Motion_Picture_Musical_or_Comedy Globes –_motion_picture_musical_or_comedy for Sweeney Todd : The Demon Barber of Fleet Street and from the Screen Actors Guild for Pirates of the Caribbean : The Curse of the Black Pearl.
He also has garnered a sex symbol status in American सिनेमा, होने twice named as the `` Sexiest Man Alive `` by People magazine in 2003 and 2009.
He has been listed in the 2012 Guinness Book of World Records as the highest paid actor, साथ $ 75 million.
The World Wide Web ( abbreviated as WWW or W3, commonly known as the web ), is a प्रणाली of interlinked हाइपरटेक्स्ट documents accessed via the Internet.
With a web browser, one can view web pages that may contain text, images, वीडियो, and other multimedia, and navigate between them via hyperlinks.
Using concepts from his earlier hypertext systems like ENQUIRE, British engineer, computer scientist and at that time employee of the CERN, Sir Tim Berners-Lee, now Director of the World Wide Web Consortium ( W3C ), wrote a proposal in कूच 1989 लिये कया होता eventually become the World Wide Web.
At CERN, a European research organisation near Geneva straddling the border between France and Switzerland, Berners-Lee and Belgian computer scientist Robert Cailliau proposed in 1990 to use hypertext `` to link and access information of various kinds as a web of nodes in which the user can browse at will '', and they publicly introduced the project in December of the same year.
Mark Travis John सांचेज़ ( born November 11, 1986 ) is an American football quarterback for the New York Jets of the National Football League ( NFL ).
He was drafted in the first round of the 2009 NFL Draft as the fifth overall selection by the Jets and the second quarterback taken overall.
He निभाई कॉलेज फ़ुटबॉल at the University of Southern California ( USC ).
Sanchez grew up in a well-disciplined and athletic family.
in the आठवीं grade, he began to play football and learn the intricacies of the quarterback position, training with his father, Nick.
A well-regarded prospect, Sanchez committed to Southern California following his successful high school career in which he led his team to a चैंपियनशिप शीर्षक दौरान उसके फाइनल season.
At USC, Sanchez was relegated as the backup quarterback during his first three years though he rose to prominence due to his brief appearances on the field in 2007 due to injuries suffered by starting quarterback John David Booty.
Sanchez also became popular within the जातियाँ due to his Mexican-American heritage.
नामित the प्रारंभ in 2008, सांचेज़ led यूएससी to a 12–1 रिकार्ड और जीती the रोज़ कटोरी विरूद्ध penn राज्य लिये जिससे सांचेज़ थी awarded the सबसे मूल्यवान खिलाड़ी पुरस्कार लिये उसके प्रदर्शन on ठोकर.
Although many considered him too inexperienced, Sanchez announced his intention to डालें the 2009 NFL Draft.
He was selected by the Jets after they traded up साथ the क्लीवलैंड भूरा, और थी named the starting quarterback prior to the start of the season.
Despite a subpar performance, Sanchez led the Jets to the AFC Championship खेल, a losing effort to the Indianapolis Colts, becoming the fourth rookie quarterback in NFL history to win his first playoff game and the second to win two playoff games.
In his second season, Sanchez continued to develop and led the Jets to the playoffs and the team 's second consecutive AFC Championship Game where they narrowly lost to the Pittsburgh Steelers, 24–19.
With the win over the New England देशप्रेमी the सप्ताह prior, सांचेज़ tied four other quarterbacks for the second most post-season road victories by a quarterback in NFL history.
In leading the Jets to two consecutive conference championships, Sanchez joined quarterback Ben Roethlisberger as the only two quarterbacks in NFL history to पहुँचें the सम्मेलन चैंपियनशिप in their first two seasons in the league.
The next two सीज़न होता be a regression for both the team and Sanchez as they failed to reach the playoffs.
Fans and media critics called for a struggling सांचेज़ to be benched.
He eventually was replaced towards the end of the 2012 season साथ ग्रेग McElroy.
Paul Avery ( April 2, 1934December 10, 2000 ) was an American police reporter, best known for his stories on the infamous serial killer known as the Zodiac, and later for his work on the Patricia hearst kidnapping.
A small submersible AC sump pump with a garden hose कनेक्टर
A sump pump is a पंप प्रयुक्त to हटाएँ जल कि रै accumulated in a water collecting sump basin, commonly found in the basement of homes.
The water may enter via the perimeter drains of a तहखाने waterproofing system, funneling into the basin or because of rain or natural ground water, if the basement is below the water table level.
Sump pumps are used where basement flooding happens regularly और to उपाय dampness where the water table is above the foundation of a home.
Sump pumps send water away from a house to any place where it is no longer समस्यापूर्ण, ऐसे as a नगरपालिका तूफ़ान नाली or a dry well.
Pumps may discharge to the sanitary sewer in older संस्थापना.
Once considered acceptable, this practice may now violate the plumbing code or municipal bylaws, क्युकी it can overwhelm the municipal sewage treatment system.
Municipalities urge homeowners to डिस्कनेक्ट and reroute sump pump discharge away from sanitary sewers.
जुर्माना may be imposed for noncompliance.
Many homeowners have inherited their sump pump configurations and do not realize that the pump discharges to the sewer.
If the discharge is fed to a laundry sink in the basement, it 's likely going to the sewer.
प्रायः hardwired into a घर 's विद्युत प्रणाली, sump पंपों may have a बैटरी बैकअप.
The home 's pressurized water supply powers some pumps, eliminating the need for electricity at the expense of using potable water, potentially बनाना उन्हें अधिक महंगी to operate than विद्युत pumps and creating an additional water disposal problem.
Since a sump basin may overflow if not constantly pumped, a बैकअप प्रणाली is important for cases when the main power is out for prolonged periods of time, as during a severe storm.
There are generally दो प्रकार of sump pumps — pedestal and submersible.
The pedestal pump 's motor is mounted above the sump, where it is more easily सर्विस, but is also more conspicuous.
The pump impeller is driven by a long, vertical extension shaft और the impeller is in a स्क्रॉल आवास in the base of the pump.
The submersible pump is entirely mounted inside the sump, और is विशेषकर sealed to prevent electrical short circuits.
Sump pump systems are also utilized in industrial and commercial अनुप्रयोग to कंट्रोल जल table -related problems in surface soil.
An artesian aquifer or periodic high water table situation can cause the ground to become unstable due to water saturation.
As long as the pump functions, the सतह मृदा होगा remain stable.
These sumps are typically ten feet in depth or more ; lined with corrugated मेटल पाइप कि contains perforations or drain holes throughout.
They may include electronic control systems with visual and audible alarms and are usually covered to prevent debris and animals from falling in.
Bleeding Kansas, Bloody Kansas or the Border War, was a series of violent political confrontations involving anti-slavery Free-Staters and pro-slavery `` Border Ruffian `` elements, that took place in the Kansas Territory and the neighboring कस्बों of मिसौरी between 1854 and 1861.
At the heart of the conflict was the question of whether कान्सास होता डालें the संघ as a free state or slave state.
As such, Bleeding Kansas was a proxy war between Northerners and southerners over the समस्या of गुलामी in the United States.
the पद `` Bleeding Kansas '' was coined by Horace Greeley of the New York Tribune ; the events it encompasses directly presaged the American Civil War.
Congress had long struggled to balance the interests of pro-slavery forces and anti-slavery शक्तियां.
The events later ज्ञात as bleeding कान्सास यहूद नियत into गति by the Kansas–Nebraska Act of 1854, which nullified the Missouri Compromise and instead implemented the concept of popular sovereignty.
An ostensibly democratic idea, popular sovereignty stated that the inhabitants of each territory or state should decide whether it होता be a फ़्री or स्लेव राज्य ; however, इस resulted in immigration en masse to Kansas by activists from both sides.
At one point, Kansas had two separate governments, each with its own constitution, हालांकि तभी एक थी federally recognized.
On January 29, 1861, Kansas was admitted to the Union as a free state, less than three months before the बैटल of फोर्ट sumter which began the Civil War.
Benzene is an organic chemical compound with the molecular formula C6 H|Hydrogen|H6.
Its molecule is composed of 6 कार्बन अणु joined in a ring, with 1 hydrogen atom attached to each carbon atom.
Because its अणुओं contain only carbon and hydrogen atoms, benzene is classed as a hydrocarbon.
Benzene is a natural constituent of crude oil, और is एक of the most basic petrochemicals.
Benzene is an aromatic hydrocarbon and the second [ n ] - annulene ( [ 6 ] -annulene ), a cyclic हाइड्रोकार्बन साथ a continuous pi bond.
It is sometimes abbreviated Ph –H. Benzene is a colorless and highly ज्वलनशील द्रव साथ a sweet smell.
It is मुख्यतः प्रयुक्त as a precursor to भारी रसायन, such as ethylbenzene and cumene, which are produced on a billion kilogram scale.
Because it has a high octane number, it is an important component of gasoline, composing a few प्रतिशत of इसके द्रव्यमान.
Most non-industrial applications have been limited by benzene 's carcinogenicity.
Giovanni Virginio Schiaparelli ( ; 14 March 1835 – 4 July 1910 ) was an इतालवी astronomer and science historian.
Wii homebrew refers to the reuse of निन्टेंडो 's वी game console to run software that has not been authorized by Nintendo.
It achieves this by defeating the Wii 's copy सुरक्षा और कोड हस्ताक्षर measures.
in अधिक सामान्य शर्तें, वी homebrew refers to the उपयोग of the वी 's हार्डवेयर, accessories और तन्त्र लिये उद्देश्य बाहर those intended by the निर्माता.
Original efforts focused on using the Wii Remote as a pointing यंत्र on अन्य ऑपरेटिंग systems, or running web-based games in the built-in web browser.
Subsequent developments in games exploits, such as the `` Twilight hack ``, `` bannerbomb '' and its later incarnation `` LetterBomb '', `` Smash Stack '', `` Indiana Pwns '', `` Yu-Gi-OWNED '', `` bathaxx '', and `` Return of the Jodi '', made installing the `` Homebrew Channel `` possible.

Stephen John Hadley ( born February 13, 1947 ) was the 21st U.S. Assistant to the President for नेशनल सुरक्षा अफेयर्स ( commonly referred as National Security Advisor ), serving under President George W. Bush.
Take identical growing plants and give fertilizer to half of them.
If there are differences between the fertilized plant group and the unfertilized `` control '' group, these differences may be due to the fertilizer.
A scientific control is an experiment or अवलोकन designed to minimize the effects of variables other than the single independent variable.
This increases the reliability of the results, often through a comparison between control माप और the अन्य measurements.
Scientific controls are a part of the वैज्ञानिक method.
For example, during drug testing, scientists will try to control two groups to keep them as identical as possible, then allow one समूह to कोशिश the drug.
Another example might be testing plant fertilizer by giving it to only half the plants in a गार्डन : the पौधे कि प्राप्त no उर्वरक हैं the कंट्रोल group, because they establish the baseline level of growth that the fertilizer-treated plants will be compared against.
Without a control group, the experiment can not determine whether the fertilizer-treated plants grow more than they would have if untreated.
Ideally, all परिवर्तनीय in an प्रयोग होगा be नियंत्रित ( accounted for by the control measurements ) and none will be uncontrolled.
In such an experiment, if all the controls work as expected, it is possible to conclude that the experiment is working as intended and that the results of the experiment are due to the प्रभाव of the परिवर्तनीय being tested.
That is, scientific controls allow an investigator to make a claim like `` Two परिस्थितियों यहूद एकसमान until factor X occurred.
Since factor X is the only difference between the two situations, the new outcome was caused by factor X. ''

John Adams ( October 30, 1735 ( O.S. October 19, 1735 ) – July 4, 1826 ) was the second president of the United States ( 1797–1801 ), having पहले परोसा as the पहला वाइस अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त States.
An American Founding Father, he was a statesman, diplomat, and a leading advocate of American स्वतंत्रता from Great Britain.
खूब शिक्षित, he थी an आत्मज्ञान राजनैतिक theorist who promoted republicanism and wrote prolifically about his often seminal ideas, both in published works and in letters to his wife and key adviser Abigail as well as to other Founding Fathers.
Adams came to prominence in the early stages of the American Revolution.
A lawyer and public फिगर in बोस्टन, as a प्रतिनिधि from Massachusetts to the Continental Congress, he played a leading role in persuading Congress to declare independence.
He assisted Thomas Jefferson in drafting the Declaration of Independence in 1776, and was its primary advocate in the Congress.
Later, as a diplomat in Europe, he helped negotiate the eventual peace treaty with Great Britain, and was जिम्मेदार लिये obtaining vital governmental loans from Amsterdam bankers.
A political theorist and historian, Adams largely wrote the Massachusetts Constitution in 1780, which together with his earlier Thoughts on Government, influenced American political thought.
One of his greatest roles was as a judge of character : in 1775, he nominated George Washington to be commander-in-chief, and 25 years later nominated John Marshall to be Chief Justice of the United States.
Adams ' revolutionary credentials secured him two terms as George Washington 's vice president and his own election in 1796 as the दूसरी president.
During his one term, he encountered ferocious attacks by the Jeffersonian republicans, as खूब as the dominant faction in his own Federalist Party led by his bitter enemy Alexander Hamilton.
Adams signed the controversial Alien and Sedition Acts, and built up the army and navy especially in the face of an undeclared naval युद्ध ( पुकारा the `` Quasi-War `` ) with France, 1798–1800.
The major accomplishment of his presidency was उसके शांतिपूर्ण रेज़ोल्यूशन of the conflict in the face of Hamilton 's opposition.
In 1800, Adams was defeated for re-election by Thomas Jefferson and रिटायर्ड to मैसाचुसेट्स.
He later resumed his friendship साथ जेफरसन.
He और उसके बीवी, अबीगैल एडम्स, founded an accomplished family line of politicians, diplomats, and historians now referred to as the Adams political family.
Adams was the पिता of जॉन Quincy Adams, the sixth President of the United States.
His achievements have received greater recognition in modern times, though his योगदान यहूद नहीं initially as celebrated as those of other Founders.
Adams was the first U.S. president to reside in the भवन कि eventually became known as the White House.
A Watt भाप engine.
The steam engine, fuelled primarily by कोयले, propelled the Industrial Revolution in Great Britain and the world.
The Industrial Revolution was the परिवर्तन to नई निर्माण processes that occurred in the period from about 1760 to some time between 1820 and 1840.
This transition included going from hand production methods to machines, new chemical manufacturing and iron production प्रक्रियाओं, improved दक्षता of जल शक्ति, the increasing use of steam power and development of machine tools.
The परिवर्तन also included the change from wood and other bio-fuels to coal.
The Industrial revolution began in Britain and within a few decades spread to Western Europe and the संयुक्त States.
The Industrial Revolution marks a major turning point in history ; almost प्रत्येक पहलू of रोज़ जीवन was influenced in some way.
Most notably, average income and population began to प्रदर्शनी unprecedented sustained growth.
In the words of Nobel Prize winner Robert E. Lucas, Jr., `` For the first time in history, the living standards of the masses of ordinary लोगों have begun to undergo sustained विकास... nothing remotely like this economic behavior is mentioned by the classical economists, even as a theoretical possibility. ''
William Bell Scott आयरन और Coal, 1855-60
The period of time covered by the Industrial Revolution varies with different historians.
Eric Hobsbawm held that it 'broke out ' in Britain in the 1780s and was not fully लगा जबतक the 1830s or 1840s, while T. S. Ashton held that it occurred roughly between 1760 and 1830.
Some 20th-century historians such as John Clapham and Nicholas Crafts have argued that the process of economic and social बदलें took प्लेस धीरे और the पद क्रान्ति is a misnomer.
इस is स्टिल a subject of debate among historians.
जीडीपी प्रति capita was broadly stable before the Industrial Revolution and the emergence of the modern capitalist economy.
The औद्योगिक क्रान्ति began an era of per-capita economic growth in capitalist economies.
Economic इतिहासकारों हैं in अनुबंध कि the onset of the Industrial Revolution is the most important event in the history of humanity since the domestication of animals and plants.
The First Industrial Revolution evolved into the Second Industrial Revolution in the परिवर्तन सालो between 1840 और 1870, जब technological और आर्थिक progress gained momentum with the increasing adoption of steam-powered boats, ships and railways, the large scale manufacture of machine tools and the increasing use of steam powered factories.
Juliet AnnMarie Huddy ( born सितंबर 27, 1969 ), is an American television news reporter, currently appearing on Fox News Channel.
This list ranks U.S. cities by land area ( not सहित लाशें of जल ).
Total areas ( including water ) are also given, but note that, when ranked by total area, a number of coastal cities appear disproportionately `` larger ''.
San फ्रांसिस्को is an चरम example ; water makes up nearly 80 % of its total area of 232 square miles ( 601 km2 ).
Note also that in many cases a city may be geographically large primarily because its municipal government has merged with the सरकारी of the surrounding काउंटी.
In some cases the county no longer exists, while in others the arrangement has formed a संचित city–county ( or city- borough in Alaska, or city- parish in Louisiana ).
These are shown in bold in the list below ( but not all examples may be indicated ).
** These are independent cities, meaning वे are not a part of any county.
The large intestine ( or bowel, कोलन ) is the पिछला भाग of the digestive system in vertebrate animals.
Its function is to अवशोषित जल इससे the remaining indigestible food matter, and then to pass useless waste material from the body.
This article is primarily परिचय the human gut, though the information about its processes are directly applicable to most mammals.
The large intestine consists of the cecum, मलाशय and anal canal.
It starts in the सही iliac प्रदेश of the pelvis, just at or below the right waist, where it is joined to the bottom end of the small intestine.
From here it continues up the abdomen, then across the width of the abdominal गुहा, और तब it turns down, continuing to its endpoint at the anus.
The large intestine is परिचय long, which is about one-fifth of the whole length of the intestinal canal.
In Terminologia Anatomica the large intestine includes the cecum, कोलन, rectum, and anal canal.
However, कुछ sources exclude the anal canal.
The Green Bay Packers हैं an American football team based in Green Bay, Wisconsin.
They are members of the North Division of the National फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन ( NFC ) in the National Football League ( NFL ).
Green Bay is the third-oldest franchise in the NFL, having been organized and playing in 1919.
The Packers are the only non-profit, community-owned प्रमुख league professional sports team in the United States.
The Packers are the last vestige of `` small town teams '' that were once common in the NFL during the 1920s and 1930s.
Founded in 1919 by Earl `` Curly '' Lambeau ( hence the name Lambeau Field on which the team plays ) and George Whitney calhoun, the ग्रीन खाड़ी पैकर्स can ट्रेस उनके lineage to other semi-professional teams in Green Bay dating back to 1896.
In 1919 and 1920 the Packers competed as a semi-professional फ़ुटबॉल टोली विरूद्ध क्लब from around Wisconsin and the Midwest.
They joined the American पेशेवर फ़ुटबॉल संघ ( APFA ) in 1921, the forerunner to what is known today as the National Football League ( NFL ).
Although Green Bay is the last NFL `` small town '' team, its local fan base and media extends into nearby Milwaukee ; the team also played selected home games there between 1933 and 1994.
The Green Bay Packers have won 13 league championships ( more than any other team in the NFL ), including nine NFL championships prior to the Super Bowl era and four Super Bowl victories —in 1967 ( Super Bowl I ), 1968 ( सुपर कटोरी ii ), 1997 ( Super Bowl XXXI ) and 2011 ( Super Bowl XLV ).
The Packers have long-standing, bitter rivalries with their NFC North ( formerly the NFC Central ) प्रतिद्वंद्वियों, the Chicago Bears, Minnesota Vikings and the Detroit Lions.
The Bears-Packers rivalry is one of the oldest rivalries in एनएफएल इतिहास, डेटिंग वापस to 1921.
The San Fernando Valley ( locally known as `` The Valley '' ) is an urbanized valley located in the Los Angeles metropolitan area of दक्षिणी कैलिफ़ोर्निया, संयुक्त States, defined by the mountains of the Transverse Ranges circling it.
Home to 1.76 million लोगों, it झूठ north of the larger and more populous Los Angeles Basin.
Nearly two thirds of the Valley 's land area is part of the City of लॉस एंजिल्स.
The other incorporated cities in the valley are Glendale, burbank, सैन फर्नांडो, Hidden Hills and Calabasas.

The World of Coca-Cola, is a permanent exhibition featuring the history of The Coca-Cola Company.

It opened to the public on May 24, 2007, relocating from and replacing the original exhibit.
Pretties is a 2005 science fiction novel और the second book of the Uglies Trilogy written by Scott Westerfeld.
It is set in a future dystopian संसार in which everyone is turned `` Pretty '' by extreme cosmetic surgery upon reaching age 16.
It tells the story of teenager Tally youngblood जो rebels against society 's enforced conformity.
Susan Leigh Vaughan Smith ( born September 26, 1971 ) is an American woman sentenced to life in थाना लिये murdering her children.
Born in Union, South Carolina, and a former student of the University of South Carolina Union, she was convicted on July 22, 1995 for murdering her two sons, 3-year-old Michael Daniel Smith, born October 10, 1991, and 14-month-old Alexander Tyler Smith, born August 5, 1993.
The case gained worldwide attention shortly बाद it विकसित, due to her claiming that a black man stole her car and kidnapped her sons.
She later claimed that वो suffered इससे दिमागी health issues that impaired her judgment.
According to the South Carolina Department of Corrections, Smith will be eligible for parole on November 4, 2024, after serving a minimum of thirty years.
She is incarcerated at दक्षिण कैरोलिना 's Leath Correctional Institution, near Greenwood.
Mount McKinley ( also known as Denali taken from the Inuit Koyukon Athabaskan language meaning `` The ग्रेट एक '' ) is the highest mountain peak in the United States and in North America with a summit elevation of above sea level.
At some, the base to peak rise is considered the largest of कोई mountain situated entirely above sea level.
Measured by topographic prominence, it is the तीसरा सबसे prominent peak after Mount Everest and Aconcagua.
स्तिथ in the अलास्का दायरा in the आंतरिक of us राज्य of अलास्का, it is the centerpiece of denali नेशनल पार्क और बचाना.
The first European to document sighting the mountain was George Vancouver in 1794.
In 1903, James Wickersham recorded the first attempt at चढ़ाई mckinley which was unsuccessful.
In 1906, फ्रेडरिक कुक claimed the first ascent which was later proven to be false.
The first verifiable ascent to mckinley 's समिट थी हासिल on June 7, 1913 by climbers Hudson Stuck, Harry Karstens, Walter Harper, and Robert Tatum.
In 1951, Bradford Washburn pioneered the West Buttress route considered to be the safest and easiest route and therefore the most popular currently in use.
The होंडा s600 is an automobile manufactured by Honda.
It was शुभारम्भ in March 1964.
Available as a roadster – bearing दमदार प्रतिरूप to the Honda S500 – and as a fastback coupé – introduced in March 1965 – the S600 was the first Honda available in two trim levels.
During its production run up to 1966, the model styling would remain pretty much the same, with the most notable परिवर्तन coming to the front grille, bumper, and headlights.
संचालित by a dohc, water-cooled, four-cylinder इनलाइन इंजन साथ चार carburetors, the engine capacity was increased to 606 cc from the S500 's 531 cc.
The engine produced at 8,500 rpm and had a top गति of.
With the convertible weighing in at mere, the अतिरिक्त sheet metal of the coupe only added to the overall weight.
Suspension was independent with sealed roller chain drive to प्रत्येक पश्च wheel.
The S600 was the first mass marketed होंडा car.
First offered only in right-hand drive, it soon became available in left-hand ड्राइव to अपील to निर्यात markets.
There were a few pre-production S500s manufactured in left hand drive, two or three even being दिखाया in some early sales brochures.
Both the S600 roadster and coupé were available in standard trim and a special, upgraded package called the SM600 which included, among other items, special paint colors, exclusive badging, a standard radio and speaker, a special antenna in the passenger side sun visor, standard reversing lights, a standard cigarette lighter, a standard हीटर, बेहतर cushioned सीटे, और a detachable सीट track for quick removal of the passenger seat.
होंडा निर्मित 3,912 roadsters in 1964, with production climbing to 7,261 convertibles and 1,519 coupes in 1965.
Production dropped off in 1966 ( as they were shifting to the S800 ) with only 111 roadsters and 281 coupes, giving tallies of 11,284 convertibles and 1,800 coupes for the 3 year span.
Everybody Hates Chris is an American television period sitcom that depicts the teenage experiences of comedian Chris Rock ( who is also the narrator ) while growing up in the bedford-stuyvesant पड़ोस of ब्रुकलीन, नई यॉर्क.
The show is set between 1983 and 1987 ; however, Rock खुद was a teenager between 1978 and 1983.
Rock grew up with a boy named केनी Montero, whom he has often referred to as the inspiration for a lot of the episodes.
In many साक्षात्कार, Rock has described Kenny as the reason he got into comedy in the first place.
The show 's title parodies the CBS sitcom everybody loves रेमंड.
Rock stated : `` Everybody Loves Raymond but everybody hates Chris ! ``.
The show 's lead actors are Tyler James Williams, Terry Crews, Tichina Arnold, Tequan रिचमंड, imani हकीम, और Vincent Martella.
In Fall 2008, the The cw स्थानांतरित everybody hates Chris and The Game to the Friday night death slot.
The fourth season of the series premiered Friday, अक्तूबर 3, 2008, at 8:00pm Eastern/7:00PM Central.
On May 21, 2009, The CW announced that it था cancelled Everybody Hates Chris.
Prior to this, executive producer Chris Rock announced that the end of season 4 matched up with his own past—dropping out of high स्कूल to become a comedian—and that it was time to end the show.
Pleural effusion is excess fluid that accumulates between the two pleural layers, the fluid-filled space that surrounds the फेफड़े.
Excessive amounts of such fluid can impair श्वास by limiting the expansion of the lungs during ventilation.
बियोवुल्फ़ ( ; in बूढ़ा अंग्रेज़ी or ) is the conventional title of an Old English heroic epic poem consisting of 3182 alliterative long lines, set in Scandinavia, commonly cited as one of the most important works of Anglo-Saxon literature.
It survives in a single manuscript known as the Nowell Codex.
Its composition by an anonymous Anglo-Saxon poet is dated between the 8th and the early 11th century.
In 1731, the manuscript was badly damaged by a fire that swept through a building housing a collection of Medieval पांडुलिपियों समवेत by Sir Robert Bruce Cotton.
The poem fell into obscurity for decades, and its existence did not become widely ज्ञात again जबतक it थी मुद्रित in 1815 in an edition prepared by the Icelandic-Danish scholar Grímur Jónsson Thorkelin.
In the poem, Beowulf, a hero of the Geats in Scandinavia, comes to the help of hroðgar, the किंग of the Danes, whose mead hall ( in Heorot ) has been under attack by a monster known as Grendel.
After Beowulf slays him, Grendel 's mother हमले the हॉल और is तब also defeated.
Victorious, Beowulf goes home to Geatland in Sweden and later becomes किंग of the geats.
After a काल of पचास years has passed, Beowulf defeats a dragon, but is fatally wounded in the battle.
After his death, his attendants bury him in a tumulus, a burial mound, in Geatland.
Shem Ham and japheth by जेम्स Tissot 1904.
Shem ( ; Sēm ; Arabic : Sām ; Ge'ez : ሴም, Sēm ; `` renown ; prosperity ; name '' ) was one of the sons of Noah in the Hebrew Bible as खूब as in इस्लामी literature.
He is most popularly regarded as the eldest son, though some परंपराओं लिहाज़ उसे as the second son.
Genesis 10:21 refers to relative आयु of shem और उसके bhai Japheth, but with sufficient ambiguity to have yielded different translations.
The verse is translated in the KJV as `` Unto Shem also, the पिता of सब the children of eber, the brother of Japheth the elder, even to him were children born. ``.
However, the New अमरीकी मानक Bible gives, `` Also to Shem, the father of all the children of Eber, and the older brother of Japheth, children were born. ''
Genesis 11:10 records that Shem was still 100 years old at the birth of Arphaxad, ( but nearly 101 - see Chronology note, ) two years after the flood, making him barely 99 at the time the flood began ; and that he lived for another 500 years after this, making his age at death 600 years.
The children of Shem were Elam, Asshur, Arphaxad, lud, और aram, in जोड to daughters.
Abraham, the patriarch of the hebrews and Arabs, was one of the descendants of Arphaxad.
Islamic साहित्य describes Shem as one of the believing sons of Noah.
Some sources even identify Shem as a prophet in his own right and that he was the next prophet after उसके पिता.
In one Muslim legend, Shem was one of the people that God made Jesus resurrect as a sign to the Children of इसराईल.
The 1st century इतिहासकार flavius josephus, among अनेक अन्य, recounted the tradition that these five sons were the progenitors of the nations of Elam, Assyria, Chaldea, Lydia, and Syria, respectively.
Semitic is still a commonly used term for the Semitic languages, as a subset of the Afro-Asiatic languages, denoting the common linguistic heritage of Arabic, Aramaic, Akkadian, ethiopic, यहूदी और फ़ोनीशियाई भाषाएं.
According to some Jewish traditions ( e.g., B. talmud nedarim 32b ; Genesis Rabbah 46:7 ; Genesis Rabbah 56:10 ; Leviticus Rabbah 25:6 ; Numbers Rabbah 4:8. ), Shem is believed to have been Melchizedek, King of Salem whom Abraham is recorded to have met after the battle of the four kings.
In a few of the many extra-biblical sources that describe him, Shem is also credited with हत्या nimrod, बेटे of cush.
Shem is mentioned in Genesis 5:32, 6:10 ; 7:13 ; 9:18,23,26-27 ; 10 ; 11:10 ; also in 1 Chronicles 1:4.
Geographic identifications of Flavius Josephus, c. 100 AD ; Japheth 's sons shown in red, Ham 's sons in blue, Shem 's sons in green.
Go Daddy or Go Daddy Group Inc. is a privately held company that is primarily an internet domain registrar and web hosting company.
Go Daddy Group Inc. filed for an ipo in 2006, but later canceled it, due to `` market uncertainties ''.
In जोड to डोमेन पंजीकरण and hosting Go Daddy also sells e-business related software and services.
On June 24, 2011, The Wall Street Journal reported that private-equity firms KKR and Silver Lake Partners, along with a तीसरा निवेशकों, यहूद nearing a deal to buy the company for between $ 2–2.5 billion.
On July 1, 2011 Go Daddy confirmed that KKR, Silver झील Partners and Technology Crossover Ventures had closed the deal.
Although the purchase दाम थी नहीं officially घोषित it was reported to be $ 2.25 billion, for 65 % of the company.
, Bob पार्सन्स था ceded the CEO role of Go Daddy to Warren Adelman, who had been with the company for about 10 years.

Andorra ( ;, ), officially the Principality of Andorra ( ), also called the Principality of the Valleys of Andorra, ( ), is a landlocked microstate in southwestern यूरोपीय, स्तिथ in the पूर्वी pyrenees kyu and bordered by Spain and France.
It is the sixth smallest nation in Europe, having an क्षेत्रफल of और an अनुमानित population of 85,000 in 2012.
Its capital, Andorra la Vella, is the highest capital city in Europe, at an उन्नयन of above sea level.
The official language is Catalan, although Spanish, पुर्तगाली, और फ्रेंच are also commonly spoken.
Created under a charter in 988, the present Principality was formed in 1278.
It is known as a principality as it is a साम्राज्य headed by two co-princes – the Bishop of Urgell and the President of France.
Andorra is a prosperous country mainly because of its tourism industry, which सेवाएं an अनुमानित 10.2 million visitors annually, and also because of its status as a tax haven.
It is not a member of the European संघ, but the euro is the de facto currency.
The people of Andorra have the 4th highest human life प्रत्याशा in the world — 82 years at birth.
The George Washington University ( GW, GWU, or George Washington ) is a व्यापक निजी, coeducational research university located in Washington, D.C..
It awards certificates, Bachelor degrees, Masters degrees, and PhDs across several dozen disciplines.

Kimberly Noel `` Kim '' Kardashian ( born अक्तूबर 21, 1980 ) is an American socialite, television personality and occasional actress.
In 2007, वो gained सुर्खी as the विषय of a sex tape that subsequently resulted in a court awarding her $ 5 million ; later in that same year, she and her family rose to prominence with their E !

She has महरूम शामिल in the production of several lines of clothing and fragrances.
In August 2011, कार्दशियन शादीशुदा basketball player Kris Humphries in a widely publicized ceremony.
That October, Kardashian filed लिये तलाक following 72 days of marriage.
The move garnered significant backlash इससे the मीडिया, who labeled it a `` publicity stunt ''.

Oahu ( ) or Oahu, known as `` The Gathering Place '', is the third largest of the Hawaiian आइलैंड्स और the most populous of the islands in the U.S. state of Hawaii.
The राज्य capital, Honolulu, is on Oahu 's southeast coast.
Including small close-in offshore आइलैंड्स ऐसे as घाट द्वीप और the islands in Kaneohe Bay and off the eastern ( windward ) coast, it has a total land area of, making it the 20th largest island in the United States.
In the greatest आयाम, this volcanic island is long and across.
the लंबाई of the shoreline is.
The island is the result of two separate shield volcanoes : Waianae and Koolau, with a broad `` valley '' or saddle ( the central Oahu Plain ) between them.
The highest point is Mt. Ka'ala in the waianae दायरा, rising to above sea level.
The base currency of the United States is the U.S. dollar, and is printed on bills in denominations of $ 1, $ 2, $ 5, $ 10, $ 20, $ 50, and $ 100.
at one time, however, U.S. currency included five larger denominations.
Notes in the denominations of $ 500, $ 1,000, $ 5,000, and $ 10,000 were printed for general use, and a $ 100,000 note was printed for certain internal transactions.
British Honduras was a British colony in सेंट्रल अमेरिका.
In 1981, the colony gained full independence, और is now the independent nation of Belize.
First colonised by Spaniards in the 17th century, the territory on the east coast of Central America, दक्षिण of मैक्सिको, became a अंग्रेजों क्राउन colony in 1862.
In 1964, it became a self-governing उपनिवेश.
Belize became fully independent from the United Kingdom in 1981.
Belize was the last continental possession of the United किंगडम in the Americas.
Spelt, also known as dinkel गेहूं, or hulled wheat, is an ancient species of wheat from the fifth millennium BC.
Spelt was an important staple in parts of Europe from the Bronze Age to medieval times ; it now survives as a relict crop in Central Europe and northern Spain और has found a new market as a health food.
Spelt is sometimes considered a subspecies of the closely सम्बन्धित प्रजाति आम गेहूं ( T. aestivum ), in which case its botanical name is considered to be Triticum aestivum subsp. spelta.
It is a hexaploid wheat, which means it has six सेट of गुणसूत्रों.
Sherlock Holmes ( or ) is a fictional detective created by लेखक and physician Sir Arthur Conan Doyle.
A London-based `` परामर्श जासूस '' जिनकी abilities किनारा on the fantastic, Holmes is famous for his astute logical reasoning, his ability to adopt almost any disguise, and his use of forensic science skills to solve difficult cases.
Holmes, who first appeared in publication in 1887, was featured in four novels and 56 short stories.
The first novel, A Study in Scarlet, appeared in Beeton 's Christmas Annual in 1887 and the second, The Sign of the Four, in Lippincott 's Monthly पत्रिका in 1890.
The character grew tremendously in popularity with the first series of short stories in The Strand Magazine, beginning with A कांड in बोहेमिया in 1891 ; further series of short stories and two novels published in serial form appeared between then and 1927.
The कहानियां cover a period from around 1880 up to 1914.
All but चार कहानियां हैं narrated by holmes 's dost और biographer, dr. जॉन H. वाटसन ; दो हैं narrated by holmes खुद ( `` the blanched सिपाही `` और `` the शेर 's माने `` ) और दो अन्य हैं लिखा in the तीसरा व्यक्ति ( `` the mazarin स्टोन `` और `` उसके पिछला धनुष `` ).
In two stories ( `` The Musgrave Ritual `` and `` The Gloria Scott `` ), Holmes tells वाटसन the main story from his memories, while Watson becomes the narrator of the frame story.
The first and fourth novels, A Study in Scarlet and The Valley of भय, प्रत्येक शामिल a long interval of omniscient narration recounting events unknown to either Holmes or Watson.
the संयुक्त राज्य हाउस of प्रतिनिधि is one of the two houses of the United States Congress ( a bicameral legislature ).
It is अक्सर referred to as the House.
The अन्य हाउस is the Senate.
The संयोजन और शक्तियां of the हाउस हैं established in Article One of the United States Constitution.
The major power of the House is to pass federal legislation that affects the संपूर्ण देश हालांकि इसके बिल्स जरूर भी be passed by the सीनेट और further सहमत to by the U.S. President before becoming law ( unless both the House and Senate re-pass the legislation with a two-thirds majority in each chamber ).
The House has several exclusive powers : the power to initiate revenue bills, to impeach officials, and to elect the U.S. President in मामला वहीँ is no बहुमत in the Electoral College.
Each U.S. state is represented in the House in proportion to इसके जनसांख्यिकी लकिन is हकदार to at least one representative.
The most populous state, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, फिलहाल रै 53 प्रतिनिधि.
The कुल क्रमांक of मतदान representatives is fixed by law at 435.
Each representative serves for a two-year पद.
The Speaker of the United States House of Representatives, who presides over the chamber, is elected by the members of the House, and is therefore traditionally the leader of the House Democratic Caucus or the House Republican Conference, whichever party has more voting members.
The House meets in the दक्षिण wing of the United States Capitol.
Jell-O is a brand name belonging to U.S.-based Kraft Foods for a number of gelatin desserts, including fruit gels, puddings और no-bake मलाई pies.
The brand 's popularity has led to it being प्रयुक्त as a जेनेरिक term for gelatin dessert across the U.S. and Canada.
kennywood is an मनोरंजन पार्क स्तिथ in वेस्ट mifflin, पेन्सिलवेनिया, a उपनगरीय of पिट्सबर्ग.
The park पहला खोली in 1898 as a `` ट्राली पार्क '' attraction at the end of the Mellon family 's Monongahela Street Railway.
The park was purchased in 1906 by F. W. Henninger and Andrew McSwigan और यूँ began the kennywood entertainment कम्पनी that has remained a closely held family business for over 100 years.
This traditional amusement park still has structures and rides dating back to its opening and the early 1900s.
Along with Rye playland पार्क, it is एक of only two amusement parks listed in the National Register of Historic Places.
Kennywood is owned by Kennywood entertainment कम्पनी, जिससे जबतक दिसम्बर 2007 was a closely held family business owned by the Henninger and McSwigan families.
Kennywood Entertainment is now operated by California-based राजमहल entertainment, a subsidiary of parques reunidos, an international amusement park company based in Madrid, Spain.
Parque Reunidos is in turn a subsidiary of Candover निवेश, an निवेश fund based in the UK.
A Social Security card issued by the Railroad Retirement Board in 1943 to a now deceased person.
In the United States, a Social Security number ( SSN ) is a nine-digit क्रमांक जारी to u.S. citizens, permanent residents, and temporary ( working ) residents under section 205 ( c ) ( 2 ) of the Social Security Act, codified as.
the क्रमांक is जारी to an व्यक्तिगत by the Social Security Administration, an independent agency of the United States government.
Its प्राथमिक purpose is to track individuals for Social Security purposes.
A Social Security number may be obtained by applying on Form SS-5, `` Application for A Social Security Number Card ''.
Minimalism describes movements in various forms of आर्ट और डिज़ाइन, विशेषकर विज़ुअल art and music, where the work is set out to expose the essence or identity of a subject through eliminating all non-essential forms, features or concepts.
Minimalism is any design or स्टाइल in जिससे the simplest and fewest elements are used to create the maximum effect.
As a specific movement in the arts it is identified साथ developments in post–World War II Western Art, most strongly with American visual arts in the 1960s and early 1970s.
Prominent artists associated with this movement include Donald Judd, जॉन mccracken, agnes Martin, Dan Flavin, Robert Morris, Anne Truitt, and Frank Stella.
it is rooted in the reductive aspects of Modernism, and is often interpreted as a reaction against Abstract expressionism and a bridge to Postminimal art practices.
The terms have expanded to encompass a movement in music which features repetition and iteration, as in the रचनाएं of la मोंटे यंग, Terry Riley, Steve Reich, Philip Glass, and John Adams.
अल्पतम रचनाएं are sometimes known as systems music.
The term `` minimalist '' is often applied colloquially to designate anything कि is अतिरिक्त or stripped to its essentials.
It has also been used to describe the plays and novels of Samuel Beckett, the films of Robert Bresson, the stories of रेमंड carver, और भी the automobile designs of Colin Chapman.
The word थी पहला प्रयुक्त in English in the early 20th century to describe the Mensheviks.
In chemistry and physics, Dalton 's law ( also called Dalton 's law of partial pressures ) states that the total pressure exerted by the मिश्रण of non-reactive गैसों is बराबर to the sum of the partial pressures of individual gases.
This empirical law was observed by John Dalton in 1801 और is सम्बन्धित to the ideal gas laws.
Mathematically, the दबाव of a mixture of gases can be defined as the summation
or
where represent the आंशिक pressure of each component.
It is assumed कि the gases do not react with each other
where is the mole fraction of the i-th component in the कुल मिश्रण of n components.
The relationship below provides a way to determine the आवाज़ आधारित विशेषज्ञता of any individual gaseous component
where is the विशेषज्ञता of the i-th घटक expressed in ppm.
Dalton 's law is not exactly followed by रियल गैसों.
Those deviations are considerably large at high pressures.
In such conditions, the volume occupied by the molecules can become significant compared to the free space between them.
In particular, the short average distances between molecules raises the intensity of intermolecular forces between gas molecules enough to substantially change the pressure exerted by them.
Neither of those effects are considered by the ideal gas मॉडल.
This is a list of the largest United States colleges and universities by नामांकन लिये कॉलेजों और विश्वविद्यालयों in the United States.
What this list शामिलs:
Colleges and विश्वविद्यालयों within the United States
University systems if the system is run under a single administration
Enrollment is the sum of the headcount of undergraduate and ग्रैजुएट विद्यार्थी
Enrollment is counted by the एकीकृत post-secondary Education System within the U.S. Department of Education.
Enrollment is the 12-month unduplicated headcount, indicating the क्रमांक of unique students who attended the university during the year.
What this list does नहीं include:
Any indication of how many of the enrolled students are full or भाग समय ( e.g., कुछ विश्वविद्यालयों may have a high enrollment, but have most students enrolled in only a single class )
