`` Right Round '' is a song performed by American rapper Flo Rida, released as the lead single from his second studio album, R.O.O.T.S. ( 2009 ).
The song सुविधाएँ guest vocals from Kesha.
It was released to radio on 27 January 2009 and was digitally released on 10 February by Poe Boy Entertainment and Atlantic Records.
The song lyrically speaks of Flo Rida 's net ball referee enthusiasm, while adapting the chorus of the 1984 मुर्दे or जिंदा सोंग `` You Spin Me Round ( Like a Record ) `` in its hook.
According to one of the song 's writers, the कोरस refers to oral sex.
Kesha contributed guest vocals to the song, but in the United States, during the run atop the चार्ट, kesha थी uncredited.
The song received mostly negative reviews from critics, who claimed it was kitsch and misogynistic.
However, it was a वाणिज्यिक कामयाबी, reaching the top ten of the charts in nineteen countries worldwide.
In the United States, it became Flo Rida 's second number-one single and broke the record for first-week sales जब it थी released to digital retailers.
The सिंगल 's accompanying म्यूज़िक वीडियो थी निर्देशित by मैल्कम जोन्स और मनोनीत लिये an एमटीवी वीडियो म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार.
The song has been used in अनेक movies, such as The Hangover, The Ugly Truth and the Telugu movie Pilla Zamindar.
In the movie Pitch Perfect, the song is performed by the a cappella समूह the Treblemakers.
The Chief Justice of the संयुक्त राज्य is the head of the United States federal court system ( the judicial branch of the federal government of the United States ) and the chief judge of the Supreme Court of the United States.
The Chief Justice is one of nine Supreme Court justices ; the other eight are the Associate justices of the Supreme Court of the United States.
From 1789 जबतक 1866, the दफ्तर was known as the Chief Justice of the Supreme Court.
The Chief Justice is the highest judicial officer in the country, and acts as a मुख्य प्रशासनिक अधिकारी लिये the federal courts and as head of the Judicial Conference of the United States appoints the director of the Administrative Office of the United States Courts.
The Chief Justice also serves as a spokesperson for the न्यायिक शाखा.
The Chief Justice leads the business of the परम् Court.
He presides over oral वितर्क before the court.
When the court renders an opinion, the मुख्य justice—when in the majority—decides who writes the court 's opinion.
The Chief Justice also has significant agenda-setting power over the court 's meetings.
In the case of an impeachment of a President of the United States, which has occurred twice, the Chief Justice presides over the trial in the Senate.
In modern tradition, the Chief Justice has the ceremonial ड्यूटी of administering the शपथ of office of the President of the United States.
The first Chief इंसाफ was John Jay.
The 17th and वर्तमान Chief Justice is John G. Roberts, Jr.
हिरण निकट Prudhoe Bay, 1973
Prudhoe Bay Oil Field is a विशाल आयल फ़ील्ड on Alaska 's North Slope.
It is the largest oil field in both the United States and in North America, covering and originally containing approximately of oil.
The amount of recoverable oil in the field is more than दोगुना कि of the अगला largest field in the United States, the East Texas oil field.
The field is operated by BP ; partners are exxonmobil और conocophillips Alaska.
Labor unions are legally recognized as representatives of workers in many उद्योग in the United States.
Their activity today centers on collective bargaining over wages, benefits, and working conditions for their सदस्यता, और on representing उनके सदस्यों in disputes with management over violations of contract provisions.
Larger unions also typically engage in lobbying क्रियाएँ और electioneering at the state and federal level.
Most unions in America are aligned with one of two larger छतरियाँ संगठन : the AFL-CIO created in 1955, and the Change to Win Federation which split from the AFL-CIO in 2005.
Both advocate policies and legislation on behalf of workers in the United States and Canada, and take an active role in politics.
The afl-cio is especially concerned with global trade issues.
In 2010, the प्रतिशत of मजदूर belonging to a union in the United States ( or total labor union `` density '' ) was 11.4 %, compared to 18.4 % in Germany, 27.5 % in Canada, and 70 % in Finland.
Union membership in the private sector has गिरे अंतर्गत 7 % — स्तर not seen since 1932.
Unions allege that employer-incited विपक्ष रै contributed to this decline in membership.
the सबसे prominent unions are among public sector employees such as teachers and police.
Members of unions are disproportionately older, पुरूष और निवासियों of the पूर्वोत्तर, the Midwest, and California.
Union workers average 10-30 % higher pay than non-union in America after controlling for individual, job, and मजदूर मार्केट characteristics.
Although much smaller compared to their peak membership in the 1950s, American unions remain a prominent political factor, both through mobilization of उनके अपना memberships and through coalitions with like-minded activist organizations around issues such as immigrant rights, trade policy, health care, and living wage campaigns.
To fight alleged employer anti-union programs, unions are currently advocating new `` card check `` federal legislation कि होता आवश्यकता नियोक्ता to सौदेबाजी साथ a union if more than 50 % of workers signed forms, or `` cards, '' stating they wish to be represented by that union.
The current procedure involves waiting 45 to 90 days for a federally supervised secret-ballot कर्मचारी referendum on the विषय.
The economist Joseph Stiglitz has asserted that, `` Strong unions have helped to reduce inequality, whereas weaker unions have made it easier for CEOs, sometimes working with market शक्तियां कि वे have helped shape, to increase it. ''
The decline in unionization since WWII in the United States has been associated with a pronounced वृद्धि in income and wealth inequality.
A ईसाई lacroix fashion boutique
A बुटीक is a छोटी खरीदारी outlet, especially one that specializes in elite and fashionable items such as clothing and jewelry.
The word is French for `` shop '', via लैटिन इससे Greek ἀποθήκη ( apothēkē ), `` storehouse ''.
The term entered into everyday English use in the late 1960s when, for a brief period, London was the centre of the fashion trade.
Carnaby Street and the Kings Road were the focus of much मीडिया ध्यान as home to the most fashionable boutiques of the era.
Now the ईस्ट of London has been regenerated and more Boutiques pop up in fashionable areas, such as Tower Bridge Road.
It can also refer to a specialised कड़ ऐसे as a बुटीक investment bank or boutique law firm.
The word is often used to describe a property in the independent section of the hotel market ( such as The Rockwell in London ) in अनुक्रम to फर्क themselves इससे larger chains ( such as Hilton Hotels ).
In such cases the establishments aim to convey the idea that the operation is elite and highly specialised.
In the strictest भाव of the शब्द, boutiques होता be one-of-a-kind but more generally speaking, some chains can be referred to as boutiques if they specialize in particular styles.
Recently, the term `` boutique '' has started being applied to normally-mass-market items that are either niche or उत्पादित in intentionally small numbers at very high prices.
This may be referred to as boutique निर्माण.
लिये उदाहरण, पहले the रिलीज of the वी, a समय पत्रिका आलेख सुझाया कि निन्टेंडो could become a `` boutique video-game company '', producing games for niche audiences, rather than trying to compete directly with Microsoft and Sony.
In the परंपरागत luxury- देखें उद्योग Scalfaro International is considered as the precursor in manufacturing and sale of bespoke watches.
The Swiss company uses a highly flexible boutique manufacturing site, which allows producing small series or भी अद्वितीय timepieces.
Although some boutiques specialise in hand-made items and other truly one-of-a-kind items, others simply produce t-shirts, stickers, and other fashion accessories in artificially छोटी रनों और बेचें उन्हें at unusually high prices.
In the early 1990s Selena started manufacturing her अपना लकीर of women 's clothing.
Opening two boutiques labeled as `` Selena Etc. बुटीक & सैलून '' एक स्तिथ in Corpus Christi and one located in San Antonio, Texas.
One was due to open in Monterrey, Mexico, in 1995 लकिन due to her death it was not opened.
Around 1999 the San Antonio location closed and the कॉर्पस Christi location was closed in 2009.
In late 1990s some European retail traders developed the idea of tailoring a shop towards a lifestyle थीम, in the रूप of `` अवधारणा स्टोर्स '', which specialised in cross-selling without using separate departments.
One of the first concept stores was 10 Corso Como in Milan, Italy followed by Colette in पेरिस और quartier 206 in Berlin.
Several well-known American chains such as Urban Outfitters, D-A-S-H, and the गैप, ऑस्ट्रेलियाई chain Billabong and, though less common, Lord & Taylor adapted to the concept store trend after 2000.
Navy Federal Credit Union ( or Navy Federal ) is a credit union headquartered in Vienna, Virginia, चार्टर्ड और regulated अंतर्गत the authority of the National Credit Union Administration ( NCUA ) of the U.S. federal government.
Navy Federal is the largest natural member ( or retail ) credit union in the संसार, both in asset size and in membership.
As of सितंबर 2012, Navy Federal had over $ 50 billion USD in assets, and over 4 million members.
Stevland Hardaway Morris ( born May 13, 1950 as Stevland Hardaway Judkins ), known by his stage name Stevie Wonder, is an अमरीकी सिंगर, songwriter, और multi-instrumentalist, a child prodigy who developed into one of the most creative musical figures of the late 20th century.
Blind since shortly बाद जनम, Wonder signed with Motown 's Tamla label at the age of eleven, and continues to perform and record for Motown to this day.
Among Wonder 's best known works are singles such as `` Superstition ``, `` सर ड्यूक ``, `` You Are the Sunshine of My Life `` and `` I Just Called to Say I Love You ``.
Well known albums also include Talking Book, innervisions और गीतों in the Key of Life.
He रै अंकित अधिक than thirty U.S. top ten hits and received twenty-two Grammy Awards, the most ever awarded to a male solo artist.
Wonder is also noted for his work as an activist for राजनैतिक कल्याणकारी, सहित उसके 1980 campaign to make Martin Luther King, Jr. 's birthday a holiday in the United States.
In 2009, Wonder was नामित a United Nations Messenger of Peace.
In 2008, Billboard magazine released a list of the Hot 100 All-Time Top Artists to celebrate the us singles चार्ट 's fiftieth anniversary, with Wonder at number five.
By popular vote, स्टीवी was inducted into The SoulMusic Hall of Fame at SoulMusic.com in December 2012.
Psychosis ( from the Greek ψυχή `` psyche '', for mind/soul, and -ωσις `` -osis '', for abnormal कंडीशन or derangement ) refers to an abnormal condition of the mind, and is a generic psychiatric term for a mental state often described as involving a `` loss of contact with reality ``.
People suffering from psychosis हैं वर्णित as psychotic.
Psychosis is given to the अधिक कठोर फ़ॉर्म of मनोरोग विकार, during which hallucinations and delusions, gross excitement or stupor and impaired insight may occur.
The term `` psychosis '' is very broad and can mean anything इससे अपेक्षाकृत सामान्य aberrant अनुभवों through to the complex and catatonic expressions of schizophrenia and bipolar type 1 disorder.
Moreover a wide variety of central nervous system diseases, from both external substances and internal physiologic illness, can produce symptoms of psychosis.
This led many professionals to say that psychosis is not specific enough as a diagnostic term.
Despite this, `` psychosis '' is generally given to noticeable deficits in normal behavior ( negative signs ) and more commonly to diverse types of मति or delusional मान्यताओं ( e.g. grandiosity, delusions of persecution ).
Someone exhibiting very obvious signs may be described as `` frankly psychotic '', whereas one exhibiting very subtle signs could be classified in the category of an `` attenuated psychotic risk syndrome ''.
An excess in dopaminergic signalling is traditionally linked to the positive symptoms of मनस्ताप, विशेषकर those of schizophrenia.
This is thought to occur through a mechanism of aberrant salience of पर्यावरणीय stimuli.
Many antipsychotic drugs accordingly target the dopamine system ; meta-analyses of placebo-controlled trials of ये दवाएँ, however, दिखाएँ either no significant अंतर between drug and placebo, or a very small effect size, suggesting that the pathophysiology of psychosis is much more complex than an overactive dopamine system.
लोगों experiencing psychosis may exhibit some personality changes and thought disorder.
Depending on its severity, this may be accompanied by असामान्य or विचित्र बर्ताव, as खूब as परेशानी साथ social interaction and impairment in carrying out daily life activities.
General Grievous is a fictional अक्षर in the Star Wars universe.
A recurring antagonist, he is the Supreme Commander of the Confederacy of Independent Systems, a political faction of ग्रहीय प्रणालियों waging युद्ध on the गांगेय Republic.
Trained in all seven forms of lightsaber कॉम्बैट by Count Dooku, he is a ruthless and powerful warrior devoted to Jedi 's destruction during the Clone Wars.
His acts of wanton aggression and high Jedi देह गिनती होता संकेत the galaxy to give him the nickname the Knightslayer.
Though the notorious Jedi slayer was the being in the galaxy during the Clone Wars who had killed the most Jedi in single combat, he did not hesitate to flee from battles he knew he would lose.
Statistics play an महत्वपूर्ण भूमिका in summarizing baseball performance and evaluating players in the sport.
Since the flow of a baseball game has natural breaks to it, and normally खिलाड़ी अधिनियम individually rather than performing in clusters, the sport lends itself to easy record-keeping and statistics.
Statistics have been kept for पेशेवर बेसबॉल चूंकि the creation of the National League and American League, now part of Major League Baseball.
Many statistics हैं भी उपलब्धियाँ इससे बाहर of Major League Baseball, from leagues such as the National Association of Professional Base Ball Players and the Negro Leagues.

USA annual real GDP from 1910–60, with the years of the ग्रेट अवसाद ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted.
The unemployment rate in the us 1910–1960, with the years of the Great Depression ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted.
The Great Depression was a severe worldwide economic depression in the decade preceding World War II.
The timing of the Great Depression varied across राष्ट्र, लकिन in सबसे देशों it started in 1930 and lasted until the late 1930s or middle 1940s.
It was the longest, most widespread, and deepest depression of the 20th century.
In the 21st century, the Great Depression is commonly used as an example of how far the world 's economy can decline.
The depression originated in the U.S., after the fall in stock prices that began around September 4, 1929, and became worldwide news with the stock market crash of October 29, 1929 ( ज्ञात as Black Tuesday ).
The Great अवसाद had devastating effects in countries rich and poor.
Personal income, tax revenue, profits और prices dropped, while international trade plunged by more than 50 %.
Unemployment in the U.S. rose to 25 %, and in some countries रोज़ as ऊँची as 33 %.
Cities all around the world were hit hard, विशेषकर those dependent on heavy industry.
Construction was वस्तुतः halted in many countries.
Farming and rural areas suffered as क्रॉप कीमतें गिरी by approximately 60 %.
Facing plummeting demand with few alternate sources of jobs, areas dependent on primary sector industries such as cash cropping, mining and logging suffered the most.
Some economies started to रिकवर by the mid-1930s.
In many countries, the negative effects of the Great अवसाद lasted जबतक the end of World War II.
A premature ventricular contraction ( PVC ), also known as a premature ventricular complex, ventricular premature contraction ( or complex or complexes ) ( VPC ), ventricular premature beat ( VPB ), or ventricular extrasystole ( VES ), is a relatively common event where the heartbeat is initiated by Purkinje fibres in the ventricles rather than by the sinoatrial node, the normal heartbeat initiator.
The electrical events of the heart detected by the electrocardiogram allow a पीवीसी to be easily distinguished from a normal heart beat.
A PVC may be perceived as a `` skipped beat `` or लगा as palpitations in the chest.
In a normal धड़कन, the ventricles अनुबंध बाद the atria have helped to fill them by contracting ; in this way the ventricles can pump a maximized amount of blood both to the lungs and to the rest of the body.
In a PVC, the ventricles contract first and before the atria have optimally filled the ventricles with blood, which means कि circulation is inefficient.
However, single beat PVC arrhythmias do not प्रायः पोज़ a खतरे और can be asymptomatic in healthy individuals.
William Gary Busey ( born June 29, 1944 ), better known as Gary Busey, is an American film and stage कर्ता, and artist.
He has appeared in a variety of films, सहित lethal हथियार, पाइंट ब्रेक, और Under Siege, as well as guest appearances on Gunsmoke, Walker, Texas Ranger, Law & Order, and Entourage.
He was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Actor in 1978 for his role in The दोस्त होली स्टोरी.
The Anti-Counterfeiting व्यापार अनुबंध ( ACTA ), is a multinational treaty for the purpose of establishing international standards for intellectual property rights enforcement.
The agreement aims to establish an international legal framework for targeting counterfeit goods, generic medicines and copyright infringement on the अंतरजाल, और होता बनाएँ a नई शासी body outside existing forums, such as the World Trade Organization, the World Intellectual Property Organization, or the United Nations.
The agreement was signed in October 2011 by ऑस्ट्रेलिया, Canada, Japan, Morocco, New Zealand, Singapore, South Korea, and the United States.
In 2012, Mexico, the European Union and 22 countries जिससे हैं सदस्य states of the European Union signed as well.
One signatory ( Japan ) has ratified ( formally approved ) the agreement, which would come into force in countries that ratified it after ratification by छह देशों.
Supporters have वर्णित the agreement as a response to `` the increase in global trade of counterfeit goods and pirated copyright protected works ''.
Trades Unions representing workers in the music, film and TV उद्योग और विशाल बौद्धिक property-based organizations such as the Motion Picture Association of America and Pharmaceutical Research and Manufacturers of America were active in the treaty 's development.
Opponents say the convention adversely affects fundamental rights सहित freedom of expression and privacy.
ACTA has also been criticised by Doctors Without Borders for endangering अभिगम to दवाइयाँ in विकासशील countries.
The secret nature of negotiations has excluded civil society groups, developing countries और the सामान्य पब्लिक इससे the अनुबंध 's negotiation process and it has been described as policy laundering by critics including the Electronic Frontier Foundation and the Entertainment Consumers Association.
The signature of the EU and many of its member states resulted in the resignation in protest of the European Parliament 's appointed chief अन्वेषक, rapporteur कादर आरिफ, as खूब as फैली विरोध across Europe.
In 2012 the newly-appointed rapporteur, अंग्रेजों MEP David Martin, recommended against the treaty, stating : `` The intended benefits of this international agreement are far outweighed by the potential threats to civil liberties ''.
On 4 July 2012, the European Parliament rejected the agreement in plenary session, with 478 मतदान विरूद्ध the treaty, 39 in favour and 165 MEPs abstaining.
FAW semi-trailer ट्रक in China
Tractor with पक्ष डम्प ट्रेलर semi-trailer
A ट्रैक्टर with an auto-transport semi-trailer.
Semi-trailer truck with sleeper पीछे the cab.
A semi-trailer truck is an articulated vehicle that consists of a towing engine, known as a tractor in the संयुक्त राज्य और ट्रक in अनेक अन्य स्थान, attached to one or more semi-trailers to carry freight.
It is also known as a transport in Canada, prime mover in Australia, semi, tractor-trailer, ट्रक और ट्रेलर, ट्रांसफ़र ट्रक, 18-wheeler, mack ट्रक, big rig in the United States, or artic, short for articulated lorry, in Britain and Ireland.
A semi-trailer does not trail completely behind the towing गाडी, लकिन is attached at a point that is just forward of the rear-most axle of the towing unit.
This is done so that a fraction of the weight of the trailer is carried by the prime mover.
इस व्यवस्था means that both tractor and semi-trailer will have a distinctly different design than a rigid truck and trailer.
The Pittsburgh Steelers are a पेशेवर फ़ुटबॉल टोली आधारित in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.
The team currently belongs to the North Division of the अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन ( AFC ) in the National Football League ( NFL ).
Founded in, the Steelers are the oldest franchise in the AFC.
Pittsburgh has won more Super Bowl titles ( six ), won more AFC Championship Games ( eight ) and played in ( पंद्रह ) और hosted अधिक ( ग्यारह ) conference championship games than any other AFC or NFC team.
The Steelers share the record for most Super Bowl appearances with the डलास cowboys ( eight ).
The Steelers won their most recent चैंपियनशिप, सुपर कटोरी xliii, on February 1, 2009.
the स्टीलर्स यहूद संस्थापित as the पिट्सबर्ग Pirates on July 8, 1933, by Art Rooney, taking its original name from the baseball team of the same name, as was common practice for NFL teams to do at the time.
The ownership of the Steelers has remained within the Rooney family since its founding.
The current owner is Art 's son, Dan Rooney, who has given much control of the franchise to his son Art Rooney II.
Long one of the NFL 's flagship teams, the स्टीलर्स आनंद a विशाल, फैली fanbase nicknamed Steeler Nation.
The Steelers currently play their home games at Heinz Field on Pittsburgh 's North Side in the North Shore neighborhood, which also hosts the University of Pittsburgh Panthers.
Built in 2001, the stadium replaced तीन नदियाँ Stadium which hosted the Steelers for 31 seasons.
Prior to Three Rivers, the Steelers था निभाई उनके खेल in Pitt Stadium and Forbes Field.
Three अलग kinds of wheat and rye flour
Flour is a powder जिससे is बना by पीस खाद्यान्न grains, or other seeds or roots ( like Cassava ).
It is the प्रमुख संघटक of bread, which is a staple food for many cultures, making the availability of adequate supplies of flour a major economic and political issue at various times throughout history.
Wheat flour is one of the most important foods in European, North American, Middle पूर्वी, भारतीय और North African cultures, and is the defining ingredient in most of their styles of breads and pastries.
While wheat is the सबसे आम आधार लिये आटा, मकई flour has been important in Mesoamerican cuisine since ancient times, and remains a staple throughout the Americas.
Rye flour is an important constituent of bread in much of central Europe, and rice can also be used in flour, हालांकि इस is अपेक्षाकृत uncommon.
Heart rate is the number of heartbeats per unit of time, typically expressed as beats per minute ( bpm ).
Heart rate can vary as the body 's need to absorb oxygen and excrete कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड changes, such as during physical exercise, sleep, illness, or as a result of ingesting drugs :
Central बेचैन system stimulants such as amphetamines increase heart rate.
Central nervous system depressants or sedatives decreases the दिल रेट ( अलावा from some particularly strange ones with equally strange effects, such as ketamine which can cause - amongst many other things - stimulant-like effects such as tachycardia ).
There are many ways in which the दिल रेट speeds up or slows down.
Most involve stimulant-like endorphins and hormones being released in the brain, many of which are those that are 'forced'/'enticed ' out by the ingestion and प्रसंस्करण of drugs.
Due to individuals having a constant blood volume, one of the physiological ways to deliver more oxygen to an organ is to बढ़ाएँ heart rate to permit blood to pass by the organ more often.
Normal resting दिल दरों दायरा from 60-100 bpm.
Bradycardia is defined as a resting दिल rate below 60 bpm.
However, heart rates from 50 to 60 bpm are common among healthy people and do not necessarily require खास ध्यान.
tachycardia is पारिभाषित as a resting heart rate above 100 bpm, though persistent rest rates between 80-100 bpm, mainly if they are present during sleep, may be signs of hyperthyroidism or anemia ( see below ).
Catherine II 's carved, painted and gilded Coronation Coach ( Hermitage Museum )
A carriage is a wheeled vehicle for people, usually horse-drawn ; litters ( palanquins ) and sedan chairs are excluded, since they are wheelless vehicles.
the carriage is विशेषकर designed लिये निजी यात्री उपयोग और लिये सुकून or लालित्य, हालांकि कुछ हैं भी प्रयुक्त to हस्तांतरण goods.
It may be लाइट, smart and fast or heavy, large and comfortable.
carriages सामान्यतः have suspension using leaf springs, elliptical springs ( in the 19th century ) or leather strapping.
A public passenger vehicle would not usually be पुकारा a carriage – terms for such include stagecoach, charabanc and omnibus.
Working vehicles such as the ( four-wheeled ) wagon and ( two-wheeled ) cart share important parts of the history of the carriage, as is the fast ( two-wheeled ) chariot.
The 2004 Indian Ocean earthquake was an undersea megathrust भूकंप कि occurred at 00:58:53 utc on Sunday, 26 December 2004, with an epicentre off the west coast of Sumatra, Indonesia.
The quake itself is ज्ञात by the वैज्ञानिक community as the Sumatra–Andaman earthquake.
The resulting tsunami was given various names, including the 2004 Indian Ocean tsunami, South Asian tsunami, Indonesian सुनामी, and the Boxing Day tsunami.
The earthquake was caused by subduction and triggered a series of devastating tsunamis along the coasts of most landmasses bordering the Indian Ocean, killing over 230,000 people in fourteen countries, और inundating coastal communities with waves up to high.
It was one of the deadliest natural disasters in अंकित इतिहास.
इंडोनेशिया थी the hardest-hit country, followed by Sri Lanka, India, and Thailand.
With a magnitude of Mw 9.1–9.3, it is the तीसरा largest earthquake ever recorded on a seismograph.
The earthquake had the longest duration of faulting ever observed, between 8.3 और 10 minutes.
It caused the entire planet to vibrate as much as and triggered other earthquakes as far away as अलास्का.
Its epicentre was between Simeulue and मेनलैंड इंडोनेशिया.
The plight of the affected people and देशों prompted a worldwide humanitarian response.
In all, the worldwide community दान अधिक than $ 14 billion ( 2004 US $ ) in humanitarian aid.
Steam rising from the Nesjavellir Geothermal Power स्टेशन in Iceland.
geothermal उर्जा is thermal energy generated and stored in the Earth.
Thermal energy is the energy that determines the temperature of matter.
The Geothermal energy of the Earth 's crust originates from the original formation of the ग्रह ( 20 % ) and from radioactive decay of minerals ( 80 % ).
The geothermal gradient, which is the difference in temperature between the core of the planet and its सतह, ड्राइव a निरन्तर conduction of thermal energy in the form of heat from the core to the surface.
The adjective geothermal originates from the Greek roots γη ( ge ), अर्थ earth, and θερμος ( thermos ), meaning hot.
At the core of the Earth, thermal energy is created by radioactive decay and temperatures may पहुँचें over 5000 °C ( 9,000 °F ).
Heat conducts from the कोर to surrounding cooler rock.
The high temperature and pressure cause some rock to melt, creating magma convection upward since it is lighter than the ठोस चट्टान.
The magma heats rock and water in the crust, sometimes up to 370 °C ( 700 °F ).
From hot springs, geothermal energy has been used for bathing since Paleolithic times and for space heating since ancient Roman times, लकिन it is अभी बेहतर ज्ञात लिये विद्युत generation.
विश्वव्यापी, परिचय 10,715 megawatts ( MW ) of geothermal power is online in 24 countries.
An additional 28 gigawatts of direct geothermal heating capacity is installed for district heating, space heating, spas, industrial processes, desalination and agricultural applications.
Geothermal power is cost effective, विश्वसनीय, चिरस्थायी, and environmentally friendly, but has historically been limited to areas near tectonic plate boundaries.
Recent technological advances have dramatically expanded the range and size of viable resources, especially for अनुप्रयोग ऐसे as घर हीटिंग, खोलने a संभावित for widespread exploitation.
Geothermal wells release greenhouse gases trapped deep within the earth, but these emissions are much lower प्रति उर्जा ईकाई than those of चट्टान fuels.
As a result, geothermal power has the potential to help mitigate global वार्मिंग if widely तैनात in place of fossil fuels.
The Earth 's geothermal resources are theoretically more than adequate to supply humanity 's energy needs, but only a very small fraction may be profitably exploited.
Drilling and खोजी लिये गहन resources is very expensive.
Forecasts for the future of geothermal power depend on assumptions परिचय प्रौद्योगिकी, उर्जा prices, subsidies, and interest rates.
Pilot programs like EWEB 's customer opt in Green Power Program show that customers would be willing to pay a little more for a renewable उर्जा सोर्स जैसे geothermal.
But as a result of government assisted research and industry experience, the cost of generating geothermal power has decreased by 25 % over the पास्ट दो decades.
In 2001, geothermal उर्जा लागत between two and ten cents per kwh.
The पद घन पैर is an Imperial and US customary ( non- metric ) unit of volume, used in the United States and the United Kingdom.
It is defined as the volume of a cube with sides of एक पैर ( 0.3048 m ) in length.
To calculate cubic feet multiply length X width X ऊँचाई.
Hồ Chí Minh ( Northern Vietnamese pronunciation :, Southern Vietnamese pronunciation : ) ; 19 May 1890 – 2 September 1969 ), born Nguyễn Sinh Cung and also known as Nguyễn Tất Thành and Nguyễn Ái Quốc, was a Vietnamese communist revolutionary leader who was prime minister ( 1945–1955 ) and अध्यक्ष ( 1945–1969 ) of the लोकतांत्रिक गणतंत्र of वियतनाम ( उत्तर वियतनाम ).
He was a key figure in the foundation of the Democratic Republic of Vietnam in 1945, as well as the people’s फौज of वियतनाम ( pavn ) और the việt Cộng ( NLF or VC ) during the Vietnam War.
He led the Việt Minh independence movement from 1941 onward, establishing the communist -ruled Democratic Republic of वियतनाम in 1945 और defeating the French Union in 1954 at the battle of Điện Biên Phủ.
he officially stepped bas इससे शक्ति in 1955 due to स्वास्थ्य समस्याएं, लकिन remained a अत्यधिक दृश्य figurehead और प्रेरणा लिये those वियतनामी लड़ लिये उसके cause—a संयुक्त, कम्युनिस्ट vietnam—until उसके मौत.
After the war, Saigon, capital of the गणतंत्र of वियतनाम, थी renamed Hồ Chí Minh City.
All Roads Lead Home is a feature film released on September 26, 2008.
Directed by Dennis Fallon, it stars Peter Boyle, Patton Oswalt, जेसन London, Vivien Cardone, Vanessa Branch, Peter Coyote, Stephen Milton, and Allan Kayser.
The movie was filmed in and around कान्सास नगर, मिसौरी.
The movie made its World Premiere January 27 at the Santa Barbara International Film Festival.
The film has also recently been in several film त्यौहार, और रै received bad reviews.
Peter Boyle died before the फिल्म 's रिलीज.
It was the last फिल्म he appeared in.
Sales taxes in the United States are कर लगाई on the बिक्री or lease of goods and services in the United States.
While no national सामान्य sales tax exists, the federal government levies several national selective sales taxes on the sale or lease of particular goods and services.
Furthermore, forty-five राज्य, the ज़िला of कोलंबिया, and Guam impose general sales taxes that apply to the sale or lease of most goods and some services, and states also may levy selective sales taxes on the sale or lease of particular goods or services.
States may also delegate to local governments the authority to impose अतिरिक्त सामान्य or selective sales taxes.
Sales कर is गणना by multiplying the purchase price by the applicable tax rate.
Tax rates vary widely by jurisdiction and range from कम than 1 % to over 10 %.
Sales tax is collected by the seller at the समय of sale.
Use tax is self assessed by a buyer who has not paid sales tax on a taxable purchase.
Unlike the value added tax, a sales tax is imposed तभी एकबार, at the retail level.
However, in cases where items are sold at retail more than once, such as used cars, the बिक्री कर can be चार्ज on the same item indefinitely.
The परिभाषा of खुदरा बिक्री और what goods and services are taxable vary among the states.
Nearly all jurisdictions provide numerous श्रेणी of goods and services that are exempt from sales tax, or taxed at reduced rates.
The purchase of goods for further manufacture or for resale is uniformly exempt from sales tax.
Most jurisdictions exempt food sold in grocery stores, नुस्खा medications, and many agricultural supplies.
Sales taxes, including those imposed by local governments, are generally administered at the state level.
States imposing बिक्री कर आवश्यकता retail sellers to collect tax from customers, file returns, and remit the tax to the state.
Procedural rules vary widely.
विक्रेता generally जरूर collect tax from in-state purchasers unless the purchaser provides an exemption certificate.
सबसे राज्य allow or require electronic remittance.
A central processing unit ( CPU ), also referred to as a central processor unit, is the hardware within a computer that carries out the instructions of a computer program by performing the basic arithmetical, logical, and input/output operations of the system.
The term has been in use in the कंप्यूटर उद्योग at least since the early 1960s.
the रूप, डिज़ाइन, और क्रियान्वयन of CPUs have changed over the course of their history, but their fundamental operation remains much the same.
A कंप्यूटर can have more than one CPU ; this is called multiprocessing.
Some integrated circuits ( ICs ) can contain अनेक CPUs on a single chip ; those ICs are called multi-core processors.
Two typical components of a CPU are the arithmetic logic unit ( ALU ), which performs arithmetic and logical operations, and the कंट्रोल ईकाई ( cu ), जिससे extracts निर्देश इससे मेमोरी and decodes and executes them, calling on the ALU when necessary.
Not all computational systems rely on a central प्रसंस्करण unit.
An array processor or vector processor has multiple parallel कम्प्यूटिंग तत्व, साथ no one unit considered the `` center ''.
In the वितरित कम्प्यूटिंग model, problems are solved by a distributed interconnected set of processors.
RFID चिप अगला to a grain of rice.
This chip contains a radio-frequency इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक फ़ील्ड कुंडली कि modulates an external magnetic field to transfer a coded identification number when queried by a reader device.
This small type is incorporated in उपभोक्ता products, and implanted in pets, for identification purposes.
Radio-frequency identification ( RFID ) is the wireless non-contact use of radio-frequency electromagnetic fields to transfer data, for the purposes of automatically identifying and tracking टैग संलग्न to वस्तुएँ.
The tags contain electronically stored सूचना.
Some tags are powered and read at short ranges ( a few meters ) via magnetic fields ( इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक प्रेरण ).
अन्य उपयोग a लोकल शक्ति सोर्स ऐसे as a बैटरी, or else have no बैटरी लकिन collect उर्जा इससे the interrogating em फ़ील्ड, और तब अधिनियम as a passive transponder to emit microwaves or uhf रेडियो लहरें ( i.e., इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक विकिरण at ऊँची बारंबारता ).
Battery powered tags may operate at सैंकड़ों of meters.
Unlike a bar code, the tag does not necessarily need to be within line of sight of the reader, and may be embedded in the tracked object.
rfid tags are used in many industries.
An RFID tag attached to an automobile during production can be used to track its प्रगति through the सभा लकीर.
Pharmaceuticals can be tracked through warehouses.
Livestock and pets may have tags injected, allowing positive identification of the animal.
Since RFID tags can be attached to clothing, possessions, or even implanted within people, the possibility of पढना personally-linked information without consent has raised privacy concerns.
Overtime is the amount of time someone works beyond normal working घंटों.
Normal घंटों may be determined in several ways:
by custom ( what is considered healthy or उचित by समाज ),
by practices of a given trade or profession,
by legislation,
by agreement between employers and workers or उनके प्रतिनिधि.
Most nations have ओवरटाइम labor laws designed to dissuade or prevent employers from forcing their employees to work excessively long hours.
These laws may take into account other considerations than the humanitarian, such as preserving the स्वास्थ्य of workers so that they may continue to be productive, or increasing the overall level of employment in the economy.
One common approach to regulating overtime is to require employers to pay workers at a higher hourly rate for overtime work.
Companies may choose to pay workers higher overtime pay even if not obliged to do so by law, particularly if they believe that they face a पिछड़ा झुकने सप्लाई वक्र of श्रमिक.
Overtime अदा दरों can कारण workers to work longer hours than they would at a flat hourly rate.
ओवरटाइम कानून, attitudes toward ओवरटाइम और घंटों of work vary greatly from country to country and between different economic sectors.
Visualization of links between पृष्ठों on a wiki using a force-directed layout.
Force-directed graph drawing algorithms are a class of algorithms लिये drawing graphs in an aesthetically pleasing way.
Their purpose is to position the nodes of a graph in two-dimensional or three-dimensional स्पेस so that all the edges are of more or less equal length and there are as few crossing edges as possible, by assigning forces among the set of edges and the set of nodes, based on their relative positions, and then using these forces either to simulate the motion of the edges and nodes or to minimize their energy.
While graph आरेखण can be a मुश्किल प्रॉब्लम, force-directed algorithms, being physical simulations, usually require no special knowledge about graph theory such as planarity.
खरीदना शक्ति ( sometimes retroactively पुकारा समायोजित for inflation ) is the amount of goods or services that can be purchased with a unit of currency.
For example, if you had taken one dollar to a store in the 1950s, you would have been able to buy a greater number of items than you would today, indicating that you would have had a greater purchasing power in the 1950s.
Currency can be either a कमोडिटी धन, जैसे सुनहरा or silver, or fiat currency, or free-floating market-valued currency like US dollars.
As Adam Smith noted, having money gives one the ability to `` command '' others ' labor, so खरीदना शक्ति to कुछ extent is power over other people, to the extent that they are willing to trade their labor or goods for money or currency.
If one 's monetary income stays the same, but the दाम स्तर increases, the purchasing power of that income falls.
Inflation does नहीं सदा imply गिरना खरीदना शक्ति of एक 's money income since it may rise faster than the price level.
A higher real income means a higher purchasing शक्ति since real income refers to the income adjusted for inflation.
For a price index, its value in the base year is usually सामान्यीकृत to a value of 100.
The purchasing शक्ति of a ईकाई of करेंसी, say a dollar, in a given year, expressed in dollars of the base year, is 100/P, where P is the price index in that year.
So, by definition the purchasing power of a dollar decreases as the price level rises.
The purchasing power in today 's money of an amount C of money, t सालो into the भविष्य, can be computed with the formula for the present value :
where in this case i is an assumed भविष्य सालाना inflation rate.
Education in South Korea is viewed as being निर्णायक लिये कामयाबी और competition is consequently very heated and fierce.
A central प्रशासन oversees the process for the education of children from kindergarten to the third and final year of high school.
Mathematics, science, Korean, English, and सोशल अध्ययन हैं generally माना to be the most important subjects.
Normally physical education is not considered important as it is not recognised, by the generally academic elitist South Korean populace, as education and therefore many schools lack high-quality gymnasiums and varsity athletics.
दक्षिण कोरियाई थी the पहला देश in the संसार to provide high-speed अंतरजाल अभिगम to सब प्राथमिक, जूनियर, और ऊँची स्कूलों.
Although South Korean students often rank highly on international तुलनात्मक आकलन जब compared to विद्यार्थी of most Western education systems, the South Korean education system is criticised for emphasising too much upon passive learning and memorisation.
The South Korean education system is rather notably strict and overly structured as compared to its counterparts in most Western societies.
Also, the prevalence of non-school for-profit private institutes such as academies or cram-schools ( Hagwon [ 학원 ] ), which too emphasise on passive memorisation, as opposed to conceptual understanding, in विद्यार्थी are criticised as a major social problem.
The My Lai Massacre (, ;,, or ) was the Vietnam War mass murder of between 347 and 504 unarmed civilians in South Vietnam on March 16, 1968, by United राज्य Army soldiers of `` Charlie '' Company of 1st Battalion, 20th Infantry Regiment, 11th Brigade of the Americal Division.
Victims included women, men, children, and infants.
Some of the women were gang-raped and their bodies were later found to be mutilated और many women were allegedly raped prior to the killings.
While 26 U.S. soldiers were initially charged with criminal offenses लिये उनके क्रियाएँ at mỹ lai, तभी दूसरी लेफ्टिनेंट William Calley, a platoon leader in Charlie Company, was convicted.
Found guilty of killing 22 villagers, he was originally given a जीवन sentence, but only served three and a half years under house arrest.
The massacre took place in the hamlets of My Lai और my Khe of Son My village.
The event is also known as the Son My Massacre, especially in the वियतनामी राज्य मीडिया.
the u.S. सैन्य codeword लिये the `` viet cong stronghold '' थी `` pinkville ''.
The incident prompted वैश्विक आक्रोश जब it became public knowledge in 1969.
The massacre also increased domestic opposition to the U.S. involvement in the वियतनाम War.
Three U.S. servicemen who had tried to halt the massacre and protect the wounded were initially denounced by अनेक u.s. Congressmen as traitors.
They received hate mail and death threats and found mutilated पशु on their doorsteps.
The three were later widely praised और सजा by the फौज for their heroic actions.
The hijackers in the September 11 attacks were 19 men affiliated with al-Qaeda, and 15 of the 19 were citizens of Saudi Arabia.
Others were इससे मिश्र, Lebanon, and the UAE.
The hijackers were व्यवस्थित into चार टीमों, प्रत्येक led by a pilot-trained hijacker with four `` muscle hijackers '' who were trained to help subdue the pilots, passengers, and crew.
The first hijackers to arrive in the United States were Khalid al-mihdhar और Nawaf al-Hazmi, who settled in the San Diego area in January 2000.
They were followed by three hijacker-pilots, Mohamed Atta, Marwan al-Shehhi, और ziad jarrah जल्दी in the summer of 2000 to undertake flight training in south Florida.
The fourth hijacker-pilot, Hani Hanjour, arrived in San Diego in December 2000.
The rest of the `` muscle hijackers '' arrived in the spring and early summer of 2001, just months before the September 11 attacks.
Abū al-Qāsim Muḥammad ibn ʿAbd Allāh ibn ʿAbd al-Muṭṭalib ibn Hāshim ( ) ( circa| 570 – circa| 8 June 632 ), also transliterated as मुहम्मद ( ), थी a धार्मिक, political, and military leader from Mecca who unified Arabia into a single religious polity under Islam.
He is believed by मुसलमान and Bahá'ís to be a messenger and prophet of God.
Muhammad is लगभग universally माना by Muslims as the last prophet sent by God for mankind.
Non-Muslims regard Muhammad as the संस्थापक of Islam.
Muslims consider him to be the restorer of an unaltered original monotheistic faith of Adam, Noah, Abraham, Moses, Jesus, and other prophets.
Born in about 570 CE in the Arabian city of Mecca, he was orphaned at an early age और brought up अंतर्गत the care of his uncle Abu Talib.
He later worked ज़्यादातर as a merchant, as well as a shepherd, and was first married by age 25.
Being in the habit of periodically retreating to a गुफा in the surrounding mountains for several nights of seclusion and prayer, he later reported that it was there, at age 40, that he received his first revelation from God.
Three years after this event Muhammad started preaching these revelations publicly, proclaiming that `` God is One ``, that complete `` surrender '' to Him ( lit.
islām ) is the only way ( dīn ) acceptable to God, and that he himself was a prophet and messenger of God, in the same vein as other Islamic prophets.
Muhammad gained few followers early on, and was met with hostility इससे कुछ meccan जनजातियों ; he and his followers were treated harshly.
To escape persecution, Muhammad sent some of his followers to Abyssinia before he and his followers in Mecca migrated to Medina ( then known as yathrib ) in the year 622.
This इवेंट, the हिज्र, marks the beginning of the Islamic calendar, which is also known as the Hijri Calendar.
In Medina, Muhammad united the जनजातियों under the Constitution of Medina.
After eight years of fighting with the Meccan tribes, his अनुसरणकर्ता, जो by तब had grown to 10,000, took control of Mecca in the largely peaceful Conquest of Mecca.
He destroyed the pagan idols in the city and then sent his followers out to destroy all of the remaining pagan temples in Eastern Arabia.
In 632, a few months after returning to मदीना इससे the Farewell Pilgrimage, Muhammad fell ill and died.
By the time of his death, most of the Arabian Peninsula had converted to islam, और he had united Arabia into a single Muslim religious polity.
The खुलासे ( or Ayah, lit.
`` Signs [ of God ] '' ) — which Muhammad reported receiving until his death – form the verses of the Quran, regarded by Muslims as the `` शब्द of परमेश्वर '' और around जिससे the धर्म is based.
Besides the कुरान, मुहम्मद 's जीवन ( सिरा ) and traditions ( sunnah ) are also upheld by Muslims as the sources of sharia law.
They discuss Muhammad and other नबियों of islam साथ reverence, adding the phrase peace be upon him whenever their names are mentioned.
While conceptions of Muhammad in medieval Christendom and premodern times were largely negative, appraisals in आधुनिक इतिहास have महरूम far less so.
This is a list of tables of the verified oldest लोगों in the world in ordinal rank, such as oldest person or oldest man.
In these tables, a supercentenarian is considered 'verified ' if his or her claim has been validated by an international body that specifically deals in longevity research, such as the जराविद्या शोध समूह ( GRG ) or Guinness World Records.
The longest unambiguously documented human lifespan is that of Jeanne Calment of France ( 1875–1997 ), who died at age 122 सालो, 164 days.
She met विंसेंट वैन gogh when she was 12 or 13.
This led to news media attention in 1985, बाद calment turned 110.
Subsequent investigation found documentation for Calment 's age, beyond any उचित सवाल, in the records of her native city, Arles, France.
More evidence of Calment 's lifespan has been produced than for any other supercentenarian ; her case serves as an archetype in the methodology लिये verifying the आयु of the world 's oldest people.
The longest undisputed lifespan for male supercentenarians is that of Jiroemon Kimura, who currently lives in Japan and is age as of.
Since the death of 115-year old Dina Manfredini of the United States, on 17 December 2012, Kimura, born 19 April 1897, is the oldest living person in the world whose age can be documented.
he रै भी महरूम the oldest living man since the death of 114-year old Walter Breuning on 14 April 2011.
चूंकि the मौत of 115-year बूढ़ा koto Okubo of Japan on 12 January 2013, the oldest living woman has been -year-old Misao Okawa, also from Japan, born on 5 March 1898.
This is a timeline of the african-american सिविल Rights Movement.
The Civil अधिकारों movement was a freedom struggle by African Americans in the 1950s and 1960s to gain equality.
The goals of the movement were freedom इससे पक्षपात, बराबर अवसर in employment, education and housing, the right to vote and equal access to public facilities.
Heavy मेटल ( प्रायः referred to as मेटल ) is a विधा of चट्टान म्यूज़िक कि विकसित in the लेट 1960s और जल्दी 1970s, largely in the संयुक्त किंगडम और in the संयुक्त राज्य.
With roots in ब्लूज़ चट्टान और साइकेडेलिक चट्टान, the bands कि निर्मित heavy metal developed a thick, massive sound, characterized by highly amplified distortion, extended guitar solos, emphatic beats, and overall loudness.
Heavy metal lyrics and performance styles are generally associated साथ मर्दानगी and machismo.
The first heavy metal bands such as led zeppelin, गहन जामुनी और ब्लैक sabbath attracted large audiences, though they were often derided by critics, a status common throughout the history of the genre.
In the mid-1970s Judas Priest helped spur the genre 's evolution by discarding much of its blues influence ; Motörhead introduced a पंक rock sensibility and an increasing emphasis on speed.
Bands in the New Wave of अंग्रेजों भारी मेटल such as Iron Maiden followed in a similar vein.
Before the end of the decade, heavy metal fans became known as `` metalheads `` or `` headbangers ``.
During the 1980s, glam metal became a commercial force with groups like Mötley Crüe and Poison.
Underground scenes produced an array of more extreme, aggressive styles : thrash metal broke into the mainstream with bands such as Metallica, Megadeth, Slayer, and एंथ्रेक्स, जबकि अन्य शैलियाँ of the most extreme subgenres of metal like death metal and black metal remain subcultural phenomena.
Since the mid-1990s, popular styles such as nu metal, which often incorporates elements of grunge and hip hop ; and metalcore, जिससे मिश्रणों चरम मेटल साथ hardcore punk, have further expanded the definition of the genre.
The far-right ( also known as the extreme right ) refers to the उच्चतम उपाधि of rightism in right-wing politics.
Far right politics involves support of strong or complete social hierarchy in society, and supports supremacy of certain individuals or groups deemed to be innately superior or preferable who are to be more valued than those deemed to be innately inferior or undesirable.
The far right 's advocacy of supremacism is based on what its adherents perceive as स्वाभाविक विशेषताएँ of people that can not be changed.
This stands as a point of difference with the centre-right 's attribution of behaviours, ऐसे as आलस्य or decadence, as the primary sources of social inequalities.
The centre right—unlike the far right—claims that people can end their behavioural हीनता through changing their habits and choices.
The original far right, which emerged in France after the French Revolution, refused to accept the French Republic and supported a counter-revolution to restore the French monarchy and aristocracy.
The far right is commonly associated with persons or groups who थाम चरम nationalist, xenophobic, racist, religious fundamentalist or reactionary views.
the सबसे extreme-right movements have pursued oppression and genocide against groups of people on the basis of their alleged inferiority.
Thomas Hobbes of Malmesbury ( 5 April 1588 – 4 December 1679 ), in some older texts Thomas Hobbs of Malmsbury, was an अंग्रेज़ी पारस, बेहतरीन ज्ञात आज for his work on political philosophy.
His 1651 book Leviathan established the foundation for most of Western political दर्शनशास्त्र इससे the perspective of social contract theory.
Hobbes was a champion of absolutism for the sovereign, but he also developed some of the fundamentals of यूरोपीय उदार विचार : the सही of the व्यक्तिगत ; the natural equality of all men ; the artificial character of the political order ( which led to the later distinction between civil society and the state ) ; the view that all legitimate political power must be `` representative '' and based on the consent of the people ; and a liberal interpretation of law which leaves people free to do whatever the law does not explicitly forbid.
He was one of the founders of आधुनिक राजनैतिक philosophy.
His understanding of humans as being matter and motion, obeying the same physical laws as other matter and motion, remains influential ; and his account of human nature as self-interested cooperation, and of political समुदायों as होने आधारित upon a `` social contract `` remains one of the major topics of political philosophy.
In addition to political philosophy, Hobbes also contributed to a विविध सरणी of अन्य फ़ील्ड, including history, geometry, the physics of gases, theology, ethics, and general philosophy.
Emotional intelligence ( EI ) is the ability to identify, assess, and control the भाव of oneself, of अन्य, और of groups.
It can be divided into क्षमता EI and trait EI.
Ability EI is usually measured using maximum performance tests and has stronger relationships with traditional intelligence, whereas trait EI is प्रायः measured using self-report questionnaires and has stronger relationships with personality.
Criticisms have centered on whether EI is a real प्रज्ञा और whether it has incremental validity over IQ and the Big Five personality traits.
Heredity is the passing of traits to औलाद from its parents or ancestor.
This is the process by which an offspring cell or organism acquires or becomes predisposed to the विशेषताएँ of its parent cell or organism.
Through heredity, variations exhibited by individuals can accumulate and cause some प्रजाति to evolve.
The study of heredity in biology is called आनुवंशिकी, which includes the field of epigenetics.
For United States individual income tax, adjusted gross income ( AGI ) is कुल सकल आय minus specific reductions.
Taxable income is adjusted gross income minus allowances for personal exemptions and itemized deductions.
लिये सबसे individual tax purposes, AGI is more relevant than gross income.
Gross income is sales price of goods or property, minus cost of the property sold, plus other income.
It includes wages, interest, dividends, कारोबार आय, rental आय, and all other types of income.
Adjusted gross income is gross income less deductions from a business or rental activity और 21 अन्य विशिष्ट items.
Several deductions ( e.g. medical expenses and miscellaneous itemized deductions ) are limited based on a percentage of AGI.
Certain phase outs, including those of lower tax rates and itemized deductions, हैं आधारित on levels of AGI.
Many states base state income tax on agi साथ निश्चित deductions.

This version was featured on their demo CD ( which प्रदर्शित early versions of four tracks ).
A telephone prefix is the first set of digits of a telephone number ; in the North American क्रमांकन योजना देशों ( देश कोड 1 ), it is the first three digits of a seven-digit phone number.
In other countries दोनो the उपसर्ग और the number may have different lengths.
It shows which exchange the remaining numbers refer to.
A full telephone number is usually made up of देश कोड ( required for international calls only ), area code ( required for calls between telephone areas ), prefix, and subscriber number.
Some places restrict certain prefixes to फैक्स संख्याएँ or कोशिका फोन only ; in other places such dedicated prefixes are not used.
As telephone technology advanced, the precise significance of the prefix became blurred in many places ; 485 in London, UK, was once the GULliver exchange, लकिन अभी 44207485xxxx is बस माना एक of अनेक क्रमांक ब्लॉक served by the CLKEN Kentish Town exchange ; 4420770703xx is another.
Metformin ( BP, सुनाया, ; originally बेची as glucophage ) is an oral antidiabetic drug in the biguanide class.
It is the first-line drug of choice for the treatment of type 2 diabetes, in particular, in overweight and obese people and those with सामान्य गुर्दा function.
Its use in gestational मधुमेह रै been limited by safety concerns.
It is also used in the treatment of polycystic ovary syndrome, and has been investigated लिये अन्य diseases where insulin resistance may be an important factor.
Metformin works by suppressing glucose production by the liver.
Metformin is the only antidiabetic drug कि रै महरूम conclusively shown to prevent the cardiovascular complications of diabetes.
It helps reduce LDL cholesterol and triglyceride levels, and is not associated with weight gain.
, metformin is one of only two oral antidiabetics in the World Health संगठन मॉडल सूची of अनिवार्य दवाइयाँ ( the other being glibenclamide ).
When prescribed appropriately, metformin कल्याणकारी few प्रतिकूल प्रभाव ( the most common is gastrointestinal upset ) and is associated with a low risk of hypoglycemia.
Lactic acidosis ( a buildup of lactate in the रक्त ) can be a गंभीर चिंता in overdose and when it is prescribed to people with contraindications, but otherwise, there is no significant risk.
First synthesized और मिला to reduce blood sugar in the 1920s, metformin was forgotten for the next two decades as research shifted to insulin and other antidiabetic drugs.
Interest in metformin was rekindled in the late 1940s after several reports that it could reduce blood sugar levels in people, and in 1957, French physician Jean Sterne published the first clinical trial of metformin as a उपचार लिये diabetes.
It was introduced to the United Kingdom in 1958, Canada in 1972, and the संयुक्त राज्य in 1995.
Metformin is now believed to be the most widely prescribed antidiabetic drug in the world ; in the United States alone, more than 48 million prescriptions were filled in 2010 for its generic formulations.
The Mount Rushmore National Memorial is a sculpture carved into the granite face of Mount Rushmore near keystone, दक्षिण Dakota, in the United States.
Sculpted by Danish-American Gutzon Borglum and his son, lincoln borglum, माउंट rushmore सुविधाएँ sculptures of the heads of four United States presidents : George Washington, Thomas Jefferson, Theodore Roosevelt and Abraham Lincoln.
The संपूर्ण memorial covers and is above sea level.
The tallest पहाड़ in the प्रदेश is Harney Peak ( ).
South डकोटा इतिहासकार दोने रॉबिन्सन is credited with conceiving the idea of carving the likenesses of famous people into the Black Hills region of South Dakota in order to promote tourism in the region.
Robinson 's initial idea was to sculpt the Needles ; however, Gutzon Borglum अस्वीकृत the needles site because of the poor quality of the granite and strong opposition from environmentalists and Native American groups.
They settled on the Mount Rushmore location, which also has the advantage of facing southeast लिये अधिकतम सूर्य exposure.
रॉबिन्सन wanted it to feature western heroes like Lewis and Clark, Red Cloud and Buffalo Bill Cody but Borglum decided the sculpture should have a more national focus, and chose the four presidents whose likenesses would be carved into the mountain.
After securing federal funding, construction on the memorial began in 1927, और the राष्ट्रपतियों ' faces were completed between 1934 and 1939.
upon gutzon borglum 's death in March 1941, his son Lincoln Borglum took over construction.
Although the initial concept called for each president to be depicted from head to waist, lack of funding मजबूर निर्माण to समाप्त in लेट October 1941.
The U.S. National Park Service took control of the मेमोरियल in 1933, while it was still under construction, and has managed the memorial to the present day.
It attracts nearly three million people annually.

A shirt, dress shirt, button-front, button-front shirt, or button-up कमीज़ is a परिधान साथ a collar, a full-length opening at the front from the collar to the hem, and sleeves with cuffs.
Shirts are predominantly used by मेन, since women usually wear blouses.
The front opening is fastened using buttons or studs, और the cuffs बंद with buttons or cuff links.
Shirts are normally made from woven cloth, and are often accompanied by a jacket and tie, for उदाहरण with a suit or formalwear, but shirts are also worn more casually.
In British English, dress shirt means specifically the more formal evening garment worn with black- or white- tie, also discussed below.
Some of ये औपचारिक shirts have stiff fronts and detachable collars attached with collar studs.
The term `` button-down '' ( which refers a type of shirt which has a collar fastened down by buttons ) is sometimes used in गलती to लागू to सब शर्ट ( with or without buttoned down collars ), being used as a synonym for `` button-up '' or `` button-front ''.
प्रशासनिक पेशेवर दिन ( भी ज्ञात as secretaries Day or Admin Day ) is an unofficial secular holiday observed in several countries to recognize the work of secretaries, administrative assistants, receptionists, and other administrative support professionals.
In North America, it is celebrated on the Wednesday of the last full week of अप्रैल ( अप्रैल 24 in 2013 ).
In France it is celebrated on the third Thursday in अप्रैल ( April 18 in 2013 ).
In Australia it is मनाये on the first Friday in May

Nicolas Poussin ( ; 15 June 1594 – 19 November 1665 ) was the leading painter of the classical French Baroque style, although he spent most of his working life in Rome.
His work is characterized by clarity, logic, and order, and favors line over color.
Until the 20th century he remained a major inspiration for such classically oriented artists as jacques-louis दाउद, jean-auguste-dominique Ingres and Paul Cézanne.
He worked in Rome for a circle of leading collectors there and elsewhere, except for a short period when Cardinal Richelieu ordered him back to France to serve as First Painter to the King.
Most of his works are history paintings of religious or mythological subjects that very often have a विशाल लैंडस्केप element.
Jackie Keith Whitley ( July 1, 1954Stambler, Irwin, and Grelun Landon ( 2000 ). - Country Music : The Encyclopedia. - New York : St. Martin 's Press. - p.533. - ISBN 978-0-312-26487-1.—Carlin, Richard ( 2003 ). - Country Music : A Biographical Dictionary. - New York : Routledge - p.427. - ISBN 978-0-415-93802-0.—Larkin, Colin ( 1995 ). - The Guinness Encyclopedia of Popular Music. - New York : Stockton Press - P.4462. - ISBN 978-0-85112-662-3.—Stanton, Scott ( 2003 ). - The Tombstone पर्यटक : संगीतकारों. - नई यॉर्क : जेब किताबे. - p.395. - isbn 978-0-7434-6330-0.—hicks, Jack. - `` Singer Keith Whitley 's Memory Alive Through Songs, Love in Home Town ''. - The Kentucky Post. - September 25, 1991.— '' Country Music Star Keith Whitley Dead at 33 ''. - Lexington Herald-Leader. - May 10, 1989.——Hurst, Jack. - `` Whitley 's Last Days ''. - Chicago Tribune. - May 14, 1989.— '' Alcohol Kills Country Singer Keith Whitley ''. - United Press International. - ( c/o The San Francisco Chronicle ). - May 10, 1989. — May 9, 1989 ), known professionally as Keith Whitley, was an American country music singer.
Whitley 's brief career in mainstream country music lasted from 1984 until his death in 1989, but he continues to influence an entire पीढी of गायकों and songwriters.
He charted 19 singles on the Billboard country charts, including five consecutive Number Ones : `` Do n't Close Your आँखें ``, `` जब तुम कह nothing at सब ``, `` i 'm no अजनबी to the बरसात ``, `` I Wonder Do You Think of Me `` and `` It Ai n't Nothin ' `` ( the last two posthumously ).
Statute of Grand Duchy of Lithuania, written in Polish
A statute is a formal लिखा enactment of a legislative authority that governs a state, city, or county.
Typically, statutes command or prohibit कुछ, or declare policy.
The word is often used to distinguish law made by legislative bodies from case law, decided by न्यायालयों, और regulations issued by government agencies.
Statutes are sometimes referred to as legislation or `` black letter law. ''
As a source of law, statutes are considered primary प्राधिकार ( as opposed to secondary authority ).
Ideally all statutes जरूर be in सामंजस्य साथ the fundamental law of the land ( constitutional ).
This word is प्रयुक्त in contradistinction to the common law.
Statutes acquire their force from the time of their ड्योढ़ी, however जबतक वरना provided.
Statutes are of several kinds ; namely, Public or private.
Declaratory or remedial.
Temporary or perpetual.
A अस्थाई statute is one which is limited in its duration at the time of its enactment.
It continues in फ़ोर्स जबतक the time of its limitation has expired, unless sooner repealed.
A perpetual statute is one for the continuance of which there is no limited time, although it may not be expressly घोषित to be so.
If, however, a statute which did not itself contain any limitation is to be governed by another which is temporary only, the former will also be temporary and dependent upon the existence of the latter.
Before a statute becomes law in some countries, it must be agreed upon by the highest executive in the government, and finally published as part of a code.
In अनेक देशों, statutes are organized in topical arrangements ( or `` codified '' ) within publications called codes, such as the United States Code.
In many nations statutory विधि is विशिष्ट from and subordinate to constitutional law.
The external iliac arteries are two major arteries which bifurcate off the common iliac arteries anterior to the sacroiliac joint of the pelvis.
They proceed anterior and inferior along the medial border of the psoas major muscles.
They exit the pelvic girdle posterior and inferior to the inguinal ligament about one third laterally from the insertion point of the वंक्षण स्नायु on the जननांग tubercle at which point they are referred to as the femoral arteries.
The external iliac artery is usually the धमनी प्रयुक्त to संलग्न the renal artery to the recipient of a kidney transplant.
Steam is a डिजिटल वितरण, डिजिटल अधिकारों management, multiplayer and communications platform developed by Valve Corporation.
It is used to distribute games and related media ऑनलाइन, इससे छोटी स्वतंत्र developers to larger software houses ; in October 2012, Valve expanded the service to include non-gaming software.
Steam provides the user with installation and automatic management of software across multiple computers, community features such as friends lists and समूह, बादल छायांकन, और in-game आवाज़ and chat functionality.
The software provides a freely available application programming interface, Steamworks, that developers can take advantage of to integrate many of Steam 's functions within their software products, including copy protection, networking and matchmaking, in-game achievements and micro-transactions, and support for user-created content through Steam Workshop.
Though initially developed for use on Microsoft Windows, the client has विस्तारित to शामिल os x और लिनक्स संस्करण, and clients with limited functionality on the PlayStation 3 console and for both iOS and Android mobile devices.
In addition to being a central hub for gaming software, Valve has created a version of Steam with altered functionality to be used in schools for educational software, including a modified version of Portal 2 for teaching science and critical thinking lessons.
, there are nearly 2000 खेल उपलब्धियाँ through भाप, and 54 million active user accounts.
As of January 2013, भाप रै देखी over 6.6 million concurrent players.
Steam has an estimated 50–70 % share of the digital distribution market for video games.
The Steam logo is a stylised left-side fly-crank और लाठी इससे the walschaerts valve gear of a steam locomotive.
Jerry Lewis ( born March 16, 1926 ) is an American comedian, actor, singer, film निर्माता, screenwriter and film director.
He is known for his slapstick ह्यूमर in फिल्मी, television, stage and radio.
He was originally paired up with Dean Martin in 1946, forming the famed comedy team of मार्टिन और लुईस.
In addition to the duo 's popular nightclub work, they starred in a कामयाब series of comedy films for Paramount Pictures.
Lewis is also known for his charity fund-raising telethons and position as national chairman for the Muscular Dystrophy संघ ( MDA ).
Lewis has won several awards for lifetime achievements from The American Comedy पुरस्कार, Los Angeles Film Critics Association, and Venice Film Festival, and he has two stars on the Hollywood Walk of Fame.
In 2005, he received the Governors Award of the Academy of Television Arts & Sciences फलक of Governors, which is the highest Emmy Award presented.
On February 22, 2009, the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences awarded Lewis the Jean Hersholt humanitarian Award.
The Rhine ( ; ; ) is a European river that runs from the Swiss canton of Grisons in the southeastern Swiss Alps through Germany and eventually flows into the North Sea coast in the Netherlands and is the twelfth longest river in Europe, at about, with an average निर्वहन of more than.
The Rhine and the Danube formed most of the northern inland frontier of the Roman Empire and, since those days, the Rhine has been a vital और navigable जलमार्ग carrying trade and goods deep inland.
It has also served as a defensive feature और रै been the basis for regional and international borders.
The many castles and prehistoric fortifications along the Rhine testify to its importance as a जलमार्ग.
River traffic could be stopped at these locations, usually for the purpose of collecting tolls, by the state that controlled that portion of the river.
Sri ( सिंहली )
Sri ( Devanagari : श्री, IAST ; Śrī ), also transliterated as Sree or Shri or Shree is a word of Sanskrit origin, used in the Indian subcontinent as polite form of address equivalent to the English `` Mr. '' in written and spoken भाषा, or as a शीर्षक of veneration लिये deities ( प्रायः translated as `` Holy '' ).

Civil engineering is a professional engineering discipline that deals with the design, construction, and maintenance of the physical and naturally built environment, including works like roads, पुलों, नहरों, dams, और buildings.
Civil अभियान्त्रिकी is the oldest engineering discipline after military engineering, and it was defined to distinguish non-military engineering from military engineering.
It is traditionally broken into several sub-disciplines including environmental engineering, geotechnical engineering, geophysics, geodesy, control engineering, structural engineering, biomechanics, nanotechnology, transportation engineering, earth science, atmospheric sciences, forensic engineering, municipal or urban अभियान्त्रिकी, जल संसाधन engineering, materials engineering, coastal engineering, surveying, and construction engineering.
Civil engineering takes place on all levels : in the पब्लिक सेक्टर इससे नगरपालिका through to national governments, and in the private sector from individual homeowners through to international companies.
