The euro sign is the currency sign used for the euro, the official currency of the Eurozone in the European Union ( EU ).
The डिज़ाइन थी प्रस्तुत to the public by the European Commission on 12 December 1996.
The international three-letter कोड ( according to ISO standard ISO 4217 ) for the euro is EUR.
In Unicode it is एनकोडेड at.
In English, the चिह्न precedes the value.
In some styleguides, but नहीं others, the euro sign is unspaced.
Mate (, ; sometimes also spelled maté ), also known as chimarrão ( ) or cimarrón ( ), is a परंपरागत दक्षिण अमरीकी infused drink, particularly in Argentina, Uruguay, Paraguay and the southern states of Brazil and to a lesser degree in south of Chile, the Bolivian Chaco, Syria and Lebanon.
It is prepared from steeping dried leaves of yerba mate ( llex paraguariensis, known in Portuguese as erva-mate ) in hot water.
Mate is परोसा साथ a metal straw from a shared hollow calabash gourd.
The straw is called a bombilla in some Latin American countries, a bomba in पुर्तगाली, और a bombija or, अधिक generally, a masassa ( type of straw ) in Arabic.
The straw is traditionally made of silver.
Modern, commercially available straws are typically made of nickel silver, called Alpaca ; stainless steel, or hollow-stemmed cane.
The gourd is known as a mate or a guampa ; while in Brazil, it has the specific name of cuia, or also cabaça ( the name for indigenous-influenced calabash gourds in अन्य regions of ब्राज़ील, स्टिल used for general food and drink in remote regions ).
Even if the water is supplied from a modern thermos, the infusion is traditionally drunk from mates or cuias.
As with other brewed herbs, yerba mate पत्ते are dried, chopped, and ground into a powdery mixture called yerba.
The bombilla अधिनियमों as दोनो a straw and a sieve.
The submerged end is flared, with small छेद or स्लॉट that allow the brewed liquid in, but block the chunky matter that makes up much of the mixture.
A modern bombilla डिज़ाइन उपयोग a सीधा tube with holes, or spring sleeve to act as a sieve.
`` Tea-bag '' type infusions of mate ( mate cocido ) have महरूम on the market in Argentina, Paraguay and Uruguay for many years under such trade names as `` Taragüí Vitality '' in Argentina, `` Pajarito '' and `` Kurupí '' in Paraguay, and in Brazil under the name `` Mate Leão ''.
This is माना a completely different drink.
It is never drunk from cuias or पुकारा chimarrão, nor is it associated with the gaucho/gaúcho culture.
The ऑटोमोटिव उद्योग is a पद कि कवर a चौड़ी दायरा of companies and organisations involved in the design, development, manufacture, marketing, and selling of motor vehicles, towed vehicles, motorcycles and mopeds.
It is one of the world 's सबसे important economic sectors by revenue.
The term automotive उद्योग प्रायः करता नहीं शामिल उद्योग समर्पित to the maintenance of automobiles following delivery to the end-user, such as repair shops and motor fuel filling stations.
the पद ऑटोमोटिव थी निर्मित इससे यूनानी autos ( स्वः ), और लैटिन motivus ( of गति ) to represent कोई रूप of self-powered गाडी.
This term was proposed by sae सदस्य Elmer Sperry.
David Michael `` Dave '' Bautista, Jr. ( born January 18, 1969 ), is an American mixed martial artist, bodybuilder, actor, and former professional wrestler best known for his time in World Wrestling Entertainment स्पर्धा अंतर्गत the रिंग नाम बतिस्ता.
In WWE, he became a six-time world champion, winning the World Heavyweight Championship four times, और the डब्ल्यूडब्ल्यूई चैंपियनशिप two times.
He is the longest-reigning World Heavyweight Champion in डब्ल्यूडब्ल्यूई इतिहास.
In addition to these championships, Batista has won the संसार टैग टोली चैंपियनशिप तीन times ( twice with Ric Flair and once with John Cena ) and the WWE Tag Team Championship once ( with Rey Mysterio ).
Batista was also the winner of the 2005 Royal Rumble match and went on to headline WrestleMania 21, one of the top five highest-grossing pay-per-view events in pro wrestling history.
After trying out at World Championship Wrestling 's Power Plant, Batista signed a contract with the WWF in 2000 and was sent to its developmental territory, Ohio Valley Wrestling ( OVW ), where he won the OVW Heavyweight Championship.
In August 2012, Bautista signed a contract with Classic Entertainment & Sports to लड़ो in मिश्रित martial arts.
He won his MMA debut on October 6, 2012, defeating Vince Lucero via TKO in the पहला round.
Henry T. थामस sampson, Jr. ( born in Jackson, Mississippi in 1934 ) is an African-American inventor.
He graduated from high school in 1951 from Lanier High School in Jackson, मिसिसिपी.
He then attended मोरहाउस कॉलेज for a couple of years before transferring to Purdue University where he became a member of the Omega Psi Phi fraternity.
He received a Bachelor 's उपाधि in science from Purdue University in 1956.
He graduated with an MS degree in अभियान्त्रिकी इससे the University of California, Los Angeles in 1961.
Sampson also received his MS in Nuclear Engineering इससे the विश्वविद्यालयों of Illinois Urbana-Champaign in 1965, and his PhD in 1967.
He is the first African American to earn a ph.d.in नाभिकीय अभियान्त्रिकी in the United States.
कुछ of उसके accomplishments include being a member of the United States Navy between the years 1962 and 1964 and earning an Atomic Energy Commission honor between 1964 and 1967.
Later he थी awarded the Black Image Award from Aerospace Corporation in 1982.
He was awarded the Blacks in Engineering, Applied Science Award, and पुरस्कार लिये शिक्षा, by the Los Angeles Council of Black Professional Engineers in 1983.
In June 2007, Sampson was married to Laura howzell यंग in St. Thomas, U.S. Virgin Islands.
Young-Sampson is a professor in the College of Education at California State University San Bernardino.
रॉबर्ट लेन Gibbs ( born March 29, 1971 ) is a senior campaign adviser for US President Barack Obama.
Previously, he थी the 28th White House Press Secretary.
Gibbs was the communications director for then- U.S. Senator Obama and his 2008 presidential campaign.
Gibbs, who has worked with Obama since 2004, was press secretary of John Kerry 's 2004 presidential campaign and has previously specialized in Senate campaigns, having served as communications director for the Democratic Senatorial Campaign कमेटी और लिये चार व्यक्तिगत Senate campaigns, including those of Obama in 2004 and Fritz Hollings in 1998.
Gibbs was also the press secretary of प्रतिनिधि bob etheridge.
On November 22, 2008, Gibbs was announced as the press secretary of the Obama प्रशासन.
He assumed the role of press secretary on January 20, 2009, and gave his first official briefing on January 22.
On January 5, 2011, Gibbs announced that he would leave the White House to become an outside adviser to the प्रशासन.
He left on फ़रवरी 11, 2011.
on फ़रवरी 12, 2013, it थी announced that Gibbs had been hired as a contributor for cable-news channel MSNBC.
His first appearance was on the same night prior to the 2013 State Of The Union पता.
Armando Pérez ( born January 15, 1981 ), बेहतर ज्ञात by his stage name Pitbull, is an American rapper, songwriter, and record producer.
His पहला अंकित performance was from the Lil Jon album Kings of Crunk in 2002.
In 2004, he released his debut album titled M.I.A.M.I. ( short लिये धन is a प्रमुख Issue ) under TVT Records.
Since then, he has released three other albums under the लेबल : el Mariel in 2006, The Boatlift in 2007, and Planet Pit in 2011.
He released rebelution in 2009, which included singles `` I Know You Want Me ( Calle Ocho ) `` and `` Krazy ``.
The latter peaked at No. 30 on the hot 100 और no. 11 on the Hot Rap Tracks charts while `` I Know You Want Me '' peaked at No. 2 on the Hot 100 and peaked within the top ten spots of charts in the UK, Canada, Italy, and the Netherlands.
The song पहुँचे no. 1 in फ़्रांस और the यूरोपीय Hot 100 on the week ending August 29, 2009 according to Billboard magazine.
He later signed with Polo Grounds Music through Sony Music and created his own लेबल mr. 305 Inc.
Another single from Rebelution was `` Hotel Room Service ``, which peaked at No. 8 on the Hot 100.
Rebelution गई on to sell over 7.5 million worldwide digital singles and albums combined.
Nevertheless, he dropped a smash called `` Give Me Everything '' which reached # 1 worldwide, and featured artists Ne-yo, Nayer, and afrojack.
He has also performed as a featured artist in the remixes of अनेक अन्य hit गीतों, जैसे tik टोक, चीख & Shout, Lo Hecho Esta Hecho, Bad, Papi, Diamonds, How Low, Tonight ( I 'm Lovin ' You ), Video Phone, Over To You Now and Bumpy Ride.
Pérez is also the host of his own Spanish-language program on the cable channel Mun2 titled la esquina ( स्पेनी for The Corner ).
In 2005 Pérez and rapper Sean 'Diddy ' Combs co-founded Bad Boy Latino, a subsidiary of Combs ' Bad Boy Records label.
It primarily focuses on Latin hip hop, Latin soul, Latin pop and other Tropical music, and has offices in New York and Miami, Florida.
Along with co-founding it, Pérez फिलहाल heads the a & R division of the label.
Pérez has become a product endorser, representing alongside Drake, Rihanna, and Trey Songz the “So Kodak” campaign for the Kodak brand and embarking on a partnership with the soft drink giant Dr pepper as भाग of the अभियान “ विदा 23 ” लिये जिससे he अंकित the सोंग specifically featured on his album Armando.
Pitbull also announced he has become the spokesperson लिये voli वोदका, in जिससे he holds a majority equity stake, and Budweiser has chosen Pitbull to promote its Bud Light line of beer.
The commercials currently highlight Pitbull dancing and gyrating on स्टेज पकड़कर up a bottle of Bud Light.
pitbull रै also purchased an equity stake in Miami Subs Pizza and Grill.
Halloween or Hallowe'en ( a contraction of `` All Hallows ' संध्या `` ), भी ज्ञात as सब hallows ' संध्या, is a वार्षिक जश्न observed in a number of countries on October 31, the eve of the Western Christian feast of All Hallows ( or All Saints ) and the day initiating the triduum of Hallowmas.
According to many विद्वानों, All Hallows ' Eve is a Christianised feast originally influenced by western European harvest festivals, and festivals of the dead with possible pagan roots, particularly the Celtic Samhain.
Other scholars maintain कि it originated independently of Samhain and has solely Christian roots.
Typical festive Halloween activities include trick-or-treating ( also known as `` guising `` ), attending costume parties, carving pumpkins into jack-o'-lanterns, lighting bonfires, apple bobbing, visiting haunted आकर्षण, playing pranks, telling डरावने कहानियां, और watching horror films.
Freedom of वाक is the राजनैतिक सही to communicate one 's opinions and ideas using one 's body and property to anyone who is willing to receive them.
The term freedom of expression is sometimes used synonymously, but includes any act of seeking, receiving and imparting information or ideas, regardless of the medium used.
In practice, the right to freedom of speech is not absolute in any country and the right is commonly subject to limitations, as with libel, slander, obscenity, sedition ( including, लिये उदाहरण inciting जातीय द्वेष ), कापीराइट violation, revelation of information that is classified or otherwise.
the सही to स्वतंत्रता of अभिव्यक्ति is पहचाना as a इंसान सही अंतर्गत आलेख 19 of the सार्वभौमिक घोषणा of इंसान अधिकारों और पहचाना in अंतरराष्ट्रीय इंसान अधिकारों विधि in the अंतरराष्ट्रीय वचन on सिविल और राजनैतिक अधिकारों ( ICCPR ).
Article 19 of the ICCPR states that `` [ e ] veryone shall have the right to hold opinions बगैर हस्तक्षेप '' और `` everyone shall have the right to freedom of expression ; this right shall include freedom to seek, receive and impart information and ideas of all kinds, regardless of frontiers, either orally, in writing or in print, in the form of art, or through any other media of his choice ''.
Article 19 goes on to say that the exercise of these rights carries `` special duties and responsibilities `` and may `` therefore be subject to certain restrictions '' when necessary `` [ f ] or respect of the rights or reputation of others '' or `` [ f ] or the सुरक्षा of नेशनल सुरक्षा or of पब्लिक अनुक्रम ( order public ), or of public health or morals ''.
Freedom of speech may be legally curtailed in some religious legal systems and in secular jurisdictions where it is found to cause religious offense, ऐसे as the अंग्रेजों जातिगत और धार्मिक Hatred Act 2006.
Sydney Harbour from the air, showing the Opera House, the CBD, Circular Quay, the Bridge, the Parramatta River, North Sydney और kirribilli in the foreground
The Sydney Harbour सेतु is a स्टील through मेहराब सेतु आरपार सिडनी harbour कि carries रेल, vehicular, bicycle and pedestrian traffic between the Sydney central business district ( CBD ) and the North Shore.
The dramatic view of the bridge, the harbour, और the आसपास सिडनी ओपेरा House is an iconic image of Sydney, New South Wales, and Australia.
The bridge is nicknamed `` The Coathanger '' क्युकी of its arch-based design.
Under the directions of Dr J.J.C. Bradfield of the NSW Department of Public Works, the bridge was designed and built by British firm Dorman Long and Co Ltd of Middlesbrough and खोली in 1932.
The bridge 's डिज़ाइन was influenced by the Hell Gate Bridge in New York.
It was the world 's widest long-span bridge, at 48.8 meters ( 160 feet ) wide, until construction of the new Port Mann Bridge in Vancouver.
it is भी the पांचवां longest spanning-arch bridge in the world, and it is the tallest steel arch bridge, measuring from top to water level.
Until 1967 the harbour Bridge was Sydney 's tallest structure.
The Hawaii hotspot is a volcanic hotspot located near the namesake Hawaiian Islands, in the northern Pacific Ocean.
One of the most well-known and heavily studied hotspots in the world, the Hawaii plume is responsible for the creation of the Hawaiian – Emperor seamount chain, an over 5,800 kilometres ( 3,600 mi ) long chain of ज्वालामुखी, चार of जिससे हैं क्रियाशील, दो of जिससे हैं dormant, और अधिक than 123 of जिससे are extinct, many having since been ground beneath the waves by erosion as seamounts and atolls.
The chain extends from south of the island of हवाई to the किनारे of the Aleutian Trench, near the eastern edge of Russia.
While most volcanoes are created by geological activity at tectonic plate boundaries, the Hawaii hotspot is located far from nearby plate boundaries ; the classic hotspot theory, first proposed in 1963 by John Tuzo Wilson, proposes that a single, fixed mantle plume builds volcanoes that then, cut off from उनके सोर्स by the गति of the प्रशांत थाली, become increasingly inactive and eventually erode below sea level over millions of years.
According to this theory, the nearly 60° bend separating the Emperor and Hawaiian segments of the chain was caused by a अचानक शिफ़्ट in the movement of the Pacific Plate.
In 2003, fresh investigations of this irregularity led to the proposal of a mobile hotspot सिद्धान्त, suggesting कि हॉटस्पॉट हैं मोबाईल, not fixed, and that the 47 million year old bend was caused by a shift in the hotspot 's motion rather than the plate 's.
Ancient Hawaiians were the पहला to recognize the increasing age and weathered state of the volcanoes to the north as they progressed on fishing expeditions along the islands.
The volatile state of the Hawaiian volcanoes and their constant battle with the sea was a major element in Hawaiian mythology, embodied in Pele, the deity of volcanoes.
After the arrival of Europeans on the island, in 1880-1881 James Dwight Dana directed the first formal geological पढ़ाई of the हॉटस्पॉट 's volcanics, confirming the relationship long observed by the natives.
1912 marked the founding of the Hawaiian Volcano Observatory by volcanologist Thomas jaggar, initiating निरन्तर scientific observation of the islands.
In the 1970s, a mapping project was initiated to gain more information about the complex geology of Hawaii 's seafloor.
The हॉटस्पॉट रै चूंकि महरूम tomographically imaged, showing it to be wide and up to deep, and olivine and garnet -based studies have shown its magma chamber is approximately.
In its at least 85 million years of activity the हॉटस्पॉट रै उत्पादित an estimated of rock.
The chain 's rate of drift has slowly increased over time, causing the amount of time each individual volcano is active to decrease, from 18 million years for the 76 million year old Detroit Seamount, to just under 900,000 लिये the एक लाख year-old kohala ; on the अन्य हाथ, eruptive आवाज़ रै increased from per year to about.
Overall, this has caused a ट्रेंड towards अधिक क्रियाशील but quickly-silenced, closely spaced volcanoes—whereas volcanoes on the near side of the hotspot overlap each other ( forming such superstructures as Hawaii island and the ancient Maui Nui ), the oldest of the Emperor seamounts are spaced as far as apart.

The show airs on treehouse tv कनाडा and Nick Jr. ( formerly Noggin ).

Osteonecrosis of the jaw ( ONJ ) is a severe bone disease that affects the maxilla और the mandible.
Various forms of ONJ have been described over the last 160 years, and a number of कल्याणकारी have महरूम सुझाया in the literature.
osteonecrosis of the जबड़े संबद्ध साथ bisphosphonate therapy, required by some cancer treatment regimens, has been identified and defined as a pathological entity since 2003.
The possible risk from lower oral doses of bisphosphonates, taken by patients to prevent or treat osteoporosis, remains uncertain.
Various treatment options have been explored, however severe cases of ONJ still require surgical removal of the प्रभावित अस्थि.
A thorough history and assessement of pre-existing systemic problems and possible sites of dental infection are required to help prevent the condition, especially if bisphosphonate therapy is considered.
The Boston Red Sox are a professional baseball team based in Boston, Massachusetts, and a member of Major League Baseball 's American League Eastern प्रभाग.
Founded in as one of the अमरीकी लीग 's आठ charter franchises, the Red Sox 's home ballpark has been Fenway Park since.
The `` Red Sox '' name was chosen by the team owner, John I. Taylor, around, following पिछला बोस्टन टीमों that had been known as the `` Red Stockings ``.
They have played in 11 संसार Series, winning 7.
Boston was a dominant team in the new league, defeating the Pittsburgh Pirates in the first World Series in and winning four more championships by.
However, they then went into one of the longest championship droughts in baseball history, called by some the `` Curse of the Bambino `` after its alleged beginning with the Red Sox 's sale of Babe Ruth to the rival Yankees two years after their world championship in 1918, an 86-year wait पहले the टोली 's sixth World Championship in.
However, the team 's history during that period was hardly one of futility, but was rather punctuated with some of the most memorable moments in World Series history, including Enos Slaughter 's `` mad dash `` in, the `` नामुमकिन सपना `` of, कार्लटन फिस्क 's home run in, and Bill Buckner 's error in.
Red Sox history रै भी महरूम चिह्नित by the टोली 's तीव्र फंसने with the New York Yankees, arguably the fiercest and most historic in North American professional sports.
The Boston Red Sox are owned by Fenway Sports समूह, जो भी अपना Liverpool Football Club of the Premier League in England.
The Red Sox are consistently one of the top MLB teams in average road attendance, while the small capacity of Fenway Park prevents them इससे leading in overall attendance.
From May 15, 2003 to April 10, 2013, the Red Sox sold out every home game-a total of 820 games ( 794 नियमित season ) for a major professional sports record that lasted almost a decade.
Mince pie भर साथ mincemeat
Mincemeat is a mixture of chopped dried fruit, distilled spirits and spices, and sometimes beef suet, beef, or venison.
originally, mincemeat always contained meat.
Many modern recipes contain beef suet, though vegetable shortening is sometimes प्रयुक्त in its place.
Variants of mincemeat are found in Australia, Brittany, कनाडा, northern Europe, Ireland, South Africa, the United Kingdom and the United States.
In some countries the term mincemeat refers to minced or ground meat.
Diana, Princess of Wales ( Diana Frances ; née Spencer ; 1 July 1961 – 31 August 1997 ) was the first wife of Charles, Prince of Wales, the eldest son and heir apparent of Queen Elizabeth II.
She was well known लिये उसके fund-raising work for international charities and as an eminent celebrity of the late 20th century.
Her wedding to the Prince of Wales on 29 July 1981 was held at St Paul 's Cathedral and देखी by a global television audience of over 750 million.
While married she bore the titles Princess of Wales, Duchess of Cornwall, Duchess of Rothesay, countess of Chester and Baroness of Renfrew.
The marriage produced two sons, the princes William and Harry, who became दूसरी और तीसरा in line to the British throne.
Diana was born into an aristocratic English परिवार साथ royal ancestry.
She was the fourth child of John Spencer, 8th Earl Spencer and his बीवी Frances, daughter of Maurice Roche, 4th Baron Fermoy.
She became a पब्लिक फिगर साथ the announcement of her engagement.
She also received recognition for her charity work and for her support of the International अभियान to बैन landmines.
From 1989, she was the president of the Great Ormond Street Hospital for children, in addition to दर्जनों of अन्य charities.
Diana remained the object of worldwide media scrutiny during and after her marriage, which ended in divorce on 28 August 1996.
Media attention और पब्लिक शोक यहूद considerable following her death in a car crash in Paris on 31 August 1997.
Argentina, officially the अर्जेंटाइन गणतंत्र ( ), is the second largest country in both South America and the Latin America region.
The country is a संघ of 23 प्रांतों and the autonomous city of Buenos Aires, its capital and largest city.
It is the eighth -largest country in the world by land area and the largest among Spanish-speaking nations by geographical area of 2,780,400 km2 and is the fourth by population, with over 41 million people.
Argentina is a founding member of the United Nations, Mercosur, the संघ of दक्षिण अमरीकी राष्ट्र, the संगठन of Ibero-American States, the World Bank Group and the World Trade Organization, and is one of the G-15 and G-20 major economies.
Argentina is located in South America, bordered by Chile to the west and south, बोलीविया और पैराग्वे to the north and Brazil and Uruguay to the northeast.
Argentina claims sovereignty over part of Antarctica, the Falkland Islands ( ) and South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands.
Argentina is the successor राज्य of the viceroyalty of the río de la प्लाटा, an overseas colony of the Spanish Empire.
Argentina declared independence during the Argentine War of Independence, which was followed by the अर्जेंटाइन Civil Wars during most of the 19th century.
The country faced अनेक सैन्य coups और राजनैतिक अस्थिरता दौरान the 20th century, along with periodic economic crisis that continue to this day.
A पहचाना दक्षिणी Cone power, and middle power, Argentina is Latin America 's third-largest economy, with a `` very high '' rating on the Human development index.
Within Latin America, Argentina has the fifth highest nominal GDP per capita and the उच्चतम in खरीदना शक्ति शर्तें.
the Legatum Institute have argued that the country has a `` foundation for future growth due to its market size, levels of foreign direct investment, and percentage of high-tech exports as share of total manufactured goods '', and it is classed by investors as middle emerging economy.
अर्जेंटीना is the लैटिन American country with the most Nobel Prizes, for a total of five, all obtained during the second half of the twentieth century.
The country has three Nobel prizes in science and two of peace.
The most important aspects of science and technology in Argentina are concerned with medicine, nuclear physics, biotechnology, nanotechnology, space and rocket technology and several fields related to the country 's Main Economic Activities.
The country also has the mega exhibition center of science, technology, industry और आर्ट कि हैं लैटिन America 's largest.

The city 's 2010 estimated जनसांख्यिकी is 40,010.
hickory is the प्रिंसिपल city in the Hickory-Lenoir-Morganton MSA, in which the population at the 2010 Census was 365,497.
Polyethylene terephthalate ( sometimes written poly ( ethylene terephthalate ) ), commonly abbreviated PET, PETE, or the obsolete PETP or PET-P, is a thermoplastic polymer resin of the पॉलिएस्टर परिवार और is प्रयुक्त in सिंथेटिक मछली ; पेय, food and other liquid containers ; thermoforming applications ; and engineering resins often in combination with glass fiber.
The term polyethylene terephthalate is a सोर्स of confusion because this substance, PET, does not contain polyethylene.
Thus, the alternate form, बहु ( एथिलीन terephthalate ), is often used in scholarly journals for the sake of accuracy and clarity.
Depending on its processing and thermal history, polyethylene terephthalate may exist both as an amorphous ( transparent ) and as a semi-crystalline पॉलिमर.
The semicrystalline material might appear transparent ( particle size < 500 nm ) or अपारदर्शी और श्वेत ( particle size up to a few microns ) depending on its crystal structure and particle size.
Its monomer ( bis-β-hydroxyterephthalate ) can be synthesized by the esterification reaction between terephthalic acid and ethylene glycol with water as a byproduct, or by transesterification प्रतिक्रिया between एथिलीन ग्लाइकोल और dimethyl terephthalate with methanol as a byproduct.
Polymerization is through a polycondensation reaction of the monomers ( done immediately after esterification/transesterification ) with water as the byproduct.
The majority of the world 's PET उत्पादन is लिये सिंथेटिक fibers ( in excess of 60 % ), with bottle production accounting for around 30 % of global demand.
In the context of textile applications, PET is referred to by its common name, `` पॉलिएस्टर, '' whereas the acronym `` PET '' is generally used in relation to packaging.
Polyester makes up परिचय 18 % of world polymer production and is the third-most-produced polymer ; polyethylene ( PE ) and polypropylene ( PP ) are first and second, respectively.
PET consists of polymerized units of the मोनोमर एथिलीन terephthalate, with repeating C10H8O4 units.
पालतु is commonly recycled, and has the number `` 1 '' as its recycling symbol.

Its current senators are Democrat Mary Landrieu and रिपब्लिकन दाउद Vitter.
Black pudding, blood खीर or रक्त सॉसेज is a प्रकार of sausage made by cooking blood or dried blood with a filler until it is thick enough to congeal when cooled.
The dish exists in various cultures from Asia to यूरोपीय and the Americas.
Pig, cattle, sheep, duck, and goat blood can be used depending on different countries.
In Europe and the Americas, typical fillers include meat, fat, suet, bread, cornmeal, sweet potato, onion, chestnuts, जौ, और oatmeal.
In Spain, पुर्तगाल and Asia, potato is often replaced by rice.
शेयरधारक may refer to:
Stakeholder ( corporate ), a person, group, संगठन, सदस्य or प्रणाली जो affects or can be affected by an organization 's actions
Stakeholder, an entity that can be affected by the results of कि in जिससे वे हैं said to be stakeholders, i.e., that in which they have a stake.
Project stakeholder, a person, group or संगठन साथ an ब्याज in a project
Stakeholder theory, a theory that identifies and models the groups जिससे हैं हितधारकों of a corporation or project
Stakeholder analysis, the process of identifying those प्रभावित by a project or event
Stakeholder ( law ), a third पार्टी जो temporarily holds money or property while its owner is still being determined
Jack Smight ( March 9, 1925 - September 1, 2003 ) थी an अमरीकी थिएटर और film director.
Smight was born in Minneapolis, Minnesota and went to school with भविष्य कर्ता पीटर Graves.
His film credits include The Traveling Executioner, Rabbit, Run, Loving Couples, Midway, Harper, Airport 1975, फटकार alley और the एमी पुरस्कार -winning Eddie, as well as many episodes of television series such as The Twilight Zone and The Alfred Hitchcock Hour.
He also directed the 1960 Broadway play The 49th Cousin and composed the music for the फिल्मी adaption of Roll of Thunder Hear My Cry.
Smight died इससे cancer in Los Angeles, California.
Dmitri Ivanovich Mendeleev ( ; 8 फ़रवरी 1834 – 2 February 1907 O.S. 27 January 1834 – 20 January 1907 ) was a Russian chemist and inventor.
He formulated the Periodic Law, created his own version of the periodic table of elements, and used it to correct the properties of some already discovered elements and also to predict the properties of तत्व yet to be discovered !
Modesto ( Spanish for `` modest '' ), officially the City of Modesto, is the county seat and largest city of Stanislaus काउंटी, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, United States.
With a population of लगभग 201,165 at the 2010 census, Modesto ranks as the 18th largest city in the state of California.
The Modesto Census County Division, which includes the cities of Ceres and Riverbank, has a population of 312,842 as of 2010.
Modesto is located in the central घाटी क्षेत्रफल of उत्तरी कैलिफ़ोर्निया, 90 मील उत्तर of fresno, 92 मील ईस्ट of San Francisco, 68 miles south of the state capital of Sacramento, 66 miles west of Yosemite National Park, and 24 miles south of Stockton.
Modesto, a 29-time Tree City USA honoree, is घिरी by rich farmland, lending to a ranking for the county as 6th among all California counties in farm production.
Led by milk, almonds, chickens, walnuts, and corn silage, the county grossed nearly $ 3.1 अरब in agricultural production in 2011.
Modesto थी immortalized in the 1973 George Lucas film American Graffiti.
The award winning film captured the spirit of `` cruising '' and friendship on 10th and 11th Streets in 1962 and led to the revival of 1950 's nostalgia that included the TV show Happy Days and the other spin-offs.
Ron Howard, हैरिसन घाट और Richard Dreyfuss starred in the film.
The soundtrack was a विशाल success.
Director George Lucas is a native of Modesto, graduating from Downey High School in 1962.
The Gallup-Healthways Well-Being Index for 2011, which interviews 1,000 participants daily and asks individuals to assess उनके कार्य, finances, शारीरिक स्वास्थ्य, emotional state of mind and communities, ranked Modesto 126 out of the 190 cities surveyed.
In December 2009, Forbes क्रमित modesto 48th आउट of 100 among `` Best Bang-for-the-Buck Cities ''.
In this ranking, Modesto ranked 8th in housing affordability and travel time but also ranked 86th in job भविष्यवाणी growth and 99th in foreclosures.
Independence Day, commonly known as the Fourth of July, is a federal holiday in the United States commemorating the adoption of the Declaration of Independence on July 4, 1776, declaring independence from the Kingdom of Great Britain.
Independence Day is commonly associated with fireworks, parades, barbecues, carnivals, fairs, picnics, concerts, baseball games, family reunions, and political speeches and ceremonies, in addition to various other पब्लिक और निजी कार्यक्रम celebrating the history, government, and traditions of the United States.
स्वतंत्रता दिन is the national day of the United States.
A gender symbol denotes the sex of an organism or characterizes an एजेंट by gender.
The two standard gender symbols denoting male ♂ and female ♀ are derived from astrological प्रतीकों, denoting the classical planets Mars and Venus, respectively.
These symbols have been in use since the Renaissance also denoting elements in alchemy, specifically the metals iron and copper.
They were first used to denote the प्रभावी लिंग of plants ( i.e. sex of individual in a given crossbreed, since most plants are hermaphroditic ) by Carolus Linnaeus in 1751.
A leasehold एस्टेट is an स्वामित्व of a अस्थाई सही to hold land or property in which a lessee or a tenant holds rights of real property by some form of title from a lessor or landlord.
Although a tenant does hold rights to real property, a leasehold estate is typically considered personal property.
Leasehold is a form of land tenure or property tenure where one party खरीदता the right to occupy land or a building for a given length of time.
As lease is a विधिक एस्टेट, leasehold estate can be bought and sold on the open market.
A leasehold thus differs from a freehold or fee simple where the ownership of a property is purchased outright and thereafter held for an indeterminate length of time, and also differs from a tenancy where a property is let ( rented ) on a periodic basis such as weekly or monthly.
Until the end of the lease period ( often measured in दशकों or सदियां ; a 99 साल पट्टे is काफी आम ) the leaseholder has the right to remain in occupation as an assured tenant paying an agreed rent to the owner.
शर्तें of the अनुबंध हैं contained in a lease, which has elements of contract and property law intertwined.
the पद एस्टेट for years may occasionally be used.
This refers to a leasehold estate for any specific period of time ( the word `` years '' is भ्रामक ).
An estate for years is नहीं automatically renewed.
Colloquially, `` lease '' and `` leasing `` are often a formalization of a longer, specific period as compared साथ a `` rental '' that created a tenancy at will, terminable or renewable at the end of a short period.
Olivia ( also known as Welcome to the World of the Pig ओलिविया ) is a british-american children 's एनिमेटेड television series produced by media company Chorion and based on Ian Falconer 's books.
It is seen on Nick jr. in the US, Milkshake !
, Nick Jr. in the UK and Ireland, and डिज़्नी जूनियर in लैटिन अमेरिका and Brazil, Treehouse TV in Canada.
The show has won a silver Parents ' Choice Award for its धनात्मक स्टोरी lines and characters.
Location of Panama between Pacific ( bottom ) and Caribbean ( top ), with canal at top center
The Panama Canal ( ) is a जलयान कनाल in Panama that connects the Atlantic Ocean ( via the Caribbean Sea ) to the Pacific Ocean.
The canal कटौती आरपार the isthmus of Panama and is a key conduit for international maritime trade.
There are locks at each end to lift ships up to Gatun Lake ( above sea-level ).
Gatun Lake was created to reduce the राशि of कार्य जरूरी for the canal.
The current locks are चौड़ी.
A third, wider lane of locks is being built.
France began work on the canal in 1881, but had to stop because of अभियान्त्रिकी समस्याएं and high mortality due to disease.
The United States ( US ) later took over the project and took a decade to complete the canal in 1914, enabling ships to avoid the lengthy Cape Horn route around the southernmost tip of South America ( via the Drake Passage ) or to navigate the जलसन्धि of Magellan.
One of the largest and most difficult engineering projects ever undertaken, the Panama Canal shortcut made it possible for ships to travel between the Atlantic और प्रशांत महासागर in हाफ the time previously required.
The shorter, faster, safer route to the US वेस्ट coast और to राष्ट्र in और along the Pacific Ocean allowed those places to become more integrated with the world economy.
During this time, ownership of the territory that is now the Panama Canal थी पहला कोलम्बियाई, तब फ्रेंच, और तब अमरीकी ; the United States completed the construction.
The canal was taken over in 1999 by the panamanian सरकारी, as long planned.
Annual traffic has risen from about 1,000 ships जब the कनाल opened in 1914, to 14,702 vessels in 2008, the latter measuring a total of 309.6 million Panama Canal/Universal Measurement System ( PC/UMS ) tons.
By 2008, more than 815,000 vessels had passed through the canal, many of them much larger than the original planners could have envisioned ; the largest ships that can transit the canal today are called Panamax.
The American Society of Civil Engineers has named the Panama Canal one of the seven चमत्कार of the आधुनिक संसार.
Benjamin Franklin ( April 17, 1790 ) was one of the founding fathers of the United States.
A noted polymath, Franklin was a leading author, printer, political theorist, राजनेता, postmaster, वैज्ञानिक, संगीतकार, inventor, satirist, civic activist, statesman, and diplomat.
As a scientist, he was a major figure in the American Enlightenment and the history of physics for his discoveries and theories regarding electricity.
He invented the lightning rod, bifocals, the फ्रैंकलिन स्टोव, a carriage odometer, and the glass 'armonica '.
He facilitated many civic संगठन, including a fire department and a university.
Franklin earned the title of `` The First American '' for his early and indefatigable campaigning for colonial unity ; as an लेखक और प्रवक्ता in लंदन लिये अनेक colonies, तब as the first United States Ambassador to France, he exemplified the emerging American nation.
Franklin was foundational in defining the American ethos as a marriage of the practical values of thrift, hard work, education, community spirit, self-governing institutions, and विपक्ष to authoritarianism both political and religious, with the scientific and tolerant values of the Enlightenment.
In the words of historian Henry Steele Commager, `` In a Franklin could be merged the virtues of Puritanism without its defects, the illumination of the Enlightenment without its heat. ''
To Walter Isaacson, this makes Franklin `` the most accomplished American of his age and the most influential in inventing the type of society America would become. ''
Franklin, always proud of his working class roots, became a कामयाब समाचारपत्र एडिटर और मुद्रक in Philadelphia, the leading city in the colonies.
He was also partners with William Goddard and Joseph Galloway the three of whom published the Pennsylvania वृत्तान्त, a समाचारपत्र that was known for its revolutionary sentiments and criticisms of the British monarchy in the American colonies.
He became wealthy publishing Poor Richard 's almanack and The Pennsylvania Gazette.
Franklin gained international renown as a वैज्ञानिक लिये उसके प्रसिद्ध experiments in electricity and for his many inventions, especially the lightning rod.
He played a major role in establishing the University of Pennsylvania and was elected the first president of the अमरीकी philosophical Society.
Franklin became a national hero in America when he पथप्रदर्शन the प्रयत्न to have Parliament repeal the unpopular Stamp Act.
An accomplished diplomat, he was widely admired among the French as American minister to Paris and was a प्रमुख figure in the development of positive Franco-American relations.
For many years he was the British postmaster for the colonies, जिससे सक्रिय him to set up the first national communications network.
He was active in community अफेयर्स, औपनिवेशिक and state politics, as well as national and international affairs.
From 1785 to 1788, he served as governor of Pennsylvania.
Toward the end of his life, he freed his slaves and became one of the सबसे prominent abolitionists.
His colorful life and legacy of scientific and political achievement, and status as one of America 's most influential Founding Fathers, have seen Franklin honored on coinage and money ; warships ; the names of many towns, counties, educational संस्थानों, namesakes, and companies ; and more than two centuries after his death, countless cultural references.
Criminal Minds is an अमरीकी police procedural television program that premiered September 22, 2005, on CBS.
The श्रेणी फ़ॉलो a टोली of profilers from the FBI 's Behavioral Analysis Unit ( BAU ) based in Quantico, Virginia.
The BAU is part of the FBI National बीच लिये the विश्लेषण of हिंसक Crime.
The show differs इससे अनेक प्रक्रियात्मक dramas by focusing on profiling the criminal, rather than the crime itself.
The show is produced by The Mark गॉर्डन कम्पनी in संघ with CBS Television Studios ( originally Paramount Network Television then CBS Paramount Network Television ) and ABC Studios ( originally Touchstone Television ).
CBS announced in October 2009 that Legacy Interactive would develop a video game based on the दिखाएँ.
The game would require players to examine crime दृश्यों लिये clues to सहायता solve murder mysteries.
The interactive puzzle game was released in 2012, but did not feature any of the voices of the show 's cast, nor was the cast involved with the project.
On March 14, 2012, CBS renewed Criminal Minds for an आठवीं ऋतु, which premiered on September 26, 2012.
`` Heart-Shaped Box '' is a song by the American grunge band Nirvana, written by vocalist and guitarist Kurt Cobain.
The song was released as the first single from the group 's third and final studio album, In utero, in 1993.
It was एक of दो गीतों इससे the एल्बम मिश्रित by स्कॉट Litt in order to augment the original production by producer Steve Albini.
While Nirvana 's label DGC Records did not release a शारीरिक सिंगल लिये बिक्री in the संयुक्त राज्य, `` heart-shaped Box '' received much American radio airplay, reaching number one on the Billboard Modern Rock Tracks chart.
The अंतरराष्ट्रीय रिलीज of the single reached number five on the UK Singles Chart.
The song 's music video, directed by एंटोन corbijn, garnered critical plaudits.
The orbital speed of a body, generally a ग्रह, a प्राकृतिक उपग्रह, an कृत्रिम उपग्रह, or a अनेक star, is the speed at which it orbits around the barycenter of a system, usually around a more massive body.
It can be used to refer to either the mean orbital speed, the average speed as it completes an orbit, or instantaneous orbital speed, the speed at a particular point in its orbit.
The orbital speed at any position in the orbit can be computed from the distance to the central body at that position, and the specific orbital energy, which is independent of स्थिति : the गतिज उर्जा is the कुल energy minus the potential energy.
Brown Palace आंतरिक और Atrium
Brown Palace होटल is the second-oldest operating hotel in Denver, Colorado and is one of the first atrium-style hotel ever built.
It is now operated by कोरम होटल और Resorts.
It was निर्मित in 1892, one year later than the Oxford Hotel.
It was named लिये इसके असली मालिक, हेनरी C. Brown, and was designed with its odd triangular shape by architect Frank Edbrooke.
The hotel is located at 321 17th St, डेनवर, co between 17th गली, ब्रॉडवे and Tremont Street/Pl in downtown Denver behind the Republic Plaza.
The main प्रवेश door is on Tremont Street.
DVD-Video is a consumer video format used to store digital video on DVD discs, और is फिलहाल the प्रबल उपभोक्ता video format in Asia, North America, Europe, and Australia.
Discs using the DVD-Video specification require a DVD drive and an H.262/MPEG-2 Part 2 decoder ( e.g., a DVD player, or a computer DVD drive with a software DVD player ).
Commercial DVD फिल्मों हैं एनकोडेड using a combination of H.262/MPEG-2 Part 2 compressed video and audio of varying formats ( often multi-channel formats as described below ).
Typically, the data rate for DVD फिल्मों सीमाएँ इससे 3 Mbit/s to 9.5 Mbit/s, and the bit rate is usually adaptive.
It was first available for retail around 1997.
The DVD-Video specification was निर्मित by dvd फ़ोरम and can be obtained from DVD Format/Logo Licensing Corporation for a fee of $ 5,000.
The specification is not publicly available, because every सदस्य जरूर चिह्न a non-disclosure agreement.
Certain information in the DVD Book is मालिकाना and confidential.
The nautical mile ( symbol M, NM or nmi ) is a unit of length that is about one minute of arc of latitude measured along any meridian, or about one minute of arc of देशांतर at the equator.
By international agreement it has been set at 1,852 मीटर exactly ( about 6,076 feet ).
It is a non- SI unit ( although accepted for use in the International System of Units by the BIPM ) used especially by navigators in the shipping और विमानन industries, and also in polar exploration.
It is commonly used in international law and treaties, especially regarding the limits of territorial waters.
It विकसित इससे the sea mile and the related geographical mile.
The nautical mile remains in use by sea and air navigators worldwide because of its convenience when working with charts.
Most nautical charts use the Mercator projection whose scale varies by about a factor of छह इससे the equator to 80° अक्षांश, so charts covering large areas can not use a single linear scale.
The nautical mile is nearly equal to a minute of latitude on a chart, so a अलहदा measured साथ a चार्ट divider can be roughly converted to nautical miles using the chart 's latitude scale.
Shippensburg is a borough in कम्बरलैंड और फ्रैंकलिन काउंटी in the U.S. state of Pennsylvania.
Settled in 1730, Shippensburg lies in the कम्बरलैंड घाटी, 41 मील ( 66 km ) west-southwest of Harrisburg, and is part of the Harrisburg– Carlisle Metropolitan Statistical Area.
In 1900, 3,228 लोगों lived there ; in 1910, 3,457 ; and in 1940, 5,244 people lived there.
The जनसांख्यिकी was 5,492 at the 2010 census.
Shippensburg was incorporated as a borough on January 21, 1819.
In the past, there were furniture factories, engine and पंप works, and other industrial works located within the town.
Shippensburg is also the home of The Beistle Company, the oldest and largest manufacturer of decorations and party goods, which sells its distinctive honeycomb पेपर सजावट worldwide.
It is also the location of Pague and Fegan, the oldest continuously operated hardware store in Pennsylvania.
In May 2012, Volvo Construction Equipment began a $ 100 million विस्तार प्रोजेक्ट to लाओ इसके अमरीकी headquarters to Shippensburg.
shippensburg is भी home to Shippensburg University of Pennsylvania, one of 14 universities of the Pennsylvania State System of Higher Education.
वार्षिक the पिछला full week of July, the Shippensburg Community Fair is held.
Begun in 1958, the मेला bills itself as Pennsylvania 's largest bi-county fair.
The fair includes agricultural exhibits, a craft show, food vendors, and carnival rides amongst other things.
Every summer on the last Saturday of August, Shippensburg holds the Corn Festival, an event that brings regional artisans and विक्रेता to operate stands downtown.
The downtown is closed to ट्रैफ़िक लिये at तनिक 5 blocks for most of the day.
Average attendance at the पर्व is अनुमानित at 60,000 - 70,000 each year.
Black hairy जीभ ( bht, भी termed lingua villosa nigra ) refers to a condition of the tongue where the filiform papillae elongate with black or brown discoloration, giving a black and hairy appearance.
The appearance may be alarming, but it is a harmless कंडीशन.
predisposing कारकों शामिल धूम्रपान, xerostomia ( शुष्क मुँह ), नरम आहार, ग़रीब मौखिक hygiene और निश्चित medications.
Management is by improving oral hygiene, especially scraping or brushing the tongue.
The आईईईई 1394 इंटरफ़ेस is a सीरियल bus interface standard for high-speed communications and isochronous real-time data transfer.
It was developed in the लेट 1980s और जल्दी 1990s by Apple, who called it FireWire.
The 1394 इंटरफ़ेस is comparable to USB, and often those two technologies are considered together, though USB has more market share.
Apple first included FireWire in some of its 1999 models, and most Apple कंप्यूटर चूंकि the साल 2000 have शामिल FireWire ports, though, as of 2013, nothing beyond the 800 version ( IEEE-1394b ).
The interface is also known by the brand i.LINK ( सोनी ), and Lynx ( Texas Instruments ).
IEEE 1394 replaced parallel SCSI in many applications, because of lower implementation costs and a simplified, अधिक अनुकूलनीय cabling system.
The 1394 standard also defines a backplane इंटरफ़ेस, though this is not as widely used.
IEEE 1394 is the High-Definition Audio-Video Network Alliance ( HANA ) standard connection interface लिये a/v ( audio/visual ) component communication and control.
FireWire is also available in wireless, fiber optic, and coaxial versions using the isochronous protocols.
Stephen `` Stevie '' Ray vaughan ( अक्तूबर 3, 1954 – August 27, 1990 ) was an American guitarist, singer-songwriter, and record producer.
Often referred to by his initials SRV, Vaughan is बेहतरीन known as a founding member and leader of Double Trouble.
साथ साथ drummer Chris Layton and bassist Tommy Shannon, they ignited the blues revival of the 1980s.
With a career spanning seven years, Vaughan and दोगुना ट्रबल consistently sold out concerts while their albums frequently went gold.
He was born and raised in Dallas, Texas, and for a short period of time lived in ग्राहम, Texas.
As the younger brother of Jimmie Vaughan, Vaughan started playing the guitar at age seven and formed several bands that occasionally performed in local nightclubs.
At age 17, he dropped out of high school and moved to Austin to further pursue उसके musical करियर, joining समूह ऐसे as krackerjack, the Nightcrawlers, and the Cobras.
In 1977, he formed Triple Threat Revue, a band that आखिरकार विकसित into दोगुना Trouble and regularly performed around Austin.
In 1982, Vaughan and Double Trouble performed at the Montreux Jazz Festival in Switzerland, catching the attention of संगीतकारों दाउद बोवी और जैक्सन browne.
Bowie asked Vaughan to play on his upcoming studio album Let 's Dance, while Browne offered the band free use of his personal studio in Los Angeles to record an album.
In March 1983, Vaughan and Double Trouble were signed to Epic Records by दिग्गज रिकार्ड निर्माता जॉन हैमंड Sr. and released their debut album, Texas Flood in June of that year.
After successful touring, the group released the albums, Could n't Stand the Weather ( 1984 ) और आत्मा to Soul ( 1985 ), the latter of which featured new keyboardist Reese Wynans.
Although his career had progressed successfully, Vaughan checked into a rehabilitation hospital in Atlanta, जॉर्जिया to दे up a कोका और दारू आदत and returned to touring with the band.
In June 1989, In Step was released and earned them a Grammy Award for Best Contemporary Blues Performance.
On August 27, 1990, Vaughan was killed in a helicopter crash following a performance in East Troy, Wisconsin.
Vaughan 's uniquely eclectic yet intense स्टाइल थी निकला इससे a किस्में of musical genres.
He was influenced by blues musicians including Albert King, Freddie King, Otis Rush, and Muddy Waters, and rock guitarists such as Jimi Hendrix and Lonnie Mack.
His guitar playing reflected the classic blues and pentatonic तराजू.
He has received wide critical recognition for his guitar playing, रैंकिंग at # 6 on Rolling Stones list of `` 100 Greatest Guitarists '' in 2011.
He was मरणोपरांत inducted into the Blues Hall of Fame in 2000 and a memorial statue was erected in Austin 's Auditorium Shores park.
Stevie रे Vaughan is widely considered to be one of the greatest musicians to come from the state of Texas.

In computer networking, gigabit Ethernet ( GbE or 1 GigE ) is a term describing various technologies for transmitting Ethernet frames at a rate of a gigabit प्रति दूसरी ( 1,000,000,000 बिट्स प्रति दूसरी ), as defined by the IEEE 802.3-2008 standard.
It came into use beginning in 1999, gradually supplanting Fast ईथरनेट in wired local networks, where it performed considerably faster.
The cables and equipment are very similar to previous standards and यहूद बहुत आम और किफायती by 2010.
Half-duplex gigabit links connected through hubs are allowed by the specification, लकिन full-duplex उपयोग with switches is much more common.

The प्रमुख components of a stamp:
1. Image
2. perforations
3. denomination
4. देश name
A postage stamp is a small piece of paper that is purchased and displayed on an item of mail as evidence of भुगतान of postage.
Typically, stamps are made from special paper, with a national designation and denomination ( price ) on the face, और a gum adhesive on the reverse side.
Postage stamps are purchased from a postal administration or other प्राधिकृत विक्रेता और हैं प्रयुक्त to अदा लिये the लागत involved in moving mail as well as other business necessities such as insurance and registration.
The stamp’s shape is प्रायः कि of a छोटी आयताकार of varying proportions, though triangles or other shapes are occasionally used.
the स्टैम्प is affixed to an लिफाफा or अन्य डाक कवर ( i.e., पैकेट, बक्सा, mailing बेलन ) कि the ग्राहक बधाइयां to send.
The item is then processed by the postal system, where a postmark, sometimes known as a cancellation mark, is usually applied over the stamp and cover ; this procedure marks the स्टैम्प as प्रयुक्त, जिससे रोकता its reuse.
The postmark indicates the date and point of origin of the mailing.
The mailed item is then delivered to the address that the customer has applied to the लिफाफा or कवर.
Postage stamps have facilitated the delivery of mail since the 1840s.
Before this time, ink and hand-stamps ( hence the word 'stamp ' ), usually made from wood or कॉर्क, यहूद often used to frank the mail and confirm the payment of postage.
The first adhesive postage stamp, commonly referred to as the Penny ब्लैक, थी जारी in the United Kingdom in 1840.
The invention of the stamp was a part of the attempt to reform and improve the डाक प्रणाली in the संयुक्त Kingdom of Great Britain and Ireland, which in the early 19th century was in disarray and rife with corruption.
There are varying accounts of the inventor or आविष्कारक of the stamp.
Before the introduction of postage stamps, mail in the UK was paid for by the recipient, a प्रणाली कि थी संबद्ध साथ an irresolvable problem : the costs of delivering mail were not recoverable by the postal service when recipients were unable or unwilling to pay for delivered items, and senders had no incentive to restrict the number, size, or weight of items sent, whether or not they would ultimately be paid for.
The postage stamp resolved this issue in a simple और सुरुचिपूर्ण manner, साथ the अतिरिक्त benefit of room for an element of beauty to be introduced.
Later related inventions include postal stationery such as prepaid-postage envelopes, post cards, lettercards, aerogrammes and wrappers, postage मीटर, और, अधिक recently, specialty बाक्स और लिफाफे provided free to the customer by the U.S. postal service for priority or express mailing.
The postage stamp afforded convenience for both the mailer and postal officials, more efficiently recovered costs for the postal service, and ultimately resulted in a better, faster postal system.
With the conveniences stamps offered, उनके उपयोग resulted in greatly increased mailings during the 19th and 20th centuries.
Postage stamps during this era यहूद the सबसे popular way of paying for mail, but by the end of the 20th century were rapidly being eclipsed by the use of metered postage and bulk mailing by businesses. )
The same result with respect to communications by private parties occurred over the last decade of the 20th century and the first decade of the 21st due to declining cost of long distance telephone communications and the development and explosive spread of electronic mailing ( `` e-mail '' via the Internet ) and bill paying systems had.
As postage stamps with उनके engraved imagery began to appear on a widespread basis, historians and collectors began to take notice.
The study of postage stamps and their उपयोग is referred to as philately.
Stamp collecting can be both a hobby and a form of historical study and reference, as government-issued postage stamps and their mailing systems have always been involved with the history of nations.
The University of Alabama at Birmingham ( UAB ) is a public university in Birmingham in the U.S. state of Alabama.
Developing from an extension center established in 1936, the institution became an autonomous संस्था in 1969 और is आज one of three institutions in the University of Alabama System.
UAB offers over 140 programs of study in 12 academic divisions leading to bachelor 's, master 's, doctoral, and professional degrees in the social and behavioral sciences, the liberal arts, कारोबार, शिक्षा, अभियान्त्रिकी, and health-related fields such as medicine, dentistry, optometry, nursing, and public health.
The school is highly renowned for its चिकित्सा research and natural sciences programs.
The UAB Health System, one of the largest अकादमिक medical centers in the United States, is affiliated with the university.
UAB Hospital sponsors residency programs in various medical specialties, including आतंरिक आयुर्विज्ञान, न्यूरोलॉजी, surgery, radiology, and anesthesiology.
UAB Hospital is the तभी acs सत्यापित स्तर i आघात center in Alabama, as rated by the American College of Surgeons Trauma Program.
UAB is the state 's largest employer, with more than 18,000 faculty and staff and over 53,000 jobs at the university and in the health system.
An estimated 10 percent of the कार्य in the birmingham-hoover Metropolitan Area and 1 in 33 jobs in the state of Alabama are directly or indirectly related to UAB.
the विश्वविद्यालयों 's overall annual economic impact was estimated to be $ 4.6 billion in 2010.
In the fall of 2012, the University of Alabama at Birmingham नामांकित 17,999 विद्यार्थी from more than 110 countries, including 1,605 freshmen.
There are plans to commence साथ an `` आक्रामक '' growth in enrollment at UAB.
The current UAB President is Dr. रे L. watts.
Tofu, also called bean curd, is a food made by coagulating soy juice and तब दबाने the resulting curds into soft white blocks.
It is a घटक in many East Asian and Southeast Asian cuisines.
There are many different varieties of tofu, including fresh tofu and tofu that रै महरूम processed in कुछ way.
टोफू has a subtle flavor and can be used in savory and sweet dishes.
It is often seasoned or marinated to suit the dish.
Tofu originated in प्राचीन China some 2,000 years ago.
चाइनीज legend ascribes its invention to prince Liu An ( Chinese : 劉安 Liú Ān, 179–122 BC ).
Tofu and its production technique were introduced into Korea and then जापानी दौरान the Nara period.
It spread into other parts of ईस्ट एशिया as well.
This spread likely coincided साथ the स्प्रेड of Buddhism because it is an important source of protein in the vegetarian diet of East Asian Buddhism.
Li Shizhen in the Ming राजवंश वर्णित a विधि of making tofu in Bencao Gangmu.
Tofu has a low calorie count, relatively large amounts of protein, and छोटी मोटे.
It is high in आयरन और depending on the coagulant used in manufacturing, may also be high in calcium and/or magnesium.
Bubbles ( born 1983 ) is a आम चिंपैंजी, ज्ञात लिये होने the one-time pet of American recording artist Michael Jackson, who bought the primate from a Texas research facility in the early 1980s.
The animal थी a बारंबार सफर companion to the singer, whose attachment to the animal led to media mockery and, among other factors, to a public perception of Jackson as an eccentric.
During the Bad World Tour, for example, Jackson brought Bubbles with him to Japan, जहाँ वे दोनो पिया tea with the mayor of Osaka.
Bubbles was initially kept at the Jackson family 's home in Encino, Los Angeles, but was moved to neverland Ranch in 1988.
There, he slept in a crib in Jackson 's bedroom, used the singer 's toilet, and ate candy in the Neverland movie theater.
In 2003 the public learned that, like all captive chimpanzees, Bubbles had matured into a large and aggressive adult chimp unsuitable as a साथी एनिमल.
He was sent to a California animal प्रशिक्षक, जहाँ he थी reported to have attempted suicide.
When the trainer shut down his operation in 2004, Bubbles was moved to the Center for Great Apes, a अभयारण्य in wauchula, Florida, where he has lived since 2005.
Muse are an English rock band इससे teignmouth, देवों, which formed in 1994.
The band consists of school friends Matthew Bellamy ( lead vocals, lead guitar, piano, keyboards, keytar ), Christopher Wolstenholme ( bass, vocals, keyboards, rhythm guitar, harmonica ) and Dominic Howard ( drums, percussion, synthesisers, sampling ).
Since the release of their 2006 एल्बम ब्लैक Holes and Revelations, keyboardist and percussionist Morgan Nicholls has performed live with the band.
Muse are known for their energetic and extravagant live performances and their fusion of many music genres, including space rock, प्रगतिशील rock, alternative rock, heavy metal, classical music and electronica.
Muse have released six studio albums : Showbiz ( 1999 ), Origin of सममिति ( 2001 ), absolution ( 2003 ), ब्लैक छेद और खुलासे ( 2006 ), The Resistance ( 2009 ) and The 2nd Law ( 2012 ).
They have also issued three live albums, hullabaloo साउंडट्रैक ( 2002 ), जिससे is also a compilation of B-sides, Absolution Tour ( 2005 ), and HAARP ( 2008 ), which documents the band 's performances at Wembley Stadium in 2007.
Black Holes and Revelations earned the band a पारा पुरस्कार नामांकन और a तीसरा place finish in the NME Albums of the Year list for 2006.
Muse have also won a collection of music awards throughout their history, including five MTV Europe Music Awards, six Q Awards, eight NME Awards, two Brit Awards —winning `` बेहतरीन अंग्रेजों सजीव Act '' twice, an MTV Video Music Award, four Kerrang !
Awards and an American म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार.
They were also nominated for पाँच ग्रैमी पुरस्कार, of जिससे वे जीती बेहतरीन Rock Album, for their fifth studio album The Resistance ( 2009 ).
Muse have sold over 15 million albums worldwide.
Bloemfontein (, ; Dutch for `` fountain of flowers '' ) is the capital city of the Free State Province of South Africa ; and, as the judicial capital of the nation, one of South Africa 's three national capitals – the other two being Cape Town, the legislative capital, and Pretoria, the administrative capital.
Bloemfontein is popularly and poetically known as `` the city of roses ``, owing to the abundance of these flowers and the annual rose festival held there.
The city 's Sesotho name is Mangaung, meaning `` place of cheetahs `` and it रै been included in the Mangaung Local Municipality since 2000.
Bloemfontein is situated on dry grassland at, at an altitude of above sea स्तर.
the नगर is घर to 369,568 residents, while the Mangaung Local Municipality has a population of 645,455.

The meaning of life is a philosophical question concerning the significance of life or existence in general.
It can also be expressed in different forms, such as `` Why are we here ? ``, `` What is life all about ? ``, and `` What is the purpose of existence ? ''
It रै महरूम the विषय of much philosophical, वैज्ञानिक, और theological अटकलें throughout इतिहास.
There have been a large number of proposed answers to these questions from many अलग cultural and ideological backgrounds.
The meaning of life is in the philosophical and religious conceptions of existence, social ties, consciousness, and happiness, and borders on many other issues, such as symbolic meaning, ontology, value, purpose, ethics, good and evil, free will, the अस्तित्व of one or multiple Gods, conceptions of God, the soul, and the afterlife.
Scientific contributions फ़ोकस primarily on describing related empirical facts about the universe, exploring the context and parameters concerning the 'how ' of life.
Science also studies and can provide recommendations for the pursuit of well-being and a related conception of morality.
An alternative, humanistic दृष्टिकोण मुद्राएँ the question `` What is the meaning of my life ? ''
The value of the question pertaining to the purpose of life may coincide with the achievement of ultimate reality, or a feeling of oneness, or भी a अहसास of sacredness.
Family Guy creator Seth MacFarlane also provides the voices of Peter griffin, stewie Griffin, Brian Griffin, and Glenn Quagmire.
Family Guy is an American animated sitcom that features five main voice actors, and numerous regular cast and recurring guest stars.
The principal voice cast consists of show creator Seth MacFarlane, Alex Borstein, Seth Green, Mila Kunis ( who replaced Lacey Chabert after the पहला ऋतु ) और माइक हेनरी and now, the new actor Beau Osborne.
Recurring voice actors include Patrick Warburton, Adam West, John G. Brennan, निकोल सुलीवान और जेनिफर tilly, और repeat guest stars include Phyllis Diller, Charles Durning, Rush Limbaugh, and Phil LaMarr.
अनेक डाल members provide voices for multiple characters.
The voice actors, in portraying the various character personalities on the show, draw प्रेरणा इससे हस्तियाँ and pop culture.
Family Guy characters have been played by more than one actor, after members of the show left the series or had conflicting दायित्वों.
Kunis was nominated for an Annie Award for voicing Meg Griffin in the season 5 episode `` Barely Legal `` and MacFarlane has भी जीती an एमी पुरस्कार लिये Outstanding Voice-Over Performance and an Annie Award for Best Voice Acting in an Animated Television Production, though no other cast member has won an award for their work on the series.
