Core 2 is a brand encompassing a दायरा of Intel 's consumer 64-bit x86-64 single-, dual-, and quad-core microprocessors based on the Core microarchitecture.
The single- and dual-core models are single- die, whereas the quad-core models comprise two dies, each containing two cores, packaged in a multi-chip module.
The introduction of Core 2 relegated the pentium ब्रांड to the mid-range market, and reunified laptop and desktop CPU lines, which previously had been divided into the Pentium 4, Pentium D, and Pentium M brands.
The Core 2 brand was introduced on 27 जुलाई 2006, comprising the Solo ( single-core ), Duo ( dual-core ), Quad ( quad-core ), and in 2007, the Extreme ( dual- or quad-core CPUs for enthusiasts ) subbrands.
Intel Core 2 processors with vPro प्रौद्योगिकी ( designed लिये businesses ) include the dual-core and quad-core branches.
The Super Bowl is the annual championship game of the National Football League ( NFL ), the highest level of professional American football in the United States, culminating a season that begins in the late summer of the previous calendar year.
The Super Bowl uses Roman numerals to identify each game, rather than the साल in जिससे it is held.
लिये उदाहरण, सुपर कटोरी I was played on January 15, 1967, following the 1966 regular season, while Super Bowl XLVII was played on February 3, 2013, following the 2012 season.
The खेल थी निर्मित as भाग of a merger agreement between the NFL and its then-rival league, the American Football League ( AFL ).
It was agreed that the two leagues ' champion teams would play in an afl–nfl संसार चैंपियनशिप खेल जबतक the merger was to officially begin in 1970.
After the merger, each league was redesignated as a `` conference ``, and the game was then played between the conference champions.
Currently, the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल Conference ( NFC ) leads the series with 25 wins to 22 wins for the American Football Conference ( AFC ).
The day on which the Super Bowl is played, now माना by कुछ a de facto अमरीकी national holiday, is called `` Super Bowl Sunday ``.
It is the second-largest day for U.S. food consumption, after थैंक्सगिविंग दिन.
In addition, the Super Bowl has frequently been the most watched American television broadcast of the year.
Super Bowl XLV, played in 2011, became the most-watched American television program in history, drawing an average audience of 111 million viewers and taking over the spot held by the previous साल 's सुपर Bowl, which itself had taken over the # 1 spot held for twenty-eight years by the final episode of M*A*S*H.
The Super Bowl is also among the most watched sporting events in the world, almost all being North American ऑडियंस, और is दूसरी to संघ फ़ुटबॉल ’s UEFA Champions League final as the most watched annual sporting event worldwide.
Because of इसके ऊँची viewership, वाणिज्यिक airtime during the Super Bowl broadcast is the most expensive of the year.
Due to the high cost of investing in advertising on the Super Bowl, companies regularly develop their most महंगी विज्ञापन for this broadcast.
As a result, watching and discussing the broadcast 's commercials has become a significant पहलू of the इवेंट.
In addition, many popular singers and musicians have performed during the इवेंट 's pre-game and halftime ceremonies because of the exposure.
Fiona is a feminine given name.
The name Fiona was invented, and first used, by the Scottish poet James Macpherson ( 1736–96 ), author of the Ossian poems, which he claimed were translations from ancient Gaelic sources ( sources, when challenged, he never produced ).
The name was subsequently used as a pseudonym by William Sharp ( 1855–1905 ), who authored several romantic works under the name `` Fiona Macleod ''.
The name has चूंकि become popular in England, Scotland and Ireland.
The name is considered to be a Latinised form of the गैलिक word fionn, meaning `` white '', `` fair ''.
The name Fiona is also sometimes used as an Anglicisation of the Irish-language name Fíona, although these names हैं वरना unrelated ( as Fíona is derived from an element meaning `` vine '' ).
वहीँ is भी a modern tendency to equate the authentic Scottish Gaelic feminine name Fionnghal with Fiona.
The name Fiona is rising in popularity particularly in German -speaking countries.
Fiona was the 49th most popular name for baby girls born in 2008 in जर्मनी.
Fiona थी tied लिये तीसरा प्लेस in the ranking of most popular names for baby girls born in the tiny principality of Liechtenstein in 2008.
The name was the 347th most popular name for girls born in the United States in 2008, where it has ranked among the top 1,000 most लोकप्रिय names लिये लड़कियों चूंकि 1990 and among the top 500 since 1999.
The name Fiona has been particularly popular for girls of Asian or Pacific Islander descent in नई यॉर्क नगर, where Fiona ranked as the ninth most popular name for girls from those groups in 2007.
Many languages are used, or historically have been used in the United States.
The most commonly used language is अंग्रेज़ी.
There are also many languages indigenous to North America or to U.S. states or holdings in the Pacific प्रदेश.
Languages brought to the country by colonists or immigrants from Europe, Asia, or other parts of the world make up a large portion of the भाषाएं currently used ; several languages, including creoles and sign languages, have also developed in the United States.
Approximately 337 languages are spoken or signed by the जनसांख्यिकी, of जिससे 176 are indigenous to the area.
Fifty-two languages formerly बोला in the country 's territory are now extinct.
The variety of English spoken in the United States is known as American English.
English is the de facto national language of the United States, with 80 % of the population claiming it as a mother tongue, and some 95 % claiming to speak it `` well '' or `` very well ''.
However, no official language exists at the federal स्तर.
There have been several proposals to make English the national language in amendments to आव्रजन reform bills, but none of these bills has become law with the amendment intact.
The हालात is काफी varied at the राज्य and territorial levels, with some states mirroring the federal policy of adopting no official language in a de jure capacity, others adopting English alone, others officially adopting English as well as local languages, and still others adopting a policy of de facto bilingualism.
Spanish is the दूसरी सबसे आम language in the country, and is spoken by over 12 % of the population.
The United States holds the world 's fifth largest spanish-speaking population, outnumbered only by Mexico, Spain, Colombia, and Argentina.
Throughout the Southwestern United States, long-established Spanish-speaking communities coexist साथ विशाल संख्याएँ of अधिक हाल hispanophone आप्रवासियों.
Although many new Latin American immigrants are less than fluent in English, nearly all second-generation Hispanic Americans speak English fluently, while only about half still speak Spanish.
According to the 2000 US census, people of German ancestry मेक up the largest सिंगल जातीय समूह in the United States, and the German language ranks fifth.
Italian, Polish, and French are still widely spoken among populations descending from आप्रवासियों इससे those देशों in the early 20th century, but the use of these languages is dwindling as the older generations die.
Russian is also बोला by अप्रवासी populations.
Tagalog and Vietnamese have over one लाख अध्यक्षों each in the United States, almost entirely within recent immigrant populations.
Both languages, along with the varieties of the चाइनीज भाषा, जापानी, और कोरियाई, are now used in elections in Alaska, California, Hawaii, Illinois, New York, Texas, and Washington.
Native अमरीकी भाषाएं हैं बोला in smaller pockets of the country, but these populations are decreasing, and the languages are almost never widely used outside of reservations.
Hawaiian, although having few native speakers, is an official language along with English at the राज्य स्तर in Hawaii.
The state government of Louisiana offers services and documents in French, as does New मैक्सिको in Spanish.
Besides English, Spanish, French, German, Navajo and other Native American languages, all other languages are usually learned from immigrant ancestors that came after the समय of स्वतंत्रता or learned through some form of education.
1990 's Pontiac Grand Am Sedan fender and क्वार्टर panel
On an automobile, a quarter panel ( or rear wing as it is ज्ञात in अंग्रेजों अंग्रेज़ी ) is प्रायः माना the देह फलक जिससे goes between the rear door and the trunk and typically wraps around the wheel well ; however, the similar front section Fender ( vehicle ), between the door and the hood, is sometimes incorrectly referred to as a quarter panel.
The quarter panel is typically made of Sheet metal, but is sometimes made of fiberglass or fiber-reinforced प्लास्टिक ; although, this varies with different makes and models.
A quarter panel is typically a welded on component of the uni-body structure or Monocoque.
बदलना of a sheet metal quarter panel typically requires it to be cut off the vehicle and a replacement part to be welded ( or sometimes bonded ) to the Vehicle.
Due to this high amount of specialized labor, a quarter panel may often be repaired rather than replaced by hammering out the damage, and a body filler sometimes referred to as bondo to be लागू to finalize the original surface.
Shropshire ( or ; alternatively Salop ; abbreviated, in print only, shrops ) is a काउंटी in the West Midlands region of England.
It borders Wales to the west, Cheshire to the north, Staffordshire to the east, Worcestershire to the south-east और herefordshire to the south.
A unitary authority ( Shropshire Council ) was created on 1 April 2009, taking over from the previous county council and 5 ज़िला councils, और कवर most of the county.
The borough of Telford and Wrekin has महरूम a पृथक एकात्मक प्राधिकार चूंकि 1998 but continues to be included in the ceremonial county.
The county 's population and economy is centred on five towns : the county town of Shrewsbury, जिससे is culturally and historically important and is located in the centre of the county ; Telford, a new town in the east which was constructed around a number of older towns, most notably Wellington, Dawley and Madeley, which is today the most populous ; and Oswestry in the north-west, Bridgnorth just to the south of Telford, and Ludlow in the south.
The county has many further market towns, including Whitchurch in the north, Newport just to the north-east of telford, and Market Drayton in the north-east of the county.
The Ironbridge Gorge area is a UNESCO World Heritage Site, covering ironbridge, coalbrookdale और a part of Madeley.
There are, additionally, other notable historic industrial sites located around the county, such as at shrewsbury, Broseley, Snailbeach and Highley as well as the Shropshire Union Canal.
the shropshire पहाड़ियाँ क्षेत्रफल of Outstanding Natural Beauty covers about a quarter of the county, mainly in the south.
Shropshire is one of England 's most rural and sparsely populated counties, with the population density of the Shropshire परिषद क्षेत्रफल होने बस 91/km2 ( 337/sq mi ).
The Wrekin is one of the most famous natural landmarks in the county, though the highest hills are the Clee Hills, Stiperstones and the Long Mynd.
Wenlock Edge is another significant geographical and geological लैंडमार्क.
In the low-lying northwest of the county ( and overlapping the border with Wales ) is the Fenn 's, Whixall and Bettisfield Mosses National Nature Reserve, one of the most important and best preserved bogs in Britain.
The River Severn, Great Britain 's longest नदी, रनों through the county, exiting into Worcestershire via the Severn Valley.
Shropshire is landlocked, और साथ an क्षेत्रफल of, is England 's largest inland county.
The county flower is the round-leaved sundew.
For Eurostat purposes, the county ( less the unitary district of telford और Wrekin ) is a NUTS 3 region ( code UKG22 ).
The two Shropshire unitary areas ( covering all of the ceremonial county ), together with the authorities covering the ceremonial county of Staffordshire, comprise the `` Shropshire and staffordshire '' NUTS 2 region.

The American sitcom the बिग बंग सिद्धान्त, निर्मित and executive produced by Chuck Lorre and Bill Prady, premiered on CBS on September 24, 2007.
The show centers on five characters : roommates Sheldon Cooper and Leonard Hofstadter, two Caltech physicists ; Penny, a वेट्रेस और aspiring अभिनेत्री जो जीवनदान across the hall ; and Leonard and Sheldon 's friends and co-workers aerospace engineer Howard Wolowitz, and astrophysicist Rajesh Koothrappali.
Over time, several supporting वर्ण have महरूम प्रचारित to अभिनीत भूमिकाएँ : लेस्ली winkle ( ऋतु 1 पुनरावर्ती ; ऋतु 2 नियमित ; ऋतु 3 अतिथि ), a physicist colleague, and, at different times, a lover of both Leonard and Howard ; Bernadette Rostenkowski-Wolowitz ( season 3 recurring ; season 4-present regular ), a microbiologist, Howard 's fiancée and subsequent wife, and former part-time waitress alongside Penny ; neuroscientist Amy Farrah Fowler ( season 3 guest ; season 4 recurring ; season 4-present regular ), who joins the group after being matched to Sheldon on a dating website ; and comic book store-owner, Stuart Bloom ( seasons 2–5 recurring ; season 6-present regular ), who replaces Howard as Raj 's best friend when Howard is in space.
The show also features numerous supporting वर्ण, प्रत्येक of whom plays a prominent role in a small group of episodes.
The A-Team is an American action-adventure television series, running from 1983 to 1987, about a fictional group of ex– United States Army Special Forces personnel who work as soldiers of fortune, while on the run from the फौज बाद होने ब्रांडेड as युद्ध अपराधियों लिये a `` अपराधों वे did n't commit ``.
A feature film based on the series was released by 20th Century Fox on जून 11, 2010.

There is no आधिकारिक राज्य धर्म in the थाई संविधान, which guarantees religious freedom for all Thai citizens, though the king is required by law to be Buddhist.
According to the last census ( 2000 ) 94.6 % of Thais are Buddhists of the थेरवाद परंपरा.
Muslims are the second largest religious group in Thailand at 4.6 %.
Thailand 's southernmost provinces - Pattani, Yala, Narathiwat and part of Songkhla Chumphon have प्रबल मुस्लिम populations, consisting of both ethnic Thai and Malay.
The southern tip of Thailand is mostly ethnic Malays.
Christians, मुख्यतः catholics, represent 0.7 % of the population.
A small but influential community of Sikhs in Thailand and some Hindus also live in the country 's cities, and are heavily engaged in retail commerce.
There is भी a छोटी यहूदी जातियाँ in थाईलैंड, डेटिंग वापस to the 17th सदी.
Since 2001, Muslim activists, generally वर्णित by the थाई सरकारी as terrorists or separatists, have rallied against the central government because of alleged corruption and ethnic bias on the part of officials.
Thailand 's Department of Religion, currently अंतर्गत the Ministry of Culture, is formally responsible for the registration of religious groups in Thailand URL_http which hold properties through legally established foundations.
It has oversight, along with the Immigration Police, over the work permits of प्रचारकों जो हैं `` प्रवासी religious workers '' of all religions.
A मान added कर ( vat ) is a form of consumption tax.
From the perspective of the buyer, it is a कर on the purchase price.
From that of the seller, it is a tax only on the value added to a product, सामग्री, or service, from an accounting point of view, by this stage of its manufacture or distribution.
The manufacturer remits to the सरकारी the अंतर between these two amounts, and retains the rest for themselves to offset the taxes they had previously paid on the inputs.
The value added to a product by or with a business is the sale price charged to its customer, minus the cost of materials and other taxable inputs.
A VAT is like a sales tax in कि ultimately only the end consumer is taxed.
It differs from the sales tax in that, with the latter, the tax is collected and remitted to the सरकारी तभी एकबार, at the point of purchase by the end consumer.
With the VAT, collections, remittances to the government, and credits for taxes already paid occur each time a business in the supply chain purchases products.
A referee कॉलिंग a high-sticking penaltyHigh
-sticking is the name of two infractions in the sport of ice hockey that may occur when a player intentionally or inadvertently plays with his or her stick ऊपर the height of the shoulders or above the cross bar of a hockey goal.
This can result in a stoppage of play or in a दंड.
In the rules of the नेशनल हॉकी लीग, high-sticking is defined as a penalty in Rule 60 and as a non-penalty foul in Rule 80.
A stoppage in play results if a high stick comes in contact with the puck and the team who touched it regains कंट्रोल of the puck.
However, play usually continues if a player touches the puck with a high stick and the opposing टोली gains control of the puck.
If the puck goes into the opposing net after coming into contact with a high stick, the goal is disallowed.
The level at which a stick is considered too high for a लक्ष्य is the crossbar of the net.
However, if a player knocks the पक into his own net with a high stick, the goal is allowed.
A penalty is assessed if a खिलाड़ी हमलों another player with a high stick.
The player is given a नाबालिग दंड जबतक his high stick caused an injury, in which case the referee has the option to assess a double-minor, major or match penalty.
It is the referee 's discretion which penalty to assess : the rule calls for a double minor for an accidental injury, or a match penalty for a deliberate attempt to injure ( whether the विपक्ष खिलाड़ी थी दरअसल घायल ).
Injury is प्रायः decided by the high stick causing bleeding, but the presence of blood does not automatically mean an extra penalty is awarded.
Some referees have been known to award an extra दंड बगैर the presence of blood if the referee determines that the injury sustained was sufficient to warrant a double-minor penalty.
Typical आधुनिक मेमोरी card reader, compatible with many common formats
A memory card reader is a device, typically having a USB interface, for accessing the data on a memory card ऐसे as a compactflash ( CF ), Secure Digital ( SD ) or MultiMediaCard ( MMC ).
Most card readers also offer write capability, and together with the card, this can function as a pen drive.
Some printers and personal computers have a built-in कार्ड reader.
A multi कार्ड रीडर is used for communication with more than one type of flash memory card.
मल्टी कार्ड पाठक do not have built-in memory capacity, but are able to accept multiple types and styles of memory cards.
The number of compatible memory cards varies इससे रीडर to reader and can include more than 20 different types.
The number of different memory cards that a multi card reader can accept is expressed as x-in-1, with x being a figure of merit indicating the number of memory cards accepted, such as 35-in-1.
There are three categories of card readers sorted by the type and quantity of the card slots : single card reader ( e.g. 1x SD-only ), multi card रीडर ( e.g. 9-in-1 ) और श्रेणी कार्ड रीडर ( e.g. 4x sd only ).
Some kinds of मेमोरी ताश साथ their own USB functions do not need the card reader, such as the Intelligent Stick memory card, which can plug directly into a USB slot.
The USB device क्लास used is 0x08.
Bullying is detrimental to students ' well-being और विकास.
Bullying is the use of force or coercion to abuse or intimidate others.
the बर्ताव can be habitual and involve an imbalance of social or physical power.
It can include verbal harassment or threat, physical assault or coercion and may be directed repeatedly towards particular victims, perhaps on grounds of race, religion, gender, sexuality, or ability.
If bullying is done by a group, it is called mobbing.
The victim of bullying is sometimes referred to as a `` target ''.
धमकाना can be पारिभाषित in many different ways.
The UK currently has no legal definition of bullying, while some U.S. states have laws against it.
Bullying consists of three basic types of abuse – emotional, verbal, and physical.
It typically involves हल्का methods of coercion such as intimidation.
Bullying ranges from simple one-on-one bullying to more complex bullying in which the बुली may have एक or अधिक `` lieutenants '' who may seem to be willing to assist the primary bully in his or her bullying activities.
Bullying in school and the कार्यस्थल is also referred to as peer abuse.
Robert W. Fuller has analyzed bullying in the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of rankism.
A bullying culture can develop in any context in which human beings interact with each other.
This includes school, church, family, the कार्यस्थल, home, and neighborhoods.
Happy slapping in the Instituto Regional Federico Errázuriz, सांता क्रूज़, चिली
लौरा बुश and Rae Leigh Bradbury ( formerly missing ) on April 4, 2007, in Austin, Texas, after the 8-year-old introduced Mrs. Bush during announcement of the future opening of the Texas Regional Office of the National Center for Missing and Exploited Children.
Rae Leigh was the first child in the U.S. to be recovered as a result of an AMBER Alert when she was 8 weeks old in नवम्बर 1998.
An एम्बर Alert or a Child Abduction Emergency ( SAME code : CAE ) is a child abduction alert system originating in 1996, now employed in 9 countries.
AMBER is officially a backronym for America 's लापता : प्रसारण आपात जवाब, नामित लिये Amber Hagerman, a 9-year-old abducted and murdered in Arlington, Texas in 1996.
Alternate regional alert names were once used ; in Georgia, `` Levi 's Call '' ( named after Levi Frady ) ; in Hawaii, `` Maile Amber Alert '' ( after Maile Gilbert ) ; and Arkansas, `` Morgan Nick Amber Alert '' ( in memory of Morgan Chauntel Nick ).
AMBER Alerts are distributed via commercial radio stations, Internet radio, satellite radio, टेलीविज़न स्टेशन, और केबल tv by the आपात चेतावनी प्रणाली और noaa Weather Radio ( where they are termed `` Child Abduction Emergency '' or `` Amber Alerts '' ).
The alerts are also issued via e-mail, electronic traffic-condition signs, the LED billboards which are located outside of newer Walgreens locations, along with the LED/LCD signs of billboard companies such as साफ चैनल Outdoor, CBS Outdoor and Lamar, or through wireless device SMS text messages.
AMBER Alert has also teamed up with Google and Facebook to relay information regarding an AMBER Alert to an ever growing demographic.
Those interested in subscribing to receive AMBER Alerts in their area via SMS messages can visit बेतार एम्बर चेतावनियाँ, जिससे are offered by law as free messages.
In some states, the प्रदर्शक scrollboards in front of lottery terminals are also used.
The decision to declare an AMBER Alert is made by each police संगठन ( in अनेक मामले, the state police or highway patrol ) which investigates each of the abductions.
Public information in an AMBER Alert usually consists of the name and description of the abductee, a वर्णन of the suspected abductor, and a description and license plate number of the abductor 's vehicle, if available.
Monica Samille Lewinsky ( born July 23, 1973 ) is an American woman with जिसको संयुक्त राज्य अध्यक्ष Bill Clinton admitted to having had an `` improper relationship '' while she worked at the White House in 1995 and 1996.
The affair and its repercussions ( which included Clinton 's impeachment ) became known as the lewinsky कांड.
House of Night is a series of vampire -themed काल्पनिक novels by अमरीकी लेखक P. C. Cast and her daughter Kristin Cast.
It follows the adventures of Zoey Redbird, a sixteen-year-old लड़की जो रै बस become a `` fledgling vampyre '' and is required to attend the House of Night boarding school in Tulsa, Oklahoma.
The series has been on the New York Times Best Seller list for 63 weeks and there are over seven million copies in print in उत्तर अमेरिका alone.
The sixth novel, Tempted, which went on sale on अक्तूबर 27, 2009 साथ a पहला मुद्रण of a लाख copies, entered the USA Today bestseller list that week at # 1.
In January, 2010, Gezeichnet, a German translation of Marked, reached the # 1 स्पॉट on the der Spiegel bestseller list.
The series has so far sold more than ten million किताबे in 39 countries.
Burned was released on April 27, 2010, and like Tempted, it entered the USA Today बेस्टसेलर सूची कि सप्ताह at # 1.
Awakened, released in January, 2011, also entered the list at # 1.
The series, which is प्रकाशित by st मार्टिन 's Press is planned to include twelve books.
In 2008, plans for a फिल्मी adaptation were also announced.
The tenth book in the series, Hidden, was released on अक्तूबर 16, 2012.
The दूसरी किताब in the novellas ( जिससे दे backgrounds on supporting characters ), Lenobia 's Vow, was released January 31, 2012.
Book eleven is currently called नाज़िल, और the casts have announced that two more novellas, Neferet’s Curse, planned to be released February 19, 2013, and a prequel novel about Kalona, are to be released to coincide with the eleventh and twelfth books.
In Greek mythology, the Trojan War was waged against the city of Troy by the Achaeans ( Greeks ) बाद पेरिस of ट्रॉय took हेलेन इससे उसके husband Menelaus king of Sparta.
The war is one of the most important events in यूनानी mythology और रै महरूम narrated through अनेक works of यूनानी literature, most notably through Homer 's Iliad and the Odyssey.
The Iliad relates a भाग of the पिछला year of the siege of Troy ; the Odyssey describes Odysseus 's journey home.
Other parts of the war are contained in a cycle of epic poems, which have survived through fragments.
Episodes from the war provided material for Greek tragedy and other works of Greek साहित्य, and for Roman poets including Virgil and Ovid.
The war originated from a quarrel between the goddesses Athena, Hera, and Aphrodite, बाद eris, the देवी of strife and discord, gave them a golden apple, sometimes known as the Apple of Discord, marked `` for the fairest ''.
Zeus sent the goddesses to Paris, who judged that Aphrodite, as the `` fairest '', चाहिए प्राप्त the apple.
In exchange, aphrodite made Helen, the most beautiful of all women and wife of Menelaus, fall in love with Paris, who took her to Troy.
Agamemnon, king of Mycenae and the brother of Helen 's husband Menelaus, led an expedition of achaean troops to Troy and besieged the city for ten years because of Paris ' insult.
After the deaths of many heroes, सहित the achaeans Achilles and Ajax, and the Trojans Hector and Paris, the city fell to the ruse of the Trojan Horse.
The Achaeans slaughtered the Trojans ( except for some of the women and children whom they kept or sold as slaves ) and desecrated the temples, thus earning the gods ' wrath.
Few of the achaeans लौटे safely to their homes and many founded colonies in distant shores.
The Romans later traced their origin to aeneas, एक of the Trojans, who was said to have led the surviving Trojans to modern-day Italy.
The ancient Greeks thought that the Trojan War was a historical event that had taken place in the 13th or 12th century BC, and believed कि ट्रॉय थी स्तिथ in modern-day Turkey near the Dardanelles.
By आधुनिक टाइम्स, दोनो the war and the city were widely believed to be non-historical.
In 1868, however, the German archaeologist Heinrich Schliemann met Frank Calvert, who convinced Schliemann कि ट्रॉय थी at hissarlik और schliemann took over Calvert 's excavations on property belonging to Calvert ; this claim is now accepted by most scholars.
Whether there is any historical वास्तविकता पीछे the trojan युद्ध is an open question.
Many scholars believe that there is a historical core to the tale, though this may simply mean that the Homeric stories are a fusion of various tales of sieges and expeditions by Mycenaean Greeks दौरान the कांस्य Age.
Those who believe that the stories of the Trojan War are derived from a specific historical विरोध प्रायः तिथि it to the 12th or 11th centuries BC, often preferring the dates given by Eratosthenes, 1194–1184 BC, which roughly corresponds with archaeological evidence of a catastrophic burning of Troy VIIa.
Anarchists have employed certain symbols for their कारण, सहित सबसे prominently the circle-a and the black flag, although anarchists have historically largely denied the importance of symbols to political movement.
Since the revival of anarchism around the start of the 21st-century concurrent with the rise of the anti-globalization movement, anarchist cultural symbols are widely present.
The वृहद palatine कनाल ( or pterygopalatine canal ) is a passage in the skull that transmits the greater palatine artery, vein, and nerve between the pterygopalatine fossa and the oral cavity.
Surface temperature of Antarctica in winter and summer from the European Centre for Medium-Range Weather Forecasts
The जलवायु of अंटार्कटिक is the coldest on the whole of Earth.
Antarctica has the lowest naturally occurring temperature ever अंकित on the मैदान on Earth : −89.2 °C ( −128.6 °F ) at Vostok Station.
It is भी extremely dry ( technically a desert ), averaging 166 mm ( 6.5 in ) of precipitation per year.
Even so, on सबसे भाग of the महाद्वीप the snow rarely melts and is eventually compressed to become the glacial ice that makes up the ice sheet.
Weather fronts rarely घुस दूर into the continent.
Most of Antarctica has an ice cap climate ( Köppen EF ) with very cold, generally extremely dry weather throughout the year and no month averaging above 0 °C ( 32 °F ).
Some fringe coastal areas have a tundra climate ( Köppen ET ) with a short summer averaging ऊपर जमने, and much higher precipitation.
Current head coach Mike tomlin, दौरान the 2007 season
The पिट्सबर्ग स्टीलर्स मताधिकार रै था 16 सिर कोच throughout इसके इतिहास.
Founded as the Pittsburgh pirates in, the name was changed to the Steelers prior to the season to celebrate the city 's heritage of producing steel.
Joe बच परोसा दो separate terms as head coach and Walt Kiesling served three separate terms.
During the and seasons, due to the amount of players who fought in World War II, the Steelers combined their team with Philadelphia and Chicago, respectively.
During these seasons, Steelers ' coach Walt Kiesling shared coaching duties with Greasy Neale and Phil Handler, who have not been included within this list.
struggling for much of the franchise 's early years, the team 's first season with more wins than losses was coached by Jock Sutherland in.
In, under Sutherland, the Steelers played their first playoff game against the फिलाडेल्फिया Eagles.
Ten of the 16 head coaches spent their entire professional coaching careers with the franchise, including John McNally, Walt Kiesling and Chuck Noll, who have also been voted into the Pro Football Hall of Fame.
One of only four men to coach the same team for 23 years, चक Noll retired in.
Noll is also the only coach in National Football League history to जीत चार Super Bowls.
Bill Cowher, Noll 's बदलना, coached the Steelers to their fifth Super Bowl victory, in 2005.
The Steelers sixth Super Bowl win आए in सुपर कटोरी xliii, while head coached by Mike Tomlin, the team 's current head coach.
In criminal law, fraud is intentional deception made for personal gain or to क्षति another individual ; the related adjective is fraudulent, and verb is defraud.
Fraud is a crime and a सिविल विधि उल्लंघन, हालांकि the specific criminal law definition varies by legal jurisdiction.
Defrauding लोगों or entities of money or valuables is a common purpose of fraud.
A hoax also involves deception, but without the इरादे of gain or of damaging or depriving the victim.
Fraud is a defense in a civil action for उल्लंघन of contract or specific performance of a contract.
Fraud is a आधार लिये निष्पक्ष jurisdiction.
Passover, or Pesach ( from : in Hebrew, Yiddish ), Tiberian :, Modern Hebrew : /ˈpesaχ/ Pesah, Pesakh, Yiddish : Peysekh, Paysakh, Paysokh ) is an important Biblically -derived Jewish festival.
Historically, together with Shavuot ( `` Pentecost '' ) and Sukkot ( `` Tabernacles '' ), Passover is one of the तीन यात्राएं festivals ( Shalosh Regalim ) during which the entire population of the kingdom of Judah made a pilgrimage to the Temple in Jerusalem.
Samaritans स्टिल मेक this pilgrimage to Mount Gerizim, but only men participate in public worship.
Passover commences on the 15th of the Hebrew month of Nisan and lasts for either seven days ( in Israel ) or eight days ( in the diaspora ).
In Judaism, a day commences at dusk and lasts until the following dusk, thus the first day of Passover only begins after dusk of the 14th of nisan and ends at dusk of the 15th day of the month of Nisan.
The rituals unique to the Passover celebrations commence with the Passover Seder when the 15th of Nisan has begun.
In the Northern Hemisphere Passover takes place in spring as the Torah prescribes it : `` in the month of [ the ] spring '' ( בחדש האביב ).
It is one of the most widely observed Jewish holidays.
The Jewish people celebrate Passover as a commemoration of their liberation over 3,300 years ago by God from गुलामी in प्राचीन मिश्र that was ruled by the Pharaohs, and their birth as a nation under the leadership of Moses.
It commemorates the story of the exodus as वर्णित in the यहूदी Bible especially in the Book of Exodus, in which the Israelites were freed from slavery in Egypt.
In the narrative of the Exodus, the Bible tells that God helped the Children of Israel escape from their slavery in Egypt by inflicting ten plagues upon the प्राचीन Egyptians before the Pharaoh would release his Israelite slaves ; the tenth and worst of the plagues was the death of the Egyptian first-born.
The Israelites were instructed to mark the doorposts of their homes with the blood of a slaughtered spring lamb and, upon देखकर इस, the स्पिरिट of the रब knew to pass over the first-born in these homes, hence the name of the holiday.
There is some debate over where the term is दरअसल derived from.
When the Pharaoh freed the Israelites, it is कहा that they left in such a hurry that they could not wait for bread dough to rise ( leaven ).
In commemoration, for the duration of Passover no leavened bread is eaten, for which reason it is called `` The Festival of the Unleavened ब्रैड ''.
Thus Matzo ( flat unleavened ब्रैड ) is eaten during Passover and it is a symbol of the holiday.
हैली 's धूमकेतु or Comet Halley ( or ), officially designated 1P/Halley, is the best-known of the short-period comets and is visible from Earth every 75–76 years.
Halley is the only short-period comet that is clearly visible to the naked eye from धरती, और thus the only naked-eye comet that might appear twice in a human lifetime.
Other naked-eye धूमकेतुओं may be brighter and more spectacular, but will appear only once in thousands of years.
Halley 's returns to the inner Solar System have been observed and recorded by astronomers since at least 240 BCE.
Clear records of the comet 's appearances were made by Chinese, Babylonian, and medieval European chroniclers, but were not recognized as reappearances of the same object at the समय.
The comet 's periodicity was first संकल्पित in 1705 by English astronomer Edmond Halley, after whom it is now named.
Halley 's Comet last appeared in the भीतरी सौर System in 1986 and will next appear in mid-2061.
During its 1986 apparition, Halley became the first comet to be observed in detail by spacecraft, providing the first observational data on the structure of a comet nucleus and the mechanism of coma and tail formation.
These observations supported a number of longstanding hypotheses परिचय धूमकेतु निर्माण, विशेषकर Fred Whipple 's `` dirty snowball '' model, which correctly predicted that Halley would be composed of a mixture of volatile ices – such as water, carbon dioxide and ammonia – and dust.
The missions also provided आंकड़ा जिससे substantially reformed and reconfigured these ideas ; for instance it is now understood that Halley 's surface is largely composed of dusty, non-volatile materials, and that only a small portion of it is icy.
Anti-communism is opposition to communism.
Organized anti-communism developed in reaction to the rise of communism, especially after the 1917 October क्रान्ति in Russia and reaching global dimensions during the Cold War.
Most anti-communists reject the concept of historical materialism, which is a central idea in Marxism.
Anti-communists reject the मार्क्सवादी विश्वास कि capitalism will be followed by socialism and communism, just as feudalism was followed by capitalism.
anti-communists सवाल the वैध of the Marxist claim that the socialist state will `` wither away '' when it becomes unnecessary in a true communist society.
Anti-communists argue that the repression in the early years of Bolshevik rule, while not as extreme as that during Joseph Stalin 's rule, was still severe by reasonable standards, citing examples such as Felix Dzerzhinsky 's secret police, which eliminated numerous political opponents by extrajudicial executions, and the brutal crushing of the Kronstadt rebellion and Tambov rebellion.
Some anti-communists refer to both Communism and फासीवाद as सर्वसत्तावाद, seeing similarity between the actions of communist and fascist governments.
Historian Robert Conquest has argued that Communism was responsible for tens of लाखो of मौतों दौरान the 20th century.
Opponents argue that Communist parties that have come to power have tended to be rigidly intolerant of political विपक्ष.
These opponents claim that most Communist देशों have shown no signs of advancing from Marx 's socialist stage of economy to an ideal communist stage.
Rather, Communist governments have been accused of creating a new ruling class ( a nomenklatura ), साथ शक्तियां और privileges वृहद than those previously enjoyed by the upper classes in the non- communist regimes.
Gil Heron ( 9 अप्रैल 1922 – 27 November 2008 ) was a Jamaican professional footballer.
He was the first black player to play for Scottish club Celtic, and was the father of poet and musician Gil Scott-Heron.
He died in Detroit of a heart attack on 27 नवम्बर 2008.
The soybean ( US ) or soya bean ( UK ) ( Glycine max ) is a species of legume native to East Asia, widely grown for its edible bean which has numerous uses.
The plant is classed as an oilseed rather than a pulse by the UN Food and Agricultural Organization ( FAO ).
Fat-free ( defatted ) soybean meal is a significant and cheap source of protein for animal feeds and many prepackaged meals ; soy vegetable oil is another product of प्रसंस्करण the soybean crop.
For उदाहरण, सोयाबीन उत्पाद ऐसे as textured vegetable protein ( TVP ) are ingredients in many meat and dairy analogues.
Soybeans produce significantly अधिक protein per acre than most other uses of land.
Traditional nonfermented food उपयोग of soybeans include soy milk, and from the latter tofu and tofu skin.
fermented भोजन include soy sauce, fermented bean paste, natto, and tempeh, among others.
The oil is used in many industrial अनुप्रयोग.
The main producers of soy are the United राज्य ( 35 % ), Brazil ( 27 % ), Argentina ( 19 % ), China ( 6 % ) and India ( 4 % ).
The beans contain significant amounts of phytic acid, alpha-linolenic acid, and isoflavones.
हैरिसन घाट ( born July 13, 1942 ) is an American film actor and producer.
He is famous for his performances as Han Solo in the original Star Wars trilogy and the title अक्षर of the इंडियाना जोन्स फिल्मी श्रेणी.
Ford is also known for उसके भूमिकाएँ as रिक deckard in ब्लेड Runner, John Book in Witness and Jack Ryan in Patriot Games and Clear and Present Danger.
उसके करियर रै spanned छह दशकों और includes roles in several Hollywood blockbusters, including Presumed Innocent, The Fugitive, Air Force One, and What Lies Beneath.
At one point, four of the top six box-office hits of all time शामिल one of his roles.
Five of his films have महरूम inducted into the National Film Registry.
In 1997, Ford was ranked No. 1 in Empire `` The Top 100 Movie Stars of All Time '' list.
, the United States domestic box office grosses of Ford 's films total over US $ 3.5 billion, with worldwide grosses surpassing $ 6 billion, making घाट the तीसरा उच्चतम grossing U.S. domestic box-office star.
Ford is the husband of अभिनेत्री Calista Flockhart.
A tube of chapstick
ChapStick is a brand name for lip balm manufactured by Pfizer Consumer Healthcare and used in अनेक देशों विश्वव्यापी.
It is intended to help treat and prevent chapped होठ ; hence the name.
Many varieties also include sunscreen in अनुक्रम to prevent sunburn.
Due to its लोकप्रियता, the term has become a genericized trademark.
It popularly refers to any lip balm contained in a lipstick-style tube and applied in the same manner as lipstick.
However, the term is still a registered ट्रेडमार्क, साथ अधिकारों exclusively owned by Pfizer.
In Sweden and in the United Kingdom, the उत्पाद 's main competitor is Lypsyl, made by Novartis Consumer Health, which is distributed in similar packaging to ChapStick.
George Berkeley ( ; 12 March 168514 January 1753 ), also known as Bishop Berkeley ( Bishop of Cloyne ), was an Anglo-Irish philosopher whose primary achievement was the advancement of a theory he called `` immaterialism '' ( later referred to as `` subjective idealism `` by others ).
This theory denies the existence of material substance and instead contends that familiar objects like tables and chairs are only ideas in the minds of perceivers, और as a परिणाम can not exist without being perceived.
Thus, as Berkeley famously put it, for physical objects `` esse est percipi '' ( `` to be is to be आभास `` ).
Berkeley is also known for his critique of abstraction, an important premise in his argument for immaterialism.
In 1709, Berkeley published his first major work,, in which he discussed the limitations of human दृष्टि और advanced the theory that the proper objects of sight are not material objects, but light and colour.
This foreshadowed his chief philosophical work A Treatise Concerning the Principles of Human Knowledge in 1710 which, बाद इसके ग़रीब रिसेप्शन, he rewrote in संवाद रूप और प्रकाशित under the title Three Dialogues between Hylas and Philonous in 1713.
In this book, Berkeley 's views were represented by Philonous ( Greek : 'lover of mind ' ), while Hylas ( Greek : 'matter ' ) embodies the आयरिश thinker’s प्रतिद्वंद्वियों, in particular John Locke.
Berkeley argued against Sir Isaac Newton 's doctrine of absolute space, time and motion in De Motu ( on Motion ), published 1721.
His arguments were a precursor to the दृश्य of Mach and Einstein.
In 1732, he published Alciphron, a Christian apologetic against the free-thinkers, और in 1734, he प्रकाशित the Analyst, an empiricist critique of the foundations of infinitesimal calculus, which was influential in the development of mathematics.
His last major philosophical work, Siris ( 1744 ), begins by advocating the medicinal use of tar water, and then continues to discuss a wide range of topics सहित विज्ञान, दर्शनशास्त्र, और धर्मशास्त्र.
Interest in Berkeley 's work increased after World War II, because he tackled many of the issues of paramount interest to philosophy in the 20th century such as the problems of perception, the अंतर between प्राथमिक और द्वितीयक qualities, and the importance of language.
Qingdao ( ), historically known as Tsingtao, is a major city in eastern Shandong province, Eastern China, with a जनसांख्यिकी of over 8.715 million ( 2010 census ).
Its built up area, made of 6 urban districts and 4 county-level cities, is home to परिचय 4,896,000 निवासियों in 2010.
It borders Yantai to the northeast, weifang to the west and Rizhao to the southwest.
Qīng ( ) in चाइनीज means `` green '' or `` lush '', while dǎo ( ) means `` island ''.
Qingdao is administered at the sub-provincial level.
Lying आरपार the Shandong Peninsula while looking out to the Yellow Sea, Qingdao is a major seaport, naval base, and industrial centre.
It is also the site of the tsingtao Brewery.
The world 's longest sea bridge, the Qingdao Haiwan Bridge, links the main urban area of चिंगदाओ साथ Huangdao district, straddling the Jiaozhou Bay sea areas.
Qingdao is नामित चीन 's most livable city.
Mimivirus is a viral genus containing a सिंगल पहचाना species named Acanthamoeba polyphaga mimivirus ( APMV ), or is a group of phylogenetically related large viruses ( designated usually MimiN ).
In colloquial speech, APMV is more commonly referred to as बस `` mimivirus ''.
Until October 2011, when a larger virus Megavirus chilensis थी described, it had the largest capsid diameter of all known viruses.
mimivirus रै a large and complex genome compared with most other viruses.
Mimivirus, short for `` mimicking microbe '', is so called to reflect its large आकार और apparent Gram-staining properties.
The Mexican War of Independence ( 1810–1821 ) was an armed विरोध between the people of Mexico and the Spanish colonial authorities which started on September 16, 1810.
The movement, which became known as the Mexican War of Independence, was led by Mexican-born spaniards, mestizos and Amerindians who sought independence from Spain.
It started as an आदर्शवादी peasants ' विद्रोह against their colonial masters, but ended as an unlikely alliance between Mexican ex-royalists and Mexican guerrilla insurgents.
Crohn 's disease, also known as Crohn syndrome and regional enteritis, is a प्रकार of inflammatory bowel disease that may affect any part of the gastrointestinal tract from mouth to anus, causing a wide variety of symptoms.
It primarily causes abdominal pain, diarrhea ( which may be bloody if inflammation is at its worst ), vomiting ( can be continuous ), or weight loss, but may also cause complications outside the gastrointestinal tract ऐसे as स्किन rashes, गठिया, सूजन of the नजर, थकान, and lack of concentration.
Crohn 's disease is caused by interactions between environmental, immunological और बैक्टीरियल factors in genetically susceptible individuals.
This results in a chronic inflammatory disorder, in जिससे the देह 's immune system attacks the gastrointestinal tract possibly directed at microbial antigens.
Crohn 's disease has wrongly been वर्णित as an असंक्राम्य बीमारी in the पास्ट ; recent investigators have described it as an immune deficiency state.
There is a genetic association with crohn 's बीमारी, primarily with variations of the NOD2 gene and its protein, which senses bacterial cell walls.
सहोदर of प्रभावित individuals are at higher risk.
Males and महिलाओं हैं equally affected.
Smokers are two times अधिक likely to develop Crohn 's disease than nonsmokers.
Crohn 's disease affects between 400,000 and 600,000 people in North America.
Prevalence estimates लिये उत्तरी Europe have ranged from 27–48 per 100,000.
Crohn 's disease tends to present initially in the teens and twenties, with another peak incidence in the fifties to seventies, although the disease can occur at कोई आयु.
There is no known फार्मास्युटिकल or surgical cure for Crohn 's disease.
Treatment options are restricted to controlling symptoms, maintaining remission, and preventing relapse.
The बीमारी थी नामित बाद gastroenterologist Burrill Bernard Crohn, who, in 1932, together with two other colleagues at Mount Sinai Hospital in New York, described a series of patients with inflammation of the terminal ileum, the area most commonly affected by the illness.

it is स्तिथ वेस्ट of Grass Valley, California, approximately 62 miles ( 100 km ) from Sacramento.
The population was 963 at the 2010 census.
YouTube is a video-sharing website, created by three former PayPal employees in February 2005, on which users can upload, view और share वीडियो.
The company is based in San Bruno, California, and uses Adobe Flash Video and HTML5 technology to display a wide variety of user-generated video सामग्री, सहित फिल्म क्लिप्स, tv क्लिप्स, और म्यूज़िक videos, as well as amateur content such as video blogging, short original videos, and educational videos.
Most of the content on YouTube has been uploaded by individuals, although media corporations including CBS, the BBC, Vevo, Hulu, and other organizations offer some of उनके सामग्री via the site, as part of the YouTube partnership program.
Unregistered users can watch videos, while registered users can upload an असीमित number of videos.
Videos considered to contain potentially offensive content are available only to registered users at तनिक 18 सालो old.
In November 2006, YouTube, LLC was bought by google लिये us $ 1.65 अरब, और operates as a subsidiary of Google.
Sister Act is a musical written by Cheri steinkellner और विधेयक steinkellner with additional book material by Douglas Carter Beane, with lyrics by Glenn Slater and music by Alan Menken.
It is based on the hit 1992 फिल्मी comedy of the same name.
the 2009 West End production was produced by Stage Entertainment, Whoopi Goldberg, and Michael Reno for Sis Acts LLC.

Microsoft DirectX is a collection of application प्रोग्रामिंग interfaces ( APIs ) for handling tasks related to multimedia, especially game programming and video, on Microsoft platforms.
Originally, the names of these APIs all began with Direct, such as Direct3D, DirectDraw, DirectMusic, DirectPlay, DirectSound, and so forth.
The name DirectX was coined as shorthand term for all of these APIs ( the X standing in for the particular API names ) and soon became the name of the collection.
When Microsoft later set out to develop a gaming console, the X was used as the basis of the नाम एक्सबॉक्स to indicate कि the console was based on DirectX technology.
The X initial has been carried forward in the naming of APIs designed लिये the एक्सबॉक्स ऐसे as xinput और the cross-platform ऑडियो सृष्टि Tool ( XACT ), while the DirectX pattern has been continued for Windows APIs such as Direct2D and DirectWrite.
Direct3D ( the 3D graphics API within DirectX ) is widely used in the development of video games for microsoft खिड़कियाँ, microsoft एक्सबॉक्स, Microsoft Xbox 360 and some Sega Dreamcast games.
Direct3D is also used by other software अनुप्रयोग लिये कल्पना and graphics tasks such as CAD/CAM engineering.
As Direct3D is the most widely publicized component of DirectX, it is common to see the names `` DirectX '' and `` Direct3D '' used interchangeably.
The DirectX तन्त्र विकास kit ( sdk ) consists of runtime libraries in redistributable binary form, along with accompanying documentation and headers for use in coding.
Originally, the runtimes were only संस्थापित by games or explicitly by the user.
खिड़कियाँ 95 किया नहीं लॉन्च with DirectX, but DirectX was included with Windows 95 OEM Service Release 2.
Windows 98 and Windows NT 4.0 both shipped साथ डाइरेक्टएक्स, as has every version of Windows released since.
The SDK is उपलब्धियाँ as a free download.
While the runtimes are proprietary, closed-source software, source code is provided for सबसे of the SDK samples.
starting साथ the रिलीज of खिड़कियाँ 8 डेवलपर पूर्वावलोकन, डाइरेक्टएक्स sdk रै महरूम एकीकृत into खिड़कियाँ sdk.
Direct3D 9Ex, Direct3D 10, and Direct3D 11 are only available for Windows विस्टा और नए क्युकी प्रत्येक of ये नई संस्करण थी निर्मित to depend upon the new Windows Display Driver Model that was introduced for Windows Vista.
The new Vista/WDDM graphics architecture includes a new video memory manager supporting आभासीकरण of ग्राफिक्स हार्डवेयर for various applications and services like the Desktop Window Manager.
quetzaltenango, भी commonly known by its indigenous name, Xelajú, or more commonly, Xela, is the second largest city of Guatemala.
It is both the capital of Quetzaltenango Department and the नगरपालिका seat of Quetzaltenango municipality.
It has an अनुमानित population of 224,703.
The population is परिचय 61 % स्वदेशी or Amerindian, 34 % Mestizo or ladino and 5 % European.
Quetzaltenango is located in a mountain घाटी at an उन्नयन of 2,330 meters ( 7,655 ft ) above sea level at its lowest part.
It may reach above 2,400 मीटर भीतर the city.
The नगरपालिका of quetzaltenango consists of an area of.
Municipalities abutting the municipality of Quetzaltenango include : Salcajá, Cantel, Almolonga, Zunil, el palmar, concepción chiquirichapa, San Mateo, La Esperanza, Olintepeque, and San Andrés Xecul.
All these municipalities हैं भाग of the विभाग of Quetzaltenango, except San Andrés Xecul which is a part of the Department of Totonicapán.
The Epic of Gilgamesh, an epic poem from Mesopotamia, is amongst the earliest surviving works of literature.
The literary history of gilgamesh begins with five independent Sumerian poems about 'Bilgamesh ' ( Sumerian for Gilgamesh ), king of Uruk.
Four of these were used as source सामग्री for a combined epic in Akkadian.
This first combined epic, ज्ञात as the `` बूढ़ा Babylonian '' version, dates to the 18th century BC and is titled after its incipit, Shūtur eli sharrī ( `` Surpassing All Other Kings '' ).
Only a few fragments of it have survived.
The later `` Standard Babylonian '' version dates from the 13th to the 10th centuries BC and bears the incipit Sha naqba īmuru ( `` he जो Saw the Deep '' ).
Fragments of approximately two thirds of इस longer, twelve-tablet version have been recovered.
Some of the best नक़ल were discovered in the library ruins of the 7th-century BC Assyrian king Ashurbanipal.
The story centers on a friendship between Gilgamesh and Enkidu.
Enkidu is a wild man created by the gods as Gilgamesh 's equal to distract him from oppressing the लोगों of uruk.
Together, they journey to the Cedar Mountain to शिकस्त Humbaba, its monstrous guardian.
Later they kill the Bull of Heaven, which the goddess Ishtar sends to punish gilgamesh लिये spurning her advances.
As a punishment for ये क्रियाएँ, the gods sentence Enkidu to death.
The second half of the epic focuses on gilgamesh 's तकलीफ at enkidu 's death, and his quest for immortality.
In order to learn the secret of eternal life, Gilgamesh undertakes a long और perilous journey.
He learns that `` The life that you are seeking you will never find.
When the gods created man they allotted to him death, but life they retained in उनके अपना keeping. ''
This quote was originally attributed to siduri in the बूढ़ा babylonian version of the epic, and then attributed to the immortal flood hero Utnapishtim in the Akkadian version of the epic.
Nevertheless, Gilgamesh 's fame lived on after his मौत, क्युकी of उसके ग्रेट भवन projects, and his account of what Utnapishtim told him happened during the flood.
The story has महरूम अनूदित into अनेक different languages, and Gilgamesh has since become adapted in works of popular fiction.
There are numerous debates over who created the first video game, साथ the जवाब depending largely on कैसा video games are defined.
The evolution of video games represents a उलझे वेब of अनेक different industries, including scientific, computer, arcade, and consumer electronics.
The `` वीडियो '' in `` वीडियो खेल `` traditionally refers to a raster display device.
With the popular catch phrase use of the term `` video game '', the term now implies all display types, formats, and platforms.
Historians have also sought to बायपास the समस्या by instead using the more specific `` digital games '' descriptive.
This term leaves out the earlier analog-based कंप्यूटर games.
This is a list of best-selling video game franchises that have बेची or shipped at least 5 million copies.
Unless otherwise stated, numbers indicate worldwide units sold, ordered alphabetically whenever two or more list the same amount.
The exception are the ones specifying shipments, which have निम्नतर पूर्वता than others listing sales.
Franchise sales include expansion packs even though they are not माना पूरा video games.
For best-selling individual video games, see सूची of best-selling video games.
The बिक्री आंकड़े दिए नीचे do नहीं include arcade game sales, which can be found at List of highest-grossing arcade video games.

This does not necessarily apply लिये श्रेणी कि are not video game-based.
Dorothy Ann Willis Richards ( September 1, 1933 – सितंबर 13, 2006 ) was an American politician and the 45th Governor of Texas.
She first came to national attention as the state treasurer of Texas, when she delivered the keynote पता at the 1988 Democratic National Convention.
Richards served as the 45th Governor of Texas from 1991 to 1995 and थी पराजित लिये re-election in 1994 by George W. Bush.
Ann Richards was the दूसरी female governor of Texas.
Data निष्पादन रोकथाम ( DEP ) is a security feature included in modern operating systems.
It is known to be available in लिनक्स, मैक os x, आईओएस, microsoft खिड़कियाँ और Android operating systems and is intended to prevent an application or service from executing code from a non-executable memory region.
This helps prevent certain exploits कि स्टोर कोड via a buffer overflow, for example.
DEP runs in two modes : hardware-enforced DEP for CPUs that can mark memory pages as nonexecutable, and software-enforced dep साथ limited protection for CPUs that do not have hardware support.
Software-enforced DEP does not protect against निष्पादन of कोड in आंकड़ा पृष्ठों, लकिन instead counters SEH overwrite, another type of attack.
DEP was introduced on Linux in 2004 ( kernel 2.6.8 ), on Windows in 2004 with Windows XP Service Pack 2, जबकि ठहराना introduced dep when they moved to x86 in 2006.
Example illustration of two आम futanari variants
, is the Japanese word for hermaphroditism, which is भी प्रयुक्त in a broader sense for androgyny.
Beyond Japan the term is used to describe a commonly pornographic genre of computer games, comics and animations, which includes characters that show both प्राथमिक यौन characteristics.
But in today 's language it refers लगभग exclusively for characters who have an overall feminine appearance.
In that case the term is also often abbreviated as futa ( s ), which is occasionally also used as term लिये the works itself.
Early CAPTCHAs such as these, उत्पन्न by the EZ-Gimpy program, were used on Yahoo !
A modern CAPTCHA, rather than attempting to create a distorted पृष्ठभूमि और high levels of warping on the text, might focus on making segmentation difficult by adding an angled line.
Another way to make segmentation difficult is to crowd symbols together, as in Yahoo ! 's current CAPTCHA format.
कुछ captchas कोशिश to utilize the क्षमता of लोगों to देखिए three-dimensional वस्तुएँ.
On this image, symbols are drawn with lines of अलग मोटाई to make an effect of extrusion.
A CAPTCHA ( ) is a type of challenge-response test used in computing as an attempt to ensure कि the response is generated by a human being.
The process प्रायः involves a कंप्यूटर asking a user to complete a simple test which the computer is able to grade.
These tests are designed to be easy for a कंप्यूटर to generate but difficult for a computer to solve, but again easy for a human.
If a correct solution is received, it can be presumed to have महरूम डाला by a human.
A common type of CAPTCHA requires the उपयोक्ता to type letters and/or digits from a distorted image that appears on the screen.
Such tests are commonly used to prevent unwanted internet bots from accessing websites, since a normal human can easily read a CAPTCHA, while the bot can not process the image letters and therefore, can not answer properly, or at all.
Although most captchas हैं अक्षर तस्वीरें randomly उत्पन्न, अनेक of उन्हें have become मुश्किल भी लिये a human to read, so picture CAPTCHAs were created in which a human is shown a simple test to show a picture of a certain animal ( given few animal pictures ), which is simple for a human being to process, and therefore easy to pick, while a bot can not process and solve the question because although it can analyze the picture, it can not easily guess the animal.
The term `` CAPTCHA '' was coined in 2000 by लुइस वोन ahn, मैनुएल ब्लम, निकोलस J. हॉपर, and John Langford ( all of Carnegie Mellon University ).
It is an acronym based on the word `` capture '' and standing for `` Completely स्वचालित पब्लिक Turing test to tell Computers and Humans Apart ''.
Carnegie Mellon University attempted to trademark the पद on 15 अक्तूबर 2004, लकिन the ट्रेडमार्क अनुप्रयोग was abandoned on 21 April 2008.
A CAPTCHA is sometimes described as a reverse Turing test, because it is administered by a machine and targeted at a human, in contrast to the standard Turing test that is typically administered by a human and targeted at a machine.
Jacques-Yves Cousteau ( ; commonly known in English as Jacques Cousteau ; 11 June 1910 – 25 June 1997 ) was a French naval officer, explorer, conservationist, filmmaker, innovator, scientist, photographer, author and researcher who studied the sea and all forms of life in water.
He co-developed the Aqua-Lung, pioneered समुद्री conservation and was a member of the Académie française.
KFC ( केंटकी fried मुर्गा ) is a fast food restaurant chain headquartered in Louisville, Kentucky, United States, which specializes in fried chicken.
An `` American icon '', it is the world 's दूसरी largest रेस्तरां कड़ी overall ( as measured by sales ) after McDonald 's, with over 18,000 outlets in 120 countries and territories.
the कम्पनी is a subsidiary of यम !
Brands, a restaurant company which also owns Pizza Hut और Taco Bell.
KFC was founded by Harland Sanders, who began selling fried chicken इससे उसके roadside restaurant in Corbin, Kentucky during the Great Depression.
Sanders was one of the first people to see the potential of the रेस्तरां फ़्रेंचाइज़िंग concept, with the first `` Kentucky Fried Chicken '' franchise opening in Utah in 1952.
The मताधिकार popularized मुर्गा in the fast food industry, thereby diversifying the market and challenging the dominance of the hamburger.
Marketing himself as `` Colonel Sanders '', he became a legendary figure of American cultural history, and his image is still prominently used in KFC branding.
The company 's rapid expansion saw it grow too large for Sanders to manage, and in 1964 he sold the company to a group of investors led by John Y. Brown, Jr. and Jack Massey.
केएफसी थी one of the first fast food chains to expand internationally, opening outlets in England, Mexico and Puerto Rico by the mid-1960s.
throughout the 1970s और 1980s, केएफसी अनुभवी mixed fortunes domestically, as it went through a series of corporate owners who had little or no experience in the restaurant business.
In the जल्दी 1970s, केएफसी थी बेची to the आत्माओं कड़ heublein, जो यहूद लिया over by the r.J. रेनॉल्ड्स खाना और तम्बाकू संगुटिका, जो बेची the कड़ी to पेप्सिको.
The chain continued to expand overseas however, and in 1987 KFC became the first पश्चिमी रेस्तरां chain to open in China.
The chain has चूंकि विस्तारित rapidly in China, and the country is now the company 's most profitable market.
PepsiCo spun off its restaurants division as Tricon Global Restaurants, which बाद बदला इसके नाम to Yum !
ब्रांड्स.
KFC primarily sells fried chicken pieces और विसंगतियाँ ऐसे as मुर्गा सैंडविच and wraps, salads and side dishes such as French fries and coleslaw, desserts and soft drinks, often supplied by PepsiCo.
Its most famous product is दबाव fried chicken pieces, seasoned with Sanders ' `` Original Recipe '' of 11 herbs and spices.
The exact nature of these ingredients is unknown, and represents a notable व्यापार रहस्य.
Larger portions of fried chicken are served in a distinctive गत्ता `` बाल्टी '', जिससे has become a signature of the chain since being introduced by franchisee Pete Harman.
KFC is famous for the slogan `` finger lickin ' good '', which has since been replaced by `` nobody करता मुर्गा जैसे केएफसी '' और `` So good ''.
Cnidaria ( with a मूक c ) or coelenterata is a phylum containing over 10,000 species of animals found exclusively in aquatic and mostly marine environments.
Their distinguishing feature is cnidocytes, specialized कोशिकाएं कि वे उपयोग mainly for capturing prey.
Their लाशें consist of mesoglea, a non-living jelly-like substance, sandwiched between two layers of epithelium that are mostly one cell thick.
They have two basic body forms : swimming medusae and sessile polyps, both of which are radially symmetrical with mouths surrounded by tentacles that bear cnidocytes.
दोनो फ़ॉर्म have a single orifice and body cavity that are used for digestion and respiration.
Many cnidarian species produce colonies that are single organisms composed of medusa-like or polyp-like zooids, or both.
Cnidarians ' activities are coordinated by a decentralized nerve net and सरल receptors.
Several free-swimming cubozoa and Scyphozoa possess balance-sensing statocysts, and some have simple eyes.
Not सब cnidarians reproduce sexually.
Many have complex lifecycles with asexual polyp stages and sexual medusae, but कुछ omit either the polyp or the medusa stage.
Cnidarians were for a long time grouped with Ctenophores in the phylum Coelenterata, but increasing जागरूकता of उनके मतभेद caused them to be placed in separate phyla.
Cnidarians are classified into four main groups : the almost wholly sessile Anthozoa ( sea anemones, corals, sea pens ) ; swimming Scyphozoa ( jellyfish ) ; Cubozoa ( box jellies ) ; and Hydrozoa, a diverse group that includes all the freshwater cnidarians as well as many marine forms, and has both sessile members such as Hydra and colonial swimmers such as the Portuguese Man o ' War.
Staurozoa have recently been recognised as a class in their own right rather than a sub-group of scyphozoa, और there is debate about whether Myxozoa and Polypodiozoa are cnidarians or closer to bilaterians ( more complex animals ).
Most cnidarians prey on organisms ranging in size इससे प्लवक to पशु अनेक टाइम्स larger than themselves, but many obtain much of their nutrition from endosymbiotic algae, and a few are parasites.
Many are preyed upon by other animals including starfish, sea slugs, fish and turtles.
Coral reefs, whose polyps are rich in endosymbiotic algae, support some of the world 's most productive ecosystems, और protect vegetation in tidal zones and on shorelines from strong currents and tides.
While corals are almost entirely restricted to warm, उथले समुद्री waters, अन्य cnidarians live in the depths, in polar seas and in freshwater.
Fossil cnidarians have been found in rocks formed about, and other fossils show that corals may have been उपस्थित shortly पहले और diversified a few लाख years later.
Fossils of cnidarians कि do not build mineralized structures are very rare.
Scientists currently think that cnidarians, ctenophores और bilaterians हैं अधिक closely related to calcareous sponges than these are to other sponges, and that anthozoans are the evolutionary `` aunts '' or `` sisters '' of other cnidarians, and the most closely related to bilaterians.
Recent analyses have concluded कि cnidarians, हालांकि considered more `` primitive '' than bilaterians, have a wider range of genes.

The Aztec people were certain ethnic groups of central Mexico, particularly those समूह जो spoke the Nahuatl language and who dominated large parts of Mesoamerica from the 14th to 16th centuries.
The Nahuatl words aztecatl ( singular ) and aztecah ( बहुवचन ) औसत `` लोगों from Aztlan ``, a mythological place for the Nahuatl-speaking culture of the time, and later adopted as the word to define the Mexica people.
Often the पद `` एज़टेक '' refers exclusively to the Mexica people of Tenochtitlan ( now the location of Mexico City ), situated on an island in Lake Texcoco, who referred to themselves as Mexica Tenochca or Cōlhuah Mexica.
Sometimes the term also includes the inhabitants of Tenochtitlan 's two principal allied city-states, the Acolhuas of Texcoco और the tepanecs of tlacopan, who together with the Mexica formed the Aztec Triple Alliance which controlled what is often known as `` the Aztec Empire ''.
In other contexts, Aztec may refer to all the various city states and their peoples, who shared large parts of their ethnic history and cultural traits with the Mexica, Acolhua and Tepanecs, and who often also used the नावातल भाषा as a lingua franca.
In this meaning it is possible to talk about an Aztec civilization including all the particular cultural patterns common for most of the peoples inhabiting Central मैक्सिको in the लेट postclassic काल.
From the 13th century, the Valley of Mexico was the heart of Aztec civilization : here the capital of the एज़टेक ट्रिपल Alliance, the city of Tenochtitlan, was built upon raised islets in Lake Texcoco.
The Triple Alliance formed a उपनदी साम्राज्य expanding इसके राजनैतिक आधिपत्य दूर परे the Valley of Mexico, conquering other city states throughout Mesoamerica.
At its pinnacle, Aztec culture had rich and complex mythological and religious परंपराओं, as खूब as reaching remarkable architectural and artistic accomplishments.
In 1521 Hernán Cortés, along with a large number of नावातल बोलना indigenous allies, conquered Tenochtitlan and defeated the Aztec Triple Alliance under the leadership of Hueyi Tlatoani Moctezuma II.
Subsequently the Spanish founded the new settlement of Mexico City on the site of the ruined Aztec capital, from जहाँ वे proceeded with the process of colonizing Central America.
Aztec culture and history is primarily known through archaeological evidence found in excavations such as that of the renowned Templo Mayor in Mexico City ; from indigenous bark paper codices ; from eyewitness accounts by Spanish conquistadors ऐसे as hernán cortés और बर्नल díaz del Castillo ; and especially from 16th and 17th century descriptions of Aztec culture and history written by Spanish clergymen and literate Aztecs in the Spanish or Nahuatl language, such as the famous Florentine Codex compiled by the Franciscan monk Bernardino de Sahagún with the help of indigenous Aztec informants.
Anderson Hays Cooper ( born June 3, 1967 ) is an अमरीकी पत्रकार, author, and television personality.

The program is normally broadcast live from a New York City studio ; however, Cooper often broadcasts live on location for breaking news stories.
As of September 2011, he also serves as मेजबान of उसके own eponymous syndicated daytime talk show, Anderson Live, which will be cancelled at the end of the second season.
A plot of a normal distribution ( or bell-shaped curve ) where each बैंड रै a चौडाई of 1 standard deviation – See also : 68-95-99.7 rule
Cumulative probability of a normal distribution साथ expected value 0 and standard deviation 1.
In statistics and probability theory, standard deviation ( represented by the symbol सिग्मा, σ ) shows कैसा much विभिन्नता or dispersion exists from the average ( mean ), or expected value.
a कम मानक विचलन indicates कि the आंकड़ा अंक tend to be बहुत बंद to the औसत ; ऊँची मानक विचलन indicates कि the आंकड़ा अंक हैं स्प्रेड आउट over a विशाल दायरा of values.
The मानक विचलन of a यादृच्छिक परिवर्तनीय, सांख्यिकीय जनसांख्यिकी, आंकड़ा नियत, or संभाव्यता वितरण is the वर्गाकार रूट of इसके variance.
It is algebraically simpler though practically less robust than the average absolute deviation.
A useful property of standard deviation is that, नापसंद variance, it is expressed in the same units as the data.
नोट, however, that for measurements with percentage as unit, the standard deviation will have percentage points as unit.
In addition to expressing the variability of a population, standard deviation is commonly used to measure confidence in सांख्यिकीय conclusions.
For example, the margin of error in polling data is determined by calculating the अपेक्षित मानक विचलन in the परिणाम if the same poll were to be conducted multiple times.
The reported margin of error is typically about twice the मानक deviation ­– the radius of a 95 percent confidence interval.
In science, researchers commonly report the standard deviation of experimental data, and only effects that fall far outside the range of मानक विचलन हैं माना statistically significant – normal random error or variation in the measurements is in this way distinguished from causal variation.
Standard deviation is also important in finance, where the standard deviation on the rate of return on an निवेश is a measure of the volatility of the investment.
When only a sample of data from a population is available, the मानक deviation of the population can be estimated by a modified quantity called the `` sample standard deviation ''.
When the नमूना is the entire population, its unmodified standard deviation is called the `` population standard deviation ''.
Ulluco ( u : ju : kɔ : ) ( Ullucus tuberosus ) is a plant grown primarily as a root vegetable, secondarily as a leaf vegetable.
The ulluco is one of the most widely grown and economically important root crops in the Andean region of South America, दूसरी तभी to the आलू.
It is known there with the common name of papa lisa, but also by the regional names melloco ( Ecuador ), olluco ( Peru ), chugua ( Colombia ) or ruba ( Venezuela ), among others.
The leaf and the tuber are edible, similar to spinach and the potato, क्रमशः.
They are known to contain high levels of protein, calcium, और केरोटीन.
Papalisa were used by the Incas prior to arrival of europeans in South America.
Ulluco tubers are marketed as `` Earth रत्नों '' in New Zealand, by Halfords Exotic Produce.

The Fugitive Slave Law or भगोड़े स्लेव अधिनियम थी passed by the United States Congress on September 18, 1850, as part of the Compromise of 1850 between Southern slave-holding interests and Northern Free-Soilers.
This was one of the most controversial acts of the 1850 सुलह और heightened Northern fears of a `` slave power conspiracy ''.
It declared that all runaway slaves were, upon capture, to be लौटे to their masters.
Abolitionists nicknamed it the `` Bloodhound Law '' for the dogs that were used to track down runaway slaves.

Mary Do n't तुम Weep ''.
The album later became certified सुनहरा.

The संयुक्त राज्य संघीय earned income tax credit or earned income credit ( EITC or EIC ) is a refundable tax credit for low- and medium-income individuals and couples, primarily for those who have qualifying children.
When the credit exceeds the amount of taxes owed, it results in a tax refund to those who claim the क्रेडिट.
This credit is provided to offset the burden of social सुरक्षा कर और also to promote an incentive to work.
In order for a person or couple to claim one or more persons as their qualifying child ( ren ), the age, relationship, and shared residency requirements must be met, as well as some other requirements.
U.S. tax forms 1040EZ, 1040A, or 1040 can be used to अर्जी eic बगैर qualifying children.
To claim the credit with qualifying children, 1040A or 1040 must be used, as well as attaching Schedule EIC.
EIC phases in slowly, has a medium-length plateau, and then phases out more slowly than it phased in.
Since the credit phases out at 21 % ( for two children and for three or more qualilfying children ) or 16 % ( for one qualifying child ), it is always preferable to have one more dollar of actual salary or wages ( although technically, since the EIC table moves by fifty dollar increments, it 's always preferable to have an extra fifty-dollar increment of salary or wages ).
For tax साल 2011, the अधिकतम eic लिये a सिंगल व्यक्ति or couple filing without qualifying children was $ 464.
The maximum EIC with one qualifying child was $ 3,094, with two children थी $ 5,112, and with three or more qualifying children was $ 5,751.
ये amounts are indexed annually for inflation.
The earned income tax credit has been part of political debates in the United States regarding whether उठाने the minimum wage or increasing EIC will better address a seeming shortage of good-paying jobs.
The following is a list of halftime shows held at the National Football League 's championship game, the Super Bowl.
While halftime shows are a tradition during football games at all levels of competition, the Super Bowl halftime show represents a fundamental link to pop culture, which helps broaden the television audience and nationwide interest.
In most years since the mid-1980s, the halftime show of the Super कटोरी रै प्रदर्शित लोकप्रिय रिकॉर्डिंग कलाकारों and other well-known celebrities.
It रै measurably increased television viewers during and after the halftime show.
The performance is regarded one of the most-watched events in American television annually with over 100 million viewers in the United States alone.
Musical genres over the years have represented a broad range of music types, including pop, rock, classic rock, country, hip hop, rap, blues, and soul.
In some years, short skits or drama scenes are acted आउट on a स्टेज.
The प्रदर्शन समूह up साथ लोगों has performed at the most Super Bowl halftime shows, starring in four during the 1970s and 1980s.
According to Nielsen ratings, Super Bowl XLVI halftime show headlined by Madonna in 2012 remains the most-watched halftime show in इतिहास, साथ 114 million viewers or about 3 million more than the actual game.
Beyonce 's 2013 halftime show performance was the second most viewed दिखाएँ in history.
It is listed on the Guinness World रिकॉर्ड as the largest TV audience for a Super Bowl half-time performance.
International Men 's दिन ( imd ) is an annual international event celebrated on 19th November.
Inaugurated in 1999 in Trinidad and Tobago, the day and इसके कार्यक्रम find support from a variety of individuals and groups in Australia, the Caribbean, North America, Asia, Europe and Africa.
Speaking on behalf of UNESCO, Director of Women and Culture of Peace Ingeborg Breines said of IMD, `` This is an बेहतरीन विचार और होता give some gender balance. ''
She added that UNESCO was looking forward to cooperating with the organizers.
The objectives of celebrating an International Men 's Day include focusing on men 's and boys ' स्वास्थ्य, improving gender relations, promoting gender equality, and highlighting positive male role models.
It is an अवसर to हाइलाइट discrimination against men and boys and to celebrate their achievements and contributions, in particular for their contributions to community, family, marriage, and child care.
The broader and ultimate उद्देश्य of the इवेंट is to promote basic humanitarian values.
International Men 's Day is celebrated in over 60 countries, including Trinidad and Tobago, Jamaica, Australia, India, China, United States, Romania, Singapore, Malta, United Kingdom, South Africa, Tanzania, Zimbabwe, Botswana, Seychelles, Burundi, Hungary, Ireland, Isle of Man, Ghana, Canada, Denmark, Norway, Austria, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Ukraine, France, Italy, Pakistan, Cuba, अण्टीगुआ और बारबूडा, st. किट्स और नेविस, st. लूसिया, Grenada and Cayman Islands, on 19 November, and global support for the celebration is broad.
