Utilization management is the evaluation of the appropriateness, medical need and efficiency of health care services procedures and facilities according to established criteria or दिशानिर्देश और अंतर्गत the प्रावधानों of an लागू health benefits plan.
Typically it includes new activities or decisions based upon the विश्लेषण of a मामला.
Utilization management describes proactive procedures, including निर्वहन नियोजन, संयुक्त planning, pre-certification and clinical case appeals.
It also covers proactive processes, such as concurrent clinical reviews and peer reviews, as well as appeals introduced by the provider, payer or patient.
As pre-certification and concurrent review of cases grew, utilization management spun out of utilization review.
While नहीं synonymous, health care professionals tend to use the terms as interchangeable.
The difference is utilization management is and intends to मैनेज स्वास्थ्य care cases efficiently and cost effectively before and during health care administration.
Utilization review is more considering whether health care was appropriately applied after it was administered.
There are four basic techniques in utilization management:
माँग Management
utilization Review
Case प्रबन्धन
Disease प्रबन्धन
The Outsiders is a coming-of-age novel by S. E. Hinton, पहला published in 1967 by Viking Press.
Hinton was 15 जब she started writing the novel, but did most of the work when she was sixteen and a junior in high school.
Hinton was 18 when the book थी published.
The book follows two rival groups, the greasers और the socs ( सुनाया by the लेखक as, छोटी for Socials ), who are divided by their socioeconomic status.
the किताब takes प्लेस in तुलसा, Oklahoma, in 1965, but it is never stated in the book.
A film adaptation was produced in 1983, and a little-known short-lived television series appeared in 1990, picking up where the movie left off.
The United States House of Representatives is one of the two घरों of the संयुक्त States Congress ( a bicameral legislature ).
It is frequently referred to as the हाउस.
The other house is the सीनेट.
The composition and powers of the House are स्थापित in आलेख एक of the United States Constitution.
The major power of the House is to pass federal legislation that affects the संपूर्ण देश हालांकि इसके बिल्स जरूर also be passed by the Senate and further agreed to by the U.S. President before becoming law ( unless both the House and Senate re-pass the legislation with a two-thirds majority in each chamber ).
The House has several exclusive powers : the power to initiate revenue bills, to impeach officials, और to elect the U.S. President in case there is no majority in the Electoral College.
Each U.S. राज्य is represented in the House in proportion to its population but is entitled to at least one representative.
The most populous राज्य, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, currently has 53 representatives.
The total number of voting representatives is फिक्स्ड by विधि at 435.
Each representative serves for a two-year term.
The Speaker of the United States House of प्रतिनिधि, जो presides over the chamber, is elected by the members of the House, and is therefore traditionally the leader of the House Democratic Caucus or the House Republican Conference, whichever party has more voting members.
The House meets in the दक्षिण wing of the United States Capitol.
A supply कड़ी is दरअसल a complex and dynamic supply and demand network.
( cf. wieland/wallenburg, 2011 )
A supply chain is a system of organizations, people, activities, information, and resources involved in moving a उत्पाद or सेवा इससे प्रदायक to customer.
Supply chain activities transform natural resources, raw materials, और components into a finished product that is delivered to the end customer.
In sophisticated supply chain systems, प्रयुक्त उत्पाद may re-enter the सप्लाई कड़ी at any point where residual value is recyclable.
सप्लाई जंजीरों link value chains.
`` Purple Haze '' is a song written and recorded by Jimi Hendrix in 1967, released as the second single by The Jimi Hendrix Experience in दोनो the संयुक्त Kingdom and the United States.
It later appeared on the American version of the band 's 1967 album Are You अनुभवी.
`` Purple Haze '' has become one of the `` archetypical psychedelic drug songs of the sixties ''.
`` Purple Haze 's '' guitar virtuosic techniques would be emulated by many metal guitarists.
A close up picture of a गैंडा skin.
Skin is the नरम outer covering of vertebrates.
Other animal coverings such as the सन्धिपाद बहि have different developmental origin, structure and chemical composition.
The क्रियाशील cutaneous अर्थात् `` of the skin '' ( from Latin cutis, skin ).
In mammals, the skin is the largest organ of the integumentary system made up of multiple layers of ectodermal tissue, and guards the underlying muscles, bones, ligaments and internal organs.
Skin of a अलग nature exists in amphibians, reptiles, and birds.
All mammals have some hair on their skin, even marine स्तनधारियों जिससे appear to be hairless.
The स्किन अंतरफलक with the environment and is the first line of defense from external factors.
For example, the स्किन plays a key role in protecting the body against pathogens and excessive water loss.
Its other functions are insulation, temperature regulation, sensation, and the production of vitamin D folates.
Severely damaged skin may heal by forming scar tissue.
This is sometimes discoloured and depigmented.
The thickness of skin also varies from location to स्थान on an organism.
In humans for example, the skin located under the eyes and around the eyelids is the thinnest स्किन in the body at 0.5 mm thick, and is one of the first areas to show signs of aging such as `` crows feet '' and wrinkles.
The skin on the हथेलियां और the soles of the feet is 4 mm thick and the thickest skin in the body.
Fur is dense बाल.
Primarily, fur augments the insulation the skin provides but can also serve as a secondary यौन characteristic or as camouflage.
On some animals, the skin is very मुश्किल और मोटा, and can be processed to create leather.
Reptiles and fish have hard सुरक्षात्मक तराजू on उनके skin for protection, and birds have hard feathers, all made of tough β- keratins.
Amphibian skin is not a strong barrier to ड्योढ़ी of रसायन and is often subject to osmosis and diffusive forces.
For example, a frog बैठे in an anesthetic solution would be sedated quickly, as the chemical diffuses through its skin.
Thomas स्कॉट
The Rev. Thomas Scott ( 1747-1821 ) was an influential preacher and author who is principally known for his best-selling work A Commentary On The Whole Bible and the फ़ोर्स of सच्चाई, और as one of the founders of the Church Missionary Society.
Daniel radcliffe, who portrays Harry Potter, has been the icon of the film series since the release of the first film in 2001.
Some of the most renowned actors of the United Kingdom और आयरलैंड have voiced or portrayed characters appearing in the Harry Potter film series based on the book series by J. K. Rowling.
Daniel Radcliffe, Rupert Grint and Emma Watson have played हैरी कुम्हार, रॉन वीज़्ली और Hermione Granger in all the films.
When they were cast तभी Radcliffe had previously acted in a film.
Complementing them on screen are such actors as Helena Bonham Carter, Jim Broadbent, John Cleese, Robbie Coltrane, Warwick Davis, Ralph fiennes, माइकल gambon, ब्रेंडन gleeson, रिचर्ड ग्रीफिथ, Richard Harris, John Hurt, Jason Isaacs, Miriam Margolyes, Helen McCrory, Gary Oldman, Alan Rickman, Fiona Shaw, Maggie Smith, Timothy Spall, Imelda Staunton, David Thewlis, Emma Thompson, and Julie Walters, among others.
Thirteen actors have appeared as the same अक्षर in सब आठ films of the franchise.
Some well-known British actors who have नहीं appeared in the series, are asked in jest why they have not been cast.
When David Yates was directing the fifth film, Bill Nighy, who had previously collaborated साथ येट्स on तीन of his television projects, said that he joked with Yates that maybe now he would n't be the only actor in England who had n't been in Harry Potter.
`` But nobody called '', nighy added.
But in 2009, Yates cast Nighy as Minister of Magic Rufus Scrimgeour in Deathly Hallows.
Nighy said, `` I am no longer the only English actor not to be in Harry कुम्हार और i am very pleased. ''
Jude विधि रै quipped, `` Nobody 's asked me.
I was a bit too old लिये Harry ''.
When a reporter compared potions professor Horace Slughorn 's obsession with प्रसिद्ध names to the श्रेणी ' कनेक्शन to `` प्रत्येक notable British actor, '' Jim Broadbent, who plays Slughorn said, `` Well, not every actor gets invited.
I know some who are still waiting. ''
With the एक्सेप्शन of क्रिस कोलंबस, प्रत्येक निदेशक रै था a कैमियो रूप in उसके संबंधित फिल्मी : अलफोंसो cuarón appears as a जादूगर पकड़कर a मोमबत्ती during a scene at The Three Broomsticks in Prisoner of Azkaban ; Mike Newell is heard briefly as the radio presenter in Frank Bryce 's house in Goblet of Fire ; and David Yates features as a wizard within a magical moving portrait in Order of the Phoenix.
Producer David heyman भी makes a cameo appearance as a wizard featured within a magical moving portrait in the third film, Prisoner of Azkaban.
J. K. Rowling gave a speech दौरान the संसार प्रीमियर of the final film in the series— Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2 —on 7 July 2011 in London, England.
She announced that she could never have dreamt of the talented actors and actresses who have appeared in सब the हैरी कुम्हार movies.
रोलिंग भी घोषित कि वहीँ हैं सात हैरी कुम्हार फिल्मी श्रेणी डाल सदस्यों, जो वो refers to as `` the बिग सात '', वे हैं डेनियल radcliffe, रुपर्ट grint, एम्मा वाटसन, tom felton, मैथ्यू लुईस, evanna लिंच और bonnie राइट.

A twelve-step program is a set of guiding principles ( accepted by members as 'spiritual सिद्धान्त, ' आधारित on the स्वीकृत literature ) outlining a course of action for recovery from, compulsion, or other behavioral problems.
Originally proposed by Alcoholics Anonymous ( AA ) as a method of recovery from alcoholism, the Twelve Steps were first published in the book Alcoholics Anonymous : the स्टोरी of कैसा अधिक than एक सौ मेन have बरामद इससे alcoholism in 1939.
the method was then adapted and became the foundation of other twelve-step programs.
As summarized by the American Psychological संघ, the process involves the following:
admitting that one can नहीं कंट्रोल एक 's addiction or compulsion ;
recognizing a higher power that can give strength ;
examining past errors with the help of a sponsor ( अनुभवी member ) ;
बनाना amends for these errors ;
learning to live a new life with a new code of behavior ;
helping अन्य who suffer from the same addictions or compulsions.
Witness impeachment, in the विधि of प्रमाण of the United States, is the process of calling into question the credibility of an individual who is testifying in a trial.
The Federal Rules of प्रमाण contain the rules governing impeachment in federal courts.
Party leaders and whips of the United States House of Representatives are elected by their respective parties in a closed-door caucus by रहस्य बैलट और हैं भी known as floor leaders.
The U.S. House of Representatives does not officially use the term `` Minority Leader '' हालांकि the मीडिया अक्सर do.
The House instead uses the terms `` Republican Leader '' or `` Democratic Leader '' depending on जिससे पार्टी holds a अल्पसंख्यक of seats.
The current House Majority Leader is Republican Eric Cantor, while the current House Minority Leader is Democrat Nancy Pelosi.
The current House Majority Whip is Republican केविन मैकार्थी, जबकि the वर्तमान House Minority Whip is Democrat Steny Hoyer.
Following the outbreak of World War I in 1914, the German Army opened the Western Front by first invading Luxembourg and Belgium, then gaining military control of important industrial regions in फ़्रांस.
The tide of the advance was dramatically turned with the Battle of the Marne.
Following the race to the sea, both sides dug in along a meandering line of fortified trenches, stretching इससे the उत्तर समुद्र to the Swiss frontier with France.
इस लकीर remained essentially अपरिवर्तित लिये सबसे of the युद्ध.
Between 1915 and 1917 there were several प्रमुख offensives along this front.
The हमले employed massive artillery bombardments and massed infantry advances.
However, a combination of entrenchments, machine gun nests, barbed wire, and artillery repeatedly inflicted severe हताहत on the हमलावर और counterattacking defenders.
As a result, no significant advances were बना.
Among the most costly of these offensives were the Battle of Verdun with a combined [ estimated ] 700,000 dead, the Battle of the Somme with more than [ an estimated ] million casualties, and the Battle of Passchendaele with roughly [ an estimated ] 600,000 casualties.
In an effort to break the deadlock, this front saw the introduction of new military technology, सहित ज़हर gas, aircraft and tanks.
But it was only after the adoption of improved tactics that कुछ उपाधि of गतिशीलता was restored.
The German Spring Offensive of 1918 was made संभावित by the Treaty of Brest-Litovsk that marked the end of the conflict on the Eastern Front.
Using the recently-introduced infiltration tactics, the German armies advanced nearly to the west, जिससे चिह्नित the deepest अग्रिम by either पक्ष since 1914 and very nearly succeeded in forcing a breakthrough.
In spite of the generally stagnant nature of this front, this theater would prove decisive.
The inexorable advance of the Allied armies during the second half of 1918 persuaded the German commanders that defeat was अपरिहार्य, and the government was forced to sue for conditions of an armistice.
The terms of सलाम यहूद सहमत upon with the signing of the Treaty of Versailles in 1919.

The First Lady of the United States ( flotus ) is the होस्टेस of the White House.
Because this position is traditionally filled by the wife of the President of the United States, the शीर्षक is सबसे प्रायः लागू to the wife of a sitting president.
The current First Lady is मिशेल Obama.
After her husband बराक Obama was re-elected on November 6, 2012, she is scheduled to serve until January 20, 2017.
Septic shock is a medical कंडीशन as a परिणाम of कठोर infection and sepsis, though the microbe may be systemic or localized to a particular site.
It can cause multiple organ dysfunction syndrome ( formerly known as multiple अंग विफलता ) और मौत.
Its most common victims are children, immunocompromised individuals, and the elderly, as their immune systems can not deal साथ the संक्रमण as effectively as those of healthy adults.
Frequently, patients suffering from septic शॉक are cared for in intensive care units.
The mortality rate from septic शॉक is approximately 25–50 %.
Kevin Brereton ( born February 20, 1972 ), better known by his stage name k-os ( ; `` chaos '' ), is a Canadian rapper, singer, songwriter and record producer.
His given name may also be cited as Kheaven, a spelling he later adopted.
The alias `` k-os '', spelled with a lower case `` k '', was intended to be less aggressive than the pseudonyms of अन्य rappers whose names were all upper case, such as KRS-One.
It is an acronym for `` Knowledge of Self, '' although in a later interview he said कि it originally stood लिये `` केविन 's Original Sound. '' k-os ' music incorporates a wide variety of music genres, including rap, funk, rock, and reggae.
The lyrics frequently focus on promoting a `` positive message '' while at times expressing criticism of mainstream hip hop culture 's obsession with money, fame and glorification of हिंसा.
A musician as well as a producer, k-os has written and produced nearly every part of सब चार of उसके albums.
k-os usually performs with a live band, कुछ कि is uncommon in the hip hop genre.
He sometimes plays गिटार और कुंजीपटल दोनो during live performances and in the studio.
k-os received his first musical exposure with the single `` musical essence '', released in 1993.
After the release of his second single `` Rise Like the Sun '' in 1996, he withdrew from the industry क्युकी he थी असंतुष्ट with his musical style.
He reappeared briefly in 1999 and released his debut album Exit in 2002.
The album received positive reviews but sold relatively few copies.
He released his second album Joyful विद्रोह in 2004, जिससे received platinum status in Canada.
a तीसरा एल्बम,, was released in 2006 and also went platinum.
His चौथी album, Yes !

His fifth album BLack on BLonde was released in 2013.
The official 2007 संस्करण of the UCC.
Even the confidential rough drafts of the ucc यहूद saved और प्रकाशित as a 10-volume set.
The Uniform Commercial Code ( UCC or the Code ), first published in 1952, is one of a number of uniform acts that have been promulgated in conjunction साथ प्रयत्न to harmonize the विधि of बिक्री और अन्य वाणिज्यिक ट्रांजेक्शन in all 50 states within the United States of America.
multi-pitch चढ़ाई is the ascent of चढ़ाई रूट साथ एक or अधिक stops at a belay स्टेशन.
Each section of actual climbing between stops at the belay stations is called a pitch.
The leader ascends the pitch, रखकर गियर और stopping to लंगर themselves to the belay station.
The reason for the stops can be determined by चुनाव, सम्मेलन or necessity.
For example:
the रस्सी is too छोटी to do the संपूर्ण रूट in एक पिच ( necessity ).
The leader has run out of protective gear ( necessity ).
There is a convenient protectable ledge, or fixed bolts placed by पिछला climbers, at the location for a belay station ( convention ).
The leader chooses to बाकी or exchange leads before the next section of the climb ( choice ).
The general purpose of these stops is to allow the दूसरी to ascend to the पाइंट of the सीसे climber while collecting the protective gear from the route in the course of the lead climber 's ascent.
At the belay station, the protective gear is collected, possibly exchanged to a new leader, and the leader of the अगला पिच ascends the route.
A diagram showing an I Formation on offense and a 4-3 गठन on defense
In American football, प्रत्येक टोली रै ग्यारह खिलाड़ी on the field at one time.
The विशिष्ट role that a player takes on the field is called their position.
Under the modern rules of American football, teams are अनुमत unlimited subsititutions, that is teams may change any number of players after any play.
This has resulted in the development of three `` platoons '' of players, the offense ( the team with the ball, who is trying to score ), the defense ( the team trying to prevent the other team from scoring, and to take the ball from them ), and the special teams ( who play in kicking situations ).
Within those platoons, various specific स्थितियाँ मौजूद depending on what the player 's main job is.
The Controlled Substances Act ( CSA ) was enacted into law by the Congress of the संयुक्त राज्य as शीर्षक II of the Comprehensive Drug Abuse Prevention and Control Act of 1970.
The CSA is the federal U.S. drug नीति अंतर्गत जिससे the manufacture, importation, possession, use and distribution of certain substances is regulated.
The Act also served as the national implementing विधान लिये the Single Convention on Narcotic Drugs.
The legislation created five Schedules ( classifications ), with varying योग्यता लिये a substance to be included in each.
Two federal agencies, the Drug Enforcement Administration and the Food and Drug Administration, determine which substances are added to or removed from the various schedules, though the statute passed by Congress created the initial listing, and Congress has sometimes scheduled other substances through legislation such as the hillory J. farias और सामन्था reid date-rape रोकथाम अधिनियम of 2000, जिससे लगाई गामा hydroxybutyrate in Schedule I. Classification decisions are required to be made on criteria including potential for abuse ( an undefined term ), currently accepted medical use in treatment in the United States, and international treaties.
The Wayne Route 23 Transit Center is a New Jersey Transit park-and-ride station in Wayne, New Jersey along the Montclair-Boonton Line that provides bus service to New York नगर और विभिन्न अन्य अंक in the क्षेत्रफल as खूब as montclair-boonton लकीर ट्रैन सेवा to नई यॉर्क, Hoboken, and intermediate points along the line between Hackettstown and Montclair State University.
It is located off of the southbound lanes of New Jersey Route 23 on West Belt Road, near the इंटरचेंज जहाँ रूट 23, अंतरराज्यीय 80, और u.S. रूट 46 meet, across from the Willowbrook Mall.
The station opened in जनवरी 2008 and has 1,000 parking spaces.
New Jersey Transit intends for this combined rail और बस स्टेशन to become an `` interceptor station, '' that will help relieve the habitual congestion at the West Belt Road Interchange, where the three major highways meet.
In addition, the construction of the station was meant to also ease the congestion at what was then Route 23 Park & Ride, a bus depot on Route 23 North that has since been renamed Mother 's Park & Ride, and the Willowbrook Mall Park & Ride ; the now-Mother 's site had सीमित पार्किंग जबकि njt was having trouble with overfull parking areas at Willowbrook.
The Wayne Township bus garage is located on the opposite पक्ष of रूट 23.
There has been a proposal to build a parking deck with another thousand spots and develop the land at the station.
In addition to Montclair-Boonton trains, the Transit Center is served by the following New Jersey Transit bus lines:
75 to Newark Penn स्टेशन and Butler
194 to Port प्राधिकार Bus Terminal and Butler/Newfoundland
198 to बंदरगाहों प्राधिकार बस टर्मिनल और विलियम paterson विश्वविद्यालयों
324 to Port Authority and वेन रूट 23
748 to willowbrook मॉल and Paterson
The at sign @ is also commonly called the at symbol, ampersat, apetail or commercial at in English—and less commonly a चौड़ी दायरा of अन्य terms.
The fact that there is no single word in English for the symbol has prompted some writers to उपयोग the फ्रेंच arobase or Spanish and Portuguese arroba—or to coin new words such as asperand, ampersat—but none of these has achieved wide currency.
Originally an accounting and commercial invoice abbreviation meaning `` at the rate of '' ( e.g. 7 widgets @ $ 2 = $ 14 ), it थी नहीं शामिल on the कुंजीपटल of the earliest commercially successful typewriters, but was on at least one 1889 model and the very successful Underwood models from the `` Underwood No. 5 '' in 1900 onward.
It is अभी universally included on computer keyboards.
In recent years, its meaning has grown to include the sense of being `` स्तिथ at, '' `` और, '' or `` directed at '', especially in email addresses and social media, particularly Twitter.
The mark is एनकोडेड at.
The Catcher in the Rye is a 1951 novel by J. D. Salinger.
Originally published for adults, it has since become popular with adolescent readers for its विषयवस्तु of teenage angst और alienation.
it रै महरूम अनूदित into almost all of the world 's major languages.
Around 250,000 copies are sold each year with total sales of अधिक than 65 million books.
The novel 's protagonist and antihero, होल्डन Caulfield, has become an icon for teenage rebellion.
The novel was included on Times 2005 list of the 100 बेहतरीन english-language novels लिखा चूंकि 1923, and it was named by Modern Library and its readers as one of the 100 best English-language novels of the 20th century.
It has been अक्सर challenged in the United States and other countries for its liberal use of profanity and portrayal of sexuality.
It also deals with complex issues of identity, belonging, कनेक्शन, and alienation.
Skeletal muscles homo sapiens
This is a table of muscles of the human anatomy.
There are approximately 642 skeletal muscles within the typical human, and almost every muscle constitutes one part of a pair of identical bilateral muscles, found on दोनो पहलू, resulting in लगभग 320 pairs of muscles, as presented in this article.
Nevertheless, the exact number is difficult to define because different sources group muscles differently, e.g. regarding what is defined as different parts of a single muscle or as several मांसपेशियां.
Examples range from 640 to 850.
The muscles of the इंसान देह can be categorized into a number of groups which include muscles relating to the head and neck, muscles of the torso or trunk, muscles of the upper limbs, and muscles of the lower limbs.
The action refers to the action of each muscle from the standard anatomical स्थिति.
in other positions, other actions may be performed.
Bad Girls Club ( BGC ) is an American reality television series created by Jonathan Murray for the ऑक्सीजन टेलीविज़न station.
The show centers on seven feisty and mischievous महिलाओं साथ अलग पृष्ठभूमि and personalities, who have a number of psychological and behavioral problems.
They are introduced to the दिखाएँ बंद their pernicious behavior and accomplish specific goals.
The cast, deemed `` bad girls '', enjoy a luxurious lifestyle in a fine mansion for three months, during which they must obey specified rules.
Their lives inside – and outside – of the हाउस हैं chronicled and recorded by the production team.
The Bad Girls Club is broadcast in five countries ( United States, Netherlands, Australia, हंगेरियाई, और स्वीडन ).
It has received negative reviews from critics, who believe the show promotes violence by adolescent दर्शक.
Furthermore, several cast members made controversial remarks which outraged many viewers.
The स्वरूप of the दिखाएँ has changed from early seasons.
If a `` bad girl '' breaks a rule, she is evicted from the show and, if it is early in the season, replaced by a नई `` ख़राब लड़की ''.
There have been nine पूरा seasons of The Bad Girls Club, with the tenth season currently airing.
The fourth season had the highest ratings in the show 's history, becoming its `` breakthrough season ''.
There have महरूम तीन spin-offs of The Bad Girls Club.
One of them, Love Games : Bad Girls Need Love Too, where past cast सदस्यों तलाश सच्चा love, has gained high ratings.
Oxygen has also released a मोबाईल खेल, comic strip and merchandise to promote the show.
Of the 92 प्रतियोगी, केरी harvick ( of ऋतु one ) was a successful country singer before the show.
Tanisha Thomas ( of season two ) later hosted ऑक्सीजन 's OxygenLive !
and the subsequent seasons of Love Games : ख़राब लड़कियों Need Love Too.
Thomas, जो रै महरूम उतावले the `` godmother '' to all contestants, has her own television documentary entitled Tanisha Gets Married.
As of ऋतु 8 वो 's been the host of the reunion specials.
The Iowa Senate is the upper house of the Iowa General Assembly.
There are 50 seats in the Iowa Senate, representing 50 single-member districts across the राज्य साथ populations of approximately 60,927 per constituency,.
Each सीनेट ज़िला is composed of two House districts.
The सीनेट meets at the Iowa State Capitol in Des Moines.
Unlike the lower house, the Iowa House of Representatives, सीनेटरों serve four-year terms, with half of the Senate staggered for re-election every two years.
वहीँ are no term limits for the Senate.
Mechanical repair
Maintenance, repair, and operations ( MRO ) or maintenance, repair, and overhaul involves fixing कोई sort of mechanical, plumbing or electrical device should it become out of order or broken ( known as repair, unscheduled or casualty maintenance ).
It also includes performing routine actions which keep the device in working order ( known as scheduled maintenance ) or prevent trouble from arising ( preventive maintenance ).
MRO may be defined as, `` All actions which have the objective of retaining or restoring an item in or to a state in which it can perform इसके जरूरी function.
The actions include the combination of all technical and corresponding administrative, managerial, and पर्यवेक्षण क्रियाएँ. ''
MRO operations can be categorised by whether the product remains the property of the customer, i.e. a service is being offered, or whether the product is bought by the reprocessing organisation and sold to any customer wishing to make the purchase ( Guadette, 2002 ).
In the पूर्व मामला it may be a backshop operation within a larger organisation or smaller operation.
The former of these represents a closed लूप सप्लाई chain and usually has the scope of maintenance, repair or of the product.
The latter of the categorisations is an open loop supply chain and is typified by refurbishment and remanufacture.
The main characteristic of the closed लूप प्रणाली is कि the माँग लिये a उत्पाद is matched with the supply of a used product.
neglecting एसेट write-offs और असाधारण क्रियाएँ the कुल जनसांख्यिकी of the उत्पाद between the ग्राहक और the सेवा प्रदाता remains constant.
Prince William, Duke of Cambridge ( William Arthur Philip लुई ; born 21 जून 1982 ), is the elder son of Charles, Prince of Wales, and Diana, Princess of Wales, and third-eldest grandchild of Queen Elizabeth II and Prince Philip, Duke of Edinburgh.
He is second in the line of succession, behind his father, to the thrones of sixteen independent sovereign states known as the Commonwealth realms : the United Kingdom, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, Jamaica, Barbados, The Bahamas, Grenada, Papua New Guinea, the Solomon आइलैंड्स, तुवालू, संत लूसिया, संत विंसेंट और the grenadines, बेलीज़, अण्टीगुआ and Barbuda, and Saint Kitts and Nevis.
Prince William was शिक्षित at चार schools in the United Kingdom and obtained a degree from the University of St Andrews.
He spent parts of a gap year in Chile, Belize, तंजानिया, और कीनिया where he has lived and holidayed several times.
Prince William has also taken Kiswahili studies at universities in कीनिया और Tanzania.
He was commissioned as a Lieutenant in the ब्लूज़ और रॉयल्स रेजीमेंट of the household प्यादे —serving with his brother Prince Harry —and, two years later, earned his wings by completing pilot training at Royal Air Force College Cranwell.
In 2009, he transferred to the Royal Air Force, was promoted to Flight Lieutenant and underwent helicopter flying training in order to become a full-time पायलट साथ the ढूंढें और बचाव Force.
In 2010, he completed his general and special-to-type helicopter training and went on to raf घाटी on no. 22 Squadron performing co-pilot duties on board a Sea King search and rescue helicopter.
Prince William married his longtime girlfriend, Catherine Middleton, on 29 April 2011 at वेस्टमिंस्टर ऐबी.
Hours prior to his wedding, Prince William was created Duke of Cambridge, अर्ल of strathearn, and Baron Carrickfergus.
DeAndre Cortez Way ( born July 28, 1990 ), better known by his stage name Soulja Boy Tell 'Em, or simply Soulja Boy, is an अमरीकी rapper, रिकार्ड निर्माता, कर्ता, और उद्योगों.
In September 2007, उसके सिंगल `` Crank That ( Soulja Boy ) `` reached number one on the Billboard Hot 100.
the सिंगल थी initially self-published on the internet, and it later became a number-one hit in the United States for seven non-consecutive weeks starting in September 2007.
On August 17 Way was listed at # 18 on the Forbes list of hip-hop नकदी किंग्स of 2010 earning $ 7 million for that year.
Way has currently released three studio albums and one independent album : his debut studio album Souljaboytellem.com ( 2007 ) थी certified प्लेटिनम by the RIAA.
However, his next two albums, iSouljaBoyTellem ( 2008 ) and The DeAndre Way ( 2010 ) किया नहीं मैच the वाणिज्यिक कामयाबी of उसके डेब्यू, the latter तभी selling 100,000 नक़ल, despite the कामयाबी of several singles across both albums, such as `` Kiss Me Thru the Phone `` and `` Turn My Swag On `` ( iSouljaBoyTellem ) and `` Pretty Boy Swag `` ( The DeAndre Way ).
This was mainly due to negotiation problems with Interscope Records which meant a सीमित राशि of records were made available to the public.
As of 2011, रास्ता रै पुष्टि he is working on his fourth studio album, entitled USA DRE, which will be released in 2013.
The electron transport chain in the mitochondrion is the site of oxidative phosphorylation in eukaryotes.
the nadh और succinate उत्पन्न in the साइट्रिक एसिड साईकिल हैं oxidized, providing उर्जा to शक्ति एटीपी synthase.
photosynthetic इलेक्ट्रॉन transport chain of the thylakoid membrane.
An इलेक्ट्रॉन हस्तांतरण कड़ी ( इत्यादि ) युगल electron transfer between an electron donor ( such as NADH ) and an electron acceptor ( such as O2 ) with the transfer of H+ ions ( protons ) across a membrane.
The resulting electrochemical प्रोटॉन अनुपात is used to generate chemical energy in the form of adenosine triphosphate ( ATP ).
Electron transport chains are the cellular mechanisms used for extracting energy from sunlight in photosynthesis and also from redox प्रतिक्रियाएँ, ऐसे as the oxidation of sugars ( respiration ).
In chloroplasts, light drives the conversion of water to oxygen and NADP+ to NADPH with ट्रांसफ़र of H+ ions आरपार chloroplast membranes.
In mitochondria, it is the conversion of oxygen to water, NADH to NAD+ and succinate to fumarate that are required to generate the proton gradient.
इलेक्ट्रॉन हस्तांतरण chains are major sites of premature electron leakage to oxygen, generating superoxide and potentially resulting in increased oxidative stress.
Tramadol hydrochloride ( trademarked as Conzip, Ryzolt, Ultracet, Ultram in the USA, Ralivia, zytram xl durella { cr-100/200 mg } in Canada or Adolonta in Spain ) is a centrally acting synthetic analgesic used to treat moderate to moderately severe pain.
The drug has a wide range of applications, including उपचार of आमवातीय गठिया, बेचैन legs syndrome, motor neurone disease and fibromyalgia.
It थी शुभारम्भ and marketed as Tramal by the German pharmaceutical company Grünenthal GmbH in 1977.
Tramadol is a weak μ-opioid receptor agonist कि भी induces serotonin release and inhibits the reuptake of norepinephrine.
Tramadol is metabolized to o-desmethyltramadol, a significantly more potent μ-opioid agonist.
Tramadol and its major metabolite ( s ) are distinguished from अन्य अधिक potent opioid agonists by relative selectivity for μ-opioid receptors.
Bernard Lawrence `` Bernie '' Madoff ( ; born April 29, 1938 ) is an American former stockbroker, investment advisor, financier, and white collar criminal.
He is the former non-executive Chairman of the NASDAQ stock market, and the admitted operator of a Ponzi scheme that is considered to be the largest financial fraud in U.S. history.
Madoff founded the Wall Street firm Bernard L. Madoff Investment Securities LLC in 1960, and was its chairman until his arrest on December 11, 2008.
The firm was one of the top market maker businesses on Wall Street, which bypassed `` specialist '' firms by directly executing orders over the counter from retail brokers.
He employed at the firm his brother Peter as Senior Managing Director and Chief Compliance Officer ; Peter has since been sentenced to 10 years in prison.
Peter 's daughter Shana madoff as the firm 's rules and compliance officer and attorney, and his sons Andrew and Mark ( Mark committed suicide by hanging exactly two years after his father 's arrest ).
On December 10, 2008, Madoff 's sons told authorities कि उनके पिता था confessed to them that the asset management unit of his firm was a massive Ponzi scheme, and quoted him as describing it as `` one big lie. ''
The following day, FBI agents गिरफ्तार madoff and charged him with one count of securities fraud.
The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission ( SEC ) had previously conducted investigations into Madoff 's business practices, but did not ख़ोज the विशाल धोखाधड़ी.
In March 2009, madoff pleaded अपराधी to 11 संघीय felonies and admitted to turning his wealth management business into a massive Ponzi scheme that defrauded thousands of investors of billions of dollars.
Madoff said he began the Ponzi scheme in the early 1990s.
However, संघीय जांचकर्ताओं मानना the धोखाधड़ी began as early as the 1970s, and those charged with recovering the missing money believe the investment operation may never have been legitimate.
The amount missing इससे क्लाएंट खाते, सहित fabricated gains, was almost $ 65 billion.
The court-appointed trustee estimated वास्तविक losses to investors of $ 18 billion.
On June 29, 2009, he was sentenced to 150 years in थाना, the अधिकतम allowed.
Administrative Professionals Day ( also known as Secretaries Day or Admin Day ) is an unofficial secular holiday observed in several countries to recognize the work of secretaries, administrative assistants, receptionists, and other administrative support professionals.
In North अमेरिका, it is celebrated on the Wednesday of the last full week of April ( April 24 in 2013 ).
In France it is celebrated on the third Thursday in April ( April 18 in 2013 ).
In Australia it is celebrated on the first Friday in May
A quasi-judicial body is an एंटिटी ऐसे as an arbitrator or ट्रिब्यूनल फलक, generally of a पब्लिक प्रशासनिक agency, which has powers and procedures resembling those of a court of law or judge, and which is obligated to objectively determine facts and draw conclusions from them so as to provide the basis of an official action.
Such actions are able to उपाय a हालात or impose legal penalties, and may affect the legal rights, duties or privileges of specific parties.
Monument of Tycho Brahe and योहानेस Kepler in Prague
Tycho Brahe ( 14 December 154624 October 1601 ), born Tyge Ottesen Brahe, was a डैनिश nobleman ज्ञात लिये उसके सटीक and comprehensive astronomical and planetary observations.
He was born in Scania, then भाग of Denmark, now part of modern-day Sweden.
tycho थी खूब ज्ञात in उसके आजीवन as an astronomer और कीमियागर.
In his De nova stella ( On the new star ) of 1573, he refuted the Aristotelian belief in an unchanging celestial realm.
His precise measurements indicated that `` new stars, '' ( stellae novae, now known as supernovae ) in particular that of 1572, lacked the parallax expected in sub-lunar phenomena, and were therefore not `` atmospheric '' tailless धूमकेतुओं as previously believed, लकिन यहूद ऊपर the माहौल and moon.
Using similar measurements he showed that comets यहूद भी not atmospheric phenomena, as previously thought, and must pass through the supposedly `` immutable '' celestial spheres.
As an astronomer, Tycho worked to combine what he saw as the geometrical benefits of the copernican system with the philosophical benefits of the Ptolemaic system into his own model of the universe, the Tychonic system.
Furthermore, he was the last of the major naked eye astronomers, working without telescopes for his observations.
Tycho Brahe was granted an estate on the island of Hven and the funding to build the Uraniborg, an early research institute, where he built large astronomical यंत्र और took अनेक careful measurements, and later Stjerneborg, underground, when he discovered that his instruments in the former were not sufficiently steady.
On the island ( on which he demonstrated निरंकुश अक्षर और बर्ताव toward the residents ) he founded manufactories such as paper-making to provide material for printing his results.
After disagreements with the new Danish king Christian IV in 1597, he was invited by the Bohemian king and Holy Roman emperor Rudolph II to Prague, where he became the official imperial astronomer.
He built the new वेधशाला at Benátky nad Jizerou.
Here, from 1600 until his death in 1601, he was assisted by योहानेस कॅप्लर जो बाद used Tycho 's astronomical data to develop Kepler 's laws of planetary motion.
Guro District ( Guro-gu ) is a district of Seoul, South Korea, which was separated from Yeongdeungpo District on अप्रैल 1, 1980.
Located in the southwestern part of the city, where besides Yangcheon District and Geumcheon District Guro District has an important position as a हस्तांतरण कड़ी जिससे contains railroads, जमीन रूट इससे the rest of Seoul to the south of the country.
The Gyeongbu and Gyeongin railway lines connect Seoul to Busan and Incheon.
In addition, Seoul Metropolitan Subway lines 1, 2, and 7, and major highways intersect in guro ज़िला.
The name guro originates इससे the legend that nine ( ) old men ( Korean : ro ) enjoyed longevity in the district.
A digital industrial complex is located in guro ज़िला.
The Guro Digital Industrial Complex, which played a leading industrial role mainly with textile manufacturing, dressmaking और अन्य labour-intensive उद्योग in 1967, has been rapidly changed into an IT industrial complex.
This complex played a pivotal role in the economic growth of the South Korea 's development era, referred to as the `` चमत्कार on the हान नदी ``, and also contributed 10 percent of national export in the 1970s.
twenty-one प्रतिशत of the कुल क्षेत्रफल of guro ज़िला is a प्रतिबंधित मण्डल to be प्रयुक्त as a greenbelt साथ the तभी arboretum in सियोल.
The zone is बदलना into a जीवंत ज़िला as large labour-intensive factories are moving from the area and the council is developing what it terms its four zones.
An `` e-government `` system based on this hosted the international e-participation forum on February 7–9, 2007, with the participation of more than thirty-seven countries.
The forum was launched with the theme `` Promoting Democracy and Regional Development '' and twenty-five mayors including André Santini ( Issy-les-Moulineaux, France ), Kevin Foy ( Chapel Hill, US ), Apirak Kosayothin ( Bangkok, Thailand ), Uvais Mohamed Emthiyas ( Colombo, Sri Lanka ), and world experts such as Dr William H. Dutton ( Director of Oxford Internet Institute at the University of Oxford, uk ) और dr ari-veiko anttiroiko ( professor at the University of Tampere, Finland ) participated in the forum.
The Guro घोषणा, adopted during the forum, aims to set up a portal site for e-government development and to establish a concrete project in order to bridge the digital divide among the world 's cities.
इस अभ्यास रै महरूम recognised लिये providing a नई महत्वपूर्ण कदम in the विकास of e-democracy.
The e-participation forum was a key factor for Guro to play the leading role in bridging the digital divide among शहरों, to provide i.t. उद्यमों स्तिथ in Guro Digital Industrial Complex the opportunity to launch into the international market, to improve its image and become a global leader to concrete e-democracy.

A wonton ( also spelled wantan, wanton, or wuntun in transcription from Cantonese ; Mandarin : húndùn ) is a type of पकौड़ी commonly मिला in a number of Chinese cuisines.
Many people were involved in the invention of radio as we now know it.
Several संभावित विधि of बेतार संचार were considered, including inductive and capacitive induction and transmission through the ground, however the method used for radio today exclusively involves the transmission and reception of electromagnetic waves.
After early speculation on the subject, experimental work on the connection between electricity and magnetism began around 1820 with the work of Hans Christian Ørsted and continued with the work of andré-marie एम्पीयर, जोसेफ हेनरी, और माइकल Faraday.
These investigations culminated in the complete theory of electromagnetism developed by जेम्स Clerk Maxwell.
This theory described the theoretical basis of the propagation of electromagnetic waves.
After Maxwell 's theory was published many people experimented with बेतार communication, some intentionally using Maxwell 's theory some not.
It is माना संभावित कि the first intentional transmission of a signal by means of electromagnetic waves was performed by David Edward Hughes around 1880, although this was considered to be induction at the time.
The first systematic and unequivocal हस्तांतरण of em waves was performed by Heinrich Rudolf Hertz and described in papers published in 1887 and 1890.
Hertz famously considered these results as being of छोटी practical value.
After Hertz 's work many people were involved in the development of components और सिद्धान्त शामिल साथ the transmission and reception of electromagnetic waves.
Others, notably guglielmo Marconi, were concerned with practical improvements and the commercial application of radio to wireless telegraphy.
बाद on रेगिनाल्ड A. Fessenden became the first to send an audio signal by means of electromagnetic waves.
Scurvy is a disease resulting from a deficiency of vitamin C, which is required for the संश्लेषण of collagen in humans.
The chemical name for vitamin C, ascorbic acid, is derived from the Latin name of scurvy, scorbutus, जिससे भी provides the adjective scorbutic ( `` of, characterized by or having to do with scurvy '' ).
Scurvy often presents itself initially as लक्षण of malaise और lethargy, followed by formation of spots on the skin, spongy gums, and bleeding from the mucous membranes.
Spots are most abundant on the thighs and legs, and a person with the ailment looks पाले, feels उदास, और is partially immobilized.
As scurvy advances, there can be खोलें, suppurating wounds, loss of teeth, jaundice, fever, neuropathy and death.
Scurvy was at one time common among sailors, pirates and others aboard ships at sea longer than perishable fruits and vegetables could be stored ( subsisting instead only on cured and salted meats और सूखी दाने ) और by सैनिको similarly वंचित of these foods for extended periods.
It was described by Hippocrates ( c. 460 BC–c. 380 bc ), और हर्बल cures for scurvy have been known in many native cultures since prehistory.
Scurvy was one of the limiting factors of marine travel, often killing large numbers of the passengers and crew on long-distance voyages.
This became a significant issue in Europe from the beginning of the modern era in the Age of Discovery in the 15th century, continuing to खेल a significant role through World War I in the 20th century.
While today scurvy is known to be caused by a nutritional कमियां, जबतक the अलगाव of विटामिन c और सीधा प्रमाण of its link to scurvy in 1932, numerous theories and treatments were proposed, often on little or no experimental data.
This inconsistency is attributed to the lack of vitamin c as a पृथक अवधारणा, an अक्षमता to reliably link different foods ( notably present in fresh citrus, watercress, and organ meat ) to scurvy.
An additional concept required to understand scurvy was the degradation of vitamin C by exposure to air and तांबे और अन्य परिवर्तन मेटल salts such as those of iron, thus changing the links of foods to scurvy over time.
Treatment by fresh food, particularly citrus fruit, was periodically implemented, as it had been since antiquity.
However until the 1930s, treatment was inconsistent, with many ineffective treatments प्रयुक्त into the 20th सदी.
It was a स्कॉटिश सर्जन in the royal नेवी, जेम्स lind जो first proved it could be treated with citrus fruit in experiments he described in his 1753 book, A Treatise of the Scurvy, though his advice was not implemented by the Royal Navy for several decades.
In infants, scurvy is sometimes referred to as Barlow 's बीमारी, नामित बाद सर थामस barlow, a British physician who described it.
However, Barlow 's बीमारी may also refer to mitral valve prolapse.
Other eponyms लिये स्कर्वी शामिल Moeller 's disease and Cheadle 's disease.
Scurvy does not occur in most animals क्युकी they can synthesize their own vitamin C.
However, humans and other higher primates ( the simians - monkeys and apes - and tarsiers ), guinea pigs, most or all bats, and some species of birds and fish lack an enzyme ( L-gulonolactone oxidase ) necessary for such synthesis and must obtain vitamin C through their diet.
Vitamin C is widespread in plant tissues, with particularly high concentrations occurring in citrus fruits ( oranges, lemons, limes, grapefruits ), tomatoes, potatoes, cabbages, and green peppers.
Iron is a chemical तत्व with the symbol Fe ( from ) and atomic number 26.
It is a मेटल in the first transition series.
It is the most common element ( by mass ) forming the planet Earth as a whole, forming much of Earth 's बाहरी और भीतरी core.
It is the fourth most common element in the धरती 's crust.
Iron 's very common presence in रॉकी ग्रह जैसे Earth is due to its abundant production as a result of fusion in high-mass stars, where the production of nickel-56 ( which decays to the most common isotope of iron ) is the last nuclear fusion reaction that is exothermic.
This causes radioactive nickel to become the last element to be उत्पादित पहले पतन of a supernova leads to the explosive events that scatter this precursor radionuclide of iron abundantly into space.
Like other group 8 तत्व, आयरन exists in a wide range of oxidation states, −2 to +6, although +2 and +3 are the most common.
Elemental iron occurs in meteoroids and other low oxygen environments, but is reactive to oxygen and water.
Fresh iron surfaces appear lustrous silvery-gray, but oxidize in सामान्य एयर to दे hydrated iron oxides, commonly known as rust.
Unlike many other metals which form passivating oxide layers, iron oxides occupy more volume than iron metal, and thus iron oxides flake off and expose fresh surfaces for संक्षारण.
Iron metal has been प्रयुक्त since ancient times, though copper alloys, which have lower melting temperatures, were used first in history.
Pure iron is soft ( softer than aluminium ), but is unobtainable by smelting.
The material is significantly hardened और strengthened by impurities from the smelting process, such as carbon.
A certain proportion of carbon ( between 0.002 % and 2.1 % ) produces स्टील, which may be up to 1000 times harder than pure iron.
Crude iron metal is produced in blast furnaces, where ore is reduced by coke to pig iron, जिससे रै a high carbon content.
Further refinement with oxygen reduces the carbon content to the सही proportion to make steel.
Steels and low carbon iron alloys with other metals ( alloy steels ) are by far the most common metals in industrial use, due to their great range of desirable properties and the abundance of iron.
Iron chemical compounds, which include ferrous and ferric compounds, have many uses.
Iron oxide mixed साथ aluminium powder can be ignited to create a thermite reaction, used in welding and purifying ores.
It फ़ॉर्म शब्दकोष compounds with the halogens and the chalcogens.
Among its organometallic यौगिकों is ferrocene, the first sandwich compound discovered.
Iron plays an important role in biology, forming complexes with molecular ऑक्सीजन in hemoglobin and myoglobin ; these two compounds are common oxygen transport proteins in vertebrates.
Iron is also the मेटल प्रयुक्त at the active site of many important redox enzymes dealing with cellular respiration and oxidation and reduction in plants and animals.
The Blue Cross ब्लू शील्ड संघ ( BCBSA ) is a federation of 38 separate health insurance organizations and companies in the United States.
Combined, they directly or indirectly provide health insurance to over 99 million Americans.
The history of Blue Cross तिथियाँ वापस to 1929, जबकि the history of Blue Shield dates to 1939.
The Blue Cross Association dates back to 1960, जबकि इसके ब्लू शील्ड बंटवारा was created in 1948.
The two organizations merged in 1982, forming the current association.
A potato chip ( known as a chip in American, Australian, New Zealand, Canadian, Singaporean, Hong Kong, South African and Jamaican English ; as a crisp in British English and Hiberno-English, and as either a chip or wafer in Indian English ) is a thin slice of potato that is deep fried or baked until crunchy.
Potato चिप्स हैं commonly परोसा as an appetizer, side dish, or snack.
The basic chips are cooked and salted ; additional varieties are manufactured using विभिन्न flavorings and ingredients including seasonings, herbs, spices, cheeses, and artificial additives.
`` Crisps '', however, may also refer to many different types of savory snack products sold in the United Kingdom and Ireland, some made from potato, but may also be बना इससे मक्का, tapioca or अन्य cereals.
An उदाहरण of ये kinds of savory snacks is Monster Munch.
Potato chips are a predominant part of the स्नैक खाना मार्केट in English-speaking countries and numerous other Western nations.
The global potato chip market generated कुल revenues of US $ 16.4 billion in 2005.
This accounted for 35.5 % of the total savory snacks market in that year ( US $ 46.1 billion ).
Henry Clay, Sr. ( April 12, 1777 – June 29, 1852 ) was a वकील, राजनेता और skilled orator who represented Kentucky in both the Senate and in the House of Representatives.
He served three अलग terms as Speaker of the United States House of Representatives and was also Secretary of State from 1825 to 1829.
He lost his campaigns for president in 1824, 1832 and 1844.
Clay was a dominant फिगर in both the First and Second Party systems.
As a leading war hawk in 1812, he favored war with ब्रिटेन और निभाई a significant role in leading the nation to war in the War of 1812.
In 1824 he भागा लिये president and lost, but threw his electoral votes to John Quincy Adams, who made him secretary of state as the Jacksonians denounced what they considered a `` corrupt bargain. ''
He ran and lost again in 1832 and 1844 as the candidate of the whig पार्टी, जिससे he founded and usually dominated.
Clay was the foremost proponent of the American System, fighting for an increase in tariffs to foster industry in the United States, the उपयोग of संघीय funding to निर्माण और maintain अवसंरचना, and a strong national bank.
He opposed the annexation of Texas, fearing it होता इंजेक्ट the गुलामी issue into politics.
Clay also opposed the Mexican-American War and the `` Manifest Destiny `` policy of Democrats, जिससे लागत उसे मत in the close 1844 election.
Dubbed the `` Great Pacificator, '' Clay brokered important compromises दौरान the nullification Crisis and on the slavery issue.
As part of the `` Great Triumvirate `` or `` Immortal Trio, '' along with his colleagues Daniel Webster and John C. Calhoun, he was instrumental in formulating the Missouri Compromise of 1820 and the Compromise of 1850.
He was viewed as the प्राथमिक प्रतिनिधि of पश्चिमी interests in this group, and was given the names `` Henry of the West '' and `` The Western Star. ''
A plantation owner, Clay आयोजित स्लेव दौरान उसके lifetime but freed them in his Will.
Abraham Lincoln, the Whig leader in Illinois, was a great admirer of Clay, saying he was `` my ideal of a great man. ''
Lincoln wholeheartedly supported Clay 's economic programs.
In 1957, a Senate Committee selected Clay as one of the five greatest U.S. Senators, साथ साथ डेनियल वेबस्टर, John C. Calhoun, Robert La Follette, and Robert Taft.
BJ 's Wholesale Club, Inc., commonly referred to simply as BJ 's, is a membership-only warehouse club chain operating on the United States East coast, as खूब as in the state of Ohio.
The company is ranked # 232 on Fortune magazine 's 2010 listing of America 's 500 largest public corporations.
The Wizard of Oz, known during his शासनकाल as the ग्रेट और शक्तिशाली oz, is the epithet of ऑस्कर zoroaster Phadrig Isaac Norman Henkel Emmannuel Ambroise Diggs, a fictional character in the Land of Oz, created by American author L. Frank Baum.
The character was further popularized by the classic 1939 फिल्म, wherein his full name is not mentioned.
Kristinia Jamie DeBarge ( ; born March 8, 1990 ) is an American singer, songwriter, नर्तकी and actress.
She first appeared on national television in 2003 as a contestant on the अमरीकी आइडल spin-off, American Juniors.
In 2009, DeBarge signed a contract with the Island Records department Sodapop, releasing her debut album Exposed in July of the same year.
The पहला सिंगल, `` अलविदा ``, reached the top 20 in the US and Canada.
The lead single ( `` Cry Wolf '' ) from her untitled sophomore album was released on सितंबर 27, 2012.
The Hawaii Warriors football team represents the विश्वविद्यालयों of hawaiʻi at Mānoa in NCAA Division I FBS college football.
The team is coached by Norm Chow.
It was part of the Western Athletic Conference until July 2012, जब the टोली joined the पहाड़ West Conference.

Marvin Gaye ( April 2, 1939April 1, 1984 ), born Marvin pentz gay, Jr., was an American singer-songwriter and musician.
Gaye helped to shape the sound of Motown Records in the 1960s with a string of hits including `` How Sweet It Is ( To Be loved By You ) `` and `` I Heard It Through the Grapevine `` and duet recordings with Mary Wells and Tammi Terrell, later earning the titles `` Prince of Motown '' and `` Prince of Soul ''.
During the 1970s, Gaye recorded the अवधारणा एल्बम कया 's going on और let 's मिलेंगी it on और became among the first artists in Motown to break away from the reins of its production company.
Gaye 's बाद रिकार्डिंग बहकावे several R & B subgenres such as quiet storm and neo-soul.
Following a period in Europe under a tax निर्वासन in the early 1980s, Gaye released the 1982 Grammy Award-winning hit `` Sexual Healing `` and the Midnight Love album.
Since his death in 1984, Gaye has been posthumously honored by many institutions, including the Grammy Lifetime उपलब्धि Award and the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame.

The Chernobyl disaster (, Chornobylska Katastrofa – Chornobyl Catastrophe ) was a catastrophic nuclear accident that occurred on 26 April 1986 at the Chernobyl Nuclear Power संयंत्र in युक्त ( तब officially the यूक्रेनी ssr ), which was under the direct jurisdiction of the central authorities of the Soviet Union.
An explosion and fire released large quantities of radioactive particles into the atmosphere, जिससे स्प्रेड over much of the पश्चिमी ussr और यूरोपीय.
The Chernobyl disaster is widely considered to have been the worst nuclear power plant accident in history, and is one of only two classified as a level 7 event on the अंतरराष्ट्रीय नाभिकीय इवेंट स्केल ( the अन्य होने the फुकुशिमा daiichi nuclear disaster in 2011 ).
The battle to contain the contamination and avert a greater catastrophe ultimately शामिल over 500,000 workers and cost an estimated 18 billion rubles.
The official Soviet casualty count of 31 deaths has been disputed, and long-term प्रभाव ऐसे as cancers and deformities are still being accounted for.
