Mrs. Claus is the wife of Santa Claus, the Christmas gift-bringer in North अमरीकी और यूरोपीय क्रिसमस tradition.
She is known for making cookies with the elves and preparing toys with her husband Santa Claus.
Her first name is a mystery, though she has been referred to as Mary, Jessica, Layla, Annette, Heidi, or Martha.
HijackThis ( also HiJackThis or HJT ) is an open source enumerating tool for Microsoft Windows originally created by Merijn Bellekom, and later sold to Trend Micro.
The program is notable for targeting browser-hijacking methods, rather than relying on a database of known spyware.
It scans a user 's computer quickly, and displays browser hijacking locations, प्रर्दशित कया entries are there.
HijackThis is used primarily for diagnosis of browser hijacking, as uninformed उपयोग of इसके हटाना सुविधाएं can cause significant software damage to a computer.
HijackThis does not remove or detect spyware ; it सूचियाँ सबसे आम locations where browser hijacking activity can occur.
Browser hijacking can cause malware to be installed on a computer.
On February 16, 2012, Trend Micro released the HijackThis source code as open source and it is अभी उपलब्धियाँ on the sourceforge site.
Saddle Creek Records is an अमरीकी रिकार्ड label based in Omaha, Nebraska.
Started as a college class project on entrepreneurship, the label was founded by माइक mogis और जस्टिन oberst in 1993 ( as lumberjack Records ).
Mogis soon turned over his role in the कम्पनी to Robb Nansel.
The label is named after Saddle Creek Road, a street that cuts through the east side of midtown Omaha, and the beginnings of a scene whose members included Conor Oberst ( then a solo artist, फिलहाल of उज्जवल आँखें, Conor Oberst and the Mystic Valley Band, Desaparecidos and Monsters of Folk ), Tim Kasher ( then of Slowdown Virginia, currently of Cursive and The Good Life ), and others.
Collectively, they were ज्ञात unofficially as the `` Creekers ''.
काठी क्रीक पहला appeared in print on a show flyer, offering to `` Spend an evening with Saddle Creek '' ( later to be the title of the label 's DVD. )
काठी क्रीक became an incorporated entity as a result of a class project on entrepreneurship.
वितरण is संभाला by the वैकल्पिक Distribution Alliance, which is under the Warner Music Group umbrella.
Saddle Creek Records continues to be the फ्लैगशिप लेबल of a style of music called `` The Omaha Sound ``, characterized by a slight country twang.
This is increasingly inaccurate, though, with the rise of अधिक इलेक्ट्रॉनिक sounds such as those favored by The Faint and Broken Spindles.
The eclectic sounds of Saddle Creek 's disparate member bands is somewhat explained by their history ; a number of the original members of the label attended grade school together.
A `` sister label '', of sorts, to Saddle Creek is Team Love, started by Conor Oberst in 2004.
The label opened arms to their पहला bands not based in Omaha in 2001 with releases by Now It 's Overhead and Sorry About Dresden.
Other non-Nebraskan artists followed, including Los Angeles 's Rilo Kiley, Eric Bachmann ( formerly leader of Archers of Loaf and Crooked Fingers from North Carolina ), Georgie James ( Washington D.C. ), Two Gallants ( San Francisco ), और सबसे recently Tokyo Police Club ( Toronto ).
In 2005, Spend an Evening with Saddle Creek, a वृत्तचित्र detailing the पहला टेन सालो of the record label 's history, was released.
The DVD features extensive interviews with the Saddle Creek bands, archival footage, and rare live प्रदर्शन.
On June 8, 2007, the label opened their own music venue named Slowdown ( after the group slowdown वर्जिनिया ), स्तिथ in शहर ओमाहा, नेब्रास्का.
The following is a list of episodes लिये the टेलीविज़न show Full House.
in कुल, वहीँ यहूद 192 एपीसोड फिल्माया लिये the दिखाएँ over the कोर्स of इसके आठ सीज़न, इससे 1987 to 1995.
Full House is a situation कॉमेडी जिससे क्रॉनिकल्स a widowed father 's struggles of raising his three young daughters and the lives that they have touched.
The patriarch of the family, डैनी ( bob saget ), आमंत्रण उसके brother-in-law जेसी ( John Stamos ) and his best friend Joey ( Dave Coulier ), to help raise his children ( Candace Cameron, Jodie Sweetin, and Mary Kate/Ashley Olsen ), after his wife was killed during an automobile accident involving a drunk driver.
After episodes 88 and 89, Jesse marries Becky ( Lori Loughlin ), and वे move into the attic.
Then, after episodes 104 and 105, Becky and Jesse have twin boys named Nicky और एलेक्स ( डेनियल और Kevin Renteria/Blake and Dylan Tuomy-Wilhoit ).
The series ends with episode 192, `` Michelle Rides Again Part 2 '', when मिशेल loses उसके मेमोरी और the परिवार tries to restore it.
Notice of Stamp Act of 1765 in समाचारपत्र
अमरीकी अखबारों reacted to the Stamp Act with anger and predictions of the demise of journalism.
The Stamp Act 1765 ( short title Duties in American Colonies Act 1765 ; 5 जार्ज iii, c. 12 ) imposed a सीधा tax by the British Parliament specifically on the colonies of British America, and it required that many printed materials in the colonies be produced on stamped paper produced in London, carrying an embossed revenue stamp.
These printed materials were legal documents, magazines, newspapers और अनेक अन्य प्रकार of paper used throughout the colonies.
Like previous taxes, the स्टैम्प कर था to be सशुल्क in valid British currency, not in colonial paper money.
The purpose of the tax was to help pay for troops stationed in North America after the British victory in the सात Years ' War.
The British government felt that the colonies were the primary beneficiaries of this military उपस्थिति, और चाहिए अदा at तनिक a portion of the expense.
The Stamp Act met great resistance in the colonies.
The colonies sent no representatives to Parliament, and therefore had no influence over what taxes were raised, how they were levied, or how they would be spent.
Many colonists माना it a उल्लंघन of उनके अधिकारों as अंग्रेजो to be taxed बगैर उनके सहमति —consent कि तभी the औपनिवेशिक विधानमंडलों could ग्रान्ट.
औपनिवेशिक assemblies sent petitions and protests.
The Stamp Act Congress held in New York City, reflecting the first significant joint colonial response to any British माप, भी petitioned पार्लियामेंट और the King.
Local protest groups, led by colonial merchants and landowners, established connections through पत्राचार कि निर्मित a loose coalition that extended from New England to Georgia.
Protests and demonstrations initiated by the Sons of Liberty often turned violent and destructive as the masses became involved.
Very soon all stamp tax distributors were intimidated into resigning their commissions, और the कर थी never effectively collected.
विपक्ष to the Stamp Act was not limited to the colonies.
British merchants और निर्माताओं, जिनकी निर्यात to the colonies were threatened by colonial economic problems exacerbated by the tax, also pressured Parliament.
The Act was repealed on कूच 18, 1766 as a पदार्थ of expedience, but Parliament affirmed its power to legislate for the colonies “in all cases whatsoever” by also passing the Declaratory Act.
There followed a series of new taxes and regulations, likewise opposed by the colonists.
The episode played a major role in defining the grievances and enabling the व्यवस्थित औपनिवेशिक प्रतिरोध that led to the American Revolution in 1775.
pt-105 underway.
PT boats were a variety of torpedo-armed तेज़ attack craft used by the United States Navy in World War II to attack larger surface ships.
`` PT '' is the us hull classification symbol for `` Patrol Torpedo ''.
The PT boat squadrons were nicknamed `` the mosquito बेड़े ''.
The Japanese called them `` Devil नौकाएँ ''.
The original pre– World War I torpedo boats यहूद designed with `` displacement '' hulls.
They displaced up to 300 टन and the top speed was.
the PT boats used in World War II were built using the planing -type hull form developed for racing boats.
They were much smaller ( 30–75 टन ) and faster ( 35–40 knots ).
Both types were designed to strike at larger warships with torpedoes, using relatively high speed to get close, and small size to avoid being spotted and hit by gunfire.
They यहूद much less expensive than large warships.
PT boats were much faster, smaller, and cheaper than conventional ( विस्थापन hull ) vessels.
During World War II, American PT boats engaged enemy destroyers और numerous other surface craft, ranging from small boats to large supply ships.
PT boats also operated as gunboats against enemy small craft, such as armored barges used by the Japanese forces for inter-island transport.
Good Friday is a religious holiday observed primarily by Christians commemorating the crucifixion of Jesus Christ and his death at Calvary.
The holiday is observed during Holy Week as part of the paschal triduum on the शुक्रवार preceding Easter Sunday, and may coincide with the Jewish observance of Passover.
It is also ज्ञात as Holy Friday, Great Friday, Black Friday, or Easter Friday, though the latter properly refers to the Friday in Easter week.
Based on the details of the Canonical gospels, the Crucifixion of Jesus was most likely to have been on a Friday ( the day before the Sabbath ) ( ).
The estimated year of the Crucifixion is AD 33, by two different समूह, और originally as ad 34 by Isaac Newton via the differences between the Biblical and Julian calendars and the crescent of the moon.
A third method, using a completely different astronomical approach based on a lunar Crucifixion darkness and eclipse model ( consistent with Apostle Peter 's सन्दर्भ to a `` moon of blood '' in Acts 2:20 ), points to Friday, 3 April AD 33.
the ग्रेट जलाशय is the largest क्षेत्रफल of endorheic watersheds in उत्तर अमेरिका.
It is noted for both its arid शर्तें और इसके जलाशय और दायरा topography that varies from the North American low point at Badwater Basin to the highest point of the contiguous United States, less than away at the summit of Mount Whitney.
The region spans several physiographic divisions, biomes / ecoregions, और रेगिस्तान.
Raster may refer to:
रास्टर ग्राफिक्स, आलेखीय techniques using arrays of pixel values
रास्टर graphics editor, a computer program
Raster scan, the pattern of image readout, हस्तांतरण, storage, and reconstruction in television and computer images
Rasterisation, or rasterization, conversion of a vector image to a raster image
Raster image प्रोसेसर, or rip, a घटक of a printing system that performs rasterisation
Raster इन्टरनेट, a computer interrupt signal
Raster to vector, an image conversion प्रक्रम
Raster bar, an effect used in कंप्यूटर demos
Raster-Noton, a record लेबल
Rastrum, a device प्रयुक्त in मध्यकालीन music manuscripts to draw staff lines
Raster Document Object, a file format
Beowulf ( ; Old English : ) is a legendary Geatish hero and later turned king in the epic poem named after him, one of the oldest surviving pieces of literature in the English language.
The attack on Pearl Harbor ( called Hawaii Operation or Operation AI by the Japanese Imperial General Headquarters ( Operation Z in planning ) and the Battle of Pearl Harbor ) was a surprise military strike conducted by the Imperial Japanese Navy against the United States naval base at Pearl हार्बर, हवाई, on the morning of दिसम्बर 7, 1941 ( December 8 in Japan ).
From the standpoint of the defenders, the attack commenced at 7:48 a.m. Hawaiian Time.
The attack was intended as a preventive कार्रवाई in अनुक्रम to रखना the u.S. प्रशांत Fleet from interfering with military actions the Empire of Japan was planning in Southeast Asia against overseas territories of the United Kingdom, the Netherlands, and the United States.
The base was attacked by 353 Japanese fighters, bombers and torpedo planes in दो लहरें, launched from six aircraft carriers.
All eight U.S. Navy battleships were damaged, with four being sunk.
Two of these were later raised, and with the remaining four repaired, छह battleships returned to service later in the war.
The Japanese also sank or damaged three cruisers, three destroyers, an anti-aircraft training ship, and one minelayer.
188 U.S. वायुयान यहूद नष्ट ; 2,402 Americans were killed and 1,282 wounded.
Important base installations such as the power station, shipyard, maintenance, and fuel and torpedo storage facilities, as well as the पनडुब्बी piers and headquarters building ( also home of the intelligence section ) were not attacked.
Japanese losses were light : 29 aircraft and five midget submarines lost, and 65 servicemen killed or wounded.
एक जापानी sailor was captured.
The attack came as a profound shock to the American people and led directly to the American entry into संसार युद्ध ii in दोनो the प्रशांत और यूरोपीय theaters.
The following day ( December 8 ), the United States घोषित war on Japan.
Domestic support for non-interventionism, which had been strong, disappeared.
Clandestine support of Britain ( for example the Neutrality Patrol ) was replaced by active alliance.
Subsequent operations by the U.S. prompted जर्मनी और इटली to declare war on the U.S. on December 11, which was reciprocated by the U.S. the same day.
There were numerous historical precedents for unannounced military action by Japan.
However, the lack of any formal warning, particularly while negotiations were still apparently ongoing, led President Franklin D. Roosevelt to proclaim December 7, 1941, `` a date which will live in infamy ``.
U.S. Route 85 ( US 85 ) is a north–south United राज्य highway that runs for in the Mountain - Northern Plains states of the United States.
The southern terminus of the route is at the United states-mexico किनारा in el पासो, टेक्सास, connecting with Mexican Federal Highway 45.
The northern terminus is at the United States-Canada border in Fortuna, उत्तर डकोटा, where the route continues north as Saskatchewan Highway 35.
In both the संयुक्त राज्य और Saskatchewan, Canada the route is known as the CanAm Highway.
Sections of US 85 are considered part of the Theodore Roosevelt Expressway.
The United States presidential election of 1968 was the 46th quadrennial अध्यक्षीय election, held on Tuesday, November 5, 1968.
The Republican nominee, पूर्व vice-president Richard Nixon, won the election over the Democratic nominee, incumbent Vice-President Hubert Humphrey.
निक्सन भागा on a अभियान कि promised to restore law and order to the nation 's cities, torn by riots and crime.
Analysts have argued the चुनाव of 1968 is a realigning election as it permanently disrupted the New Deal Coalition that had dominated presidential politics for 36 years.
Coming four years after Democrat Lyndon B. Johnson won in a historic landslide, the election saw the incumbent president forced out of the race and a Republican elected for the first समय in बारह सालो.
It was a wrenching national experience, conducted during a year of violence that included the assassination of civil rights leader Martin Luther King, Jr., and subsequent race riots across the nation, the assasination of Democratic presidential candidate Robert F. Kennedy, widespread opposition to the Vietnam War across university campuses, and violent confrontations between police and anti-war protesters at the 1968 Democratic National Convention as the Democratic party split again and again.
The election featured the strongest तीसरा पार्टी प्रयत्न चूंकि 1912 by पूर्व Alabama Governor George Wallace, a Democrat.
Because Wallace 's campaign opposed federal intervention in the South to end school segregation, he carried the गहन South and ran well in ethnic industrial districts in the North.
This was the last election in which नई यॉर्क था the सबसे votes in the electoral college ( 43 votes ).
After the 1970 जनसांख्यिकी, कैलिफ़ोर्निया gained the most electoral votes and has remained the most populous state since then.
This is the latest election where a presidential ticket won बगैर carrying the vice presidential candidate 's home state.
Windows Task Manager is a task manager or System monitor application included with the microsoft खिड़कियाँ nt परिवार of ऑपरेटिंग प्रणालियों कि provides सीमित सूचना about computer performance and running applications, processes and CPU usage, commit charge and memory information, network activity and statistics, logged-in users, and system services ( and as often is the case with software tools provided by Microsoft for Windows, 3rd party software is available which fills the requirements more thoroughly, e.g, `` Process Explorer '', `` Extended Task Manager '', `` Anvir Task Manager '', `` Process Hacker '', and `` System Explorer '' ).
The Task Manager can also be used to set process priorities, processor affinity, forcibly terminate processes, and shut down, restart, hibernate or log off from Windows.
Windows Task Manager was introduced with खिड़कियाँ NT 4.0.
Previous versions of खिड़कियाँ nt included the Task List application, which had far fewer features.
The task list थी सक्षम of listing currently running processes and killing them, or creating a new process.
In Windows XP only, a Shutdown menu is also present that allows access to Standby, Hibernate, Turn off, Restart, Log बंद और स्विच User.
Earlier versions of Microsoft Windows ( microsoft खिड़कियाँ 3.x, खिड़कियाँ 95, खिड़कियाँ 98 ) had a program known as tasks to display the programs currently running.
This file was executed by running the taskman.exe file from the C : \खिड़कीs निर्देशिका.
Kanji ( ; ) are the adopted logographic Chinese characters ( hanzi ) that are used in the modern Japanese writing system along with hiragana ( ひらがな, ), katakana ( カタカナ, ), Hindu-Arabic numerals, and the occasional use of the Latin alphabet.
The Japanese term kanji ( ) लिये the Chinese characters literally means `` Han characters '' and is written using the same characters as the Chinese hanzi ( ).
John R Williams ( May 4, 1782 – October 20, 1854 ) was an American soldier, merchant, and politician who is most well known for सेवारत as the पहला महापौर of Detroit, Michigan.
In total, he served as Detroit 's mayor for five अन्य terms.
He also was a brigadier general in the संयुक्त राज्य फौज during the Black Hawk War.
A simple शुष्क magnetic portable compass.
A smartphone that can be used as a compass because of the magnetometer inside.
An iPhone that can be used as a geological कम्पास क्युकी of the 3-axis teslameter and 3-axis accelerometer inside it
A military compass that was used during संसार War I.
A compass is a navigational instrument that shows directions in a frame of reference that is stationary relative to the surface of the earth.
The frame of reference defines the four cardinal directions ( or अंक ) – north, south, east, and west.
इंटरमीडिएट directions are also defined.
Usually, a diagram called a compass rose, which shows the दिशानिर्देश ( with their names usually abbreviated to initials ), is marked on the compass.
When the compass is in use, the rose is aligned with the real directions in the फ़्रेम of सन्दर्भ, so, लिये उदाहरण, the `` N '' mark on the rose really points to the north.
Frequently, in addition to the rose or sometimes instead of it, angle markings in degrees हैं दिखाया on the compass.
North corresponds to शून्य डिग्री, and the angles increase clockwise, so east is 90 degrees, south is 180, and west is 270.
These numbers allow the compass to show azimuths or bearings, which are commonly stated in this notation.
The magnetic compass was first invented as a device लिये भविष्यवाणी as early as the Chinese Han Dynasty ( Since about 206 BC ).
The compass was used in Song राजवंश China by the military for navigational orienteering by 1040-1044, and was used for maritime navigation by 1111 to 1117.
The use of a कम्पास is recorded in Western Europe between 1187 and 1202, and in Persia in 1232.
the शुष्क कम्पास was invented in Europe around 1300.
This was supplanted in the early 20th century by the liquid-filled magnetic compass.
The Inca Empire or Inka Empire ( quechua : tawantinsuyu ) was the largest empire in pre-Columbian America.
The प्रशासनिक, राजनैतिक and military center of the empire was located in Cusco in modern-day Peru.
The Inca civilization arose from the हाइलैंड्स of पेरू sometime in the early 13th century.
From 1438 to 1533, the Incas used a variety of methods, from conquest to peaceful assimilation, to incorporate a large portion of western South America, centered on the Andean mountain ranges, including, besides Peru, large parts of modern Ecuador, western and south central Bolivia, northwest Argentina, north and central Chile, and southern Colombia into a state comparable to the historical empires of Eurasia.
The official language of the empire was Quechua, although hundreds of local languages and dialects of Quechua were spoken.
The Inca referred to their empire as Tawantinsuyu which can be translated as The Four Regions or The चार संयुक्त प्रांतों.
There were many local forms of worship, most of them concerning local sacred `` Huacas ``, but the Inca leadership encouraged the worship of Inti —the sun god—and imposed its sovereignty above other cults ऐसे as कि of Pachamama.
The Incas considered उनके किंग, the Sapa Inca, to be the `` child of the sun. ''
The kidneys are organs that serve several essential regulatory भूमिकाएँ in सबसे पशु, including vertebrates and some invertebrates.
They are essential in the urinary system and also serve homeostatic functions such as the regulation of इलेक्ट्रोलाइट्स, मेंटेनेंस of acid–base संतुलन, और regulation of blood pressure ( via maintaining salt and water balance ).
They serve the body as a natural filter of the blood, and remove wastes जिससे are diverted to the urinary bladder.
In producing urine, the kidneys excrete wastes ऐसे as यूरिया और अमोनियम, और they are also responsible for the reabsorption of water, glucose, and amino acids.
The kidneys also produce hormones including calcitriol, erythropoietin, and the enzyme renin.
Located at the rear of the abdominal cavity in the retroperitoneum, the kidneys receive blood from the paired renal धमनियों, और नाली into the युग्म renal veins.
Each kidney excretes मूत्र into a ureter, itself a paired structure that empties into the urinary bladder.
Renal physiology is the study of kidney function, while nephrology is the medical specialty चिंतित with kidney diseases.
Diseases of the kidney are diverse, but individuals with kidney disease frequently display characteristic नैदानिक सुविधाएँ.
Common clinical conditions involving the kidney include the nephritic and nephrotic syndromes, renal cysts, acute kidney injury, chronic kidney disease, urinary tract infection, nephrolithiasis, and urinary tract obstruction.
Various cancers of the kidney exist ; the सबसे आम वयस्क renal cancer is renal cell carcinoma.
Cancers, cysts, and some other renal conditions can be प्रबंधित साथ हटाना of the गुर्दा, or nephrectomy.
जब renal फलन, measured by glomerular filtration rate, is persistently poor, dialysis and kidney transplantation may be treatment options.
Although they are not severely नुकसानदेह, kidney stones can be painful and a nuisance.
The removal of kidney stones involves ultrasound उपचार to ब्रेक up the पत्थरों into छोटी टुकड़े, जिससे are then passed through the urinary tract.
One common symptom of kidney stones is a sharp pain in the medial/lateral खण्ड of the lower back.
Lockton Companies Inc. is the world 's largest privately held insurance brokerage firm, providing बीमे, रिस्क प्रबन्धन और कर्मचारी लाभ समाधान.
In जोड to इसके Kansas City, Missouri headquarters, Lockton operates 60 locations in 17 countries.
Lockton is currently home to more than 4,450 Associates worldwide.
The company was founded by Jack Lockton in 1966 and रै चूंकि become the world’s 9th largest insurance brokerage firm.
Lockton serves a wide array of industries with services that include risk प्रबन्धन, casualty, surety, पेशेवर indemnity and more.
For 46 years, Lockton posted extraordinary organic growth, with global revenues reaching $ 915 million in फिस्कल 2012.
Lockton Benefits Group : Lockton’s Employee Benefit’s team works closely with insurance carriers and administrators to create व्यापक और integrated benefits strategies for clients.
The Lockton Benefits Group provides services including compliance, executive benefits, health and welfare, health risk solutions, रिटायरमेंट and more.
Lockton Affinity : Lockton अपनापन, an संबद्ध of lockton कंपनियाँ, meets the बीमे needs of affinity groups, franchises, professional organizations, and associations of all sizes.
Lockton Affinity offers a किस्में of insurance product options and programs.
Products include : General Liability, Professional Liability, प्रॉपर्टी, मजदूर मुआवजे, Directors & Officers Liability, Commercial Auto, Specialty Coverage, Excess, Health Plans and more.
lockton अंतरराष्ट्रीय : Lockton International operates offices in the UK and Ireland, as well as offices throughout Asia and Latin America.
In यूरोपीय, Lockton International is a partner in EOS RISQ, Europe’s leading insurance broking and risk management consultancy.
EOS RISQ is an equity-based European साझेदारी of प्रमुख स्वतंत्र बीमे brokers with over 3,500 employees based in more than 30 countries in Europe.
Lockton International provides specialized समाधान लिये निजी lines, SME’s and major multi-national clients.
White chocolate is a chocolate डेरिवेटिव.
It commonly consists of cocoa मक्खन, sugar, milk solids and salt, and is characterized by a pale yellow or ivory appearance.
The melting point of cocoa butter, its primary cocoa bean component, is high पर्याप्त to रखना श्वेत chocolate solid at room temperature.
Donald Leon `` Don '' Blankenship ( born March 14, 1950 ) was Chairman and CEO of Massey Energy Co., the sixth largest coal company ( by 2008 उत्पादन ) in the संयुक्त States.
He served in those roles from November 30, 2000, until दिसम्बर 31, 2010.
Blankenship is an active financial backer of the Republican party and participant in लोकल और राज्य राजनीती, विशेषकर in his home state of West Virginia.
He has frequently spoken out publicly about politics, the environment, unions, and coal production.
U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission filings show Blankenship was paid $ 17.8 million in 2009, the highest in the coal industry.
उसके 2009 pay represents a $ 6.8 million raise over 2008 and almost double his compensation package in 2007.
Blankenship also received a deferred compensation package valued at $ 27.2 लाख in 2009.
On December 3, 2010, Blankenship announced that he was retiring as CEO at the end of the साल, और would be succeeded by Massey President Baxter F. Phillips Jr.

Negligence ( Lat. negligentia, from neglegere, to neglect, literally `` not to pick up something '' ) is a failure to exercise the care that a reasonably prudent person would exercise in like circumstances.
The area of tort law known as लापरवाही involves नुक़सान caused by carelessness, not intentional harm.
According to Jay M. Feinman of the Rutgers विश्वविद्यालयों स्कूल of Law ;
`` The core idea of negligence is that people should exercise reasonable care when they act by taking account of the potential harm that they might foreseeably cause harm to other people. ''
`` those who go personally or bring property जहाँ वे जान कि वे or it may आइये into टक्कर साथ the persons or property of others have by law a duty cast upon them to use reasonable care and skill to avoid such a collision. ''
फ्लेचर v Rylands ( [ 1866 ] LR 1 Ex 265 )
Through civil litigation, if an घायल व्यक्ति proves कि another व्यक्ति acted negligently to cause their injury, they can recover damages to compensate for their harm.
Proving a case for negligence can potentially entitle the injured plaintiff to compensation for harm to their body, property, mental well-being, वित्तीय औकात, or अंतरंग relationships.
However, because negligence cases are very fact-specific, this general definition does not fully explain the concept of when the law will require one person to compensate another लिये नुकसान caused by accidental injury.
Further, the law of negligence at common law is only one aspect of the विधि of देयता.
Although resulting damages must be proven in order to recover मुआवजे in a लापरवाही action, the nature and extent of those damages are not the primary focus of negligence cases.
A melanocytic nevus ( भी ज्ञात as `` nevocytic nevus '' ) is a type of lesion that contains nevus cells ( a type of melanocyte ).
Some sources equate the term mole with `` melanocytic nevus ''.
Other sources reserve the term `` mole '' for other purposes.
The majority of moles appear during the first two decades of a person’s life, while about one in every 100 babies is born with moles.
Acquired औज़ार हैं a रूप of benign फुलाव, जबकि जन्मजात moles, or congenital nevi, are considered a minor malformation or hamartoma and may be at a higher risk for melanoma.
A mole can be either subdermal ( under the skin ) or a pigmented विकास on the स्किन, formed mostly of a type of cell known as a melanocyte.
The high concentration of the body’s pigmenting agent, मेलेनिन, is responsible for their dark color.
औज़ार हैं a सदस्य of the family of skin lesions known as nevi.
The comprehensive metabolic panel, or chemical screen, ( CMP ; CPT code 80053 ) is a panel of 14 blood tests which serves as an आरंभिक व्यापक चिकित्सा स्क्रीनिंग tool.
The CMP provides a rough check of kidney फलन, जिगर फलन, और electrolyte and fluid balance, but it is far from perfect.
Abnormal values from a CBC may be a परिणाम of गलत positives और यूँ the cbc may need to be repeated for a patient ( or replaced with a more specific test ).
the cmp is an expanded version of the basic metabolic panel ( BMP ), which does not include liver tests.
A CMP ( or BMP ) can be ordered as part of a routine physical examination, or may be used to monitor a patient with a chronic disease, such as मधुमेह mellitus or hypertension.
Previous names for the panel of tests have been Chem 12, Chemistry panel, रसायन स्क्रीन, sma 12, SMA 20 and SMAC ( Sequential Multiple Analysis - Computer ).
the परीक्षण हैं performed on मशीने आधारित on the autoanalyzer invented in 1957.

Natural gas is a naturally occurring हाइड्रोकार्बन गैस mixture consisting primarily of methane, but commonly including varying amounts of other hydrocarbons, carbon dioxide, nitrogen, and hydrogen sulfide.
Natural gas is an energy source प्रायः प्रयुक्त लिये heating, cooking, and electricity generation.
It is also used as fuel for vehicles and as a chemical feedstock in the manufacture of plastics and other commercially महत्वपूर्ण सशुल्क रसायन.
Natural gas is found in गहन underground natural rock formations or associated with other hydrocarbon reservoirs in coal beds and as methane clathrates.
Petroleum is also another संसाधन found in proximity to and with natural gas.
Most natural gas was निर्मित over समय by two mechanisms : biogenic and thermogenic.
Biogenic गैस is निर्मित by methanogenic organisms in marshes, bogs, landfills, and shallow sediments.
Deeper in the earth, at greater temperature and pressure, thermogenic gas is created from buried organic material.
Before natural gas can be used as a ईंधन, it जरूर undergo प्रसंस्करण to remove impurities, including water, to meet the specifications of marketable natural gas.
The by-products of processing include इथेन, प्रोपेन, butanes, pentanes, and higher molecular weight hydrocarbons, hydrogen sulfide ( which may be converted into pure sulfur ), carbon dioxide, water vapor, and sometimes helium and nitrogen.
Natural gas is often informally referred to simply as gas, especially when compared to other energy sources such as oil or coal.
This page is about the कल्पना Movers band.
For information about the tv दिखाएँ अभिनीत the band, see Imagination Movers ( TV series ).
कल्पना मूवर्स is a band formed in New Orleans, Louisiana, in 2003.
The lineup शामिल Rich Collins, Scott Durbin, Dave Poche, and Scott `` Smitty '' Smith.
Members of the समूह यहूद longtime friends and neighbors.
The group प्रारंभ as a television/music concept which was pitched to local PBS affiliates in New Orleans.
WLAE-TV was the first to take an interest in the group and later introduced them to Beth Courtney, the अध्यक्ष & मुख्य कार्यपालिका अधिकारी at Louisiana Public Broadcasting.
Soon after, LPB began airing one-minute videos produced by the कल्पना मूवर्स themselves.
The Movers built a sizable regional following by setting educational songs for kids to melodies और लय कि वयस्कों appreciate as well.
They sold more than 100,000 नक़ल of their self-produced CDs and DVDs.
Their three indie CDs : `` Good Ideas, '' `` Calling All Movers, '' and `` Eight Feet '' along with their grass roots DVD `` Stir It Up '' have, संयुक्त, जीती चौदह नेशनल awards, from such groups as the National Association of Parenting Publications ( NAPPA ) and Parents ' Choice.
In early 2005, Disney took notice, और initiated negotiations to add the Movers to the company 's roster.
These were interrupted in August when the flood protection designed and built by the Army Corps of इंजीनियर्स to protect New Orleans failed.
The resulting floodwater claimed the band 's office, as well as the homes of कॉलिन्स, durbin और poche – लकिन the सौदे was signed in the spring of 2006.
In 2008, Walt Disney Records introduced the Imagination Movers ' music to the nation with the release of the Movers ' first nationally-released cd, `` Juice Box Heroes. ''
In September 2008, a 30-minute दिखाएँ featuring the समूह began airing on the Disney Channel 's preschool programming block known as Playhouse Disney, and currently airs on Playhouse Disney 's replacement, Disney Junior.
The मूवर्स लिखें और perform all the songs on their show.
Moreover, the Imagination Movers have received नाजुक kudos for their live concert performances.
In October 2009, the Imagination Movers started the `` Live from the Idea Warehouse कॉन्सर्ट दौरे 2009 ''.
Traveling from mid-October to mid-December 2009 their live performances include lots of their favorite songs and नाचना, as खूब as वीडियो appearances of Warehouse Mouse.
Beginning in early-February 2011 and wrapping up in late May 2011, the Imagination Movers presented their `` In a Big Warehouse Concert Tour, '' playing अधिक than 100 shows in 50+ cities across North America.
From March to October 2012, the कल्पना मूवर्स toured North America on their post-Disney `` Rock-O-Matic '' tour.
The show maintained several elements of the original TV concept, such as an on-stage `` idea emergency '' and several sets from their older catalogue ; however, with the प्रस्थान of वेन्डी calio वापस to उसके देशी हवाई, the अक्षर `` नीना '', साथ with her musical numbers, is not present.
The tour promotes the Imagination Movers ' new album/DVD रिलीज, `` rock-o-matic '', which features all new music from the band.
The album itself is produced independently of Disney and has a notably more mature, contemporary rock-and-roll ध्वनि, हालांकि स्टिल बहुत उचित for children.
Several performance dates यहूद स्थानांतरित to बाद in 2012 to benefit from the increased exposure of the Imagination Movers TV show now playing daily on Disney Junior.
The platypus ( Ornithorhynchus anatinus ) is a semiaquatic mammal endemic to eastern Australia, सहित तस्मानिया.
Together with the four species of echidna, it is one of the five extant प्रजाति of monotremes, the तभी स्तनधारियों that lay eggs instead of giving birth.
It is the sole living representative of its family ( ornithorhynchidae ) और genus ( ornithorhynchus ), though a number of related species have been found in the fossil record.
The unusual appearance of इस egg-laying, duck -billed, beaver -tailed, otter -footed mammal baffled European naturalists when they first encountered it, with some considering it an elaborate fraud.
It is one of the few venomous mammals, the male platypus having a spur on the हिन्द foot that delivers a venom capable of causing severe pain to humans.
The unique features of the platypus make it an important subject in the study of evolutionary biology and a recognisable and iconic symbol of Australia ; it has appeared as a mascot at national events and is featured on the reverse of its 20-cent coin.
The platypus is the animal emblem of the state of New South Wales.
Until the early 20th century, it थी hunted लिये इसके फर, but it is now protected throughout its range.
Although captive प्रजनन programmes have had only limited success and the platypus is vulnerable to the effects of pollution, it is not under any immediate threat.
The Chupacabra or Chupacabras (, from chupar `` to चूस '' और cabra `` बकरी '', वस्तुतः `` बकरी sucker '' ) is a legendary cryptid rumored to inhabit parts of the Americas.
It is associated more recently with sightings of an allegedly unknown animal in प्यूर्टो रीको ( जहाँ ये sightings were first reported ), Mexico, and the United States, especially in the latter 's Latin American communities.
The name comes from the animal 's reported habit of attacking and drinking the रक्त of पशुधन, विशेषकर goats.
Physical descriptions of the प्राणी vary.
Eyewitness sightings have been claimed as early as 1995 in Puerto Rico, and have since been reported as far north as Maine, and as far south as Chile, and even being spotted बाहर the americas in countries like Russia and The Philippines.
It is supposedly a heavy creature, the size of a small bear, with a row of spines reaching from the neck to the base of the tail.
Sighting reports of the Chupacabra have been disregarded as uncorroborated or lacking evidence, while most reports in उत्तरी मैक्सिको और the दक्षिणी संयुक्त राज्य have महरूम verified as canids afflicted by mange.
biologists and wildlife management officials view the chupacabra as a contemporary legend.
The North American Free Trade Agreement ( NAFTA ) is an agreement signed by कनाडा, मैक्सिको, और the United States, creating a trilateral trade bloc in North America.
The agreement came into force on जनवरी 1, 1994.
It superseded the Canada–United States Free Trade Agreement between the u.S., कनाडा, and Mexico
NAFTA has two supplements : the North American Agreement on Environmental Cooperation ( NAAEC ) and the उत्तर अमरीकी अनुबंध on Labor Cooperation ( NAALC ).
Thermal comfort is the condition of mind that expresses satisfaction with the thermal environment and is assessed by subjective मूल्यांकन ( ANSI / ASHRAE Standard 55 ).
Maintaining this standard of thermal comfort for occupants of buildings or other enclosures is एक of the महत्वपूर्ण लक्ष्य of HVAC ( heating, ventilation, and air conditioning ) design engineers.
The Predicted Mean Vote ( PMV ) model stands among the most पहचाना thermal comfort models.
It was developed using principles of heat balance and प्रायोगिक आंकड़ा एकत्रित in a नियंत्रित जलवायु chamber under steady state conditions.
Because the PMV model was derived from data collected in a controlled climate, it is not suitable for अनुप्रयोग in naturally हवादार spaces which often have high levels of air movement.
This shortcoming motivated the development of a family of empirical statistical models of थर्मल सुकून in naturally ventilated spaces known as adaptive models.
Adaptive models of thermal comfort consider occupants as dynamically interacting with their environment, and controlling their thermal comfort by अर्थात् of clothing or window-opening and closing.
This is in contrast to thermal सुकून in sealed buildings, in which occupants experience the environment passively.
Thermal comfort is affected by heat conduction, convection, radiation, and evaporative ऊष्मा loss.
Thermal comfort is maintained when the ऊष्मा उत्पन्न by human metabolism is allowed to dissipate, thus maintaining thermal equilibrium with the surroundings.
It has been long recognized that the sensation of feeling hot or ठंडा is नहीं बस निर्भर on एयर तापमान alone.
Thermal comfort calculations according to ANSI/ASHRAE Standard 55 can be freely performed with the CBE थर्मल सुकून औजार लिये ashrae-55.
Durante degli Alighieri, simply referred to as Dante (, ; ; c. 1265–1321 ), was a major इतालवी poet of the Middle Ages.
His Divine Comedy, originally called ' and later called ' by Boccaccio, is widely considered the greatest literary work composed in the Italian भाषा and a masterpiece of world literature.
In Italy he is known as ' ( `` the परम् Poet '' ) or just '.
He, Petrarch and Boccaccio are also known as `` the three fountains '' or `` the three crowns ''.
Dante is also called the `` Father of the इतालवी language ''.

( ) is a tire and rubber company आधारित in जापानी.
It is भाग of the Sumitomo Group.
The company traces its origins to 1909, when the Sumitomo Group made an investment in Dunlop Japan, the newly formed जापानी subsidiary of the British company Dunlop Rubber.
Over the years Sumitomo and Dunlop developed a close business relationship, and in 1963 the sumitomo समूह acquired control of Dunlop Japan and renamed it Sumitomo Rubber Industries Ltd.
In 1985, when Dunlop Rubber was taken over by BTR plc, the company acquired the automobile tire एसेट of dunlop, including the right to use the Dunlop brand on automobile tires.
the अधिग्रहण किया नहीं शामिल the US and Australian businesses, which were separately owned, but in 1986 Sumitomo also acquired the Dunlop Tire Corporation of the US from its management.
In 1997, Sumitomo formed a joint venture with Goodyear Tire and Rubber Company, by which Goodyear and Sumitomo agreed to manufacture tires for each other 's markets, सहित dunlop ब्रांडेड tires.
As part of the agreement, Goodyear acquired 75 % interests in Dunlop Tyres, the UK company which Sumitomo had formed, and in Dunlop Tire Corporation.
Goodyear and Sumitomo also made investments in प्रत्येक other.
Today, the company makes a चौड़ी दायरा of रबर आधारित उत्पाद, including automobile tires, golf balls and tennis balls.
Microsoft Visual Studio Express is a set of freeware integrated development environments ( IDE ) developed by Microsoft that are lightweight संस्करण of the Microsoft Visual Studio product line.
Express Editions यहूद conceived beginning with Visual Studio 2005.
The विचार of एक्स्प्रेस editions is to provide streamlined, easy-to-use and easy-to-learn IDEs for users other than professional software developers, such as hobbyists and students.
The Alps are one of the great mountain range systems of Europe stretching लगभग across eight Alpine countries from Austria and Slovenia in the east, Switzerland, Liechtenstein, Germany, France to the west and Italy and Monaco to the south.
The mountains were formed over hundreds of millions of years as the African and Eurasian tectonic plates collided.
Extreme shortening caused by the event resulted in समुद्री sedimentary रॉक्स उठती by thrusting and folding into high mountain peaks such as Mont Blanc and the Matterhorn.
Mont Blanc spans the French–Italian border, and at is the highest पहाड़ in the Alps.
The Alpine region area contains अनेक चोटियों higher than, known as the `` four-thousanders ``.
The altitude and size of the range affects the climate in Europe ; in the mountains precipitation levels vary greatly and climatic शर्तें consist of distinct zones.
Wildlife such as ibex live in the higher peaks to elevations of, and plants such as Edelweiss grow in rocky areas in lower elevations as well as in उच्चतर elevations.
Evidence of human habitation in the ऐल्प्स goes वापस to the Paleolithic era.
A mummified man, संकल्पित to be 5,000 years old, was discovered on a glacier at the Austrian–Italian border in 1991.
By the 6th century BC, the Celtic La Tène संस्कृति थी खूब स्थापित.
Hannibal may have crossed the Alps with a झुंड of elephants, and the Romans had settlements in the region.
In 1800 Napoleon crossed one of the mountain गुजरता with an army of 40,000.
The 18th and 19th centuries saw an influx of naturalists, writers, and artists, in particular the Romantics, followed by the golden age of alpinism as mountaineers began to ascend the चोटियों.
In World War II the Third Reich invaded the अल्पाइन countries, with the exception of Switzerland and Liechtenstein ; Adolf Hitler kept a base of operation in the Bavarian Alps throughout the war.
The Alpine region has a strong सांस्कृतिक पहचान.
The traditional culture of farming, cheesemaking, and woodworking still exists in Alpine villages, although the tourist industry began to grow early in the 20th century and expanded greatly after World War ii to become the प्रबल उद्योग by the end of the century.
The Winter Olympic Games have been hosted in the Swiss, French, Italian, Austrian और जर्मनी ऐल्प्स.
At present the region is home to 14 million people and रै 120 million annual visitors.
Lois patrice Griffin ( née Pewterschmidt ) is a character from the animated television series Family Guy.
She is voiced by writer Alex Borstein and first appeared on television, along with the rest of the family in the 15-minute short on December 20, 1998.
Lois थी created and designed by series creator Seth MacFarlane.
MacFarlane was asked to pitch a pilot to the Fox Broadcasting Company based on Larry and Steve, a short made by macfarlane जिससे प्रदर्शित a middle-aged character named Larry and an intellectual dog, Steve.
After the pilot was given the ग्रीन लाइट, the griffin परिवार appeared on the episode `` Death Has a Shadow ``.
लोइस is the माँ of the Griffin family.
With उसके husband पीटर, वो has had three children : Meg, Chris, and Stewie.
Lois is often portrayed as a stereotypical television mother, despite her admitting to being a drug user, a recovering meth addict kleptomaniac.
Lois has also had several affairs, one of which allegedly resulted in the conception of Meg.
She has appeared in other media relating to Family Guy—including a video game, commercials और books—and प्रेरित an entire line of merchandise.
Lois 's distinctive New York accent originated इससे a अक्षर in a stage show that Alex Borstein had performed in, which was largely inspired by a relative who grew up on Long Island, New York.
Family transmission of Basque भाषा ( Basque as initial language )
Percentage of students registered in Basque language schools ( 2000–2005 ).
स्थान of the Basque-language provinces within Spain and France
Basque ( endonym :, ) is the ancestral language of the Basque लोगों, जो inhabit the बास्क देश, a प्रदेश spanning an area in northeastern Spain and southwestern France.
It is spoken by 27 % of Basques in all territories ( 714,136 आउट of 2,648,998 ).
Of these, 663,035 live in the Spanish part of the Basque country and the remaining 51,100 live in the French part.
In academic चर्चाएँ of the distribution of Basque in Spain and France, it is customary to refer to three ancient provinces in France and four Spanish provinces.
Native speakers are concentrated in a संलग्न area including parts of the Spanish autonomous communities of the Basque Country and Navarre and in the western half of the French département of Pyrénées-Atlantiques.
The Basque Autonomous Community is an administrative entity within the binational ethnographic Basque Country incorporating the traditional Spanish provinces of Biscay, Gipuzkoa, and Álava, which retain उनके अस्तित्व as politico-administrative विभाजन.
These प्रांतों और अनेक क्षेत्रों of नावारा हैं heavily आबादी by जातीय basques, but Basque was, at least until the 1990s, not spoken as a native language in most of Álava, western parts of Biscay and central and southern areas of Navarre, either because it had been replaced by Spanish along the centuries, in some areas, or because it had never been spoken there, in other areas.
In southwestern France, the ancient basque-populated provinces were Labourd, Lower Navarre, and Soule.
They and other regions were consolidated into a single département in 1790 अंतर्गत the नाम basses-pyrénées, a name which persisted until 1970.
A standardized form of the बास्क भाषा, पुकारा euskara batua, was developed by the Basque Language Academy in the late 1960s.
Euskara Batua was created so that Basque भाषा could be used—and easily understood by all Basque speakers—in formal situations ( education, mass media, literature ), and this is its main use today.
The role of this standard Basque language depends on the linguistic educational model of प्रत्येक प्रदेश और प्रत्येक school.
In most areas of the स्पेनी बास्क देश, the शैक्षणिक Model D, where all subjects are taught in Basque, except `` Spanish language and literature '' ( which is taught in Spanish ) is now the predominant model.
In France, the बास्क भाषा स्कूल seaska और the संघ लिये a दुभाषिया ( Basque and French ) schooling Ikasbi meet a wide range of Basque language educational needs up to the Sixth Form, while often struggling to surmount financial and administrative constraints.
Apart from this standardized संस्करण, वहीँ हैं पाँच प्रमुख बास्क dialects : bizkaian, gipuzkoan, and Upper Navarrese in Spain, and Navarrese–Lapurdian and Zuberoan ( in France ).
Although they take their names from the mentioned historic provinces, the dialect boundaries are not congruent with province boundaries.
The President, Directors and Company, of the Bank of the United States, commonly known as the First Bank of the United States, was a सेंट्रल बैंको, चार्टर्ड लिये a पद of बीस सालो, by the United States Congress on February 25, 1791.
Establishment of the Bank was included in a three-part विस्तार of संघीय फिस्कल और मौद्रिक शक्ति ( साथ with a federal mint and excise taxes ) championed by Alexander Hamilton, first Secretary of the Treasury.
Hamilton believed a central bank was necessary to stabilize and improve the nation 's credit, and to improve handling of the financial business of the संयुक्त राज्य सरकारी अंतर्गत the newly enacted संविधान.
Officially proposed to the पहला सत्र of the पहला कॉंग्रेस in 1790, Hamilton 's Bank faced widespread resistance from opponents of increased federal power.
Secretary of State Thomas Jefferson and James Madison led the opposition, which claimed कि the bank was unconstitutional, and that it benefited merchants and investors at the expense of the majority of the population.
The First Bank building is now a National Historic Landmark located in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania within Independence National Historical Park.
James Wesley Marsters ( born August 20, 1962 ) is an American actor and musician.
Marsters first came to the attention of the general public playing the popular character Spike, a platinum-blond yobbish English vampire in the television series buffy the Vampire Slayer and its spin-off series, Angel, from 1997 to 2004.
Since then, he has gone on to play other science fiction roles, such as the alien supervillain Brainiac on the Superman -inspired series Smallville, the omnisexual time traveller Captain John Hart in British science-fiction दिखाएँ torchwood और आतंकवादी Barnabas Greeley in Sci fi 's Caprica.
Marsters appeared in a supporting भूमिका in the 2007 फिल्म P.S.
I Love तुम और as the main antagonist, Piccolo, in the 2009 fantasy adventure film Dragonball Evolution.
He appeared as a recurring character in the first season of the revival of Hawaii 5-0.
In molecular biology, human chorionic gonadotropin ( hCG ) is a hormone produced by the fertilized egg after conception.
Later during pregnancy it is made by the developing placenta, and later by the placental component syncytiotrophoblast.
Some cancerous tumors उपज this hormone ; therefore, elevated levels measured when the patient is not pregnant can lead to a cancer diagnosis.
however, it is नहीं ज्ञात whether this production is a contributing cause or an effect of tumorigenesis.
The pituitary analogue of hCG, known as luteinizing hormone ( LH ), is produced in the pituitary gland of males and females of all ages.
, the FDA has prohibited the sale of `` homeopathic '' and over the काउंटर hCG diet products and declared them fraudulent and illegal.
Beyoncé Giselle Knowles-Carter, known by her stage name Beyoncé ( ; born September 4, 1981 ), is an American singer, songwriter, नर्तकी, और actress.
Born and raised in Houston, Texas, she performed in singing and dancing प्रतियोगिताओं as a चाइल्ड पहले forming in 1990 a group with Kelly Rowland and LaTavia Roberson that was eventually named Destiny 's Child.
Once signed to Columbia Records, the girls subsequently became one of the संसार 's best-selling girl groups of all time.
The group was plagued by internal conflict and legal turmoil and Knowles suffered from depression कि lasted for a number of years.
During the group 's hiatus, Knowles released her debut solo album Dangerously in Love ( 2003 ), which earned her पाँच ग्रैमी Awards and has sold a total of 4.9 million copies in the US alone.
It spawned Billboard number one singles `` Crazy in Love, '' considered by VH1 to be the `` Greatest Song of the 00 's, '' and `` Baby Boy. ''
Following the disbandment of Destiny 's Child in 2005, नॉलेस 's दूसरी सोलो एल्बम B'Day ( 2006 ) contained the top five singles `` Déjà Vu ``, `` Irreplaceable ``, and `` Beautiful Liar ``.
Her performance in Dreamgirls ( 2006 ) अर्जित उसके दो सुनहरी Globe nominations.
Knowles ' work playing Etta James in that film inspired her subsequent एल्बम i Am...
Sasha Fierce ( 2008 ) which spawned hits `` If I Were a Boy ``, `` Single Ladies ( put a रिंग on it ) ``, `` Halo ``, and `` Sweet Dreams ``.
The album also helped Knowles earn six Grammys in 2010, breaking the record for most Grammy पुरस्कार जीती by a मादा कलाकार in one night.
Her fourth album 4 ( 2011 ) deviated towards traditional R & B and became her fourth लगातार क्रमांक एक एल्बम on the Billboard 200.
In January 2012, Knowles gave जनम to बेटी Blue Ivy Carter, her first child with husband Jay-Z.
Knowles has sold over 13 million albums in the US and 118 million रिकॉर्ड विश्वव्यापी ( as well as a further 50 million records with Destiny 's Child ), and is one of the best-selling music artists of all time.
The Recording Industry संघ of अमेरिका ( RIAA ) recognized Knowles as the Top Certified Artist of the 2000s.
In 2009, Billboard named her the Top Radio Songs Artist of the decade and ranked her the Top Female Artist and the fourth कलाकार of the दशक.
Beyoncé Knowles is the most nominated woman in Grammy Award history, receiving 17 awards ; other accolades include 12 MTV Video Music Awards, 7 Billboard Awards सहित a मिलेनियम पुरस्कार, और a स्टार on the हॉलीवुड चलना of Fame as part of Destiny 's Child.

it थी बाद covered by Tim McGraw with guest vocalist Faith Hill.
Released in July 2001, McGraw 's version was the दूसरी single from McGraw 's Set This Circus Down album.
the song reached Number One on the Billboard Hot Country Singles & Tracks ( now Hot Country Songs ) charts.

It थी released theatrically in North America on February 5, 2010.

They decide to exchange letters to प्रत्येक other after he is deployed to the war.

despite receiving negative reviews, the film made a strong box office performance, knocking off Avatar after seven weekends in first place and grossing a total of $ 114,977,104 worldwide.
The film was released on May 25, 2010 on DVD and Blu-ray.

Santa Fe ( ; ( Tewa : Ogha Po'oge, ) ) is the capital of the U.S. state of New Mexico.
It is the fourth-largest नगर in the state and is the seat of.
Santa Fe ( meaning “holy faith” in Spanish ) had a population of 67,947 in the 2010 census.
It is the प्रिंसिपल city of a Metropolitan Statistical Area which encompasses all of Santa Fe County and is part of the larger Albuquerque-Santa Fe-Las Vegas Combined Statistical Area.
The city’s full name when founded was La Villa Real de la Santa Fé de San फ्रांसिस्को de asís ( “the royal Town of the Holy Faith of St. Francis of Assisi” ).

1765 broadside
the बेटे of स्वतंत्रता थी a समूह consisting of अमरीकी देशप्रेमी कि originated in the pre-independence उत्तर अमरीकी अंग्रेजों colonies.
the समूह थी formed to protect the rights of the colonists and to take to the streets against the taxes by the British government.
They are best known for undertaking the Boston Tea Party in 1773, which led to the Intolerable Acts ( an intense crackdown by the अंग्रेजों सरकारी ), and a counter-mobilization by the Patriots.
ओसाका castle
is a नगर in the कन्साई region of Japan 's main island of Honshu, a designated city under the Local Autonomy Law, the capital city of Osaka Prefecture and also the largest part of the Keihanshin metropolis, which comprises three major cities of Japan, Kyoto, Osaka and Kobe.
Located at the mouth of the Yodo River on Osaka Bay, Osaka is Japan 's third largest नगर by जनसांख्यिकी after Tokyo ( special wards ) and Yokohama.
Keihanshin is the second largest metropolitan area in Japan by population and one of the largest metropolitan areas highly ranked in the world, with nearly 19 million people, and by GDP the second largest area in Japan and the seventh largest area in the world.
historically the commercial center of Japan, Osaka functions as one of the command centers for the Japanese economy.
The ratio between daytime and night time जनसांख्यिकी is 141 %, the उच्चतम in जापानी, highlighting its status as an economic center.
Its nighttime population is 2.6 million, the third in the country, but in daytime the population surges to 3.7 million, second only after Tokyo ( combining the special wards of Tokyo, which is नहीं a सिंगल incorporated नगर, for statistical purposes ; see the Tokyo article for more information on the definition and makeup of Tokyo ).
Osaka used to be referred to as the in feudal Edo period because it was the centre of trading लिये राइस, creating the first modern futures exchange market in the world.
The Little Mermaid is a 1989 American animated musical fantasy film produced by Walt Disney Feature Animation and distributed by Walt Disney Pictures.
Based on the Danish fairy tale by Hans Christian Andersen, The Little Mermaid tells the स्टोरी of a खूबसूरत mermaid who dreams of becoming human.
Written, directed, and produced by Ron Clements and John Musker, with music by Alan Menken and Howard Ashman, the film features the voices Jodi Benson, Christopher Daniel Barnes, Pat Carroll, Samuel E. Wright, Jason Marin, Kenneth मंगल, दोस्त hacket, और रेने Auberjonois.
The 28th film in the Walt Disney Animated Classics series, The Little Mermaid was released to theaters on November 14, 1989 to largely positive reviews, garnering $ 84 million at the box office during its initial release, and $ 211 million in total lifetime gross.
After the success of the 1988 डिज़्नी / amblin फिल्मी जो framed रोजर खरगोश, the छोटी मरमेड is given credit for breathing life back into the art of Disney animated feature films after a string of critical or commercial failures produced by Disney that dated back to the early 1970s.
It also marked the start of the era known as the Disney Renaissance.
A stage adaptation of the film with a book by Doug Wright and additional songs by Alan Menken and new गीतों ग्लेन स्लेटर खोली in डेनवर in जुलाई 2007 and began performances on Broadway January 10, 2008.
alt=Close-up photo of a metal spoon filled साथ a viscous, clear purple fluid
Purple drank is a slang term for a recreational drug popular in the hip hop community in the southern United States, originating in Houston, Texas.
Its प्रमुख संघटक is prescription -strength cough syrup containing codeine and promethazine.
Cough syrup is typically mixed with ingredients ऐसे as sprite नरम पेय or Mountain Dew and pieces of Jolly Rancher candy.
The purplish वर्ण of purple drank comes from dyes in the cough syrup.
There are numerous slang terms for purple drank, including sizzurp, lean, syrup, drank, barre, purple जेली, टेक्सास चाय, और tsikuni.
First/given, middle, and last/family/surname आरेख साथ J. S. Bach as example.
J. S. Bach shared his given name with six तात्कालिक family members and many extended family members.
He shared his family नाम with most family members.
A given name, in Western contexts often referred to as a first name, is a personal name that specifies and differentiates between सदस्यों of a समूह of individuals, especially in a family, all of whose members usually share the same family name ( surname ).
A given name is purposefully given, usually by a चाइल्ड 's अभिभावक at or near birth, in contrast to an inherited one such as a family name.
A given name is sometimes legally changed through a नाम बदलें.
Given names are often used in a familiar and friendly manner in अनौपचारिक परिस्थितियों.
In more formal situations the surname is used instead, unless it is necessary to distinguish between people with the same surname.
The idiom `` on a first-name basis '' ( or `` on first-name terms '' ) alludes to the अपनेपन of addressing another by a given name.
The western style of having both a family name ( surname ) and a given name is far from universal.
In अनेक countries it is common for ordinary people to have only one name ( a mononym ).
Hydrochloric acid is a साफ, colourless solution of hydrogen chloride ( H Cl ) in water.
It is a highly corrosive, strong mineral acid साथ अनेक industrial uses.
Hydrochloric एसिड is found naturally in gastric acid.
Historically called muriatic एसिड, और spirits of salt, hydrochloric acid was produced from vitriol ( sulfuric acid ) and common salt.
It first appeared during the Renaissance, and then it was प्रयुक्त by chemists ऐसे as Glauber, Priestley and Davy in their scientific research.
With major production starting in the Industrial Revolution, hydrochloric acid is used in the chemical industry as a रासायनिक अभिकर्मक in the large-scale production of vinyl chloride for PVC plastic, and MDI / TDI for polyurethane.
It has numerous smaller-scale applications, including household सफ़ाई, उत्पादन of जिलेटिन और other food additives, descaling, and leather processing.
About 20 million tonnes of hydrochloric acid are produced annually.
Wheat ( Triticum spp. ) is a cereal grain, originally from the Levant region of the Near East and Ethiopian Highlands, but now cultivated विश्वव्यापी.
In 2010, world उत्पादन of गेहूं थी 651 million tons, making it the third most-produced cereal after maize ( 844 million tons ) and rice ( 672 million tons ).
गेहूं was the second most-produced cereal in 2009 ; world production in that year was 682 million tons, after maize ( 817 million tons ), and with rice as a close third ( 679 million tons ).
This grain is grown on more land area than कोई अन्य commercial food.
संसार trade in wheat is greater than for all other crops combined.
Globally, wheat is the leading source of vegetable protein in human food, having a higher protein सामग्री than soybeans or the अन्य प्रमुख cereals, maize ( corn ) or rice.
In terms of total production tonnages used for food, it is currently second to rice as the main human food crop and ahead of maize, बाद allowing लिये मक्का 's अधिक extensive use in animal feeds.
Wheat was a key factor enabling the emergence of city-based societies at the start of civilization because it was one of the first crops that could be easily cultivated on a large scale, and had the अतिरिक्त लाभ of yielding a कटाई कि provides long-term storage of food.
Wheat contributed to the emergence of city-states in the Fertile Crescent, including the Babylonian and Assyrian empires.
गेहूं अनाज is a स्टेपल खाना प्रयुक्त to मेक आटा लिये leavened, flat and steamed breads, biscuits, cookies, cakes, breakfast cereal, pasta, noodles, couscous and for fermentation to make beer, other alcoholic beverages, or biofuel.
Wheat is planted to a limited extent as a forage crop for livestock, and its straw can be used as a निर्माण सामग्री for roofing thatch.
The whole grain can be milled to छोड़ बस the endosperm for white flour.
The by-products of इस हैं bran and germ.
The whole grain is a concentrated source of vitamins, minerals, and protein, while the refined grain is ज़्यादातर starch.

To publish is to make content available to the सामान्य public.
While specific use of the term may vary among देशों, it is usually applied to text, images, or other audio-visual content on any traditional medium, including paper ( newspapers, magazines, catalogs, etc. ).
The word publication means the act of publishing, and also refers to any printed copies.
Melissa & Joey is an एबीसी परिवार असली टेलीविज़न series starring Melissa Joan Hart and Joey Lawrence.
It first aired on एबीसी Family on August 17, 2010.
The series फ़ॉलो लोकल राजनेता Mel Burke ( Melissa Joan Hart ) and Joe Longo ( Joey Lawrence ), whom Mel hires to look after her niece and nephew after a Ponzi scheme leaves him broke.
The series was renewed by ABC परिवार for a second season of fifteen episodes, which began airing on May 30, 2012 and ended on August 29, 2012.
Melissa & Joey ranks as cable TV 's # 1 telecast at 8 o'clock across target audiences 18–34, 18–49 and 12–34 demographics.
On August 17, 2012, ABC Family renewed मेलिसा & जॉय लिये a तीसरा season, set to premiere in spring 2013.
The Dharma wheel, often used to represent the Noble eightfold Path
The Noble Eightfold पाथ (, ) is एक of the principal teachings of the Buddha, who described it as the way leading to the cessation of suffering ( dukkha ) and the achievement of self-awakening.
It is used to develop insight into the true nature of phenomena ( or reality ) और to eradicate greed, hatred, and delusion.
The Noble Eightfold Path is the fourth of the Buddha 's Four Noble Truths ; the पहला तत्व of the प्रतिष्ठित Eightfold Path is, in turn, an understanding of the Four Noble Truths.
It is also known as the Middle Path or मध्य Way.
All eight elements of the Path begin with the शब्द `` सही '', which translates the word samyañc ( in Sanskrit ) or sammā ( in Pāli ).
These denote completion, togetherness, and coherence, and can also suggest the senses of `` perfect '' or `` ideal ''.
'Samma ' is also translated as `` wholesome '', `` wise '' and `` skillful ''.
In Buddhist symbolism, the प्रतिष्ठित eightfold Path is often represented by means of the dharma wheel ( dharmachakra ), whose eight spokes represent the eight elements of the path.
The Grammy Award for Song of the Year is an honor presented at the Grammy Awards, a ceremony that was established in 1958 and originally called the Gramophone Awards.
Awards in several categories are distributed annually by the National Academy of Recording Arts and Sciences of the संयुक्त राज्य to `` सम्मान artistic achievement, technical proficiency and overall excellence in the recording industry, without regard to album sales or chart position. ''
Economics is the social science that analyzes the उत्पादन, distribution, and consumption of goods and services.
The term economics comes from the Ancient Greek ( ', `` management of a household, administration '' ) from ( ', `` house '' ) + ( ', `` custom '' or `` law '' ), hence `` rules of the house ( hold ) ''.
Political economy was the earlier name for the subject, but economists in the late 19th century suggested `` economics '' as a shorter term for `` economic science '' that also avoided a narrow political-interest connotation and as similar in form to `` mathematics ``, `` ethics '', and so forth.
A focus of the subject is how आर्थिक एजेंटों behave or interact and how economies work.
Consistent साथ इस, a प्राथमिक textbook distinction is between microeconomics and macroeconomics.
Microeconomics examines the behavior of basic elements in the economy, including व्यक्तिगत agents ( such as households and firms or as buyers and sellers ) and markets, and their interactions.
Macroeconomics analyzes the entire economy और मुद्दे affecting it, सहित unemployment, inflation, economic growth, and monetary and fiscal policy.
Other broad distinctions include those between positive economics ( describing `` what is '' ) and normative economics ( advocating `` what ought to be '' ) ; between economic theory and applied economics ; between rational and behavioral economics ; and between mainstream economics ( more `` orthodox '' and dealing with the `` rationality-individualism-equilibrium nexus '' ) and heterodox economics ( more `` radical '' and dealing with the `` institutions-history-social structure nexus '' ).
Economic analysis may be applied throughout समाज, as in business, finance, health care, and government, but also to such diverse subjects as crime, education, the family, law, politics, religion, social institutions, war, and science.
At the turn of the 21st सदी, the expanding domain of economics in the social sciences has been described as economic imperialism.
An increasing क्रमांक of economists have called for increased emphasis on environmental sustainability ; this area of research is known as Ecological economics.

Required findings for दवाएँ to be लगाई in this schedule:
The drug or अन्य पदार्थ रै a low potential for abuse relative to the drugs or other substances in schedule III.
The drug or other substance has a currently accepted चिकित्सा उपयोग in treatment in the United States.
Abuse of the drug or other substance may lead to limited physical dependence or psychological dependence relative to the दवाएँ or अन्य substances in अनुसूची III.
The पूरा सूची of Schedule IV drugs are as follows.
The प्रशासनिक नियंत्रित substances Code Number for each drug is included.
US काउंटी household median income 2009.
Median US household आय, 2001-2011
Household income is a measure commonly used by the United States government और निजी संस्थानों.
Each household is measured by the income of every resident over the age of 15.
Income includes wages and salaries, बेरोजगारी बीमे, विकलांगता भुगतान, चाइल्ड support payments received, regular rental receipts, as well as any personal business, investment, or other kinds of income received routinely.
जबकि inflation-adjusted ( `` real '' ) household income had been increasing almost every year from 1945 to 1999, it has since been flat and even decreased recently.
U.S. median household income fell इससे $ 51,144 in 2010 to $ 50,502 in 2011.
Extreme poverty in the United States, अर्थ households जीना on कम than $ 2 per day before government benefits, doubled from 1996 to 1.5 million households in 2011, including 2.8 million children.
The residents of the household do not have to be related to the head of the household for their earnings to be considered part of the household 's income.
As households tend to share a समान आर्थिक context, the use of household income remains among the most widely accepted measures of income.
That the size of a household is not commonly taken into खाता in ऐसे उपायों may विकृत कोई विश्लेषण of fluctuations within or among the household income categories, and may render direct comparisons between quintiles difficult or even impossible.
The lapse rate is defined as the rate of decrease with height for an atmospheric variable.
The variable शामिल is temperature unless specified otherwise.
The terminology arises from the शब्द बीतने in the sense of a decrease or decline.
While most often applied to Earth 's माहौल the अवधारणा can be extended to any gravitationally supported ball of gas.
Blue Mountain State is an American कॉमेडी श्रेणी that premiered on Spike on January 11, 2010.
The series producers include क्रिस Romano and Eric Falconer, and it is produced by Lionsgate Television.
The series is about a fictional university, Blue Mountain State, and its football team, `` The Mountain Goats. ''
It portrays certain aspects of American विश्वविद्यालयों जीवन, सहित football, sex, binge drinking, drugs, wild partying, and hazing.
In February 2012, it was reported that Blue Mountain State would not be नवीनीकृत for a fourth season.
In March 2013, Ed Marinaro stated that he is working on a ब्लू Mountain State film.
Apple Inc., formerly Apple Computer, Inc., is an American multinational corporation headquartered in Cupertino, California that designs, develops, and sells consumer इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स, कंप्यूटर software and personal computers.
Its best-known hardware products are the Mac लकीर of कंप्यूटर, the iPod music player, the iPhone smartphone, and the iPad tablet computer.
Its software includes the OS X and iOS operating प्रणालियों, the iTunes media browser, the Safari web browser, and the iLife and iWork creativity and production suites.
The company was founded on अप्रैल 1, 1976, और incorporated as Apple Computer, Inc. on January 3, 1977.
The word `` कंप्यूटर '' थी removed from its name on January 9, 2007, reflecting its shifted focus towards consumer electronics after the introduction of the iPhone.
Apple is the world 's second-largest information technology company by revenue after Samsung इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स, and the world 's third-largest mobile phone maker after Samsung and Nokia.
Fortune magazine named Apple the most admired company in the United States in 2008, और in the संसार इससे 2008 to 2012.
However, the company has received criticism for its contractors ' labor practices, and for ठहराना 's own environmental and business practices.
, Apple maintains 394 retail stores in fourteen countries as well as the online ठहराना स्टोर and iTunes Store.
It is the second-largest publicly traded निगम in the संसार by मार्केट capitalization, with an estimated value of US $ 414 billion as of January 2013.
, the कम्पनी था 72,800 permanent full-time employees and 3,300 temporary full-time employees worldwide.
Its worldwide सालाना आय in 2012 totalled $ 156 billion.
Section 8 housing in the दक्षिण Bronx
Section 8 of the Housing Act of 1937 ( ), often simply known as Section 8, as repeatedly amended, authorizes the payment of rental housing सहायता to निजी जमींदार on behalf of approximately 3.1 million low-income households.
It operates through several programs, the largest of which, the आवास चुनाव वाउचर program, pays a large portion of the rents and utilities of about 2.1 million households.
The US Department of Housing and Urban Development manages the Section 8 programs.
The Housing Choice Voucher Program provides `` tenant-based '' rental सहायता, so a tenant can move from one unit of at least minimum housing quality to another.
It also allows individuals to apply their monthly voucher towards the खरीदें of a घर, with over $ 17 billion going towards such purchases each year ( from ncsha.org analysis ).
The अधिकतम अनुमत वाउचर is $ 2200 a month.
Section 8 also authorizes a variety of `` project-based '' rental assistance programs, under which the owner reserves some or all of the units in a building for low-income tenants, in return for a Federal government guarantee to make up the अंतर between the किरायेदार 's योगदान और the किराया लिये 1 cent in the मालिक 's अनुबंध साथ the government.
A tenant who leaves a subsidized प्रोजेक्ट will lose access to the project-based subsidy.
The United States Department of Housing and शहरी विकास और संयुक्त States Department of Veterans Affairs have a special Section 8 program called VASH ( Veterans Affairs Supportive Housing ), or HUD-VASH, which gives out a certain number of Section 8 vouchers to eligible homeless and otherwise vulnerable US armed forces veterans.
